41002013	Yesu bwii kpee Galile ɔbʋn‐kaa, nɩɩ asa damantɛ ba ba mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ o piili ɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ.
41002014	Maa kyʋn ee kpee mʋ, o wu Alifeyo mu‐bii Lewi maa tɛ lenpoo ɔkɔɔlɛkpa. Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ba buu mɛ.” Nɩɩ Lewi kʋsʋ buu mʋ.
41002015	Ɩmʋ kamaa tɔ, Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba tɛ bee gyii Lewi kɩkpaara sʋ, nɩɩ lenpoo akɔɔlɛpʋ yɛ alibi awaapʋ damantɛ ba buu mʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ gaalaagaa ba be tii mʋ sʋ bee gyii agyitɔ.
41002016	Nɩɩ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ Farasii abi mʋ, ba maa wu fɛɛ Yesu maa alibi awaapʋ yɛ lenpoo akɔɔlɛpʋ ba maa gyii mʋ, ba taasɛ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ kʋtɔ sʋ nɩɩ maa falɛ asa ɩ tɛ bee gyii?”
41002017	Yesu nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Bamʋ nɩɩ ba mɛɛ lɔ mʋ, be mee biti ɔkyɛpʋ, amɔɔ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ lɔ. N man ba nɩn kɛ n ba tɩɩ adanbɩrasa awaapʋ, amɔɔ alibi awaapʋ.”
41002018	Gyɔn Okyugyeepu abɩɩlapʋ yɛ Farasii abi bee ŋmina kɔnɔ. Nɩɩ asa akʋ ba kpee Yesu asɛ naa taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ Gyɔn Okyugyeepu abɩɩlapʋ yɛ Farasii abi abɩɩlapʋ bee ŋmina kɔnɔ, nɩɩ fʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ bɩrɛ be mee ŋmina?”
41002019	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Kɩkyɩɩfɔ tɔ asa bɛɛ taalɛ ŋmina kɔnɔ yɛgɛ ɔkyɩɩfɔ mu‐kuli san ɔ bʋ bamʋ asɛ? Ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ waa kanɩn. Fɛɛ ɔkyɩɩfɔ mu‐kuli san bʋ bamʋ asɛ falɛ.
41002020	Amaa saŋa kʋ ɩɩ ba nɩɩ bee biti ba taa ɔkyɩɩfɔ mu‐kuli mʋ lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ. Kanɩn saŋa maŋa tɔ nɩɩ bee biti ba ŋmina kɔnɔ.
41002021	“Ba mɛɛ taa kikyibi pʋpwɛ bɛɛ mata kaalɛ dɩdaa ɔbɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ kii biti kɩ kyatɛ kaalɛ mʋ tii sʋ.
41002022	Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taa nta pʋpwɛ waa kʋtɔbwaaya ɔwʋlɛ taakpe dɩdaa tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ kan waa kanɩn, nɩɩ nta mʋ ɩɩ bɩlɛ mʋ, ii biti ɩ kyatɛ taakpe dɩdaa mʋ nyita, kɛ nta mʋ ɩ kyɛɛgɛ fɔyɩ. Amaa bɛɛ taa nta pʋpwɛ waa taakpe pʋpwɛ tɔ, kɛ ɩmʋ anyɔ mʋ ɩ man nyita.”
41002023	Kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa kʋ, nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba naa alʋn kadɔɔ kʋ tɔ, nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba piili bɛɛ gyayɩ alʋn mʋ ɩkʋ.
41002024	Nɩɩ Farasii abi mʋ ba yɛ, “Kɩɩ, mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fʋ abɩɩlapʋ bɛɛ waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man dɛ ɔkpa kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa?”
41002025	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan man pɩɩta kalɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Owura Dawidi maa mʋ kamaa tɔ abi ba waa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ akʋn a mɔɔ bamʋ mʋ nɩn?
41002026	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Abiyata kyɩna ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ, Owura Dawidi loo Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa obu mʋ tɔ naa taa bodobodo mʋ nɩɩ ba taa lɛɛ saraga sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ wɛ, nɩɩ ɔ sa mʋ kamaa tɔ abi, yɛgɛ ɩ man dɛ ɔkpa fɛɛ ba wɛ ɩmʋ, amɔɔ aseepu mʋ nkʋn.”
41002027	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ fɛɛ, “Nyɩmɩsa kɩdanbɩrasa sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ waa kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa mʋ, man gyɛ nyɩmɩsa nɩɩ ba waa sa kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa mʋ sa.
41002028	Ɩmʋ sʋ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n kyɔ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa mʋ gbaa.”
41003001	Yesu bwii kpee kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa. Ɔnyɩn kʋ mʋ nɩɩ mʋ kɩbaa ki wu mʋ bʋ tʋtɔ.
41003002	Asa akʋ mɔɔ ba bʋ tʋtɔ nɩɩ bee biti kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba nyɛ asɩn akʋ taa pwɩɩ Yesu. Ɩmʋ sʋ ba tɛ bee gyoo fɛɛ Yesu ii biti ɔ kyɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ, abɛɛ ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ kyɛ mʋ.
41003003	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ yɛ, “Kʋsʋ yɩlɛ bamʋ ansi tɔ nfɩɩ.”
41003004	Nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ asa mʋ yɛ, “Kɩmɔmɔ nɩɩ anɛ nbara mʋ ɩɩ sa ɔkpa fɛɛ a waa kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ? Adanbɩrasa abɛɛ alibi? A mɔlɩgɛ asa abɛɛ a mɔɔ?” Asa mʋ ba man taalɛ tɔwɛ sɛhn.
41003005	Nɩɩ Yesu kɩɩ bamʋ kyaabɔɔ agbʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɩ kɔ mʋ gaa lɩɩ bamʋ kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn sʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ yɛ, “Tɛɛŋɛ fʋ kɩbaa.” Nɩɩ ɔ tɛɛŋɛ mʋ kɩbaa, nɩɩ ki kyiŋi.
41003006	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Farasii abi mʋ ba lɩɩ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ba maa Herodi kamaa abi ba naa waa kɔnɔ kʋlʋn ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ba taa kɛ ba mɔɔ Yesu.
41003007	Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba lɩɩ ɩkaa sʋ kpee Galile ɔbʋn ɔkaa, nɩɩ asa damantɛ ba lɩɩ Galile yɛ Gyudeya ɩsʋwʋlɛ sʋ ba buu mʋ.
41003008	Akʋ ba lɩɩ Gyerusalem kadɛ lala yɛ ɩsʋwʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ Idumiya, yɛ Gyɔdan ɔbʋn kyɔwɛ kɩlɩɩ yɛ Taayi maa Sidon ndɛ lala mʋ abaafʋn. Asa damantɛ ba ba Yesu asɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa.
41003009	Sakyɔ mʋ sʋ mʋ, Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ ba lɔŋɔ ɔkʋlɩ yɩla mʋ, kɛ ba man nyɛ nin tiri mʋ tɔ.
41003010	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ kyɛ asa damantɛ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ san bɛɛ lɔ mʋ kpini, bee nin bee tiri mʋ, kɛ ba nyɛ mata mʋ.
41003011	Nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi wuya ana ba kan wu mʋ mʋ, bɛɛ lɩɩ bɛɛ tɩyɛ mu ansi tɔ, kɛ ba kuusi tɔwɛ fɛɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ.”
41003012	Nɩɩ Yesu ɩ gya bamʋ fɛɛ ba man tɔwɛ ɔkʋ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ.
41003013	Nɩɩ Yesu kpee kɩbɩɩ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti, nɩɩ ba ba mʋ asɛ.
41003014	Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ bamʋ tɔ asa kudu anyɔ, nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ bamʋ fɛɛ asunpu. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N lɛɛ fanɛ fɛɛ fan baa fan bʋ mɛ asɛ, kɛ n sun fanɛ fan naa tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn.
41003015	N biti n sa fanɛ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan taalɛ taa gya nbwɩɩ libi.”
41003016	Asa kudu anyɔ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ mʋ atɩɩ ndee. Simon (mʋ nɩɩ Yesu yɩla mʋ kɩtɩɩ yɛ Pita).
41003017	Sebedi mu‐bii ana Gyemisi yɛ Gyɔn, (mʋ nɩɩ Yesu yɩla bamʋ kɩtɩɩ yɛ Bwanegesi ɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, Bʋlayɩ kikpira nbii).
41003018	Bamʋ akʋ ɩ gyɛ Andiruwu yɛ Filipu yɛ Batolome yɛ Matiwu yɛ Tomasi yɛ Alifeyo mu‐bii Gyemisi yɛ Simon Seloti,
41003019	yɛ Gyuda Isikariyoti, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ ba lɛɛ Yesu sa mʋ.
41003020	Nɩɩ Yesu bwii kpee kewu tɔ. Nɩɩ sakyɔ bɩla ba mʋ asɛ, halɩɩ maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba man nyɛ saŋa kɛ ba gyii.
41003021	Mʋ kʋʋpʋ ana ba maa nu falɛ mʋ, ba sun ba naa kɩtaa mʋ ba, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba nu asa bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ i nyita.
41003022	Nɩɩ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba lɩɩ Gyerusalem mʋ akʋ ba yɛ, “Yesu sʋ Beelisebu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ nbwɩɩ libi kumu mʋ ɔlʋn. Mʋ ɩɩ sa mʋ ɔlʋn nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ ɛɛ gya nbwɩɩ libi falɛ.”
41003023	Ɩmʋ sʋ Yesu tɩɩ bamʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ kɩŋasan tɔ yɛ, “Ɔkpa mɔɔ sʋ nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ ɩ taalɛ gya Sɩtaanɛ?
41003024	Nɩɩ ɔsʋwʋlɛ asa ba kan ba barɩgɛ tɔ bɛɛ kɔ yɛ abaa mʋ, ɔsʋwʋlɛ maŋa i boyi.
41003025	Nɩɩ kɩkpaara sʋ asa ba kan bɛɛ barɩgɛ tɔ bɛɛ kɔ yɛ abaa mʋ, kɩkpaara maŋa i boyi.
41003026	Ɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ kuwura‐gyii kɩ kan kɩ barɩgɛ tɔ kɩɩ kɔ yɛ abaa mʋ, kɩɩ tɩyɛ kakpaa.
41003027	Ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ loo ɔlʋnpʋ kɩkpaara sʋ naa swii mʋ atɔ natɛ. Amɔɔ ɩ dagaa maa gyankpaa ŋmina mʋ pɔyɩ, kɛ ɔ nyɛ ɔkpa loo mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ yuuri mʋ atɔ.
41003028	N gyii fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ ɩɩ taa nyɩmɩsa alibi kʋmaa yɛ mʋ kɩtɔwɛ yii mʋ kʋmaa ɛɛ kɛɛ.
41003029	Amaa nyɩmɩsa kɩtɔwɛ yii Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ bɩrɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ taa kɛɛ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ waa alibi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dɛ kakpaa nɩn.”
41003030	Yesu tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ nɩn, lɩɩ fɛɛ akʋ bɛɛ yɛ ɔ sʋ nbwɩɩ libi.
41003031	Nɩɩ Yesu mu‐nyi yɛ mu‐supu ana ba ba yɩla nbwama, nɩɩ ba sun mʋ asɛ yɛ ba tɩɩ mʋ.
41003032	Saŋa maŋa mʋ, asa ba kyɩna kyaabɔɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kɩɩ fu‐nyi yɛ fu‐supu ana ba bʋ nbwama bee biti fʋ.”
41003033	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mi‐nyi yɛ mu‐supu ana?”
41003034	Nɩɩ ɔ kɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ kyaabɔɔ mʋ gyaŋɛ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Fan kɩɩ! Banɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Mi‐nyi yɛ mi‐supu ana.
41003035	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti mʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ mi‐supu, yɛ mɛ‐daa, yɛ mɛ‐pɩɩkyɩɩ yɛ mi‐nyi.”
41004001	Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla piili ɛɛ kaapʋ Galile ɔbʋn kaa, nɩɩ asa damantɛ ba ba kyaabɔɔ mʋ bɛɛ nu mʋ asɛ. Sakyɔ sʋ mʋ, o loo ɔkʋlɩ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyan nkyu sʋ ɔbʋn kaa, yɛgɛ asa ba yɩla kidenbi sʋ.
41004002	Nɩɩ ɔ taa aŋasan tɔ kaapʋ bamʋ atɔ damantɛ. Mʋ kɩkaapʋ tɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ,
41004003	“Fan nu, ɔdɔɔpʋ kʋ ɩ kyɩna kpee ɔ naa ŋmatɛ ayu.
41004004	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ ŋmatɛ ayu mʋ, ɩmʋ ɩkʋ ɩ tɩyɛ ɔkpa kaa, nɩɩ nbwiibi ba ba tasɛ gyii.
41004005	Nɩɩ ɩkʋ ɩ tɩyɛ fʋlɛ sʋ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩsɛ ɩ man bʋnyɛ, ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ kɔyɩ bilen.
41004006	Ɩmʋ sʋ kyɔwɛ maa da mʋ, ɩ bwɩɩ, nɩɩ i wu lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ man sʋ ilin.
41004007	Nɩɩ ɩkʋ ɩ tɩyɛ iwii tɔ, nɩɩ iwii mʋ ɩ dan nyan ɩmʋ, nɩɩ ɩ man talɛ sɔyɩ abi.
41004008	Nɩɩ ɩkʋ mɔɔ ɩ tɩyɛ kasɛ danbɩrasa tɔ. Nɩɩ ɩ kɔyɩ dan nɩɩ ɩ sɔyɩ abii. Ɩkʋ ɩ sɔyɩ abi adɩsa, ɩkʋ mɔɔ adisiye, nɩɩ ɩkʋ mɔɔ kɩlɩfa.”
41004009	Nɩɩ Yesu lʋwɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ asʋ nɩɩ ee biti o nu mʋ, o nu.”
41004010	Ɩ maa ba san Yesu nkʋn mʋ, mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ yɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba nu mʋ asɩn tɔwɛsa mʋ akʋ ba ba taasɛ mʋ kɩŋasan mʋ kasɛ.
41004011	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ bɩrɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ asiri asɩn kaapʋ fanɛ, amaa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man tii fanɛ sʋ bɩrɛ mʋ, aŋasan tɔ nɩɩ bɛɛ sʋ bɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ.
41004012	Ɩmʋ sʋ, ‘bee biti ba kɩɩ kɛ ba kɩɩ, ba mɛɛ yɛ ba wu, bee biti ba nu, amaa ba mɛɛ yɛ ba nu kasɛ. Nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ kanɩn sʋ, naafɔɔ ba tee bwii ba Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, kɛ ɔ taa bamʋ alibi kɛɛ bamʋ.’ ”
41004013	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan man nu kɩŋasan nɩmʋ kasɛ? Nɛnɛ nɩɩ fen biti fan nu kɩŋasan kʋ kasɛ?
41004014	Ɔdɔɔpʋ mʋ ɩ gyɛ abwaarɛsɩn ɔtɔwɛpʋ.
41004015	Asa akʋ ba du nɩn fɛɛ ayu mʋ nɩɩ ɩ tɩyɛ ɔkpa kaa mʋ. Ba dan bee nu abwaarɛsɩn mʋ, yɛgɛ Sɩtaanɛ ɩ ba lɛɛ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ lɩɩ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ.
41004016	Akʋ mɔɔ ba du nɩn fɛɛ abi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ tɩyɛ afʋlɛ sʋ mʋ. Ba dan nu abwaarɛsɩn mʋ, bɛɛ taa kensi‐gyii kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ.
41004017	Amaa ɩ maa mee loo bamʋ nkɔlɔ kasɛ tɔ sʋ mʋ, ɩ mɛɛ kyɛɛrɛɛ bamʋ tɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ awʋrʋfɔ abɛɛ kanyanla dan ba bamʋ sʋ lɩɩ abwaarɛsɩn sʋ mʋ, bɛɛ yɛgɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kesun.
41004018	Akʋ mɔɔ ba du nɩn fɛɛ abi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ tɩyɛ iwii tɔ mʋ. Kanɩn asa mʋ bee nu abwaarɛsɩn.
41004019	Amaa kakyɩna kanɩmʋ tɔ tɔɔrɔɔ yɛ kefulee biti kensi payɩ yɛ dulinyaa atɔ kebiti libi, ɩ ba nyan abwaarɛsɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ɩ man taalɛ sɔyɩ abi.
41004020	Nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba du nɩn fɛɛ abi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ tɩyɛ ɩsɛ danbɩrasa tɔ mʋ. Ba dan nu abwaarɛsɩn mʋ, bɛɛ kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ kɛ bɛɛ sɔyɩ abi. Akʋ bɛɛ sɔyɩ adɩsa, akʋ adisiye, nɩɩ akʋ gbaa kɩlɩfa.”
41004021	Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla bɔ kɩŋasan kʋ yɛ, “Be mee tuwa fɩtɩla kɛ ba taa waa kolobi tɔ, abɛɛ ba taa waa npaa kasɛ. Bee tuwa fɩtɩla ba sʋ bɛɛ gyaga kɩmʋ ɔgyagakpa nɩn.
41004022	Ɩmʋ sʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ baala mʋ, kii biti kɩ lɩɩ ifuli, kɛ kɩmʋ nɩɩ kii bun sʋ mʋ kii biti ki bugi tɔ.
41004023	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ asʋ mʋ o nu.”
41004024	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ fɛɛ, “Fan fɛ nfɛɛrɛ danbɩrasa lɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fan nu mʋ sʋ. Kʋtɔ kaalasa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ taa kaala sa fʋ tɔɔmaa mʋ, kɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa ii biti ɔ kaala sa fʋ, kɛ ɩ ŋara fʋ lɛɛ mʋ.
41004025	Ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ tii sʋ, nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ mʋ, halɩɩ pii mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ, bee biti ba kɔɔlɛ lɩɩ mʋ asɛ.”
41004026	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ fɛɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii du nɩn fɛɛ ɔnyɩn kʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ ŋmatɛ ayu mʋ ndɔɔ tɔ.
41004027	Ɛɛ dɛ kɛ o kyiŋi kagyanbwɛ yɛ kakyʋwapɛ, yɛgɛ ɔ man nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ ayu mʋ ɩ waa nɩɩ ɩ kɔyɩ nɩɩ ɩ dan.
41004028	Kasɛ mʋ ɩ yɛgɛ ayu mʋ ɩɩ dan nɩɩ ɩɩ kɔyɩ. Oyu mʋ ɩ gyankpaa kɔyɩ kɛ ɩ nyɛ ɔtɔ kɛ ɩ kʋʋgɛ abi.
41004029	Ɩ dan mʋ, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ ɩ taa deebi naa tɩŋɛ ɩmʋ lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩmʋ saŋa fʋʋ.”
41004030	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ fɛɛ, “Mɩnɛ kʋtɔ nɩɩ an biti a taa Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ waa sɩnkaala? Mɩnɛ kɩŋasan nɩɩ an biti a taa kaapʋ tɔ?
41004031	Ki du nɩn fɛɛ sinapi oyu kibi atɔ duusa tɔ kpini kibi pii, nɩɩ bee duu kɩmʋ.
41004032	Nɩɩ ba kan duu kɩmʋ mʋ, kɩ kɔyɩ, nɩɩ kɩɩ dan kɩ gyɔɔ apʋnfa kpini, nɩɩ kɩɩ waa n‐yaabi lala halɩɩ nbwiibi ba ba waa nsʋswaa kɩmʋ onyin tɔ.”
41004033	Aŋasan tɔ falɛ nɩɩ Yesu taa tɔwɛ bamʋ abwaarɛsɩn. Ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ taalɛ nu kasɛ.
41004034	Asɩn akʋ ɩ man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ kɩŋasan. Amaa saŋa kʋmaa nɩɩ ɩ ba san maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ nkʋn mʋ, ɛɛ lɛɛ ɩmʋ kasɛ ɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ.
41004035	Kakɛ maŋa kalaatɩpwɛɛ asɛ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ fɛɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ a faa kpee benbe.”
41004036	Nɩɩ ba loo ɔkʋlɩ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɛ kɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ba yɛgɛ sakyɔ mʋ ɔbʋn kaa, ɩkʋlɩ ɩkʋ gbaa i tii bamʋ sʋ.
41004037	Ba maa kpee mʋ, nɩɩ afuu i tigi kɔnɔ kʋlʋn, nɩɩ apaa ɩ waa nɩɩ ɩ da nkyu ɩ waa ɔkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ naa san gbɛrɛɛ kɛ ɔkʋlɩ mʋ ɔ bɔla.
41004038	Amaa Yesu taa mu kumu gyaga keputu sʋ dɛ nsɩɩrɛ ɔkʋlɩ kɔnɔ. Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba kyiŋi mʋ, nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, a maa biti a wu mʋ, ɩ man tiri fʋ?”
41004039	Nɩɩ Yesu kʋsʋ yɩlɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ afuu mʋ fɛɛ, “Waa diin.” Nɩɩ katɩn kʋmaa waa diin.
41004040	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ kufuu? Fan man sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii nɩn?”
41004041	Nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ gaa nɩɩ ba taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Mɩnɛ Nyɩmɩsa ndee? Halɩɩ afuu yɛ apaa gbaa i nu mʋ asɛ.”
41005001	Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba faa kpee Galile ɔbʋn benbe, Gerasene kabaafʋn.
41005002	Yesu maa dan ɛɛ lɩɩ ɔkʋlɩ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kʋ mʋ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba tɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, lɩɩ nkyan tɔ ba gyaŋa mʋ.
41005003	Ɔnyɩn maŋa tɛ nkyan mʋ tɔ nɩn. Ɔkʋ man bɩla taalɛ da mʋ ɩgbɛɛ.
41005004	Lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa kʋmaa nɩɩ ba da mʋ ayaa yɛ abaa ɩgbɛɛ mʋ, ɛɛ tɩŋɛ ɩmʋ nɩn. Nɩɩ ɔkʋ man bʋ tɔ kɛ ɔ taalɛ gyii mʋ sʋ.
41005005	Ɔ naa ɔ naa nkyan yɛ abɩɩ tɔ kyʋwapɛ yɛ kagyanbwɛ, nɩɩ ɛɛ taa afʋlɛ ɛɛ kyaŋɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛgɛ ee kuusi.
41005006	Maa wu Yesu kata mʋ, ɔ sɩlɛ naa gyaŋa mʋ, nɩɩ o muŋa mu ansi tɔ.
41005007	Nɩɩ o kuusi kenken tɔwɛ yɛ, “Yesu, fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Owura lala Mu‐Bii. Maa fʋ an sʋ mɩnɛ? Bɔ Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ fʋ mɛɛ yɛ fʋ tɔɔrɔɔ mɛ.”
41005008	Ɔnyɩn mʋ tɔwɛ kanɩn nɩn lɩɩ fɛɛ Yesu wʋla tɔwɛ nbwɩɩ libi mʋ yɛ, “Nbwɩɩ libi, fan lɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ tɔ.”
41005009	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ kɩtɩɩ?” Nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Bɛɛ tɩɩ mɛ yɛ Kʋkyɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ an kyɔ.”
41005010	Nɩɩ ɔ mata sʋ ɛɛ kʋlɛ Yesu gaa fɛɛ ɔ man gya nbwɩɩ libi mʋ lɩɩ ɔsʋwʋlɛ maŋa tɔ.
41005011	Akuuri damantɛ akʋ ba bʋ tiri tʋtɔ kɩbɩɩ kʋ sʋ bee gyii.
41005012	Nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi mʋ ba kʋlɛ Yesu yɛ, “Yɛgɛ a naa loo akuuri mʋ tɔ.”
41005013	Nɩɩ Yesu sa bamʋ ɔkpa, nɩɩ ba lɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ tɔ naa loo akuuri mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ akuuri mʋ kpini bamʋ kɔnɔ ɩ waa fɛɛ ngbɩn nyɔ mʋ, ba sɩlɛ kpɩlɩgɛ kɩbɩɩ mʋ ogee tɔ naa loo nkyu tɔ muuri.
41005014	Nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kɩɩ akuuri mʋ sʋ mʋ, ba sɩlɛ kpee kadɛ tɔ yɛ ndɔɔ ana tɔ naa tɔwɛ asa. Nɩɩ asa ba ba kɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa.
41005015	Ba maa ba Yesu asɛ mʋ, ba wu ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ daa ɔ sʋ nbwɩɩ libi mʋ, bun ɩkaalɛ danbɩrasa ɔ tɛ, nɩɩ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ ɩ dɛ. Nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ.
41005016	Bamʋ nɩɩ ba taa bamʋ ansi wu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu waa mʋ, ba tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba tɛ mʋ sʋ, yɛ akuuri mʋ asɩn sa asa.
41005017	Nɩɩ asa mʋ ba yɛ Yesu ɔ lɩɩ bamʋ ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
41005018	Yesu maa loo ɔkʋlɩ tɔ mʋ, ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba daa ba tɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ ɔ yɛgɛ ɔ buu mʋ.
41005019	Nɩɩ Yesu kina, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Bwii kpee kewu naa tɔwɛ fʋ asa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ waa sa fʋ, yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ o wu fʋ kʋwɛɛ.”
41005020	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ lɩɩ tʋtɔ naa natɛ kabaafʋn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Ndɛ Kudu mʋ sʋ kpini, ɛɛ tɔwɛ asa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu waa sa mʋ. Nɩɩ i kyinkyin bamʋ nɩɩ ba nu mʋ kpini.
41005021	Nɩɩ Yesu bwii loo ɔkʋlɩ tɔ faa kpee ɔbʋn mʋ benbe, nɩɩ asa kʋkyɔ ba ba sarɛ kyaabɔɔ mʋ.
41005022	Nɩɩ Gyarosi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa abɩlɩsa mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ ba tʋtɔ. Maa wu Yesu mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɩyɛ mʋ ayaa tɔ.
41005023	Nɩɩ ɔ kʋlɛ mʋ gaa yɛ, “N kʋlɛ fʋ nɩn, mi kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi ɛɛ lɔ ee biti o wu, ba taa fʋ abaa gyaga mʋ sʋ kɛ ɔ nyɛ alanfɩya.”
41005024	Nɩɩ maa Yesu ba yii sʋ bee kpee, yɛgɛ sakyɔ ba mili Yesu sʋ ba buu mʋ.
41005025	Ɔkyɩɩ kʋ nɩɩ nkalan ɩɩ da mʋ, nsu kudu anyɔ, bʋ sakyɔ mʋ tɔ.
41005026	Ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nyita mu afulee mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kpini akyɛpʋ asɛ kpɩnɛ, fɛɛ naafɔɔ kʋlɔ mʋ kɩ bɔɔsɛ mʋ, amaa kʋlɔ mʋ kɩ san kii tii sʋ.
41005027	O nu Yesu sʋ nɩɩ o loo sakyɔ mʋ tɔ ba Yesu kamaa.
41005028	Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ mu kumu tɔ yɛ, “Naafɔɔ n daa nyɛ mata mʋ kaalɛ gbaa nɩn, n biti n nyɛ alanfɩya.”
41005029	Nɩɩ ɔ mata Yesu kaalɛ, nɩɩ nkalan mʋ ɩ tɩn opula tɔ. Nɩɩ o wu mʋ n‐yɩɩ tɔ fɛɛ mʋ awʋrʋfɔ kpini ɩ kyʋn.
41005030	Opula tɔ nɩɩ Yesu bɩɩ fɛɛ ɔlʋn kʋ lɩɩ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ o biliŋi kɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ ɩ mata mɛ kaalɛ?”
41005031	Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba ba sa mʋ kɔnɔ fɛɛ, “Fu wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ mili fʋ sʋ, nɩɩ fʋ taasɛ yɛ, ‘Anɩmʋ ɩ mata mɛ kaalɛ?’ ”
41005032	Nɩɩ Yesu biliŋi ɔ dan san ɛɛ kɩɩ ee biti ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ mata mʋ kaalɛ mʋ.
41005033	Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ maa wu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa mʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa kufuu kyɩkyaa natɛ ba Yesu ansi tɔ, ba muŋa mʋ ayaa tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ asɩn mʋ kesintin kpini tɔwɛ mʋ.
41005034	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ fɛɛ, “Mi‐bii, fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fʋ nyɛ alanfɩya, kpewu kɔkɔlɔ yuuli sʋ, fʋ awʋrʋfɔ ɩ lʋwɛ.”
41005035	Yesu maa san ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ nbɔɔ ba lɩɩ ɔbɩlɩsa Gyarosi kɩkpaara sʋ ba tɔwɛ Gyarosi yɛ, “Fu kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi mʋ wu, mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ san fɩɩ tɔɔrɔɔ ɔkaapʋpʋ mʋ?”
41005036	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ mu ansi yɛgɛ bamʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ Gyarosi yɛ, “Man waa kufuu, dan kɔɔlɛ gyii kanɩn.”
41005037	Nɩɩ ɔ man bɩla yɛgɛ ɔkʋ buu mʋ tii Pita yɛ Gyemisi yɛ mu‐supu Gyɔn sʋ.
41005038	Ba maa fʋʋ Gyarosi kɩkpaara sʋ mʋ, ba wu asa ba maa waa ɩlawʋ bɛɛ sawʋ kenken.
41005039	Nɩɩ Yesu loo taasɛ bamʋ fɛɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ fɛn waa kanɩn? Mɩnɛ kusu nɩɩ fen su kanɩn? Kebii mʋ man wu, ɔ dɛ nsɩɩrɛ nɩn.”
41005040	Nɩɩ asa mʋ ba ŋmasɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ gya bamʋ kpini lɩɩ kewu, nɩɩ maa kebii mʋ mʋ‐sɛ yɛ mu‐nyi yɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ asa mʋ ba loo obu mʋ nɩɩ kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi mʋ dɛ kɩmʋ tɔ mʋ.
41005041	Nɩɩ ɔ kɩtaa kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi mʋ kɩbaa tɔ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Talita kuum.” Kɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, “Kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi, n yɛ fʋ kʋsʋ.”
41005042	Opula tɔ nɩɩ kebii mʋ kʋsʋ, nɩɩ ɔ natɛ. Kebii mʋ gyii nsu kudu anyɔ. Nɩɩ asɩn mʋ i kyinkyin bamʋ gaa.
41005043	Nɩɩ Yesu sa bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ ba man kan tɔwɛ ɔkʋ kanɩn asɩn nɩmʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ fɛɛ ba sa kebii mʋ agyitɔ kɛ o gyii.
41006001	Nɩɩ Yesu lɩɩ tʋtɔ bwii kpee mʋ gbaa‐gbaa kadɛ tɔ, nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba buu mʋ kpee.
41006002	Kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ, o kpee kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa ɛɛ kaapʋ. Nɩɩ mʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ ki kyinkyin asa mʋ nɩɩ ba nu mʋ gaa, nɩɩ ba taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ kɩkaapʋ nɩmʋ lɩɩ? Fɩnɛ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ kanyaasɩn nɩmʋ lɩɩ halɩɩ ɛɛ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa anɩmʋ?
41006003	Man gyɛ kapinta mʋ ndee? Man gyɛ Mɛɛrɩ mu‐bii mʋ nɩn? Man gyɛ mu‐supu ana ɩ gyɛ Gyemisi yɛ Gyosefu yɛ Gyuda yɛ Simon? Man gyɛ anaa mʋ‐pɩɩkyɩɩ ana ɩ bʋ nfɩɩ?” Nɩɩ ba kina kɩkɔɔlɛ mʋ.
41006004	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ katɩn kʋmaa, amɔɔ mʋ kadɛ tɔ yɛ mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ abi nkʋn asɛ nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ.”
41006005	Kanɩn sʋ mʋ, ɔ man taalɛ waa adangana tʋtɔ kʋkyɔ, amɔɔ asa kalɩsa akʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ abaa gyaga bamʋ sʋ nɩɩ ba nyɛ alanfɩya.
41006006	Nɩɩ i kyinkyin mʋ gaa lɩɩ fɛɛ asa mʋ ba man kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii. Nɩɩ Yesu kpee ndɛ‐bii mʋ nɩɩ ɩ maa mʋ kadɛ, ɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ abwaarɛsɩn.
41006007	Nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ, o sun bamʋ anyɔ‐anyɔ, nɩɩ ɔ sa bamʋ ɔlʋn yɛ ba taa gya nbwɩɩ libi.
41006008	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ fɛɛ, “Fan maa kpee falɛ, fan man taa sɛhn, amɔɔ fanɛ akpebi nkʋn. Fan man taa agyitɔ abɛɛ adiikun abɛɛ afulee waa fanɛ igyifa tɔ.
41006009	Fan waa asɩbɩta, amaa fan man taa ɩkaalɛ ɩkʋ kɩtaa tii sʋ.
41006010	Kɩkpaara kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ fanɛ mʋ, fan kyɩna tʋtɔ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan lɩɩ kadɛ mʋ tɔ.
41006011	Nɩɩ fan kan kpee kadɛ kʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ man kɔɔlɛ fanɛ abɛɛ nu fanɛ asɛ mʋ, nɩɩ fan kan fɛn lɩɩ kanɩn kadɛ maŋa tɔ mʋ, fan kpɩkpaa fanɛ ayaa tɔ ɩsɛ wʋrɩgɛ tʋtɔ, kɛ ɩmʋ ii biti i gyii bamʋ.”
41006012	Nɩɩ ba kpee naa tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn sa asa yɛ ba yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa.
41006013	Nɩɩ ba gya nbwɩɩ libi damantɛ kʋsʋ asa sʋ, nɩɩ ba sʋswa alɔpʋ damantɛ olifu nfɔ nɩɩ ba nyɛ alanfɩya.
41006014	Owura Herodi nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii kpee sʋ kpini, lɩɩ fɛɛ Yesu kɔɔlɛ kɩtɩɩ katɩn kʋmaa. Akʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ Gyɔn okyugyeepu mʋ ɩ bɩla kyiŋi, ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ ɛɛ waa kanɩn asɩn kyinkyinsa.
41006015	Akʋ mɔɔ ba yɛ ɔ gyɛ Eligya nɩn, nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba yɛ ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ dɩdaa mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ nɩn.
41006016	Herodi maa nu Yesu asɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Ɔ gyɛ Gyɔn okyugyeepu nɩn. Mɛ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba tɩn mu kumu, amaa o bwii ba nkpa tɔ.”
41006017	Herodi ɩ daa yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba kɩtaa Gyɔn okyugyeepu, nɩɩ ba taa agbeeleebi da mʋ, nɩɩ ba taa mʋ tii obu. Kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa kanɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, mʋ‐ka Herodiya mʋ nɩɩ o kili mʋ, ɔ kɔɔlɛ mʋ lɩɩ mu‐supu Filipu asɛ nɩn.
41006018	Lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa kʋmaa Gyɔn okyugyeepu ɩɩ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ ɩ man dagaa maa kɔɔlɛ mu‐supu mʋ‐ka kili.
41006019	Kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ Gyɔn okyugyeepu nyɛ kilibi Herodiya asɛ, nɩɩ ee biti ɔ mɔɔ mʋ, amaa ɔ man taalɛ.
41006020	Herodi sɩlɛ Gyɔn okyugyeepu, lɩɩ fɛɛ o nyi maa gyɛ nyɩmɩsa danbɩrasa yɛ nyɩmɩsa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ, ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ o kun mʋ. Herodi ii biti Gyɔn abwaarɛsɩn kunu, amaa saŋa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o nu ɩmʋ mʋ ɩɩ tɔɔrɔɔ mʋ gaa.
41006021	Herodiya ba nyɛ mu kebiti saŋa mʋ nɩɩ mu‐kuli Herodi i gyii mʋ kakɛ kʋʋgɛsa akɛ. Owura Herodi dɩŋa agyitɔ, nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ kɩbanɛ abɩlɩsa yɛ anaakɔpʋ abɩlɩsa yɛ Galile abɩlɩsa kparɛ‐kparɛ yɛ ba be gyii bamʋ ansi.
41006022	Nɩɩ Herodiya mu‐bii kyɩɩsa lɩɩ ba kyaa, nɩɩ i gyii Herodi yɛ mʋ afɔ ansi gaa. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ kebii mʋ yɛ, “Taasɛ mɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fii biti kɛ n sa fʋ.”
41006023	Nɩɩ ɔ bɔ ntan yɛ, “Kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fii biti mʋ n biti n sa fʋ, halɩɩ mi kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩbaafʋn gbaa.”
41006024	Nɩɩ kebii mʋ lɩɩ ɩkaa sʋ naa taasɛ mu‐nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ lɩɩ Owura Herodi asɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ fii biti Gyɔn okyugyeepu mu kumu.”
41006025	Nɩɩ kebii mʋ waa bilen bwii kpee Owura Herodi asɛ naa tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “N biti Gyɔn okyugyeepu kumu tangɩran sʋ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ.”
41006026	Nɩɩ Owura Herodi kɔkɔlɔ ki nyita mʋ gaa, amaa ɔ man taalɛ kina lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛɛ bɔ ntan mʋ afɔ ansi tɔ sʋ mʋ.
41006027	Nɩɩ o sun ɔnaakɔpʋ kʋlʋn yɛ ɔ naa bɩya Gyɔn kumu. Nɩɩ o kpee obu tiisa mʋ tɔ naa tɩn mʋ Gyɔn kumu.
41006028	Nɩɩ ɔ taa gyaga tangɩran sʋ taa ba sa kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi mʋ. Nɩɩ kebii mʋ taa naa sa mu‐nyi.
41006029	Gyɔn okyugyeepu abɩɩlapʋ ba maa nu kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ba ba taa mu kibuni sansa naa pula.
41006030	Yesu asunpu mʋ ba bwii ba Yesu asɛ ba tɔwɛ mʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba waa yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ba kaapʋ.
41006031	Lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ asa kʋkyɔ bɛɛ ba Yesu asɛ bee bwii sʋ mʋ, ba man nyɛ saŋa ba gyii. Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ fɛɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ a lɩɩ ɩkaa sʋ kpee opula mʋ nɩɩ asa ba man bʋ, kɛ fan nyɛ saŋa fʋʋtɛ gbɛrɛɛ.”
41006032	Nɩɩ ba loo ɔkʋlɩ tɔ bamʋ nkʋn bee kpee katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ man bʋ mʋ.
41006033	Amaa asa damantɛ ba wu bamʋ, nɩɩ ba bɩɩ bamʋ, nɩɩ ba waa bilen taa ayaa tɔ sɩlɛ lɩɩ ndɛ mʋ tɔ kpini gyankpaa naa gyoo bamʋ.
41006034	Yesu maa lɩɩ ɔkʋlɩ tɔ, nɩɩ o wu sakyɔ mʋ, bamʋ asɩn ɩ kɩtaa mʋ kʋwɛɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba du nɩn fɛɛ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba man sʋ ɔkpapʋ. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ o piili ɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ atɔ damantɛ.
41006035	Ɩ maa sʋ ii kpee kalaatɩpwɛɛ asɛ mʋ, Yesu abɩɩlapʋ ba ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kyɔwɛ tɛɛ ɛɛ lʋwɛ. Nɩɩ nfɩɩ mɔɔ waa opula mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa ɩkaa sʋ, nɩɩ sɛhn man bʋ tɔ.
41006036	Ɩmʋ sʋ yɛgɛ ba kpee ndɔɔ ana tɔ yɛ ndɛ‐bii mʋ nɩɩ ɩ maa anɛ mʋ naa sɔɔ kʋtɔ kʋ gyii.”
41006037	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fan sa bamʋ kʋtɔ kʋ kɛ ba gyii.” Nɩɩ ba taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Fii biti fɛɛ a taa gbiti nderebi anyɔ naa sɔɔ bodobodo sa bamʋ?”
41006038	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Bodobodo afɩnɛ nɩɩ fan su? Fan naa kɩɩ.” Ba maa naa kɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ ba ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Bodobodo inuu yɛ ɩkɩn ɩnyɔ nɩɩ an sʋ.”
41006039	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ ba yɛgɛ asa mʋ ba kyɩna kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ afitiri bunboli sʋ.
41006040	Nɩɩ asa mʋ ba kyɩna kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ buu abaa, akʋ kɩlɩfa akʋ mɔɔ adunuu.
41006041	Nɩɩ Yesu taa bodobodo inuu yɛ ɩkɩn ɩnyɔ mʋ, nɩɩ o diyaa mu ansi kɩɩ sʋsʋ, nɩɩ ɔ fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ taa sa abɩɩlapʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ba barɩgɛ sa asa mʋ kpini. Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla barɩgɛ ɩkɩn mʋ tɔ sa asa mʋ kpini.
41006042	Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ gyii naa fʋʋ mʋ ɔkaa.
41006043	Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba tasɛ bodobodo yɛ ɩkɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ san mʋ waa alantan kudu anyɔ tɔ, nɩɩ ɩ bɔla.
41006044	Anyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba gyii agyitɔ mʋ ba gyɛ ngbɩn nnuu.
41006045	Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ Yesu yɛgɛ nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba taa ɔkʋlɩ gyankpaa mʋ, bee kpee Betisayida mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ benbe. Nɩɩ mɔɔ mʋ lɛɛ asa mʋ ɔkpa.
41006046	Maa kala bamʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ o kpee kɩbɩɩ sʋ, ɛɛ kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ.
41006047	Ɩ maa ba fʋʋ kalaatɩpwɛɛ asɛ mʋ, abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba fʋʋ nkyu mʋ nsana, yɛgɛ Yesu nkʋn mɔɔ bʋ kidenbi sʋ.
41006048	Nɩɩ Yesu wu fɛɛ kɩpalɛ mʋ ki nu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ apaa mʋ ɩ gyaŋa bamʋ. Kɩbwaayɩkɛ sʋ mʋ, Yesu natɛ nkyu sʋ naa fʋʋ bamʋ asɛ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ kyʋn bamʋ sʋ.
41006049	Amaa ba wu maa naa nkyu mʋ sʋ, be nyi fɛɛ obuni nɩn, nɩɩ ba waa ɩlawʋ.
41006050	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba wu Yesu mʋ, kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ kpini gaa. Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ asɛ opula tɔ yɛ, “Fan nyɛ nkɔlɔ, fan man waa kufuu, mɛ nɩn.”
41006051	Nɩɩ Yesu loo bamʋ asɛ ɔkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ afuu mʋ a yɔɔ opula tɔ. Nɩɩ i kyinkyin abɩɩlapʋ mʋ gaa,
41006052	lɩɩ fɛɛ ba man taalɛ nu kanan mʋ nɩɩ Yesu sa anyɩn ngbɩn nnuu agyitɔ mʋ kasɛ. Nɩɩ ɩ kɩtaa bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ gaa.
41006053	Nɩɩ ba faa kpee benbe ɔsʋwʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba tɩɩ yɛ Kanesareti, nɩɩ ba taa bamʋ ɔkʋlɩ dan.
41006054	Ba maa dan bɛɛ lɩɩ ɔkʋlɩ tɔ mʋ, asa ba bɩɩ Yesu.
41006055	Nɩɩ asa ba sɩlɛ lɩɩ ɔsʋwʋlɛ maŋa sʋ kpini bɛɛ ba Yesu asɛ, nɩɩ ba taa alɔpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba dɛ ɩkalan sʋ bɩya mʋ.
41006056	Katɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu kpee ndɛ‐bii abɛɛ ndɛ lala tɔ yɛ ndɔɔ ana tɔ mʋ, asa bɛɛ kpiya alɔpʋ agya tɔ yɛgɛ bɛɛ kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ ɔ yɛgɛ ba mata mʋ kaalɛ. Bamʋ nɩɩ ba mata mʋ kaalɛ kpini mʋ, ba nyɛ alanfɩya.
41007001	Farasii abi yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ akʋ, mʋ nɩɩ ba lɩɩ Gyerusalem ba Yesu asɛ mʋ, ba sarɛ kyaabɔɔ mʋ.
41007002	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba wu fɛɛ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ ba tɛ bee gyii agyitɔ yɛgɛ ba man fwɩɩ bamʋ abaa kanan mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ adɩdaasɩn ɩɩ kaapʋ mʋ.
41007003	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Farasii abi mʋ yɛ Gyiwu abi kpini ba buu bamʋ naana ana kɩkaapʋ dɩdaa mʋ nɩn, ba mɛɛ yɛ ba gyii agyitɔ, amɔɔ ba fwɩɩ bamʋ abaa kanan mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ adɩdaasɩn mʋ ɩɩ kaapʋ.
41007004	Nɩɩ ba kan lɩɩ kɩgya tɔ ba mʋ, ba mɛɛ yɛ ba gyii, amɔɔ ba fwɩɩ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ pɔyɩ. Nɩɩ ba bɩla ba sʋ ikisii lɩɩ ɩkɔɔpʋ yɛ npulii yɛ ɩtasa atɔ kɩfwɩɩ sʋ.
41007005	Ɩmʋ sʋ, nɩɩ Farasii abi mʋ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ ba taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Mɩnɛ kʋtɔ sʋ nɩɩ fʋ abɩɩlapʋ bɩrɛ be mee buu anɛ naana ana kɩkaapʋ dɩdaa mʋ, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ bamʋ bɩrɛ ba sʋ abaa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man du kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ bee gyii agyitɔ?”
41007006	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla mʋ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Isaya sʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyʋrɔɔ yɩla lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ kesintin. Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Fan sʋ fanɛ nnɔ fɛn tɔwɛ yɛ fen sun mɛ, yɛgɛ ɩ man lɩɩ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ.
41007007	Kɩyan nɩɩ fen sun mɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa ɩkpa nɩɩ fɛn sʋ fɛn kaapʋ fɛɛ mɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ.’ ”
41007008	Nɩɩ Yesu kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan kina Ɩbwaarɛ nbara mʋ, nɩɩ fan buu nyɩmɩsa lɛɛ.”
41007009	Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan sʋ kanyaasɩn ɩkpa libi mʋ nɩɩ fɛn sʋ fɛn taa Ɩbwaarɛ nbara yɩlɛ ɩkaa sʋ, kɛ fan nyɛ buu nyɩmɩsa kɩkaapʋ sʋ.
41007010	Mosesi kaapʋ yɛ, ‘Taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa fʋ‐sɛ yɛ fu‐nyi, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ nnɔ wʋrɩgɛ mʋ‐sɛ abɛɛ mu‐nyi sʋ mʋ, ba mɔɔ mʋ.’
41007011	Amaa fanɛɛ fanɛ, fɛn yɛ nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan tɔwɛ mʋ‐sɛ abɛɛ mu‐nyi yɛ, ‘Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ naafɔɔ fii biti fʋ nyɛ lɩɩ mɛ asɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ Koriban.’ (Kɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba taa kɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ).
41007012	Kanɩn sʋ mʋ, ɔ sʋ ɔkpa fɛɛ o kina kɩkyɛ mʋ‐sɛ yɛ mu‐nyi tɔ.
41007013	Kanɩn kɩkaapʋ mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ fɛn kaapʋ asa falɛ ɩɩ yɛgɛ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ ii biliŋi kɩyan. Atɔ damantɛ fɛɛ ɩnɩmʋ nɩɩ fɛn waa.”
41007014	Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla tɩɩ asa ba sarɛ mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ o nu mɛ asɛ, kɛ ɔ bɩɩ asɩn nɩmʋ kasɛ.
41007015	Sɛhn man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɩɩ lɩɩ kewu ii loo nyɩmɩsa tɔ nɩɩ ɩɩ waa mʋ ineesi, amɔɔ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ tɔ mʋ ɩɩ waa mʋ ineesi.
41007016	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ asʋ mʋ o nu.”
41007017	Yesu maa lɩɩ asa mʋ asɛ kpee kɩkpaara sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba taasɛ mʋ kɩŋasan mʋ kasɛ.
41007018	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ fɛɛ, “Ɩmʋ sʋ, fanɛ gbaa fen mee nu asɩn kasɛ bilen? Fan man nyi fɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋ man bʋ tɔ kɩɩ lɩɩ kewu nɩɩ kii loo nyɩmɩsa tɔ nɩɩ kɩɩ waa mʋ ineesi.
41007019	Lɩɩ fɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kii loo nyɩmɩsa tɔ mʋ, ki mee kpee mʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ, amɔɔ mʋ ɔtɔ tɔ, kɛ kɩ bɩla bɔla lɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ tɔ.” (Yesu katɔwɛ mʋ kɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ agyitɔ gyisa kʋmaa i du kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ.)
41007020	Nɩɩ Yesu kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ lɩɩ nyɩmɩsa tɔ mʋ, kɩmʋ ɩɩ waa mʋ ineesi.
41007021	Lɩɩ fɛɛ lɩɩ nyɩmɩsa tɔ, yɛ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ nɩɩ nfɛɛrɛ libi yɛ kɩbawʋlɛ kigyii, yɛ keyu, yɛ asa kɩmɔɔ yɛ kɩlɩɩ okuli abɛɛ ɔkaa kamaa,
41007022	yɛ kensi payɩ libi yɛ kumu tɔ ɔlʋn, yɛ kapɩna asa, yɛ kɩgyagaa, yɛ kayɩɩ basa yɛ nyɩmɩsa kinyita yɛ alala‐sɩn yɛ kimelensi.
41007023	Ɩnɩmʋ kpini ɩɩ lɩɩ nyɩmɩsa kɔkɔlɔ tɔ nɩn, nɩɩ ɩɩ waa mʋ ineesi.”
41007024	Nɩɩ Yesu lɩɩ Galile kpee Taayi katɩnɛ. Nɩɩ o loo kɩkpaara kʋ sʋ, ɔ man daa ee biti fɛɛ ɔkʋ o wu mʋ, amaa ɔ man taalɛ baala mʋ n‐yɩɩ.
41007025	Ɔkyɩɩ kʋ mʋ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba tɛ mu‐bii sʋ mʋ nu Yesu sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ ba mʋ asɛ bilen ba muŋa mʋ ayaa tɔ.
41007026	Ɔkyɩɩ mʋ man gyɛ Gyiwu obii, ɔ lɩɩ Fonesiya mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Siriya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ nɩn. Nɩɩ ɔ kʋlɛ Yesu yɛ ɔ gya nbwɩɩ libi mʋ lɩɩ mu kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi mʋ sʋ sa mʋ.
41007027	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ yɛ, “Ɩ dagaa nbii mʋ ba maa gyii ŋmɛ pɔyɩ. Ɩ man bʋrɔn fɛɛ ba taa nbii agyitɔ sa igyoonɔ.”
41007028	Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ sa kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, ɩ gyɛ kesintin nɩn, amaa nbii ba kan bee gyii agyitɔ nɩɩ ɩkʋ ɩ lɩɩ tɩyɛ kasɛ mʋ, igyoonɔ bɛɛ tasɛ bee gyii.”
41007029	Nɩɩ Yesu sa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sa mɛ kɔnɔ sʋ mʋ, bwii kpewu, nbwɩɩ libi mʋ ba lɩɩ fu kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi mʋ tɔ.”
41007030	Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ bwii kpewu naa wu kebii mʋ maa dɛ npaa sʋ yɛgɛ nbwɩɩ libi mʋ ba tɛɛ wʋla lɩɩ mʋ tɔ.
41007031	Nɩɩ Yesu lɩɩ Taayi katɩnɛ, nɩɩ ɔ bɔla Sidon kpee Galile ɔbʋn‐kaa naa fʋʋ Dekapoli (Ndɛ kudu) ɩsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
41007032	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ asa akʋ ba taa kpawu kʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ ɔ dan ba Yesu asɛ ba kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ ɔ taa mʋ abaa gyaga mʋ sʋ sa bamʋ.
41007033	Nɩɩ Yesu taa kpawu mʋ lɩɩ asa tɔ kpee ɩkaa sʋ, taa mʋ abaa‐bi waa mʋ asʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ tʋʋ nkyɔlɛ nɩɩ ɔ mata mʋ kanandʋlʋ.
41007034	Nɩɩ Yesu diyaa mu ansi kɩɩ sʋsʋ, nɩɩ o muusi. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ yɛ, “Ɩfata.” Kɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “Bugi tɔ.”
41007035	Opula tɔ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ asʋ a tigi, nɩɩ ee nu katɔwɛ, nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ ɛɛ tɔwɛ danbɩrasa.
41007036	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ asa mʋ yɛ ba man kan tɔwɛ sa ɔkʋ. Amaa kɩgya damantɛ nɩɩ ɔ gya bamʋ mʋ, saamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ lɔŋɔ bɛɛ tɔwɛ bee tii sʋ.
41007037	Nɩɩ i kyinkyin asa mʋ gaa nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Ɔ waa kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ danbɩrasa. Ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ akpawu bee nu, nɩɩ anaamuu bɛɛ tɔwɛ.”
41008001	Kanɩn nkɛ maŋa tɔ mʋ, sakyɔ damantɛ kʋ bɩla ba sarɛ Yesu asɛ. Nɩɩ ba maa man sʋ agyitɔ akʋ ba gyii mʋ, Yesu tɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba mʋ asɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ,
41008002	“Asa nɩmʋ asɩn ɩ sʋ mɛ kʋwɛɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ndaga nkɛ nsa ndee ba maa bʋ mɛ asɛ, nɩɩ ba man sʋ agyitɔ akʋ ba gyii.
41008003	Nɩɩ n kan tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ ba bwii kpewu mʋ, bee biti ba naa kirin‐kirin ɔkpa tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ akʋ ba lɩɩ kata‐kata.”
41008004	Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ an biti a nyɛ agyitɔ kiperi kɩnɩmʋ sʋ sa asa damantɛ nɩmʋ?”
41008005	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Bodobodo afɩnɛ nɩɩ fan sʋ?” Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Asunɔ nɩɩ an sʋ.”
41008006	Nɩɩ Yesu yɛgɛ nɩɩ asa mʋ ba kyʋn kyɩna kasɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ taa bodobodo asunɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ ɔ kpɛɛ‐kpɛɛ ɩmʋ tɔ taa sa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ ba barɩgɛ tɔ sa asa mʋ ba gyii, nɩɩ ba barɩgɛ tɔ sa bamʋ.
41008007	Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla taa ɩkɩn gbɛrɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ mʋ, fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ bɩla sa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ yɛ ba barɩgɛ ɩmʋ tɔ sa asa mʋ.
41008008	Nɩɩ asa mʋ kpini ba gyii ŋmɛ. Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba tasɛ‐tasɛ bamʋ agyisan mʋ bɔla alantan asunɔ.
41008009	Asa mʋ nɩɩ ba gyii kanɩn agyitɔ maŋa mʋ, ba gyɛ asa ngbɩn nna. Ɩmʋ kamaa tɔ, nɩɩ Yesu yɛgɛ bamʋ, nɩɩ ba kpewu.
41008010	Opula maŋa tɔ, nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba loo ɔkʋlɩ tɔ faa kyʋn Dalimanuta ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
41008011	Farasii abi akʋ ba ba Yesu asɛ ba gyii mʋ ɩmɔɔrɛ, kɛ ba nyɛ wu mʋ kilibi. Nɩɩ ba tʋʋ Yesu tɔ kɩɩ yɛ ɔ waa sʋsʋ adangana akʋ kaapʋ bamʋ.
41008012	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ o muusi, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fanɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ asa fen biti adangana fen wu? N biti n tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, n mɛɛ yɛ n waa kanɩn adangana maŋa kaapʋ fanɛ kpaa.”
41008013	Nɩɩ Yesu yɛgɛ bamʋ tʋtɔ naa loo mʋ ɔkʋlɩ tɔ faa kyʋn benbe.
41008014	Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba tan sʋ fɛɛ ba maa man taa bodobodo kʋkyɔ, amaa bodobodo kukuli kʋlʋn ɩ bʋ bamʋ asɛ ɔkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ.
41008015	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kɩɩ danbɩrasa kɛ fan baa fan da fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ, lɩɩ Farasii abi yɛ Herodi asa bamʋ kɩfɛ mʋ nɩɩ kii tin bodobodo mʋ.”
41008016	Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba piili bɛɛ tɔwɛ abaa yɛ, “A maa man lɛɛ bodobodo kʋkyɔ sʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ kanɩn mʋ abɛɛ?”
41008017	Yesu maa bɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɛn tɔwɛ fanɛ kɩman sʋ bodobodo kʋkyɔ mʋ asɩn? Ɩmʋ sʋ, fan man pɩɩta bɩɩ mɛ awaasa kasɛ? Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ mɛɛ taalɛ ɩ kɩtaa atɔ bilen kanɩn?
41008018	Fan sʋ ansi, fan man kɩɩ? Nɩɩ fan sʋ asʋ, fan mee nu? Fen mee nyiŋi asɩn nɩn abɛɛ?
41008019	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n taa bodobodo anuu barɩgɛ sa asa ngbɩn nnuu nɩɩ ba gyii mʋ, alantan afɩnɛ nɩɩ fan tasɛ agyisan mʋ bɔla?” Nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Alantan kudu anyɔ.”
41008020	Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla taasɛ yɛ, “N maa taa bodobodo asunɔ barɩgɛ tɔ sa asa ngbɩn nna nɩɩ ba gyii mʋ, alantan afɩnɛ nɩɩ fan tasɛ agyisan mʋ bɔla?” Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Alantan asunɔ.”
41008021	Nɩɩ Yesu yɛ, “Ɩnɩmʋ kpini kamaa mʋ, fan man taalɛ bɩɩ ɩmʋ kasɛ?”
41008022	Nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba kpee Betisayida kadɛ tɔ, nɩɩ asa akʋ ba taa gyaatanapʋ kʋ ba kʋlɛ Yesu fɛɛ ɔ taa mʋ kɩbaa mata mʋ.
41008023	Nɩɩ Yesu kɩtaa gyaatanapʋ mʋ kɩbaa tɔ, taa mʋ lɩɩ kadɛ mʋ nbwama. Nɩɩ Yesu tʋʋ nkyɔlɛ waa mu ansi tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ abaa gyaga mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fɩɩ wu atɔ?”
41008024	Nɩɩ gyaatanapʋ mʋ diyaa mu ansi sʋsʋ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “N wu asa ba maa naa, nɩɩ ba du fɛɛ iyu ɩ maa naa mʋ.”
41008025	Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla taa mʋ abaa gyaga ɔnyɩn mu ansi sʋ, nɩɩ mu ansi mʋ i bugi, nɩɩ mu ansi mʋ ɩ nyɛ alanfɩya, ɩɩ kɩɩ danbɩrasa.
41008026	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ gyaatanapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Kpewu! Amaa man bɩla bwii kpee kadɛ mʋ tɔ.”
41008027	Nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba kpee ndɛ‐bii mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ Kasariya Filipi kadɛ mʋ asɛ. Ba maa kpee mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ nɩɩ asa ba yɛ n gyɛ?”
41008028	Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Akʋ ba yɛ fʋ ɩ gyɛ Gyɔn okyugyeepu mʋ, akʋ mɔɔ ba yɛ fʋ ɩ gyɛ Eligya, nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba yɛ fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ.”
41008029	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fanɛ mɔɔ, fan yɛ anɩmʋ nɩɩ n gyɛ?” Nɩɩ Pita lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ.”
41008030	Nɩɩ Yesu gya bamʋ yɛ ba man kan tɔwɛ ɔkʋ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ.
41008031	Nɩɩ Yesu piili ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Ɩ dagaa fɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa maa wu awʋrʋfɔ gaa, kɛ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu abɩlɩsa yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ ba kina mɛ. Bee biti ba mɔɔ mɛ, kɛ nkɛ nsa kamaa mʋ, n biti n kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ ba.”
41008032	Amaa Yesu maa bugi mʋ asɩn mʋ tɔ pensen kaapʋ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ, nɩɩ Pita tɩɩ mʋ lɩɩ ɩkaa sʋ ɛɛ tɔwɛ yii mʋ.
41008033	Amaa Yesu, biliŋi kɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ Pita yɛ, “Lɩɩ mɛ sʋ, fʋ Sɩtaanɛ nɩmʋ. Fʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ man lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, ɩ lɩɩ nyɩmɩsa asɛ nɩn.”
41008034	Nɩɩ Yesu tɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ yɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba ba mʋ asɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti fɛɛ o buu mɛ mʋ, ɩ dagaa fɛɛ o kina mʋ n‐yɩɩ, kɛ ɔ sʋla mʋ oyu laasa kɛ o buu mɛ.
41008035	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti fɛɛ o kun mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ nkpa mʋ, ee biti ɔ pan nkpa mʋ. Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ pan mʋ nkpa lɩɩ mɛ yɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ mʋ nkpa.
41008036	Nɩɩ fʋ kan nyɛ dulinyaa tɔ kʋtɔ kʋmaa, nɩɩ fʋ pan fʋ nkpa mʋ, mɩnɛ nɩɩ fʋ nyɛ?
41008037	Abɛɛ mɩnɛ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa ɩ taalɛ ɔ taa kyarɛ mʋ nkpa?
41008038	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan waa ipeeli lɩɩ mɛ yɛ mɛ kɩkaapʋ sʋ, nbɩɩnbɩɩ kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ abi mʋ nɩɩ alibi yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩman‐sɩlɛ kɩ bʋ bamʋ tɔ falɛ mʋ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ kan ba yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ bʋnyaa yɛ mʋ sʋsʋ nbɔɔ mʋ, ngbaa mɛ ii biti ɩ baa ɩ sʋ mɛ ipeeli sa kanɩn ɔsa maŋa.”
41009001	Nɩɩ Yesu bwii kyaga sʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ fɛɛ akʋ ba bʋ fanɛ tɔ nfɩɩ nɩɩ ba mɛɛ yɛ ba wu lewu, amɔɔ ba wu Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩ maa ba ɔlʋn sʋ.”
41009002	Nkɛ nsiye kamaa tɔ mʋ, Yesu taa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ asa, Pita yɛ Gyemisi yɛ Gyɔn tii mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ dii kɩbɩɩ lala kʋ kpee, nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ bamʋ nkʋn. Nɩɩ Yesu kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kyɛɛgɛ bamʋ ansi sʋ.
41009003	Nɩɩ mʋ ɩkaalɛ bunsa gbaa ɩ lɔŋɔ fuuli parɛparɛ ɩ ŋalɩgɛ sʋ. Ɔkʋ man bʋ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ fwɩɩ kaalɛ kɛ ki fuuli parɛparɛ kanɩn kudubi.
41009004	Opula maŋa tɔ mʋ, ba ba kɩɩ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ asa dɩdaa anyɔ, Eligya yɛ Mosesi, ba lɩɩ ba, nɩɩ ba maa Yesu bɛɛ tɔwɛ.
41009005	Nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, ɩ bʋrɔn gaa fɛɛ a maa bʋ nfɩɩ. Ɩmʋ sʋ, yɛgɛ kɛ a yii abu asa, fʋ lɛɛ kʋkʋ, Eligya lɛɛ kʋkʋ, Mosesi lɛɛ kʋkʋ.”
41009006	Nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa Pita maa abɩɩlapʋ banban mʋ gaa, nɩɩ ba man bɩla be nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ.
41009007	Nɩɩ kabwaarɛ wʋlɛ ba bun bamʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔbʋlɛ kʋ lɩɩ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ mʋ tɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mi‐Bii‐nyɩnsa mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ kebiti sa. Fan nu mʋ asɛ.”
41009008	Opula maŋa tɔ, abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba maa kɩɩ kyaabɔɔ mʋ, ba man bɩla wu ɔkʋ bamʋ asɛ, amɔɔ Yesu nkʋn.
41009009	Ba maa kpɩlɩgɛ kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ bɛɛ ba mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu da bamʋ amu tɔ yɛ, “Fan man tɔwɛ ɔkʋ yɛ ɔkʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan wu, naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n bwii kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ.”
41009010	Nɩɩ ba nu sa mʋ, amaa bamʋ wʋlɛ‐wʋlɛ ɩɩ taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Kikyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ nɩmʋ kasɛ kaapʋ nɛnɛ?”
41009011	Nɩɩ ba taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ ɩ dagaa Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Eligya maa gyankpaa ba pɔyɩ?”
41009012	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɩ gyɛ kesintin fɛɛ Eligya ii biti ɔ gyankpaa ba, kɛ ɔ ba lɔŋɔ kʋtɔ kʋmaa kɩnɩmʋ. Amaa mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n biti n wu awʋrʋfɔ gaa kɛ asa ba kina mɛ?
41009013	N tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ Eligya tee bwii ba, nɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ asa bee biti mʋ, ba tɛɛ taa waa mʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba wʋla kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ mʋ.”
41009014	Ba maa kpɩlɩgɛ kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ bɛɛ ba abɩɩlapʋ asansa mʋ asɛ mʋ, ba wu sakyɔ damantɛ kʋ maa yɩlɛ kyaabɔɔ bamʋ, yɛgɛ ba maa nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ bee gyii ɩmɔɔrɛ.
41009015	Asa mʋ ba maa wu Yesu maa ba mʋ, i kyinkyin bamʋ, nɩɩ ba sɩlɛ kpee mʋ asɛ naa fwaala mʋ.
41009016	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩmɔɔrɛ nɩɩ fanaa bamʋ fen gyii mʋ?”
41009017	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ lɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, kabwɩɩ libi kʋ tɛ mi‐bii sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ ɛɛ tɔwɛ, nɩɩ n taa mʋ ba fʋ asɛ.
41009018	Ɩ dan kan kyɩna mʋ sʋ de, ɩ sʋ mʋ ɩ tʋʋ kasɛ, yɛgɛ mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ kii fuu afʋfʋʋ, yɛgɛ ɛɛ wɛ mʋ anyi tɔ, nɩɩ ee kirin. N ba kʋlɛ fʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ ba kʋsaa kanɩn nbwɩɩ libi maŋa lɩɩ mi‐bii mʋ sʋ, amaa ba man taalɛ.”
41009019	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “O! Fanɛ ndaga kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ asa mʋ nɩɩ fan man sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii. Nɛnɛ nɩɩ fen biti yɛ n nyɛ kenyiita sa fanɛ? Fan taa kebii mʋ bɩya mɛ nfɩɩ.”
41009020	Ba maa taa kebii mʋ bɩya mʋ, nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi mʋ maa wu Yesu mʋ, opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ ɩ taa kebii mʋ tʋʋ kasɛ fɛɛ kigbingbin. Ɔ dɛ ee gbiliti yɛgɛ mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ kii fuu afʋfʋʋ.
41009021	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ kebii mʋ mʋ‐sɛ yɛ, “Kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa mʋ falɛ mʋ, ɩ tɛɛ kyɛɛrɛɛ do?” Nɩɩ mʋ‐sɛ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Lɩɩ koo mu kebii tɔ nɩɩ ɩ waa mʋ kanɩn.
41009022	Ɩ taalɛ ɩ taa mʋ ɩ tʋʋ fʋlɔn yɛ nkyu tɔ ii biti ɩ mɔɔ mʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ, nɩɩ fɩɩ taalɛ waa kʋtɔ kʋ mʋ, wu anɛ kʋwɛɛ kɛ fʋ mɔlɩgɛ anɛ.”
41009023	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ‐sɛ yɛ, “Fʋ yɛ nɩɩ n biti n taalɛ mʋ? Nu kasɛ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gyii mʋ, kʋtɔ kʋmaa kii biti kɩ waa sa mʋ.”
41009024	Kebii mʋ mʋ‐sɛ taa kensi payɩ kʋlɛ Yesu yɛ, “N kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gyii, amaa kyɛ mɛ tɔ kɛ n nyɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tii sʋ.”
41009025	Yesu maa wu sakyɔ mʋ maa nyɛ akyɔ ii tii sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ pʋntɛ nbwɩɩ libi mʋ sʋ tɔwɛ ɩmʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ naamuu yɛ akpawu nbwɩɩ libi, n yɛ fan kʋsʋ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ, kɛ fan man bɩla bwii ba mʋ sʋ kakaakʋ.”
41009026	Nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi mʋ ba nyaŋɛ tɔ muusi tɔ taa kebii mʋ tʋʋ ɔlʋn fɛɛ kigbingbin, nɩɩ ba kʋsʋ mʋ sʋ. Kebii mʋ dɛ fɛɛ obuni, nɩɩ asa mʋ ba yɛ o wu.
41009027	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu kɩtaa kebii mʋ kɩbaa tɔ kʋsaa mʋ yɩlɛ mʋ ayaa sʋ.
41009028	Ɩmʋ kamaa tɔ, nɩɩ Yesu loo kɩkpaara sʋ, nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ nkʋn ba naa taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ anɛɛnɛ a man taalɛ kʋsaa nbwɩɩ libi mʋ lɩɩ kebii mʋ sʋ?”
41009029	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Sɛhn man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɩ taalɛ gya ɩnɩmʋ ana kudubi, amɔɔ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ nkʋn.”
41009030	Ɩmʋ kamaa nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba lɩɩ tʋtɔ bɔla Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ. Nɩɩ Yesu mee biti fɛɛ ba bɩɩ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ.
41009031	Lɩɩ fɛɛ kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ ɛɛ kaapʋ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ nɩn. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Bee biti ba lɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ sa asa, kɛ ba mɔɔ mɛ, amaa nkɛ nsa kamaa tɔ mʋ, n biti n kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ.”
41009032	Maa tɔwɛ bamʋ kanɩn mʋ, ba man nu ɩmʋ kasɛ, nɩɩ ɩ sʋ bamʋ kufuu fɛɛ ba taasɛ mʋ ɩmʋ kasɛ.
41009033	Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba kpee Kapanum kadɛ lala tɔ. Ba maa bʋ kɩkpaara sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan maa naa ɔkpa tɔ fɛn ba mʋ, mɩnɛ ɩmɔɔrɛ nɩɩ fen gyii mʋ?”
41009034	Ba laatɔ nɩn ba man lɛɛ kɔnɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba naa ɔkpa tɔ bee kpee mʋ, bee gyii abaa ɩmɔɔrɛ yɛ ɔmɔmɔ ɩ gyɛ bamʋ tɔ ɔlala.
41009035	Yesu maa kyʋn kyɩna mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ ba mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ kan ee biti fɛɛ o biliŋi ɔlala mʋ, ɔ waa mʋ n‐yɩɩ kalʋwɛ yɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ sa mʋ tɔɔmaa ana.”
41009036	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu taa kebii kʋ ba yɩlɛ bamʋ ansi tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ taa kebii mʋ abaa tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ,
41009037	“Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kan kɔɔlɛ kebii kɩnɩmʋ dubi mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ mʋ, mɛ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kan kɔɔlɛ mɛ mɔɔ mʋ, man gyɛ mɛ nkʋn nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ, amaa ɔ kɔɔlɛ ɔmʋnɩ o sun mɛ mʋ gbaa.”
41009038	Nɩɩ Gyɔn tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, an wu ɔnyɩn kʋ maa sʋ fʋ kɩtɩɩ ɛɛ kʋsaa nbwɩɩ libi ɛɛ lɩɩ asa sʋ, yɛgɛ ɔ man tii anɛ sʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ an gya mʋ yɛ ɔ man bɩla waa kanɩn.”
41009039	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan man gya kanɩn ɔsa maŋa. Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa lɩɩ mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ mʋ, ɩmʋ kamaa mʋ ɔ mɛɛ bɩla taalɛ tɔwɛ asɩn kʋ nyita mɛ kɩtɩɩ.
41009040	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o mee nyita anɛ kusun mʋ, o tii anɛ sʋ nɩmʋ.
41009041	N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ ɔkʋ kan sa fanɛ nkyu nuusa lɩɩ fan maa gyɛ mɛ lɛɛ sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ ɩmʋ kʋkɔka.
41009042	“Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan yɛgɛ nɩɩ nbii mʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii falɛ tɔ ɔkʋ kan waa alibi mʋ, kanɩn odunwura maŋa, nɩɩ ba kan taa kɩfʋlɛ‐buu lala ŋmina kyaga mʋ ɔbʋlɛ tɔ taa mʋ tʋʋ ɔpʋ tɔ gbaa mʋ, ɩ bɔ.
41009043	Nɩɩ fʋ kɩbaa kɩ kan kɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fɩɩ waa libi mʋ, tɩn kɩmʋ fɔyɩ. Ɩ bɔ sa fʋ fɛɛ fʋ maa taa kɩbaa dɩyɛ loo Ɩbwaarɛ ayɛ, ɩ kyɔ fɛɛ fʋ maa taa abaa anyɔ naa loo awʋrʋfɔ fʋlɔn mʋ nɩɩ i mee dun kpaa tɔ.
41009044	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ asʋnswɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ be mee wu, nɩɩ fʋlɔn mʋ gbaa mee dun kakaakʋ.
41009045	“Nɩɩ fʋ kɩyaa kɩ kan kɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fɩɩ waa alibi mʋ, tɩn kɩmʋ fɔyɩ. Ɩ bɔ sa fʋ fɛɛ fʋ maa gyɛ boobi nɩɩ fu loo Ɩbwaarɛ ayɛ, ɩ kyɔ fɛɛ fʋ maa taa ayaa anyɔ naa loo awʋrʋfɔ fʋlɔn tɔ.
41009046	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ asʋnswɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ be mee wu, nɩɩ fʋlɔn mʋ gbaa mee dun kakaakʋ.
41009047	“Nɩɩ fu kinsi kɩ kan kɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fɩɩ waa alibi mʋ, kyɔlɛ kɩmʋ tʋʋ. Ɩ bɔ sa fʋ fɛɛ fʋ maa taa kinsi kʋlʋn kpee Ɩbwaarɛ ayɛ, ɩ kyɔ fɛɛ fʋ maa taa ansi anyɔ naa loo awʋrʋfɔ tɔ kakpaa.
41009048	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ, asʋnswɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ be mee wu, nɩɩ fʋlɔn mʋ gbaa mee dun kakaakʋ.
41009049	Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ taa fʋlɔn bɔɔlɛ ɔkʋmaa kɛ ɔ waa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ nfɔlɛ bɛɛ bɔɔlɛ inun nɩɩ ɩ waa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ pɔyɩ nɩɩ ba sʋ bɛɛ waa saraga bɛɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ.
41009050	“Nfɔlɛ ɩ bʋrɔn, amaa nɩɩ nfɔlɛ kan fɔyɩ ɩmʋ ɔkɔn bɩrɛ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ fɛn bɩla taalɛ waa mʋ kɛ ɩ nyɛ ɩmʋ ɔkɔn? Ɩmʋ sʋ fan yɛgɛ fanɛ awaasa ɩ baa ɩ bʋkɔn fɛɛ nfɔlɛ, kɛ fan kyɩna yɛ abaa kayɩɩ yuuli tɔ.”
41010001	Yesu maa lɩɩ tʋtɔ mʋ, o kpee Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ faa Gyɔdan ɔbʋn mʋ kpee benbe. Nɩɩ sakyɔ damantɛ kʋ kɩ ba kyaabɔɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kaapʋ bamʋ abwaarɛsɩn fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla ɛɛ waa mʋ.
41010002	Tʋtɔ mʋ Farasii abi akʋ ba ba sʋʋ Yesu ɔdʋʋ sɩntaasɛ tɔ yɛ, “Ɩ dɛ ɔkpa sa ɔnyɩn fɛ o kina mʋ‐ka?”
41010003	Nɩɩ Yesu bwii taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nbara nɩɩ Mosesi kaapʋ fanɛ?”
41010004	Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mosesi sa ɔkpa fɛɛ ɔnyɩn ɔ kyʋrɔɔ kekina ɔwʋlɛ sa mʋ‐ka kɛ o kina mʋ.”
41010005	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ nkɔlɔ ɩ maa bʋlʋn sʋ nɩɩ Mosesi kyʋrɔɔ kanɩn nbara mʋ sa fanɛ.
41010006	Naafɔɔ lɩɩ koo npiili asɛ, atɔ kʋtʋʋ tɔ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ waa bamʋ ɔnyɩn yɛ ɔkyɩɩ.
41010007	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn ii biti ɔ yɛgɛ mʋ‐sɛ yɛ mu‐nyi, kɛ ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ mata mʋ‐ka,
41010008	kɛ bamʋ asa anyɔ ba biliŋi nyɩmɩsa kʋlʋn, yɛgɛ ba man bɩla ba gyɛ asa anyɔ, amaa ba gyɛ ɔkʋlʋn nɩn.
41010009	Ɩmʋ sʋ, ɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa waa kʋkʋlʋn mʋ, ɔkʋ man kan barɩgɛ ɩmʋ tɔ.”
41010010	Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba maa loo kɩkpaara sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba lɔŋɔ taasɛ mʋ asɩn lɩɩ kekili mʋ asɩn sʋ.
41010011	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kan kina mʋ‐ka nɩɩ ɔ naa kili ɔkyɩɩ pʋpwɛ mʋ, o nyita kekili, nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ‐ka mu alibi.
41010012	Kanɩn ɔkpa kʋlʋn sʋ nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ kan kina mu‐kuli naa kili ɔnyɩn pʋpwɛ mʋ, o nyita kekili.”
41010013	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ asa akʋ ba taa bamʋ nbii wuribi bɛɛ ba Yesu asɛ yɛ ɔ taa mʋ kɩbaa gyaga bamʋ sʋ, yɛgɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ bɛɛ gya bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ bɩya nbii mʋ.
41010014	Yesu maa wu ɩmʋ kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ agbʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ nbii wuribi mʋ ba ba mɛ asɛ, kɛ fan man tii bamʋ ɔkpa, lɩɩ fɛɛ sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩ gyɛ sa asa mʋ nɩɩ ba du fɛɛ nbii wuribi mʋ nɩn.
41010015	N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ fɛɛ kebii mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ nyɛ loo kɩmʋ tɔ.”
41010016	Nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ bamʋ puga, taa mʋ abaa gyaga‐gyaga bamʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa bamʋ kusee.
41010017	Yesu maa dan yii ɔkpa mʋ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kʋ sɩlɛ ba muŋa mu ansi tɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ danbɩrasa, mɩnɛ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa n maa waa kɛ n nyɛ nkpa kakpaa?”
41010018	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fʋ tɩɩ mɛ ɔdanbɩrasa? Ɔkʋ man gyɛ ɔdanbɩrasa, amɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ nkʋn.
41010019	Fu nyi Ɩbwaarɛ nbara mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Man mɔɔ nyɩmɩsa, man kan lɩɩ fʋ‐ka abɛɛ fu‐kuli kamaa, man yuuri, man tɩn antɩŋɛsa, man puni fʋ tɔɔmaa, taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa fʋ‐sɛ yɛ fu‐nyi.’ ”
41010020	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, n wʋla n buu ɩnɩmʋ kpini lɩɩ koo mi kibii tɔ.”
41010021	Nɩɩ Yesu kɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ diin, mʋ asɩn ɩ pɩrɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɩ san fʋ kʋtɔ kʋlʋn, kpee naa fɛ fʋ kapatɩyɛ kpini, kɛ fʋ taa afulee mʋ sa atiripu. Ɩmʋ ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ fʋ nyɛ ɩmʋ kʋkɔka, kɛ fʋ ba buu mɛ.”
41010022	Ɔnyɩn mʋ maa nu kanan mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ nyaŋɛ mu ansi tɔ taa kɔkɔlɔ nyita kpewu, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ gyɛ atɔ wuya gaa nɩn.
41010023	Nɩɩ Yesu kɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ tɔ kyaabɔɔ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩ bʋlʋn gaa sa atɔ wuya ana fɛɛ ba loo Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ.”
41010024	Asɩn mʋ i kyinkyin abɩɩlapʋ mʋ. Amaa Yesu bɩla tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mi‐bii ana, yɛ fan wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ kiloo bʋlʋn.
41010025	Ɩ bʋpɔɔ sa nyɔɔma fɛɛ ɔ taalɛ loo baasa ɔbɔ tɔ bʋlɛ, ɩ kyɔ atɔ wuya o loo Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ.”
41010026	Asɩn nɩmʋ ɩ dɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ gaa, bɛɛ taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Anɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ mɔlɩgɛ?”
41010027	Nɩɩ Yesu kɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ surum, nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Nyɩmɩsa asɛ nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ mɛɛ taalɛ waa, man gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ. Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ bɩrɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ ɩɩ taalɛ waa.”
41010028	Nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ yɛ, “An bwiiyaa kʋtɔ kʋmaa yɛgɛ nɩɩ an baa an buu fʋ?”
41010029	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ ɔkʋ man pɩɩ yɛgɛ mʋ kɩkpaara yɛ mʋ‐daa ana yɛ mu‐supu ana yɛ mʋ‐pɩɩkyɩɩ ana mu‐nyi yɛ mʋ‐sɛ yɛ mu‐bii ana yɛ mʋ ndɔɔ ana, lɩɩ nmaa mɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sʋ,
41010030	nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ yɛ o bwii nyɛ kɩkpaara yɛ mʋ‐daa ana yɛ mu‐supu ana yɛ mʋ‐pɩɩkyɩɩ ana mu‐nyi yɛ mʋ‐sɛ yɛ mu‐bii ana yɛ mʋ ndɔɔ ana kpini kɩlɩfa sʋ. Ee biti ɔ nyɛ kekisi ndaga kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ bɩrɛ, amaa ee biti ɔ ba nyɛ nkpa kakpaa.”
41010031	Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Agyankpaapʋ gaalaagaa, bee biti ba be biliŋi asii‐amaapʋ, kɛ asii‐amaapʋ ba be biliŋi agyankpaapʋ.”
41010032	Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba naa bee kpee Gyerusalem nɩɩ Yesu ɩ gyankpaa bamʋ bee kpee. Asɩn mʋ i kyinkyin abɩɩlapʋ mʋ, nɩɩ kufuu kɩ sʋ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba buu bamʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla lɛɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ ɩkaa sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii biti ki tu mʋ.
41010033	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “An kpee Gyerusalem, nɩɩ bee biti ba lɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ sa Gyiwu aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ. Bee biti ba bun mɛ lewu kʋpwɛ, kɛ ba taa mɛ waa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi abaa tɔ.
41010034	Kanɩn asa maŋa bee biti ba waa mɛ yɛrɛyɛrɛ, kɛ ba tʋʋ nkyɔlɛ bun mɛ, kɛ tɩŋɛ mɛ awʋlɛ‐bi kɛ ba mɔɔ mɛ. Amaa nkɛ asá kamaa mʋ, n biti n kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ.”
41010035	Nɩɩ Sebedi mu‐bii ana Gyemisi maa Gyɔn, ba ba Yesu asɛ ba kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, an kʋlɛ fʋ yɛ fʋ waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ an biti a kʋlɛ fʋ falɛ mʋ sa anɛ.”
41010036	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ fen biti fɛɛ n waa sa fanɛ?”
41010037	Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fʋ kan ba kyɩna fʋ kuwura‐gya, fʋ bʋnyaa kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ mʋ, fʋ yɛgɛ anɛ ɔkʋ ɔ kyɩna fu gyisa sʋ, kɛ ɔkʋ mɔɔ ɔ kyɩna fʋ‐bɩna sʋ.”
41010038	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan man nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fɛn kʋlɛ falɛ. Fɛn taalɛ gyii awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ n biti n gyii falɛ, nɩɩ kekyugyee mʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba gyee mɛ mʋ, fɛn taalɛ gyee kanɩn kekyugyee maŋa?”
41010039	Nɩɩ ba kyula yɛ, “An taalɛ.” Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fen biti fan gyii awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ n biti n gyii falɛ, kɛ fan gyee mɛ kekyugyee mʋ nɩɩ n gyee mʋ.
41010040	Amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɩna mɛ gyisa sʋ abɛɛ mɛ bɩna sʋ bɩrɛ, man gyɛ mɛ ii biti n sa. Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ taa sa bamʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɔŋɔ yɩla mʋ.”
41010041	Yesu abɩɩlapʋ kudu mʋ nɩɩ ba san mʋ, ba maa nu asɩn mʋ, ba nyɛ agbʋ waa Gyemisi maa Gyɔn.
41010042	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu tɩɩ bamʋ kpini sarɛ mʋ asɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan nyi mʋ, bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi bamʋ agyankpaapʋ mʋ, bɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ ɔlʋn asa sʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ alʋlʋnpʋ gbaa bɛɛ kaapʋ ɔlʋn asa sʋ.
41010043	Amaa fanɛ bɩrɛ, fan man waa kanɩn. Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti fɛɛ ɔ waa nyɩmɩsa kparɛ mʋ, o biliŋi kɩyaafɔlɛ sa mʋ tɔɔmaa ana.
41010044	Nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ waa ɔgyankpaapʋ mʋ, ɩ dagaa maa waa fɛɛ kɩnyɛ sa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ.
41010045	Halɩɩ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa gbaa n man ba yɛ asa ba sun mɛ nɩn. N ba n ba sun asa nɩn, kɛ n taa mɛ nkpa kɛɛ, kɛ ɩ ka asa gaalaagaa alibi kʋkɔ.”
41010046	Nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba kpee Gyeriko kadɛ tɔ. Maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ yɛ kʋbʋ damantɛ ba maa lɩɩ kadɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, ba wu gyaatanapʋ kʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Batimayu, (ɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ Timayu mu‐bii) maa tɛ ɔkpa kaa ɛɛ kʋlɛ.
41010047	Gyaatanapʋ mʋ maa nu fɛɛ Yesu Kanasareti‐nyɩn mʋ ɩ kyʋn mʋ, nɩɩ o kuusi tɩɩ mʋ yɛ, “Yesu, Dawidi kanaana‐bii, wu mɛ kʋwɛɛ.”
41010048	Maa kuusi kenken sʋ mʋ, asa ba pʋntɛ mʋ sʋ yɛ o bun mʋ kɔnɔ sʋ, yɛgɛ ɛɛ lɔŋɔ ee kuusi kenken ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Dawidi kanaana‐bii, wu mɛ kʋwɛɛ!”
41010049	Nɩɩ Yesu yɩlɛ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan tɩɩ mʋ sa mɛ.” Nɩɩ ba tɩɩ mʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Yɛgɛ fʋ kɔkɔlɔ kɩ yuuli fʋ, Yesu yɛ fʋ ba.”
41010050	Nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ fugi yii mʋ ayaa sʋ ŋmanyan mʋ kɩtaa tʋʋ ɩkaa sʋ nɩɩ o kpee Yesu asɛ.
41010051	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ fii biti yɛ n waa sa fʋ?” Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, n biti n baa n kɩɩ nɩn.”
41010052	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Natɛ! Fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fʋ nyɛ alanfɩya.” Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ mu ansi mʋ a bugi, nɩɩ o buu Yesu kpee ɔkpa tɔ.
41011001	Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba maa tiri Gyerusalem, nɩɩ ba ba fʋʋ Olifu kɩbɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ maa Betifage maa Betani mʋ, Yesu sun mʋ abɩɩlapʋ anyɔ,
41011002	nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kpee kadɛ‐bi mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ fanɛ ansi tɔ, fan maa dan fɛn fʋʋ mʋ, fen biti fan wu kekuruma‐bi mʋ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩ dii mʋ maa kyaa, kɛ fan saŋɛ mʋ bɩya mɛ nfɩɩ.
41011003	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan taasɛ fanɛ kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ fan saŋɛ mʋ mʋ, fan tɔwɛ odunwura maŋa yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ ii biti mʋ, amaa ee biti o bwiiyaa mʋ ba nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ.’ ”
41011004	Kesintin, nɩɩ ba naa wu kekuruma‐bi mʋ maa kyaa kigbenbi sʋ kɩkpaara kʋkʋ kebunɔ. Ba maa saŋɛ mʋ mʋ,
41011005	nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ tʋtɔ mʋ ba taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɛn saŋɛ kekuruma‐bi mʋ?”
41011006	Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Yesu dan tɔwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ asa mʋ ba yɛgɛ ba taa natɛ.
41011007	Ba taa kekuruma‐bi mʋ bɩya Yesu, taa bamʋ ataa gyaga kuruma mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ Yesu dii kyɩna sʋ.
41011008	Asa gaalaagaa ba taa bamʋ ataa tʋʋtʋʋ ɔkpa tɔ, nɩɩ asansa mɔɔ ba ŋɛlɛ afatɛɛ wʋrɩgɛ ɔkpa mʋ tɔ.
41011009	Asa mʋ nɩɩ ba gyankpaa yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba buu kamaa mʋ kpini bee kuusi yɛ, “Hosana! Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ naa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ ɛɛ ba mʋ!
41011010	Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa anɛ‐Sɛ Owura Dawidi kuwura‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ kɩ ba mʋ! Hosana ɩ gyɛ sa anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ!”
41011011	Yesu maa fʋʋ Gyerusalem mʋ, ɔ naa loo kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ, nɩɩ ɔ kɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa kyaabɔɔ. Amaa kpalɩ fɛɛ kyɔwɛ maa tɛɛ lʋwɛ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ taa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ kpee Betani.
41011012	Lɩɩkaakɛ, ba maa lɩɩ Betani bɛɛ ba mʋ, akʋn a kɩtaa Yesu.
41011013	Maa kɩɩ kata‐kata mʋ, o wu figi oyu maa pɔrɔgɛ kɩ yɩlɛ, nɩɩ o kpee kɩmʋ asɛ naa kɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ sɔyɩ abii, amaa afatɛɛ nkʋn nɩn, kpalɩ fɛɛ ɩmʋ saŋa sɔyɩsa man pɩɩ fʋʋ.
41011014	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ figi oyu mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkʋ man bɩla yɛ o gyii fʋ abii mʋ kakaakʋ!” Mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba nu kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ oyu mʋ.
41011015	Ba maa fʋʋ Gyerusalem mʋ, Yesu kpee kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ obu mʋ tɔ naa, nɩɩ o piili ɛɛ gya atɔ afɛpʋ yɛ asɔɔpʋ. Nɩɩ o biliŋaa‐biliŋaa afulee akyarɩpʋ iteeburu yɛ awura‐lɔpɔ afɛpʋ ngya taŋa‐taŋa.
41011016	Nɩɩ o tii ɔkpa fɛɛ ɔkʋ ɔ man bɩla taa kʋtɔ kʋ bɔla kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ opula.
41011017	Nɩɩ ɔ lan kaapʋ bamʋ yɛ, “Ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, ‘Bee biti ba tɩɩ mɛ kakpaara yɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛkpa sa dulinyaa tɔ asa kpini.’ Amaa fan taa kɩmʋ biliŋaa bamʋ nɩɩ bee yuuri ɔlʋn sʋ ɔbaalakpa.”
41011018	Aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ ba nu kanɩn asɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ba piili bee biti ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ba taa mɔɔ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ kɩkaapʋ ki kyinkyin asa damantɛ mʋ kpini, nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba sɩlɛ mʋ.
41011019	Kalaatɩpwɛɛ asɛ nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba lɩɩ kadɛ lala mʋ tɔ.
41011020	Lɩɩkaakɛ nyenyenfuu ba maa naa ɔkpa tɔ mʋ, ba wu figi oyu mʋ kɩ maa wu naa fʋʋ kɩmʋ kasɛ.
41011021	Nɩɩ Pita nyiŋi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, kɩɩ figi oyu mʋ nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ nnɔ mʋ, kɩ maa wu!”
41011022	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gyii.
41011023	N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ kɩbɩɩ kɩnɩmʋ yɛ, ‘Taa fʋ n‐yɩɩ naa tʋʋ ɔpʋ tɔ,’ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ waa sika‐sika mʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ falɛ kii biti kɩ waa mʋ, ii biti i waa kanɩn nɩn sa mʋ.
41011024	Ɩmʋ sʋ n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, nɩɩ fan kan kʋlɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa fanɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ tɔ mʋ, fan kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ fan tɛɛ nyɛ kɩmʋ, nɩɩ fen biti fan nyɛ kɩmʋ.
41011025	Nɩɩ fʋ kan yɩlɛ fɩɩ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ mʋ, taa alibi kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan waa fʋ mʋ kɛɛ mʋ, kɛ fʋ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ gbaa ɔ taa fʋ lɛɛ kɛɛ fʋ.
41011026	Nɩɩ fan kan fan man taa fanɛ tɔɔmaa ana alibi kɛɛ bamʋ mʋ, fanɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ gbaa mɛɛ yɛ ɔ taa fanɛ lɛɛ kɛɛ fanɛ.”
41011027	Nɩɩ ba bɩla bwii naa fʋʋ Gyerusalem. Tʋtɔ mʋ, Yesu maa naa kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa, yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ, yɛ abɩlɩsa ba ba mʋ asɛ.
41011028	Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɔlʋn nɩɩ fʋ sʋ fɩɩ waa ɩnɩmʋ kpini? Anɩmʋ ɩ sa fʋ kanɩn ɔlʋn maŋa?”
41011029	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N biti n taasɛ fanɛ asɩn, nɩɩ fan kan lɛɛ kɔnɔ kyɛɛkyɛɛ sa mɛ bɩrɛ, n biti n tɔwɛ fanɛ ɔlʋn kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ n waa ɩnɩmʋ kpini.
41011030	Gyɔn kekyugyee mʋ, ɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ abɛɛ nyɩmɩsa asɛ?”
41011031	Nɩɩ ba yii kasɛ bee gyii abaa ɩmɔɔrɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ an kan lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ’ ee biti ɔ taasɛ anɛ yɛ, ‘Mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ a man kɔɔlɛ Gyɔn gyii?’
41011032	Amaa nɩɩ an kan tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɩ lɩɩ nyɩmɩsa asɛ mɔɔ mʋ.’ ” (Ba sɩlɛ asa mʋ, kpalɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ Gyɔn kyɩna ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ nɩn.)
41011033	Ɩmʋ sʋ ba sii lɛɛ Yesu kɔnɔ nɩn yɛ, “A man nyi.” Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Kanɩn bɩrɛ, ngbaa mɛ, n mɛɛ yɛ n tɔwɛ fanɛ ɔlʋn kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ n waa ɩnɩmʋ kpini.”
41012001	Yesu bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn kʋ kyɩna dɔɔ wayɩn kʋdɔɔ kʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ pɔyɩ kɩbandɩyɛ kyaabɔɔ kɩmʋ, nɩɩ o kuu wayɩn ɔnyɩyɛkpa ɔbɔ kʋdɔɔ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ pɔyɩ opula bʋnswɩɩsa mʋ nɩɩ akɩɩsʋpʋ bee dii bɛɛ kɩɩ kʋdɔɔ mʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ kadɔɔ maŋa waa paa agyipu kʋ abaa tɔ, nɩɩ o kpee ɔkpa.
41012002	Kɩtɩŋɛ saŋa maa fʋʋ mʋ, nɩɩ o sun mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ kʋ paa agyipu mʋ asɛ, kɛ ɔ naa kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ bɩya mʋ.
41012003	Amaa paa agyipu mʋ ba kɩtaa mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ, dayɩ mʋ bwiiyaa mʋ abaakpan.
41012004	Nɩɩ kadɔɔ wuya mʋ bwii sun ɔkʋ, nɩɩ paa agyipu mʋ ba dayɩ mʋ paatɛ mu kumu gyila mʋ ipeeli.
41012005	Kadɔɔ wuya mʋ bɩla sun ɔkʋ, nɩɩ paa agyipu mʋ ba dayɩ mʋ mɔɔ. Ɔ bɩla sun gaalaagaa, nɩɩ ba dayɩ akʋ, nɩɩ ba mɔɔ akʋ mɔɔ.
41012006	“Ɔkʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ dan san kɛ o sun mʋ ɩ gyɛ mu‐bii mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa. Laalaalʋwɛ mʋ o sun mʋ nɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔ maa gyɛ mi‐bii gbaa‐gbaa falɛ bɩrɛ, bee biti ba taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa mʋ.’
41012007	“Amaa paa agyipu mʋ ba tɔwɛ abaa nɩn yɛ, ‘Ɔnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ kapatɩyɛ ogyipu mʋ. Fan ba kɛ a mɔɔ mʋ, kɛ kapatɩyɛ mʋ ki biliŋi anɛ lɛɛ!’
41012008	Ɩmʋ sʋ ba kɩtaa mu‐bii mʋ, nɩɩ ba mɔɔ, lɛɛ mʋ lɩɩ kadɔɔ mʋ tɔ.”
41012009	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩnɩmʋ falɛ kudubi mʋ, mɩnɛ nɩɩ kadɔɔ wuya mʋ ii biti ɔ waa?” Nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Ee biti ɔ ba mɔɔ paa agyipu mʋ kpini, kɛ ɔ taa kadɔɔ mʋ waa paa agyipu pʋpwɛ abaa tɔ.”
41012010	Nɩɩ Yesu yɛ, “Fan man pɩɩta kalɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ? Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, ‘Kibuu mʋ nɩɩ apɔyɩpʋ ba kina mʋ, kɩmʋ ɩ ba biliŋi kɩbɔntɔnbʋlɔntɔ kubuu kparɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ sʋ obu mʋ tɔ.
41012011	Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ ɩ waa ɩnɩmʋ, nɩɩ i kyinkyin anɛ.’ ”
41012012	Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ ba paa Yesu kɩkɩta, kpalɩ fɛɛ ba bɩɩ yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ Yesu bɔ kanɩn kɩŋasan maŋa. Amaa ba sɩlɛ sakyɔ mʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ ba yɛgɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kyʋn.
41012013	Farasii abi yɛ owura Herodi asa akʋ ba ba Yesu asɛ ba sʋʋ mʋ ɔdʋʋ lɩɩ mʋ asɩn tɔwɛsa sʋ.
41012014	Ba ba mʋ asɛ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, an nyi fʋ maa gyɛ kesintin ogyipu, nɩɩ fʋ mɛɛ tʋwɛ lɩɩ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ nɩɩ asa bɛɛ fɛ, nɩɩ fʋ mɛɛ kɩɩ nyɩmɩsa kɩkparɛ sʋ, amaa fɩɩ kaapʋ asa Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn bɔla kesintin ɔkpa sʋ. An biti a nu lɩɩ fʋ asɛ yɛ, ɩ dɛ ɔkpa fɛɛ a ka lenpoo sa Roma abi Owura lala Kasaro?
41012015	Ɩ dagaa fɛɛ a ka abɛɛ a man ka?” Amaa Yesu wʋla o nyi ba maa gyɛ kebunbun ansi wuya ana nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ fan sʋʋ mɛ ɔdʋʋ? Fan sa mɛ kefulee nderebi kɛ n kɩɩ.”
41012016	Ba maa sa mʋ kefulee nɩɩ ɔ kɩɩ mʋ, ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ foto yɛ kɩtɩɩ ɩ gyan kefulee mʋ sʋ falɛ?” Nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Owura lala Kasaro lɛɛ.”
41012017	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ Yesu yɛ, “To! Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ Kasaro lɛɛ mʋ, fan ka sa mʋ, nɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mɔɔ lɛɛ mʋ, fan taa sa mʋ.” Nɩɩ Yesu asɩn a waa bamʋ kanankʋ.
41012018	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Sadusi abi mʋ nɩɩ ba yɛ kelewu kyiŋi man bʋ tɔ mʋ, ba ba Yesu asɛ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ,
41012019	“Ɔkaapʋpʋ, Mosesi kyʋrɔɔ nbara ɩnɩmʋ sa anɛ yɛ, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kan wu yɛgɛ mʋ‐ka, nɩɩ maa mʋ ba man kʋʋgɛ nbii mʋ, mu‐supu ɩ taalɛ taa okulapu‐kyɩɩ maŋa kili kɛ ba kʋʋgɛ nbii sa olewupu mʋ.
41012020	Ɔnyɩn kʋ maa mu‐supu ana asunɔ ɩ kyɩna ba bʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔdaa mʋ kili ɔkyɩɩ, nɩɩ o wu, yɛgɛ maa mʋ‐ka mʋ ba man kʋʋgɛ.
41012021	Osupu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyan sʋ taa okulapu‐kyɩɩ maŋa kili, nɩɩ ngbaa mʋ wu, yɛgɛ maa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ ba man kʋʋgɛ. Ɔsasapʋ maa bɩla taa mʋ, kʋkʋlʋn maŋa nɩn.
41012022	Bamʋ asunɔ maŋa kpini ba kili ɔkyɩɩ mʋ gyaŋɛ yɛgɛ bamʋ ɔkʋ maa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ ba man kʋʋgɛ. Laalaalʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ gbaa wu.
41012023	Nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ, bamʋ asunɔ kpini ba maa kili mʋ falɛ, nɩɩ kelewu kyiŋi kakɛ mʋ, bamʋ tɔ ɔmɔɔ mʋ‐ka ii biti ɩ baa ɩ gyɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ?”
41012024	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Man gyɛ fan maa man nyi abwaarɛsɩn abɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔlʋn mʋ sʋ nɩɩ fan fɔyɩ falɛ?
41012025	Ɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ kelewu kyiŋi saŋa mʋ, asa ba man bɩla yɛ ba kili, bee biti ba biliŋi fɛɛ sʋsʋ nbɔɔ mʋ nɩn.
41012026	Nbɩɩnbɩɩ, lɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ, fan man pɩɩ kalɛ Mosesi ɔwʋlɛ tɔ lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ o wu fʋlɔn maa dɛɛ apʋnfa mʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Mɛ ɩ gyɛ Abraham Ɩbwaarɛ, Isaki maa Gyekobu Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ!’
41012027	Ɔ gyɛ asa kɩɩsa Ɩbwaarɛ nɩn, man gyɛ alewupu lɛɛ. Fan fɔyɩ kesintin sʋ!”
41012028	Nbara ɔkaapʋpʋ kʋ bʋ tʋtɔ nɩɩ o nu ɩmɔɔrɛ mʋ nɩɩ bee gyii. O wu fɛɛ Yesu lɛɛ Sadusi abi mʋ kɔnɔ danbɩrasa. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ ba mʋ asɛ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Nbara mʋ kpini tɔ mʋ, kɩmɔɔ kɩ gyɛ kɩkparɛ?”
41012029	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nbara mʋ tɔ kɩkparɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ kɩnɩmʋ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, Oo! Ɩsɩrayɩ nu! Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ anɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ ɩ gyɛ ɔkʋlʋn nɩn.
41012030	Taa fʋ kɔkɔlɔ yɛ fʋ kala yɛ fʋ nfɛɛrɛ yɛ fʋ ɔlʋn kpini nyɛ kebiti sa fʋ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ.
41012031	Kɩnyɔsapʋ mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, ‘Biti fʋ bɩrɩsa fɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ!’ Nbara kʋ n man bɩla ɔ bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɩ kyɔ ɩnɩmʋ.”
41012032	Nɩɩ nbara ɔkaapʋpʋ mʋ tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Fʋ waa atɔ gaa, Ɔkaapʋpʋ! Ɩ gyɛ kesintin fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ nkʋn ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kʋ man bɩla ɔ bʋ tɔ.
41012033	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ɔ taa mʋ kɔkɔlɔ yɛ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ yɛ mʋ ɔlʋn nyɛ kebiti sa Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ o biti mʋ‐bɩrɩsa fɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ mʋ, ɩ bʋrɔn ɩ kyɔ fɛɛ ɔ maa waa saraga yɛ kakɛɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ.”
41012034	Yesu maa wu fɛɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ kanyaasɩn tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ man bʋ kata yɛ sʋsʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ.” Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, ɔkʋ man bɩla nyɛ kɔkɔlɔ taasɛ Yesu asɩn kʋ.
41012035	Yesu maa kaapʋ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ yɛ, “Nɛnɛ sʋ nɩɩ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ Krisito mʋ ii biti ɔ lɩɩ Dawidi kanaana tɔ?
41012036	Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ yɛgɛ nɩɩ Dawidi tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ mɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ yɛ, Kyɩna mɛ gyisa sʋ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n biti n taa fʋ dʋn ana kpini waa fʋ ayaa kasɛ!’
41012037	Dawidi gbaa‐gbaa ɩ tɩɩ mʋ ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ.’ Ɩmʋ sʋ, nɛnɛ sʋ nɩɩ Krisito mʋ ii biti ɔ lɩɩ Dawidi kanaana tɔ?” Nɩɩ sakyɔ damantɛ mʋ kpini ba nu Yesu asɛ yɛ kinsigyi.
41012038	Yesu maa san ɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan baa fan da nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bun bamʋ ɩbalɩmasʋ ba naa bee biti afwaala yɛ bɛɛrɛɛ agya tɔ mʋ sʋ,
41012039	yɛgɛ bɛɛ kɩɩ bɛɛ lɛɛ ɩkyɩnakpa kparɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa yɛ kensi‐gyii ipula mʋ.
41012040	Bɛɛ naa bee puni akulapu‐kyɩɩ bee gyii bamʋ atɔ, yɛgɛ bɛɛ yɩlɛ asa tɔ bɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ bʋnswɩɩsa. Bee biti ba nyɛ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ gaa ɩ kyɔ asa kpini!”
41012041	Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ, Yesu kyɩna yɛgɛ mu ansi ɩɩ kɩɩ afulee kɩdakaa katɩnɛ, nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ asa ba maa sʋ afulee bɛɛ waa tɔ. Afulee wuya ana gaalaagaa ba waa afulee gaa.
41012042	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ okulapu‐kyɩɩ tiripu kʋ taa nderebi anyɔ ba waa tɔ.
41012043	Nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba sarɛ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, okulapu‐kyɩɩ tiripu nɩmʋ waa afulee kɩdakaa mʋ tɔ ɔ kyɔ asa mʋ kpini,
41012044	lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba waa gaa‐gaa mʋ, ba gyii san ɩkʋ yɩla bamʋ ibu to nɩn, amaa okulapu‐kyɩɩ tiripu nɩmʋ bɩrɛ, mu afulee kpini mʋ nɩɩ ɔ dan ɔ sʋ mu obu to mʋ kpini‐kpini nɩɩ ɔ taa ba waa tɔ falɛ.”
41013001	Yesu maa dan ɛɛ lɩɩ Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ ɔbɩɩlapʋ kʋ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ! Kɩɩ abuu danbɩrasa yɛ ibu bʋrɔnsa mʋ nɩɩ ba pɔyɩ falɛ.”
41013002	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Yɛ fu wu ibu kparɛ‐kparɛ maŋa? Kibuu kʋlʋn gbaa kɩ mɛɛ yɛ ki sii kɩ gyan kʋkʋ sʋ yɛ be mee nin kɩmʋ tʋʋ.”
41013003	Yesu maa tɛ Olifu kɩbɩɩ‐bi mʋ sʋ yɛgɛ mu ansi ɩɩ kɩɩ Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ, Pita yɛ Gyemisi yɛ Gyɔn yɛ Andiruwu ba ba mʋ asɛ.
41013004	Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Saŋa mɔɔ nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ii biti ɩ ba? Mɩnɛ sɩnkaala ii biti ɩ waa kaapʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ii biti ɩ ba?”
41013005	Nɩɩ Yesu piili ɛɛ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan baa fan da sʋ, kɛ fan man yɛgɛ ɔkʋ ɔ pɩna fanɛ.
41013006	Asa gaalaagaa bee biti ba ba mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Mɛ, ɩ gyɛ Krisito mʋ!’ kɛ ba pɩna asa gaalaagaa.
41013007	Nɩɩ fan kan nu anaa sʋ yɛ anaa asɩn mʋ, fan man yɛgɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ ɩ ŋmaa fanɛ. Ɩ dagaa ɩnɩmʋ ɩ maa ba kanɩn, amaa ɩ mɛɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ tee tiri tɔ nɩn.
41013008	Ɔsʋwʋlɛ ii biti ɔ kɔ yɛ ɔsʋwʋlɛ, kɛ kuwura‐gyii ɔ kɔ yɛ kuwura‐gyii. Kasɛ kii biti ki gyingyen katɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ, kɛ akʋn a tɩyɛ. Kanɩn asɩn nɩmʋ kpini i du nɩn fɛɛ ɔkyɩɩ keduŋidi gyankpaasa.
41013009	“Fan baa fan da sʋ. Bee biti ba kɩtaa fanɛ kpee asɩn ogyikpa, kɛ ba dayɩ fanɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa. Lɩɩ mɛ sʋ bee biti ba tɩɩ fanɛ alʋnpʋ yɛ awura ansi tɔ, kɛ fan nyɛ ɔkpa tɔwɛ bamʋ mɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ.
41013010	Amaa pɔyɩ kɛ laalaalʋwɛ ɔ ba mʋ, ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ba tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa asa yiri kʋmaa nɩmʋ.
41013011	Nɩɩ ba kan kɩtaa fanɛ kpee asɩn ogyikpa mʋ, fan man yɛgɛ ɩ tɔɔrɔɔ fanɛ lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan naa tɔwɛ mʋ sʋ. Saŋa mʋ kan fʋʋ mʋ, fan tɔwɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa waa fanɛ nnɔ tɔ mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ man gyɛ fanɛ ɩɩ tɔwɛ, amaa Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ɩɩ tɔwɛ.
41013012	“Osupu ii biti ɔ ba lɛɛ ɔdaa sa kɛ ba mɔɔ mʋ, kɛ ɔsɛ gbaa ɔ lɛɛ mu‐bii sa. Nɩɩ nbii bee biti ba kʋsʋ yɩlɛ bamʋ akʋʋgɛpʋ sʋ kɛ ba yɛgɛ ba mɔɔ bamʋ.
41013013	“Ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ii biti o kisi fanɛ lɩɩ mɛ sʋ. Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɩtaa tɔ kenken naa fʋʋ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ, ii biti ɔ nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ mʋ.
41013014	“Kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ, nɩɩ fan kan wu ɔdaatapʋ libi‐libi mʋ maa yɩlɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ ikisii yɛ kɩsɩkpa sa Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ maa yɩlɛ tʋtɔ mʋ, (ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kan kalɛ asɩn nɩmʋ mʋ, o nu kasɛ yɛ ɔdan) saŋa maŋa mʋ, bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyudeya mʋ, ba sɩlɛ kpee abɩɩ tɔ.
41013015	Ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ obu to mʋ, ɔ man bɩla bwii loo obu to ɔ naa taa mʋ atɔ kɛ ɔ sɩlɛ.
41013016	Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ ndɔɔ tɔ mʋ, ɔ man bɩla bwii mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ naa taa mʋ atɔ bunsa.
41013017	Kanɩn nkɛ maŋa tɔ mʋ, ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ baa ɩ bʋrɔn sa akyɩɩ ɩtɔ wuya ana, yɛ akyɩɩ atalapʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ nbii wuribi abaa tɔ mʋ!
41013018	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ kɛ kanɩn asɩn nɩmʋ a man ba kɩkyɛ saŋa.
41013019	Kanɩn saŋa maŋa ii biti ɩ baa i libi ɩ kyɔ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ dulinyaa wʋla wu lɩɩ koo saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tʋʋ dulinyaa ba fʋʋ ndaga saŋa nɩmʋ ii sʋ ii kpee.
41013020	Amaa nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ man dɩn kɔɔgɛ kanɩn awʋrʋfɔ nkɛ mʋ sʋ nɩn, naafɔɔ ɔkʋ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ. Amaa lɩɩ mʋ asa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔgɛ kanɩn nkɛ maŋa sʋ.
41013021	Kanɩn saŋa maa mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ‘Fan kɩɩ! Krisito mʋ ndee!’ abɛɛ ‘Fan kɩɩ! Mʋ ɩ bʋ falɛ mʋ!’ fan man kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.
41013022	Lɩɩ fɛɛ antɩŋɛsa Krisito ana yɛ antɩŋɛsa atɔwɛpʋ bee biti ba ba. Bee biti ba ba waa asɩn kyinkyinsa yɛ adangana pɩna asa. Naafɔɔ nɩɩ ɩ nyɛ waa nɩn, bɛɛ pɩna asa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ.
41013023	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan baa fan da sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ n wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa pɔyɩ kanɩn nkɛ maŋa ɩ fʋʋ.
41013024	“Kanɩn awʋrʋfɔ nkɛ maŋa kamaa mʋ, ‘kyɔwɛ man bɩla yɛ ɔ lɩɩ, ɔbwaayɩ gbaa man bɩla yɛ o fuuli.
41013025	Akyikpebi gbaa ii biti ɩ tɩyɛ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba kasɛ, nɩɩ sʋsʋ ɔlʋn atɔ kpini ii biti i gyingyen.’
41013026	“Kɛ asa kpini ba wu mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n maa lɩɩ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ tɔ n ba yɛ ɔlʋn yɛ bɛɛrɛɛ sʋ.
41013027	Kɛ n sun sʋsʋ nbɔɔ dulinyaa tɔ katɩn kʋmaa, kyɔwɛ kɩlɩɩ yɛ kyɔwɛ kɩtɩyɛ, adii yɛ akpɩlɩgɛ, kɛ ba natɛ kʋʋla Ɩbwaarɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ lɩɩ dulinyaa tɔ kpini.
41013028	“Fan yɛgɛ iyu afatɛɛ kɩpɔrɔgɛ ɩ waa asɩn baalasa sa fanɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fan kan wu iyu ɩ maa pɔrɔgɛ mʋ, fan bɩɩ fɛɛ kɩkyɛ ki tee tiri tɔ.
41013029	Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ fan kan wu fɛɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ falɛ kpini ɩ kan ɩ waa mʋ, fan baa fan nyi fɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa kibwii ba mʋ ki tiri tɔ, nɩɩ i du fɛɛ ɔ yɩlɛ kebunɔ.
41013030	N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ atɔ nɩmʋ kpini ii biti ɩ waa pɔyɩ, kɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba san ba tɛ nkpa tɔ falɛ kpini ba wu.
41013031	Sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ kpini ii biti ɔ kyʋn, amaa mɛ atɔwɛsa bɩrɛ ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ kyʋn kakaakʋ.
41013032	“Ɔkʋ man bʋ tɔ o nyi kanɩn kakɛ abɛɛ saŋa. Sʋsʋ nbɔɔ yɛ mɛ, Obii mʋ gbaa a mee nyi, amɔɔ Ɔsɛ mʋ nkʋn i nyi.
41013033	Fan kɩɩ danbɩrasa yɛgɛ fan da sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fen mee nyi saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n biti n ba.
41013034	Ii biti ɩ waa nɩn fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa maa kpee ɔkpa kata, kɛ ɔ taa kʋtɔ kʋmaa waa mʋ ayaafɔlɛ abaa tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ sa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ mu kusun sunsa. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ kebunɔ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ yɛ ɔ baa ɔ da sʋ.
41013035	“Ɩmʋ sʋ fan baa fan da sʋ, kpalɩ fɛɛ fen mee nyi saŋa mʋ nɩɩ mɛ, fanɛ kɩkpaara wuya mʋ n biti n ba. N taalɛ n ba fɛɛ kalaatɩpwɛ abɛɛ kiyiridi nsana abɛɛ kɩbwayɩkɛ abɛɛ nyenyenfuu.
41013036	Nɩɩ n kan ba purigi fanɛ mʋ, n man ba tu fanɛ fan maa dɛ nsɩɩrɛ.
41013037	Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ falɛ, n tɔwɛ n sa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ yɛ, ‘Ba fʋ da sʋ!’ ”
41014001	Ɩ maa san nkɛ nyɔ kɛ Gyiwu abi bee gyii bamʋ kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ yɛ bodobodo mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ kɩfɛ tinsa mʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ bee biti ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ba baala taa kɩtaa Yesu kɛ ba mɔɔ mʋ.
41014002	Nɩɩ bɛɛ yɛ, “Fan man yɛgɛ a waa kanɩn saŋa nɩmʋ tɔ, akʋtɔ akʋ bee biti bɛɛ waa ɩlawʋ.”
41014003	Yesu maa bʋ Betani mʋ, nɩɩ o kpee Simon mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ bootipu mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ. Maa tɛ tʋtɔ ee gyii mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ kʋ naa taa tuulaale pʋrʋntʋwa tɔ ba mʋ asɛ. Kanɩn tuulaale maŋa sʋ ɔgyalɩn nɩn gaa, lɩɩ fɛɛ nadi nɩɩ ba taa waa ɩmʋ. Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ tigi pʋrʋntʋwa mʋ kyɛɛgɛ tuulaale mʋ kpini wʋrɩgɛ Yesu kumu tɔ.
41014004	Nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ akʋ ba nyɛ agbʋ bɛɛ taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Saamʋ maa dan taa tuulaale nɩmʋ kyɛɛgɛ wʋrɩgɛ kɩyan falɛ, mɩnɛ kyaarɛ nɩɩ ɩ sʋ?
41014005	Naafɔɔ nɩɩ ba taa tuulaale nɩmʋ fɛ nɩn, ɩ waa fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa kesu laalaamuu kʋkɔka, kɛ baa taa afulee mʋ sa atiripu.” Nɩɩ ba nyɛ agbʋ bɛɛ pwɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ.
41014006	Amaa Yesu yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ! Mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ fɛn pwɩɩ mʋ? Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ gyɛ kʋtɔ danbɩrasa sa mɛ.
41014007	Atiripu mʋ bɩrɛ, ba bʋ fanɛ asɛ saŋa kʋmaa. Kanɩn sʋ, saŋa kʋmaa fɛn taalɛ waa bamʋ adanbɩrasa. Amaa mɛɛ mɛ bɩrɛ, n man yɛ n baa n bʋ fanɛ asɛ saŋa kʋmaa.
41014008	Ɔkyɩɩ nɩmʋ waa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ nɩn. Ɔ kyɛɛgɛ tuulaale nɩmʋ wʋrɩgɛ mɛ sʋ, ɔ gyankpaa ɛɛ sʋswa mɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ sa mi kepula kakɛ nɩn.
41014009	N tɔwɛ fanɛ nɩmʋ, dulinyaa tɔ katɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, bee biti ba tɔwɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa falɛ taa nyiŋi mʋ.”
41014010	Nɩɩ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gyudasi Isikariyoti kpee Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa mʋ asɛ, kɛ ɔ lɛɛ Yesu sa bamʋ.
41014011	Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ mʋ, waa bamʋ ɔkɔn gaa, nɩɩ ba yɛ bee biti ba sa mu afulee. Ɩmʋ sʋ Gyudasi piili ee biti ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɔla sʋ lɛɛ mʋ sa bamʋ.
41014012	Kakɛ gyankpaasa mʋ nɩɩ bee gyii kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ bodobodo mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ kɩfɛ tinsa, nɩɩ ba mɔɔ kɩmʋ saraga nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ fii biti a lɔŋɔ sa fʋ, kɛ fu gyii kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ agyitɔ mʋ?”
41014013	Nɩɩ Yesu sun mʋ abɩɩlapʋ anyɔ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kpee kadɛ lala mʋ tɔ, fen biti fan gyaŋa kanyɩn kʋ maa sʋ kolobi yɛ nkyu, fan buu mʋ
41014014	naa loo kɩkpaara mʋ nɩɩ ee biti o loo mʋ sʋ, kɛ fan taasɛ kɩkpaara wuya mʋ yɛ, ‘Ɔkaapʋpʋ mʋ yɛ, obu mɔɔ tɔ nɩɩ n maa mɛ abɩɩlapʋ an biti a gyii kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ agyitɔ mʋ?’
41014015	Kɩkpaara wuya mʋ ii biti ɔ kaapʋ fanɛ obu lala kʋ abansʋrʋ sʋ, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋʋla lɔŋɔ yɩla. Tʋtɔ nɩn fan lɔŋɔ kʋtɔ kʋmaa sa anɛ.”
41014016	Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba kpee kadɛ lala mʋ tɔ naa wu kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ ba waa kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ agyitɔ mʋ.
41014017	Ɩ maa fʋʋ kalaatɩpwɛ asɛ mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ ba ba abansʋrʋ mʋ sʋ.
41014018	Ba maa gyii mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, n maa fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ an gyii falɛ, fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ ii biti ɔ lɛɛ mɛ sa.”
41014019	Asɩn mʋ a nyita bamʋ nkɔlɔ tɔ, nɩɩ ba piili bɛɛ taasɛ Yesu kʋkʋlʋn‐kʋkʋlʋn yɛ, “Ɩ gyɛ mɛ nɩn, abɛɛ?”
41014020	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fanɛ kudu anyɔ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ, ɔmʋ nɩɩ n maa mʋ abaa ɩ bʋga ii loo lapɛ kʋlʋn tɔ mʋ, ii biti ɔ lɛɛ mɛ sa.
41014021	Mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa n biti n wu fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba wʋla kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ mʋ. Amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɛɛ mɛ sa mʋ, mʋ laakʋ. Naafɔɔ ba daa ba man kʋʋgɛ mʋ gbaa mʋ, ɩ bɔ.”
41014022	Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba maa san bee gyii mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu taa bodobodo, nɩɩ ɔ taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ ɔ kpɛɛ bodobodo mʋ tɔ, taa sa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kɔɔlɛ bodobodo nɩmʋ gyii, ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ.”
41014023	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu taa kɔɔpʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa afwaala sa mʋ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ taa sa bamʋ kpini yɛ ba nuu.
41014024	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mɛ nkalan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa yɩlɛ sa katɔwɛ kyula mʋ, kɛ ɩ kyɛɛgɛ wʋrɩgɛ sa asa gaalaagaa.
41014025	N tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ n man bɩla yɛ n nuu wayɩn nta nɩmʋ kakaakʋ, naa fʋʋ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ n biti n bɩla nuu nta pʋpwɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ.”
41014026	Nɩɩ ba maa bɩɩ ɔlʋn yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, ba lɩɩ kyʋn Olifu kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ.
41014027	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ kpini fen biti fan sɩlɛ yɛgɛ mɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, ‘N biti n mɔɔ nbʋlʋpʋ ɔkpapʋ mʋ, kɛ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ ba yaasɛ tɔ.’ ”
41014028	Yesu kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Amaa mi kelewu kyiŋi kamaa mʋ, n biti n gyankpaa fanɛ kpee Galile.”
41014029	Nɩɩ Pita lɛɛ Yesu kɔnɔ ɛɛ, “Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ sɩlɛ yɛgɛ fʋ gbaa, mɛɛ mɛ n man yɛ n sɩlɛ yɛgɛ fʋ!”
41014030	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ Pita yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fʋ kɛ fu nu yɛ, ndaga, pɔyɩ kɛ kyaasɛ ɔ bʋn ɩlɩɩ ɩnyɔ mʋ, fii biti fʋ kyɛɛ ɩlɩɩ ɩsa yɛ fu mee nyi mɛ.”
41014031	Amaa Pita payɩ ansi yɛ, “Halɩɩ ɩ gyɛ yɛ n maa fʋ an biti a wu gbaa mʋ, n mɛɛ yɛ n tɔwɛ yɛ n man nyi fʋ.” Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ abanban mʋ kpini ba tɔwɛ.
41014032	Nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba kpee katɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Gesemani, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kyɩna nfɩɩ kɛ n kpee naa kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ.”
41014033	Nɩɩ Yesu taa Pita yɛ Gyemisi yɛ Gyɔn buu mʋ n‐yɩɩ. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu kɔkɔlɔ nyita mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ gbaa ɩ yɔɔ mʋ.
41014034	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɛ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ ɩ dɩyɛ mɛ lewu‐lewu. Fan sii nfɩɩ yɛgɛ fan da sʋ!”
41014035	Maa kpee ansi tɔ gbɛrɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ naa kyʋn tɩyɛ kasɛ kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ ɩ nyɛ waa bɩrɛ, falɛ awʋrʋfɔ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ man tu mʋ.”
41014036	Nɩɩ Yesu kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nsɛ, kʋtɔ kʋmaa kɩ man bʋlʋn fʋ asɛ. Kɔɔlɛ kanɩn awʋrʋfɔ nɩmʋ lɩɩ mɛ sʋ. Amaa man gyɛ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ biti, amaa fʋ yɛgɛ fʋ kɔkɔlɔ biti kɩ waa.”
41014037	Yesu maa bwii kpee mʋ abɩɩlapʋ asɛ mʋ, ɔ naa tu ba maa dɛ nsɩɩrɛ. Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ Pita yɛ, “Simon, fʋ dɛ nɩn? Amɔɔ fan mɛɛ bɩla taalɛ kyɩna kerefi kʋlʋn yɛgɛ fan man dɛ?
41014038	Fan baa fan da sʋ, fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ, kɛ fan man tɩyɛ kʋtʋʋ tɔ kɩɩ tɔ. Kpalɩ fɛɛ fanɛ n‐yaayu bɩrɛ ii biti ɩ waa kʋ tɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋrɔn, amaa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mɔɔ ɩ pɔɔ.”
41014039	Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla bwii kpee ɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ kʋkʋlʋn maŋa.
41014040	Maa bɩla bwii ba mʋ, o wu ba maa dɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ nsɩɩrɛ ɩɩ sʋ bamʋ. Nɩɩ ba man bɩla be nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ.
41014041	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu naa bwii ba kili sasapʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan san fan dɛ fɛn fʋʋtɛ nɩn? Fan kɩɩ! Saŋa mʋ fʋʋ fɛɛ ba taa mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ waa alibi awaapʋ abaa tɔ.
41014042	Fan kɩɩ, ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɛɛ mɛ ɛɛ sa mʋ ndee. Fan kʋsʋ kɛ a kpee.”
41014043	Yesu maa dan san ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ, opula tɔ nɩɩ Gyudasi, abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ, ba fʋʋ tʋtɔ yɛ sakyɔ damantɛ kʋ. Ba sʋ isakunde yɛ agulungu. Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ yɛ kadɛ mʋ abɩlɩsa i sun bamʋ.
41014044	Nɩɩ Gyudasi mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɛɛ Yesu sa mʋ, wʋla kaapʋ asa sɩnkaala kʋ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɔmʋ nɩɩ n naa baari mʋ tɔ mʋ, mʋ nɩmʋ. Fan kɩtaa mʋ kɛ fan kun mʋ taa natɛ.”
41014045	Gyudasi maa dan fʋʋ Yesu asɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ!” Nɩɩ o baari mʋ tɔ.
41014046	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba kɩtaa Yesu ba sʋ mʋ tɔ kinkin.
41014047	Amaa bamʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ tʋtɔ mʋ, ɔkʋ lɛɛ mu sakunde ŋɛ Ɩbwaarɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ kɩnyɛ kʋsʋ tɩn.
41014048	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Amɔɔ isakunde yɛ ngulungun nɩɩ fɛn taa ba kɛ fan ba kɩtaa mɛ, fɛɛ n maa gyɛ kumu tɔ ɔlʋn oyu?
41014049	Kakɛ kʋmaa, n maa fanɛ nɩn kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ yɛgɛ n kaapʋ, nkɛɛ fan man kɩtaa mɛ. Amaa ɩ dagaa ɩnɩmʋ ɩ waa kanɩn, kɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɩ ba tɔ.”
41014050	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ kpini ba yɛgɛ mʋ sɩlɛ kyʋn.
41014051	Nɩɩ kɩyaafɔlɛ kʋ mʋ nɩɩ o bun kɩkalala nkʋn mʋ o buu Yesu, nɩɩ ba paa yɛ ba kɩtaa mʋ.
41014052	Nɩɩ ɔ sɩlɛ kibulunkpan yɛgɛ mʋ kɩkalala mʋ.
41014053	Nɩɩ ba taa Yesu kpee oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ kɩkpaara sʋ. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ kadɛ abɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ kpini ba sarɛ.
41014054	Nɩɩ Pita buu Yesu kɩyaa‐kɩyaa naa loo oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ kɩkpaara sʋ asɩn ogyikpa tʋtɔ. Nɩɩ o sii kyɩna kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ akɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ asɛ ɛɛ wʋlɛ fʋlɔn.
41014055	Nɩɩ aseepu bɩlɩsa mʋ yɛ kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ abɩlɩsa mʋ kpini ba biti asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba tɩn gyaga Yesu sʋ, kɛ ba nyɛ mɔɔ mʋ. Amaa ba kpɩnɛ, ba man nyɛ.
41014056	Nɩɩ asa gaalaagaa ba tɩn antɩŋɛsa gyaga Yesu sʋ, amaa bamʋ nnɔ tɔwɛsa ɩ man gyɛ kʋlʋn.
41014057	Nɩɩ anyɩn akʋ ba kʋsʋ yɩlɛ tɩn antɩŋɛsa gyaga Yesu sʋ yɛ,
41014058	“An nu maa tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘N biti n boyi kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ nɩɩ asa ba pɔyɩ mʋ, kɛ nkɛ nsa kamaa mʋ, n biti n pɔyɩ kɩpʋpwɛ mʋ nɩɩ man gyɛ asa ba pɔyɩ kɩmʋ.’ ”
41014059	Nkɛɛ bamʋ gbaa‐gbaa bamʋ nnɔ ɩ kwɩɩ yɛ abaa.
41014060	Nɩɩ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ bamʋ kpini ansi tɔ, taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Amɔɔ fʋ man sʋ kɔnɔ fʋ lɛɛ lɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ bɛɛ pwɩɩ fʋ falɛ?”
41014061	Amaa Yesu laatɔ ɔ man bugi mʋ kɔnɔ. Nɩɩ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ bɩla bwii taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ? Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ anɛ ayenbi ɩ gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ Mu‐Bii?”
41014062	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ fen biti fan wu mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa n tɛ Ɔlʋnpʋ Ɩbwaarɛ gyisa sʋ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ tɔ ɛɛ ba.”
41014063	Nɩɩ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ kyatɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa ɩkaalɛ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Ɩnɩmʋ bɩrɛ, an man bɩla an biti ɔkʋ ɔ ba tɔwɛ anɛ asɩn pwɩɩsa kʋ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ.”
41014064	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan nu yɛ fanɛ asʋ. Ɔ tɔwɛ nbusaa asɩn yii Ɩbwaarɛ. Kanɩn sʋ fan yɛ a waa mʋ nɛnɛ?” Bamʋ kpini ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “O gyii kʋpwɛ, nɩɩ ɩ dagaa maa wu.”
41014065	Nɩɩ asa mʋ akʋ ba tʋʋ nkyɔlɛ bee bun Yesu, nɩɩ ba bun mu ansi yɛgɛ akʋ mɔɔ bɛɛ da mʋ, nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ ɔ bɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ da mʋ? Nɩɩ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ akɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ ba taa mʋ lɩɩ bɛɛ kpa mʋ ɩtan.
41014066	Pita maa dan san ɔ bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ, nɩɩ aseepu ɔbɩlɩsa kɩnyɛ kyɩɩsa kʋ ba tʋtɔ.
41014067	Maa wu Pita maa san ɛɛ wʋlɛ fʋlɔn mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kɩɩ mʋ surum. Nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ Pita yɛ, “Yɛ ngbaa fʋ fu buu Yesu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Kanasareti‐nyɩn mʋ nɩn?”
41014068	Amaa Pita kyɛɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “N man nyi mʋ, nɩɩ n man nyi asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ tɔwɛ falɛ kasɛ.” Nɩɩ Pita lɩɩ ba lenbu.
41014069	Nɩɩ kɩnyɛ kyɩɩsa mʋ bɩla wu Pita tʋtɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba yɩla tʋtɔ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnɩmʋ gbaa tii bamʋ sʋ.”
41014070	Nɩɩ Pita bɩla kyɛɛ. Kamaa tɔ mʋ, bamʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ tʋtɔ mʋ ba tɔwɛ Pita yɛ, “Kesintin tɔ mʋ, fʋ gyɛ bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋ nɩn. Kpalɩ fɛɛ ngbaa fʋ, fʋ lɩɩ Galile nɩn!”
41014071	Nɩɩ Pita piili ɛɛ tɔwɛ nnɔ ɛɛ gyaga mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ bɔ ntan tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ fɛn tɔwɛ mʋ asɩn falɛ gbaa, n man nyi mʋ.”
41014072	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ kyaasɛ bʋn kɩnyɔsapʋ. Nɩɩ Pita nyiŋi asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Yesu wʋla tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Pɔyɩ kɛ kyaasɛ ɔ bʋn ɩlɩɩ ɩnyɔ mʋ, fii biti fʋ kyɛɛ ɩlɩɩ ɩsa yɛ fʋ man nyi mɛ” mʋ. Nɩɩ Pita tɩyɛ kusu sʋ ɛɛ sawʋ.
41015001	Lɩɩkaakɛ nyenyenfuu, nɩɩ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ yɛ kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ abɩlɩsa mʋ kpini, ba gyaŋɛ nɩɩ ba taa nfɛɛrɛ kʋlʋn. Nɩɩ ba ŋmina Yesu nɩɩ ba taa mʋ kyʋn naa sa Paleti mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Roma obii, nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ Ɩsɩrayɩ ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ.
41015002	Nɩɩ Paleti taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Gyiwu abi owura mʋ?” Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Kanan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ mʋ, kanɩn nɩn.”
41015003	Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ mɔɔ ba pwɩɩ Yesu lɩɩ asɩn gaalaagaa sʋ.
41015004	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔbɩlɩsa Paleti bɩla taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Fʋ mɛɛ yɛ fʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ? Nɩɩ asɩn damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba pwɩɩ fʋ lɩɩ ɩmʋ sʋ falɛ fa?”
41015005	Nɩɩ Yesu kina kɩlɛɛ kɔnɔ. Nɩɩ ɩ waa Paleti kanankʋ.
41015006	Kesu kʋmaa, ngyaŋɛ nbunɔ saŋa mʋ, ɔbɩlɩsa Paleti ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ bɛɛ lɛɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba tii obu mʋ tɔ ɔkʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ bee biti mʋ sa bamʋ.
41015007	Kanɩn saŋa maŋa tɔ mʋ, ba tii ɔnyɩn kʋ obu, bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Barabasi. O tii bamʋ nɩɩ ba man biti kɩbanɛ nɩɩ ba kɔ keluu mɔɔ nyɩmɩsa mʋ sʋ nɩn.
41015008	Nɩɩ asa mʋ ba ba Paleti asɛ, ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ɔ waa sa bamʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ wʋla ɛɛ waa mʋ.
41015009	Nɩɩ Paleti taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fen biti fɛɛ n yɛgɛ Gyiwu abi owura mʋ?”
41015010	Paleti dan o nyi kesintin fɛɛ aseepu abɩlɩsa ba taa Yesu ba sa mʋ lɩɩ kayɩɩ basa.
41015011	Amaa aseepu bɩlɩsa mʋ ba fun waa asa mʋ yɛ ba kʋlɛ Paleti kɛ ɔ yɛgɛ Barabasi sa bamʋ, man gyɛ Yesu.
41015012	Nɩɩ Paleti bɩla bwii taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ mɩnɛ nɩɩ fen biti fɛɛ n waa ɔmʋ nɩɩ fɛn tɩɩ yɛ Gyiwu abi owura mʋ?”
41015013	Nɩɩ ba kuusi yɛ, “Da mʋ oyu laasa sʋ mɔɔ mʋ.”
41015014	Nɩɩ Paleti taasɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ mɩnɛ kilibi nɩɩ ɔ dan waa nɩn?” Nɩɩ ba kuusi kenken tii sʋ yɛ, ba da mʋ oyu laasa sʋ.
41015015	Paleti mɔɔ bwii ee biti ɔ waa asa mʋ kɔkɔlɔ biti sʋ, nɩɩ o tigi Barabasi sa bamʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba taa tɩŋɛ Yesu, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ waa bamʋ abaa tɔ yɛ ba naa da mʋ mata oyu laasa sʋ.
41015016	Nɩɩ anaakɔpʋ mʋ ba taa Yesu naa loo Ɔbɩlɩsa Paleti lenbu tɔ. Nɩɩ ba tɩɩ bamʋ tɔɔmaa ana asansa.
41015017	Nɩɩ ba bun Yesu kɩrɩman‐kyu kɩtaa fɛɛ awura lɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ba taa iwii waa kuwura‐wʋrʋ bun mʋ.
41015018	Nɩɩ ba piili bɛɛ fwaala mʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Gyiwu abi owura mʋ, nyɛ nkpa bʋnswɩɩsa.”
41015019	Nɩɩ ba taa oyu bɛɛ da mu kumu tɔ, nɩɩ bɛɛ tʋʋ nkyɔlɛ ba bun mʋ, nɩɩ ba gya muŋa bamʋ ayaa muli sʋ sa mʋ fɛɛ ba maa sun owura mʋ.
41015020	Ba maa tɛɛ waa Yesu ahin‐sɩn lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ba bugi bamʋ kɩrɩman‐kyu kɩtaa mʋ, nɩɩ ba taa Yesu gbaa‐gbaa lɛɛ bun mʋ. Nɩɩ ba taa mʋ kyʋn ba naa da mʋ oyu laasa mʋ sʋ.
41015021	Ba maa kpee mʋ, ba gyaŋa Simon mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Siren ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, ɛɛ ba kadɛ lala mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ anaakɔpʋ mʋ ba nyan mʋ yɛ ɔ sʋla Yesu oyu laasa mʋ. Simon nɩmʋ mu‐bii ana ɩ gyɛ Alekisanda maa Rufusi.
41015022	Nɩɩ ba taa Yesu kpee katɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Goligota mʋ. Goligota kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “Kumu kawɛ opula.”
41015023	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba taa kɩfɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ mɩɩrɛ waa nta tɔ sa Yesu yɛ o nuu. Amaa Yesu kina ɔ man nuu.
41015024	Nɩɩ ba da Yesu oyu laasa sʋ. Ba maa biti ba barɩgɛ Yesu ɩkaalɛ tɔ mʋ, ba tʋʋ nbii barɩgɛ mʋ ɩkaalɛ mʋ tɔ sa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa gyii mʋ.
41015025	Nyenyenfuu, ɩ waa fɛɛ kerefi akpanɔ saŋa, nɩɩ ba da Yesu mata oyu laasa mʋ sʋ.
41015026	Nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba taa bun Yesu kʋpwɛ mʋ taa da mata mu amu sʋ yɛ, “ƆNƖMƲ Ɩ GYƐ GYIWU ABI OWURA MƲ.”
41015027	Kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ, ba da bamʋ nɩɩ bee yuuri ɔlʋn sʋ anyɔ akʋ iyu laasa sʋ Yesu asɛ. Ɔkʋ bʋ mʋ gyisa sʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɔɔ bʋ mʋ bɩna sʋ.
41015028	Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ mʋ ɩ ba tɔ.
41015029	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ ba ɛɛ kyʋn tʋtɔ gbaa bɛɛ sʋ asebi bɛɛ wʋrɩgɛ Yesu sʋ, yɛgɛ bee fi‐fi bamʋ amu bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “To, yɛ fʋ yɛ fii biti fu boyi kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ kɛ fʋ bɩla bwii pɔyɩ kɩmʋ nkɛ nsa akɛ mʋ?
41015030	Kanɩn bɩrɛ kpɩlɩgɛ lɩɩ oyu laasa mʋ sʋ kɛ fʋ mɔlɩgɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ!”
41015031	Kanɩn nɩɩ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ gbaa ba ŋmasɛ Yesu nɩn. Bɛɛ tɔwɛ abaa yɛ, “Ɛɛ mɔlɩgɛ asa amaa ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ mɔlɩgɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ.”
41015032	Nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Fʋ nyɛ nɩɩ fʋ gyɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ yɛ ɔ ba mɔlɩgɛ asa, nɩɩ fʋ bɩla fʋ gyɛ Gyiwu abi owura mʋ de, kpɩlɩgɛ lɩɩ oyu laasa mʋ sʋ, saamʋ an nyɛ kɔɔlɛ fu gyii.” Asa anyɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba da bamʋ iyu laasa mʋ sʋ gbaa bɛɛ saalɛ Yesu.
41015033	Kyɔwɛ maa fʋʋ amu nsana mʋ, nɩɩ kitentenbiri ki bun ɔsʋwʋlɛ mʋ kpini sʋ naa fʋʋ kalaatɩpwɛ asɛ.
41015034	Ɩ maa fʋʋ kerefi asa kalaatɩpwɛɛ asɛ mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu kuusi kenken yɛ, “Eli, Eli, lamaa sabatani?” Ɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “Mɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, mɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fʋ yɛgɛ mɛ kanɩn?”
41015035	Asa mʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ tʋtɔ mʋ i nu ɩnɩmʋ, nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Fan nu! Ɛɛ tɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Ɔtɔwɛpʋ Eligya.”
