41015036	Nɩɩ bamʋ ɔkʋ sɩlɛ naa taa ɔkyɛɛ dufudufu nyɔ nta nyaŋɛsa tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ taa ŋmina oyu sʋ kʋsaa naa tii Yesu kɔnɔ yɛ o nuu. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ a kɩɩ fɛɛ Eligya ii biti ɔ ba kpɩlɩgɛ mʋ oyu laasa mʋ sʋ.”
41015037	Nɩɩ Yesu sawʋ kenken, nɩɩ o wu.
41015038	Nɩɩ kɩtaa kunsa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ barɩgɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ ɔtɔ tɔ mʋ kyatɛ tɔ kɩnyɔ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba yii kasɛ.
41015039	Nɩɩ anaakɔpʋ ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ yɩlɛ tʋtɔ mʋ wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ Yesu sawʋ nɩɩ o wu mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kesintin, ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii nɩn.”
41015040	Akyɩɩ akʋ ba yɩlɛ kata bɛɛ kɩɩ. Bamʋ tɔ akʋ ɩ gyɛ Mɛɛrɩ Magidalen yɛ Mɛɛrɩ, Gyemisi pii asɛ maa Gyosefu bamʋ‐nyi, yɛ Solome.
41015041	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu bʋ Galile mʋ, ba buu mʋ, nɩɩ ba kyɛ mʋ tɔ. Akyɩɩ gaalaagaa mʋ nɩɩ ba buu mʋ ba Gyerusalem mʋ gbaa ba yɩlɛ tʋtɔ.
41015042	Kanɩn kakɛ maŋa kɩ gyɛ kakɛ kʋlasa gyoo kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa mʋ. Kyɔwɛ maa kpee ɔ naa tɩyɛ mʋ,
41015043	nɩɩ Gyosefu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Arimatiya mʋ naa ba. Ɔ gyɛ nyɩmɩsa kparɛ nɩn, nɩɩ o tii kadɛ abɩlɩsa mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ asa asɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ee gyoo Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩba saŋa mʋ. Nɩɩ Gyosefu waa kɔkɔlɔ kpee Paleti asɛ naa kʋlɛ Yesu kibuni mʋ.
41015044	Paleti maa nu fɛɛ Yesu tɛɛ wʋla wu mʋ, nɩɩ i kyinkyin mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ anaakɔpʋ ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Yesu tee wu?”
41015045	Paleti maa nu anaakɔpʋ bɩlɩsa asɛ yɛ ɩ gyɛ kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ sa ɔkpa yɛ Gyosefu ɔ naa taa Yesu kebuni mʋ naa pula.
41015046	Nɩɩ Gyosefu naa sɔɔ taafuli, nɩɩ ɔ naa saatɛ Yesu, taa taafuli mʋ maalɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ naa pula kakyan mʋ nɩɩ ba ŋɛ kɩfʋlɛ tɔ waa ɔbɔ mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ Gyosefu gbiliti kubuu lala tii kakyan mʋ kɔnɔ.
41015047	Nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ Magidalen yɛ Gyose mu‐nyi Mɛɛrɩ ba yɩlɛ kɩɩ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba taa Yesu naa pula mʋ.
41016001	Kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ kamaa tɔ mʋ, Mɛɛrɩ Magidalen yɛ Mɛɛrɩ Gyemisi mu‐nyi yɛ Solome ba bɩya atɔ liifensa mʋ nɩɩ ba sɔɔ mʋ, kɛ ba taa naa sʋswa Yesu kebuni mʋ.
41016002	Lɩɩkaakɛ, nawɔkyɩ kakɛ gyankpaasa akɛ nyenyenfuu, kyɔwɛ maa dan lɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ ba kʋsʋ bee kpee Yesu kakyan mʋ asɛ.
41016003	Ba maa naa bee kpee ɔkpa tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ba taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Anɩmʋ ii biti ɔ naa gbiliti kubuu mʋ lɩɩ kakyan mʋ kɔnɔ sa anɛ?” Kpalɩ fɛɛ kubuu mʋ kɩ kyɔ gaa.
41016004	Ba maa kɩɩ mʋ, ba wu fɛɛ kubuu mʋ kɩ tɛɛ wʋla gbiliti kɩ dɛ.
41016005	Nɩɩ ba loo kakyan mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ba wu kɩyaafɔlɛ kʋ maa bun atɔ fufuli ɔ tɛ kakyan mʋ tɔ gyisa sʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ nkɔlɔ ɩ ŋmaa bamʋ.
41016006	Nɩɩ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fan man yɛgɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ ɩ ŋmaa fanɛ. N nyi yɛ Yesu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Nasareti, mʋ nɩɩ ba da mʋ oyu laasa sʋ mʋ nɩɩ fen biti. Ɔ man bʋ nfɩɩ. O kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ. Fan kɩɩ, nfɩɩ nɩɩ ba daa taa mʋ yɩla.
41016007	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan natɛ naa tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ Pita yɛ, Yesu gyankpaa fanɛ ee kpee Galile. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ fen biti fan wu mʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ mʋ.”
41016008	Nɩɩ ba sɩlɛ lɩɩ kakyan mʋ tɔ lɩɩ fɛɛ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ, nɩɩ bɛɛ kyɩkyaa. Ba man tɔwɛ ɔkʋ sɛhn kpalɩ fɛɛ kufuu kɩ maa sʋ bamʋ sʋ.
41016009	Yesu maa kʋsʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ lɩɩkaakɛ nyenyenfuu mʋ, ɔ daa kɩlɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ nɩn kaapʋ Mɛɛrɩ Magidalen mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gya nbwɩɩ libi asunɔ lɩɩ mʋ tɔ mʋ.
41016010	Nɩɩ o kpee naa tɔwɛ mʋ bɩrɩsa ana mʋ nɩɩ ba bɔɔta tɔ ba tɛ bɛɛ sawʋ mʋ.
41016011	Ba maa nu lɩɩ Magidalen asɛ yɛ Yesu tɛ nkpa tɔ nɩɩ o wu mʋ mʋ, ba man kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.
41016012	Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, Yesu taa ɔkpa pʋpwɛ kʋ sʋ lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ bamʋ tɔ asa anyɔ akʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba naa bee kpee bamʋ kadɛ tɔ.
41016013	Nɩɩ ba bwii ba tɔwɛ abanban mʋ, amaa ba man kɔɔlɛ bamʋ gyii.
41016014	Ɩnɩmʋ kpini kamaa mʋ, Yesu lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu ɔkʋ mʋ, yɛgɛ ba tɛ bee gyii. Yesu pwɩɩ bamʋ lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ nkɔlɔ ɩ maa bʋlʋn gaa, nɩɩ ba man kɔɔlɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba wu mʋ maa tɛ nkpa tɔ mʋ gyii.
41016015	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kpee dulinyaa tɔ katɩn kʋmaa naa tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa daadimaadi.
41016016	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ gyii, nɩɩ ba gyee mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee mʋ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ. Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ, bee biti ba bun mʋ lewu kʋpwɛ.
41016017	Bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ falɛ ɩsɩnkaala ii biti i buu bamʋ. Lɩɩ mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ mʋ, bee biti ba gya nbwɩɩ libi, kɛ ba tɔwɛ ntɔwɛ pʋpwɛ.
41016018	Fɛɛ nɩɩ ba kan kɩtaa anansɛ tɔ abɛɛ ba kan nuu kʋbwɛ gbaa mʋ, ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ waa bamʋ sɛhn. Bee biti ba taa bamʋ abaa gyaga alɔpʋ sʋ kɛ ba nyɛ alanfɩya.”
41016019	Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu maa tɔwɛ bamʋ asɛ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa mʋ kpee sʋsʋ naa kyɩna mʋ gyisa sʋ.
41016020	Nɩɩ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ ba kpee katɩn kʋmaa naa tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, yɛgɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu ɔlʋn tii bamʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ba waa adangana, nɩɩ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ bamʋ asɩn danbɩrasa katɔwɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ kesintin.
42001001	Mɛ‐kyɛmɩnɛ Tiyofolisi, asa damantɛ ba taa tʋʋ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kyʋrɔɔ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa anɛ tɔ mʋ yɩla.
42001002	Ba kyʋrɔɔ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ asa ba wu yɛ ansi, lɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu asɩn mʋ i yii kasɛ, nɩɩ ba da ɩmʋ kibonbon tɔwɛ anɛ mʋ, yɩla.
42001003	Ɩmʋ sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ wuya Tiyofolisi, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ n loo asɩn mʋ tɔ kɩɩ lɩɩ ɩmʋ npiili mʋ, ɩ dagaa fɛɛ n kyʋrɔɔ ɩmʋ kɩgyasʋ‐kɩgyasʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ sʋ sa fʋ.
42001004	Kɛ fʋ nyɛ bɩɩ asɩn mʋ kesintin fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kaapʋ fʋ mʋ.
42001005	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Herodi gyɛ owura Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kʋ bʋ tɔ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Sakariya. Ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ kɩmʋ yɛ Abigya mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ. Nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ‐ka Elisabeti, nɩɩ ngbaa mʋ lɩɩ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ Aron kɩnaana tɔ.
42001006	Sakariya maa Elisabeti kakyɩna tɔ ɩkpa i kyiigi Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, nɩɩ ba buu Ɩbwaarɛ nbara yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ mʋ nnɔsa mʋ ɩ kaapʋ mʋ.
42001007	Ba bɩlɛ, amaa ba man kʋʋgɛ kebii, lɩɩ fɛɛ Elisabeti maa gyɛ ogbentipu sʋ.
42001008	Saŋa kʋ ɩ ba fʋʋ aseepu kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ Sakariya bʋ kɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ bee sun Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ.
42001009	Nɩɩ ba tʋʋ nbii lɛɛ mʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ aseepu ɩkpa ɩ kaapʋ mʋ, fɛɛ o loo kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ naa tuwa nlaa.
42001010	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ o loo ee tuwa nlaa mʋ, yɛgɛ asa damantɛ ba bʋ kewusunɔ bɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ.
42001011	Nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kabɔɔ ba mʋ asɛ, ba yɩlɛ nlaa kaswɩɩ mʋ gyisa sʋ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ee tuwa nlaa mʋ.
42001012	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Sakariya wu kabɔɔ mʋ, mʋ kɔkɔlɔ kɩ ŋmaa mʋ, nɩɩ ɩ kɩtaa mʋ kufuu.
42001013	Amaa nɩɩ kabɔɔ mʋ tɔwɛ Sakariya yɛ, “Man waa kufuu, Ɩbwaarɛ nu fʋ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ. Fʋ‐ka Elisabeti ii biti ɔ kʋʋgɛ Obii‐nyɩnsa kɛ fʋ yɩla mʋ kɩtɩɩ yɛ Gyɔn.
42001014	Lɩɩ mʋ sʋ mʋ, fanɛ ansi ii biti i gyii, kɛ asa damantɛ gbaa ansi i gyii lɩɩ mʋ kakʋʋgɛ sʋ.
42001015	Ee biti ɔ waa nyɩmɩsa kparɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ. Ɔ man kan waa nuu nta abɛɛ nta bʋlʋnsa. Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ biti o loo bɔla mʋ tɔ, lɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ mu‐nyi ɔtɔ tɔ mʋ.
42001016	Nɩɩ ee biti ɔ yɛgɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi gaalaagaa ba nyɛ nfɛɛrɛ kɩkyɛɛgɛ, kɛ ba bwii ba Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ.
42001017	Fu kebii Gyɔn nɩmʋ ii biti ɔ taa Kayaayu tɔ ɔlʋn gyankpaa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Eligya. Ee biti ɔ lɔŋɔ asɛ yɛ nbii bʋga tɔ, kɛ ɔ taa bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn mʋ, ba ba nyɛ kanyaasɩn kɛ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ ba Ɩbwaarɛ ɩkpa kyiigisa mʋ sʋ. Ee biti ɔ waa ɩnɩmʋ lɔŋɔ asa mʋ gyoo Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ.”
42001018	Nɩɩ Sakariya taasɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ n biti n waa bɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ gyɛ kesintin? Lɩɩ fɛɛ n bɩlɛ, nɩɩ mɛ‐ka gbaa bɩlɛ yɛ kebii kɩnyɛ.”
42001019	Nɩɩ kabɔɔ mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ Gabireli mʋ nɩɩ n yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ sʋsʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ o sun mɛ yɛ n ba tɔwɛ fʋ asɩn danbɩrasa nɩmʋ.
42001020	Kpalɩ fɛɛ fʋ maa man kɔɔlɛ mɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba ɩmʋ saŋa tɔ kyɛɛkyɛɛ gyii sʋ mʋ, n tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ fʋ man bɩla yɛ fʋ taalɛ tɔwɛ sɛhn, naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ mɛ katɔwɛ yɩla mʋ kii biti kɩ ba tɔ.”
42001021	Saŋa kʋlʋn maa tɔ, yɛgɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ kewusunɔ mʋ, bɛɛ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ Sakariya kyɛɛrɛɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ.
42001022	Nɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ obu mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɔ man bɩla ɛɛ taalɛ ɛɛ tɔwɛ bamʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ba bɩɩ fɛɛ, o wu ansi sʋ kɩlɛɛkaapʋ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ abaa nɩɩ o sii ɔ sʋ ɛɛ tɔwɛ bamʋ asɛ.
42001023	Sakariya maa sun mu kiseepu kusun lʋwɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɔ lɩɩ tʋtɔ kpewu mʋ ayɛ.
42001024	Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ‐ka Elisabeti nyɛ ɔtɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ baala kɩkpaara sʋ kanɩn ɩbwaayɩ inuu.
42001025	Nɩɩ Elisabeti yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ ɩ waa ɩnɩmʋ sa mɛ. O su mɛ kʋwɛɛ, nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ ipeeli lɩɩ mɛ sʋ lɩɩ mɛ tɔɔmaa ana tɔ.”
42001026	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Elisabeti sʋ mʋ ɔtɔ ɩbwaayɩ isiye mʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sun mʋ kabɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gabireli kpee Nasareti kadɛ tɔ, mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ.
42001027	Ɩbwaarɛ sun mʋ kpee kibite mʋ nɩɩ o mee nyi ɔnyɩn nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Mɛɛrɩ mʋ asɛ. Ba taa mʋ sa ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gyosefu kekili, nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Dawidi kɩnaana tɔ.
42001028	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ kpee mʋ asɛ naa fwaala mʋ yɛ, “Faa kumu ɔkɔn! Ɩbwaarɛ bʋ fʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ waa fʋ kusee gaa.”
42001029	Nɩɩ ɩ kɩtaa Mɛɛrɩ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ kabɔɔ mʋ tɔwɛ mʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɛɛ fɛ kanɩn afwaala mʋ nfɛɛrɛ.
42001030	Nɩɩ kabɔɔ mʋ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɛɛrɩ man waa kufuu, lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ nyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ kabwaala.
42001031	Fii biti fʋ nyɛ ɔtɔ kɛ fʋ kʋʋgɛ Obii‐nyɩnsa, kɛ fʋ yɩla mʋ kɩtɩɩ yɛ Yesu.
42001032	Ee biti ɔ waa nyɩmɩsa kparɛ kɛ ba tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Owura lala Mu‐Bii. Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ taa Yesu mʋ naana Dawidi kuwura‐gya mʋ sa mʋ.
42001033	Nɩɩ ee biti o gyii Ɩsɩrayɩ abi sʋ kuwura‐gyii naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ ɔkaa.”
42001034	Nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ taasɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ii biti ɩ bɔla sʋ waa, yɛgɛ n gyɛ kibite mʋ nɩɩ n man nyi ɔnyɩn?”
42001035	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ii biti ɔ ba fʋ sʋ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Owura lala mʋ ɔlʋn o bun fʋ sʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ bee biti ba tɩɩ obii kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ nɩɩ fii biti fʋ kʋʋgɛ mʋ mʋ, yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii.
42001036	Fʋ kʋʋpʋ Elisabeti mʋ nɩɩ asa bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ ogbentipu nɩɩ ɔ waa kakyɩɩ bɩlɩsa gbaa mʋ, sʋ obii‐nyɩnsa‐bii ɔtɔ ɩbwaayɩ isiye.
42001037	Lɩɩ fɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋ kɩ man bʋ tɔ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mɛɛ taalɛ waa.”
42001038	Nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ nɩn, yɛgɛ ɩ waa kanɩn sa mɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ mʋ.” Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ lɩɩ tʋtɔ kyʋn.
42001039	Ɩmʋ nkɛ gbɛrɛɛ kamaa mʋ, Mɛɛrɩ kʋʋla mʋ n‐yɩɩ ɛɛ waa bilen o kpee kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ abɩɩ tɔ Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
42001040	Nɩɩ ɔ naa loo Sakariya kɩkpaara sʋ naa fwaala mʋ‐ka Elisabeti.
42001041	Elisabeti maa nu Mɛɛrɩ afwaala mʋ, kebii mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ mʋ ɔtɔ tɔ mʋ fitii. Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ kɩ maa loo bɔla Elisabeti mʋ,
42001042	nɩɩ ɔ pʋntɛ kenken tɔwɛ yɛ, “Akyɩɩ kpini tɔ mʋ, fʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ waa kusee kʋkyɔ, nɩɩ kusee bun fu kebii mʋ nɩɩ fii biti fʋ kʋʋgɛ mʋ sʋ.
42001043	Mɩnɛ kusee lala nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa bwaala mɛ yɛ mɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ mu‐nyi ɔ ba bɔɔ mɛ sʋ?
42001044	N maa dan nu fʋ afwaala mʋ, kebii mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ mɛ ɔtɔ tɔ mʋ taa kensi‐gyii fitii.
42001045	Kusee ɩ gyɛ fʋ lɛɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ maa kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ fʋ mʋ, ii biti ɩ ba tɔ kesintin.”
42001046	Nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “N yɩn Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɩɩ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ.
42001047	Ɩbwaarɛ mɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ sʋ mʋ, mi ansi i gyii lɩɩ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ.
42001048	Kpalɩ fɛɛ mɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ kibite mʋ nɩɩ n man bʋ sɛhn tɔ mʋ, mɛ asɩn i tiri Ɩbwaarɛ. Nɩɩ lɩɩ ndaga sʋ i kpee mʋ, ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ii biti ɔ tɩɩ mɛ yɛ kumu ɔkɔn wuya.
42001049	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɔlʋnpʋ lala Ɩbwaarɛ waa atɔ kparɛ sa mɛ. Mʋ kɩtɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Kɩkyɩrɛkyɩrɛ.
42001050	Nɩɩ asa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba sɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, ee wu bamʋ kʋwɛɛ, san sa abii san yɛ anaana.
42001051	Ɔ taa mʋ kɩbaa bʋlʋnsa mʋ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa, nɩɩ ɔ yaasɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kʋsaa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ.
42001052	Ɔ kʋsaa awura‐gyipu bamʋ ngya sʋ, amaa nɩɩ o diyaa abʋlʋpʋ mʋ sʋsʋ.
42001053	Ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ atiripu ba nyɛ atɔ danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ i tiri bamʋ. Amaa atɔ wuya ana bɩrɛ, o bwiiyaa bamʋ yɛ abaa kpan.
42001054	Ɩbwaarɛ nyiŋi mʋ asa Ɩsɩrayɩ abi sʋ, nɩɩ o wu bamʋ kʋwɛɛ kyɛ bamʋ tɔ,
42001055	fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɩla anɛ naana ana agyankpaapʋ mʋ. Ɔ tɔwɛ Abraham yɛ ee biti o wu maa mʋ kanaana tɔ abi kpini kʋwɛɛ.”
42001056	Nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ kyɩna Elisabeti asɛ ɩ waa fɛɛ ɩbwaayɩ ɩsa pɔyɩ nɩɩ o bwii kpewu.
42001057	Elisabeti kakɛ kʋʋgɛsa maa fʋʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kʋʋgɛ kebii‐nyɩnsa‐bii.
42001058	Nɩɩ Elisabeti mʋ tɔɔmaa ana yɛ mʋ kʋʋpʋ ana ba maa nu kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ wu mʋ kʋwɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ kpini ba bʋga gyii bamʋ ansi.
42001059	Ɩmʋ kakɛ buruwasapu mʋ ba gyaŋɛ, kɛ ba tɩn kebii mʋ oduu. Naafɔɔ bee biti ba taa mʋ‐sɛ kɩtɩɩ Sakariya mʋ yɩla mʋ.
42001060	Amaa nɩɩ mu‐nyi kina kɩtɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Ba tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gyɔn.”
42001061	Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ Elisabeti yɛ, “Fan man sʋ ɔkʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kanɩn kɩtɩɩ fanɛ kanan tɔ.”
42001062	Nɩɩ ba waa abaa tɔwɛ mʋ‐sɛ Sakariya asɛ, kɛ ba bɩɩ kɩtɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba taa yɩla kebii mʋ.
42001063	Nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba taa kɩgyantan‐bi sa mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ kyʋrɔɔ sʋ yɛ, “Mʋ kɩtɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Gyɔn.” Nɩɩ i kyinkyin bamʋ gaa.
42001064	Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ Sakariya kɔnɔ bugi, nɩɩ mʋ kanandʋlʋ gbaa saŋɛ, nɩɩ o piili ɛɛ tɔwɛ ɛɛ yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ.
42001065	Nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa mʋ tɔɔmaa ana mʋ kpini, nɩɩ asɩn nɩmʋ ɩ yalagɛ ndɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ abɩɩ tɔ Gyudeya Ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
42001066	Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o nu kanɩn asɩn mʋ ɩɩ fɛ kɩmʋ nfɛɛrɛ, nɩɩ ɛɛ taasɛ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ kanɩn kebii nɩmʋ ba ɔ ba waa?” Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩbaa kɩ gyan mʋ sʋ.
42001067	Nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ bɔla kebii mʋ mʋ‐sɛ Sakariya tɔ, nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn yɛ,
42001068	“Fan yɛgɛ a yɩn anɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ ba nɩn ɔ ba kyɛ mʋ asa tɔ kɛ ɔ mɔlɩgɛ bamʋ.
42001069	Lɩɩ mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ Dawidi kanan tɔ mʋ, ɔ lɛɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ Lʋnpʋ sa anɛ.
42001070	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ba wʋla tɔwɛ yɩla fɛɛ,
42001071	ee biti ɔ ba mɔlɩgɛ anɛ lɩɩ anɛ dʋn ana yɛ anɛ akisipu kpini abaa tɔ.
42001072	Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ yɛ ee biti o wu anɛ naana ana kʋwɛɛ kɛ o nyiŋi mʋ katɔwɛ kyula kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ.
42001073	Katɔwɛ kyula nɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔ ntan sa anɛ naana Abraham yɛ,
42001074	ee biti ɔ kɔɔlɛ anɛ lɩɩ anɛ akisipu abaa tɔ, kɛ ɔ yɛgɛ a nyɛ ɔlʋn sun mʋ yɛgɛ a man sʋ kufuu.
42001075	Kɛ a ba an gyɛ asa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ kɛ anɛ ɩkpa i kyiigi, mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ lɩɩ anɛ kakyɩna kpini.”
42001076	Nɩɩ Sakariya tɔwɛ mu‐bii Gyɔn yɛ, “Mi‐bii, bee biti ba tɩɩ fʋ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Ɔlʋnpʋ mʋ ɔtɔwɛpʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fii biti fʋ gyankpaa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ naa lɔŋɔ mʋ ɔkpa.
42001077	Fii biti fʋ ba yɛgɛ mʋ asa ba bɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ lɩɩ alibi kɩtaakɛɛ sʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ.
42001078	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ maa wu anɛ kʋwɛɛ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ mʋ ba anɛ asɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ kyɔwɛ ɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba ɛɛ da kasɛ mʋ.
42001079	Kɛ ɩ ŋmaŋɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kitentenbiri mʋ nɩɩ kɩ sʋ bamʋ kii kpee lewu tɔ, kɛ ɩ ŋmaŋɛ tɔ kaapʋ anɛ ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ sʋ i kpee keyuula tɔ.”
42001080	Nɩɩ kebii mʋ dan nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu tɔ ɔlʋn, nɩɩ ɔ kyɩna ofuli sʋ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi.
42002001	Kanɩn nkɛ maŋa tɔ mʋ, Owura Kasaro Agusitu sa kɔnɔ yii sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ Roma kuwura‐gyii kasɛ mʋ kpini ɔ naa kyʋrɔɔ mʋ kɩtɩɩ kɛ ba kalɛ mʋ.
42002002	Kɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ asa kɩkalɛ gyankpaasa mʋ nɩɩ ba waa Roma kuwura‐gyii tɔ, saŋa maŋa tɔ nɩɩ Kwirinisi gyɛ Siriya ɔsʋwʋlɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ.
42002003	Kanɩn sʋ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kpee mʋ kadɛ tɔ kɛ ɔ naa kyʋrɔɔ mʋ kɩtɩɩ.
42002004	Nɩɩ Gyosefu gbaa kʋsʋ Nasareti kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, kpee kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ kɩmʋ yɛ Betilehem mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ. Betilehem ɩ gyɛ kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ owura Dawidi lɩɩ. Gyosefu kpee Betilehem kpalɩ fɛɛ ɔ lɩɩ Dawidi kebunɔ nɩn.
42002005	Gyosefu taa Mɛɛrɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɛ ee biti o kili mʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ba kpee Betilehem ba naa kyʋrɔɔ bamʋ atɩɩ. Kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ Mɛɛrɩ sʋ ɔtɔ.
42002006	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Betilehem mʋ, nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ saŋa kʋʋgɛsa kɛ fʋʋ.
42002007	Nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ kʋʋgɛ mu‐bii‐nyɩnsa gyankpaasa. Nɩɩ ɔ taa akyibi mili kebii mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ dɩɩla kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ atɔbwaaya bee gyii mʋ tɔ. Kpalɩ fɛɛ afɔ ba maa ba kɩkyɔ sʋ mʋ Mɛɛrɩ maa Gyosefu ba man nyɛ opula afɔ obu mʋ tɔ.
42002008	Saŋa maŋa tɔ, nbʋlʋpʋ akpapʋ akʋ ba bʋ kadɛ mʋ afitiri tɔ bɛɛ kɩɩ bamʋ nbʋlʋpʋ sʋ kagyanbwɛ.
42002009	Nɩɩ opula maa tɔ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ kʋ kɩ ba bamʋ asɛ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bʋnyaa mʋ ŋmaŋɛ tɔ kyaabɔɔ bamʋ. Nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ.
42002010	Amaa nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan man waa kufuu. N bɩya fanɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ ii biti a waa asa kpini ɔkɔn.
42002011	Ndaga kakɛ nɩmʋ ba kʋʋgɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ mʋ Dawidi kadɛ tɔ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ.
42002012	Falɛ nɩɩ fen biti fan wu kesintin mʋ. Fen biti fan wu fɛɛ ba maa taa akyibi mili kebii pʋpwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ dɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ atɔbwaaya bee gyii mʋ tɔ.”
42002013	Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ kʋbʋ lala kʋ ba lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba tii kabɔɔ mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ba yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ,
42002014	“Bʋnyaa bʋ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ asɛ. Kɛ keyuula ki bun bamʋ nɩɩ ba bɔla mu ansi mʋ kasɛ sʋ.”
42002015	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ ba lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ kpee sʋsʋ mʋ, nbʋlʋpʋ akpapʋ mʋ ba tɔwɛ abaa yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ a kpee Betilehem naa kɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ anɛ mʋ.”
42002016	Kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ ba kpaala kpee nɩɩ ba naa wu Mɛɛrɩ maa Gyosefu yɛ kebii pʋpwɛ mʋ maa dɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ atɔbwaaya bee gyii tɔ mʋ.
42002017	Nbʋlʋpʋ akpaapʋ mʋ ba maa naa wu kebii mʋ, nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ asa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ ba tɔwɛ bamʋ lɩɩ kebii mʋ sʋ mʋ.
42002018	Nɩɩ i kyinkyin bamʋ nɩɩ ba nu asɩn mʋ nɩɩ atɔbwaaya akpaapʋ mʋ ba tɔwɛ mʋ.
42002019	Nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ taa asɩn mʋ kpini waa mʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ, ɛɛ fɛ ɩmʋ nfɛɛrɛ.
42002020	Nɩɩ nbʋlʋpʋ akpaapʋ mʋ ba maa bwii bee kpee mʋ, yɛgɛ bɛɛ bɩɩ ɩlʋn bɛɛ yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba nu nɩɩ ba wu mʋ, ɩ bɔla sʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ kɩ tɔwɛ bamʋ mʋ.
42002021	Kebii mʋ maa fʋʋ nkɛ nburuwa akɛ kɛ ba tɩn mu oduu mʋ, nɩɩ ba yɩla mʋ kɩtɩɩ yɛ Yesu, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ wʋla tɔwɛ yɩla pɔyɩ nɩɩ ba nyɛ mʋ ɔtɔ mʋ.
42002022	Nɩɩ saŋa mʋ maa fʋʋ fɛɛ Gyosefu maa Mɛɛrɩ ba fwɩɩ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ ineesi, fɛɛ kanɩn mʋ nɩɩ Mosesi nbara mʋ ɩ kaapʋ mʋ, kanan sʋ ba taa kebii mʋ kpee Gyerusalem ba naa taa mʋ waa Ɩbwaarɛ abaa tɔ.
42002023	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba kyʋrɔɔ yɩla Ɩbwaarɛ nbara mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ba taa kebii‐nyɩnsa gyankpaasa kʋmaa nɩmʋ naa sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ.”
42002024	Nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ maa Gyosefu ba naa lɛɛ saraga fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nbara ɩ kaapʋ mʋ. Nbara mʋ ɩ kaapʋ yɛ, (Ba taa alɔpɔ anyɔ abɛɛ awura‐lɔpɔ pii‐pii anyɔ kpee naa lɛɛ saraga sa Ɩbwaarɛ).
42002025	Kanan saŋa mʋ ɔnyɩn kʋ bʋ Gyerusalem nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Simeyon. Ɔ gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ mʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi nɩɩ ee sun Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ kɔkɔlɔ kʋlʋn, nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ kɩ bɔla mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ o gyoo saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ bɩya Ɩsɩrayɩ abi kamɔlɩgɛ.
42002026	Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ kɩ lɛɛ kaapʋ mʋ fɛɛ, ɔ mɛɛ yɛ o wu, amɔɔ o wu Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ pɔyɩ kɛ o wu.
42002027	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ maa Gyosefu ba taa kebii mʋ kpee kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ tɔ, kɛ ba naa waa mu kumu sʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nbara ɩ kaapʋ mʋ, nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ kpiya Simeyon kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ.
42002028	Nɩɩ Simeyon kɔɔlɛ kebii mʋ kɩtaa mʋ abaa tɔ nɩɩ ɔ yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ yɛ,
42002029	“Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ fʋ yɛgɛ nɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ mʋ ɩ ba tɔ, kanɩn sʋ nbɩɩnbɩɩ fɩɩ taalɛ yɛgɛ mɛ, fʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ n wu kayɩɩ yuuli tɔ.
42002030	Lɩɩ fɛɛ mi ansi i wu Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sa asa mʋ.
42002031	Mʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ fʋ wʋla lɔŋɔ sa asa kpini mʋ.
42002032	Mʋ ɩ gyɛ kaŋmaŋɛ mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ yɛgɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi mʋ ba bɩɩ fʋ ɔkpa mʋ, kɛ kɩ yɛgɛ fʋ asa, Ɩsɩrayɩ abi gbaa ba nyɛ bʋnyaa.”
42002033	Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Simeyon tɔwɛ lɩɩ kebii mʋ sʋ mʋ, i kyinkyin mu‐nyi yɛ mʋ‐sɛ.
42002034	Nɩɩ Simeyon waa Mɛɛrɩ maa Gyosefu kusee, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ Mɛɛrɩ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ kebii nɩmʋ nɩn, yɛ kpalɩ mʋ sʋ mʋ, Ɩsɩrayɩ abi gaalaagaa bee biti ba tɩyɛ, kɛ akʋ mɔɔ ba nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ. Mʋ ii biti ɔ lɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ kaapʋ, kɛ asa ba gyii ɩmʋ ɩmɔɔrɛ.
42002035	Kɛ asa gaalaagaa nfɛɛrɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ bamʋ amu tɔ mʋ ɩ lɩɩ ifuli. Kɛ fʋ Mɛɛrɩ mɔɔ, fʋ kayɩyɛɛ kii biti kɩ waa fɛɛ deebi bʋyɛsa nɩɩ ba taa yii fʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ mʋ.”
42002036	Saŋa maŋa mʋ, kakyɩɩ bɩlɩsa kʋ bʋ tɔ, bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Ana nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ. O kili nsu nsunɔ nɩɩ mu‐kuli wu. Mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Fanuweli, nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Asee kebunɔ.
42002037	Ɔ kyɩna kukula mʋ tɔ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ o gyii nsu aduburuwa yɛ ana. Saŋa kʋmaa kagyanbwɛ yɛ kakyʋwapɛ ee sun Ɩbwaarɛ. Ɔ mɛɛ lɩɩ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ tɔ. Ɔ bʋ tʋtɔ nɩn ee ŋmina kɔnɔ yɛgɛ ɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ.
42002038	Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ Ana ba Gyosefu maa Mɛɛrɩ asɛ nɩɩ ɔ fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ kebii mʋ asɩn sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ ba gyoo Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ ba lɛɛ Gyerusalem abi lɩɩ awʋrʋfɔ tɔ mʋ.
42002039	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ maa Gyosefu ba lʋwɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ dagaa fɛɛ ba waa fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nbara ɩ kaapʋ mʋ, ba bwii kpewu bamʋ kadɛ tɔ Nasareti mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ.
42002040	Nɩɩ Yesu dan nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ ɔlʋn, nɩɩ kanyaasɩn kɩ bɔla mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala kɩ bʋ mʋ sʋ.
42002041	Kesu kʋmaa Gyosefu maa Mɛɛrɩ bee kpee Gyerusalem ba naa gyii Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kesu kɔnɔ kɔlɔŋɔ.
42002042	Yesu maa gyii nsu kudu anyɔ mʋ, o buu Mɛɛrɩ maa Gyosefu kpee naa gyii kanɩn Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ mʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ anaana‐tɔ ɩ kaapʋ mʋ.
42002043	Ba maa gyii bamʋ nkɛ lʋwɛ nɩɩ ba bwii bee kpewu mʋ, Yesu sii kamaa Gyerusalem tɔ yɛgɛ mʋ akʋʋgɛpʋ ana mʋ ba man nyi.
42002044	Ba nyi fɛɛ ɔ tii kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba maa bamʋ ba naa mʋ sʋ nɩn, nɩɩ ba natɛ kakɛ ibiri pɔyɩ nɩɩ ba piili bee biti mʋ bamʋ kʋʋpʋ ana yɛ bamʋ kyɛmɩnɛ ana mʋ tɔ.
42002045	Ba maa man wu mʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ba bwii kpee Gyerusalem ba naa biti mʋ.
42002046	Kakɛ sasapʋ akɛ mʋ, ba naa wu mʋ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ, maa tɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ asɛ, yɛgɛ ee nu bamʋ asɛ yɛgɛ ɛɛ taasɛ bamʋ asɩn mʋ kasɛ.
42002047	Bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba nu kanan mʋ nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ asɩn mʋ kasɛ mʋ, i kyinkyin bamʋ.
42002048	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ mʋ akʋʋgɛpʋ ba naa wu mʋ mʋ, i kyinkyin bamʋ, nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Mi‐bii, mɩnɛ nɩɩ fʋ waa anɛ kanɩn? N maa fʋ‐sɛ ansi ɩ payɩ an biti fʋ.”
42002049	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fan naa fen biti mɛ? Fan man nyi fɛɛ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ n baa n bʋ mɛ‐sɛ ayɛ?”
42002050	Amaa ba man nu asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ kasɛ.
42002051	Nɩɩ o buu Mɛɛrɩ maa Gyosefu kpee Nasareti, yɛgɛ saŋa kʋmaa ee nu bamʋ asɛ. Amaa mu‐nyi taa asɩn nɩmʋ kpini waa mʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ ɛɛ fɛ ɩmʋ nfɛɛrɛ.
42002052	Nɩɩ Yesu dan n‐yɩɩ tɔ yɛ kanyaasɩn tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ asa ansi.
42003001	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Tiberiyu kyɩna ɔ gyɛ Roma ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ owura lala nsu kudu anusapu mʋ, saŋa maŋa tɔ mʋ Pontiyu Paleti ɩ kyɩna ɔ gyɛ Gyudeya Kuwura‐bii, nɩɩ Herodi mɔɔ gyɛ Galile Kuwura‐bii, yɛgɛ mu‐supu Filipu mɔɔ ɛɛ kɩɩ Itureya yɛ Tirakoniti ɩsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, nɩɩ Lisaniya mɔɔ ɩ gyɛ Abilene ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ Kuwura‐bii.
42003002	Kanɩn saŋa maa nɩɩ Anasi maa Kayifasi ba gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ mʋ asɩn sa Sakariya mu‐bii Gyɔn, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ ofuli sʋ mʋ.
42003003	Ɩmʋ sʋ Gyɔn natɛ kyaabɔɔ ɔsʋwʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ maa Gyɔdan ɔbʋn mʋ ɛɛ tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn ɛɛ sa asa yɛ, “Fan kyɛɛgɛ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ fanɛ alibi tɔ kɛ fan bwii ba Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, kɛ fan yɛgɛ ba gyee fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee, kɛ fan nyɛ alibi kɩtaa kɛɛ.”
42003004	Gyɔn nɩmʋ asɩn nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Isaya wʋla kyʋrɔɔ yɩla mʋ ɔwʋlɛ tɔ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkʋ bʋ ofuli sʋ ee kuusi ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Fan lɔŋɔ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ ɔkpa, kɛ fan kyiigi mʋ ɩkpa‐bi mʋ.
42003005	Kɛ fan tii‐tii igee mʋ, kɛ fan tɩtɛ abɩɩ yɛ abɩɩ‐bi mʋ ba kasɛ waa kyɛɛkyɛɛ. Kɛ fan kyiigi ɩkpa nyɔnsa mʋ, kɛ ɩkpa gogyigogyi mʋ i tii waa tɔlɩtɔlɩ.
42003006	Kɛ daadimaadi kpini ba wu Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ yɛ ɔ ba mɔlɩgɛ asa mʋ.’ ”
42003007	Nɩɩ Gyɔn tɔwɛ sakyɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ ba mʋ asɛ yɛ o gyee bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee mʋ yɛ, “Fan du fɛɛ anansɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ kʋbwɛ. Nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ anɩmʋ ɩ da fanɛ amu tɔ yɛ fan sɩlɛ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ agbʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ fanɛ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ mʋ mʋ tɔ?
42003008	Fan waa adanbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ fan kyɛɛgɛ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ fanɛ alibi tɔ ba Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ. Kɛ fan yɛgɛ kɩtɔwɛ yɛ, ‘An lɩɩ Abraham kɩnaana tɔ nɩn, ɩmʋ sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ bɩɩtɛ anɛ kʋsʋ.’ N tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ taalɛ yɛgɛ abuu nɩmʋ a biliŋi Abraham anaana‐bii.
42003009	Ba tɛɛ wʋla taa kpanfa waa oyu mʋ ilin tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ oyu kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ mɛɛ sɔyɩ abi danbɩrasa mʋ, bee biti ba ŋɛ kɩmʋ tʋʋ kasɛ, kɛ ba taa tʋʋ waa fʋlɔn tɔ.”
42003010	Gyɔn maa tɔwɛ kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɩmʋ sʋ nɛnɛ nɩɩ an biti a waa?”
42003011	Nɩɩ Gyɔn lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ ɩkaalɛ ɩnyɔ mʋ, ɔ barɩgɛ tɔ sa mʋ tɔmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ agyitɔ gbaa, ɔ waa kanɩn.”
42003012	Lenpoo akɔɔlɛpʋ akʋ gbaa ba ba yɛ o gyee bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee. Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ an biti a waa?”
42003013	Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan man kɔɔlɛ afulee kyʋn kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fan kɔɔlɛ mʋ.”
42003014	Nɩɩ anaakɔpʋ mʋ akʋ ba ba taasɛ Gyɔn yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ anɛ gbaa anɛ an biti a waa?” Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan man nyan ɔkʋ kɔɔlɛ mu afulee, kɛ fan man pwɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ asɩn a dɛ ɔkpa, amaa ɩmʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ ka fanɛ mʋ ɩ kʋkwɛ fanɛ.”
42003015	Ɩ maa waa fɛɛ asa mʋ kpini bɛɛ kɩɩ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ ɔkpa mʋ, ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɩɩ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ akʋtɔ fɛɛ Gyɔn ɩ gyɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ.
42003016	Ɩmʋ sʋ Gyɔn tɔwɛ asa mʋ kpini yɛ, “Nkyu nɩɩ n sʋ n gyee fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee, amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɔ mɛ gaa mʋ ɩɩ ba. Nɩɩ n man dagaa gbaa fɛɛ n muŋa saŋɛ mʋ asɩbɩta ɩfɛ. Nɩɩ mɛɛ mʋ ii biti ɔ taa Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ yɛ fʋlɔn gyee fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee.
42003017	Nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ kʋtɔ kyaalɛsa mʋ kɩbaa tɔ, ee biti ɔ ba kyaalɛ ayu lɩɩ ayu‐waatɛ tɔ, kɛ ɔ laata ayubi mʋ waa kikyunkun tɔ, kɛ o tuwa ayu‐waatɛ mʋ fʋlɔn mʋ nɩɩ ii mee dun kpaa.”
42003018	Ɩkpa damantɛ sʋ nɩɩ Gyɔn taa kɩtaa asa mʋ nkɔlɔ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa bamʋ.
42003019	Ɩmʋ kamaa mʋ Gyɔn pwɩɩ owura Herodi, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ taa mu‐supu Filipu mʋ‐ka Herodiya kili, yɛ asɩn libi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa tii sʋ.
42003020	Amaa alibi mʋ nɩɩ Herodi bɩla waa tii sʋ mʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ kamaa tɔ mʋ ɔ kɩtaa Gyɔn tii obu.
42003021	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Gyɔn i gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee mʋ, o gyee Yesu gbaa. Nɩɩ Yesu maa kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ mʋ, nɩɩ sʋsʋ bugi tɔ.
42003022	Nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ kɩ kpɩlɩgɛ fɛɛ kuwura‐lɔpɔ ba gyɔŋɔ mʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ ɔbʋlɛ kʋ lɩɩ sʋsʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ mi‐bii bitisa mʋ, nɩɩ fʋ ɩ bɔla mi ansi.”
42003023	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu gyii nsu adɩsa mʋ, nɩɩ o piili mu kusun mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sun mʋ yɛ ɔ ba waa mʋ. Nɩɩ asa bɛɛ kɩɩ fɛɛ Yesu gyɛ Gyosefu mu‐bii. Gyosefu mʋ gyɛ Heli mu‐bii.
42003024	Nɩɩ Heli mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Matati, nɩɩ Matati mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Lewi, nɩɩ Lewi mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Malikin, nɩɩ Maliki mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Gyanayi, Gyanayi mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Gyosefu kʋ.
42003025	Gyosefu nɩmʋ mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Matatiya, Matatiya mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Amosi, nɩɩ Amosi mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Nahum, nɩɩ Nahum mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Isili, nɩɩ Isili mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Nagayi.
42003026	Nɩɩ Nagayi mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Mati, nɩɩ Mati mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Matatiya, nɩɩ Matatiya mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Semen, nɩɩ Semen mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Gyoseki, nɩɩ Gyoseki mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Gyoda.
42003027	Nɩɩ Gyoda mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Gyowanan, nɩɩ Gyowanan mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Resa, nɩɩ Resa mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Serubabeli, nɩɩ Serubabeli mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Selatiye, nɩɩ Selatiye mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Neri.
42003028	Neri mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Maliki, nɩɩ Maliki mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Adi, nɩɩ Adi mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Kosam, nɩɩ Kosam mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Elimadam, nɩɩ Elimadam mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Eri.
42003029	Nɩɩ Eri mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Gyosuwa, nɩɩ Gyosuwa mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Eliyasa, nɩɩ Eliyasa mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Gyorim, nɩɩ Gyorim mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Matati, nɩɩ Matati mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Lewi.
42003030	Nɩɩ Lewi mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Simeyon, nɩɩ Semiyon mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Gyuda, nɩɩ Gyuda mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Gyosefu, nɩɩ Gyosefu mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Gyonam, nɩɩ Gyonam mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Eliyakim.
42003031	Nɩɩ Eliyakim mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Meliya, nɩɩ Meliya mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Mena, nɩɩ Mena mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Matata, nɩɩ Matata mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Natan, nɩɩ Natan mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Dawidi.
42003032	Nɩɩ Dawidi mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Gyeese, nɩɩ Gyeese mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Obedi, Obedi mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Bowasi, nɩɩ Bowasi mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Salimon, nɩɩ Salimon mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Naason.
42003033	Nɩɩ Naason mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Aminadabi, nɩɩ Aminadabi mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Ram, nɩɩ Ram mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Hesiron, nɩɩ Hesiron mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Peresi, nɩɩ Peresi mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Gyuda.
42003034	Nɩɩ Gyuda mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Gyekobu, Gyekobu mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Isaki, Isaki mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Abraham, nɩɩ Abraham mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Tera, nɩɩ Tera mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Naho.
42003035	Nɩɩ Naho mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Serugi, nɩɩ Serugi mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Rewu, Rewu mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Pelegi, nɩɩ Pelegi mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Ebe, nɩɩ Ebe mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Sela.
42003036	Nɩɩ Sela mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Kenan, nɩɩ Kenan mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Afahadi, nɩɩ Afahadi mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Sem, nɩɩ Sem mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Nowa, nɩɩ Nowa mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Lameki.
42003037	Nɩɩ Lameki mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Metusala, Metusala mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Enoki, nɩɩ Enoki mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Gyaredi, nɩɩ Gyaredi mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Mahalale, nɩɩ Mahalale mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Keyinan.
42003038	Nɩɩ Keyinan mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Enosi, nɩɩ Enosi mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Seti, nɩɩ Seti mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Adam. Nɩɩ Adam gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii.
42004001	Yesu maa lɩɩ Gyɔdan ɔbʋn mʋ tɔ ba mʋ, yɛgɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ kɩ bɔla mʋ, nɩɩ Kayaayu maŋa yɛgɛ nɩɩ o kpee ofuli sʋ.
42004002	Maa bʋ ofuli mʋ sʋ nkɛ adɩna mʋ, nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ ii kpee ɛɛ tʋʋ mʋ tɔ ɩɩ kɩɩ. Kanɩn nkɛ nɩmʋ kpini mʋ ɔ man gyii sɛhn, ɩmʋ sʋ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ akʋn a kɩtaa mʋ.
42004003	Nɩɩ ɩ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fʋ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii kʋlʋn mʋ de, yɛgɛ kubuu nɩmʋ ki biliŋi bodobodo.”
42004004	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɩ man gyɛ agyitɔ nkʋn sʋ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa ii biti ɔ nyɛ nkpa.’ ”
42004005	Nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ kpee kɩbɩɩ bʋnswɩɩsa kʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa awuragyi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ dulinyaa tɔ mʋ kpini kaapʋ mʋ opula tɔ.
42004006	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “N biti n sa fʋ awuragyi mʋ ɔlʋn yɛ ɩmʋ bʋnyaa lɩɩ atɔ nɩmʋ kpini sʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩmʋ kpini ba taa waa mɛ abaa tɔ nɩn, nɩɩ n taalɛ taa sa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n biti.
42004007	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ fʋ kan muŋa sun mɛ mʋ, ɩmʋ kpini ii biti i biliŋi fʋ lɛɛ.”
42004008	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Muŋa fʋ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ mʋ nkʋn nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fʋ maa sun.’ ”
42004009	Tʋtɔ ɔ nɩɩ bɩla kpiya mʋ Gyerusalem naa yɩlɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ ketin tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fʋ kan fʋ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii kʋlʋn mʋ, yɛgɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ tɔ lɩɩ tʋtɔ ba tɩyɛ kasɛ.
42004010	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti o sun mʋ nbɔɔ kɛ ba be kun fʋ.’
42004011	Bee biti ba sɔgɩta fʋ, kɛ fʋ man tɩyɛ kasɛ kɛ fʋ ayaa a man da abuu.”
42004012	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Man kan tʋʋ fʋ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔ kɩɩ.’ ”
42004013	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tʋʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkpa kʋmaa sʋ kpɩnɛ mʋ, ɔ san yɛgɛ mʋ o gyoo saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ nyɛ mʋ.
42004014	Lɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ ɔlʋn tɔ sʋ mʋ, Yesu bwii kpee Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, nɩɩ mʋ asɩn ɩ yalagɛ ɩsʋwʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kyaabɔ tʋtɔ kpini.
42004015	Nɩɩ ɔ kaapʋ Abwaarɛsɩn Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩgyaŋɛkpa, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ yɩn mʋ.
42004016	Nɩɩ o kpee Nasareti katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba bɩla mʋ mʋ, nɩɩ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ mʋ, o kpee Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla ɛɛ waa mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ kɛ ɔ kalɛ Abwaarɛsɩn.
42004017	Nɩɩ ba taa Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Isaya ɔwʋlɛ mʋ bɔɔta mʋ. Maa bugi tɔ mʋ, o biti wu nɩɩ ɔ kalɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ yɩla yɛ,
42004018	“Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ kɩ bʋ mɛ asɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ lɛɛ mɛ nɩn fɛɛ n tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa atiripu. O sun mɛ yɛ n ba tɔwɛ kamɔlɩgɛ asɩn sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba tii bamʋ ibu mʋ. O sun mɛ yɛ n ba bugi agyaatanapʋ ansi, kɛ bamʋ nɩɩ asa bee sisii bamʋ mʋ, bee biti ba nyɛ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ.
42004019	O sun mɛ yɛ n ba da kibonbon fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kamɔlɩgɛ saŋa mʋ fʋʋ.”
42004020	Yesu maa kalɛ lʋwɛ mʋ, ɔ bɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ mʋ bwiiyaa sa ɔmʋnɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa mʋ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ naa kyɩna. Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ ɔgyaŋɛkpa mʋ kpini ansi i yii mʋ sʋ.
42004021	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ndaga Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa ɩnɩmʋ ɩ ba tɔ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ mɛ asɩn fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan nu n maa kalɛ mʋ.”
42004022	Nɩɩ Yesu kɔnɔ tɔ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ i kyinkyin bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ kpini, nɩɩ ba yɩn mʋ. Nɩɩ ba taasɛ abaa yɛ, man gyɛ Gyosefu mu‐bii mʋ nɩn?
42004023	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N nyi fɛɛ fen biti fan bɔ mɛ kɩŋasan nɩmʋ yɛ ‘Ɔkyɛpʋ, kyɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ.’ Nɩɩ fen biti fan bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Atɔ mʋ nɩɩ an nu fɛɛ fʋ waa Kapanum kadɛ tɔ mʋ, waa ɩmʋ fʋ kadɛ tɔ nfɩɩ.’
42004024	“N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ kʋmaa nɩmʋ man sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ mʋ ayɛ.
42004025	Nɩɩ n biti fan wu kesintin fɛɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Eligya saŋa mʋ, akulapu‐kyɩɩ ba kyɩna ba kyɔ Ɩsɩrayɩ ɔsʋwʋlɛ mʋ sʋ. Saŋa maŋa tɔ bʋlayɩ yɩlɛ nsu nsa yɛ ɩbwaayɩ isiye nɩɩ akʋn a ba ɔsʋwʋlɛ mʋ kpini sʋ.
42004026	Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ man sun Eligya bamʋ ɔkʋlʋn gbaa asɛ, amɔɔ okulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ Sarefati kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Sidon kabaafʋn sʋ mʋ nkʋn asɛ.
42004027	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Elisa saŋa mʋ, abootipu ba kyɔ Ɩsɩrayɩ ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, amaa Elisa man kyɛ bamʋ ɔkʋ, amɔɔ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Naaman mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Kesiriya‐nyɩn mʋ nkʋn nɩɩ ɔ kyɛ.”
42004028	Asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ ɔgyaŋɛkpa tʋtɔ mʋ, ba maa nu asɩn nɩmʋ mʋ, nɩɩ agbʋ a kɩtaa bamʋ.
42004029	Nɩɩ ba kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ Yesu lɛɛ kadɛ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ba taa mʋ dii kpee kɩbɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ kadɛ kɩ gyan sʋ mu kumu tɔ, paa fɛɛ ba yɛgɛ mʋ tʋʋ kɩbɩɩ maŋa ogee tɔ.
42004030	Amaa ɔ dan natɛ bʋlɛ asa damantɛ mʋ nsana kyʋn.
42004031	Lɩɩ tʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu kpee Kapanum kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ mʋ, o piili ɛɛ kaapʋ asa mʋ.
42004032	Mʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ ki kyinkyin bamʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ sʋ ɔlʋn.
42004033	Nɩɩ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɔnyɩn kʋ kyɩna ɔ sʋ nbwɩɩ libi, nɩɩ kayaayu bʋ mʋ sʋ, maa wu Yesu mʋ, nɩɩ o kuusi kenken yɛ,
42004034	“Ndo! Yesu Kanasareti‐nyɩn, mɩnɛ nɩɩ fii biti anɛ asɛ? Fʋ ba fʋ ba nyita anɛ nɩn? N nyi ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ gyɛ, fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Nyɩmɩsa Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ.”
42004035	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu pʋntɛ kabwɩɩ libi mʋ sʋ yɛ, “Laatɔ, kɛ fʋ lɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ tɔ.” Nɩɩ kabwɩɩ libi mʋ taa kanyɩn mʋ tʋʋ kasɛ bamʋ ansi tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ mʋ tɔ kyʋn yɛgɛ ɔ man taalɛ waa mʋ sɛhn.
42004036	Nɩɩ ɩ waa asa mʋ kpini kɩyan nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ abaa yɛ, “Mɩnɛ kɩkaapʋ ndee? Ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ taa kɩnyɩn yɛ ɔlʋn ɛɛ pʋntɛ n‐yaayu libi sʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ lɩɩ asa tɔ!”
42004037	Nɩɩ Yesu n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn mʋ ɩ yɛlɩgɛ kyaabɔɔ ɔsʋwʋlɛ maŋa sʋ kpini.
42004038	Yesu maa lɩɩ Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa obu mʋ tɔ mʋ, o kpee Simon ayɛ. Yɛgɛ Simon mʋ‐saa kyɩɩsa dɛ ɛɛ lɔ kibirima bʋlʋnsa, nɩɩ ba kʋlɛ Yesu yɛ ɔ ba kɩɩ mʋ.
42004039	Nɩɩ ɔ naa yɩlɛ mʋ asɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ kibirima mʋ yɛ kɩ lɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ kibirima mʋ kɩ yɛgɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ kɩtaa bamʋ kɩfɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ kɩtaa bamʋ kɩfɔ.
42004040	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ kyɔwɛ kpee ɔ naa tɩyɛ mʋ, asa mʋ ba taa alɔpʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ lɔ alɔ yiri‐yiri mʋ ba Yesu asɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ abaa gyaga bamʋ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɛ bamʋ kpini.
42004041	Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla gya nbwɩɩ libi lɩɩ asa gaalaagaa tɔ, yɛgɛ bee kuusi kenken bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ.” Amaa nɩɩ ɔ pʋntɛ bamʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ man yɛgɛ bamʋ ba tɔwɛ sɛhn, lɩɩ fɛɛ be nyi maa gyɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ.
42004042	Kayɩɩ maa kɛ mʋ Yesu kpee opula mʋ nɩɩ i du surum, nɩɩ asa mʋ ba lɩɩ ba naa bee biti mʋ. Ba maa ba wu mʋ mʋ, ba man bɩla bee biti fɛɛ ɔ lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ.
42004043	Amaa ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩ dagaa fɛɛ n maa tɔwɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa ndɛ kʋ asa gbaa, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sun mɛ.”
42004044	Nɩɩ Yesu kyaga sʋ ɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩgyaŋɛkpa, mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ kpini.
42005001	Kakaakʋ nɩɩ Yesu kpee ɔ yɩlɛ Kanesareti ɔbʋn mʋ nɩɩ ba bɩla bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Galile mʋ ɔbʋn‐kaa. Nɩɩ asa ba naa kyaabɔɔ mʋ bee nin abaa kɛ ba naa nu abwaarɛsɩn.
42005002	Yesu wu ɩkʋlɩ ɩnyɔ ɩ maa dan kebunɔ maŋa yɛgɛ ɩkɩn akɩtapʋ mʋ bɛɛ fwɩɩ bamʋ asawu.
42005003	Nɩɩ Yesu loo ɔkʋlɩ mʋ kʋkʋ, mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ Simon lɛɛ tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ o nin waa tɔ gbɛrɛɛ. Ɔkʋlɩ maŋa tɔ nɩɩ Yesu kyʋn kyɩna yɛgɛ ɛɛ tɔwɛ kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ sarɛ tʋtɔ mʋ abwaarɛsɩn.
42005004	Yesu maa tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ Simon yɛ “Palɛ fʋ ɔkʋlɩ mʋ kpee katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋnyɛ, kɛ faa fʋ tɔɔmaa ana mʋ fan tʋʋ fanɛ asawu kɩtaa ɩkɩn.”
42005005	Nɩɩ Simon lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɛ ɔbɩlɩsa, an tʋʋ nɩn halɩɩ ba kalayɩ, a man kɩtaa sɛhn, amaa nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ kanɩn bɩrɛ, n biti n tʋʋ.”
42005006	Nɩɩ ba maa tʋʋ asawu mʋ, ba kɩtaa ɩkɩn kɩbansa halɩɩ bamʋ asawu mʋ ɩ san gbaa kyatɛ.
42005007	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba da abaa tɩɩ bamʋ tɔɔmaa ana mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ ɔkʋlɩ nyɔsapʋ mʋ tɔ yɛ ba ba kyɛ bamʋ tɔ. Ɩkʋlɩ ɩnyɔ mʋ kpini yɛ ɩmaa ɩmʋ ɩkɩn mʋ ɩ san gbaa muuri.
42005008	Simon Pita maa wu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kyʋn muŋa mu amulii sʋ Yesu ansi tɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, lɩɩ mɛ asɛ, n gyɛ alibi ɔwaapʋ nɩn.”
42005009	Lɩɩ ɩkɩn damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba kɩtaa mʋ sʋ mʋ, i kyinkyin maa mʋ tɔmaa ana kpini.
42005010	Ɩkɩn mʋ kɩkɩta mʋ gbaa ki kyinkyin Gyemisi maa Gyɔn, Sebedi mu‐bii ana mʋ nɩɩ ba maa Simon bee sun kusun mʋ. Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ Simon yɛ, “Man waa kufuu, lɩɩ ndaga ɩ sʋ ii kpee mʋ, fii biti fʋ ba fɩɩ kɩtaa asa fɩɩ bɩya mɛ nɩn.”
42005011	Nɩɩ ba bɩɩtɛ ɩkʋlɩ mʋ ba dan kidenbi sʋ, nɩɩ ba yɛgɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ nɩɩ ba buu Yesu.
42005012	Yesu maa bʋ kadɛ kʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔnyɩn kʋ gbaa bʋ tʋtɔ nɩɩ kibootoo kɩtaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kpini. Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ o wu Yesu mʋ, o be muŋa mu ansi tɔ kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, nɩɩ fii biti mʋ, fɩɩ taalɛ yɛgɛ mɛ n‐yɩɩ ɩ lɔŋɔ sʋ.”
42005013	Nɩɩ Yesu tɛɛŋɛ mʋ kɩbaa mata mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “N biti, lɔŋɔ sʋ.” Nɩɩ opula maŋa tɔ kibootoo mʋ kɩ yɛgɛ mʋ.
42005014	Nɩɩ Yesu da ɔnyɩn mu kumu tɔ yɛ, “Man kan waa tɔwɛ ɔkʋ, amaa taa fʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ Ɩbwaarɛ oseepu mʋ, kɛ fʋ naa lɛɛ saraga fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Mosesi nbara mʋ ɩ kaapʋ mʋ, kɛ ɩ kaapʋ tɔ sa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ fɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ ɩ lɔŋɔ sʋ.”
42005015	Amaa Yesu n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn mʋ ɩ lɔŋɔ yalagɛ tɔ, nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ asa damantɛ ba be nu mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ kyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ lɔ mʋ kpini.
42005016	Amaa saŋa kʋmaa Yesu ɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ nkʋn ee kpee ɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ, opula mʋ nɩɩ o du surum.
42005017	Kakaakʋ Yesu maa kaapʋ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ, Farasii abi yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba lɩɩ Galile yɛ Gyudeya ɩsʋwʋlɛ sʋ yɛ Gyerusalem kadɛ tɔ mʋ ba tɛ tʋtɔ. Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔlɔn mʋ bʋ mʋ asɛ fɛɛ ɔ taa kyɛ alɔpʋ.
42005018	Nɩɩ anyɩn akʋ ba sʋla ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ i wu nɩɩ ɔ dɛ kalan sʋ. Ba kpan bamʋ n‐yɩɩ ba taa mʋ loo kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ, naa yɩla Yesu ansi tɔ.
42005019	Lɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ sʋ mʋ, ba man nyɛ ɔkpa ba taa mʋ loo kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ba dii kpee obu mʋ sʋsʋ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba taa ɩsɛɛ nyalɛ munla mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ba foti ɔbɔ kpɩlɩgaa mʋ yɛgɛ ɔ dɛ mʋ kalan sʋ sakyɔ mʋ nsana yɩla Yesu ansi tɔ.
42005020	Yesu maa wu kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ yɛ “Mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ n taa fu alibi kɛɛ fu.”
42005021	Nɩɩ Farasii abi yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ ba piili bɛɛ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ bamʋ amu tɔ yɛ “Anɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔsa nɩmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ nbusaa asɩn kanɩn? Anɩmʋ ɩ taalɛ taa alibi kɛɛ tii Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ?”
42005022	Yesu nyi nfɛɛrɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ fɛ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ “Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fɛn fɛ falɛ nfɛɛrɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ?
42005023	Ɩmʋ kɩmɔɔ ɩ bʋsɩn kɩtɔwɛ. N taa fʋ alibi kɛɛ fʋ, abɛɛ kʋsʋ natɛ?
42005024	N biti fan bɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa n sʋ ɔlʋn dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ nɩɩ n taalɛ taa alibi kɛɛ.” Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ i wu mʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ, Kʋsʋ! Taa fʋ kalan kpewu.”
42005025	Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ bamʋ ansi tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ kalan nɩɩ ɔ dɛ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɛɛ yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ ee kpewu.
42005026	Nɩɩ i kyinkyin ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ, nɩɩ ba yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ ɩ kɩtaa bamʋ kufuu nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ndaga an wu asɩn kyinkyinsa.”
42005027	Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, Yesu lɩɩ nɩɩ ɔ naa wu lenpoo ɔkɔɔlɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Lewi mu kusun obu to. Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kʋsʋ buu mɛ.”
42005028	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ kʋsʋ yɛgɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩɩ o buu Yesu.
42005029	Nɩɩ Lewi dɩŋa agyitɔ kʋkyɔ mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ sa Yesu, nɩɩ lenpoo akɔɔlɛpʋ gaalaagaa yɛ asa akʋ ba bʋga tʋtɔ, nɩɩ ba maa Yesu bee gyii.
42005030	Amaa nɩɩ Farasii abi mʋ yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ gbaa bamʋ gyɛ Farasii abi mʋ bɛɛ kɔlɩtɛ bɛɛ sa Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fanaa lenpoo akɔɔlɛpʋ yɛ alibi awaapʋ fen bʋga fen gyii fen nuu kanɩn?”
42005031	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔkyɛpʋ man tiri sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ alanfɩya, amɔɔ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ lɔ mʋ nkʋn.
42005032	N man ba yɛ n ba tɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba mʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi nɩn. Amaa n ba nɩn yɛ n ba tɩɩ alibi awaapʋ kɛ ba kyɛɛgɛ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ ba Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ.”
42005033	Nɩɩ asa akʋ ba tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Gyɔn okyugyeepu abɩɩlapʋ bee ŋmina kɔnɔ yɛgɛ bɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ saŋa kʋmaa, kanɩn nɩɩ Farasii abi abɩɩlapʋ mʋ gbaa bɛɛ waa nɩn. Amaa fɛɛ fʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ bɩrɛ ba dan bee gyii bee nuu nɩn saŋa kʋmaa.”
42005034	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fɩɩ taalɛ yɛgɛ kɩkyɩɩfɔ tɔ afɔ ba ŋmina kɔnɔ yɛgɛ ɔkyɩɩfɔ mu‐kuli bʋ bamʋ asɛ?
42005035	Amaa saŋa kʋ ii biti ɔ ba, kɛ ba taa ɔkyɩɩfɔ mu‐kuli lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ, kanɩn nkɛ maŋa tɔ bɩrɛ bee biti ba ŋmina kɔnɔ.”
42005036	Nɩɩ Yesu bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan kɩnɩmʋ yɛ, “Ɔkʋ mɛɛ tɩn kikyibi pʋpwɛ naa baata mata kaalɛ dɩdaa ɔbɔ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan waa kanɩn mʋ, ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ kikyibi pʋpwɛ mʋ ɩ kyatɛ kaalɛ dɩdaa mʋ i tii sʋ nɩn, nɩɩ kikyibi dɩdaa mʋ yɛ kɩpʋpwɛ mʋ ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ baa i duli abaa.
42005037	Kanɩn nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taa ɔwʋlɛ dɩdaa ee sun kʋkɔrɛ pʋpwɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ kan waa kanɩn bɩrɛ, ɔwʋlɛ dɩdaa mʋ ii biti ɔ kyatɛ, nɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ yɛgɛ kʋkɔrɛ pʋpwɛ mʋ kɩ waa ɔdan.
42005038	Kanɩn sʋ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ɔwʋlɛ pʋpwɛ nɩɩ bɛɛ sʋ bee sun kʋkɔrɛ pʋpwɛ.
42005039	Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lan kʋkɔrɛ dɩdaa nɩɩ ɩ dɩn mʋ mʋ, ɔ man bɩla ee biti kʋkɔrɛ pʋpwɛ kɩlan. Ee biti ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Kʋkɔrɛ dɩdaa mʋ kɩ bɔɔ mʋ.’ ”
42006001	Kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ kʋ nɩɩ Yesu naa ayu kʋdɔɔ kʋ tɔ, nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba tɩŋɛ ayu mʋ pʋsa bamʋ abaa tɔ wɛ.
42006002	Nɩɩ Farasii abi mʋ akʋ ba taasɛ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fan waa kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ ikisii?”
42006003	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan man pɩɩta kalɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ, kɛ fan wu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Dawidi waa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ akʋn a mɔɔ maa mʋ asa mʋ?
42006004	Fan man wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ o loo kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa obu to naa taa saraga bodobodo mʋ wɛ, nɩɩ ɔ taa ɩkʋ sa mʋ asa gbaa nɩɩ ba wɛ, yɛgɛ ɩ man gyɛ anɛ nbara sʋ fɛɛ ɔkʋ o gyii ɩmʋ, amɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu nkʋn?”
42006005	Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ, “Mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa gbaa n gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ sa kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa mʋ.”
42006006	Kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ kʋ biyo Yesu bɩla kpee Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa ɛɛ kaapʋ. Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kʋ bʋ tʋtɔ nɩɩ mʋ gyisa kɩbaa ki wu.
42006007	Farasii abi mʋ yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ bee biti kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba waa kɛ ba bun Yesu kʋpwɛ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ba tɛ ba gyoo bɛɛ kɩɩ fɛɛ Yesu ii biti ɔ kyɛ mʋ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ mʋ.
42006008	Amaa Yesu wʋla o n‐yɩɩ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ fɛ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ mʋ kɩbaa ki wu mʋ yɛ, “Kʋsʋ yɩlɛ asa mʋ kpini ansi tɔ.” Nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ.
42006009	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N taasɛ fanɛ, mɩnɛ kʋtɔ nɩɩ anɛ nbara mʋ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ a waa kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ? A waa adanbɩrasa abɛɛ alibi? A mɔlɩgɛ asa nkpa abɛɛ a nyita ɩmʋ?”
42006010	Nɩɩ ɔ kɩɩ bamʋ kpini kyaabɔɔ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ yɛ, “Tɛɛŋɛ fʋ kɩbaa.” Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ tɛɛŋɛ mʋ kɩbaa, nɩɩ mʋ kɩbaa mʋ kɩ nyɛ ɔlʋn.
42006011	Amaa agbʋ a kɩtaa bamʋ, nɩɩ ba piili bɛɛ bee ŋmina kanan mʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba waa Yesu.
42006012	Nkɛ maŋa tɔ mʋ, Yesu kpee abɩɩ tɔ ɔ naa kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ, nɩɩ kagyanbwɛ maŋa kpini mʋ, ɔ bʋ tʋtɔ ɛɛ kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ.
42006013	Nɩɩ kayɩɩ kɩ maa kɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kpini ba mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ bamʋ tɔ kudu anyɔ, nɩɩ ɔ yɩla bamʋ kɩtɩɩ yɛ asunpu.
42006014	Bamʋ ɩ gyɛ Simon (mʋ nɩɩ ɔ yɩla mʋ kɩtɩɩ yɛ Pita), yɛ mu‐supu Andiruwu, yɛ Gyemisi maa Gyɔn, yɛ Filipu maa Batolome,
42006015	yɛ Matiwu maa Tomasi, yɛ Alifeyo mu‐bii Gyemisi, yɛ Simon mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Seloti,
42006016	yɛ Gyemisi mu‐bii Gyudasi, yɛ Gyudasi Isikariyoti mʋ nɩɩ ɔ ba lɛɛ Yesu sa mʋ.
42006017	Yesu maa mu asunpu ba kpɩlɩgɛ kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ ba kipentenpiren kʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ gaalaagaa ba be tu mʋ tʋtɔ, nɩɩ asa damantɛ ba lɩɩ Gyudeya yɛ Gyerusalem yɛ ndɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Tayi maa Sidon ɔpʋ nbunɔ mʋ kpini.
42006018	Ba ba nu mʋ asɛ kɛ ba nyɛ bamʋ alɔ kɩ kyɛ. Bamʋ nɩɩ n‐yaayu libi bɛɛ tɔɔrɔɔ bamʋ ba nyɛ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ.
42006019	Nɩɩ asa mʋ kpini ba kpan bamʋ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ ba mata mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔlʋn kʋ bʋ mʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ ɩ kyɛ bamʋ kpini alɔ.
42006020	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu kɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Amu ɔkɔn wuya ana ɩ gyɛ fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan gyɛ atiripu, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩ gyɛ fanɛ lɛɛ.
42006021	Amu ɔkɔn wuya ana ɩ gyɛ fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ akʋn a mɔɔ fanɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ yɛgɛ fan ŋmɛ. Amu ɔkɔn wuya ana ɩ gyɛ fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fen su nbɩɩnbɩɩ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ yɛgɛ fan ŋmasɛ.
42006022	Amu ɔkɔn wuya ana ɩ gyɛ fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ asa bee kisi fanɛ, bee kina fanɛ, bɛɛ saalɛ fanɛ, nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩn antɩŋɛsa libi bɛɛ gyaga fanɛ sʋ, lɩɩ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ sʋ.
42006023	“Nɩɩ ba kan waa fanɛ kanɩn mʋ fan yɛgɛ ɩ waa fanɛ ɔkɔn, kɛ fan taa kensi‐gyii kyaa, lɩɩ fɛɛ kɛkɛɛ lala kɩ dɛ sʋsʋ kii gyoo fanɛ. Kpalɩ fɛɛ kanɩn nɩɩ bamʋ naana ana gbaa ba taa waa Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ.
42006024	Amaa fanɛ atɔ wuya ana, fanɛ laakʋ, fɛɛ fan maa wʋla nyɛ fanɛ ɔkɔn dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ.
42006025	Fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan gyii ŋmɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ falɛ mɔɔ, fanɛ laakʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ akʋn ii biti ɩɩ tɩyɛ fanɛ sʋ. Fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fɛn ŋmasɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ falɛ mɔɔ mʋ, fanɛ laakʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fen biti fan su kɛ fan bɔɔta tɔ.
42006026	Nɩɩ fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ asa bɛɛ tɔwɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, fanɛ laakʋ. Kanɩn nɩɩ bamʋ naana ana ba tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa lɩɩ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩn atɩŋɛsa bɛɛ gyaga Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ mʋ.”
42006027	Nɩɩ Yesu yɛ, “Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fen nu mɛ asɛ yɛ, fan biti fanɛ dʋn ana, kɛ fan waa adanbɩrasa sa fanɛ akisipu ana.
42006028	Kɛ fan waa bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ fanɛ nnɔ mʋ kusee, kɛ fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ nyanla fanɛ.
42006029	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan da fʋ ɔtan mʋ, biliŋi kɩnyɔsapʋ mʋ sa mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan kɔɔlɛ fʋ balɩmaasʋ mʋ, yɛgɛ ɔ taa fʋ kaalɛ tii sʋ.
42006030	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ba kʋlɛ fʋ kʋtɔ kʋ mʋ, sa mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan taa fʋ kʋtɔ kʋ mʋ, man bɩla naa taasɛ kʋtɔ maŋa sʋ lɩɩ odunwura mʋ asɛ.
42006031	Kɛ fan waa fanɛ tɔɔmaa ana fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fɛɛ ba waa sa fanɛ mʋ.
42006032	“Fɛɛ nɩɩ fan kan fen biti bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti fanɛ nkʋn mʋ, mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ bɩla yɩn fanɛ? Halɩɩ alibi awaapʋ gbaa bee biti bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti bamʋ mʋ.
42006033	Nɩɩ fan kan waa kɩdanbɩrasa sa bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa fanɛ adanbɩrasa nkʋn mʋ, mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ bɩla yɩn fanɛ? Alibi awaapʋ gbaa bɛɛ waa kanɩn.
42006034	Nɩɩ fan kan fɛn paala bamʋ nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ bee biti ba ba nyɛ ka fanɛ mʋ, mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ bɩla yɩn fanɛ? Halɩɩ alibi awaapʋ gbaa bɛɛ paala bamʋ tɔmaa ana kɛ bee bwii ka bamʋ afulee maŋa kɔnɔ kyɛɛkyɛɛ.
42006035	Amaa fan biti fanɛ dʋn ana kɛ fan waa bamʋ adanbɩrasa. Nɩɩ fan kan paala bamʋ mʋ, fan man fɛ ɩmʋ kɩba ka nfɛɛrɛ. Nɩɩ fɛn waa kanɩn mʋ, fen biti fan nyɛ kɛkɛɛ lala, kɛ fen biti fan baa fan gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Owura lala mʋ nbii ana. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa asa, nɩɩ ɛɛ waa kɩdanbɩrasa ɛɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba mɛɛ fwaala, nɩɩ ba gyɛ amu tɔ ɔlʋn wuya ana.
42006036	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan wu asa kʋwɛɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa ii wu asa kʋwɛɛ mʋ.
42006037	“Fan man talɛ fanɛ tɔɔmaa ana, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa ɔ man talɛ fanɛ. Fan man bun asa kʋpwɛ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa ɔ man bun fanɛ kʋpwɛ. Fan taa kɛɛ abaa, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa ɔ taa kɛɛ fanɛ.
42006038	Fan sa, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa ɔ sa fanɛ. Ee biti ɔ kaala, bɔla kʋtɔ kaalasa mʋ, kɛ ɔ nyɛɛ sʋ, kɛ o gyingyen kɩmʋ, kɛ ɩ bɔla wʋrɩgɛ fanɛ abaa tɔ. Kʋtɔ kaalasa mʋ nɩɩ fan taa kaala mʋ, kɩmʋ maa nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ taa kaala sa fanɛ.”
42006039	Nɩɩ Yesu bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan nɩmʋ yɛ, “Gyaatanapʋ ɩ taalɛ gyankpaa mʋ tɔɔmaa gyaatanapʋ ɔkpa? Nɩɩ ɩ kan ba kanɩn mʋ, bamʋ asa anyɔ kpini bee biti ba naa lɩɩ tɩyɛ kɩkyabɔ tɔ.
42006040	Nɩɩ ɔbɩɩlapʋ mɛɛ taalɛ ŋara mʋ ɔkaapʋpʋ, amaa nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɩla bɩɩ bɩrɛ ɛɛ taalɛ waa fɛɛ mʋ ɔkaapʋpʋ.
42006041	“Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fu wu keyuubi kɩ maa bʋ fʋ tɔɔmaa kensi tɔ, nɩɩ fu mee wu kagyapoti mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ fʋ lɛɛ tɔ?
42006042	Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ taalɛ tɔwɛ fʋ tɔɔmaa yɛ, ‘Mɛ tɔɔmaa, yɛgɛ n lɛɛ keyuubi mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ fu kensi tɔ falɛ! Yɛgɛ fʋ mɛɛ kɩɩ kagyapoti mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ fʋ gbaa‐gbaa fu kensi tɔ?’ Fʋ kebunbun ansi wuya, gyankpaa lɛɛ kagyapoti mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ fʋ kensi tɔ, pɔyɩ kɛ fʋ taalɛ kɩɩ danbɩrasa lɛɛ keyuubi mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ fʋ tɔɔmaa lɛɛ tɔ.
42006043	“Nɩɩ oyu danbɩrasa kʋ man bʋ tɔ kɩ sɔyɩ abi libi, abɛɛ oyu libi mɛɛ sɔyɩ abi danbɩrasa.
42006044	Oyu kʋmaa nɩmʋ kɩmʋ abi sʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ sʋ bɛɛ bɩɩ kɩmʋ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ tɩyɛ akutu ɛɛ lɩɩ kɩkpalɛ oyu sʋ, abɛɛ kididobi lɩɩ kimango oyu sʋ.
42006045	Nyɩmɩsa danbɩrasa ɩɩ waa atɔ danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋʋla yɩla mʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ, nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa libi mɔɔ ɩɩ waa atɔ libi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋʋla yɩla mʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa kɔnɔ ɩɩ tɔwɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ nɩn.
42006046	“Mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ fan tɩɩ mɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ,’ yɛgɛ fan mɛɛ waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ fan waa?
42006047	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ ba mɛ asɛ, ba nu mɛ asɩn, nɩɩ ɔ waa ɩmʋ mʋ, n biti n kaapʋ fanɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ o duli.
42006048	Kanɩn ɔsa maŋa du nɩn fɛɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ pɔyɩ kɩkpaara, nɩɩ o kuu loo kasɛ nɩɩ ɔ pɔyɩ ɔpɔrɛ gyankpaasa mʋ gyaga kɩfʋlɛ sʋ. Nɩɩ nkyu n bɔla nɩɩ ɩ da kɩkpaara mʋ, amaa kɩ man gyingyen lɩɩ fɛɛ maa pɔyɩ kɩmʋ danbɩrasa mʋ sʋ.
42006049	Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o nu mɛ asɩn, nɩɩ ɔ man buu ɩmʋ mʋ, o du nɩn fɛɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kuu ɔbɔ pɔyɩ nɩɩ ɔ pɔ́yɩ́ kɩkpaara mʋ gyaga kusuupu sʋ. Nɩɩ nkyu maa bɔla da kɩkpaara mʋ, nɩɩ kɩ lɩɩ tɩyɛ yaasɛ tɔ kpini‐kpini.”
42007001	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ lʋwɛ, nɩɩ asa ba nu mʋ katɔwɛ mʋ, o kpee Kapanum kadɛ tɔ.
42007002	Roma anaakɔpʋ kɩlɩfa ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ kʋ kyɩna ɔ bʋ tʋtɔ, nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ kʋ mʋ nɩɩ ee biti mʋ asɩn, nɩɩ ɛɛ lɔ nɩɩ ee biti o wu.
42007003	Ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ maa nu Yesu sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ o sun Gyiwu abi abɩlɩsa akʋ mʋ asɛ, yɛ ɔ ba kyɛ mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ sa mʋ.
42007004	Ba maa ba Yesu asɛ mʋ, ba dan baasɛ kʋlɛ mʋ gaa tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ dagaa fɛɛ fʋ maa kyɛ mʋ tɔ.
42007005	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa anɛ Gyiwu abi, halɩɩ ɔ pɔyɩ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa sa anɛ.”
42007006	Ɩmʋ sʋ Yesu buu bamʋ ee kpee tʋtɔ. Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ o tiri kɩkpaara mʋ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ Roma anaakɔpʋ ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ sun mʋ kyɛmɩnɛ ana ba naa tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ man nyanla fʋ n‐yɩɩ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ n man dagaa fɛɛ fʋ ba mɛ kɩkpaara sʋ.
42007007	Kanɩn gbaa nɩɩ n wu fɛɛ n man dagaa fɛɛ n ba fʋ asɛ. Fɛɛ fʋ dan sa kɔnɔ mɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ ii biti ɔ nyɛ alanfɩya.
42007008	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ngbaa mɛ n bʋ ɔbɩlɩsa ɔkʋ kasɛ, nɩɩ anaakɔpʋ ɔkʋ gbaa ba bʋ mɛ kasɛ. Nɩɩ n tɔwɛ nɩmʋ yɛ, ‘Kpe nfɩɩ’ nɩɩ ee kpee, nɩɩ n bɩla tɔwɛ ɔnɩmʋ yɛ, ‘Ba nfɩɩ,’ nɩɩ ɛɛ ba, nɩɩ n tɔwɛ mɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ yɛ, ‘Waa falɛ,’ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa.”
42007009	Yesu maa nu kanɩn mʋ, i kyinkyin mʋ, nɩɩ o biliŋi mu ansi kɩɩ kʋbʋ damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba buu mʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, Ɩsɩrayɩ abi kpini tɔ mʋ, n man pɩɩta wu ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ falɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii damantɛ nɩmʋ kedubi.”
42007010	Nbɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ o sun mʋ ba maa bwii kpewu mʋ, ba naa tu kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ maa nyɛ alanfɩya.
42007011	Ɩmʋ kamaa mʋ Yesu lɩɩ tʋtɔ kpee kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ kɩmʋ yɛ Nayin, nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ yɛ asa damantɛ ba buu mʋ.
42007012	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ o tiri kadɛ mʋ nbwama mʋ, o wu ba maa sʋ obuni ba lɩɩ kadɛ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ obuni maŋa gyɛ okulapu‐kyɩɩ kebii‐nyɩnsa kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋʋgɛ. Nɩɩ asa damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kadɛ mʋ tɔ ba buu okulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ.
42007013	Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu maa wu okulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ, mʋ asɩn a kɩtaa mʋ kʋwɛɛ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Man bɩla su.”
42007014	Nɩɩ Yesu taa mʋ kɩbaa naa mata kɩdakaa mʋ, nɩɩ asʋlapʋ mʋ ba sii ba yɩlɛ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kɩyaafɔlɛ! N tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ, kʋsʋ!”
42007015	Nɩɩ olewupu mʋ kʋsʋ kyɩna, nɩɩ o piili ɛɛ tɔwɛ, nɩɩ Yesu taa mʋ sa mu‐nyi.
42007016	Nɩɩ i kyinkyin bamʋ kpini nɩɩ ba yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ. Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ lala kʋ lɩɩ anɛ sʋ. Ɩbwaarɛ ba ɔ ba kyɛ mʋ asa tɔ.”
42007017	Yesu asɩn nɩmʋ ɩ yalagɛ Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, yɛ ɩsʋwʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dɛ ɩ maa kɩmʋ mʋ.
42007018	Nɩɩ Gyɔn abɩɩlapʋ ba naa tɔwɛ mʋ Yesu awaasa mʋ kpini. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ anyɔ,
42007019	nɩɩ o sun bamʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu asɛ yɛ ba naa taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ, Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ ee biti ɔ ba mʋ abɛɛ a gyoo kɩɩ ɔkʋ ɔkpa?”
42007020	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ anyɩn mʋ ba ba Yesu asɛ mʋ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, Gyɔn okyugyeepu i sun anɛ fʋ asɛ yɛ abaa taasɛ fʋ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ ee biti ɔ ba mʋ abɛɛ a gyoo kɩɩ ɔkʋ ɔkpa?”
42007021	Kanɩn saŋa maa tɔ mʋ Yesu kyɛ asa gaalaagaa alobi, nɩɩ ɔ gya nbwɩɩ libi lɩɩ asa tɔ, nɩɩ o bugi agyaatanapʋ gaalaagaa ansi.
42007022	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ lɛɛ Gyɔn nbɔɔ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan bwii naa tɔwɛ Gyɔn kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan wu yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ fan nu. Agyaatanapʋ ansi ii bugi, nɩɩ aboobi bɛɛ kʋsʋ natɛ, nɩɩ abootipu bɛɛ nyɛ alanfɩya, nɩɩ akpawu asu ii tigi, nɩɩ alewupu bee kyiŋi bɛɛ ba nkpa tɔ, nɩɩ atiripu bee nu asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ.
42007023	Fan bɩla tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, kusee ɩ gyɛ sa ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ san ɔ sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mɛ tɔ.”
42007024	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Gyɔn nbɔɔ ba lɩɩ mʋ asɛ mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu piili ɛɛ tɔwɛ Gyɔn asɩn ɛɛ sa kʋbʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan maa lɩɩ kpee Gyɔn asɛ ofuli mʋ sʋ mʋ, mɩnɛ nɩɩ fan waa nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ fen kpee fɛn naa kɩɩ? Kʋkyɔ mʋ nɩɩ afuu a da ii fiilaa mʋ?
42007025	Nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ kanɩn bɩrɛ mʋ, mɩnɛ nɩɩ fan kpee naa wu? Abɛɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ o bun ɔgyalɩn atɔ? Ayee! Asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bun ɔgyalɩn atɔ nɩɩ ba sʋ kakyɩna danbɩrasa mʋ, ba bʋ awurakpa nɩn.
42007026	Amaa mɩnɛ nɩɩ fan kpee naa kɩɩ? Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ abɛɛ? Ɛɛhn, n tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ ɔ kyɔ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ.
42007027	Gyɔn nɩmʋ asɩn nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘N biti n sun mɛ kabɔɔ kɛ ɔ gyankpaa fʋ, mʋ ii biti ɔ lɔŋɔ fʋ ɔkpa gyoo fʋ.’
42007028	N tɔwɛ fanɛ fɛɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ mʋ, man kyɔ Gyɔn, amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o du pii sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii tɔ mʋ kyɔ mʋ.”
42007029	Asa mʋ kpini yɛ lenpoo akɔɔlɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba nu Gyɔn asɩn tɔwɛsa mʋ, ba kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ i kyiigi, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba yɛgɛ nɩɩ Gyɔn gyee bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee.
42007030	Amaa Farasii abi yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ anyipu ba kina nfɛɛrɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ sa bamʋ mʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ba man yɛgɛ nɩɩ Gyɔn gyee bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee.
42007031	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ nɩɩ n biti n taa ndaga kakyɩna kanɩmʋ tɔ asa kaala. Anɩmʋ ana nɩɩ ba duli?
42007032	Ba du nɩn fɛɛ nbii mʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ kɩgya tɔ bɛɛ tɩɩ abaa bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘An fʋlɛ kensi‐gyii nbɩlɛ sa fanɛ, amaa fan man kyaa, nɩɩ an sawʋ keli alengyi sa fanɛ, amaa fan man su’.
42007033	“Lɩɩ fɛɛ Gyɔn okyugyeepu maa ba mʋ, ee ŋmina kɔnɔ gaa, nɩɩ ɔ man nuu nta, nɩɩ fan yɛ ‘Ɔ sʋ nbwɩɩ libi.’
42007034	Nɩɩ Mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa n maa ba mʋ, n gyii nɩɩ n nuu, nɩɩ fan yɛ, ‘N gyɛ ogyipu lala yɛ ɔtabʋʋpʋ, nɩɩ n bɩla n gyɛ lenpoo akɔɔlɛpʋ yɛ alibi awaapʋ bamʋ kyɛmɩnɛ.’
42007035	Amaa bamʋ nɩɩ bee buu Ɩbwaarɛ kanyaasɩn, lɩɩ bamʋ‐daa sʋ mʋ, ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ kanyaasɩn mʋ bʋrɔn.”
42007036	Saŋa kʋ tɔ nɩɩ Kafarasii‐nyɩn kʋ tɩɩ Yesu yɛ ɔ ba kɛ ba naa bʋga gyii. Nɩɩ Yesu kpee mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ nɩɩ ɔ naa kyɩna o gyii.
42007037	Kanɩn kadɛ maŋa tɔ mʋ ɔkyɩɩ gyaga kʋ bʋ tʋtɔ. Ɔkyɩɩ mʋ maa nu fɛɛ Yesu bʋ Kafarasii‐nyɩn mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ ee gyii mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ bɩya tulale liifensa pʋrʋntʋwa bɔla.
42007038	Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ ba yɩlɛ Yesu kamaa tiri mʋ ayaa asɛ ee su ansikyu ɛɛ pɔɔla mʋ ayaa. Nɩɩ ɔ taa mu inyini ɛɛ kpayɩ Yesu ayaa sʋ, nɩɩ o munkura ɩmʋ bɛɛrɛɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kyɛɛgɛ tulale mʋ wʋrɩgɛ mʋ ayaa sʋ.
42007039	Nɩɩ Kafarasii‐nyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ Yesu mʋ maa wu ɩnɩmʋ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ yɛ, “Fɛɛ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ dɩn dan ɔ gyɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ kesintin nɩn, ɔ dɩn bɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ mata mʋ falɛ, ɔ dɩn bɩɩ kɩbaabʋtɔ gyaga mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ kɩmʋ tɔ.”
42007040	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ Simon yɛ, “N sʋ kʋtɔ kʋ kɛ n tɔwɛ fʋ.” Nɩɩ Simon yɛ, “N nu, Ɔkaapʋpʋ, tɔwɛ mɛ.”
42007041	Nɩɩ Yesu bɔɔ mʋ kɩŋasan yɛ, “Anyɩn anyɔ akʋ ɩ naa paala afulee lɩɩ afulee wuya kʋ asɛ. Ɔkʋ paala gbiti nderebi anu, ɔnyɔsapʋ mɔɔ adunuu.
42007042	Bamʋ ɔkʋ man taalɛ nyɛ ɔ naa ka mʋ kʋkɔ. Nɩɩ afulee wuya mʋ taa kɛɛ bamʋ asa anyɔ. Asa anyɔ maŋa tɔ mʋ, anɩmʋ ii biti o biti afulee wuya mʋ asɩn gaa?”
42007043	Simon lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N waa nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ mu afulee akyɔ mʋ.” Nɩɩ Yesu yɛ, “Fʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ kesintin.”
42007044	Nɩɩ Yesu biliŋi kɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ Simon yɛ, “Yɛ fu wu ɔkyɩɩ nɩmʋ? N maa ba fʋ kɩkpaara sʋ mʋ, fʋ man sa mɛ nkyu kɛ n fwɩɩ mɛ ayaa sʋ, amaa ɔkyɩɩ nɩmʋ taa mʋ ansikyu fwɩɩ mɛ ayaa, nɩɩ ɔ taa mu inyini kpayɩ ɩmʋ.
42007045	Fʋ man baari mɛ waa mɛ nsa‐nsa, amaa lɩɩ koo saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n ba nfɩɩ mʋ, ɔkyɩɩ nɩmʋ man pɩɩ yɛgɛ mɛ ayaa sʋ kimunkura.
42007046	Fʋ man taa olifu nfɔ wʋrɩgɛ mi kumu tɔ, amaa ɔkyɩɩ nɩmʋ taa tulale wʋrɩgɛ mɛ ayaa sʋ.
42007047	Ɩmʋ sʋ n tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ, kebiti lala mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kaapʋ falɛ sʋ mʋ, ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ ba taa mu alibi damantɛ mʋ kɛɛ mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ mu alibi a man kyɔ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ kɩtaakɛɛ mʋ, ɛɛ kaapʋ kebiti mʋ gbaa gbɛrɛɛ nɩn.”
42007048	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ yɛ, “N taa fu alibi kɛɛ fʋ.”
42007049	Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba san ba tɛ ogyikpa mʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ abaa yɛ, “Anɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔnɩmʋ, halɩɩ ɔ sʋ alibi ɛɛ kɛɛ?”
42007050	Amaa Yesu tɔwɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ mɔlɩgɛ fʋ. Natɛ yɛ kɔkɔlɔ yuuli.”
42008001	Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, Yesu natɛ ndɛ lala yɛ ndɛ‐bii sʋ ɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa lɩɩ kuwura‐gyii mʋ sʋ, yɛgɛ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ ba tii mʋ sʋ.
42008002	Nɩɩ akyɩɩ ɔkʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gya n‐yaayu libi lɩɩ bamʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɔ kyɛ bamʋ alɔ mʋ, gbaa ba buu mʋ. Bamʋ ɔkʋ ɩ gyɛ Mɛɛrɩ (mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Magidalen) mʋ nɩɩ Yesu gya nbwɩɩ libi asunɔ lɩɩ mʋ tɔ mʋ,
42008003	yɛ Gyowana mʋ nɩɩ mu‐kuli ɩ gyɛ Kyusa. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ owura Herodi kɩkpaara sʋ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ, yɛ Susana yɛ akʋ. Akyɩɩ anɩmʋ ɩ sʋ bamʋ gbaa‐gbaa atɔ bɛɛ kyɛ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ tɔ.
42008004	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ asa bɛɛ lɩɩ ndɛ sʋ ndɛ sʋ ba ba gyaŋɛ Yesu asɛ, nɩɩ ba ba nyɛ akyɔ mʋ, Yesu bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan yɛ,
42008005	“Ɔdɔɔpʋ kʋ ɩ kyɩna kpee ɔ naa ŋmatɛ ayu. Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ ŋmatɛ ayu mʋ ɩmʋ ɩkʋ ɩ tɩyɛ ɔkpa tɔ nɩɩ asa ba natɛ ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ nbwiibi ba ba tasɛ gyii.
42008006	Nɩɩ ɩkʋ ɩ tɩyɛ afʋlɛ sʋ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩsɛ ɩ man kyɔ sa ɩmʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ maa kɔyɩ mʋ, ɩmʋ ilin ɩ man taalɛ kpee kata. Ɩmʋ sʋ kyɔwɛ maa daa ɩmʋ mʋ nɩɩ i fugya.
42008007	Nɩɩ ɩkʋ mɔɔ ɩ tɩyɛ iwii tɔ nɩɩ ɩmaa ɩmʋ ɩ bʋga dan nɩɩ iwii mʋ ɩ dan nyan ɩmʋ.
42008008	Nɩɩ abi akʋ mɔɔ ɩ tɩyɛ kasɛ danbɩrasa tɔ nɩɩ ɩ kɔyɩ dan. Nɩɩ ɩ dan sɔyɩ abi kɩlɩfa‐kɩlɩfa.” Maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ o diyaa mʋ ɔbʋlɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ asʋ nɩɩ ee biti o nu mʋ, o nu.”
42008009	Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba taasɛ mʋ kɩŋasan mʋ kasɛ.
42008010	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fanɛ bɩrɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mu kuwura‐gyii mʋ asiri asɩn kaapʋ fanɛ, amaa asansa bɩrɛ aŋasan tɔ nɩɩ n biti n tɔwɛ sa bamʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ, ‘bee biti ba ba bɛɛ kɩɩ, amaa ba mɛɛ yɛ ba wu, kɛ ba ba bee nu, amaa ba mɛɛ yɛ ba nu kasɛ.’ ”
42008011	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kɩŋasan mʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, abi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ ŋmatɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ.
42008012	Nɩɩ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ tɩyɛ ɔkpa tɔ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee nu asɩn mʋ, nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ ɩ lɛɛ ɩmʋ ɛɛ lɩɩ bamʋ nkɔlɔ tɔ, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ taalɛ kɔɔlɛ gyii kɛ ba nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ.
42008013	Nɩɩ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ tɩyɛ afʋlɛ sʋ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee nu asɩn mʋ, nɩɩ bɛɛ taa kensi‐gyii kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ. Amaa asɩn mʋ man loo bamʋ nkɔlɔ tɔ. Bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ mɛɛ kyɛɛrɛɛ, ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ kʋtʋʋ tɔ kɩɩ kɩ kan ba tu bamʋ de, bɛɛ lɩɩ tɩyɛ nɩn.
42008014	Nɩɩ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ tɩyɛ iwii tɔ mɔɔ mʋ ɩ yɩlɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ bee nu asɩn mʋ, amaa lɩɩ kakyɩna tɔ nfɛɛrɛ kɩfɛ, kufulee biti yɛ kensi‐gyii bansa i kun bamʋ, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ taalɛ dan kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ.
42008015	Nɩɩ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ tɩyɛ kasɛ danbɩrasa tɔ mʋ mɔɔ, ɩ gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba taa kɔkɔlɔ kʋlʋn kɔɔlɛ asɩn mʋ gyii, nɩɩ ba sʋ kenyiita yɩlɛ tɔ kɛ ba waa adanbɩrasa.”
42008016	Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla tɔwɛ bamʋ kɩŋasan kʋ yɛ, “Ɔkʋ mee tuwa fɩtɩla kɛ ɔ taa waa kolobi tɔ abɛɛ ɔ taa yii npaa kasɛ, amaa ɛɛ taa ɛɛ gyaga kɩmʋ ɔgyagakpa nɩn, kɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ ba mʋ ba wu fɩtɩla mʋ.
42008017	Nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ baala gbaa kii biti kɩ lɩɩ ifuli, nɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ asiri atɔ kpini ii biti ɩ lɩɩ ifuli.
42008018	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan baa fan da sʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fen nu asɩn, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee nu asɩn kasɛ mʋ, ii biti ɩ sa mʋ tii sʋ, nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o mee nu asɩn mʋ kasɛ mʋ, ii biti ɩ kɔɔlɛ ipii mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ gbaa lɩɩ mʋ asɛ.”
42008019	Nɩɩ Yesu mu‐nyi yɛ mu‐supu ana ba ba yɛ ba be wu mʋ, amaa lɩɩ sakyɔ sʋ mʋ, ba man nyɛ nin tiri mʋ.
42008020	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔkʋ tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Fu‐nyi yɛ fu‐supu ana ba yɩlɛ kewu bee biti fɛɛ ba wu fʋ.”
42008021	Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mi‐nyi yɛ mi‐supu ana ɩ gyɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ bee nu abwaarɛsɩn nɩɩ bɛɛ sʋ bɛɛ waa kusun mʋ.”
42008022	Kakaakʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ a faa kpee benbe.” Nɩɩ ba loo ɔkʋlɩ tɔ faa kyʋn.
42008023	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ palɛ bee kpee mʋ Yesu dɛ nsɩɩrɛ. Nɩɩ afuu lala akʋ a tigi lɩɩ bamʋ sʋ, nɩɩ apaa a da a loo ɔkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ ɩ san gbɛrɛɛ kɛ ɔkʋlɩ mʋ o muuri, nɩɩ bamʋ nkɔlɔ ɩ ŋmaa bamʋ.
42008024	Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba naa kyiŋi mʋ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ! An biti a sii nkyu tɔ!” Nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ, pʋntɛ afuu mʋ yɛ apaa mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɩ waa diin.
42008025	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii bʋ fɩnɛ?” Nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ, nɩɩ i kyinkyin bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Nyɩmɩsa mɔɔ ndee nɩɩ ɛɛ sa afuu yɛ apaa kɔnɔ nɩɩ i nu mʋ asɛ.”
42008026	Nɩɩ ba palɛ naa fʋʋ Gerasene abi ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, kɩbaafʋn mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Galile benbe.
42008027	Yesu maa dan ɛɛ lɩɩ ɛɛ yɩlɛ ɔbʋn kaa mʋ, nɩɩ Kagerasene‐nyɩn kʋ mʋ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba bʋ mʋ tɔ mʋ ba gyaŋa mʋ. Ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ natɛ kubolonkpan kyɛɛrɛɛ yɛgɛ ɔ mɛɛ kyɩna kɩkpaara sʋ, amɔɔ nkyan tɔ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ.
42008028	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ wu Yesu mʋ, ɔ pʋntɛ tɩyɛ mʋ ayaa tɔ, nɩɩ o kuusi kenken tɔwɛ yɛ, “Yesu, sʋsʋ Owura Lala mu‐bii! Mɩnɛ nɩɩ fii biti mɛ asɛ? N kʋlɛ fʋ nɩn, man nyanla mɛ!”
42008029	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Yesu wʋla sa nbwɩɩ libi mʋ kɔnɔ fɛɛ ba lɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ tɔ. Saŋa kʋmaa nɩmʋ nbwɩɩ libi mʋ bɛɛ ba mʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ ɩ kan ba mʋ sʋ mʋ, bɛɛ taa agbeeleebi ŋmina mʋ abaa yɛ mʋ ayaa, yɛgɛ bee kun mʋ. Amaa ɛɛ tɩŋɛ agbeeleebi mʋ nɩɩ ba taa ŋmina mʋ mʋ, nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi mʋ bɛɛ sʋla mʋ kpee ofuli sʋ.
42008030	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ fʋ?” Nɩɩ ɔ yɛ bɛɛ tɩɩ mɛ yɛ, “Kʋbʋ!” Lɩɩ fɛɛ nbwɩɩ libi kʋkyɔ ba tɛ mʋ sʋ.
42008031	Nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi mʋ ba kʋlɛ Yesu yɛ, ɔ man taa bamʋ naa waa ɔbɔ kyinkyingilin mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ ɔkaa mʋ tɔ.
42008032	Nɩɩ akuuri damantɛ akʋ ba bʋ kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ bee gyii. Nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi mʋ ba kʋlɛ Yesu fɛɛ ɔ yɛgɛ ba naa loo akuuri mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ Yesu sa bamʋ ɔkpa.
42008033	Nbwɩɩ libi mʋ ba maa lɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ tɔ mʋ, ba naa loo akuuri mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ba sɩlɛ kpɩlɩgɛ kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ naa loo ɔbʋn lala mʋ tɔ nɩɩ ba muuri.
42008034	Nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kɩɩ akuuri mʋ sʋ ba maa wu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa mʋ, ba sɩlɛ kpee kadɛ tɔ yɛ ndɔɔ ana tɔ naa tɔwɛ asa.
42008035	Nɩɩ asa mʋ ba ba kɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa. Ba maa ba Yesu asɛ mʋ, ba wu ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba kʋsʋ mʋ sʋ mʋ, o bun kaalɛ ɔ tɛ Yesu ayaa kasɛ yɛgɛ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ i du kyɛɛkyɛɛ, nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ.
42008036	Bamʋ nɩɩ ba taa bamʋ ansi wu mʋ, ba tɔwɛ asa kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba daa ba tɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ nyɛ kɩkyɛ.
42008037	Kanɩn sʋ Gerasene abi mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kɩbaafʋn maŋa sʋ kpini, ba kʋlɛ Yesu yɛ ɔ lɩɩ bamʋ ɔsʋwʋlɛ maŋa sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ. Nɩɩ o loo ɔkʋlɩ tɔ bwii.
42008038	Pɔyɩ kɛ ba bwii mʋ, ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba kʋsʋ mʋ sʋ mʋ kʋlɛ Yesu yɛ ɔ yɛgɛ o buu mʋ. Amaa Yesu kina tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ,
42008039	“Bwii kpee kewu naa tɔwɛ kʋtɔ lala mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ waa sa fʋ.” Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔnyɩn mʋ kpee kadɛ mʋ tɔ katɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ naa tɔwɛ kʋtɔ lala mʋ nɩɩ Yesu waa sa mʋ.
42008040	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu bwii faa kpee ɔbʋn benbe mʋ, sakyɔ mʋ ba waa mʋ nsa‐nsa kɔɔlɛ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba wʋla ba tɛ ba gyoo mʋ.
42008041	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gyarosi, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ ba tɩyɛ Yesu ayaa kasɛ, nɩɩ ɔ kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ ɔ ba mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ.
42008042	Lɩɩ fɛɛ mu kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ o gyii nsu kudu anyɔ ii biti o wu. Yesu maa yii sʋ ee kpee mʋ, sakyɔ mʋ mili mʋ sʋ ba buu mʋ.
42008043	Ɔkyɩɩ kʋ bʋ sakyɔ mʋ tɔ nɩɩ nkalan ɩ da mʋ nsu kudu anyɔ, amaa ɔkʋ man taalɛ kyɛ mʋ.
42008044	Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ loo sakyɔ mʋ tɔ ba Yesu kamaa ba mata mʋ kaalɛ kɔnɔ‐bi, nɩɩ opula maŋa tɔ mʋ nkalan mʋ ɩ tɩn.
42008045	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ ɩ mata mɛ?” Bamʋ kpini ba maa kina yɛ ɩ man gyɛ bamʋ mʋ, nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, sakyɔ bee mili fʋ sʋ, bɛɛ mata fʋ.”
42008046	Amaa Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔsa kʋ mata mɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ n wu nɩɩ n bɩɩ fɛɛ ɔlʋn kʋ maa lɩɩ mɛ tɔ.”
42008047	Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ maa wu fɛɛ ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ taa baala mʋ, ɔ kyɩkyaa ba tɩyɛ Yesu ansi tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ yɩlɛ sakyɔ mʋ tɔ tɔwɛ kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ mata Yesu, yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ kɩkyɛ opula maŋa tɔ.
42008048	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ yɛ, “Mi‐bii kyɩɩsa, fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fʋ nyɛ alanfɩya, kpewu kayɩɩ yuuli tɔ.”
42008049	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu san ɛɛ tɔwɛ kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ kabɔɔ kɩ lɩɩ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa ɔbɩlɩsa Gyarosi kɩkpaara sʋ, ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Man bɩla tɔɔrɔɔ ɔkaapʋpʋ mʋ, fu kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi mʋ wu.”
42008050	Yesu maa nu kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ Gyarosi yɛ, “Man waa kufuu, fɛɛ fʋ dan nyɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii ee biti ɔ nyɛ alanfɩya.”
42008051	Yesu fʋʋ Gyarosi kɩkpaara sʋ mʋ, ɔ man yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɔkʋ buu mʋ loo obu to, amɔɔ Pita maa Gyɔn yɛ Gyemisi yɛ kebii mʋ, mʋ‐sɛ yɛ mu‐nyi nkʋn.
42008052	Saŋa maa kpini yɛgɛ asa bɛɛ sawʋ bɛɛ waa ɩlawʋ, bee su kebii mʋ keli. Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ kusu, ɔ man wu, ɔ dɛ nɩn.”
42008053	Nɩɩ asa mʋ ba ŋmasɛ Yesu, lɩɩ fɛɛ be nyi kebii mʋ maa wu.
42008054	Amaa Yesu kɩtaa kebii mʋ kɩbaa tɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Mi‐bii, kʋsʋ!”
42008055	Nɩɩ kebii mʋ, mʋ kala bwii ba mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ opula maŋa tɔ. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, ba sa kebii mʋ agyitɔ kɛ o gyii.
42008056	Nɩɩ ɩ waa kebii mʋ akʋʋgɛpʋ kɩyan, amaa nɩɩ ɔ da bamʋ amu tɔ yɛ ba man waa kɛ ba tɔwɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa falɛ sa ɔkʋ.
42009001	Yesu maa tɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ kudu‐anyɔ mʋ ba gyaŋɛ mʋ, ɔ sa bamʋ ɔlʋn nɩɩ ɔ waa bamʋ kɩnyɩn tɔ yɛ ba gya nbwɩɩ libi lɩɩ asa tɔ kɛ ba kyɛ alɔ.
42009002	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ o sun bamʋ yɛ, ba naa tɔwɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ asɩn kɛ ba kyɛ alɔpʋ.
42009003	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan maa kpee falɛ, fan man taa sɛhn tii sʋ. Fan man taa kikpebi abɛɛ adiikun abɛɛ agyitɔ abɛɛ afulee abɛɛ kaalɛ nyɔsapʋ kʋ tii sʋ.
42009004	Nɩɩ kɩkpaara kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fan loo kɩmʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ fanɛ mʋ, fan kyɩna tʋtɔ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan lɩɩ kadɛ maŋa tɔ.
42009005	Nɩɩ kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba kina fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ, nɩɩ fan lɩɩ tʋtɔ fen kpee mʋ, fan kpɩkpaa fanɛ ayaa sʋ apurutiti, kɛ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan waa mʋ, ɩ man bʋrɔn.”
42009006	Ɩmʋ sʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba natɛ ndɛ‐bi‐ndɛ‐bi mʋ sʋ kpini bɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, yɛgɛ bɛɛ kyɛ asa katɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ bee kpee mʋ.
42009007	Kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ Owura Herodi maa nu atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa kpini mʋ ɩ tɔɔrɔɔ mʋ gaa. Lɩɩ fɛɛ akʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ Gyɔn okyugyeepu mʋ i kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ.
42009008	Nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba yɛ, olewupu Eligya i bwii kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ, nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ, atɔwɛpʋ dɩdaa mʋ ɔkʋ i bwii kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ.
42009009	Amaa Herodi tɔwɛ yɛ, “N yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba tɩn Gyɔn okyugyeepu kumu. Anɩmʋ nɩɩ n bɩla n nu mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn falɛ?” Nɩɩ ɔ kpan mʋ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ o wu Yesu.
42009010	Nɩɩ asunpu mʋ ba maa bwii ba mʋ, ba ba tɔwɛ Yesu kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba naa waa. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ taa bamʋ nkʋn ba lɩɩ kpee kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ kɩmʋ yɛ Betisayida mʋ.
42009011	Sakyɔ mʋ ba maa nu kanɩn mʋ, ba buu mʋ kpee tʋtɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ bamʋ tɔwɛ kuwura‐gyii asɩn sa bamʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti kɩkyɛ mʋ.
42009012	Kyɔwɛ maa biti ɔ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ ba ba mʋ asɛ. Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Yɛgɛ asa mʋ ba kpee ndɛ‐bi‐ndɛ‐bi yɛ ndɔɔ ana mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ tiri nfɩɩ mʋ, kɛ ba naa nyɛ ilookpa yɛ agyitɔ gyii. Lɩɩ fɛɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ an bʋ falɛ gyɛ kiyii nsana.”
42009013	Amaa Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fan sa bamʋ kʋtɔ kʋ kɛ ba gyii.” Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ an sʋ ɩ gyɛ bodobodo anuu yɛ ɩkɩn ɩnyɔ, abɛɛ fii biti fɛɛ a naa sɔɔ agyitɔ sa asa damantɛ banɩmʋ?”
42009014	(Nɩɩ anyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ, bɛɛ waa fɛɛ ngbɩn nnuu). Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ asa mʋ ba kyɩna ntun adunuu‐adunuu.”
42009015	Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba waa kanɩn, nɩɩ ba yɛgɛ asa mʋ kpini ba kyɩna‐kyɩna kasɛ.
42009016	Nɩɩ Yesu taa bodobodo yɛ ɩkɩn ɩnyɔ mʋ diyaa mu ansi kɩɩ sʋsʋ taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ kpɛɛ‐kpɛɛ tɔ taa sa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ ba barɩgɛ tɔ sa asa mʋ kɛ ba gyii.
42009017	Asa mʋ kpini ba gyii ŋmɛ, nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba tasɛ‐tasɛ agyisan mʋ bɔla alantan kudu anyɔ.
42009018	Kakaakʋ Yesu maa kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ mʋ nkʋn mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba ba mʋ asɛ nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ nɩɩ asa bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, n gyɛ?”
42009019	Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Akʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ fʋ ɩ gyɛ Gyɔn okyugyeepu, nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Eligya ɩ gyɛ fʋ, nɩɩ asansa mɔɔ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, fʋ ɩ gyɛ atɔwɛpʋ dɩdaa mʋ nɩɩ ba wu mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ i bwii ba nkpa tɔ.”
42009020	Nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɔɔ fanɛ mɔɔ, anɩmʋ nɩɩ fan yɛ n gyɛ?” Nɩɩ Pita lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Wʋla lɛɛ mʋ.”
42009021	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu da bamʋ amu tɔ yɛ ba man kan waa tɔwɛ ɔkʋ.
42009022	Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa dagaa maa gyii awʋrʋfɔ gaa, kɛ abɩlɩsa yɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ kpini ba kina mɛ. Bee biti ba mɔɔ mɛ, amaa nkɛ nsa kamaa mʋ n biti n kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ ba nkpa tɔ.”
42009023	Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti fɛɛ o buu mɛ mʋ, ɩ dagaa fɛɛ o kina mʋ kɔkɔlɔ biti, kɛ o kukuri mu oyu laasa sʋla buu mɛ kakɛ kʋmaa.
42009024	Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti fɛɛ ɔ mɔlɩgɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ nkpa mʋ, ii biti ɩ lɩɩ mʋ abaa tɔ, amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ nkpa sa lɩɩ mɛ sʋ mʋ, ee biti o bwii nyɛ mʋ nkpa.
42009025	Fɛɛ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa kan nyɛ dulinyaa tɔ atɔ kpini nɩɩ ɔ pan mʋ nkpa mʋ, mɩnɛ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ?
42009026	Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ sʋ mʋ ipeeli lɩɩ mɛ yɛ mɛ asɩn mʋ sʋ mʋ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ii biti ɩ baa ɩ sʋ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ ipeeli sa kanɩn ɔsa maŋa, lɩɩ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ maa Mɛ‐Sɛ yɛ mʋ nbɔɔ kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ an biti a ba bʋnyaa tɔ mʋ.
42009027	N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan yɩlɛ nfɩɩ falɛ tɔ akʋ ba mɛɛ yɛ ba wu lewu, amɔɔ ba dan wu kuwura‐gyii mʋ pɔyɩ.”
42009028	Yesu maa tɔwɛ asɩn nɩmʋ lʋwɛ nkɛ nsunɔ kamaa mʋ, ɔ taa Pita maa Gyɔn yɛ Gyemisi nɩɩ maa bamʋ ba kpee kɩbɩɩ kʋkʋ sʋ ba naa kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ.
42009029	Maa san ɔ maa sʋ ɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ mʋ, nɩɩ mu ansi tɔ a biliŋi, nɩɩ mʋ ɩkaalɛ gbaa ɩ lɔŋɔ fuuli parɛparɛ nɩɩ ɩ ŋalɩgɛ fɛɛ bʋlayɩ maa wɛɛ ɩsɛɛ mʋ.
42009030	Opula maŋa tɔ asa anyɔ akʋ ba ba mʋ asɛ. Bamʋ ɩ gyɛ Mosesi maa Eligya.
42009031	Ba taa bʋnyaa sʋ ba Yesu asɛ, nɩɩ maa bamʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ yɩla fɛɛ ee biti o kpee Gyerusalem naa wu mʋ.
42009032	Pita maa mʋ tɔɔmaa ana mʋ ba dɛ nsɩɩrɛ, amaa ba maa kyiŋi mʋ, ba wu Yesu bʋnyaa mʋ yɛ asa anyɔ mʋ ba maa yɩlɛ mʋ asɛ.
42009033	Asa anyɔ mʋ ba maa lɩɩ Yesu asɛ bee kpee mʋ, Pita tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, ɩ bʋrɔn gaa fɛɛ a maa bʋ nfɩɩ. Yɛgɛ a waa abu asa, fʋ lɛɛ kʋkʋ. Mosesi lɛɛ yɛ Eligya lɛɛ. (Yɛgɛ ɔ man nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ).”
42009034	Ɔ dan san ɛɛ tɔwɛ nɩɩ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ a ba bun bamʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ ɩ kɩtaa abɩɩlapʋ mʋ kufuu kanan mʋ nɩɩ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ mʋ a bun bamʋ sʋ mʋ.
42009035	Nɩɩ ɔbʋlɛ kʋ tɔwɛ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ tɔ yɛ, “Ɔnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mi‐bii mʋ nɩɩ n wʋla lɛɛ. Fen nu mʋ asɛ.”
42009036	Ɔbʋlɛ mʋ maa tɔwɛ lʋwɛ mʋ, ba wu fɛɛ ɩ san Yesu nkʋn nɩn. Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba yɛgɛ nɩɩ asɩn mʋ a sii yɛ bamʋ nkʋn, ba man tɔwɛ ɔkʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba wu saŋa maŋa.
42009037	Ɩmʋ lɩɩkaakɛ mʋ ba maa lɩɩ kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ bɛɛ ba mʋ, sakyɔ damantɛ kʋ ba gyaŋa Yesu.
42009038	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kʋ bʋ sakyɔ mʋ tɔ kuusi tɩɩ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ! N kʋlɛ fʋ nɩn, kɩɩ mi kebii‐nyɩnsa‐bii nɩmʋ sa mɛ, mʋ nkʋn ɩ dan ɔ gyɛ mi‐bii.
42009039	Kayaayu libi kʋ ɩɩ taalɛ ɛɛ ba mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ opula tɔ ee kuusi yɛgɛ ɩɩ sʋ mʋ ɩɩ tʋʋ kasɛ, ɩɩ bɩɩtɛ mʋ fɛɛ kabwɩɩ mʋ, yɛgɛ mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ ɩ lɩɩ afʋfʋʋ ɩ taa mʋ i kpii nɩɩ ɩ waa mʋ ɩ kyɛɛrɛɛ pɔyɩ kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ mʋ.
42009040	Nɩɩ n kʋlɛ fʋ abɩɩlapʋ yɛ ba gya kayaayu libi mʋ lɩɩ mʋ tɔ, amaa ba man taalɛ.”
42009041	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “O! Fanɛ ndaga asa, fan man kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gyii, nɩɩ fanɛ ɩkpa ɩ man du kyɛɛkyɛɛ. Nkɛ nfɩnɛ nɩɩ n biti n kyɩna fanɛ asɛ nyɛ kenyiita sa fanɛ?” Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ yɛ, “Taa fu‐bii mʋ ba nfɩɩ.”
42009042	Nɩɩ kebii mʋ maa ba Yesu asɛ mʋ, nɩɩ kayaayu libi mʋ ba taa mʋ tʋʋ kasɛ nɩɩ i kpii mʋ fɛɛ kigbingbin mʋ. Amaa Yesu pʋntɛ kayaayu libi mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kyɛ kebii mʋ bwiiyaa mʋ sa mʋ‐sɛ.
42009043	Lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔlʋn kparɛ mʋ kaapʋ mʋ, ɩ waa asa mʋ kpini kɩyan. Ɩ maa san i kyinkyin asa mʋ lɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu waa sʋ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ,
42009044	“Fan kan fanɛ asʋ kɛ fan nu yɛ ɔdan. Bee biti ba lɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ waa asa abaa tɔ.”
42009045	Amaa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba man nu ɩmʋ kasɛ. Ɩ gyɛ asɩn baalasa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ man lɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ, amaa nɩɩ ba sʋ kufuu fɛɛ ba taasɛ mʋ asɩn mʋ kasɛ.
42009046	Nɩɩ ɩmɔɔrɛ ɩ tɩyɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ nsana fɛɛ bamʋ tɔ mʋ, anɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔlala.
42009047	Amaa Yesu maa bɩɩ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ fɛ mʋ, ɔ taa kebii pii ba yɩlɛ mʋ asɛ.
42009048	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fʋ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ kɔɔlɛ kebii nɩmʋ dubi mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ mʋ, fʋ kɔɔlɛ mɛ nɩmʋ. Nɩɩ fʋ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ kɔɔlɛ mɛ mʋ, fʋ kɔɔlɛ ɔmʋnɩ o sun mɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔmʋnɩ ɔ gyɛ pii fanɛ kpini tɔ mʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ fanɛ tɔ ɔlala.”
42009049	Nɩɩ Gyɔn tɔwɛ sa Yesu yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ! An wu ɔnyɩn kʋ maa sʋ fʋ kɩtɩɩ ɛɛ gya nbwɩɩ libi. Ɩmʋ sʋ an gya mʋ lɩɩ kɩmʋ tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ man tii anɛ sʋ.”
42009050	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan man gya mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ tɔwɛ ee yii fanɛ mʋ, o tii fanɛ sʋ.”
42009051	Yesu kibwii kpee sʋsʋ saŋa maa tiri tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ nfɛɛrɛ, nɩɩ o yii sʋ kpee Gyerusalem.
42009052	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ nbɔɔ sun yɛ ba gyankpaa mʋ kpee Samariya kadɛ‐bi tɔ naa kʋʋla gyoo mʋ.
42009053	Amaa tʋtɔ asa mʋ ba man kɔɔlɛ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba dan be nyi maa kpee Gyerusalem nɩn.
42009054	Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ anyɔ, Gyemisi maa Gyɔn ba maa wu kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, fii biti fɛɛ a tɩɩ fʋlɔn lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba tuwa bamʋ abɛɛ?”
42009055	Amaa nɩɩ Yesu biliŋi kɩɩ bamʋ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Fanɛ katɔwɛ maŋa man bʋrɔn.”
42009056	Nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba lɩɩ tʋtɔ taa kpee kadɛ‐bi pʋpwɛ kʋ sʋ.
42009057	Ba maa naa ɔkpa tɔ bee kpee mʋ, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kʋ tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “N biti n buu fʋ kpee katɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fii kpee mʋ.”
42009058	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ yɛ, “Agboogboo bɛɛ dɛ ɩbɔ tɔ, nɩɩ nbwiibi ba sʋ nsʋswaa, amaa mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa bɩrɛ n man sʋ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n dɛ fʋʋtɛ.”
42009059	Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn kʋ mɔɔ yɛ, “Buu mɛ.” Amaa ɔnyɩn mʋ tɔwɛ Yesu nɩn yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, yɛgɛ n bwii kpee naa pula nsɛ pɔyɩ.”
42009060	Amaa Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Yɛgɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba du fɛɛ alewupu, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba man nyi Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ ba kpee naa pula bamʋ alewupu. Kɛ fɛɛ fʋ, fu kpee naa tɔwɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ asɩn.”
42009061	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kʋ mɔɔ bɩla yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ n biti n buu fʋ, amaa yɛgɛ kɛ n bwii kpee naa kala mɛ kɩkpaara sʋ asa kɛ n ba.”
42009062	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fii biliŋi fɩɩ kɩɩ kamaa mʋ, nɩɩ fʋ nfɛɛrɛ man dɛ katɩn kʋlʋn mʋ, fʋ man dagaa Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii.”
42010001	Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu lɛɛ asa adusunɔ yɛ anyɔ akʋ nɩɩ o sun bamʋ asa anyɔ‐anyɔ, yɛ ba gyankpaa mʋ kpee kadɛ kʋmaa yɛ katɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti o kpee mʋ.
42010002	Nɩɩ ɔ bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan yɛ, “Ndɔɔ tɔ atɔ sɔyɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa a tɩŋɛ mʋ ɩ kyɔ gaa, amaa atɩŋɛpʋ mʋ ba man kyɔ. Fan kʋlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kusun mʋ wuya, kɛ ɔ bɩya atɩŋɛpʋ ba tii su kɛ ba ba waa mu kusun mʋ.
42010003	Fan kpee, n sun fanɛ nɩn fɛɛ nbʋlʋpʋ‐bi ba maa kpee akuntun tɔ.
42010004	Fan man waa fan taa afulee abɛɛ adiikun abɛɛ asɩbɩta, kɛ fan man fwaala ɔkʋ ɔkpa tɔ.
42010005	Nɩɩ fan kan loo kɩkpaara kʋmaa sʋ mʋ, fan daa kɩtɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Keyuula kɩ ba kɩkpaara nɩmʋ sʋ.’
42010006	Nɩɩ keyuula nyɩmɩsa kan ɔ bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ, fanɛ keyuula ii biti ɔ ba mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ kanɩn mʋ, ii biti i bwii ba fanɛ sʋ.
42010007	Fan kyɩna kɩkpaara maŋa sʋ, kɛ fen gyii kɛ fen nuu kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba sa fanɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ osunpu kʋmaa kʋkɔka dagaa mʋ. Fan man ba fen loo fen loo akpaara‐akpaara sʋ.
42010008	“Nɩɩ kadɛ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fan loo kɩmʋ tɔ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ fanɛ mʋ, fan gyii agyitɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba sa fanɛ.
42010009	Fan kyɛ alɔpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kadɛ mʋ tɔ, kɛ fan tɔwɛ ɔkʋmaa yɛ, ‘Nbɩɩnbɩɩ, Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii ki tiri fanɛ tɔ.’
42010010	Amaa nɩɩ fan kan loo kadɛ kʋ tɔ nɩɩ ba man kɔɔlɛ fanɛ mʋ, fan lɩɩ kpee kadɛ mʋ agbenbi sʋ kɛ fan tɔwɛ yɛ,
42010011	‘An kpɩkpaa fanɛ kadɛ tɔ apurutiti mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ anɛ ayaa sʋ mʋ gbaa an wʋrɩgɛ fanɛ sʋ, kɛ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan waa mʋ, ɩ man bʋrɔn. Amaa fan baa fan nyi fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii ki tiri tɔ.’
42010012	Nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, katalɛ lala kakɛ mʋ, kadɛ maa kii biti kɩ nyɛ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ kɩ kyɔ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ ba Sodom kadɛ tɔ mʋ.”
42010013	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Korasin abi fanɛ laakʋ, Basayida abi fanɛ laakʋ, adangana mʋ nɩɩ n waa fanɛ asɛ falɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɩ daa ɩ gyɛ Taayi yɛ Sidon nɩɩ n waa kanɩn nɩn, naafɔɔ ba wʋla kyɩna kɛ ba dɩla ɩbɔɔta kɛ ba taa nsɔ bun bamʋ amu kɛ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ ba kyɛɛgɛ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ alibi tɔ.
42010014	Amaa katalɛ lala kakɛ mʋ, Taayi maa Sidon abi kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ mʋ ii biti ɩ baa ɩ bɔɔ fanɛ lɛɛ.
42010015	Fanɛ Kapanum abi, bee biti ba kukuri fanɛ kpee sʋsʋ nɩn abɛɛ? Ayee, bee biti ba bɩya fanɛ kasɛ kamandɛ.”
42010016	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o nu fanɛ asɛ mʋ, nu mɛ asɛ, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o kina fanɛ mʋ, o kina mɛ, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o kina mɛ mʋ, o kina ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ nɩn.”
42010017	Abɩɩlapʋ adusunɔ yɛ anyɔ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu sun mʋ ba bwii ba yɛ kensi‐gyii nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, fʋ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ nbwɩɩ libi gbaa ba bɩya bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ sa anɛ.”
42010018	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N wu Sɩtaanɛ maa lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba tɩyɛ kasɛ fɛɛ bʋlayɩ maa wɛɛ ɩsɛɛ mʋ.
42010019	N sa fanɛ ɔlʋn fɛɛ fen biti fan kyigya anansɛ yɛ ɩkyankpatɛ sʋ, kɛ fan nyɛ ɔlʋn fanɛ dʋn Sɩtaanɛ sʋ, nɩɩ sɛhn mɛɛ yɛ ɔ waa fanɛ.
42010020	Amaa fan man yɛgɛ ɩ waa fanɛ ɔkɔn fɛɛ n‐yaayu libi ba bɩya bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ sa fanɛ. Amaa fan yɛgɛ ɩ waa fanɛ ɔkɔn fɛɛ ba maa kyʋrɔɔ fanɛ atɩɩ yɩla Ɩbwaarɛ ayɛ.”
42010021	Kanɩn saŋa maŋa Yesu kɔkɔlɔ ki fuuli mʋ lɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Mɛ‐Sɛ, sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, n fwaala fʋ lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ taa atɔ nɩmʋ baala anyaasɩnpʋ yɛ ɩwʋlɛ anyipu sʋ, nɩɩ fʋ lɛɛ kaapʋ nbii wuribi. Nsɛ, fʋ kɩpɩrɛ sʋ nɩɩ fʋ waa ɩnɩmʋ.
42010022	“Mɛ‐Sɛ taa atɔ nɩmʋ kpini waa mɛ kɩbaa tɔ. Ɔkʋ mee nyi ɔmʋ nɩɩ mɛ, Obii mʋ n gyɛ, amɔɔ Ɔsɛ mʋ nkʋn, nɩɩ ɔkʋ mee nyi Ɔsɛ mʋ, amɔɔ bamʋ nɩɩ n biti n lɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ mʋ nkʋn i nyi Ɔsɛ mʋ.”
42010023	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu biliŋi tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ nkʋn yɛ, “Kumu ɔkɔn ɩ gyɛ sa fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan wu atɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan wu falɛ.
42010024	N bɩla n tɔwɛ fanɛ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ gaalaagaa yɛ awura, ba daa bee biti ba wu atɔ mu nɩɩ fen wu falɛ amaa ba man wu. Nɩɩ ba daa bee biti ba nu asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fen nu falɛ, amaa ba man nu ɩmʋ.”
42010025	Kakaakʋ nbara ɔkaapʋpʋ onyipu kʋ kʋsʋ ba Yesu asɛ o be nu mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ asɩn. Nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, mɩnɛ nɩɩ n biti n waa kɛ n nyɛ nkpa kakpaa?”
42010026	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ? Nɛnɛ nɩɩ fʋ kalɛ ɩmʋ nu kasɛ?”
42010027	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Taa fʋ kɔkɔlɔ yɛ fʋ kala yɛ fʋ ɔlʋn yɛ fʋ nfɛɛrɛ kpini biti fʋ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, kɛ fu biti fʋ tɔɔmaa fɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ.”
42010028	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ kyɛɛkyɛɛ sʋ. Waa ɩmʋ kɛ fʋ nyɛ nkpa.”
42010029	Amaa ɔnyɩn mʋ ii biti ɔ kaapʋ fɛɛ mʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi sʋ mʋ, ɔ taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Anɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mɛ tɔɔmaa?”
42010030	Nɩɩ Yesu kɔnɔ kɩlɛɛ tɔ mʋ, ɔ bɔɔ mʋ kɩŋasan yɛ, “Kakaakʋ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kʋ lɩɩ Gyerusalem ee kpee Gyeriko. Nɩɩ ɔ naa tɩyɛ kumu ɔlʋn tɔ ayu abaa tɔ, nɩɩ ba dayɩ mʋ dɩlɩgɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɩ san gbɛrɛɛ kɛ o wu nɩɩ ba yɛgɛ mʋ.
42010031	Ɩ ba fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ oseepu kʋ naa ɔkpa maŋa sʋ ɛɛ ba. Maa wu ɔnyɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kɩlɩgɛ taa ɔkpa mʋ kɩbaafʋn kyʋn yɛgɛ mʋ.
42010032	Kanɩn ɔkpa kʋlʋn maŋa nɩɩ Lewi‐nyɩn kʋ gbaa bɔla ba wu mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kɩlɩgɛ mʋ kyʋn.
42010033	Amaa Kasamariya‐nyɩn kʋ gbaa bɔla ɔkpa maŋa ba lɩɩ mʋ sʋ. Maa ba wu ɔnyɩn mʋ, ɩ kɩtaa mʋ kʋwɛɛ.
42010034	Nɩɩ Kasamariya‐nyɩn mʋ natɛ kpee mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ taa wayɩn nta kpayɩ mʋ ɩlɔ ana mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ waa kɩfɛ mʋ ɩlɔ mʋ tɔ nɩɩ o ŋmina ɩmʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ gyaga mʋ kuruma sʋ kpee kɩkpaara mʋ nɩɩ afɔ bee loo kɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kɩɩ mʋ sʋ.
42010035	Lɩɩkaakɛ, Kasamariya‐nyɩn mʋ maa biti ɔ kʋsʋ kpee mʋ, ɔ lɛɛ afulee sa afɔ kɩkpaara ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Kɩɩ ɔlɔpʋ nɩmʋ sʋ sa mɛ, nɩɩ fu kan nyita afulee akʋ tii ɩnɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ n kan bwii ba mʋ n biti n ba ka fʋ ɩmʋ kpini.’ ”
42010036	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ nbara ɔkaapʋpʋ mʋ yɛ, “To, fʋ asɛ mʋ, asa asá nɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, ɔmɔɔ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ mʋ tɔɔmaa ɩ gyɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ amu tɔ ɔlʋn ayu ba dayɩ mʋ mʋ?”
42010037	Nɩɩ nbara ɔkaapʋpʋ onyipu mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔmʋ nɩɩ o wu ɔnyɩn mʋ kʋwɛɛ mʋ.” Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ gbaa fʋ naa waa kanɩn.”
42010038	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ bee kpee mʋ, ba naa fʋʋ kadɛ‐bi kʋ. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Maata waa mʋ nsa‐nsa taa mʋ kpee mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ.
42010039	Maata sʋ osupu mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Mɛɛrɩ. Nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ naa kyɩna Yesu asɛ ee nu mʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ.
42010040	Amaa kanɩn asɩn mʋ ɩ tɔɔrɔɔ Maata lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ nkʋn ɩɩ dɩŋa afɔ mʋ agyitɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ ba Yesu asɛ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ, ɩ man tiri fʋ fɛɛ mi‐supu maa yɛgɛ mɛ nkʋn n waa kusun mʋ kpini? Tɔwɛ mʋ kɛ ɔ ba kyɛ mɛ tɔ.”
42010041	Nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Maata, Maata! Asɩn gaalaagaa ɩ tɔɔrɔɔ fʋ, nɩɩ i tiri fʋ.”
42010042	Amaa kʋtɔ kʋlʋn i tiri. Mɛɛrɩ lɛɛ kɩmʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋrɔn, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ yɛ ba taalɛ kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ lɩɩ mʋ abaa tɔ.
42011001	Kakaakʋ nɩɩ Yesu bʋ katɩn kʋ ɛɛ kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ. Maa lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, kaapʋ anɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Gyɔn kaapʋ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ.”
42011002	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kan fen biti fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ mʋ, fan tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, yɛgɛ asa ba bʋnyaa fʋ kɩtɩɩ, yɛgɛ fu kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩ ba kasɛ sʋ nfɩɩ.
42011003	Kɛ fʋ sa anɛ kakɛ kʋmaa agyitɔ gyisa.
42011004	Taa anɛ alibi kɛɛ anɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ anɛ gbaa anɛ an sʋ an kɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa anɛ alibi mʋ. Kɛ fʋ man yɛgɛ a loo kʋtʋʋ tɔ kɩɩ.’ ”
42011005	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “A taa fɛɛ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ kan kpee mʋ kyɛmɩnɛ asɛ kagyanbwɛ kiyiridi nsana yɛ, ‘Mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ, paala mɛ bodobodo asa.
42011006	Lɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ kʋ ɩ dan lɩɩ ɔkpa sʋ ba sʋgɛ mɛ sʋ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ. Nɩɩ mɛɛ mɛ n man sʋ sɛhn n sa mʋ kɛ o gyii.’
42011007	“A taa fɛɛ, mʋ kyɛmɩnɛ mʋ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ obu to yɛ, ‘Man tɔɔrɔɔ mɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ n tɩyɛ tii biri sʋ, nɩɩ maa mi‐bii ana an tɩyɛ dɛ, ɩmʋ sʋ n mɛɛ yɛ n bɩla taalɛ kʋsʋ sa fʋ sɛhn.’
42011008	N tɔwɛ fanɛ fɛɛ, nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ gyɛ kakyɛmɩnɛ nkʋn sʋ mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ kʋsʋ sa mʋ sɛhn. Amaa kpalɩ fɛɛ maa man sʋ ipeeli nɩɩ ɔ san ɔ maa sʋ ɛɛ kʋlɛ mʋ, ɩ waa nɛnɛ ee biti ɔ kʋsʋ sa mʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ i tiri sa mʋ mʋ.
