42011009	“Ɩmʋ sʋ n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, Fan kyaga sʋ fɛn kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, ee biti ɔ sa fanɛ, fan kyaga sʋ fen biti, fen biti fan nyɛ, fan kyaga sʋ fɛn da ɔpʋnʋ, ee biti o tigi sa fanɛ.
42011010	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kʋlɛ mʋ, bɛɛ sa mʋ, nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti mʋ, ɛɛ nyɛ, nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ da ɔpʋnʋ sʋ mʋ, bee tigi sa mʋ.
42011011	“Nɩɩ fanɛ tɔ ɔsɛ mɔɔ nɩɩ mu‐bii ɩɩ kʋlɛ mʋ ɔkɩn, nɩɩ ɛɛ taa kɩnansɛ sa mʋ?
42011012	Abɛɛ ɛɛ kʋlɛ fʋ kibesi kɛ fʋ kɩtaa kyankpatɩ sa mʋ?
42011013	Fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fɛn gyɛ alibi awaapʋ gbaa mʋ, fen nyi atɔ danbɩrasa kɩtaa sa fanɛ‐bii ana. Ɩ waa nɛnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fanɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ taa mʋ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba kʋlɛ mʋ mʋ?”
42011014	Kakaakʋ Yesu maa gya kabwɩɩ libi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ yɛgɛ nyɩmɩsa ɔ tɔwɛ. Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ kabwɩɩ libi mʋ lɩɩ mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ daa ɔ gyɛ naamuu mʋ, piili ɛɛ tɔwɛ. Nɩɩ i kyinkyin asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ.
42011015	Amaa asa mʋ tɔ akʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nbwɩɩ libi kpini kumu mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ Beelisebu mʋ, ɩɩ sa Yesu ɔlʋn nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ ɛɛ gya nbwɩɩ libi kanɩn mʋ.”
42011016	Nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba tʋʋ mʋ tɔ kɩɩ, lan tɔwɛ yɛ, nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ mʋ ɔlʋn maŋa lɩɩ mʋ, ɔ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa kɛ ba kɩɩ.
42011017	Amaa Yesu maa wʋla bɩɩ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ fɛ sʋ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Kuwura‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ barɩgɛ tɔ kɩɩ kɔ yɛ abaa mʋ, kɩ mɛɛ yɛ kɩ taalɛ yɩlɛ. Nɩɩ kɩkpaara mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ barɩgɛ tɔ kɩɩ kɔ yɛ abaa mʋ gbaa, kɩ mɛɛ yɛ kɩ taalɛ yɩlɛ.
42011018	Nɩɩ fɛɛ Sɩtaanɛ gbaa barɩgɛ tɔ kɩɩ kɔ yɛ kɩmʋ n‐yɩɩ mʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ kɩmʋ kuwura‐gyii ɩ taalɛ yɩlɛ? Lɩɩ fɛɛ fɛn tɔwɛ yɛ, Beelisebu ɔlʋn nɩɩ n sʋ n gya nbwɩɩ libi sʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ kanɩn.
42011019	Nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Beelisebu ɔlʋn nɩɩ n sʋ n gya nbwɩɩ libi mʋ, anɩmʋ ɔlʋn nɩɩ fanɛ abuupu bɩrɛ ba sʋ bɛɛ gya nbwɩɩ libi bɛɛ lɩɩ asa tɔ? Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ yɛgɛ kɛ fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ abuupu ba talɛ fanɛ fɛɛ fanɛ lɛɛ man dɛ ɔkpa.
42011020	Amaa nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔlʋn nɩɩ n sʋ n gya nbwɩɩ libi n lɩɩ asa tɔ mʋ, kɩmʋ ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii kɩ ba fanɛ asɛ.
42011021	“Fɛɛ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa bʋlʋnsa wʋla kʋʋla mʋ adʋntɔ ee kun mʋ kɩkpaara bɩrɛ, mʋ kapatɩyɛ kɩ dɛ sa mʋ bwahn.
42011022	Amaa fɛɛ nɩɩ ɔkʋ ɔlʋn ɩ kyɔ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ o tii mʋ waa tɔ taalɛ mʋ mʋ, ɛɛ kɔɔlɛ mʋ adʋntɔ mʋ nɩɩ mʋ tamaa gyan sʋ mʋ kpini, kɛ ɔ barɩgɛ mʋ kapatɩyɛ mʋ tɔ kɛɛ asa.
42011023	“Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man bʋ mɛ asɛ mʋ, ɛɛ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ mɛ sʋ nɩn, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ kʋʋla ɛɛ kyɛ mɛ tɔ mʋ, ɩɩ yaasɛ tɔ nɩn.”
42011024	“Fɛɛ nɩɩ kabwɩɩ libi kan lɩɩ nyɩmɩsa tɔ mʋ, ee kpee ɛɛ naa ɛɛ kyaabɔɔ ifuli sʋ ee biti ɔfʋʋtɛkpa. Nɩɩ ɔ man kan nyɛ mʋ, ɛɛ tɔwɛ sa mʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ, ‘N biti n bwii kpee mɛ kɩkpaara mʋ nɩɩ n lɩɩ kɩmʋ sʋ mʋ.’
42011025	Maa ba mʋ o be wu fɛɛ ba fɔgɛ kɩkpaara mʋ, lɔŋɔ kɩmʋ atɔ kʋmaa yɩla kyɛɛkyɛɛ.
42011026	Kɛ ɔ bɩla naa taa nbwɩɩ libi asunɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba libi ba kyɔ mʋ tii mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ, kɛ ba kpee naa kyɩna tʋtɔ. Kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ kanɩn nyɩmɩsa maŋa kakyɩna tɔ ki nyita ɩ kyɔ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ daa o du mʋ.”
42011027	Yesu maa tɔwɛ kanɩn mʋ, sakyɔ mʋ tɔ ɔkyɩɩ kʋ diyaa mʋ ɔbʋlɛ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa onyi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋʋgɛ fʋ, nɩɩ ɔ sa fʋ mʋ kɩnyapʋ‐kyu mʋ.”
42011028	Amaa Yesu lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba nu abwaarɛsɩn nɩɩ ba buu ɩmʋ mʋ.”
42011029	Asa mʋ ba maa nyɛ akyɔ bee tii sʋ mʋ, Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ndaga asa libi kakyɩna kanɩmʋ tɔ bɛɛ taasɛ bee biti asɩn kyinkyinsa, amaa mɛɛ yɛ n waa sɛhn sa bamʋ, amɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ Ɔtɔwɛpʋ Gyona lɛɛ mʋ.
42011030	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ Gyona kyɩna ɔ gyɛ sɩnkaala sa Ninewe abi mʋ, kanɩn maŋa sʋ nɩɩ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa gbaa n biti n ba waa Ɩbwaarɛ sɩnkaala sa ndaga asa kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ.
42011031	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ katalɛ akɛ mʋ, Owura kyɩɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɩna lɩɩ akpɩlɩgɛ mʋ, ii biti ɔ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ kɛ o bun ndaga kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ asa kʋpwɛ. Kpalɩ fɛɛ ɔ lɩɩ kata‐kata dulinyaa ɔkaa o be nu Solomon mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɩna ɔ gyɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ owura mʋ kanyaasɩn. Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ n kyɔ Owura Solomon mʋ.
42011032	Nɩɩ katalɛ akɛ mʋ Ninewe abi mʋ nɩɩ ba daa kyɩna dɩdaa mʋ, bee biti ba kʋsʋ yɩlɛ talɛ fanɛ ndaga asa nɩmʋ tɔ, kɛ ba bun fanɛ kʋpwɛ. Kpalɩ fɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Gyona tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn sa bamʋ mʋ, ba yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa. Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ n kyɔ Gyona mʋ.
42011033	“Ɔkʋ mee tuwa fɩtɩla ɔ sʋ ɛɛ yɩla katɩn mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ baala, abɛɛ ɔ taa waa kolobi tɔ. Amaa ɛɛ taa gyaga kɩmʋ ɔgyagakpa nɩn, kɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba ba tʋtɔ mʋ, ɩ baa ɩ kɩɩ bamʋ tɔ.
42011034	Fu ansi ɩ gyɛ fɩtɩla sa fʋ n‐yɩɩ. Nɩɩ fu ansi ɩ kan ɩ bʋrɔn mʋ, fʋ n‐yɩɩ kpini gbaa gyɛ fɩtɩla nɩn. Amaa nɩɩ fu ansi ɩ man kan ɩ bʋrɔn mʋ, fʋ n‐yɩɩ kpini gbaa bʋ kitentenbiri tɔ.
42011035	Kanɩn sʋ kɩɩ sʋ yɛ ɔdan, kɛ fɩtɩla mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ fʋ tɔ mʋ kɩ man biliŋi kitentenbiri.
42011036	Ɩmʋ sʋ fɛɛ nɩɩ fʋ n‐yɩɩ kpini gyɛ fɩtɩla, nɩɩ ɩmʋ kɩbaafʋn kʋ man gyɛ kitentenbiri mʋ, ii biti ɩ baa ɩ kɩɩ tɔ gaa, fɛɛ fɩtɩla maa kɩɩ tɔ kɩ ŋalɩgɛ fanɛ sʋ mʋ.”
42011037	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ lʋwɛ mʋ, Kafarasii‐nyɩn kʋ tɩɩ Yesu yɛ, ɔ ba kɛ maa mʋ ba bʋga gyii. Ɩmʋ sʋ o kpee nɩɩ maa mʋ ba naa bʋga bee gyii.
42011038	Amaa ɩ waa Kafarasii‐nyɩn mʋ kanankʋ, fɛɛ Yesu maa man fwɩɩ mʋ abaa fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ anaana tɔ ɩ kaapʋ mʋ pɔyɩ nɩɩ ee gyii.
42011039	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu mʋ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ Farasii abi falɛ nɩɩ fen du, fɛn fwɩɩ nwɛ‐bi yɛ ɩlapɛ nmaa, amaa kumu tɔ ɔlʋn yɛ kensi payɩ libi ɩ bɔla fanɛ tɔ.
42011040	Fanɛ amelensipu nɩmʋ! Fan man nyi fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ pɔyɩ kɩmʋ kamaa yɛ ɔtɔ tɔ mʋ, kpini asɩn i tiri sa mʋ?
42011041	Amaa fan taa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ fanɛ nwɛ‐bi yɛ ɩlapɛ mʋ tɔ sa atiripu, kɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa kɩnɩmʋ ɩ waa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ sa fanɛ.
42011042	“Fanɛ Farasii abi fanɛ laakʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan barɩgɛ fanɛ adɔɔ‐gyitɔ ntun kudu nɩɩ fan taa ketun kʋlʋn fɛn sa Ɩbwaarɛ. Amaa fan kina fen mee gyii asɩn ɩmʋ ɔkpa sʋ, nɩɩ fen mee biti Ɩbwaarɛ. Ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fan daa kɩwaa ɩnɩmʋ, kɛ fan taa ketun kʋlʋn mʋ sa Ɩbwaarɛ tii sʋ.
42011043	“Fanɛ Farasii abi fanɛ laakʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fen biti ɩkyɩnakpa kparɛ‐kparɛ Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩgyaŋɛkpa, nɩɩ fen biti bɛɛrɛɛ afwaala agya tɔ ipula.
42011044	“Fanɛ laakʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fen du nɩn fɛɛ nkyan mʋ nɩɩ ba man daasɛ ɩmʋ fɛɛ nkyan, nɩɩ asa ba naa ɩmʋ sʋ yɛgɛ ba man nyi fɛɛ ɩ gyɛ nkyan.”
42011045	Nɩɩ nbara ɔkaapʋpʋ onyipu kʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, ɩmʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ tɔwɛ falɛ mʋ, fɩɩ saalɛ anɛ gbaa anɛ tii sʋ.”
42011046	Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fanɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ anyipu, fanɛ laakʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan taa ɩsʋla budusa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋsɩn kasʋla mʋ sʋla asa. Nɩɩ fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ fan mɛɛ taa kɩbaa‐bi kʋlʋn gbaa kyɛ bamʋ tɔ.
42011047	“Fanɛ laakʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan pɔyɩ nkyan sa Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ, nɩɩ fanɛ naana ana ɩ gyɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba mɔɔ bamʋ mʋ.
42011048	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ lɛɛ kaapʋ kesintin fɛɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ naana ana ba waa mʋ, fan kɔɔlɛ kyula. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba mɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ mɔɔ fan pɔyɩ bamʋ nkyan.
42011049	Lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ lɩɩ mʋ kanyaasɩn tɔ yɛ, ‘N biti n sun mɛ atɔwɛpʋ yɛ mi asunpu ba kpee bamʋ asɛ, kɛ ba mɔɔ mɛ asa mʋ akʋ kɛ ba nyanla asansa.’
42011050	Ɩmʋ sʋ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ dɛ sa asa mʋ nɩɩ ba mɔɔ mʋ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba kyɩna kasɛ sʋ lɩɩ koo dulinyaa npiili mʋ, ee biti ɔ taa kanɩn kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ mʋ bɩɩtɛ ndaga asa libi kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ.
42011051	Asa mʋ nɩɩ ba mɔɔ lɩɩ Abeli sʋ naa fʋʋ Sakariya mʋ nɩɩ ba mɔɔ mʋ kaswɩɩ yɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ nsana mʋ, n tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ taa amɔɔpʋ mʋ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ mʋ ɔ bɩɩtɛ fanɛ ndaga kakyɩna tɔ asa libi banɩmʋ.
42011052	“Fanɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ anyipu, fanɛ laakʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan taa ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ asa bee biti ba bɔla sʋ bɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ baala. Nɩɩ fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ fan man naa ɔkpa maa sʋ, nɩɩ fen tii bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba natɛ kɩmʋ sʋ mʋ ɔkpa.”
42011053	Yesu maa lɩɩ tʋtɔ mʋ, nɩɩ Farasii abi yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ ba piili bɛɛ pwɩɩ mʋ kenken, yɛgɛ bɛɛ taasɛ mʋ asɩn lɩɩ atɔ gaalaagaa sʋ,
42011054	yɛgɛ ba gyoo fɛɛ bee biti ba nyɛ mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ asɩn tɔwɛsa akʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man dagaa kɛ ba kɩtaa mʋ.
42012001	Saŋa maŋa tɔ mʋ, asa mʋ ba maa nyɛ akyɔ bee tii sʋ, halɩɩ bee kyigya abaa ayaa sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu piili ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ gyankpaa ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan baa fan da fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ lɩɩ Farasii abi kebunbun ansi wuya ana sʋ. Bamʋ akaapʋsa i du nɩn fɛɛ bodobodo kɩfɛ tinsa.
42012002	Kʋtɔ kʋ man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ kɩ baala yɛgɛ ba mɛɛ yɛ ba bɩɩ, abɛɛ asiri kʋ man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ lɩɩ ifuli.
42012003	Ɩmʋ sʋ asɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ kitentenbiri tɔ mʋ, kayɩ kakɛ mʋ ii biti ɩ lɩɩ ifuli, nɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fu‐kuli waa kʋsʋ tɔ obu to mʋ, bee biti ba taa ɩmʋ da kibonbon.”
42012004	Nɩɩ Yesu kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana, fan man sɩlɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ taalɛ mɔɔ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ, nɩɩ ɩmʋ kamaa mʋ ba mɛɛ bɩla taalɛ waa kɩmʋ sɛhn.
42012005	Amaa n biti n kaapʋ fanɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa yɛ fan sɩlɛ. Fan sɩlɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ mɔɔ fanɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kɛ ɔ bɩla taa fanɛ waa fʋlɔn tɔ. N tɔwɛ fanɛ fan sɩlɛ mʋ.
42012006	“Afɩnɛ ɩ gyɛ langba kɩgya? Kobo anyɔ ɩ taalɛ sɔɔ bamʋ anuu. Amaa n mɛɛ tan bamʋ ɔkʋ sʋ.
42012007	Halɩɩ fanɛ kumu tɔ inyini kpini gbaa Ɩbwaarɛ nyi ɩmʋ kɔnɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ fan man waa kufuu, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan gyɛ akparɩ fan kyɔ alangba ngbɩn‐ngbɩn.
42012008	“N tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ sakyɔ tɔ yɛ ɔ gyɛ mɛ lɛɛ mʋ, mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa gbaa n biti n tɔwɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ ansi tɔ yɛ ɔ gyɛ mɛ lɛɛ.
42012009	Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o kina mɛ sakyɔ tɔ mʋ, ngbaa mɛ n biti n kina mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ ansi tɔ.
42012010	“Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn libi ee yii mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ɩɩ taalɛ taa kɛɛ mʋ, amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn libi ee yii Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ taa kɛɛ mʋ.
42012011	“Nɩɩ ba kan bɩya fanɛ Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa abɩlɩsa, abɛɛ awura abɛɛ ɔsʋwʋlɛ alʋnpʋ ansi tɔ mʋ, fan man kan fɛ nfɛɛrɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan lɛɛ fanɛ asɩn mʋ kɔnɔ, abɛɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fan tɔwɛ.
42012012	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ii biti ɔ kaapʋ fanɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fan tɔwɛ saŋa maŋa.”
42012013	Nɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, tɔwɛ sa mɛ‐daa kɛ ɔ yɛgɛ maa mʋ a barɩgɛ kapatɩyɛ mʋ nɩɩ anɛ‐sɛ wu yɛgɛ sa anɛ mʋ.”
42012014	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn, anɩmʋ i yii mɛ asɩn ogyipu abɛɛ kapatɩyɛ ɔbarɩgɛpʋ?”
42012015	Nɩɩ ɔ kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kɩɩ danbɩrasa kɛ fan baa fan da fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ lɩɩ kensi payɩ libi sʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa nkpa man gyɛ mʋ atɔ damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ.”
42012016	Nɩɩ ɔ bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan kɩnɩmʋ yɛ, “Afulee wuya kʋ sʋ ndɔɔ nɩɩ kɩ waa agyitɔ gaa.
42012017	Ɔnyɩn mʋ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ, ‘Nɛnɛ nɩɩ n biti n waa? N man sʋ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n taa mɛ agyitɔ anɩmʋ kpini waa.’
42012018	“Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Falɛ nɩɩ n biti n waa. N biti n nyita mɛ agyitɔ ɩwaakpa mʋ, kɛ n lɔŋɔ waa ɩmʋ alala‐alala. Kɛ n taa mɛ adɔɔ‐gyitɔ yɛ mɛ atɔ kpini waa tʋtɔ.
42012019	Nɩɩ n biti n tɔwɛ sa mɛ n‐yɩɩ yɛ, “Fʋ sʋ atɔ damantɛ nɩɩ ɩ dɛ sa fʋ nsu‐nsu. Kanɩn sʋ fʋʋtɛ kɛ fu gyii, kɛ fu nuu kɛ fu gyii fu ansi.” ’
42012020	“Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Omelensipu nɩmʋ, kagyanbwɛ nɩmʋ fʋ nkpa ii biti ɩ lɩɩ fʋ abaa tɔ. Nɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ kʋʋla sa fʋ n‐yɩɩ yɩla mʋ ii biti i biliŋi anɩmʋ lɛɛ?’ ”
42012021	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kʋʋla atɔ ɛɛ yɩla ɛɛ sa mʋ n‐yɩɩ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ bɩrɛ ɔ man gyɛ atɔ wuya, falɛ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ waa mʋ.”
42012022	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ yɛ, “Kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, fan man fɛ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ kakyɩna kanɩmʋ tɔ atɔ tirisa fɛɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan gyii, abɛɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan nyɛ bun fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ.
42012023	Nkpa i tiri ɩ kyɔ agyitɔ, kanɩn nɩɩ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ gbaa ki tiri kɩ kyɔ atɔ bunsa.
42012024	Fan taa fanɛ ansi kɩɩ nbwiibi, ba mɛɛ duu nɩɩ ba mɛɛ tɩŋɛ, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ sʋ abu kɛ ba kʋʋla bamʋ agyitɔ yɩla, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ ɩɩ kɩɩ bamʋ sʋ. Fan man gyɛ akparɩ fan kyɔ nbwiibi?
42012025	Fanɛ anɩmʋ lɩɩ mʋ kayɩyɛɛ sʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ taa kakɛ kʋlʋn tii mʋ nkpa sʋ?
42012026	Nɩɩ fan maa mɛɛ taalɛ waa atɔ pii anɩmʋ mʋ, mɩnɛ waa nɩɩ fɛn yɩyɛɛ asansa sʋ?
42012027	“Fan kɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ iyu ntʋtʋlɛ i du, i mee sun nɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ lʋʋ ataa ɩ sa ɩmʋ n‐yɩɩ. Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ fɛɛ, Owura lala Solomon maa mʋ atɔ danbɩrasa kpini gbaa mʋ, ɔ man taalɛ nyɛ atɔ bunsa danbɩrasa fɛɛ ntʋtʋlɛ mʋ.
42012028	Fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii pii wuya ana, nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ gyɛ falɛ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ i bun afitiri tɔ ntʋtʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ tɔ ndaga kɛ ɔkɛ ba taa tʋʋ fʋlɔn tɔ mʋ, mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ sa fanɛ atɔ bunsa?
42012029	Fan man yɛgɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ ɩ baa ɩ gyan atɔ mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan gyii abɛɛ fan nuu mʋ sʋ, fan man yɛgɛ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ tɔɔrɔɔ fanɛ.
42012030	Lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba mɛɛ sun Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, ɩ fɛ ɩnɩmʋ ana kpini nfɛɛrɛ. Nɩɩ fanɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nyi fɛɛ ɩnɩmʋ ana kpini i tiri fanɛ.
42012031	Amaa fan kɩɩ biti Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ, kɛ ɔ sa fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ kpini tii sʋ.”
42012032	Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kʋbʋ pii, fan man waa kufuu, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ bɔla fanɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi fɛɛ ɔ waa fanɛ awura‐bii mu kuwura‐gyii tɔ.
42012033	Fan fɛ fanɛ npatɩyɛ kpini, kɛ fan taa afulee mʋ sa atiripu. Fan nyɛ afulee mʋ nɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ lʋwɛ mʋ yɩla sʋsʋ, ntɩn mʋ nɩɩ oyu mɛɛ yɛ ɔ taalɛ nin tiri tɔ, nɩɩ tabɩrɩta mɛɛ taalɛ nyita ɩmʋ mʋ.
42012034	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ntɩn mʋ nɩɩ fʋ kapatɩyɛ kɩ bʋ mʋ, tʋtɔ nɩɩ fʋ kɔkɔlɔ gbaa kɩ bʋ.
42012035	“Fan kʋʋla fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kɩrɩsʋ fan gyoo, kɛ fan yɛgɛ fanɛ ɩfɩtɩla ɩ baa ɩ kɩɩ tɔ.
42012036	Fɛɛ ayaafɔlɛ ba maa gyoo bamʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ɔ lɩɩ kɩkyɩɩfɔ tɔ ba, nɩɩ ɔ kan ba da kebunɔ mʋ, kɛ ba nyɛ tigi mʋ bilen.
42012037	Ayaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ba tu bamʋ yɛgɛ ba tɛ ba gyoo mʋ, bamʋ ansi ii biti i gyii. N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ ee biti ɔ kʋʋla mʋ n‐yɩɩ kɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ ɔ taa agyitɔ naa yii bamʋ kɛ ba gyii.
42012038	Ayaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ba tu bamʋ kagyanbwɛ kiyiridi nsana abɛɛ kɩbwayɩkɛ yɛgɛ ba kʋʋla ba gyoo mʋ mʋ, bamʋ ansi ii biti i gyii.
42012039	Amaa fan baa fen nyi fɛɛ, nɩɩ kɩkpaara wuya daa o nyi saŋa mʋ nɩɩ oyu ii biti o be yuuri nɩn, naafɔɔ ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ yɛgɛ ba be boyi loo mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ.
42012040	Ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan kʋʋla fanɛ n‐yɩɩ fan gyoo. Lɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n biti n ba saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fan mɛɛ fɛ mɛ kɩba mʋ nfɛɛrɛ.”
42012041	Nɩɩ Pita taasɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, anɛ nɩɩ fɩɩ bɔɔ kɩŋasan kanɩmʋ fɩɩ sa abɛɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ?”
42012042	Nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ bɩrɛ ɩ gyɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kesintin yɛ kanyaasɩn? Mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋnɩ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ taa mʋ ayaafɔlɛ waa mʋ abaa tɔ, yɛ ɔ sa bamʋ agyitɔ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa.
42012043	Kensi‐gyii ɩ gyɛ sa kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ba tu mʋ yɛgɛ ɛɛ waa kanɩn.
42012044	N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ mʋ ii biti ɔ taa mʋ kapatɩyɛ kpini‐kpini waa mʋ abaa tɔ.
42012045	Amaa a taa fɛɛ nɩɩ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ kan tɔwɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ, ‘Mɛ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ii biti ɔ kyɛɛrɛɛ!’ Nɩɩ o piili ɛɛ dayɩ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ayaafɔlɛ yɛ abite, nɩɩ ee gyii nɩɩ ee nuu bʋʋ bɩrɛ,
42012046	kanɩn kɩyaafɔlɛ maŋa mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ii biti o be purigi mʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ee biti ɔ ba, yɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man nyi sʋ. Mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ mʋ biti ɔ tɩŋɛ mʋ kʋkyʋkyʋʋ, kɛ ɔ bɩɩtɛ mʋ kʋsʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ bɩɩtɛ asʋ tɔ ɔlʋn wuya ana kʋsʋ mʋ.
42012047	“Kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ o nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ii biti, nɩɩ ɔ man kʋʋla mʋ n‐yɩɩ ɔ waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ee biti mʋ, bee biti ba tɩŋɛ mʋ kʋkyʋkyʋʋ gaa.
42012048	Amaa ɔmʋnɩ ɔ man nyi nɩɩ ɔ waa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ mʋ, bee biti ba tɩŋɛ mʋ pii. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba sa mʋ gaa mʋ, bee biti ba kɔɔlɛ gaa lɩɩ mʋ asɛ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba taa gaa waa mʋ kɩbaa tɔ mʋ, bee biti ba kɔɔlɛ kʋkyɔ lɩɩ mʋ asɛ.”
42012049	“N ba nɩn yɛ n ba yɛgɛ fʋlɔn ɔ dɛɛ kasɛ sʋ, naafɔɔ n daa n biti gbaa fɛɛ fʋlɔn mʋ tɛɛ ɩ dɛɛ.
42012050	Awʋrʋfɔ lala ii biti i munla mɛ, nɩɩ ɩ tɔɔrɔɔ mɛ gaa fɛɛ ɩ ba kɛ ɩ ba kyʋn.
42012051	Fen nyi fɛɛ keyuula nɩɩ n bɩya kasɛ sʋ? Ayee, n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ nbarɩgɛ tɔ nɩɩ n bɩya.
42012052	Lɩɩ ndaga ɩ sʋ ii kpee mʋ, kɩkpaara kʋlʋn sʋ mʋ, asa anuu bee biti ba barɩgɛ tɔ yɛ abaa, kɛ asa asá ba kɔ yɛ asa anyɔ, kɛ asa anyɔ ba kɔ yɛ asa asá.
42012053	Nbarɩgɛ tɔ ii biti ɩ ba ɔsɛ yɛ obii‐nyɩnsa nsana, obii‐nyɩnsa yɛ ɔsɛ nsana, onyi yɛ obii‐kyɩɩsa nsana, obii‐kyɩɩsa yɛ onyi nsana, ɔsaa‐kyɩɩsa yɛ ɔsaa nsana, ɔsaa yɛ ɔsaa‐kyɩɩsa nsana.”
42012054	Yesu tɔwɛ sakyɔ mʋ yɛ, “Saŋa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fen wu kabwaarɛ wʋlɛ maa gyaga kyɔwɛ kɩtɩyɛ mʋ, opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ fɛn tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Bʋlayɩ ii biti ɔ daa,’ nɩɩ ɛɛ daa.
42012055	Nɩɩ afuu a daa a lɩɩ akpɩlɩgɛ mʋ fɛn tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Kududuu kii biti kɩ waa,’ nɩɩ ɩ waa.
42012056	Fanɛ kebunbun ansi wuya ana fɛn taalɛ fɛn kɩɩ kasɛ yɛ sʋsʋ fɛn kaapʋ ɩmʋ kasɛ. Nɩɩ mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fɛn mɛɛ taalɛ bɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩɩ waa nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ kasɛ?
42012057	“Mɩnɛ waa nɩɩ fɛn mɛɛ taalɛ talɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ bɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋrɔn kɛ fan waa?
42012058	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan pwɩɩ fʋ, nɩɩ faa mʋ fen kpee asɩn ogyikpa mʋ, kpan fʋ n‐yɩɩ kɛ faa mʋ fan tɔwɛ lɔŋɔ abaa ɔkpa tɔ pɔyɩ kɛ fan fʋʋ tʋtɔ. Nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ kanɩn bɩrɛ, ee biti ɔ taa fʋ naa sa asɩn ogyipu kɛ o bun fʋ kʋpwɛ, kɛ ɔ taa fʋ naa sa obu otiipu, kɛ mɔɔ mʋ ɔ taa fʋ naa tii obu.
42012059	N tɔwɛ fʋ fɛɛ fii biti fu sii obu maŋa tɔ, naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fii biti fʋ ka kʋkɔ mʋ kpini‐kpini.”
42013001	Kanɩn saŋa maŋa tɔ asa akʋ ba ba tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ Galile abi akʋ ba taa atɔbwaaya ba bɛɛ lɛɛ saraga bɛɛ sa kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ Paleti yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba mɔɔ bamʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ nkalan ɩ bʋga yɛ atɔbwaaya nkalan maa tɔ.
42013002	Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan nyi fɛɛ kanɩn Galile abi maŋa awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba gyii mʋ, ɩ kaapʋ nɩɩ fɛɛ ba gyɛ alibi awaapʋ ba kyɔ Galile abi kpini?
42013003	Ayee! N tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ nɩɩ fan man kan lɛɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ alibi tɔ bɩrɛ, fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fen biti fan wu fɛɛ bamʋ.
42013004	Abɛɛ asa kudu aburuwa mʋ nɩɩ Silon kɩbansʋrʋ kyɩna tɩyɛ bamʋ sʋ nɩɩ ba wu mʋ, ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ bamʋ ɩ kyɩna waa alibi ba kyɔ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyerusalem kpini saŋa maŋa?
42013005	Ayee! N tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ nɩɩ fan man kan lɛɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ alibi tɔ bɩrɛ, fanɛ gbaa fanɛ kpini fen biti fan wu fɛɛ bamʋ.”
42013006	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan nɩmʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn kʋ ɩ kyɩna duu figi oyu mʋ kʋdɔɔ tɔ, nɩɩ o kpee ɔ naa biti kɩmʋ abi amaa ɔ man nyɛ.
42013007	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ kʋdɔɔ mʋ sʋ yɛ, ‘Ɩ waa fɛɛ nsu nsa ndee n maa ba n ba biti abi oyu nɩmʋ sʋ yɛgɛ n mɛɛ nyɛ. Ŋɛ kɩmʋ tʋʋ! Mɩnɛ nɩɩ kɩ yɩlɛ kɩ waa kasɛ nɩmʋ sʋ?’
42013008	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ yɛgɛ kɩmʋ kɛ kɩ yɩlɛ kesu kʋlʋn tii sʋ. N biti n kuu kyaabɔɔ kɩmʋ kɛ n waa kɩmʋ atɔbwaaya ibini.’
42013009	Nɩɩ kɩ kan sɔyɩ abi kesu kakʋ mʋ, ɩ bʋrɔn, nɩɩ kɩ kan kɩ man sɔyɩ bɩrɛ kɛ fʋ ŋɛ kɩmʋ tʋʋ.”
42013010	Kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ kʋ Yesu ɩ kaapʋ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa kʋ.
42013011	Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ kabwɩɩ libi ki biliŋaa mʋ waa boobi nsu kudu aburuwa mʋ bʋ tʋtɔ. Kabwɩɩ libi mʋ bɩɩtɛ mʋ muŋa nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ tɛɛŋɛ tɔ kpini‐kpini.
42013012	Yesu maa wu mʋ mʋ, ɔ tɩɩ mʋ ba ansi tɔ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkyɩɩ, fʋ nyɛ alanfɩya.”
42013013	Nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ abaa gyaga mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ opula maŋa tɔ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ kyiigi tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ.
42013014	Lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Yesu kyɛ ɔlɔpʋ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ nyɛ agbʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ asa mʋ yɛ, “Nkɛ nsiye ɩ gyɛ kusun nkɛ, ɩmʋ sʋ fan ba kanɩn nkɛ maŋa tɔ kɛ ba kyɛ fanɛ alɔ, man gyɛ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ.”
42013015	Nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fanɛ kebunbun ansi wuya ana! Fanɛ anɩmʋ ɩ mɛɛ saaŋɛ mʋ naatɛ‐nyɩnsa abɛɛ mu kuruma kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ, nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ sʋ mʋ ee kpee ɛɛ sa mʋ nkyu?
42013016	Ɔkyɩɩ nɩmʋ gyɛ Abraham kanaana‐bii mʋ nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ ŋmina mʋ nsu kudu aburuwa. Mɩnɛ waa nɩɩ ɩ man dagaa maa nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki nyita mʋ sʋ?”
42013017	Maa tɔwɛ falɛ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ipeeli ɩ kɩtaa mʋ akisipu kpini. Amaa asa mʋ bɩrɛ ansi i gyii lɩɩ adangana damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ sʋ.
42013018	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ ki du? Mɩnɛ nɩɩ n biti n taa kɩmʋ kaala?
42013019	Ki du nɩn fɛɛ gowa kibi mʋ nɩɩ ɔdɔɔpʋ taa du mʋ kʋdɔɔ tɔ nɩɩ kɩ dan biliŋi oyu, nɩɩ nbwiibi bɛɛ ba bɛɛ kyɩna kɩmʋ n‐yaabi sʋ.”
42013020	Nɩɩ ɔ bɩlaa bwii taasɛ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ n biti n taa Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kaala?
42013021	Ki du nɩn fɛɛ kɩfɛ tinsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ taa bʋga kyagɩlɛ bodobodo nnyifo damantɛ tɔ, kɛ kɩfɛ tinsa mʋ ɩɩ yɛgɛ nnyifo maŋa kpini i tin.”
42013022	Nɩɩ Yesu maa kpee Gyerusalem mʋ, ɔ bɔla ndɛ yɛ ndɛ‐bii mʋ sʋ ɛɛ kaapʋ abwaarɛsɩn.
42013023	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, amɔɔ asa gbɛrɛɛ ii biti ba ba nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ?” Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ,
42013024	“Fan kpan fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kenken kɛ fan bɔla kebunɔ‐bii mʋ tɔ loo to. N tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ asa gaalaagaa bee biti ba kpan bamʋ n‐yɩɩ, amaa ba mɛɛ yɛ ba taalɛ.
42013025	Nɩɩ kɩkpaara wuya kan kʋsʋ tii kebunɔ mʋ, fen biti fan ba yɩlɛ kewusunɔ fen daa ɔpʋnʋ yɛgɛ fɛn kʋlɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ tigi kebunɔ sa anɛ.’ “Amaa ee biti ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘N man nyi fanɛ, n man nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ fan lɩɩ.’
42013026	“Fen biti fan tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Anaa fʋ ɩ bʋga gyii, nɩɩ an bʋga nuu, nɩɩ fʋ kaapʋ anɛ ndɛ tɔ.’
42013027	Amaa ee biti ɔ tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ‘N man nyi fanɛ abɛɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ fan lɩɩ. Fanɛ alibi awaapʋ kpini fan lɩɩ mɛ asɛ!’
42013028	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan wu Abraham maa Isaki yɛ Gyekobu yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ kpini, ba maa bʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ fan man nyɛ ɔkpa loo to mʋ, tʋtɔ nɩɩ fen biti fan su kɛ fan wɛ fanɛ anyi tɔ.
42013029	Asa bee biti ba lɩɩ kyɔwɛ kɩlɩɩ yɛ kyɔwɛ kɩtɩyɛ, kɛ akʋ ba lɩɩ adii yɛ akpɩlɩgɛ, kɛ ba ba kyɩna bamʋ ɩkyɩnakpa Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii kensi‐gyii ngyaŋɛ mʋ tɔ.
42013030	N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kamaa mʋ akʋ, bee biti ba ba gyankpaa, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyankpaa mʋ mɔɔ akʋ bee biti ba sii kamaa.”
42013031	Saŋa maŋa tɔ nɩɩ Farasii abi akʋ ba ba Yesu asɛ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Lɩɩ nfɩɩ kpee katɩn kʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Owura Herodi ii biti fɛɛ ɔ mɔɔ fʋ.”
42013032	Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan kpee naa tɔwɛ kanɩn gboogboo mʋ yɛ, n biti n gya nbwɩɩ libi kɛ n kyɛ asa ndaga yɛ ɔkɛ kɛ kakɛ sasapʋ mʋ n lʋwɛ mɛ kusun.”
42013033	Nɩɩ kanan kʋmaa sʋ mʋ, ɩ dagaa fɛɛ n maa kyaga mɛ ɔkpa sʋ n kpee ndaga yɛ ɔkɛ yɛ kakɛ sasapʋ. Ɩ waa nɛnɛ, Gyerusalem ɩ gyɛ kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba mɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ.
42013034	“O Gyerusalem abi, Gyerusalem abi, fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan mɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ, nɩɩ fan tʋʋ bamʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sun fanɛ asɛ mʋ abuu. N kpan mɛ n‐yɩɩ saŋa kʋmaa fɛɛ n kʋʋla fanɛ waa mɛ ɔtɔ tɔ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ kakyaasɛ‐nyi maa bʋga mu‐bii ana mʋ atɛɛ tɔ mʋ. Amaa fan mɛɛ sa mɛ ɔkpa!”
42013035	Kɩɩ, fanɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ kii biti ki sii kɩ dɛ kɩkpan sa fanɛ. N tɔwɛ fanɛ, fanɛ man bɩla yɛ fan wu mɛ kakɛ akʋ, naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa ɔmʋnɩ ɔ ba Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ.”
42014001	Ɩ baa fɛɛ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa kʋ nɩɩ Yesu kpee Farasii abi ɔbɩlɩsa kʋ ayɛ ɔ naa gyii, yɛgɛ bɛɛ pɛɛtɛ mʋ fɛɛ ee biti o nyita Gyiwu abi nbara mʋ.
42014002	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kʋ bʋ mu ansi tɔ tʋtɔ, ɛɛ lɔɔ kyankpan.
42014003	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ anyipu mʋ ba maa Farasii abi mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkpa dɛ fɛɛ a kyɛ ɔkʋ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ abɛɛ a man kyɛ?”
42014004	Amaa ba man tɔwɛ sɛhn nɩɩ Yesu kɩtaa ɔnyɩn mʋ, kyɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ natɛ.
42014005	Nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fɛɛ nɩɩ fanɛ ɔkʋ sʋ kebii abɛɛ naatɛ‐nyɩnsa nɩɩ ɔ tɩyɛ kitiribo tɔ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ mʋ, fʋ mɛɛ yɛ fʋ lɛɛ mʋ?”
42014006	Amaa ba man taalɛ lɛɛ ɩmʋ kɔnɔ.
42014007	Yesu maa wu fɛɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba tɩɩ bamʋ ogyikpa mʋ bɛɛ ŋmaarɛ ɩkyɩnakpa kparɛ‐kparɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan nɩmʋ yɛ,
42014008	“Fɛɛ nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan tɩɩ fʋ mʋ kɩkyɩɩfɔ tɔ mʋ, man naa kyɩna ɔkyɩnakpa kparɛ, akʋtɔ fɛɛ ɔ tɩɩ ɔsa kparɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɩla ɔ kyɔ fʋ.
42014009	Kɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ faa mʋ mʋ, ɔ ba tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ, ‘Taa fʋ kagya sa ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ.’ Tʋtɔ nɩɩ fii biti fʋ taa ipeeli naa kyɩna katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ.
42014010	Amaa nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan tɩɩ fʋ mʋ, naa kyɩna katɩn mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ, kɛ ɔ ba tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ, ‘Kyɛmɩnɛ, ba kyɩna kagya kparɛ sʋ nfɩɩ.’ Saŋa mʋ, fɩɩ nyɛ bɛɛrɛɛ lɩɩ fʋ tɔɔmaa ana mʋ nɩɩ ɔ da kɩbaa tɩɩ mʋ asɛ.
42014011	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋsaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋsʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ bɩya mʋ kasɛ, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɩya mʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ kʋsaa mʋ sʋsʋ.”
42014012	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ mʋ, mɔɔ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fʋ kan tɩɩ asa yɛ ba be gyii kakyʋwapɛ abɛɛ kalaatɩpwɛ agyitɔ mʋ, man kan waa fʋ tɩɩ fʋ kyɛmɩnɛ ana abɛɛ fʋ‐daa abɛɛ fʋ kʋʋpʋ ana abɛɛ afulee wuya ana mʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ tiri fʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ fʋ kan waa kanɩn mʋ, akʋtɔ fɛɛ bee biti ba tɩɩ fʋ gbaa fʋ ba bamʋ lɛɛ tɔ kɛ ɩ ka fʋ kʋkɔ.
42014013	Amaa nɩɩ fʋ kan dɩŋa kensi‐gyii agyitɔ mʋ, tɩɩ atiripu yɛ aboobi yɛ amʋgʋlɛ‐mʋgʋlɛ yɛ agyaatanapʋ,
42014014	kɛ fʋ nyɛ kusee, lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ ɩ mɛɛ taalɛ ka fʋ kʋkɔ. Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ ka fʋ kʋkɔ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ akyɩrɛkyɩrɛpʋ bee biti ba kʋsʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ.”
42014015	Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ maa bamʋ ba tɛ bee gyii mʋ ɔkʋ maa nu asɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Kusee ɩ gyɛ nyɩmɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti o gyii Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ.”
42014016	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn kʋ ɩ dɩŋa kensi‐gyii agyitɔ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ asa damantɛ yɛ ba be gyii.
42014017	Saŋa mʋ maa fʋʋ fɛɛ ba be gyii mʋ, nɩɩ o sun mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ yɛ ɔ naa tɔwɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ bamʋ mʋ yɛ, ba waa kʋtɔ kʋmaa lʋwɛ, ɩmʋ sʋ ba ba.
42014018	“Nɩɩ bamʋ kpini ba piili bɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn bɛɛ lɛɛ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ. Ɔgyankpaapʋ mʋ yɛ, ‘N dan sɔɔ kasɛ nɩn, nɩɩ ɩ daaga fɛɛ n naa kɩɩ kɩmʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ n kʋlɛ fʋ nɩn n mɛɛ yɛ n taalɛ ba.’
42014019	“Nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɔɔ yɛ, ‘N dan sɔɔ ɩnaatɛ‐nyɩnsa kudu nɩn, nɩɩ n dan kpee n naa taa bamʋ dɔɔ kɩɩ, ɩmʋ sʋ n mɛɛ yɛ n taalɛ ba.’
42014020	“Nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɔɔ bɩla yɛ, ‘N dan kili ɔkyɩɩ nɩn, n mɛɛ yɛ n taalɛ ba.’
42014021	“Nɩɩ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ taa asɩn mʋ ba tɔwɛ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ. Nɩɩ kɩkpaara wuya mʋ nyɛ agbʋ, nɩɩ ɔ sa mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Bilen, kpee kadɛ mʋ tɔ agbenbi sʋ yɛ ɩkpa‐bi naa bɩya atiripu yɛ aboobi yɛ agyaatanapʋ yɛ amʋgʋlɛ‐mʋgʋlɛ wuya ana.’
42014022	“Ɩ man kyɛɛrɛɛ nɩɩ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ n waa fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sa kɔnɔ mʋ, amaa ɩkyɩnakpa san ɩ bʋ tɔ.’
42014023	“Nɩɩ ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ bwii tɔwɛ mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ yɛ, ‘Kpe ɩkpa mʋ nɩɩ ii kpee ndɛ sʋ, yɛ ndɔɔ ana tɔ, kɛ fʋ yɛgɛ ba ba kɛ mɛ kɩkpaara kɩ bɔla.
42014024	N tɔwɛ fanɛ fɛɛ, asa mʋ nɩɩ n tɩɩ bamʋ Sososi mʋ ɔkʋ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ daa mɛ kensi‐gyii agyitɔ mʋ kɩɩ.’ ”
42014025	Yesu maa kʋbʋ damantɛ kʋkʋ ba maa naa mʋ, nɩɩ o biliŋi tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ,
42014026	“Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ɛɛ ba mɛ asɛ, nɩɩ o mee biti mɛ ɔ kyɔ mʋ‐sɛ yɛ mu‐nyi, mʋ‐ka yɛ mu‐bii ana, mʋ‐daa ana yɛ mu‐supu ana, apɩɩkyɩɩ yɛ apɩɩnyɩn, halɩɩ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ nkpa dee, ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ waa mɛ obuupu.
42014027	Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ sʋla mu oyu laasa, kɛ o buu mɛ mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ waa mɛ obuupu.
42014028	“Fɛɛ nɩɩ fanɛ ɔkʋ ii biti ɔ pɔyɩ kɩkpaara lala mʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa? Pɔyɩ kɛ o piili mʋ ɔ mɛɛ gyankpaa kɩɩ mu afulee mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ taa pɔyɩ, kɛ o wu fɛɛ mu afulee mʋ ii biti ɩ fʋʋ kɩpɔyɩ mʋ abɛɛ ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ fʋʋ?
42014029	Nɩɩ akʋtɔ ee piili ɔpɔrɛ gyankpaasa, nɩɩ ɔ man taalɛ lʋwɛ mʋ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o wu kɩmʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ ŋmasɛ mʋ yɛ,
42014030	‘Odunwura nɩmʋ piili kɩkpaara kɩpɔyɩ amaa ɔ man taalɛ pɔyɩ lʋwɛ.’
42014031	“Abɛɛ owura mɔɔ, nɩɩ maa owura kʋ bee biti ba ba kɔ, nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ kyɩna kɩɩ tɔ yɛ ɛ taalɛ taa mʋ anaakɔpʋ ngbɩn kudu naa gyaŋa owura banban mʋ maa mʋ anaakɔpʋ ngbɩn adʋnyɔ?
42014032	Nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ kɔ yɛ mʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ lɛɛ asa sun ɔbanban mʋ asɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ san ɔ bʋ kata‐kata, kɛ ɔ taasɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba waa kɛ keyuula kɩ ba bamʋ nsana.
42014033	Kanɩn ɔkpa kʋlʋn maŋa sʋ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man yɛgɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ waa mɛ obuupu.
42014034	“Nfɔlɛ ɩ bʋrɔn, amaa nɩɩ nfɔlɛ ɔkɔn kan lʋwɛ mʋ, mɩnɛ kʋtɔ nɩɩ bee biti ba taalɛ taa waa kɛ ɩ bɩla ɩ waa ɔkɔn?
42014035	Ɩ man sʋ kyaarɛ sa kʋtɔ kʋ kɩlɔŋɔ, amɔɔ bɛɛ taa kyɛɛgɛ fɔyɩ. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ asʋ mʋ, o nu.”
42015001	Kakaakʋ nɩɩ lenpoo akɔɔlɛpʋ yɛ alibi awaapʋ ba ba sarɛ bee nu Yesu asɛ.
42015002	Nɩɩ Farasii abi yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ bɛɛ kɔlɩtɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ ɩɩ kɔɔlɛ alibi awaapʋ halɩɩ maa bamʋ bee bʋga bee gyii.”
42015003	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan kɩnɩmʋ yɛ,
42015004	“A taa fɛɛ nɩɩ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ kan ɔ sʋ nbʋlʋpʋ kɩlɩfa kɛ bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋlʋn ɔ fɔyɩ. Nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ yɛgɛ adɩkpanɔ yɛ akpanɔ mʋ afitiri tɔ, kɛ ɔ natɛ biti ɔmʋnɩ ɔ fɔyɩ mʋ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti o wu mʋ?
42015005	Nɩɩ ɔ kan wu mʋ mʋ, ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ mu ansi i gyii, kɛ ɔ taa mʋ gyaga mʋ abaakpan sʋ,
42015006	kɛ ɔ taa mʋ ba kewu. Kɛ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ kyɛmɩnɛ ana yɛ mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ abi sarɛ, kɛ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, ‘Fan ba tii mɛ sʋ kɛ i gyii ansi, lɩɩ fɛɛ n wu mɛ kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ fɔyɩ mʋ.’
42015007	N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin, ɔkpa kʋlʋn maŋa sʋ kensi‐gyii kii biti kɩ baa kɩ bʋ sʋsʋ, fɛɛ alibi ɔwaapʋ kʋlʋn maa kyɛɛgɛ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ kyɔ gaa fɛɛ asa adɩkpanɔ yɛ akpanɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kɩɩ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi nɩɩ ɩ man tiri fɛɛ ba kyɛɛgɛ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ.
42015008	“Abɛɛ a taa fɛɛ ɔkyɩɩ kʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ gbiti nderebi kudu nɩɩ ɩmʋ kʋkʋlʋn fɔyɩ. Nɩɩ o mee tuwa fɩtɩla kɛ ɔ fɔgɛ kɩkpaara kɩɩ biti kɩmʋ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti o wu kɩmʋ?
42015009	Nɩɩ ɔ kan wu kɩmʋ mʋ, ɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ kyɛmɩnɛ ana yɛ mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ abi ba sarɛ tɔ, kɛ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, ‘Fan ba tii mɛ sʋ kɛ i gyii ansi, lɩɩ fɛɛ n wu mɛ kederebi mʋ nɩɩ kɩ fɔyɩ mʋ.’
42015010	N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, ɔkpa kʋlʋn maŋa sʋ kensi‐gyii ii biti ɩ baa ɩ bʋ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ asɛ fɛɛ alibi ɔwaapʋ kʋlʋn maa kyɛɛgɛ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ.”
42015011	Nɩɩ Yesu kyaga sʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn kʋ kyɩna ɔ bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ nbii‐nyɩnsa‐bii anyɔ.
42015012	Nɩɩ kebii asɛ mʋ tɔwɛ mʋ‐sɛ yɛ, ‘Mɛ‐Sɛ, barɩgɛ fʋ kapatɩyɛ mʋ kpini tɔ kɛ fʋ taa mɛ lɛɛ sa mɛ.’ Ɩmʋ sʋ, mʋ‐sɛ barɩgɛ kapatɩyɛ mʋ tɔ ntun nyɔ sa bamʋ.
42015013	“Nkɛ gbɛrɛɛ kamaa tɔ mʋ, kebii asɛ fɛ mʋ kapatɩyɛ mʋ kpini, kʋʋla kʋsʋ loo to kpee ɔsʋwʋlɛ kʋ sʋ kata‐kata. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ naa gyii mu afulee mʋ kpini kʋsʋbɔ tɔ lʋwɛ.
42015014	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ o gyii mu afulee mʋ kpini lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ akʋn damantɛ a tɩyɛ ɔsʋwʋlɛ maŋa sʋ kpini, nɩɩ kitiri fufuli kɩ kɩtaa mʋ.
42015015	Ɩmʋ sʋ o kpee naa waa kusun sa kasɛ maŋa sʋ ɔdɛ‐bi kʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ fɛɛ ɔ kɩɩ mu akuuri sʋ.
42015016	Ee biti agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ akuuri bee gyii mʋ kigyii, amaa ɔ man nyɛ.
42015017	“Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ ba mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ sa mʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ, ‘Mɛ‐Sɛ adɔɔpʋ mʋ kpini agyitɔ a gbigi bamʋ, yɛgɛ n bʋ nfɩɩ n biti n wu akʋn lewu.
42015018	N biti n kʋsʋ bwii kpee nsɛ asɛ kɛ n naa tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, Nsɛ, n waa Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ fʋ alibi.
42015019	Ɩmʋ sʋ n man bɩla dagaa gbaa fɛɛ fʋ tɩɩ mɛ yɛ fu‐bii, taa mɛ waa fɛɛ fʋ adɔɔpʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ.’
42015020	Kanɩn sʋ ɔ kʋsʋ yii sʋ bwii ɛɛ ba mʋ‐sɛ asɛ. “Amaa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ dan san ɔ bʋ kata yɛ kewu mʋ, mʋ‐sɛ wu mʋ, nɩɩ o wu mʋ kʋwɛɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ sɩlɛ naa gyaŋa mu‐bii mʋ, nɩɩ o baari mʋ tɔ.
42015021	“Nɩɩ kebii mʋ tɔwɛ mʋ‐sɛ yɛ, ‘Nsɛ n waa Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ fu alibi. Nɩɩ n man bɩla dagaa gbaa fɛɛ fʋ tɩɩ mɛ yɛ fu‐bii.’
42015022	“Amaa nɩɩ mʋ‐sɛ tɔwɛ mʋ ayaafɔlɛ yɛ, ‘Fan waa bilen! Fan taa kɩtaa kparɛ ba bun mʋ, fan lɛɛ kepini ba waa mʋ kɩbaa‐bi tɔ, kɛ fan waa mʋ asɩbɩta.
42015023	Kɛ fan naa kɩtaa naatɛ bonbi‐nyɩnsa mʋ ba mɔɔ kɛ a gyii, kɛ a kyaa gyii anɛ ansi.
42015024	Lɩɩ fɛɛ mi kebii‐nyɩnsa‐bii nɩmʋ daa wu nɩn, nɩɩ o bwii kyiŋi, ɔ fɔyɩ nɩn, nɩɩ n bwii benti mʋ.’ Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba piili bee gyii bamʋ ansi.
42015025	“Saŋa maa tɔ mʋ yɛgɛ obii bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ bʋ ndɔɔ tɔ. Maa lɩɩ ndɔɔ ɛɛ ba nɩɩ o be tiri kewu tɔ mʋ, o nu ɩlʋn yɛ kakyaa ɩ maa kpira mʋ‐sɛ kɩkpaara sʋ.
42015026	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ‐sɛ ayaafɔlɛ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ mʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ waa.
42015027	Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Fu‐supu i bwii ba, nɩɩ fʋ‐sɛ mɔɔ mʋ naatɛ bonbi‐nyɩnsa mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fu‐supu bwii ba kewu yɛ kumu nkpa yɛ alanfɩya.’
42015028	“Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔdaa mʋ nyɛ agbʋ yɛ ɔ man bɩla yɛ o loo kɩkpaara sʋ. Kanɩn sʋ mʋ‐sɛ lɩɩ kpee naa tɔwɛ waa mʋ yɛ o loo ba.
42015029	Amaa ɔ lɛɛ mʋ‐sɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Kɩɩ! Nsu ɩnɩmʋ kpini n maa sun fʋ fɛɛ kɩnyɛ. Nɩɩ n man kina fʋ kɔnɔ kunu. Mɩnɛ kʋtɔ nɩɩ fʋ pɩɩta sa mɛ? Fʋ man sa mɛ halɩɩ kabwɩɩ gbaa kɛ maa mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana a mɔɔ gyii anɛ ansi.
42015030	Amaa fu kebii‐nyɩnsa nɩmʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ naa nyita fʋ kapatɩyɛ lɩɩ akyɩɩ gyaga sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ naa bwii ba kewu mʋ, fʋ mɔɔ naatɛ bonbi‐nyɩnsa sa mʋ.’
42015031	“Nɩɩ ɔsɛ mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Mi‐bii, fʋ bʋ mɛ asɛ nfɩɩ saŋa kʋmaa, nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ mʋ gyɛ fʋ lɛɛ nɩn.
42015032	Ɩmʋ sʋ yɛgɛ ɩ waa anɛ ɔkɔn kɛ a kyaa gyii anɛ ansi, lɩɩ fɛɛ fu‐supu nɩmʋ daa wu nɩn, nɩɩ o bwii kyiŋi, ɔ fɔyɩ nɩn, nɩɩ n bwii benti mʋ.’ ”
42016001	Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ yɛ, “Atɔ wuya kʋ ɩ kyɩna ɔ bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ mʋ kapatɩyɛ sʋ. Nɩɩ atɔ wuya mʋ nu fɛɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ ii nyita mʋ kapatɩyɛ.
42016002	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Mɩnɛ asɩn nɩɩ n nu n lɩɩ fʋ sʋ falɛ? Taa mɛ kapatɩyɛ mʋ nɩɩ n taa waa fʋ kɩbaa tɔ mʋ kpini bɩya mɛ, kɛ fʋ karagɛ ɩmʋ kɔnɔ sa mɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ man bɩla yɛ fʋ kɩɩ mɛ kapatɩyɛ sʋ.’
42016003	“Nɩɩ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ yɛ, ‘Nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɛnɛ nɩɩ n biti n waa? Mɛ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ɩɩ kɔɔlɛ mi kusun ɛɛ lɩɩ mɛ asɛ, nɩɩ n man bʋlʋn kɛ n waa kasɛ kukuu kusun, nɩɩ ɩ sʋ mɛ ipeeli yɛ n naa kʋlɛ.
42016004	N nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ n biti n waa nɩɩ kusun mʋ kɩ kan lɩɩ mɛ kɩbaa tɔ mʋ, asa bee biti ba kɔɔlɛ mɛ bamʋ akpaara sʋ.’
42016005	“Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ akɔ wuya ana nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ ɔgyankpaapʋ mʋ yɛ, ‘Mɛ‐nyɩrɩpɛ kʋkɔ afɩnɛ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ?’
42016006	“Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘N sʋ kʋkɔ olifu nfɔ galɔn alɩfa aburuwa.’ “Nɩɩ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Kɔɔlɛ fʋ ɔwʋlɛ, kɛ fʋ kyɩna bilen kɛ fʋ kyʋrɔɔ ana.’
42016007	“Nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ ɔnyɔsapʋ mʋ yɛ, ‘Afɩnɛ kʋkɔ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ?’ Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Akyembee ɩbɔɔta kagbɩn kʋlʋn.’ “Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Kɔɔlɛ fʋ ɔwʋlɛ kɛ fʋ kyʋrɔɔ aduburuwa.’
42016008	“Atɔ wuya mʋ ba yɩn ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ mu ansi ɩ tɩn fɛɛ maa sʋ kanyaasɩn. Lɩɩ fɛɛ kanɩn nɩɩ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ asa ba sʋ kensi tɩn kɩkyɔ bɛɛ waa asa ɩ kyɔ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asa ba sʋ bɛɛ waa asa mʋ.”
42016009	Nɩɩ Yesu kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan taa fanɛ dulinyaa tɔ atɔ kyɛ asa tɔ biti akyɛmɩnɛ sa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ, nɩɩ ɩ kan ba fɛɛ atɔ mʋ saŋa ɩ kyʋn mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ kɔɔlɛ fanɛ ba nkpa kakpaa tɔ.
42016010	“Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee gyii kesintin atɔ gbɛrɛɛ sʋ mʋ, ɔ bɩla ee gyii kesintin atɔ kɩkyɔ sʋ. Nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o mee gyii kesintin atɔ gbɛrɛɛ sʋ mʋ, kanɩn maa nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ yɛ o gyii kesintin atɔ kɩkyɔ sʋ.
42016011	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ fu mee gyii kesintin dulinyaa atɔ sʋ mʋ, anɩmʋ ii biti ɔ taa Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ ɔkaa mʋ waa fʋ abaa tɔ?
42016012	Nɩɩ fʋ mee gyii kesintin ɔkʋ kapatɩyɛ sʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ mɛɛ yɛ sa fʋ mʋ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ da yɛ ɔ sa fʋ mʋ.
42016013	“Kɩyaafɔlɛ kʋlʋn mɛɛ taalɛ sun anyɩrɩpɛ anyɔ. Nɩɩ ɩ kan ba kanɩn mʋ, ee biti o kisi ɔkʋ kɛ ɔ ba ee biti ɔkʋ, abɛɛ ee biti ɔ baa ee sun ɔkʋ kɛ o kina ɔkʋ. Fɛn mɛɛ taalɛ sun Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ afulee.”
42016014	Farasii abi mʋ nɩɩ bee biti afulee gaa ba maa nu ɩnɩmʋ kpini mʋ, ba gbɛɛlɛɛ Yesu.
42016015	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ banɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ fɛn waa fɛɛ fanɛ ɩkpa i kyiigi asa ansi tɔ, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ i du. Lɩɩ fɛɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ kʋtɔ kparɛ asa ansi tɔ mʋ, kɩ gyɛ kʋtɔ kisisa sa Ɩbwaarɛ.
42016016	“Ba tɔwɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Mosesi nbara yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ kɩkaapʋ naa fʋʋ Gyɔn saŋa. Lɩɩ kanɩn saŋa maŋa ɩ sʋ ii kpee mʋ, ba tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kpan mʋ n‐yɩɩ ee loo to.
42016017	Ii biti ɩ baa ɩ bʋpɔɔ sa sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ ɩ maa nyaa, ɩ kyɔ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbara mʋ pii ɩ maa lɩɩ tɔ.
42016018	“Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o kina mʋ‐ka nɩɩ ɔ naa kili ɔkyɩɩ kʋ mʋ, o nyita kekili, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ o kili ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ mu‐kuli kina mʋ mʋ gbaa ɔ kɔɔlɛ ɔkʋ mʋ‐ka.”
42016019	Nɩɩ Yesu kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Afulee wuya kʋ ɩ kyɩna ɔ bʋ tɔ. Kakɛ kʋmaa ee bun atɔ bunsa danbɩrasa fɛɛ agoo maa kente, yɛgɛ ee gyii mʋ n‐yɩɩ kakɛ kʋmaa.
42016020	Odibapu kʋ gbaa kyɩna ɔ bʋ tɔ, nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Lasarusi mʋ nɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kpini, ɩ sʋ ɩlɔ. Nɩɩ kakɛ kʋmaa bɛɛ sʋla mʋ ba bɛɛ yɩla atɔ wuya nɩmʋ kebunɔ.
42016021	Nɩɩ ee biti fɛɛ ɔ daa nyɛ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ atɔ wuya mʋ teeburi sʋ ɩ tɩyɛ kasɛ mʋ gbaa gyii. Halɩɩ igyoonɔ gbaa bɛɛ ba bee nyita mʋ ɩlɔ mʋ tɔ.
42016022	“Saŋa kʋ tɔ mʋ odibapu mʋ be wu, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ ba taa mʋ kpee Ɩbwaarɛ nyɩmɩsa Abraham asɛ sʋsʋ. Atɔ wuya mʋ gbaa be wu nɩɩ ba pula mʋ.
42016023	Ɔ naa loo Sɩtaanɛ fʋlɔn tɔ yɛgɛ ɔ bʋ awʋrʋfɔ tɔ. O diyaa mu ansi mʋ, o wu Lasarusi maa tɛ Abraham asɛ kata‐kata.
42016024	Ɩmʋ sʋ, ɔ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ, ‘Ɔsɛ Abraham, wu mɛ kʋwɛɛ kɛ fʋ sun Lasarusi kɛ ɔ taa mʋ kɩbaa‐bi nyɔ nkyu tɔ, kɛ ɔ taa ba yuula mɛ kanandʋlʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ n gyii awʋrʋfɔ fʋlɔn nɩmʋ tɔ.’
42016025	“Amaa Abraham lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ. ‘Mi‐bii, nyiŋi fɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ kyɩna fʋ tɛ nkpa tɔ kasɛ sʋ mʋ fʋ nyɛ atɔ danbɩrasa nɩɩ Lasarusi mɔɔ nyɛ atɔ libi, amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ mʋ ee gyii ɔkɔn yɛgɛ fɛɛ fii gyii awʋrʋfɔ.
42016026	Ɩnɩmʋ kpini kamaa mʋ, kɩkyɔbɔɔ lala kʋ kɩ dɛ ana fanɛ nsana, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɩɩ nfɩɩ kpee fanɛ asɛ mʋ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ taalɛ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ lɩɩ fanɛ asɛ ba anɛ asɛ nfɩɩ.’
42016027	“Nɩɩ atɔ wuya mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Kanɩn bɩrɛ mɛ‐sɛ n kʋlɛ fʋ nɩn, sun Lasarusi o bwii kpee mɛ‐sɛ kɩkpaara sʋ.
42016028	Lɩɩ fɛɛ, n sʋ mi‐supu ana anuu. Yɛgɛ ɔ naa da bamʋ amu tɔ kɛ ba man ba katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ n gyii awʋrʋfɔ falɛ.’
42016029	“Abraham lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Mosesi nbara yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ ɩ bʋ bamʋ asɛ, bɛ taalɛ nu lɩɩ ɩmʋ tɔ.’
42016030	“Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ayee, mɛ‐sɛ Abraham, nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan lɩɩ lewu tɔ naa tɔwɛ bamʋ mʋ, bee biti ba yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa.’
42016031	“Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Ba kan ba man nu Mosesi nbara yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ, halɩɩ nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ gbaa kpee bamʋ asɛ mʋ, ba mɛɛ yɛ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.’ ”
42017001	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ yɛ, “Ɩ waa nɛnɛ, atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa ɩ waa alibi mʋ ii biti ɩ ba. Amaa ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ bɔla mʋ sʋ kɛ ɩ ba mʋ, mʋ laakʋ.
42017002	Fɛɛ nɩɩ mʋ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, ba taa kubuu lala ŋmina mʋ ɔbʋlɛ tɔ naa tʋʋ ɔpʋ tɔ gbaa mʋ, ɩ bɔ sa mʋ fɛɛ ɩ maa bɔla mʋ sʋ nɩɩ nbii wuribi nɩmʋ ɔkʋ naa waa alibi.
42017003	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan baa fan da fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ. Nɩɩ fu‐supu kan waa fʋ alibi mʋ taasɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kan nu mʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ mʋ, kɛ fʋ taa mu alibi kɛɛ mʋ.
42017004	Nɩɩ ɔ kan waa fʋ alibi ɩlɩɩ isunɔ kakɛ kʋlʋn, nɩɩ ɔ kan nu mʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ ba tɔwɛ fʋ ɩlɩɩ isunɔ yɛ, ‘N man waa danbɩrasa mʋ,’ taa mu alibi kɛɛ mʋ.”
42017005	Nɩɩ asunpu mʋ ba tɔwɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ yɛ, “Tii anɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ kɛ kɩ nyɛ akyɔ.”
42017006	Nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fan kan fan sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii pii fɛɛ gowa abi gbaa mʋ, fɛn taalɛ tɔwɛ oyu lala nɩmʋ yɛ, ‘Faa fu ilin kpini fii kyiigi naa yii ɔpʋ tɔ,’ kɛ i nu fanɛ asɛ.
42017007	“Nɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ ɔkʋ sʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ nɩɩ ɛɛ dɔɔ abɛɛ ɛɛ kɩɩ nbʋlʋpʋ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kan lɩɩ ndɔɔ tɔ ba mʋ, fɩɩ dan taalɛ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Waa bilen kɛ fʋ ba kyɩna gyii?’
42017008	Ayee! Fii biti fʋ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Dɩŋa mɛ kalaatɩpwɛ agyitɔ ba yii mɛ kɛ n gyii kɛ n nuu. N kan lʋwɛ mʋ, kɛ ngbaa fʋ, fʋ naa gyii kɛ fu nuu.’
42017009	Ɩmʋ sʋ i tiri fɛɛ ɔ fwaala kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ ɔ waa sa mʋ abɛɛ?
42017010	Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ, nɩɩ fan kan waa kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ fan waa mʋ, fan tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘An gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ayaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ a man sʋ kyaarɛ, an dan waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa a maa waa mʋ nɩn.’ ”
42017011	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu ii kpee Gyerusalem mʋ, ɔ bɔla Samariya yɛ Galile ɩsʋwʋlɛ ngyaŋɛ nɩn.
42017012	Maa kpee kadɛ‐bi kʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ gyaŋa anyɩn kudu nɩɩ bɛɛ lɔ kibootoo. Nɩɩ anyɩn mʋ ba yɩlɛ kata,
42017013	nɩɩ ba kuusi kenken yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu, wu anɛ kʋwɛɛ.”
42017014	Yesu maa wu bamʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ “Fan taa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ naa kaapʋ aseepu.” Ba maa kpee mʋ nɩɩ ba nyɛ alanfɩya.
42017015	Bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋ, maa wu fɛɛ ɔ nyɛ alanfɩya mʋ, o bwii ba ee kuusi kenken ɛɛ yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ.
42017016	Nɩɩ o be muŋa Yesu ayaa tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ fwaala mʋ lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa sa mʋ mʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ kanɩn kanyɩn maŋa gyɛ Kasamariya‐nyɩn nɩn.
42017017	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ yɛ, “Man gyɛ asa kudu ɩ nyɛ alanfɩya. Fɩnɛ nɩɩ asansa akpanɔ mʋ ba bʋ?
42017018	Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ kadɛndɛmandɛ nɩmʋ nkʋn ɩ taalɛ bwii ba fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ?”
42017019	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kʋsʋ natɛ, fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fʋ nyɛ alanfɩya.”
42017020	Saŋa kʋ nɩɩ Farasii abi ba taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Kakɛ mɔɔ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kii biti kɩ ba?” Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ fɛn mɛɛ yɛ fan taa fanɛ ansi wu kɩ maa ba.
42017021	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ taalɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Kɩɩ kɩmʋ ndee’ abɛɛ ‘kɩ bʋ falɛ’. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura mʋ kɩ bʋ fanɛ tɔ.”
42017022	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Saŋa kʋ ii biti ɔ ba, nɩɩ fen biti fɛɛ fan wu mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ mɛ nkɛ mʋ kʋkʋ, amaa fan mɛɛ yɛ fen wu.
42017023	Nɩɩ asa bee biti ba tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ‘Mʋ ɩ bʋ falɛ mʋ’ abɛɛ ‘Mʋ ndee’. Amaa fan man waa fan buu bamʋ.
42017024	N tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ lɩɩ fɛɛ, mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa kibwii ba mʋ, ii biti ɩ baa i du nɩn fɛɛ bʋlayɩ maa gyii ɩsɛɛ ŋmaŋɛ sʋsʋ lɩɩ kɩbaafʋn nɩmʋ naa lɩɩ kɩbanban nɩmʋ.
42017025	Amaa ɩ dagaa fɛɛ n gyankpaa wu awʋrʋfɔ gaa, kɛ kɩnaana nɩmʋ tɔ abi ba kina mɛ.
42017026	“Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa anɛ naana Nowa saŋa mʋ, kanɩn nɩɩ ii biti ɩ waa mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa kibwii ba saŋa mʋ gbaa.
42017027	Anɛ naana Nowa saŋa mʋ, asa ba kyɩna bee gyii yɛgɛ bee nuu, bee kili naa fʋʋ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ anɛ naana Nowa loo ɔkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ nkyu ɩ ba muuri bamʋ kpini.
42017028	“Kanɩn nɩɩ ɩ waa Loti saŋa mʋ, asa ba kyɩna bee gyii yɛgɛ bee nuu, bɛɛ fɛ yɛgɛ bɛɛ sɔɔ, bee duu yɛgɛ bɛɛ pɔyɩ.
42017029	Amaa kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Loti lɩɩ Sodom kadɛ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ fʋlɔn yɛ kuduri lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba dɩyɛ bamʋ kpini.
42017030	“Kanɩn nɩɩ ii biti ɩ waa kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n biti n lɛɛ mɛ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ mʋ.
42017031	Kanɩn kakɛ maa nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ɔ bʋ kewusunɔ mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ atɔ a bʋ kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ man bɩla kpee kɩkpaara sʋ naa taa atɔ. Kanɩn ɩ gyɛ sa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ ndɔɔ tɔ mʋ, ɔ man bɩla bwii kpee kewu kɛ ɔ naa taa kʋtɔ kʋ.
42017032	Fan nyiŋi Loti mʋ‐ka.
42017033	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti fɛɛ ɔ mɔlɩgɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ nkpa mʋ, ii biti ɩ lɩɩ mʋ abaa tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ nkpa sa lɩɩ mɛ sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ kɩmʋ.
42017034	Kanɩn kagyanbwɛ maŋa mʋ, asa anyɔ bee biti ba baa ba dɛ kalan kʋlʋn sʋ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ taa ɔkʋ yɛgɛ ɔkʋ.
42017035	Akyɩɩ anyɔ bee biti ba baa bɛɛ kɔyɩ atɔ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ taa ɔkʋ yɛgɛ ɔkʋ.
42017036	Anyɩn anyɔ bee biti ba baa bee sun kusun ndɔɔ tɔ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ ba taa ɔkʋ yɛgɛ ɔkʋ.”
42017037	Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba taasɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ waa.” Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Katɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ belenbuni bʋ mʋ, tʋtɔ nɩɩ agyinbwii gbaa ba ba gyaŋɛ.”
42018001	Nɩɩ Yesu bɔ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kɩŋasan mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ kaapʋ bamʋ fɛɛ, ba ba bɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ saŋa kʋmaa, kɛ ba man yɛgɛ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ nnyɔ bamʋ.
42018002	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Asɩn ogyipu kʋ ɩ bʋ kadɛ kʋkʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ man sɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ ɔ man taa nyɩmɩsa tɩɩ sɛhn.
42018003	Nɩɩ okulapu‐kyɩɩ kʋ gbaa bʋ kadɛ maŋa tɔ, ɔ maa sʋ ɛɛ ba asɩn ogyipu mʋ asɛ ɛɛ kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Kyɛ mɛ tɔ kɛ n gyii biri mɛ dʋn ana.’
42018004	Ɩ kyɛɛrɛɛ gaa nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ waa sɛhn ɛɛ sa mʋ. Amaa kamaa tɔ mʋ, asɩn ogyipu mʋ tɔwɛ waa mʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ, ‘Ɩ gyɛ kesintin fɛɛ man sɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ man taa nyɩmɩsa tɩɩ sɛhn.
42018005	Amaa lɩɩ kitintin mʋ nɩɩ okulapu‐kyɩɩ nɩmʋ i tintin mɛ falɛ sʋ mʋ, n biti n kɩɩ kɛ n taa mu kesintin sa mʋ. Man gyɛ kanɩn mʋ kɩba mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ ba nfɩɩ falɛ, ii biti ɩ kan sa mɛ kʋlɔ.’ ”
42018006	Nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ asɩn ogyipu mʋ nɩɩ o mee gyii kesintin mʋ gbaa tɔwɛ?
42018007	Nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kanɩn bɩrɛ mʋ, mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ mɛɛ yɛ o gyii kesintin sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ bee su bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ kakyʋwapɛ yɛ kagyanbwɛ? Abɛɛ ee biti ɔ kyaga sʋ ee kina?
42018008	N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ kɩɩ sʋ bilen‐bilen fɛɛ ɔ taa bamʋ kesintin sa bamʋ. Amaa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa n kan ba mʋ, n biti n nyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii kasɛ sʋ?”
42018009	Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla bɔ kɩŋasan nɩmʋ sa asa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi, yɛgɛ bɛɛ kɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kɩyan. Ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ,
42018010	“Asa anyɔ akʋ ba kpee kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ ba naa kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ. Bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋ gyɛ Kafarasii nɩn, nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɔɔ gyɛ lenpoo ɔkɔɔlɛpʋ.
42018011	Nɩɩ Kafarasii‐nyɩn mʋ yɩlɛ mʋ kʋkwɩɩ kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɛɛ yɩn mʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ, ‘Ɩbwaarɛ, n fwaala fʋ gaa fɛɛ maa n man du fɛɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba san mʋ, n mee yuuri, abɛɛ n mee puni asa abɛɛ n man gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ n nyita kekili abɛɛ n man du fɛɛ lenpoo ɔkɔɔlɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ yɩlɛ nfɩɩ falɛ.
42018012	N ŋmina kɔnɔ nkɛ nnyɔ, nkɛ nsunɔ kʋmaa tɔ, nɩɩ n barɩgɛ mɛ atɔ tɔ ntun kudu, nɩɩ n taa ketun kʋlʋn n sa fʋ.’
42018013	“Amaa lenpoo ɔkɔɔlɛpʋ mʋ bɩrɛ yɩlɛ kata yɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ man diyaa mu ansi kɩɩ sʋsʋ, amaa ɔ taa mʋ kɩbaa gyaga mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɩbwaarɛ, alibi ɔwaapʋ ɩ gyɛ mɛ, wu mɛ kʋwɛɛ.’
42018014	Ba bwii kpewu. Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, lenpoo ɔkɔɔlɛpʋ mʋ i gyii asʋ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, man gyɛ Kafarasii‐nyɩn mʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ fanɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋsaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋsʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ bɩya mʋ kasɛ, nɩɩ fanɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɩya mʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ kʋsaa mʋ sʋsʋ.”
42018015	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ asa akʋ gbaa ba sʋ bamʋ nbii wuribi bɛɛ ba Yesu asɛ, kɛ ɔ taa mʋ abaa gyaga bamʋ sʋ. Mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba maa wu kanɩn mʋ, ba gya bamʋ.
42018016	Amaa Yesu tɩɩ nbii mʋ ba mʋ asɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ nbii mʋ ba ba mɛ asɛ, kɛ fan man tii bamʋ ɔkpa. Lɩɩ fɛɛ banɩmʋ falɛ daa kudubi nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ gyɛ bamʋ lɛɛ.
42018017	N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii fɛɛ kebii mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ yɛ o loo kɩmʋ tɔ.”
42018018	Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi ɔgyankpaapʋ kʋ taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ danbɩrasa, mɩnɛ nɩɩ n biti n waa kɛ n nyɛ nkpa kakpaa?”
42018019	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ tɩɩ mɛ yɛ ɔdanbɩrasa? Ɔkʋ man gyɛ ɔdanbɩrasa, amɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ nkʋn.
42018020	Fu nyi Ɩbwaarɛ nbara asɩn mʋ nɩɩ kaapʋ yɛ, ‘Man nyita kekili, man mɔɔ nyɩmɩsa, man kan yuuri, man waa nyama yɩlɛpʋ antɩŋɛsa wuya, kɛ fʋ taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa fʋ‐sɛ yɛ fu‐nyi?’ ”
42018021	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N buu nbara ɩnɩmʋ kpini lɩɩ mi kibii tɔ.”
42018022	Yesu maa nu kanɩn mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɩ san fʋ kʋtɔ kʋlʋn. Naa fɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ kɛ fʋ taa afulee mʋ sa atiripu, ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ fu biliŋi atɔ wuya sʋsʋ. Kɛ fʋ ba buu mɛ.”
42018023	Amaa maa nu falɛ mʋ, ɩ kɔ mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ gyɛ atɔ wuya gaa.
42018024	Nɩɩ Yesu kɩɩ mʋ kyiim, tɔwɛ yɛ, “I biti ɩ baa ɩ bʋlʋn sa atɔ wuya ana fɛɛ ba yɛgɛ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kɛ ba buu Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩkaapʋ.
42018025	Kesintin ii biti ɩ baa ɩ bʋpɔɔ sa nyɔɔma fɛɛ ɔ taalɛ loo baasa ɔbɔ tɔ bʋlɛ, ɩ kyɔ fɛɛ atɔ wuya maa yɛgɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kɛ o buu Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩkaapʋ.”
42018026	Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba nu mʋ ba taasɛ yɛ, “Kanɩn bɩrɛ anɩmʋ ɩɩ taalɛ nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ?”
42018027	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa mɛɛ taalɛ waa mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ bɩrɛ ɛɛ taalɛ waa.”
42018028	Nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kɩɩ! An yɛgɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩɩ an baa an buu fʋ falɛ!”
42018029	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ yɛgɛ kewu abɛɛ mʋ‐ka abɛɛ mʋ‐daa ana yɛ asupu abɛɛ akʋʋgɛpʋ abɛɛ mu‐bii ana lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii kɩkaapʋ mʋ sʋ mʋ,
42018030	ee biti ɔ nyɛ falɛ atɔ gaa, nbɩɩnbɩɩ kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ yɛ nkpa kakpaa mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba kamaa tɔ mʋ?”
42018031	Saŋa kʋ Yesu taa abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ lɩɩ ɩkaa sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “An kpee Gyerusalem kɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ ba kyʋrɔɔ yɩla lɩɩ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa sʋ mʋ ɩ ba tɔ.
42018032	Bee biti ba lɛɛ mɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ kɛ ba waa mɛ yɛrɛyɛrɛ, kɛ ba saalɛ mɛ, kɛ ba tʋʋ nkyɔlɛ wʋrɩgɛ mɛ sʋ, kɛ ba taa awulibi tɩŋɛ mɛ kɛ ba mɔɔ mɛ.
42018033	Kɛ ɩmʋ kakɛ sasapʋ mʋ kɛ n bwii kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ.”
42018034	Amaa abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba man nu ɩnɩmʋ kasɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ asɩn mʋ kasɛ baala bamʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ba man nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ.
42018035	Yesu maa tiri Gyeriko tɔ mʋ, yɛgɛ gyaatanapʋ kʋ tɛ ɔkpa asɛ ɛɛ kʋlɛ atɔ.
42018036	Maa nu asa damantɛ ba maa kyʋn mʋ, ɔ taasɛ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩɩ waa?”
42018037	Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Yesu Kanasareti‐nyɩn mʋ ɩ kyʋn kanɩn maŋa.”
42018038	Nɩɩ o kuusi tɩɩ yɛ, “Yesu, Owura Dawidi kanaana‐bii, wu mɛ kʋwɛɛ!”
42018039	Nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Yesu ansi tɔ mʋ, ba gya mʋ yɛ o bun mʋ kɔnɔ sʋ, amaa ɔ dan san ɔ maa sʋ ee kuusi kenken yɛ, “Owura Dawidi kanaana‐bii, wu mɛ kʋwɛɛ!”
42018040	Nɩɩ Yesu yɩlɛ nɩɩ ɔ sa kɔnɔ yɛ ba taa mʋ bɩya mʋ. Maa tiri mʋ tɔ mʋ, Yesu taasɛ mʋ yɛ,
42018041	“Mɩnɛ nɩɩ fii biti fɛɛ n waa sa fʋ?” Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, n biti fɛɛ mi ansi ɩ bɩla bugi.”
42018042	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fu ansi i bugi! Fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fʋ nyɛ alanfɩya.”
42018043	Opula maŋa tɔ mu ansi ɩ bɩla bugi nɩɩ o buu Yesu, yɛgɛ ɛɛ yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ. Nɩɩ asa mʋ kpini ba maa wu kanɩn mʋ, ngbaa bamʋ ba yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ.
42019001	Yesu loo Gyeriko kadɛ tɔ bɔla ɛɛ kyʋn.
42019002	Ɔnyɩn kʋ kyɩna ɔ bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ kɩtɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Sakiyosi. Ɔ kyɩna ɔ gyɛ lenpoo akɔɔlɛpʋ ɔbɩlɩsa nɩn, nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ atɔ wuya.
42019003	Ɔ kyɩna ee biti o wu Yesu yɛ mu ansi, amaa maa gyɛ nyɩmɩsa dɛɛ sʋ mʋ, ɔ man taalɛ, lɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ sʋ.
42019004	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ sɩlɛ kpee ansi tɔ naa dii oyu kʋ kɛ ɔ nyɛ wu Yesu, lɩɩ fɛɛ tʋtɔ sʋ nɩɩ Yesu ii biti ɔ bɔla.
42019005	Yesu maa fʋʋ opula maŋa mʋ ɔ kɩɩ sʋsʋ wu mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Sakiyosi, kpɩlɩgɛ ba bilen. N biti n sʋgɛ fʋ ayɛ ndaga.”
42019006	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ kpɩlɩgɛ bilen taa kinsi gyii waa mʋ nsa‐nsa.
42019007	Asa ba wu ɩnɩmʋ nɩɩ ba piili bɛɛ kɔlɩtɛ yɛ, “O kpee naa sʋgɛ alibi ɔwaapʋ sʋ.”
42019008	Amaa Sakiyosi kʋsʋ yɩlɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu yɛ, “Kɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, n biti n barɩgɛ mɛ kapatɩyɛ tɔ kɩnyɔ, kɛ n taa kɩbaafʋn sa atiripu. Nɩɩ n kan kɔɔlɛ afulee lɩɩ ɔkʋ asɛ ɩ kyɔ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ n kɔɔlɛ mʋ, n biti n ka mʋ kanɩn kʋkɔ maŋa kɩlɩɩ kɩnaa.”
42019009	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kamɔlɩgɛ kɩ ba fʋ ayɛ ndaga, lɩɩ fɛɛ ngbaa fʋ, fʋ gyɛ Abraham kanaana‐bii nɩn.
42019010	Lɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n ba nɩn yɛ n ba biti kɛ n mɔlɩgɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba fɔyɩ.”
42019011	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ san bee nu falɛ asɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ maa tiri Gyerusalem tɔ mʋ, asa mʋ ba fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kii biti ki piili opula tɔ, ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan
42019012	yɛ, “Ɔsa kparɛ kʋ i kpee kata‐kata kadɛ kʋ, ɔ naa gyii kuwura kɛ o bwii ba.
42019013	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ ayaafɔlɛ kudu nɩɩ ɔ sa bamʋ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ afulee mʋ nɩɩ i budu, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, ‘Fan taa kanɩn afulee maŋa sun kusun naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n biti n bwii ba.’
42019014	“Amaa ɔsʋwʋlɛ mʋ sʋ asa ba kisi mʋ, nɩɩ ba sun gya mʋ sʋ naa tɔwɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ee kpee mʋ owura lala mʋ yɛ, ‘A mɛɛ biti ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ o be gyii anɛ sʋ kuwura.’
42019015	“Tʋtɔ abɩlɩsa mʋ ba bun mʋ kuwura bɩrɛ, nɩɩ o bwii ba kewu. Nɩɩ o sun tɩɩ mʋ ayaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa afulee mʋ sa bamʋ mʋ, kɛ o wu tɔnɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba nyɛ lɩɩ kanɩn afulee maŋa sʋ.
42019016	“Ɔgyankpaasa mʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, fu afulee mʋ, ɩ kʋʋgɛ kanɩn ɩlɩɩ kudu tii sʋ’.
42019017	“Nɩɩ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ mʋ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Nsa yɛ kusun, mɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ danbɩrasa. Lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ taalɛ gyii atɔ pii nɩmʋ sʋ yɛ kesintin mʋ, n taa ndɛ kudu waa fʋ kɩbaa tɔ yɛ fʋ kɩɩ sʋ.’
42019018	“Ɔnyɔsapʋ mʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ fu afulee mʋ i bwii kʋʋgɛ ɩlɩɩ kunuu tii sʋ.’
42019019	“Nɩɩ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘N taa ndɛ nnuu waa fʋ kɩbaa tɔ yɛ fʋ kɩɩ sʋ.’
42019020	“Nɩɩ mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ kʋ gbaa ba tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, fu afulee ndee. N taa kɩmʋ ŋmina kikyibi tɔ taa yɩla katɩnkʋ.
42019021	N sɩlɛ fʋ nɩn, lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ asɩn ɩ bʋlʋn gaa. Nɩɩ fɩɩ taa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man gyɛ fʋ lɛɛ, nɩɩ fɩɩ kpa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ man gyɛ fu i duu.’
42019022	“Mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Fʋ gyɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ kumu tɔ ɔlʋn wuya. Fʋ gbaa‐gbaa fʋ kɔnɔ tɔ asɩn nɩɩ n biti n taa talɛ fʋ. Fu nyi fɛɛ mɛ asɩn ɩ bʋlʋn, nɩɩ n taa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ mɛ lɛɛ, nɩɩ n kpa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ man gyɛ mɛ i duu.
42019023	Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fʋ man taa mɛ afulee maŋa naa yɩla afulee ɔyɩlɛkpa kɛ ɩ kʋʋgɛ agyaga sa mɛ? Naafɔɔ n maa ba falɛ kɛ n ba kɔɔlɛ ɩmaa ɩmʋ agyaga.’
42019024	“Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ tʋtɔ mʋ yɛ, ‘Fan kɔɔlɛ afulee mʋ lɩɩ mʋ asɛ, kɛ fan taa sa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ ɩlɩɩ kudu tii sʋ mʋ.’
42019025	“Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, ɔ wʋla nyɛ afulee mʋ nɩɩ i budu.’
42019026	“Nɩɩ ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘N tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ba taa waa mʋ abaa tɔ sʋ danbɩrasa mʋ, bee biti ba taa gaa tii mʋ sʋ. Amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ba man taa ɩkʋ waa mʋ abaa tɔ kpini‐kpini mʋ, gbɛrɛɛ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ bee biti ba kɔɔlɛ lɩɩ mʋ asɛ.’
42019027	Amaa ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ taa agbʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ mɛ dʋn ana, nɩɩ be mee biti n maa gyii bamʋ sʋ kuwura mʋ, fan taa bamʋ ba mɔɔ mi ansi tɔ nfɩɩ.’ ”
42019028	Nɩɩ Yesu maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, ɔ gyankpaa kʋbʋ mʋ ee kpee Gyerusalem.
42019029	Maa tiri Betifage maa Betani ndɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ Olifu kɩbɩɩ ɔbʋlɛ tɔ mʋ, o sun mʋ abɩɩlapʋ anyɔ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ,
42019030	“Fan kpee kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ fanɛ ansi tɔ mʋ. Nɩɩ fan maa dan fen loo kɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, fen biti fan wu kekuruma‐bon kʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ man pɩɩta dii mʋ maa kyaa oyu. Fan Saaŋɛ mʋ bɩya mɛ nfɩɩ.
42019031	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan taasɛ fanɛ yɛ, ‘Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fen saaŋɛ mʋ mʋ?’ fan tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ ii biti mʋ.’ ”
42019032	Bamʋ nɩɩ Yesu sun mʋ, ba naa wu mʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ mʋ.
42019033	Ba maa saaŋɛ kuruma mʋ, mʋ wuya ana ba taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fen saaŋɛ kuruma mʋ?”
42019034	Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ ii biti mʋ.”
42019035	Ba taa mʋ ba sa Yesu, nɩɩ ba taa bamʋ ataa gyaga mʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ ba kyɛ Yesu tɔ nɩɩ o dii kyɩna mʋ sʋ.
42019036	Maa kpee mʋ, asa ba taa bamʋ ataa tʋʋ ɔkpa tɔ.
42019037	Yesu maa tiri Gyerusalem opula mʋ nɩɩ ɔkpa ɩɩ kpɩlɩgɛ tɔ ii kpee Olifu kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ mʋ, abɩɩlapʋ yɛ kʋbʋ damantɛ ba piili bee kuusi bɛɛ yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ kinsigyi tɔ lɩɩ adangana mʋ nɩɩ ba wu Yesu maa wʋla waa mʋ sʋ.
42019038	Bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ waa Owura mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ ba mʋ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ mʋ kusee. Keyuula kɩ bʋ sʋsʋ. Nɩɩ bʋnyaa ɩ dagaa Ɩbwaarɛ.”
42019039	Farasii abi akʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ sakyɔ mʋ tɔ mʋ ba tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, tɔwɛ fu abuupu yɛ ba bun bamʋ nnɔ sʋ.”
42019040	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kɛ fan nu fɛɛ, nɩɩ ba kan bun bamʋ nnɔ sʋ gbaa, halɩɩ abuu gbaa ii biti i kuusi.”
42019041	Ba maa tiri Gyerusalem tɔ nɩɩ o wu kadɛ mʋ, o su sa kɩmʋ asa.
42019042	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fan daa fan nyi ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ bɩya fanɛ keyuula ndaga kakɛ nɩmʋ mʋ, naafɔɔ ɩ bʋrɔn. Amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ fen mee yɛ fen wu ɔkpa mʋ.
42019043	Kakaakʋ ii biti ɩ ba, kɛ fanɛ akisipu ba kʋsʋ yɩlɛ fanɛ sʋ, kyaabɔɔ fanɛ kɛ ba nyan fanɛ lɩɩ fanɛ abaafʋn kpini.
42019044	Bee biti ba da fanɛ kasɛ, fanɛ yɛ nbii mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ fanɛ asɛ kpini. Bɛ mɛɛ yɛ ba yɛgɛ fanɛ ɔpɔrɛ kubuu kʋlʋn kɩ gyaga kɩmʋ bɩrɩsa sʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ba fanɛ asɛ mʋ, fan man taalɛ pɛɛsɛ bɩɩ.”
42019045	Nɩɩ Yesu loo kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ opula tɔ, nɩɩ o piili ɛɛ gya bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ fɛ atɔ mʋ.
42019046	Ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ba tɔwɛ yɩla Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, ‘Mɛ kɩkpaara kii biti kɩ baa kɩ gyɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ kɩkpaara nɩn, amaa fan taa kɩmʋ biliŋi bamʋ nɩɩ bee yuuri ɔlʋn sʋ mʋ ɔbaalakpa.’ ”
42019047	Kakɛ kʋmaa nɩmʋ ɛɛ kaapʋ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ yɛ asa mʋ tɔ agyankpaapʋ bee biti fɛɛ ba mɔɔ mʋ.
42019048	Amaa ba man taalɛ nyɛ ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ba bɔla sʋ kɛ ba waa kanɩn, lɩɩ fɛɛ asa mʋ kpini ba taa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ mata mʋ bee nu mʋ asɛ.
42020001	Nɩɩ ɩ ba fɛɛ kakaakʋ Yesu bʋ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa kasɔrɔga tɔ ɛɛ kaapʋ asa yɛgɛ ɛɛ tɔwɛ bamʋ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ. Nɩɩ Aseepu abɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ yɛ kadɛ tɔ abɩlɩsa gbaa ba tii sʋ, nɩɩ ba ba mʋ asɛ.
42020002	Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Tɔwɛ anɛ, anɩmʋ ɔlʋn sʋ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ fɩɩ waa atɔ nɩmʋ? Anɩmʋ ɩ sa fʋ ɔlʋn maŋa?”
42020003	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ngbaa mɛ n biti n taasɛ fanɛ asɩn kʋ kɛ fan lɛɛ mɛ kɔnɔ.
42020004	Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee mʋ nɩɩ Gyɔn gyee asa mʋ, kɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ nɩn abɛɛ kɩ lɩɩ asa asɛ?”
42020005	Nɩɩ bamʋ gbaa‐gbaa bamʋ ba taa kɩmʋ sʋ nfɛɛrɛ nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Nɩɩ an kan tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Kɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ mʋ’, ee biti ɔ taasɛ yɛ, ‘Mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ fan man kɔɔlɛ gyii?’
42020006	Amaa nɩɩ an kan tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɩ lɩɩ asa asɛ mʋ’, asa mʋ kpini bee biti ba twɩɩ anɛ abuu, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ Gyɔn gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ nɩn.”
42020007	Ɩmʋ sʋ, ba lɛɛ Yesu kɔnɔ yɛ, “An man nyi ntɩn mʋ nɩɩ Gyɔn kekyugyee mʋ lɩɩ.”
42020008	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Kanɩn bɩrɛ, ngbaa mɛ n mɛɛ yɛ n tɔwɛ fanɛ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ n waa ɩnɩmʋ kpini.”
42020009	Nɩɩ Yesu bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan nɩmʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn kʋ dɔɔ wayɩn kʋdɔɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ taa hayɩɩ sa adɔɔpʋ kʋ, nɩɩ o kpee ɔkpa naa kyɛɛrɛɛ.
42020010	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ oyu mʋ abi kɩtɩyɛ fʋʋ mʋ, nɩɩ kʋdɔɔ wuya mʋ sun mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ, kpee ahayɩɩpʋ mʋ asɛ yɛ ba sa mʋ wayɩn oyu abi mʋ ɩkʋ lɩɩ mʋ kʋdɔɔ mʋ tɔ. Amaa ahayɩɩpʋ mʋ ba dayɩ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ bwiiyaa mʋ abaa kpan.
42020011	Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla bwii sun kɩyaafɔlɛ pʋpwɛ, nɩɩ ba bɩla bwii dayɩ mʋ, waa mʋ ipeeli tɔ, bwiiyaa mʋ abaa kpan.
42020012	Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla bwii sun ɔsasapʋ, nɩɩ ba bɩla dayɩ larɩgɛ mʋ, lɛɛ mʋ lɩɩ kʋdɔɔ mʋ tɔ.
42020013	“Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, kʋdɔɔ wuya mʋ yɛ, ‘Nɛnɛ nɩɩ n biti n waa? N biti n sun mɛ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ obii, akʋtɔ bee biti ba taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa mʋ.’
42020014	“Amaa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ kʋdɔɔ mʋ ahayɩɩpʋ ba wu obii mʋ, ba taa nfɛɛrɛ mʋ sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ kapatɩyɛ ogyipu mʋ, fan yɛgɛ a mɔɔ mʋ, kɛ atɔ mʋ a biliŋi anɛ lɛɛ.’
42020015	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba lɛɛ mʋ lɩɩ wayɩn kʋdɔɔ mʋ tɔ nɩɩ ba mɔɔ mʋ. “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ, mɩnɛ gbaa nɩɩ oyu kʋdɔɔ wuya mʋ ii biti ɔ waa ahayɩɩpʋ mʋ?
42020016	Kʋdɔɔ wuya mʋ ii biti ɔ ba mɔɔ ahayɩɩpʋ mʋ, kɛ ɔ taa oyu kʋdɔɔ mʋ sa akʋ.” Nɩɩ asa mʋ ba maa nu falɛ mʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ “Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ taa kanɩn kpee kata.”
42020017	Nɩɩ Yesu kɩɩ bamʋ ansi tɔ, taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Asɩnkyan yɩlasa maa tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Kubuu mʋ nɩɩ apɔyɩpʋ ba kina mʋ, kɩmʋ ɩ ba biliŋi kɩbɔntɔnbʋlɔntɔ kubuu kparɛ mʋ’ mʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ ɩɩ kaapʋ?
42020018	Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩyɛ kubuu maŋa sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ gyayɩ tɔ buriburi. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kubuu mʋ kɩ tɩyɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ patɩyɛ tɔ.”
42020019	Nɩɩ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ yɛ aseepu abɩlɩsa mʋ ba bɩɩ fɛɛ kɩŋasan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɔɔ mʋ i yii bamʋ nɩn. Nɩɩ bee biti ɔkpa ba kɩtaa mʋ opula maŋa tɔ. Amaa ba sɩlɛ asa mʋ.
42020020	Yɛgɛ abɩlɩsa mʋ ba taa bamʋ ansi yii Yesu sʋ, nɩɩ ba lɛɛ apɛɛtɩpʋ akʋ yɛ ba waa mu ansi sʋ kɩdanbɩrasa. Bɛɛ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ bee biti ba nyɛ Yesu kɩtaa lɩɩ mʋ asɩn tɔwɛsa sʋ, kɛ ba taa mʋ sa ɔsʋwʋlɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ alʋlʋnpʋ.
42020021	Ɩmʋ sʋ apɛɛtɩpʋ mʋ ba tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, an nyi fɛɛ fʋ ɩ tɔwɛ nɩɩ fɩɩ kaapʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋrɔn, nɩɩ fʋ mɛɛ mɛɛgɛ tɔ, amaa nɩɩ fɩɩ kaapʋ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔkpa mʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ sʋ.
42020022	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ daaga fɛɛ a ka tʋʋtʋʋ sa Roma Ɩsʋwʋlɛ Owura lala Kayisa, abɛɛ a man ka?”
42020023	Nɩɩ Yesu bɩɩ fɛɛ apɛɛtɩpʋ mʋ bɛɛ da mʋ ɔtɔ tɔ nɩn, kɛ ba nyɛ nu mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ asɩn. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ,
42020024	“Fan taa nderebi mʋ ba kɛ n kɩɩ.” Maa wu kɩmʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ foto yɛ kɩtɩɩ ɩ gyan kɩmʋ sʋ?”
42020025	Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Owura lala Kayisa lɛɛ nɩn.” Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Kanɩn bɩrɛ fan taa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ Owura lala Kayisa lɛɛ mʋ sa mʋ, kɛ fan taa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ sa Ɩbwaarɛ.”
42020026	Lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ sʋ mʋ, i kyinkyin apɛɛtɩpʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ba laatɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ba man taalɛ ba nyɛ mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ asɩn kʋ ba taa kɩtaa mʋ sakyɔ mʋ tɔ.
42020027	Gyiwu abi kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Sadusi mʋ nɩɩ ba yɛ kelewu kyiŋi man bʋ tɔ mʋ, akʋ ba ba Yesu asɛ yɛ asɩn taasɛsa. Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ,
42020028	“Ɔkaapʋpʋ, anɛ naana Mosesi kyʋrɔɔ sa anɛ yɛ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan wu san okulapu‐kyɩɩ, nɩɩ ba man kʋʋgɛ mʋ, i tiri fɛɛ mu‐supu ɔ taa mʋ kili, kʋʋgɛ nbii sa mʋ‐daa mʋ.
42020029	To! Anyibii asunɔ akʋ ba kyɩna ba bʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔgyankpaapʋ mʋ kili ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kʋʋgɛ nɩɩ o wu.
42020030	Nɩɩ ɔnyɔsapʋ mʋ kili okulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ gbaa mʋ wu.
42020031	Nɩɩ ɔsasapʋ mʋ gbaa kili mʋ, nɩɩ o wu. Nɩɩ ɩ waa kanan halɩɩ asa asunɔ mʋ kpini ba kili mʋ, yɛgɛ bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋ maa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ ba man kʋʋgɛ.
42020032	Ɩmʋ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ okulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ gbaa ba wu.
42020033	Ɩmʋ sʋ an biti a taasɛ yɛ fɛɛ nɩɩ kakɛ lala mʋ nɩɩ asa kpini ba kan kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ, bamʋ tɔ ɔmɔɔ ii biti ɔ baa ɔ gyɛ mu‐kuli? Lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ asunɔ maŋa kpini ba wʋla kyɩna kili mʋ.”
42020034	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Dulinya nɩmʋ tɔ bɩrɛ asa bee kili.
42020035	Amaa bamʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wu yɛ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ba nyɛ kelewu kyiŋi, kɛ ba kyɩna dulinyaa pʋpwɛ tɔ mʋ, ba man bɩla yɛ ba kili.
42020036	Ba man bɩla yɛ ba wu kakaakʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ bee biti ba baa be du nɩn fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ. Ba gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbii lɩɩ fɛɛ ba maa kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ sʋ.
42020037	Nɩɩ lɩɩ kelewu kyiŋi asɩn bɩrɛ, Mosesi gbaa kɔɔlɛ gyii. Kanɩn sʋ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ o wu kɩpʋnfa maa dɩyɛ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ yɛ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ Abraham maa Isaki yɛ Gyekobu Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ.
42020038	Ɔ man gyɛ alewupu Ɩbwaarɛ nɩn, amaa ɔ gyɛ asa kɩɩsa lɛɛ nɩn. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ mʋ alewupu banɩmʋ ba san ba tɛ nkpa tɔ.”
42020039	Nɩɩ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ akʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, fʋ tɔwɛ kɩmʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ.”
42020040	Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ ɔkʋ man bɩla taalɛ nyɛ kɔkɔlɔ ɔsɩɩ taasɛ mʋ sɛhn.
42020041	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ taalɛ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ gyɛ Owura Dawidi kanaana‐bii?
42020042	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Dawidi gbaa‐gbaa tɔwɛ mʋ Ɩlʋn ɔwʋlɛ mʋ tɔ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ mɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ yɛ, “Kyɩna mɛ gyisa sʋ nfɩɩ,
42020043	naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n biti n taa fʋ dʋn ana ba waa fʋ ayaa ɔgyagakpa.” ’
42020044	Nɩɩ Dawidi gbaa‐gbaa ɩɩ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ’ bɩrɛ, nɛnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ mʋ kanaana‐bii?”
42020045	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ asa mʋ ba san bee nu mʋ, Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ,
42020046	“Fan kɩɩ fan n‐yɩɩ sʋ danbɩrasa lɩɩ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ sʋ. Ba gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti ɩkaalɛ lala kubun bɛɛ kyaabɔɔ tɔ, nɩɩ bee biti fɛɛ ba taa bɛɛrɛɛ fwaala bamʋ agya tɔ, bee biti ba kyɩna ngya kparɛ sʋ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa yɛ ɔgyaŋɛ gyiikpa.
42020047	Bee pɩna akulapu‐kyɩɩ bɛɛ kɔɔlɛ bamʋ akpaara, nɩɩ bɛɛ yɩlɛ ipula bɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ bʋnswɩɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ nyɛ pɩna asa fɛɛ ba gyɛ asa danbɩrasa. Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ bɩɩtɛ kanɩn asa maŋa asʋ gaa.”
42021001	Yesu maa bʋ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ o diyaa mu ansi wu atɔ wuya ana ba maa sʋ afulee bɛɛ waa kakɛɛ kɩdakaa tɔ mʋ.
42021002	Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla wu okulapu‐kyɩɩ otiripu kʋ gbaa maa taa nderebi anyɔ ba waa tɔ.
42021003	Nɩɩ Yesu yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, okulapu‐kyɩɩ otiripu nɩmʋ waa tɔ afulee ɔ kyɔ bamʋ kpini.
42021004	Asa banɩmʋ kpini, ba lɛɛ lɩɩ bamʋ afulee gaa mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ mʋ tɔ nɩn. Amaa ɔkyɩɩ nɩmʋ bɩrɛ halɩɩ maa mʋ kitiri kɩnɩmʋ mʋ, ɔ taa mu afulee mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ kpini ba waa tɔ.”
42021005	Nɩɩ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ akʋ bee biri kiligyima bɛɛ lɩɩ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ, kanan mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋrɔn, yɛ abuu danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ ba taa pɔyɩ, yɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ asa ba kɛɛ nɩɩ ba taa lɔŋɔ obu mʋ sa Ɩbwaarɛ. Amaa Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ,
42021006	“Ɩmʋ nɩɩ fan wu falɛ kpini, saŋa kʋ ii biti ɔ ba yɛgɛ fɛn mɛɛ bɩla yɛ fen wu kubuu kʋlʋn gbaa kɩ maa gyan kʋkʋ sʋ, bee biti ba nɩn kubuu kʋmaa nɩmʋ tʋʋ kasɛ.”
42021007	Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, saŋa mɔmɔ nɩɩ falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ a biti a waa? Nɩɩ mɩnɛ sɩnkaala ii biti ɩ waa kaapʋ fɛɛ saŋa mʋ fʋʋ fɛɛ kanɩn atɔ nɩmʋ ii biti ɩ waa?”
42021008	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan baa fan da sʋ, kɛ ɔkʋ ɔ man pɩna fanɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ asa gaalaagaa bee biti ba ba mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Mɛ ɩ gyɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ’. Nɩɩ bee biti ba bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Laalaalʋwɛ saŋa mʋ tee tiri tɔ’. Amaa fan man buu bamʋ.
42021009	Fan kan nu kɩnaa yɛ ɩkɔ sʋ mʋ, fan man waa kufuu. Ɩ dagaa fɛɛ falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ ɩ maa gyankpaa ba kanɩn pɔyɩ. Amaa ɩ mɛɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ tee tiri tɔ nɩn.”
42021010	Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla kyaga sʋ yɛ, “Ɔsʋwʋlɛ ii biti ɔ kɔ yɛ ɔsʋwʋlɛ, kɛ awuragyi yɛ awuragyi ba kɔ yɛ abaa.
42021011	Kɛ kasɛ ki gyingyen ipula kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ, kɛ akʋn yɛ alɔ kyaŋɛsa a tɩyɛ katɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ, kɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ a sʋ kufuu yɛ ɩsɩnkaala lala‐lala a lɩɩ sʋsʋ.
42021012	“Amaa pɔyɩ kɛ ɩnɩmʋ kpini ɩ ba mʋ, bee biti ba kɩtaa fanɛ kɛ ba nyanla fanɛ. Bee biti ba taa fanɛ kpee kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩgyaŋɛkpa naa gyii fanɛ asɩn, kɛ ba naa tii fanɛ ibu. Bee biti ba taa fanɛ kpee awura yɛ alʋnpʋ ansi tɔ, lɩɩ mɛ sʋ.
42021013	Ɩnɩmʋ ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ kɛ fan nyɛ ɔkpa tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa bamʋ.
42021014	Amaa fan yɛgɛ ɩ baa ɩ bʋ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ fɛɛ, ɩ man dagaa fan yɩyɛɛ lɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan naa tɔwɛ kɔɔlɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ mʋ sʋ.
42021015	Kpalɩ fɛɛ n biti n sa fanɛ kanyaasɩn, kɛ n kaapʋ fanɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan naa tɔwɛ, yɛgɛ fanɛ akisipu ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ kina abɛɛ o gyii ɩmɔɔrɛ lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan tɔwɛ mʋ sʋ.
42021016	Fanɛ akʋʋgɛpʋ abɛɛ adaa yɛ asupu abɛɛ fanɛ kʋʋpʋ ana abɛɛ akyɛmɩnɛ bee biti ba lɛɛ fanɛ sa, kɛ ba mɔɔ fanɛ tɔ akʋ.
42021017	Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ii biti o kisi fanɛ, lɩɩ mɛ sʋ.
42021018	Amaa halɩɩ fanɛ ɔkʋ kinyinibi kʋlʋn gbaa mɛɛ yɛ ɔ fɔyɩ.
42021019	Fan kan nyɛ nɩɩ fan yɩlɛ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ kenken mʋ, ii biti ɩ mɔlɩgɛ fanɛ.
42021020	“Nɩɩ fan kan wu fɛɛ anaakɔpʋ ba kyaabɔɔ Gyerusalem kadɛ mʋ, fen biti fan bɩɩ fɛɛ kɩmʋ kinyita ki tiri tɔ.
42021021	Kanɩn sʋ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyudeya kasɛ sʋ mʋ, ba lɩɩ sɩlɛ kpee abɩɩ tɔ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyerusalem kadɛ tɔ mɔɔ ba lɩɩ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man bʋ kadɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, ba man loo Gyerusalem kadɛ mʋ tɔ.
42021022	Kpalɩ fɛɛ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ nkɛ mʋ, ɩmʋ ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ kpini ɩ ba tɔ.
42021023	Nɩɩ akyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ ɩtɔ yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ nbii‐nyɛpʋsa mʋ laakʋ! Lɩɩ fɛɛ awʋrʋfɔ lala a biti a ba tɩyɛ kasɛ maŋa sʋ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ agbʋ lala mʋ ɩ ba Gyiwu abi sʋ.
42021024	Isakunde nɩɩ bee biti ba taa mɔɔ Gyiwu abi mʋ akʋ, kɛ ba kɩtaa bamʋ akʋ naa biliŋi anyɛ ndɛndɛmandɛ ɩsʋwʋlɛ sʋ. Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ bee biti ba taa Gyerusalem waa bamʋ kebiti naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ŋmina sa bamʋ mʋ.
42021025	“Nɩɩ ɩsɩnkaala ii biti ɩ waa kyɔwɛ yɛ ɔbwaayɩ yɛ akyikpebi tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔpʋ ɩlawʋ yɛ apaa a maa da sʋ mʋ, ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kasɛ sʋ kpini, kɛ ba waa yɛrɛyɛrɛ.
42021026	Nɩɩ ba maa kɩɩ ba gyoo kanɩn atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ waa falɛ mʋ, kufuu ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ asa ba kirin‐kirin, kpalɩ fɛɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ kpini ii biti i gyingyen lɩɩ ɩmʋ ipula.
42021027	Kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ bee biti ba wu mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa maa sʋ ɔlʋn yɛ bʋnyaa lala n lɩɩ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ tɔ n ba.
42021028	Nɩɩ fan kan wu saŋa mʋ nɩɩ falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ ii biti i piili mʋ, fan kʋsʋ yɩlɛ kɛ fan diyaa fanɛ ansi sʋsʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ kamɔlɩgɛ mʋ ki tiri tɔ.”
42021029	Nɩɩ Yesu bɔɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan nɩmʋ yɛ, “Fan kɩɩ kɩdɩnpɔ oyu yɛ iyu mʋ nɩɩ ɩ san mʋ kpini.
42021030	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fan wu ɩ maa pɔrɔgɛ mʋ, fen nyi fɛɛ kɩkyɛ ki tiri tɔ.
42021031	Kanɩn ɔkpa maŋa sʋ, nɩɩ fan kan wu atɔ nɩmʋ a maa waa mʋ, fan bɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ ki tiri tɔ.
42021032	“N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, ndaga kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ asa ba mɛɛ yɛ ba wu lʋwɛ, pɔyɩ kɛ atɔ nɩmʋ kpini ɩ waa.
42021033	Sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ kpini ii biti ɩ kyʋn, amaa mɛ kɔnɔ tɔ asɩn mʋ bɩrɛ, ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ kyʋn kpaa.
42021034	“Fan baa fan da fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ, kɛ fan man taa fan n‐yɩɩ sa kensi‐gyii gaa, yɛ kata‐bʋʋ yɛ kakyɩna tɔ atɔ bitisa kʋkyɔ, kɛ kanɩn kakɛ maŋa kɩ man ba purigi fanɛ fɛɛ ɔdʋʋ maa da kunun mʋ.
42021035	Kpalɩ fɛɛ ii biti i purigi asa mʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ kasɛ sʋ mʋ kpini.
42021036	Ɩmʋ sʋ saŋa kʋmaa fan baa fan da sʋ, kɛ fɛn kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ kɛ ɩ lɛɛ fanɛ lɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba falɛ, kɛ fan taalɛ yɩlɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mu ansi tɔ.”
42021037	Kakɛ kʋmaa nɩmʋ Yesu ɩɩ kaapʋ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ kalaatɩpwɛ kʋmaa nɩmʋ mɔɔ ee kpee ɛɛ dɛ Olifu kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ.
42021038	Nɩɩ nyenyenfuu kʋmaa nɩmʋ mɔɔ asa mʋ bee kpee kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ bee nu mʋ asɛ.
42022001	Nkɛ mʋ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi bee gyii Kesu kɔnɔ kɔlɔŋɔ bodobodo mʋ nɩɩ ba man taa kɩfɛ tinsa waa tɔ mʋ tiri tɔ. Kanɩn saŋa maŋa nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ mʋ.
42022002	Nɩɩ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ bee biti ɩkpa mʋ nɩɩ ba taa kɩtaa Yesu mɔɔ kɛ ɔkʋ ɔ man wu, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba sɩlɛ sakyɔ mʋ.
42022003	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ taa nfɛɛrɛ libi waa Gyudasi mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ Isikariyoti mʋ tɔ. Ɔ gyɛ asunpu kudu anyɔ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ.
42022004	Nɩɩ Gyudasi kpee aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa kɩkpaara akunpu bɩlɩsa mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ maa bamʋ ba naa taa nfɛɛrɛ ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɛɛ Yesu sa.
42022005	Nɩɩ ɩ waa bamʋ ɔkɔn, nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ kyula yɛ bee biti ba sa mu afulee.
42022006	Nɩɩ o kyula nɩɩ ee biti ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa lɛɛ Yesu sa bamʋ, kanan mʋ nɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ ba man nyɛ wu.
42022007	Kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi bee gyii bamʋ Bodobodo mʋ nɩɩ ba man taa kɩfɛ tinsa waa tɔ, yɛ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ kɩmɔɔ fʋʋ.
42022008	Nɩɩ Yesu sun Pita maa Gyɔn nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan naa lɔŋɔ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ an biti a taa gyii Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ agyitɔ mʋ.”
42022009	Nɩɩ ba taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ fii biti fɛɛ a naa lɔŋɔ ɩmʋ yɩla?”
42022010	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan maa dan fen loo kadɛ lala mʋ tɔ mʋ, fen biti fan gyaŋa ɔnyɩn kʋ maa sʋ kolobi yɛ nkyu. Fan buu mʋ loo kɩkpaara mʋ nɩɩ ee loo mʋ sʋ.
42022011	Kɛ fan tɔwɛ kɩkpaara wuya mʋ yɛ, ɔkaapʋpʋ mʋ yɛ, ‘Nkɩɩ afɔ obu mʋ nɩɩ maa mɛ abɩɩlapʋ an biti a kyɩna tɔ gyii Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ mʋ?’
42022012	Ee biti ɔ kaapʋ fanɛ obu lala kʋ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ abansʋrʋ mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ lɔŋɔ kɩmʋ tɔ waa kɩmʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa. Fan lɔŋɔ agyitɔ mʋ yɩla tʋtɔ.”
42022013	Ba lɩɩ naa wu atɔ mʋ kpini fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ ba kʋʋla Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ mʋ.
42022014	Saŋa mʋ maa fʋʋ mʋ, Yesu maa mu asunpu ba naa kyɩna tʋtɔ bee gyii.
42022015	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, naafɔɔ n biti gaa fɛɛ maa fanɛ an gyii Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ agyitɔ anɩmʋ pɔyɩ kɛ n gyii mɛ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ.
42022016	Lɩɩ fɛɛ n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, n man bɩla yɛ n gyii falɛ agyitɔ anɩmʋ, naa fʋʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ agyitɔ nɩmʋ kigyii kasɛ ɩɩ kaapʋ ɩ waa Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ.
42022017	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu taa kɔɔpʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kɔɔlɛ kɩnɩmʋ barɩgɛ tɔ sa abaa.
42022018	Lɩɩ fɛɛ n wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, n man bɩla yɛ n nuu falɛ nta nɩmʋ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩ ba mʋ tɔ.”
42022019	Nɩɩ ɔ taa bodobodo, nɩɩ ɔ fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ ɔ kpɛɛ kɩmʋ tɔ sa bamʋ, tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Kɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ sʋ, n taa lɛɛ saraga. Fan gyii kɩmʋ taa nyiŋi mɛ.”
42022020	Ɔkpa kʋlʋn maŋa sʋ ba maa gyii kalaatɩpwɛ agyitɔ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa kɔɔpʋ sa bamʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nta nɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ katɔwɛ kyula pʋpwɛ mʋ nɩɩ n taa mɛ nkalan tii ɩmʋ kɔnɔ, nɩɩ n kyɛɛgɛ wʋrɩgɛ sa fanɛ.
42022021	Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɛɛ mɛ sa mʋ, maa mʋ abaa ɩ bʋ agyitɔ nɩmʋ tɔ.
42022022	Mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ n biti n kpee Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla tɔwɛ yɩla mʋ. Amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɛɛ mɛ sa mʋ, mʋ laakʋ.”
42022023	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba piili bɛɛ taasɛ abaa bamʋ tɔ ɔmɔɔ ii biti ɔ waa kanɩn asɩn nɩmʋ?
42022024	Nɩɩ kamɔɔrɛ‐gyii kɩ tɩyɛ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ sʋ lɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ bamʋ tɔ ɔbɩlɩsa.
42022025	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Dulinya nɩmʋ tɔ awura bɛɛ nyan bamʋ asa nɩn, amaa bamʋ asa mʋ bɛɛ tɩɩ bamʋ yɛ, ‘Anɛ akyɛtɔpʋ.’
42022026	Amaa fan man yɛgɛ fanɛ lɛɛ ɔ baa o du kanɩn. Fanɛ tɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ, o biliŋi fɛɛ kebii, kɛ fanɛ ɔgyankpaapʋ mɔɔ o biliŋi fɛɛ fanɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ.
42022027	Ɔmɔmɔ ɩ gyɛ ɔbɩlɩsa? Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ ba kyɩna nɩɩ ee gyii mʋ, abɛɛ ɔmɔɔ nɩɩ ɛɛ bɩya agyitɔ mʋ? Man gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ ba kyɩna ee gyii mʋ? Amaa mɛɛ mɛ n bʋ fanɛ asɛ n sun fɛɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ.
42022028	Mɛ awʋrʋfɔ tɔ mʋ fan yɩlɛ mɛ kamaa.
42022029	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ mɛ‐Sɛ sa mɛ ɔkpa fɛɛ n gyii kuwura mʋ, kanɩn ɔkpa maŋa sʋ nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n sa fanɛ yɛ fan gyii kuwura.
42022030	Nɩɩ n kan be gyii kuwura mʋ, n biti n yɛgɛ maa fanɛ an gyii, kɛ a nuu teeburi kʋlʋn sʋ, kɛ fan kyɩna nwuragya sʋ kɛ fan talɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi nbunɔ kudu anyɔ mʋ.”
42022031	Yesu tɔwɛ Pita yɛ, “Simon, Simon! Nu nfɩɩ! Sɩtaanɛ kʋlɛ ɔkpa Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, kɛ ɔ bɔla kʋtʋʋ tɔ kɩɩ sʋ kyaalɛ fanɛ fɔyɩ fɛɛ ayu waatɛ mʋ.
42022032	Amaa Simon, n kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ sa fʋ kɛ fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ man tɩyɛ. Nɩɩ fʋ kan kyɛɛgɛ fʋ nfɛɛrɛ ba mɛ asɛ mʋ, waa fʋ tɔɔmaa ana abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ɔlʋn tɔ.”
42022033	Amaa Pita lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, n kʋʋla mɛ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ obu kitii tɔ gbaa n biti n buu fʋ kpee, nɩɩ halɩɩ lewu gbaa maa fʋ an biti a wu.”
42022034	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Pita! Pɔyɩ kɛ kyaasɛ ɔ bʋn kagyanbwɛ nɩmʋ mʋ, fii biti fu kina ɩlɩɩ ɩsa yɛ fʋ man nyi mɛ.”
42022035	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n kyɩna sun fanɛ yɛgɛ fan man sʋ afulee ɔwaakpa yɛ itaakpe yɛ asɩbɩta mʋ, fan pan kʋtɔ kʋ?” Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “A man pan sɛhn.”
42022036	Nɩɩ Yesu yɛ, “Amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ afulee ɔwaakpa yɛ taakpe mʋ ɔ taa. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ sakunde mʋ, ɔ fɛ mʋ balɩmaasʋ kɛ ɔ taa sɔɔ kʋkʋ.
42022037	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba kyʋrɔɔ mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn yɩla yɛ, ‘Ba taa mʋ bʋga alibi awaapʋ tɔ.’ Ɩmʋ sʋ n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ kanɩn Asɩnkyan yɩlasa nɩmʋ ɩ ba tɔ kesintin nbɩɩnbɩɩ lɩɩ mɛ sʋ.”
42022038	Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, kɩɩ isakunde anyɔ ndee.” Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɩ kʋkwɛ.”
42022039	Nɩɩ Yesu lɩɩ tʋtɔ, nɩɩ maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba kpee olifu kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba wʋla bɛɛ waa mʋ.
42022040	Ba maa fʋʋ opula maŋa mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ kɛ fan man lɩɩ tɩyɛ kʋtʋʋ tɔ kɩɩ tɔ.”
42022041	Maa tɔwɛ kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ o nin lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ gbɛrɛɛ naa yɔɔ muŋa mu amulii sʋ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ yɛ,
42022042	“Nsɛ, nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ fu kebiti mʋ, yɛgɛ awʋrʋfɔ anɩmʋ ɩ kɩlɩgɛ mɛ. Amaa man gyɛ mi kebiti, waa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ fu kebiti.”
42022043	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba mʋ asɛ, ba waa mʋ ɔlʋn tɔ.
42022044	Lɩɩ kayɩyɛɛ yɛ kensi payɩ sʋ mʋ, ɔ taa ɔlʋn kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ, nɩɩ kududuu mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ ɩɩ kyɔlɛ ɩ tɩyɛ kasɛ mʋ i du nɩn fɛɛ nkalan.
42022045	Maa kʋsʋ mʋ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ tɔ mʋ, o bwii naa tu mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba maa dɛ nsɩɩrɛ lɩɩ bamʋ kɩkpɩnɛ yɛ kɔkɔlɔ nyita sʋ.
42022046	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fan dɛ nsɩɩrɛ? Fan kʋsʋ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ kɛ fan man lɩɩ tɩyɛ kʋtʋʋ tɔ kɩɩ tɔ.”
42022047	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu san ɛɛ maa sʋ ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ sakyɔ kʋ ba ba lɩɩ tʋtɔ. Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gyudasi mʋ, gyankpaa sakyɔ mʋ. Nɩɩ o nin tiri Yesu, nɩɩ ɔ baari mʋ tɔ.
42022048	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ Gyudasi yɛ, “Kibiri tɔ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ fɩɩ lɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa fɩɩ sa?”
42022049	Tʋtɔ mʋ, Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ mʋ asɛ mʋ, ba maa wu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ waa mʋ, nɩɩ ba taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ a lɛɛ anɛ isakunde mʋ kɔ?”
42022050	Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ ŋɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ gyisa kʋsʋ tɩn.
42022051	Amaa nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ kanɩn kɩwaa.” Nɩɩ Yesu taa mʋ kɩbaa mata ɔnyɩn mʋ kʋsʋ nɩɩ kɩ kyaga sʋ.
42022052	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ yɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa akunpu abɩlɩsa yɛ kadɛ tɔ abɩlɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ba ba kɩtaa mʋ mʋ yɛ, “N gyɛ kumu tɔ ɔlʋn oyu nɩn nɩɩ fan sʋ isakunde yɛ agulungu kɛ fɛn ba kɔ yɛ mɛ?
42022053	Kakɛ kʋmaa nɩmʋ maa fanɛ nɩn kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ tɔ, nɩɩ fan man kɩtaa mɛ. Amaa ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ fanɛ saŋa fɛɛ Sɩtaanɛ kitentenbiri tɔ owura maa sun kusun.”
42022054	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba kɩtaa Yesu, nɩɩ ba taa mʋ kpee Ɩbwaarɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ. Nɩɩ Pita sii kamaa tɔ o buu bamʋ kɩyaa‐kɩyaa.
42022055	Ba maa naa fʋʋ mʋ, ba dɛɛla fʋlɔn kɩkpaara mʋ nsana bɛɛ wʋlɛ, nɩɩ Pita naa sii kyɩna bamʋ asɛ.
42022056	Nɩɩ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ kibite wu Pita maa tɛ fʋlɔn mʋ asɛ. Ɔ kɩɩ mʋ diin nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ gbaa tii Yesu sʋ.”
42022057	Nɩɩ Pita kyɛɛ yɛ, “Ɔkyɩɩ, n man nyi mʋ kpini‐kpini.”
42022058	Ɩ maa waa kesin mʋ, ɔkʋ mɔɔ bɩla wu Pita nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Ngbaa fʋ, fʋ gyɛ bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋ.” Nɩɩ Pita lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn n man tii su.”
42022059	Saŋa gbɛrɛɛ kamaa mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ kyaga sʋ ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kesintin, ɩ man sʋ ɩmɔɔrɛ yɛ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ man tii Yesu sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ gyɛ Galile obii nɩn.”
42022060	Nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn, n man nyi asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ tɔwɛ falɛ sʋ.” Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ kyaasɛ bʋn.
42022061	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu biliŋi kɩɩ Pita surum. Nɩɩ Pita nyiŋi asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ wʋla tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Pɔyɩ kɛ kyaasɛ ɔ bʋn kɩbwayɩkɛ kɩnɩmʋ mʋ, fii biti fʋ kyɛɛ ɩlɩɩ ɩsa yɛ fʋ man nyi mɛ.”
42022062	Nɩɩ Pita lɩɩ naa su gaa.
42022063	Asa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu bʋ bamʋ abaa tɔ mʋ, bee yooli mʋ yɛgɛ bɛɛ dayɩ mʋ.
42022064	Ba waa Yesu kebunbun ansi, nɩɩ ba da‐da mʋ ɩtan nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ, kaapʋ anɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ da fʋ.”
42022065	Nɩɩ ba saalɛ mʋ asebi gaalaagaa.
42022066	Kayɩ maa kɛ mʋ, ɔsʋwʋlɛ abɩlɩsa yɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ ba ba gyaŋɛ nɩɩ ba taa Yesu ba bamʋ asɩn ogyikpa mʋ.
42022067	Nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Tɔwɛ anɛ, fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ?” Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N kan tɔwɛ fanɛ gbaa fan mɛɛ yɛ fan kɔɔlɛ gyii.
42022068	Nɩɩ n kan taasɛ fanɛ asɩn gbaa, fan mɛɛ yɛ fan lɛɛ mɛ asɩn maŋa kɔnɔ.
42022069	Amaa lɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ ɩɩ sʋ ii kpee mʋ, mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa n biti n baa n tɛ Owura lala Ɔlʋnpʋ Ɩbwaarɛ gyisa sʋ.”
42022070	Nɩɩ bamʋ kpini ba taasɛ yɛ, “Kanɩn sʋ fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ?” Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɩmʋ nɩɩ fan tɔwɛ maŋa.”
42022071	Nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Mɩnɛ asɩn nɩɩ an bɩla an biti a nu tii sʋ? Lɩɩ fɛɛ an nu asɩn mʋ lɩɩ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ.”
42023001	Nɩɩ kʋbʋ mʋ kpini ba kʋsʋ taa Yesu naa sa ɔsʋwʋlɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ Paleti.
42023002	Nɩɩ ba piili bɛɛ pwɩɩ mʋ asɩn nɩmʋ sʋ yɛ, “An wu kanyɩn nɩmʋ maa nyita anɛ asa yɛ ba man ka tʋʋtʋʋ sa Owura lala Kayisa. Nɩɩ ɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ Owura yɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ.”
42023003	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Paleti taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Gyiwu abi owura mʋ?” Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɛɛhn, ɩmʋ nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ maŋa.”
42023004	Nɩɩ Paleti tɔwɛ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa mʋ yɛ kʋbʋ damantɛ mʋ yɛ, “N man wu ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn pwɩɩsa akʋ.”
42023005	Amaa ba mata sʋ yɛ, “Ɔ taa mʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ tɔwɛ kʋsaa Gyiwu abi kpini nkɔlɔ. O piili lɩɩ Galile nɩn halɩɩ ba lɩɩ nfɩɩ.”
42023006	Paleti maa nu Galile kɩtɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ yɛ, “Kanyɩn maa gyɛ Kagalile‐nyɩn nɩn?”
42023007	Maa bɩɩ fɛɛ Yesu lɩɩ owura Herodi ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ, ɔ taa mʋ kpiya Herodi. Saŋa maa tɔ yɛgɛ ngbaa mʋ ɔ bʋ Gyerusalem.
42023008	Owura Herodi maa wu Yesu mʋ, mu ansi i gyii gaa, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ wʋla ee biti mʋ kyɛɛrɛɛ yɛ o wu mʋ lɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ o nu lɩɩ mʋ sʋ mʋ. Ɔ sʋ tamaa fɛɛ o wu mʋ kɛ ɔ waa adangana kɛ o wu.
42023009	Owura mʋ taasɛ mʋ asɩn taasɛsa kɩkyɔ amaa Yesu man lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ.
42023010	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ ba maa sʋ ba yɩlɛ bɛɛ pwɩɩ mʋ.
42023011	Nɩɩ Herodi maa mʋ anaakɔpʋ bee yooli mʋ, nɩɩ ba ŋmasɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ ba taa kaalɛ bʋnswɩɩsa danbɩrasa kʋ bun mʋ, nɩɩ ba bwiiyaa mʋ kpee Paleti asɛ,
42023012	Kanɩn kakɛ maŋa nɩɩ ɔsʋwʋlɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ Paleti maa owura Herodi ba biliŋi akyɛmɩnɛpʋ. Naafɔɔ ba kyɩna ba gyɛ adʋn nɩn.
42023013	Nɩɩ ɔsʋwʋlɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ Paleti tɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa mʋ yɛ kadɛ abɩlɩsa yɛ asa mʋ kpini ba gyaŋɛ.
42023014	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ ɩ bɩya ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ yɛ, mʋ ɩ bɩya kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn ɔsʋwʋlɛ nɩmʋ sʋ. Amaa n maa mɛɛgɛ mʋ asɩn mʋ tɔ fanɛ ansi tɔ nfɩɩ mʋ, n man wu fanɛ asɩn pwɩɩsa mʋ akʋ mʋ sʋ.
42023015	Owura Herodi gbaa ɔ man wu alibi akʋ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ o bwiiyaa mʋ bɩya anɛ. Kesintin tɔ mʋ, ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ man waa alibi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa lewu.
42023016	Kanɩn sʋ n biti n yɛgɛ ba tɩŋɛ mʋ awʋlɛ‐bi kɛ n yɛgɛ mʋ ɔ natɛ.
42023017	(Lɩɩ fɛɛ Kesu kɔnɔ kɔlɔŋɔ ngyaŋɛ kʋmaa mʋ, ɩ gyɛ dankaarɩ nɩn fɛɛ Paleti ɔ lɛɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ ba tii obu mʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ sa bamʋ.)”
42023018	Nɩɩ kʋbʋ damantɛ mʋ ba kuusi kɔnɔ kʋlʋn sʋ yɛ, “Fan taa ɔnyɩn maŋa naa mɔɔ, kɛ fan lɛɛ Barabasi sa anɛ.”
42023019	Barabasi nɩmʋ tɔwɛ kʋsaa asa nkɔlɔ nɩɩ ba kɔ yɛ Roma kɩbanɛ, nɩɩ ɔ bɩla mɔɔ ɔsa kʋ ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ba tii mʋ obu.
42023020	Paleti maa biti yɛ ɔ lɛɛ Yesu sʋ mʋ, o bwii tɔwɛ sa bamʋ.
42023021	Amaa ba maa sʋ bee kuusi yɛ, “Fan da mʋ oyu laasa sʋ, fan da mʋ oyu laasa sʋ!”
42023022	Paleti bwii tɔwɛ bamʋ asɛ kɩsasapʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩn? Mɩnɛ alibi nɩɩ ɔnyɩn maŋa waa? N man wu alibi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa nɩɩ ɔ dagaa lewu. Kanɩn sʋ n biti n yɛgɛ ba tɩŋɛ mʋ awʋlɛ‐bi kɛ n yɛgɛ mʋ ɔ natɛ.”
42023023	Amaa ba lɔŋɔ kuusi tɔ kenken fɛɛ ɔkpa kʋmaa sʋ mʋ ba da mʋ oyu laasa sʋ. Nɩɩ bamʋ kekuusi mʋ i gyii sʋ.
42023024	Ɩmʋ sʋ Paleti waa mʋ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ɔ waa bamʋ kebiti.
42023025	Kanɩn sʋ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ ɔ lɛɛ sa bamʋ mʋ, ɔ lɛɛ mʋ sa bamʋ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ Barabasi mʋ nɩɩ ba tii mʋ obu lɩɩ mʋ kɩtɔwɛ kʋsaa asa nkɔlɔ nɩɩ ba kɔ yɛ kɩbanɛ, yɛ mʋ ɔsa kɩmɔɔ sʋ mʋ. Amaa nɩɩ ɔ taa Yesu sa bamʋ ba naa waa bamʋ kɔkɔlɔ biti.
42023026	Ba maa sʋ bee kpee mʋ, ba gyaŋa Simon Kakereni‐nyɩn mʋ ɔ lɩɩ kukura ee loo Gyerusalem. Nɩɩ ba nyan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋla oyu laasa mʋ o buu Yesu.
42023027	Nɩɩ asa damantɛ kʋ ba buu mʋ, akyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ bee su bɛɛ yɩyɛɛ bɛɛ sa mʋ mʋ gbaa ba tii sʋ.
42023028	Nɩɩ Yesu biliŋi tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Gyerusalem akyɩɩsa, fan man sʋ sa mɛ, fan su sa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ yɛ fanɛ‐bii ana.
42023029	Lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa kʋ ii biti ɔ ba, kɛ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa agbentipu yɛ ɩtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man kʋʋgɛ kɩɩ abɛɛ anyɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ nbii ba man nyɛpʋ.’
42023030	Nɩɩ saŋa maŋa tɔ mʋ, ‘bee biti ba tɔwɛ abɩɩ yɛ, “Fan tɩyɛ anɛ sʋ!” Kɛ ba tɔwɛ adenbi mɔɔ yɛ, “Fan bun anɛ sʋ!” ’
42023031	Nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kanɩn nɩɩ ba sʋ bɛɛ waa oyu bunboli mʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ bee biti ba waa iyu wʋlɛsa mʋ?”
42023032	Nɩɩ ba taa asun libi wuya ana anyɔ tii Yesu sʋ ba naa mɔɔ.
42023033	Ba maa naa fʋʋ opula mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ “Kumu Kɩwɛɛ mʋ”, nɩɩ ba da Yesu maa asun libi wuya ana mata iyu laasa sʋ. Ɔkʋ bʋ mʋ gyisa sʋ yɛgɛ ɔbanban mʋ mɔɔ bʋ mʋ bɩna sʋ.
42023034	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nsɛ, taa bamʋ alibi kɛɛ bamʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba man nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa.” Nɩɩ ba tʋʋ nbii barɩgɛ Yesu atɔ bunsa tɔ.
42023035	Asa mʋ ba yɩlɛ tʋtɔ ba kɩɩ mʋ halɩɩ Gyiwu abi abɩlɩsa mʋ bɛɛ waa mʋ yɛrɛyɛrɛ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔ mɔlɩgɛ akʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kan ɔ gyɛ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ, ɔ mɔlɩgɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ.”
42023036	Nɩɩ anaakɔpʋ mʋ gbaa ba ba ŋmasɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ ba sa mʋ nta nyaŋɛsa.
42023037	Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fʋ gyɛ Gyiwu abi owura kesintin mʋ, mɔlɩgɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ.”
42023038	Nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ asɩn kʋ mu amu sʋ yɛ, ƆNƖMƲ Ɩ GYƐ GYUDA ABI OWURA.
42023039	Asun libi wuya ana mʋ nɩɩ ba saa iyu laasa mʋ sʋ mʋ ɔkʋ piili ɛɛ saalɛ Yesu yɛ, “Man gyɛ fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ? Mɔlɩgɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ kɛ fʋ mɔlɩgɛ anɛ?”
42023040	Amaa ɔbanban mʋ pʋntɛ mʋ sʋ yɛ, “Fʋ man sɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ anɛ kpini an bʋ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ kʋlʋn tɔ falɛ?
42023041	Anɛ bɩrɛ ba bɩɩtɛ anɛ kʋsʋ kɩmʋ ɔkpa sʋ, fɛɛ asun libi mʋ nɩɩ an waa mʋ sʋ. Amaa ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ bɩrɛ ɔ man waa alibi akʋ.”
42023042	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Yesu, fʋ kan ba gyii fu kuwura mʋ, fu nyiŋi mɛ.”
42023043	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fʋ kesintin tɔ yɛ, ndaga kakɛ nɩmʋ fu biti fʋ kyɩna maa mɛ‐Sɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ Paradise tɔ.”
42023044	Ɩ kyɩna ɩ gyɛ kyɔwɛ amu nsana tɔ nɩn, nɩɩ kitentenbiri kɩ tɩyɛ ɔsʋwʋlɛ mʋ kpini sʋ naa fʋʋ kakyʋwapɛ kerefi asá saŋa,
42023045	lɩɩ fɛɛ kyɔwɛ yɛgɛ kɩda. Nɩɩ kɩtaa kunsa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ barɩgɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa opula kyɩrɛkyɩrɛkpa Kɩkyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, kɩ kyatɛ tɔ kɩnyɔ.
42023046	Nɩɩ Yesu taa ɔbʋlɛ lala kuusi yɛ, “Nsɛ, n taa mɛ kala waa fʋ abaa tɔ.” Maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ ɔfʋʋtɛ tɩn.
42023047	Anaakɔpʋ kɩlɩfa ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ maa wu atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa mʋ, ɔ yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kesintin, ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi.”
42023048	Asa mʋ nɩɩ ba ba gyaŋɛ tʋtɔ bɛɛ kɩɩ mʋ, ba maa wu atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa mʋ, bamʋ kpini ba taa nkɔlɔ nyita sawʋ kpewu.
