42023049	Amaa bamʋ nɩɩ be nyi Yesu mʋ, yɛ akyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba buu mʋ lɩɩ Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ ba mʋ, ba yɩlɛ kata gbɛrɛɛ bɛɛ kɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa maŋa kpini.
42023050	Ɔnyɩn kʋ ɩ kyɩna ɔ bʋ tɔ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gyosefu. Nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Gyuda kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Arimatiya mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ nyɩmɩsa mʋ nɩɩ mʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi nɩɩ ɔ sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ. Nɩɩ o tii Gyiwu abi kpini abɩlɩsa kʋbʋ mʋ sʋ.
42023051	Amaa o man kyula bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ yɛ awaasa mʋ. Ɔ kyɩna ee gyoo Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ nɩn.
42023052	Nɩɩ o kpee Paleti asɛ naa kʋlɛ Yesu kibuni mʋ.
42023053	Nɩɩ ɔ saatɛ Yesu kibuni mʋ lɩɩ oyu laasa mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa kɩtaa fufuli maalɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ naa pula kakyan mʋ nɩɩ ba baaŋɛ kɩfʋlɛ tɔ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩta pula ɔkʋ kɩmʋ tɔ mʋ.
42023054	Ɩ kyɩna ɩ gyɛ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kʋʋla bamʋ n‐yɩɩ ba gyoo kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ mʋ.
42023055	Akyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba buu Yesu lɩɩ Galile mʋ, ba buu Gyosefu nɩɩ ba naa wu kakyan mʋ, yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa Yesu kibuni mʋ pula mʋ.
42023056	Nɩɩ ba kpewu naa kʋʋla atɔ liifensa yɛ ituulale mʋ nɩɩ ba taa ba sʋswa Yesu kibuni mʋ. Amaa ba taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa Mosesi nbara mʋ, nɩɩ ba fʋʋtɛ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa kakɛ maŋa.
42024001	Gyiwu abi kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ lɩɩkaakɛ kɩbwayɩkɛ mʋ, nɩɩ akyɩɩ mʋ ba taa atɔ liifensa mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋla yɩla mʋ kpee Yesu kakyan asɛ.
42024002	Ba naa wu fɛɛ kubuu mʋ nɩɩ ba taa tii kakyan mʋ, kɩ maa gbiliti lɩɩ kɩmʋ kɔnɔ sʋ.
42024003	Amaa ba maa loo kakyan mʋ tɔ mʋ, ba man wu Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu kubuni mʋ.
42024004	Ɩ maa waa bamʋ kanankʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ bɛɛ fɛ ɩmʋ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ, opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ anyɩn anyɔ akʋ ba ba yɩlɛ bamʋ asɛ. Ba bun kɩkalala mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ ŋalɩgɛ sʋ fɛɛ bʋlayɩ maa wɛɛ ɩsɛɛ mʋ.
42024005	Nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa akyɩɩ mʋ gaa, nɩɩ ba nyɔn bamʋ amu yii tɔ. Nɩɩ anyɩn anyɔ mʋ ba taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fan baa fen biti nyɩmɩsa kɩɩsa lɩɩ alewupu tɔ.”
42024006	Ɔ man bʋ nfɩɩ, o kyiŋi lɩɩ alewupu tɔ. Fan nyiŋi asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ fanɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ fanɛ asɛ Galile mʋ yɛ,
42024007	“Ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ba lɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ waa asa libi abaa tɔ, kɛ ba da mɛ oyu laasa sʋ mɔɔ, kɛ nkɛ nsa kamaa mʋ, n kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ.”
42024008	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ akyɩɩ mʋ ba nyiŋi mʋ asɩn mʋ.
42024009	Ba maa lɩɩ kakyan mʋ asɛ ba mʋ, ba tɔwɛ asɩn nɩmʋ kpini sa Yesu abɩɩlapʋ kudu akʋ mʋ yɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba san mʋ kpini.
42024010	Akyɩɩ maŋa ɩ gyɛ Mɛɛrɩ Magidalen, Gyowana, Gyemisi mu‐nyi Mɛɛrɩ yɛ akyɩɩ akʋ, ɩ tɔwɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ sa abɩɩlapʋ mʋ.
42024011	Amaa abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba man kɔɔlɛ akyɩɩ mʋ asɩn mʋ gyii, lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ asɩn mʋ a du nɩn fɛɛ amelensi‐sɩn mʋ.
42024012	Amaa Pita kʋsʋ sɩlɛ kpee kakyan mʋ asɛ. Maa suŋa kɩɩ kakyan mʋ tɔ mʋ, o wu kɩtaa fufuli mʋ nɩɩ ba taa maalɛ mʋ mʋ nkʋn. Nɩɩ ɔ fɛ ɩmʋ nfɛɛrɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa nɩɩ o bwii kpewu.
42024013	Kanɩn kakɛ maŋa mʋ, mʋ abɩɩlapʋ anyɔ ba kyɩna bee kpee Emawusi kadɛ tɔ. Lɩɩ Gyerusalem kpee tʋtɔ gyɛ ɩmaalɩ asunɔ.
42024014	Ba maa kyɩna ba naa bee kpee mʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ abaa asɛ lɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa mʋ kpini sʋ.
42024015	Ba maa tɔwɛ abaa asɛ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa kiligyima lɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa mʋ sʋ mʋ, Yesu gbaa‐gbaa ba bamʋ asɛ yɛgɛ maa bamʋ ba naa.
42024016	Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ man yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba bɩɩ mʋ.
42024017	Ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ kiligyima nɩɩ fan naa fen biri kanɩn?” Nɩɩ ba sii yɩlɛ nyaŋɛ bamʋ ansi tɔ.
42024018	Bamʋ tɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Kelopasi mʋ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ nkʋn ɩ gyɛ ɔfɔ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ bʋ Gyerusalem nfɩɩ nɩɩ fʋ man nyi asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa tʋtɔ nkɛ nnyɔ nɩmʋ tɔ?”
42024019	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ asɩn?” Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Lɩɩ Yesu Kanasareti‐nyɩn mʋ sʋ. Ɔ kyɩna ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ nɩn, nɩɩ ɔlʋn bʋ mʋ atɔwɛsa yɛ mʋ awaasa kpini tɔ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ asa kpini ansi tɔ.
42024020	Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ ɔsʋwʋlɛ akɩɩsʋpʋ ba taa mʋ sa yɛ ba mɔɔ nɩɩ ba da mʋ mata oyu laasa sʋ mɔɔ.
42024021	Amaa naafɔɔ an kyɩna an sʋ tamaa fɛɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ ba ɔ ba kɔɔlɛ anɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi yɛgɛ. Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bɩlaa ki tii sʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, ndaga ɩ gyɛ kakɛ sasapʋ nɩɩ asɩn nɩmʋ a maa waa.
42024022	Ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ bɩla i tii sʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, anɛ akyɩɩ mʋ akʋ ba yɛgɛ nɩɩ i kyinkyin anɛ. Ba kpee kakyan mʋ asɛ naa loo to nyenyenfuu nɩmʋ,
42024023	amaa ba man wu mu kibuni mʋ. Ba ba tɔwɛ anɛ yɛ ba nyɛ ansi sʋ kɩlɛɛkaapʋ nɩɩ ba wu Ɩbwaarɛ n bɔɔ ba maa tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ Yesu bʋ nkpa tɔ.
42024024	Nɩɩ anɛ tɔ akʋ ba kpee kakyan mʋ tɔ nɩɩ ba naa wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ akyɩɩ mʋ ba ba tɔwɛ mʋ, amaa ba man wu mʋ.”
42024025	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ kimelensi ndee? Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ i du swɩɩ‐swɩɩ kanɩn, nɩɩ fan mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ ba wʋla tɔwɛ yɩla mʋ gyii bilen?
42024026	Yɛ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ o gyii falɛ awʋrʋfɔ pɔyɩ kɛ o loo mʋ bʋnyaa tɔ?”
42024027	Nɩɩ Yesu maa piili lɩɩ Mosesi nbara yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ lɛɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ kpini ɩ tɔwɛ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ mʋ kaapʋ bamʋ.
42024028	Ba maa tiri kadɛ‐bi mʋ nɩɩ bee kpee mʋ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu waa fɛɛ maa biti ɔ kyʋn kadɛ mʋ sʋ.
42024029	Amaa ba kʋlɛ mʋ gaa tɔwɛ yɛ, “Dɛ anɛ asɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa kyʋn, kyɔwɛ lʋwɛ.” Ɩmʋ sʋ o loo naa kyɩna bamʋ asɛ.
42024030	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ maa bamʋ ba kyɩna kɛ ba gyii mʋ, ɔ taa bodobodo nɩɩ ɔ fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ ɔ kpɛɛ kɩmʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɔ taa sa bamʋ.
42024031	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ bamʋ ansi i bugi nɩɩ ba bɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ nyaa bamʋ ansi sʋ.
42024032	Nɩɩ ba taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ anaa mʋ an naa ɔkpa tɔ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ ɛɛ sa anɛ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɛɛ kaapʋ anɛ mʋ, anɛ n‐yɩɩ ɩ man dii anɛ?”
42024033	Nɩɩ ba kʋsʋ bwii kpee Gyerusalem bilen. Tʋtɔ maŋa nɩɩ ba naa wu kudu ɔkʋ mʋ yɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ bamʋ asɛ mʋ ba maa gyaŋɛ,
42024034	nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɩ gyɛ kesintin nɩn yɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ kyiŋi nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ Simon.”
42024035	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ asa anyɔ mʋ gbaa ba tɔwɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa ɔkpa tɔ yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba bɩɩ Yesu saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kpɛɛ bodobodo mʋ tɔ mʋ.
42024036	Ba maa san ba yɩlɛ bɛɛ tɔwɛ falɛ asɩn mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu gbaa‐gbaa ba yɩlɛ bamʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Keyuula kɩ ba fanɛ sʋ.”
42024037	Bamʋ nkɔlɔ n ŋmaa bamʋ nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ, nɩɩ ba fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ba wu obuni nɩn.
42024038	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ ɩ tɔɔrɔɔ fanɛ, nɩɩ mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fan san fen gyii ɩmɔɔrɛ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ?
42024039	Fan kɩɩ mɛ abaa yɛ mɛ ayaa. Man gyɛ mɛ nɩn abɛɛ? Fan mata mɛ kɛ fan kɩɩ, obuni man sʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ yɛ awuya, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ falɛ?”
42024040	Maa tɔwɛ falɛ lʋwɛ mʋ, ɔ taa mʋ abaa yɛ mʋ ayaa kaapʋ bamʋ.
42024041	Ba maa man pɩɩta kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii lɩɩ kensi‐gyii yɛ adangana nɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ “Fan sʋ agyitɔ kʋ nfɩɩ fan gyii?”
42024042	Nɩɩ ba taa ɔkɩn ŋasɩsa kɩdɩyɛ sa mʋ,
42024043	nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ kɩmʋ wɛ bamʋ ansi tɔ tʋtɔ.
42024044	Ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n kyɩna n bʋ fanɛ asɛ mʋ, n tɔwɛ fanɛ asɩn nɩmʋ yɛ, asɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ yɩla lɩɩ mɛ sʋ, Mosesi nbara tɔ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ kɩkaapʋ yɛ Ɩlʋn mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ɩ maa ba tɔ.”
42024045	Nɩɩ o bugi bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ kɛ ba nyɛ nu Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ kasɛ.
42024046	Ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Asɩn mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ ii biti o gyii awʋrʋfɔ kɛ o wu, kɛ o kyiŋi lɩɩ alewupu tɔ kakɛ sasapʋ.
42024047	Nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ba tɔwɛ Asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa asa kpini mʋ kɩtɩɩ tɔ, kɛ asa ba kyɛɛgɛ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ alibi tɔ ba Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ kɛ ɔ taa bamʋ alibi kɛɛ bamʋ. Nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ba piili asɩn nɩmʋ kɩtɔwɛ lɩɩ Gyerusalem kadɛ tɔ.
42024048	Fanɛ ɩ gyɛ kesintin agyipu lɩɩ atɔ nɩmʋ kpini sʋ.
42024049	N biti n bɩya fanɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ nɩɩ mɛ‐Sɛ kyɩna da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɛ ee biti ɔ sa fanɛ mʋ. Amaa fan kyɩna kadɛ lala nɩmʋ tɔ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Kayaayu mʋ ɔlʋn mʋ ii biti ɔ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba fanɛ sʋ.”
42024050	Yesu maa taa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ lɩɩ Gyerusalem kadɛ tɔ bee kpee naa tiri Betani kadɛ tɔ. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ kʋsaa mʋ abaa sʋsʋ nɩɩ, ɔ waa bamʋ kusee.
42024051	Maa dan san ɛɛ waa bamʋ kusee maŋa nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa mʋ lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ kpee sʋsʋ.
42024052	Nɩɩ ba muŋa sun mʋ nɩɩ ba taa kensi‐gyii lala bwii kpee Gyerusalem kadɛ tɔ.
42024053	Nɩɩ ba kyaga sʋ kyɩna kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ bɛɛ yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ.
43001001	Lɩɩ npiili asɛ, pɔyɩ kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ tʋʋ dulinyaa mʋ, ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɔnɔ tɔ Asɩn mʋ bʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kɔnɔ tɔ Asɩn mʋ maa Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ bʋ tɔ, nɩɩ Kɔnɔ tɔ Asɩn maŋa ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ.
43001002	Lɩɩ koo npiili asɛ mʋ, Kɔnɔ tɔ Asɩn mʋ maa Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ bʋ tɔ.
43001003	Kɔnɔ tɔ Asɩn mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɔla tʋʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa. Sɛhn man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ man gyɛ mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ Asɩn mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɔla sʋ tʋʋ kɩmʋ.
43001004	Ɩbwaarɛ Kɔnɔ tɔ Asɩn mʋ tɔ nɩɩ nkpa ɩ bʋ, nɩɩ nkpa maŋa ɩɩ ŋmaŋɛ tɔ ɩɩ sa asa kpini.
43001005	Kaŋmaŋɛ mʋ ɩɩ ŋmaŋɛ kitentenbiri tɔ, nɩɩ kitentenbiri mʋ man taalɛ dunla kaŋmaŋɛ mʋ kakaakʋ.
43001006	Ɔnyɩn kʋ kyɩna ɔ bʋ tɔ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sun mʋ, bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gyɔn.
43001007	Gyɔn ba nɩn ɔ ba tɔwɛ kesintin asɩn lɩɩ kaŋmaŋɛ mʋ sʋ sa asa, kɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ nyɛ nu kɛ ɔ kɔɔlɛ gyii.
43001008	Man gyɛ Gyɔn gbaa‐gbaa ɩ gyɛ kaŋmaŋɛ mʋ, mɛɛ mʋ ba nɩn kɛ ɔ ba tɔwɛ asɩn lɩɩ kaŋmaŋɛ mʋ sʋ.
43001009	Kesintin kaŋmaŋɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ ŋmaŋɛ sa asa kpini mʋ, kɩɩ ba dulinyaa tɔ.
43001010	Dulinya nɩmʋ tɔ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kɔnɔ tɔ Asɩn mʋ wʋla ɔ bʋ. Nɩɩ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla tʋʋ dulinyaa mʋ, nkɛɛ dulinyaa asa ba man bɩɩ mʋ.
43001011	Ɔ ba mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, amaa mʋ gbaa‐gbaa asa ba man kɔɔlɛ mʋ.
43001012	Amaa asa mʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii mʋ kpini mʋ, ɔ sa bamʋ ɔkpa yɛ ba be biliŋi Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii ana.
43001013	Ba man biliŋi mu‐bii ana bɔla nyɩmɩsa kakʋʋgɛ sʋ, abɛɛ nyɩmɩsa kɔkɔlɔ biti sʋ, abɛɛ ɔnyɩn kebiti sʋ. Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa‐gbaa ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba be biliŋi mu‐bii ana.
43001014	Nɩɩ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Kɔnɔ tɔ Asɩn mʋ ba biliŋi nyɩmɩsa, nɩɩ ɔ ba kyɩna anɛ asɛ kasɛ sʋ. An wu mʋ bʋnyaa kparɛ, mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii kʋlʋn kpen mʋ. Nɩɩ kabwaala yɛ kesintin kɩ bɔla mʋ.
43001015	Mʋ asɩn nɩɩ Gyɔn daa ɛɛ tɔwɛ ɛɛ kaapʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ kenken yɛ, “Ɔnɩmʋ asɩn nɩɩ n wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ, nɩɩ n tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ mɛ kamaa tɔ ɛɛ ba mʋ kyɔ mɛ, nɩɩ ɔ wʋla ɔ bʋ tɔ pɔyɩ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mɛ mʋ.’ ”
43001016	Lɩɩ mʋ kabwaala mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bɔla mʋ tɔ gaa sʋ mʋ, anɛ kpini an nyɛ kusee kʋkyɔ‐kʋkyɔ.
43001017	Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla Mosesi sʋ taa nbara mʋ sa. Amaa kabwaala yɛ kesintin bɩrɛ bɔla Yesu Krisito sʋ nɩn ba.
43001018	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ man pɩɩta wu Ɩbwaarɛ kakaakʋ, amɔɔ mu‐bii kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ngbaa mʋ ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ ɔ bʋ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ, ɩ lɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kedubi kaapʋ.
43001019	Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi alʋnpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyerusalem mʋ ba sun Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu yɛ Lewi abi Gyɔn asɛ ba naa taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ anɩmʋ?”
43001020	Nɩɩ Gyɔn man kina kɩtɔwɛ, amaa ɔ tɔwɛ bugi tɔ yɛ, “Man gyɛ mɛ ɩ gyɛ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ.”
43001021	Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kanɩn bɩrɛ, anɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ fʋ? Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Eligya mʋ?” Nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Ayee! Man gyɛ mɛ ɩ gyɛ Eligya.” Nɩɩ ba bɩla taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ an kɩɩ mʋ ɔkpa mʋ?” Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ayee.”
43001022	Ɩmʋ kamaa mʋ ba bɩla taasɛ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ bɩrɛ ɩ gyɛ fʋ? Lɛɛ kɔnɔ sa anɛ, kɛ a nyɛ asɩn kʋ naa tɔwɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba sun anɛ mʋ. Ɔsa mɔɔ bɩrɛ gbaa ɩ gyɛ fʋ?”
43001023	Nɩɩ Gyɔn lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ ɔbʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ kii kuusi ofuli sʋ yɛ, ‘Fan kyiigi ɔkpa mʋ sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ.’ Falɛ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Isaya kyʋrɔɔ yɩla Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ tɔ mʋ.”
43001024	Nɩɩ Farasii abi akʋ ba sun nbɔɔ Gyɔn asɛ,
43001025	ba naa taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ maa man gyɛ Krisito mʋ, abɛɛ Eligya, abɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ mʋ, mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ fii gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee?”
43001026	Gyɔn lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N sʋ nkyu nɩn n gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee. Amaa ɔkʋ yɩlɛ fanɛ tɔ nɩɩ fan man nyi mʋ.
43001027	Mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ mɛ kamaa tɔ ɛɛ ba mʋ. Amaa n man dagaa gbaa n saŋɛ mʋ asɩbɩta ɩfɛ.”
43001028	Asɩn nɩmʋ kpini ɩ waa Betani kadɛ tɔ nɩn. Betani bʋ Gyɔdan ɔbʋn benbe kyɔwɛ ɔlɩɩkpa, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ Gyɔn ii gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee mʋ.
43001029	Ɩmʋ lɩɩkaakɛ Gyɔn maa wu Yesu maa naa ɛɛ ba mʋ asɛ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan kɩɩ, ɔnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabʋlʋpʋ, mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ lɛɛ saraga kɛ asa kpini ba nyɛ alibi kɩtaakɛɛ mʋ.
43001030	Ɔnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ n wʋla n tɔwɛ mʋ asɩn yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩn kʋ bʋ mɛ kamaa ɛɛ ba, nɩɩ ɔ kyɔ mɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ wʋla ɔ bʋ tɔ pɔyɩ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mɛ.’
43001031	Mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ bɩrɛ n man n daa n nyi mʋ, amaa kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sun mɛ yɛ n ba gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee mʋ, kɛ n ba nyɛ lɛɛ mʋ ifuli kaapʋ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi mʋ.”
43001032	Nɩɩ Gyɔn gyii ɩmʋ kesintin tɔwɛ yɛ, “N wu Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ kɩ maa kpɩlɩgɛ lɩɩ sʋsʋ fɛɛ kuwura‐lɔpɔ nɩɩ kɩ ba kyɩna sii mʋ sʋ.
43001033	Naafɔɔ ngbaa mɛ n man n wʋla n nyi mʋ, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ yɛ n ba gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee mʋ, ɩ tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔmʋ nɩɩ fʋ kan wu mɛ Kayaayu kɩ maa kpɩlɩgɛ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba kyɩna sii mʋ sʋ mʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ taa mɛ Kayaayu mʋ gyee asa.’
43001034	N wu ɩnɩmʋ kpini nɩɩ n gyii ɩmʋ kesintin yɛ ɔnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ.”
43001035	Lɩɩkaakɛ mʋ, Gyɔn maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ anyɔ ba bɩla ba yɩlɛ tʋtɔ.
43001036	Maa wu Yesu maa naa ɛɛ kyʋn mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan kɩɩ, Ɩbwaarɛ Kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ ndee!”
43001037	Gyɔn abɩɩlapʋ anyɔ mʋ ba maa nu maa tɔwɛ kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ba buu Yesu.
43001038	Yesu maa biliŋi kɩɩ mʋ, o wu ba maa buu mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ fen biti?” Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Rabi, fɩnɛ nɩɩ fʋ tɛ?” (Rabi kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ Ɔkaapʋpʋ).
43001039	Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan ba kɩɩ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɛ.” Ɩmʋ sʋ ba buu mʋ naa wu katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ. Saŋa maŋa tɔ gyɛ kalaatɩpwɛ sʋ kerefi ana tɔ. Nɩɩ ba kyɩna mʋ asɛ kakɛ maŋa.
43001040	Asa anyɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba nu asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Gyɔn tɔwɛ, nɩɩ ba buu Yesu mʋ, bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋ ɩ gyɛ Simon Pita mu‐supu Andiruwu.
43001041	Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Andiruwu gyankpaa waa ɩ gyɛ yɛ, o biti mʋ‐daa Simon nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “An wu Mesaya mʋ.” Mesaya mʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ yɛ ɔ ba mɔlɩgɛ asa.
43001042	Nɩɩ Andiruwu taa mʋ‐daa Simon kpee Yesu asɛ. Yesu kɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “N nyi fɛɛ fʋ ɩ gyɛ Simon, Gyɔn mu‐bii‐nyɩnsa mʋ. Amaa bee biti ba tɩɩ fʋ yɛ Kefasi” (Giriki katɔwɛ tɔ ɩ gyɛ yɛ Pita, nɩɩ kɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ kɩfʋlɛ.)
43001043	Ɩmʋ lɩɩkaakɛ mʋ, Yesu waa nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ee biti o kpee Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ. O wu Filipu, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ba buu mɛ!”
43001044	Filipi lɩɩ Betisayida kadɛ tɔ nɩn tʋtɔ nɩɩ Andiruwu maa Pita gbaa ba lɩɩ.
43001045	Nɩɩ Filipu wu Nataneli nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “An wu ɔmʋ nɩɩ Mosesi wʋla kyʋrɔɔ mʋ asɩn waa Nbara ɩwʋlɛ tɔ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ gbaa ba kyʋrɔɔ mʋ asɩn yɩla mʋ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ Yesu, Gyosefu nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Nasareti kadɛ tɔ mʋ mu‐bii.”
43001046	Nɩɩ Nataneli taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Amɔɔ, kʋtɔ danbɩrasa kʋ ɩ taalɛ lɩɩ Nasareti kadɛ tɔ?” Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Filipu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ba kɩɩ.”
43001047	Yesu maa wu Nataneli maa naa ɛɛ ba mʋ asɛ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kesintin tɔ, Ɩsɩrayɩ ɔnyɩn gbaa‐gbaa ndee, nɩɩ antɩŋɛsa kʋ man bʋ mʋ tɔ.”
43001048	Nɩɩ Nataneli taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ fʋ waa fii nyi mɛ?” Yesu lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N wu fʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ bʋ figi onyin tɔ, pɔyɩ nɩɩ Filipu tɩɩ fʋ mʋ.”
43001049	Nɩɩ Nataneli tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, fʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ! Nɩɩ fʋ ɩ bɩla fʋ gyɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi Owura mʋ.”
43001050	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “N maa tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ, n wu fʋ fʋ maa bʋ figi onyin tɔ sʋ nɩɩ fʋ kɔɔlɛ gyii? Fii biti fʋ ba wu atɔ damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kyɔ ɩnɩmʋ gbaa.”
43001051	Nɩɩ Yesu bwii kyaga sʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, fanɛ kpini fen biti fan wu sʋsʋ maa bugi tɔ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ ba ba bee dii bɛɛ kpɩlɩgɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa sʋ.”
43002001	Nkɛ nsa kamaa mʋ, ba kpɩɩ ɔkyɩɩfɔ Kena kadɛ tɔ Galile Ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ. Yesu mu‐nyi bʋ tʋtɔ.
43002002	Nɩɩ ba da kɩbaa tɔ tɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ gbaa kɩkyɩɩfɔ mʋ tɔ.
43002003	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ nta ɩ pwagɛ bamʋ mʋ, Yesu mu‐nyi tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Bamʋ nta ɩ lʋwɛ.”
43002004	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔkyɩɩ, man tɔwɛ mɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n waa. Mɛ saŋa man pɩɩ fʋʋ.”
43002005	Nɩɩ mu‐nyi tɔwɛ nta ayɛpʋ mʋ yɛ, “Kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ fan waa mʋ, fan waa.”
43002006	Nɩɩ nkyu afʋlɛ alan asiye ɩ yɩlɛ tʋtɔ, ɩmʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ bɛɛ waa Gyiwu abi anaana‐tɔ ineesi kɩfwɩɩ. Nɩɩ kʋfʋlɛ kɩlan kʋmaa kɩ taalɛ gyii ɩgalɔn adʋnyɔ abɛɛ adɩsa.
43002007	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ nta ayɛpʋ mʋ yɛ, “Fan saa nkyu bɔla alan mʋ kpini.” Ɩmʋ sʋ ba saa nkyu bɔla alan mʋ kpini bɩlɩbɩlɩ.
43002008	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ ba mʋ yɛ, “Fan nyɛ ɩmʋ ɩkʋ naa sa nta ayɛpʋ ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ.” Nɩɩ ba waa kanɩn.
43002009	Nta ayɛpʋ ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ maa daa nuu nkyu mʋ nɩɩ i biliŋi nta mʋ kɩɩ mʋ, o wu fɛɛ ɩ bʋrɔn. Ɔ man nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ, amaa ayɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba saa nkyu mʋ bɩrɛ be nyi. Nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ ɔkyɩɩfɔ mu‐kuli mʋ lɩɩ ɩkaa sʋ.
43002010	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɩ daa kɩlɛɛ nta danbɩrasa pɔyɩ. Nɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ nuu bʋʋ mʋ, kɛ ɔ lan bɩya nta mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man bʋrɔn mʋ. Amaa fʋ taa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn yɩla ba fʋʋ saŋa nɩmʋ.”
43002011	Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa gyankpaasa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu waa. Ɔ waa ɩmʋ Kena kadɛ tɔ Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ bʋnyaa mʋ kaapʋ. Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.
43002012	Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ maa mu‐nyi yɛ mu‐supu ana yɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba lɩɩ tʋtɔ kpee Kapanum kadɛ tɔ. Nɩɩ ba kyɩna tʋtɔ nkɛ nkʋ.
43002013	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kɩ san gbɛrɛɛ kɩ fʋʋ mʋ, Yesu kpee Gyerusalem kadɛ tɔ.
43002014	Maa fʋʋ tʋtɔ mʋ, nɩɩ o kpee kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa opula mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ o wu anyɩn akʋ ba maa fɛ ɩnaatɛ, yɛ nbʋlʋpʋ yɛ awura‐lɔpɔ yɛgɛ akʋ mɔɔ ba tɛ iteeburu asɛ bɛɛ kyɛrɛ afulee.
43002015	Nɩɩ ɔ taa ɔfɛ waa kʋkyʋkyʋʋ gyan bamaa bamʋ ɩnaatɛ yɛ nbʋlʋpʋ lɩɩ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa opula. Nɩɩ ɔ yasɛ bamʋ afulee abi tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ bala bamʋ iteeburu bun.
43002016	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ fɛ awura‐lɔpɔ mʋ yɛ, “Fan lɛɛ bamʋ lɩɩ nfɩɩ. Fan man taa Mɛ‐Sɛ ayɛ biliŋi kɩgya ogyikpa.”
43002017	Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba nyiŋi Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kebiti mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ sa kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ kii gyii mi kumu.”
43002018	Nɩɩ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa nɩɩ fɩɩ taalɛ waa kaapʋ anɛ, kɛ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ fʋ sʋ ɔkpa fʋ waa ɩnɩmʋ?”
43002019	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ kɩŋasan tɔ yɛ “Fan boyi kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ nɩmʋ, kɛ n taa nkɛ nsa kʋsaa kɩmʋ yii.”
43002020	Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi mʋ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Nsu adɩna yɛ asiye nɩɩ ba taa pɔyɩ Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ nɩmʋ, nɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ fʋ yɛ fɩɩ taalɛ taa nkɛ nsa kʋsaa kɩmʋ yii?”
43002021	Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ kɩmʋ asɩn falɛ, ɩ gyɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ nɩn, man gyɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa.
43002022	Ɩmʋ sʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kyiŋi mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ, mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba nyiŋi yɛ ɔ wʋla tɔwɛ bamʋ ɩnɩmʋ. Nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ yɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ mʋ gyii.
43002023	Asɩn kyinkyinsa kʋkyɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa Gyerusalem kadɛ tɔ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi bee gyii bamʋ Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ mʋ, asa gaalaagaa ba wu nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.
43002024	Amaa Yesu bɩrɛ, ɔ man taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ tʋʋ bamʋ sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ o nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ asa kpini ba du.
43002025	Nɩɩ ɩ man tiri mʋ fɛɛ ɔkʋ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ asa ba du, lɩɩ fɛɛ o nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ asa nkɔlɔ tɔ.
43003001	Ɔnyɩn kʋ lɩɩ Farasii kʋbʋ mʋ tɔ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Nikodemusi, ɔ gyɛ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ nɩn.
43003002	Mʋ ɩ ba Yesu asɛ kagyanbwɛ kʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, an nyi yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ i sun fʋ yɛ fʋ ba kaapʋ anɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ waa falɛ, amɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ tii mʋ sʋ.”
43003003	Nɩɩ Yesu lɩɩ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ wu kɛ ɔ bɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ, amɔɔ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba bwii kʋʋgɛ mʋ.”
43003004	Nɩɩ Nikodemusi taasɛ yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ ba bɩla yɛ ba kʋʋgɛ nyɩmɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛɛ dan? Ɛ taalɛ bɩla bwii loo mu‐nyi ɔtɔ tɔ kɛ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ?”
43003005	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fʋ kesintin yɛ ɔkʋ man bʋ tɔ ɔ taalɛ loo Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ, amɔɔ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba gyee mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee maa Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ kigyee, kɛ ɔ nyɛ kakʋʋgɛ pʋpwɛ.
43003006	Nyɩmɩsa kʋʋgɛ nyɩmɩsa fɛɛ mu keduli nɩn, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ ɩ kʋʋgɛ nyɩmɩsa fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ keduli nɩn.
43003007	Man yɛgɛ i kyinkyin fʋ fɛɛ, n maa tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ ɩ dagaa ba bwii kʋʋgɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ.
43003008	Afuu ɩɩ da ii kpee katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ii biti. Fii nu ɩmʋ sʋ, amaa fʋ man nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ lɩɩ yɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ii kpee. Kanɩn nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ tɔ mʋ du.”
43003009	Nɩɩ Nikodemusi taasɛ yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ taalɛ waa?”
43003010	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N nyi fʋ maa gyɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ ɔkaapʋpʋ kparɛ, nɩɩ fʋ man nu ɩnɩmʋ kasɛ?
43003011	N tɔwɛ fʋ kesintin yɛ, ɩmʋ nɩɩ an nyi mʋ nɩɩ an tɔwɛ, nɩɩ ɩmʋ nɩɩ an wu mʋ, nɩɩ an lɛɛ an tɔwɛ. Amaa fan mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ anɛ asɩn tɔwɛsa fen gyii.
43003012	N maa tɔwɛ fanɛ kasɛ sʋ asɩn nɩɩ fan maa kɔɔlɛ gyii falɛ mʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ fan taalɛ kɔɔlɛ sʋsʋ asɩn gyii?
43003013	Ɔkʋ man pɩɩta lɩɩ kasɛ sʋ kpee sʋsʋ, amɔɔ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ nɩɩ n lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba kasɛ sʋ mʋ.
43003014	Saŋa mʋ dɩdaa mʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ Mosesi taa ɔpɔlɛ ŋalɩgɛ waa kɩnansɛ nɩɩ ɔ maalɛ oyu, kʋsaa kɩmʋ ifuli mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ asa ba kɩɩ nɩɩ ba nyɛ nkpa mʋ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ii tiri fɛɛ ba kʋsaa mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ sʋsʋ,
43003015	kɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ ɔ nyɛ nkpa kakpaa.
43003016	“Lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ kebiti sa dulinyaa tɔ asa gaa sʋ mʋ, ɔ lɛɛ mɛ, Mu‐Bii kʋlʋn kpen mʋ sa, fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ, mɛɛ yɛ ɔ fɔyɩ, amaa ee biti ɔ nyɛ nkpa kakpaa.
43003017	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ man sun mɛ, Mu‐Bii mʋ ba dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ, yɛ n ba bun kɩmʋ tɔ asa kʋpwɛ, amaa o sun mɛ nɩn yɛ n ba waa bamʋ ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ.
43003018	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ mɛɛ yɛ o bun mʋ kʋpwɛ, amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla bun mʋ kʋpwɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ man kɔɔlɛ mɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii kʋlʋn kpen mʋ gyii.
43003019	Kanan mʋ nɩɩ kʋpwɛ kubun mʋ kɩ ba mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ ɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ nɩn ba dulinyaa tɔ, amaa asa bee biti kitentenbiri mʋ ba kyɔ ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ asunsunsa ɩ gyɛ alibi nɩn.
43003020	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa alibi mʋ ii kisi ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ ba ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ tɔ, kɛ mu alibi ɩ ba lɩɩ ifuli.
43003021	Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dɛ ɔkpa mʋ bɩrɛ, ɛɛ ba ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ tɔ, kɛ asa ba nyɛ wu fɛɛ mʋ atɔ waasa mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti.”
43003022	Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba lɩɩ Gyerusalem kpee Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ. Ɔ kyɩna tʋtɔ nkɛ nyɔ kʋ maa bamʋ, nɩɩ o gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee.
43003023	Kanɩn saŋa maŋa nɩɩ Gyɔn Okyugyeepu mʋ gbaa bʋ Anon kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri Salim mʋ tɔ. Ee gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee, lɩɩ fɛɛ nkyu ɩ kyɩna ɩ kyɔ tʋtɔ gaa, nɩɩ asa bee kpee mʋ asɛ yɛgɛ ee gyee bamʋ.
43003024	Saŋa maŋa, ba man pɩɩta tii Gyɔn obu.
43003025	Nɩɩ ɩmɔɔrɛ ɩ tɩyɛ Gyɔn abuupu yɛ Gyiwu nyɩmɩsa kʋ nsana lɩɩ anaana tɔ ineesi kɩfwɩɩ sʋ.
43003026	Nɩɩ Gyɔn abɩɩlapʋ ba ba mʋ asɛ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ an wu mʋ Gyɔdan ɔbʋn benbe mʋ, ɔmʋ nɩɩ fu gyii mʋ asɩn kesintin mʋ gbaa ii gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee, yɛgɛ asa kpini bee kpee mʋ asɛ.”
43003027	Nɩɩ Gyɔn lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ man kan taa kʋtɔ kʋ sa ɔkʋ mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ nyɛ kɩmʋ.
43003028	Fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ fen biti fan gyii mɛ kesintin fɛɛ, n wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ‘Man gyɛ mɛ ɩ gyɛ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ.’ Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ sun mɛ nɩn yɛ n gyankpaa ba lɔŋɔ ɔkpa yɩla mʋ.”
43003029	Nɩɩ ɔ bɔ kɩŋasan yɛ, “Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ ɔkyɩɩfɔ mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔkyɩɩfɔ mu‐kuli. Ɔkyɩɩfɔ mu‐kuli mʋ kyɛmɩnɛ bɩrɛ ɛɛ yɩlɛ ee gyoo nɩn. Nɩɩ ɔ kan nu mʋ ɔbʋlɛ mʋ, mu ansi i gyii. Kanɩn maŋa sʋ nɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ mi ansi i gyii gaa.
43003030	Ɩ dagaa fɛɛ Yesu kɩtɩɩ kɩ ba ki dii ki tii sʋ, kɛ mɛ Gyɔn kɩtɩɩ mɔɔ kɩ ba kasɛ.
43003031	“Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba mʋ kyɔ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ. Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ kasɛ sʋ mʋ gyɛ kasɛ nɩmʋ sʋ nyɩmɩsa nɩn, nɩɩ kasɛ nɩmʋ sʋ asɩn nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ. Nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ sʋsʋ mʋ kyɔ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ.
43003032	Ɩmʋ nɩɩ o wu yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ o nu mʋ, ɩmʋ kesintin nɩɩ ee gyii mʋ, nkɛɛ ɔkʋ mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ mʋ kesintin kigyii mʋ ee gyii.
43003033	Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɔɔlɛ mʋ asɩn mʋ gyii mʋ, ɩmʋ ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gyɛ kesintin wuya.
43003034	Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sun mʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ sa mʋ Kayaayu mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ ɔkaa.
43003035	Mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ ii biti Mu‐Bii kʋlʋn mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa kʋtɔ kʋmaa waa mʋ kɩbaa tɔ.
43003036	Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ gyii mʋ sʋ nkpa kakpaa. Amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ man nu sa Mu‐Bii mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ nyɛ nkpa kakpaa, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ agbʋ mʋ ɩ dɛ mʋ sʋ.”
43004001	Ɩ maa ba fɛɛ Yesu bɩɩ fɛɛ Farasii abi mʋ ba nu yɛ ɛɛ nyɛ abɩɩlapʋ nɩɩ ee gyee bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee ɔ kyɔ Gyɔn.
43004002	Kesintin tɔ bɩrɛ, Yesu gbaa‐gbaa man gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee, amɔɔ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ nkʋn ii gyee asa.
43004003	Yesu maa bɩɩ kanɩn mʋ, ɔ kʋsʋ lɩɩ Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ bwii kpee Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
43004004	Maa kpee mʋ ɩ dagaa maa bɔla lɩɩ Samariya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
43004005	Nɩɩ ɔ ba fʋʋ Samariya kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ kɩmʋ yɛ Sikaa mʋ. Kanɩn kadɛ maŋa kɩ bʋ tiri kasɛ mʋ nɩɩ saŋa mʋ dɩdaa mʋ, Gyekobu taa sa mu‐bii Gyosefu mʋ.
43004006	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Gyekobu kitiribo mʋ kɩ bʋ. Yesu maa natɛ nɩɩ i nu mʋ mʋ, ɔ naa kyɩna kitiribo mʋ asɛ. Saŋa maŋa gyɛ kyɔwɛ amu nsana.
43004007	Yesu maa tɛ tʋtɔ mʋ, nɩɩ Kasamariya‐kyɩɩ kʋ ba ɔ ba saa nkyu, nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Sa mɛ nkyu kɛ n nuu.”
43004008	Kanɩn saŋa maa mʋ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ ba kyʋn kadɛ tɔ ba naa sɔɔ agyitɔ.
43004009	Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ lɛɛ Yesu kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fʋ gyɛ Gyiwu obii nɩn, nɩɩ mɛɛ mɛ n gyɛ Samariya obii nɩn. Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fʋ kʋlɛ mɛ nkyu kɛ fu nuu?” Ɔkyɩɩ mʋ tɔwɛ kanɩn lɩɩ fɛɛ Gyiwu abi yɛ Samariya abi ba mɛɛ bʋga lapɛ kʋlʋn.
43004010	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fʋ daa fu nyi kakɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩɩ sa, yɛ mɛ mʋ nɩɩ n kʋlɛ fʋ nkyu falɛ nɩn, naafɔɔ fʋ dɩn kʋlɛ mɛ kɛ n sa fʋ nkyu mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nkpa.”
43004011	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ taasɛ yɛ, “Ɔbɩlɩsa, fʋ man sʋ kuuka, nɩɩ kitiribo mʋ mɔɔ bʋ nyɛ. Fɩnɛ nɩɩ fii biti fʋ nyɛ falɛ nkyu mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nkpa mʋ sa mɛ?
43004012	Anɛ naana Gyekobu ɩ sa anɛ kitiribo maŋa. Mʋ gbaa‐gbaa maa mu‐bii ana yɛ mʋ atɔbwaaya kpini kɩmʋ tɔ nɩɩ ba nuu. Fɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ fʋ kyɔ anɛ naana Gyekobu nɩn abɛɛ?”
43004013	Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o nuu nkyu nɩmʋ mʋ, bʋlɩfɔ ii biti o bwii kɩtaa mʋ.
43004014	Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o nuu nkyu mʋ nɩɩ n biti n sa mʋ mʋ, bʋlɩfɔ man bɩla yɛ ɔ kɩtaa mʋ. Kanɩn nkyu maŋa ii biti i biliŋi fɛɛ nkyu mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ kyʋn mʋ tɔ, kɛ kɩɩ sa mʋ nkpa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ ɔkaa.”
43004015	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔbɩlɩsa, n kʋlɛ fʋ nɩn, sa mɛ kanɩn nkyu maŋa kɛ bʋlɩfɔ ɔ man bɩla kɩtaa mɛ, kɛ n man bɩla n baa n sa nkyu nfɩɩ.”
43004016	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ yɛ, “Bwii kpee naa tɩɩ fu‐kuli kɛ fan ba.”
43004017	Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “N man sʋ okuli.” Nɩɩ Yesu yɛ, “Fʋ tɔwɛ kesintin fɛɛ fʋ man sʋ okuli.
43004018	Fʋ wʋla kili anyɩn anu nɩɩ fʋ yɛgɛ, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ faa mʋ fan tɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ falɛ gbaa, man gyɛ fu‐kuli. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩmʋ nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ falɛ gyɛ kesintin nɩn.”
43004019	Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔbɩlɩsa n wu fɛɛ fʋ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ nɩn.
43004020	Anɛ naana ana Samariya abi bɩrɛ kɩbɩɩ nɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ba daa bɛɛ sun Ɩbwaarɛ, amaa fanɛ Gyiwu abi ɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ Gyerusalem ɩ gyɛ opula mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ a sun Ɩbwaarɛ.”
43004021	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkyɩɩ, kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii fɛɛ saŋa kʋ ii biti ɔ ba, nɩɩ man gyɛ kɩbɩɩ kɩnɩmʋ sʋ abɛɛ Gyerusalem nɩɩ asa bee biti ba sun Mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ.
43004022	Fanɛ Samariya abi ɩ man nyi Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ fen sun danbɩrasa, amaa anɛ Gyiwu abi bɩrɛ an nyi Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ an sun. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kamɔlɩgɛ mʋ kɩ bɔla Gyiwu abi sʋ nɩn ba.
43004023	Saŋa kʋ ii biti ɔ ba, nɩɩ kɩ tɛɛ fʋʋ lʋwɛ, nɩɩ kesintin asunpu bee biti ba sun Mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ yɛ kesintin tɔ. Kanɩn asunpu banɩmʋ falɛ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ ii biti.
43004024	Ɩbwaarɛ gyɛ kayaayu nɩn, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bee sun mʋ mʋ, ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ba sun mʋ Kayaayu yɛ kesintin tɔ.”
43004025	Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “N nyi fɛɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ, nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Krisito mʋ, ee biti ba. Nɩɩ ɔ kan ba mʋ, ee biti ɔ lɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ tɔ kaapʋ anɛ.”
43004026	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Mɛ, mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fʋ asɛ falɛ, mɛ ɩ gyɛ mʋ.”
43004027	Kanɩn saŋa maŋa nɩɩ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba bwii lɩɩ kadɛ tɔ ba. Nɩɩ ba maa wu Yesu maa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ ba maa tɛɛ bɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ, i kyinkyin bamʋ. Amaa bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋ man taalɛ taasɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ fii biti?” Abɛɛ ba taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ tɔwɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ asɛ?”
43004028	Tʋtɔ mʋ, ɔkyɩɩ mʋ yɛgɛ mʋ kɔlɔ‐bi yɩla sɩlɛ kpee kadɛ tɔ naa tɔwɛ asa yɛ,
43004029	“Fan ba kɩɩ ɔnyɩn kʋ maa tɔwɛ mɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ n waa mʋ kpini. Abɛɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ?”
43004030	Ɩmʋ sʋ asa mʋ ba lɩɩ kadɛ mʋ tɔ bee kpee ba naa kɩɩ Yesu.
43004031	Saŋa maa tɔ nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, waa aniya kɛ fu gyii agyitɔ.”
43004032	Amaa nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “N sʋ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ n gyii, yɛgɛ fan man nyi ɩmʋ sʋ.”
43004033	Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Abɛɛ ɔsa kʋ wʋla bɩya mʋ agyitɔ nɩn nɩɩ o gyii?”
43004034	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɛ agyitɔ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ n maa waa Mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ kebiti, kɛ n waa kusun mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sa mɛ mʋ lʋwɛ.
43004035	Man gyɛ fanɛ kɩŋasan ɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɩ san ɩbwaayɩ ɩna kɛ a tɩŋɛ ayu mʋ?’ Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ fɛɛ fan bugi fanɛ ansi kɩɩ adɔɔ mʋ, fen biti fan wu fɛɛ ɩ payɩ fʋʋ kɩtɩŋɛ.
43004036	Ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɩŋɛ mʋ ɩɩ nyɛ mʋ kʋkɔka danbɩrasa, nɩɩ ayu mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kʋʋla ɛɛ yɩlɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa ba nkpa kakpaa tɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee duu yɛ ɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɩŋɛ mʋ kpini bee biti ba bʋga gyii bamʋ ansi.
43004037	Ɩmʋ sʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔkʋ ii duu nɩɩ ɔkʋ ɩɩ kpa,’ ɩ gyɛ kesintin.
43004038	N sun fanɛ ndɔɔ tɔ yɛ fan naa tɩŋɛ ayu mʋ nɩɩ fan man duu. Akʋ ɩ waa ɩmʋ kusun nɩɩ fan ba nyɛ ɩmʋ kʋkɔka.”
43004039	Samariya abi gaalaagaa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kadɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ ba kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ maa tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔ tɔwɛ mɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n wʋla waa” mʋ sʋ.
43004040	Ɩmʋ sʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Samariya abi mʋ ba ba mʋ asɛ mʋ, ba kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ ɔ kyɩna bamʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ kyɩna bamʋ asɛ nkɛ nnyɔ.
43004041	Asa gaalaagaa ba ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii tii sʋ lɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ sʋ.
43004042	Nɩɩ asa mʋ ba tɔwɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ yɛ, “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ, an kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii, yɛgɛ man gyɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ anɛ mʋ sʋ, amaa kpalɩ fɛɛ anɛ gbaa‐gbaa anɛ an nu yɛ anɛ asʋ, nɩɩ an bɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ dulinyaa tɔ asa ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ mʋ.”
43004043	Yesu maa gyii nkɛ nnyɔ kamaa tɔ mʋ, ɔ lɩɩ tʋtɔ kpee Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
43004044	Yesu gbaa‐gbaa ɩ wʋla kyɩna tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ kʋmaa man sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ ayɛ.”
43004045	Yesu maa naa fʋʋ Galile mʋ, Galile abi ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ abaa anyɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ngbaa bamʋ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba kpee Gyerusalem naa gyii Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ mʋ, ba wu kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa tʋtɔ mʋ.
43004046	Yesu maa bʋ Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ, o bwii kpee Kena kadɛ tɔ. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ kyɩna taa nkyu biliŋi nta mʋ. Maa bʋ tʋtɔ kanɩn mʋ, kɩbanɛ ɔbɩlɩsa kʋ mu‐bii‐nyɩnsa dɛ Kapanum kadɛ tɔ ɛɛ lɔ.
43004047	Ɔnyɩn mʋ maa nu fɛɛ Yesu lɩɩ Gyudeya ba Galile mʋ, ɔ ba mʋ asɛ ba kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ ɔ ba Kapanum ba kyɛ mu‐bii mʋ nɩɩ ɔ dɛ ee biti o wu mʋ sa mʋ.
43004048	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ ɔkʋ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii, amɔɔ fen wu asɩn kyinkyinsa yɛ adangana.”
43004049	Nɩɩ kɩbanɛ bɩlɩsa mʋ kʋlɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔbɩlɩsa, yɛgɛ a kpee mi kebii mʋ asɛ pɔyɩ kɛ o wu.”
43004050	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ yɛ, “Natɛ, fu kebii mʋ mɛɛ yɛ o wu.” Ɔnyɩn mʋ kɔɔlɛ Yesu asɩn mʋ gyii, nɩɩ ɔ kɩtaa ɔkpa kyʋn.
43004051	Maa kpewu mʋ, mʋ ayaafɔlɛ ba ba gyaŋa mʋ ɔkpa tɔ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, mu‐bii mʋ nyɛ alanfɩya.
43004052	Nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ kebii mʋ nyɛ alanfɩya. Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ndee kyʋwapɛ kerefi kʋlʋn saŋa mʋ, nɩɩ kibirima mʋ yɛgɛ mʋ.”
43004053	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ bɩɩ yɛ kanɩn saŋa maa kyɛɛkyɛɛ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fu‐kebii mʋ mɛɛ yɛ o wu” mʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔnyɩn mʋ maa mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ abi kpini ba kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii.
43004054	Yesu maa lɩɩ Gyudeya ba Galile mʋ, ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa nyɔsapʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa.
43005001	Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, Yesu kpee Gyerusalem naa gyii Gyiwu abi Kesu kɔnɔ ngyaŋɛ kʋ.
43005002	Kɩpatɛ kʋ kɩ bʋ Gyerusalem kadɛ tɔ, nɩɩ kɩ bʋ tiri kebunɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ nbʋlʋpʋ kebunɔ mʋ. Bɛɛ tɩɩ kapatɩyɛ maa Hibriwu kadɛ tɔ yɛ Betesada. Nɩɩ agyan anu ɩ dɛ kyaabɔɔ kɩmʋ.
43005003	Agyan nɩmʋ tɔ nɩɩ alɔpʋ damantɛ fɛɛ agyaatanapʋ, yɛ ayaa yɛ abaa wusa wuya ana, amʋgʋlɛ‐mʋgʋlɛ kpini ba ba tʋtɔ bee gyoo.
43005004	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kabɔɔ ɩ taalɛ ɛɛ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ɛ ba ee lupu nkyu mʋ tɔ, kɛ, alɔpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba dɛ‐dɛ mʋ, bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyankpaa loo kapatɩyɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, mʋ kʋlɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ mʋ tɔ mʋ ɩɩ lʋwɛ.
43005005	Ɔnyɩn kʋ bʋ tʋtɔ ɛɛ lɔ nsu adɩsa yɛ aburuwa.
43005006	Yesu maa wu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ dɛ tʋtɔ lɔ kyɛɛrɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fii biti fɛɛ fʋ nyɛ alanfɩya?”
43005007	Nɩɩ ɔlɔpʋ mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔbɩlɩsa, nɩɩ kabɔɔ mʋ kan lupu nkyu mʋ tɔ mʋ, n man sʋ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa mɛ loo kapatɩyɛ mʋ tɔ. Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n kpan mɛ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ n loo to mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ ɩ daa gyankpaa mɛ loo to.”
43005008	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kʋsʋ taa fʋ kalan kɛ fʋ natɛ.”
43005009	Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ alanfɩya, nɩɩ o kukuri mʋ kalan natɛ. Kanɩn kakɛ maŋa gyɛ Gyiwu abi kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ nɩn.
43005010	Nɩɩ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ ba tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ alanfɩya mʋ yɛ, “Ndaga gyɛ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ. Anɛ nbara mʋ ɩ mɛɛ sa ɔkpa yɛ fʋ sʋla fʋ kalan.”
43005011	Amaa ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɛ mɛ mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, ‘Taa fʋ kalan kɛ fʋ natɛ.’ ”
43005012	Kanɩn sʋ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ kanɩn ɔnyɩn maŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ fʋ taa fʋ kalan kɛ fʋ natɛ?”
43005013	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ man nyi kanɩn ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɛ mʋ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ asa ba kyɔ nɩɩ Yesu loo asa damantɛ mʋ tɔ kyʋn.
43005014	Kamaa tɔ mʋ Yesu wu mʋ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kɩɩ, nbɩɩnbɩɩ fʋ nyɛ alanfɩya, ɩmʋ sʋ yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa. Nɩɩ man gyɛ kanɩn, ɩmʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba fʋ sʋ mʋ ii biti ɩ baa ɩ kyɔ ɩnɩmʋ.”
43005015	Nɩɩ Ɔnyɩn mʋ lɩɩ tʋtɔ naa tɔwɛ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ yɛ Yesu ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɛ mʋ mʋ.
43005016	Lɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu waa kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ sʋ mʋ, Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ ba piili bɛɛ tɔɔrɔɔ mʋ.
43005017	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɛ‐Sɛ ii sun kusun saŋa kʋmaa, ɩmʋ sʋ ngbaa mɛ n sun kusun.”
43005018	Lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ Gyiwu abi ba payɩ ansi bee biti ɩkpa ba mɔɔ mʋ. Man gyɛ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ nbara kinyita mʋ wʋlɛ nkʋn sʋ, amaa ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ mʋ‐Sɛ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ maa Ɩbwaarɛ kyɛɛkyɛɛ.
43005019	Nɩɩ Yesu kyaga sʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, mɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ n mɛɛ taalɛ waa sɛhn mɛ kɩba sʋ. Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n wu Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ waa mʋ, kɩmʋ nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n waa.
43005020	Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ sʋ kebiti sa mɛ, nɩɩ ɛɛ kaapʋ mɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa mʋ. Mɛ‐Sɛ ii biti ɔ kaapʋ mɛ atɔ kparɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kyɔ ɩnɩmʋ, kɛ n waa kɛ i kyinkyin fanɛ.
43005021	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ ii kyiŋi alewupu nɩɩ ɛɛ sa bamʋ nkpa mʋ, kanɩn maŋa sʋ nɩɩ mɛ, Obii mʋ gbaa n sa nkpa mi kebiti tɔ.
43005022	Mɛ‐Sɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛɛ talɛ ɔkʋ, amaa ɔ taa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ katalɛ waa mɛ kɩbaa tɔ.
43005023	Mɛ‐Sɛ ii biti asa kpini ba taa bʋnyaa sa mɛ, Obii mʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ taa bʋnyaa bɛɛ sa Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ taa bʋnyaa sa mɛ, Obii mʋ, ɩɩ kaapʋ nɩn fɛɛ ɔ mɛɛ taa bʋnyaa ɛɛ sa Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ.
43005024	“N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o nu mɛ asɩn, nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ gyii mʋ, sʋ nkpa kakpaa, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ mɛɛ yɛ o bun mʋ kʋpwɛ. Ɔ tɛɛ faa lɩɩ lewu tɔ ba nkpa tɔ.
43005025	N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ saŋa kʋ ɩɩ ba, nɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ gbaa ɩɩ tɛɛ ba. Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba du fɛɛ alewupu lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba man nyi Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, bee biti ba nu mɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ ɔbʋlɛ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba nu mɛ asɛ mʋ, bee biti ba nyɛ nkpa.
43005026	Fɛɛ Kanan mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ gyɛ nkpa kumu mʋ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ɔ sa mɛ, Mu‐Bii mʋ ɔkpa fɛɛ n baa n gyɛ nkpa kumu.
43005027	Nɩɩ ɔ sa mɛ ɔlʋn yɛ n talɛ daadimaadi kʋmaa, lɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ ɩ gyɛ Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa.
43005028	“Fan man yɛgɛ ɩnɩmʋ i kyinkyin fanɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa kʋ ii biti ɔ ba nɩɩ alewupu mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ nkyan tɔ kpini bee biti ba nu mɛ ɔbʋlɛ,
43005029	kɛ ba lɩɩ bamʋ nkyan tɔ ba. Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba waa adanbɩrasa mʋ, bee biti ba kyiŋi nyɛ nkpa, kɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba waa alibi mʋ, bee biti ba kyiŋi kɛ ba gyii kʋpwɛ.
43005030	Nɩɩ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ mɛɛ taalɛ waa sɛhn mɛ kɩbaa sʋ. N talɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n nu lɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ asɛ, nɩɩ n gyii asɩn ɩmʋ ɔkpa sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ n mee biti n waa mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ kɔkɔlɔ biti, amɔɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ lɛɛ.”
43005031	Yesu kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ n gyii mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn kesintin mʋ, ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ baa i budu.
43005032	Amaa ɔkʋ bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ee gyii mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn, mʋ ɩ gyɛ mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ n nyi fɛɛ mɛ n‐yɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ee gyii mʋ ɩ gyɛ kesintin.
43005033	“Nɩɩ fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fan sun kpee Gyɔn asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kesintin mʋ tɔwɛ fanɛ lɩɩ mɛ sʋ.
43005034	Man gyɛ fɛɛ n biti nyɩmɩsa daadimaadi o gyii mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kesintin nɩn, amaa n tɔwɛ asɩn nɩmʋ lɩɩ Gyɔn sʋ nɩn, kɛ fan nu kasɛ kɛ fan nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ.
43005035	Gyɔn kyɩna o du nɩn fɛɛ ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ kyaŋɛ nɩɩ kɩ kɩɩ tɔ, nɩɩ fan gyii fanɛ ansi gbɛrɛɛ ɩmʋ tɔ.
43005036	“Amaa n sʋ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ii gyii mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kesintin, nɩɩ i budu ɩ kyɔ Gyɔn lɛɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ kusun mʋ nɩɩ mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ taa sa mɛ nɩɩ n sun falɛ mʋ, ɩɩ lɛɛ kaapʋ kesintin fɛɛ mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ i sun mɛ.
43005037	Nɩɩ mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ gbaa gyii mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kesintin. Nɩɩ fan man pɩɩta nu mʋ ɔbʋlɛ abɛɛ fan wu mʋ yɛ ansi,
43005038	nɩɩ mʋ asɩn mʋ a man bʋ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan man kɔɔlɛ mɛ, ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mʋ gyii.
43005039	Fan payɩ ansi bɩɩla Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fɛn fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ kanan ɔkpa maŋa sʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan nyɛ nkpa kakpaa, yɛgɛ kanɩn Asɩnkyan yɩlasa maŋa ii gyii mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kesintin.
43005040	Amaa fan kina mɛ asɛ kɩba, kɛ fan ba nyɛ nkpa.
43005041	“Ayɩn‐bi lɩɩ daadimaadi kʋ asɛ man tiri mɛ.
43005042	Amaa n nyi fanɛ. N nyi fan maa man sʋ kebiti sa Ɩbwaarɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ.
43005043	N ba mɛ‐Sɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ, nɩɩ fan man kɔɔlɛ mɛ, amaa nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ba mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ kɩtɩɩ tɔ mʋ, fan biti fan kɔɔlɛ mʋ.
43005044	Fan maa biti ayɩn‐bi lɩɩ abaa asɛ falɛ, yɛgɛ fɛn mɛɛ kpan fanɛ n‐yɩɩ fan nyɛ ayɩn‐bi lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nkʋn asɛ mʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ fen biti fan waa kɔɔlɛ gyii?
43005045	“Fan man fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ n biti n pwɩɩ fanɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ mu ansi tɔ. Fanɛ naana Mosesi mʋ nɩɩ fan taa fanɛ tamaa tʋʋ mʋ sʋ mʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ pwɩɩ fanɛ.
43005046	Nɩɩ fan kan kɔɔlɛ Mosesi gyii mʋ, naafɔɔ fen biti fan kɔɔlɛ ngbaa mɛ gyii, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ kyʋrɔɔ mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn.
43005047	Amaa nɩɩ fan man kan kɔɔlɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyʋrɔɔ lɩɩ mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ mʋ gyii mʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ fen biti fan waa kɔɔlɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ falɛ gyii?”
43006001	Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, Yesu faa Galile ɔbʋn lala mʋ nɩɩ ba bɩla bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Tiberiya mʋ kpee kɩmʋ benben.
43006002	Nɩɩ asa damantɛ ba buu mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba wu mʋ asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa ɛɛ kyɛ alɔpʋ mʋ.
43006003	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba dii kpee kɩbɩɩ‐bi kʋkʋ sʋ naa kyɩna.
43006004	Kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ, Gyiwu abi Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kensi‐gyii mʋ ki tiri tɔ.
43006005	Yesu maa diyaa mʋ ansi kɩɩ mʋ, o wu sakyɔ damantɛ maa ba mʋ asɛ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ taasɛ Filipu yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ an biti an nyɛ agyitɔ sɔɔ sa asa banɩmʋ kpini kɛ bee gyii?”
43006006	Yesu tʋʋ Filipu tɔ nɩn kɩɩ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ tɛɛ wʋla o nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ waa.
43006007	Nɩɩ Filipu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Pɔyɩ kɛ a taalɛ nyɛ agyitɔ gbɛrɛɛ‐gbɛrɛɛ sa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ o gyii mʋ, amɔɔ an biti a nyita ɩbwaayɩ iburuwa kʋkɔka.”
43006008	Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ tɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Andiruwu, Simon Pita mu‐supu mʋ tɔwɛ yɛ,
43006009	“Kebii‐nyɩnsa‐bii kʋ bʋ nfɩɩ, nɩɩ ɔ sʋ bodobodo pii‐pii anuu yɛ ɩkɩn‐bi anyɔ. Kanɩn agyitɔ pii nɩmʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ waa kɛ ɩ fʋʋ asa damantɛ banɩmʋ?”
43006010	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ asa mʋ ba kyɩna‐kyɩna.” Yɛgɛ afitiri pɔrɔgɛsa a bʋ tʋtɔ kʋkyɔ, ɩmʋ sʋ asa mʋ kpini ba kyʋn kyɩna. Nɩɩ anyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ kɔnɔ ɩ waa fɛɛ ngbɩn nnuu.
43006011	Ba maa kyɩna kanɩn mʋ, Yesu taa bodobodo mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ ɔ taa sa yɛ ba barɩgɛ tɔ sa bamʋ. Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ɔ waa ɩkɩn mʋ gbaa. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ nyɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ee biti.
43006012	Ba maa gyii ŋmɛ mʋ, Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Fan tasɛ‐tasɛ agyisan mʋ, kɛ fan man yɛgɛ ɩmʋ ɩkʋ i sii.”
43006013	Ɩmʋ sʋ ba maa gyii bodobodo pii‐pii anu mʋ, ba tasɛ‐tasɛ ɩmʋ agyisan mʋ kpini bɔla alantan kudu anyɔ.
43006014	Asa mʋ ba maa wu asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu waa mʋ, ba piili bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kesintin, ɔnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ ba dulinyaa tɔ mʋ.”
43006015	Yesu maa bɩɩ fɛɛ, bee biti ba ba taa mʋ ɔlʋn sʋ, kɛ ba naa bun mʋ kuwura mʋ, ɔ bɩla lɩɩ bamʋ tɔ kpee kɩbɩɩ‐bi sʋ mʋ nkʋn.
43006016	Kalaatɩpwɛ asɛ maa fʋʋ mʋ, Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba kpɩlɩgɛ kpee ɔbʋn lala kɔnɔ.
43006017	Nɩɩ ɩ maa sʋla naa fʋʋ kagyanbwɛ yɛgɛ Yesu man pɩɩta bwii ba bamʋ asɛ mʋ, ba naa loo ɔkʋlɩ tɔ bɛɛ faa bee kpee Kapanum.
43006018	Nɩɩ afuu lala a tigi a daa yɛgɛ nkyu mʋ ii wuli tɔ.
43006019	Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba maa palɛ kpee ansi tɔ fɛɛ mayɩlɩ asa abɛɛ ana mʋ, ba wu Yesu maa naa nkyu mʋ sʋ ɛɛ ba bamʋ ɔkʋlɩ mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ.
43006020	Amaa Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɛ nɩn, fan man waa kufuu.”
43006021	Nɩɩ ba maa biti fɛɛ ba taa Yesu waa ɔkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ mʋ, opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ ɔkʋlɩ mʋ dan katɩn mʋ nɩɩ bee biti fɛɛ ba fʋʋ mʋ.
43006022	Ɩmʋ lɩɩkaakɛ mʋ, asa damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba sii ɔbʋn lala mʋ benben mʋ, ba wu fɛɛ ɔkʋlɩ kʋlʋn ki sii kɩ dan tʋtɔ ndee nɩɩ kɩmʋ nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba taa. Amaa Yesu mɔɔ man loo mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ asɛ ɔkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ.
43006023	Nɩɩ ɩkʋlɩ ɩkʋ mɔɔ ɩ lɩɩ Tiberiya ba dan tʋtɔ tiri katɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ daa taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ asa ba gyii agyitɔ mʋ.
43006024	Ɩmʋ sʋ asa damantɛ mʋ ba maa bɩɩ fɛɛ Yesu abɛɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba man bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ, ba loo ɩkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ kpee Kapanum ba naa bee biti Yesu.
43006025	Ba maa naa wu mʋ ɔbʋn mʋ benben mʋ, ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, saŋa mɔɔ nɩɩ fʋ fʋʋ nfɩɩ?”
43006026	Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin, man gyɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ fan wu sʋ nɩɩ fan naa fen biti mɛ, amaa lɩɩ fan maa nyɛ agyitɔ gyii ŋmɛ kanan sʋ nɩɩ fen biti mɛ.
43006027	Fan man waa kusun biti agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ii biti i nyita, amaa fan waa kusun biti agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nkpa kakpaa. Mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa n biti n sa fanɛ kanɩn agyitɔ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ lɛɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ mʋ kɩbaa kɩ gyan mɛ sʋ.”
43006028	Ɩmʋ sʋ ba taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ii tiri fɛɛ a waa kɛ a taalɛ waa kusun mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti?”
43006029	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Kusun mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti fɛn waa mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, fan kɔɔlɛ mɛ, ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mʋ gyii.”
43006030	Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa nɩɩ fii biti fʋ waa kɛ an wu kɛ a kɔɔlɛ fu gyii? Mɩnɛ nɩɩ fii biti fʋ waa?
43006031	Saŋa kʋ tɔ, anɛ naana ana ba gyii agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ ɩmʋ yɛ Mana mʋ ofuli sʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔ sa bamʋ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ nɩɩ ba gyii.’ ”
43006032	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin, man gyɛ Mosesi ɩ sa fanɛ naana ana agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ mʋ. Amaa Mɛ‐Sɛ ɩ sa fanɛ naana kesintin agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ gbaa ɩɩ sa fanɛ kesintin agyitɔ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ mʋ.
43006033	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ sa asa mʋ, ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ kpɩlɩgɛ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba kasɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ɛɛ sa dulinyaa tɔ asa nkpa mʋ.”
43006034	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, lɩɩ ndaga ɩ sʋ ii kpee sa anɛ kanɩn agyitɔ maŋa saŋa kʋmaa.”
43006035	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nkpa mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ ba mɛ asɛ mʋ, akʋn ɩ mɛɛ yɛ a mɔɔ mʋ kakaakʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ, bʋlɩfɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ kɩtaa mʋ.
43006036	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ mʋ, fan wu mɛ, amaa fɛn mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ mɛ fen gyii.
43006037	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ taa sa mɛ mʋ, ii biti ɔ ba mɛ asɛ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ ba mɛ asɛ mʋ, mɛɛ yɛ n gya mʋ.
43006038	Lɩɩ fɛɛ n lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba kasɛ sʋ, kɛ n ba waa ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ kebiti, amaa man gyɛ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mi kebiti.
43006039	Ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ kebiti ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, bamʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa bamʋ sa mɛ mʋ kpini, bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋlʋn gbaa ɔ man fɔyɩ. Amaa n biti n kyiŋi bamʋ ba nkpa tɔ kakɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ.
43006040	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ kebiti ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o wu mɛ, Mu‐Bii mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ ɩɩ nyɛ nkpa kakpaa. Nɩɩ n biti n kyiŋi mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ ba nkpa tɔ kakɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ.”
43006041	Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi mʋ ba piili bɛɛ kɔlɩtɛ bee yii Yesu, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba kasɛ sʋ mʋ.”
43006042	Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Man gyɛ Gyosefu mu‐bii mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Yesu mʋ nɩn? An nyi mʋ‐sɛ yɛ mu‐nyi a! Nɩɩ mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ, ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘N lɩɩ sʋsʋ nɩn ba?’ ”
43006043	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ fanɛ kɩkɔlɩtɛ mʋ.
43006044	Ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ ba mɛ asɛ, amɔɔ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ, ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɔ ba, nɩɩ n biti n kyiŋi mʋ ba nkpa tɔ kakɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ.
43006045	Ɩbwaarɛ Atɔwɛpʋ ba kyʋrɔɔ yɩla yɛ, ‘Ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ii biti ɔ nyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩkaapʋ.’ Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o nu Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ bɩɩla lɩɩ mʋ asɛ mʋ, ii biti ɔ ba mɛ asɛ.
43006046	Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ mɛɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ ɔkʋ tee wu Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ, amɔɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ nkʋn i wu mʋ.
43006047	N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ, sʋ nkpa kakpaa.
43006048	Mɛ ɩ gyɛ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nkpa mʋ.
43006049	Fanɛ naana ana ba gyii agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Mana mʋ ofuli sʋ, amaa ba wu.
43006050	Amaa agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba kasɛ sʋ mʋ ndee, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o gyii kanɩn agyitɔ maŋa mʋ, mɛɛ yɛ o wu.
43006051	Mɛ ɩ gyɛ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nkpa nɩɩ n kpɩlɩgɛ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba kasɛ sʋ mʋ. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o gyii kanɩn agyitɔ nɩmʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ kyɩna kakpaa. Nɩɩ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ n biti n sa dulinyaa tɔ asa kɛ ba nyɛ nkpa mʋ ɩ gyɛ mɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ.”
43006052	Gyiwu abi mʋ ba maa nu Yesu asɩn tɔwɛsa kanɩn mʋ, ɩ waa bamʋ agbʋ. Nɩɩ ba piili bee gyii abaa ɩmɔɔrɛ, bɛɛ taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ ii biti ɔ waa taa mʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ sa anɛ kɛ a wɛ?”
43006053	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, fan kan fan man wɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ, kɛ fen nuu mɛ nkalan de, fɛn mɛɛ yɛ fan nyɛ nkpa.
43006054	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wɛ mɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ, nɩɩ o nuu mɛ nkalan mʋ, ɔ sʋ nkpa kakpaa, nɩɩ n biti n kyiŋi mʋ ba nkpa tɔ kakɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ tɔ.
43006055	Kpalɩ fɛɛ mɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ ɩ gyɛ agyitɔ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ, nɩɩ mɛ nkalan ɩ gyɛ atɔ nuusa gbaa‐gbaa mʋ.
43006056	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wɛ mɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ, nɩɩ o nuu mɛ nkalan mʋ, ɔ bʋ mɛ tɔ nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n bʋ mʋ tɔ.
43006057	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ nkpa kumu sun mɛ, nɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ n sʋ nkpa mʋ, ɔkpa kʋlʋn maŋa sʋ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wɛ mɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ, ii biti ɔ nyɛ nkpa lɩɩ mɛ sʋ.
43006058	Mɛ ɩ gyɛ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba kasɛ sʋ mʋ. N man du fɛɛ mana agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ naana ana ba gyii, nɩɩ ɩ man sa bamʋ nkpa nɩɩ ba wu mʋ. Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o gyii agyitɔ nɩmʋ bɩrɛ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ nkpa kakpaa.”
43006059	Yesu maa bʋ Kapaniyum, Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa ɛɛ kaapʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ.
43006060	Yesu abɩɩlapʋ gaalaagaa ba maa nu ɩnɩmʋ mʋ, ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Falɛ kɩkaapʋ kɩnɩmʋ kɩ bʋlʋn. Anɩmʋ ɩ taalɛ kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ kyula?”
43006061	Yesu maa bɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ bɛɛ kɔlɩtɛ lɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩmʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ falɛ ɩ kɩtaa fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ nɩn?
43006062	Kanɩn bɩrɛ nɩɩ fan kan wu mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa n maa bwii n kpee sʋsʋ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n lɩɩ ba kasɛ sʋ mʋ mɔɔ de?
43006063	Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ sa nkpa, amaa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ asa ba sʋ bamʋ ɔlʋn bɛɛ waa mʋ man sʋ tɔnɔ. Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ sa fanɛ mʋ, ɩ lɩɩ Kayaayu tɔ nɩn nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nkpa.
43006064	Amaa yɛgɛ fanɛ tɔ akʋ ba mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ bee gyii.” Yesu tɔwɛ kanɩn lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ wʋla o nyi lɩɩ npiili asɛ, bamʋ nɩɩ ba man kɔɔlɛ gyii yɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ ba lɛɛ mʋ ɛ sa mʋ.
43006065	Nɩɩ Yesu kyaga sʋ yɛ, “Kpalɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ ba mɛ asɛ mʋ kɩbaa sʋ, amɔɔ Mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ sa mʋ ɔkpa.”
43006066	Lɩɩ kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ gaalaagaa ba bwii kamaa, nɩɩ ba man bɩla buu mʋ.
43006067	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fen biti fan bwii do?”
43006068	Nɩɩ Simon Pita lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, anɩmʋ asɛ nɩɩ an sʋ an kpee? Fʋ nkʋn ɩ sʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nyɩmɩsa nkpa kakpaa.
43006069	An kɔɔlɛ gyii nɩɩ an bɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ nkʋn ɩ gyɛ Ɔkyɩrɛkyɩrɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ.”
43006070	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Man gyɛ fanɛ kudu anyɔ mʋ, nɩɩ n lɛɛ? Amaa fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ gyɛ Sɩtaanɛ.”
43006071	Gyudasi mʋ nɩɩ mʋ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Simon Isikariyoti mʋ asɩn nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ. Halɩɩ Gyudasi maa gyɛ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ gbaa mʋ, kamaa tɔ mʋ, mʋ ii biti ɔ ba lɛɛ Yesu sa.
43007001	Ɩnɩmʋ kpini kamaa mʋ, Yesu naa ɔ naa Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ. Ee mee biti maa loo Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Gyiwu abi abɩlɩsa bee biti ba mɔɔ mʋ.
43007002	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi Kesu kɔnɔ abuu kiyii kensi‐gyii a maa tiri tɔ mʋ,
43007003	Yesu mu‐supu ana ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɩ dagaa fʋ maa lɩɩ nfɩɩ kpee Gyudeya, kɛ fu abuupu ba naa wu fʋ asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ waa mʋ.
43007004	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti yɛ mʋ kɩtɩɩ ki dii mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ waa mʋ asɩn ɛɛ baala. Lɩɩ asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ waa falɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɩ dagaa fʋ maa lɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ ifuli kaapʋ dulinyaa tɔ asa.”
43007005	Halɩɩ mu‐supu ana gbaa ba man kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.
43007006	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa mʋ, man pɩɩ fʋʋ, fanɛɛ fanɛ saŋa kʋmaa bʋrɔn sa fanɛ.
43007007	Dulinya asa mɛɛ taalɛ kisi fanɛ. Amaa mɛ nɩɩ bee kisi, lɩɩ fɛɛ n gyii bamʋ kesintin fɛɛ bamʋ asunsunsa ɩ gyɛ alibi.
43007008	Fanɛ fanɛ fan kpee kensi‐gyii ngyaŋɛ mʋ tɔ. N mɛɛ yɛ n kpee ngyaŋɛ mʋ tɔ nbɩɩnbɩɩ, lɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ saŋa man pɩɩta fʋʋ.”
43007009	Maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ maŋa lʋwɛ mʋ o sii kyɩna Galile.
43007010	Amaa Yesu mu‐supu ana ba maa lɩɩ kyʋn kensi‐gyii ngyaŋɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, mʋ gbaa mʋ kpee nɩɩ ɔ man lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ ifuli.
43007011	Kensi‐gyii ngyaŋɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ bɛɛ kɩɩ bee biti mʋ, yɛgɛ bɛɛ taasɛ asa yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn maŋa bʋ?”
43007012	Sakyɔ mʋ tɔ asa damantɛ bee muni abaa asɛ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ. Akʋ ba yɛ, “Ɔ gyɛ nyɩmɩsa danbɩrasa.” Nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba yɛ, “Ɛɛ pɩna asa nɩn.”
43007013	Amaa ɔkʋ man taalɛ lɩɩ ifuli tɔwɛ Yesu n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba maa sɩlɛ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ sʋ.
43007014	Ba maa waa kensi‐gyii ngyaŋɛ mʋ naa fʋʋ nsana mʋ, Yesu kpee Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ nɩɩ o piili ɛɛ kaapʋ asɩn.
43007015	Mʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ i kyinkyin Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ, nɩɩ ba taasɛ yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ man bɩɩla nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ falɛ kinyi?”
43007016	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɛ kɩkaapʋ mʋ man gyɛ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ lɛɛ. Ɩ lɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ asɛ nɩn.
43007017	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ waa Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti mʋ, ee biti ɔ bu fɛɛ mɛ kɩkaapʋ mʋ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, abɛɛ n tɔwɛ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ ɔlʋn sʋ nɩn.
43007018	Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ ɔlʋn sʋ mʋ, ɩɩ waa kanɩn nɩn ee biti bʋnyaa ɛɛ sa mʋ n‐yɩɩ. Amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti bʋnyaa ɛɛ sa ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mʋ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ kesintin wuya, nɩɩ antɩŋɛsa kʋ ɩ man bʋ mʋ tɔ.
43007019	Mosesi man sa fanɛ nbara mʋ? Amaa fanɛ ɔkʋ man buu nbara mʋ. Mɩnɛ waa nɩɩ fen biti fan mɔɔ mɛ?”
43007020	Nɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nbwɩɩ libi ba bʋ fʋ tɔ. Anɩmʋ ana ii biti fʋ kɩmɔɔ?”
43007021	Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N maa waa adangana kʋlʋn kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɩmʋ i kyinkyin fanɛ falɛ.
43007022	Mosesi sa fanɛ oduu kɩtɩn nbara, yɛgɛ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ fɛn tɩn kebii oduu. Kesintin tɔ mʋ nbara mʋ man lɩɩ Mosesi asɛ, amaa ɩ lɩɩ anɛ naana ana asɛ.
43007023	Nɩɩ fan maa tɩn kebii oduu kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ, kɛ i mee nyita Mosesi nbara mʋ, mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ n kyɛ nyɩmɩsa laalaamuu kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ nɩɩ fɛn nyɛ agbʋ waa mɛ?
43007024	Fan man kɩɩ nyɩmɩsa awaasa kɛ fan bun mʋ kʋpwɛ, amaa fan kɩɩ asɩn mʋ tɔ danbɩrasa pɔyɩ kɛ fan bun kʋpwɛ.”
43007025	Nɩɩ Gyerusalem asa akʋ ba piili bɛɛ taasɛ yɛ, “Man gyɛ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ nɩɩ bee biti mʋ yɛ ba mɔɔ mʋ?
43007026	Fan kɩɩ, mʋ ɩ yɩlɛ asa tɔ ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ sɛhn. Abɛɛ abɩlɩsa mʋ ba bɩɩ nɩn fɛɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ?
43007027	Ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ bɩrɛ an nyi katɩn mʋ nu ɔ lɩɩ. Amaa Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ kan ba mʋ, ɔkʋ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ bɩɩ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ.”
43007028	Yesu maa san ɔ bʋ Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa obu lala tɔ ɛɛ kaapʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ kenken yɛ, “Kesintin, fan nyi mɛ, nɩɩ fan nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n lɩɩ. Man gyɛ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ ɔlʋn sʋ nɩɩ n ba nfɩɩ, amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ gyɛ kesintin wuya nɩɩ fanɛɛ fanɛ fan man nyi mʋ.
43007029	Amaa mɛɛ mɛ n nyi mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ n lɩɩ mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ mʋ i sun mɛ.”
43007030	Kanɩn sʋ ba biti yɛ ba kɩtaa mʋ, amaa ɔkʋ man taa mʋ kɩbaa mata mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ saŋa man pɩɩta fʋʋ.
43007031	Ɩmʋ kpini gbaa mʋ asa gaalaagaa ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii sakyɔ mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ bɛɛ taasɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ kan ba mʋ, ee biti ɔ taalɛ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa ɔ kyɔ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ waa falɛ?”
43007032	Farasii abi mʋ ba nu sakyɔ mʋ ba maa muni falɛ asɩn lɩɩ mʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ ba maa Oseepu bɩlɩsa mʋ ba sun Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa obu lala akɩɩsʋpʋ yɛ ba naa kɩtaa mʋ ba.
43007033	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N mɛɛ yɛ n bɩla n kyɩna fanɛ asɛ kyɛɛrɛɛ, kɛ n bwii kpee ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ asɛ.
43007034	Fen biti fan kɩɩ biti mɛ amaa fan mɛɛ yɛ fan wu mɛ, nɩɩ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ mʋ, fan mɛɛ taalɛ ba tʋtɔ.”
43007035	Nɩɩ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ bɛɛ taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ kanyɩn nɩmʋ ii biti o kpee nɩɩ a man bɩla yɛ a wu mʋ? Ee biti o kpee Giriki abi tɔ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ anɛ asa ba yaasɛ loo, kɛ ɔ naa kaapʋ Giriki abi mʋ abɛɛ?
43007036	Maa tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Fen biti fan biti mɛ amaa fan mɛɛ yɛ fan wu mɛ, nɩɩ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ mʋ fan mɛɛ taalɛ ba tʋtɔ mʋ’ mɩnɛ nɩɩ ɛɛ kaapʋ?”
43007037	Nɩɩ kakɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ kakɛ kparɛ kensi‐gyii mʋ tɔ mʋ, Yesu kʋsʋ yɩlɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ kenken yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ bʋlɩfɔ kan ɔ sʋ mʋ mʋ, ɔ ba mɛ asɛ ba nuu nkyu.
43007038	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ, nkyu mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nkpa mʋ ii biti ɩ baa ɩ lɩɩ mʋ tɔ ɩɩ kyʋn fɛɛ ɔbʋn, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ mʋ.”
43007039	Nkyu mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nkpa asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ nfɩɩ mʋ, yɩlɛ sa Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii mʋ, bee biti ba ba nyɛ. Saŋa maŋa tɔ mʋ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ man pɩɩ ba, lɩɩ fɛɛ Yesu bʋnyaa man pɩɩta lɩɩ ifuli.
43007040	Sakyɔ mʋ ba maa nu maa tɔwɛ falɛ asɩn mʋ, bamʋ akʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kesintin tɔ, ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ mʋ.”
43007041	Akʋ ba yɛ, “Mʋ ɩ gyɛ Krisito mʋ.” Nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba taasɛ yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ Krisito ii biti ɔ lɩɩ Galile?
43007042	Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ Krisito ii biti ɔ lɩɩ Owura Dawidi kanan tɔ, kɛ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ Betilehem kadɛ tɔ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ Owura Dawidi daa kyɩna mʋ”
43007043	Lɩɩ kanɩn sʋ nbarɩgɛ tɔ ɩ ba sakyɔ mʋ tɔ lɩɩ Yesu sʋ.
43007044	Nɩɩ bamʋ akʋ bee biti ba kɩtaa mʋ, amaa ɔkʋ man taa kɩbaa mata mʋ.
43007045	Nɩɩ Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa akɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ ba bwii kpee Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu abɩlɩsa yɛ Farasii abi mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ba taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ waa nɩɩ fan man kɩtaa mʋ ba?”
43007046	Nɩɩ akɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nyɩmɩsa kʋ man pɩɩta tɔwɛ asɩn fɛɛ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ.”
43007047	Nɩɩ Farasii abi mʋ ba taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ bɩla pɩna fanɛ gbaa fanɛ?
43007048	Fan wu kadɛ nɩmʋ tɔ abɩlɩsa abɛɛ Farasii abi mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ maa kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii? Ayee!
43007049	Amaa sakyɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii mʋ bɩrɛ ba man nyi Mosesi nbara mʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ nnɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɩla ii biti ɩ ba bamʋ sʋ.”
43007050	Nikodemusi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla ba Yesu asɛ kakaakʋ, nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ bamʋ abɩlɩsa mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ mʋ, taasɛ bamʋ yɛ,
43007051	“Anɛ nbara ɩɩ sa ɔkpa fɛɛ a taalɛ bun nyɩmɩsa kʋpwɛ yɛgɛ a man nu mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ asɩn wu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa?”
43007052	Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ngbaa fʋ, fʋ lɩɩ Galile nɩn? Kɩɩ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ danbɩrasa, fii biti fu wu fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ kʋ man lɩɩ Galile.”
43007053	[Nɩɩ ba kʋsʋ ngyaŋɛ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kpee mʋ ayɛ.]
43008001	Ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ maa kyʋn mʋ ayɛ mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu lɩɩ tʋtɔ kpee Olifu kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ.
43008002	Ɩmʋ lɩɩkaakɛ nyenyenfuu mʋ, Yesu bwii ba Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa obu lala mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ asa ba ba yɩlɛ kyaabɔɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kyʋn kyɩna nɩɩ o piili ɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ.
43008003	Maa bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ, nɩɩ nbara akaapʋpʋ yɛ Farasii abi ba bɩya ɔkyɩɩ kilipu kʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba kɩtaa mʋ maa ɔnyɩn. Nɩɩ ba taa mʋ ba yɩlɛ bamʋ nsana.
43008004	Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, ba kɩtaa ɔkyɩɩ nɩmʋ maa ɔnyɩn.
43008005	Mosesi nbara mʋ ɩɩ kaapʋ anɛ yɛ a tʋʋ abuu mɔɔ kanɩn akyɩɩ maŋa. Nbɩɩnbɩɩ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ fɩɩ tɔwɛ.”
43008006	Ba taasɛ mʋ asɩn nɩmʋ kɛ ba nu mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ alibi, kɛ ba nyɛ yɩlɛ ɩmʋ sʋ pwɩɩ mʋ. Amaa Yesu nyɔn mu kumu yii tɔ, taa mʋ kɩbaa‐bi ɛɛ kyʋrɔɔ kasɛ.
43008007	Ba maa maa sʋ bɛɛ taasɛ mʋ mʋ, ɔ kʋsaa mu kumu nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man pɩɩta waa alibi mʋ, ɔ gyankpaa tʋʋ kubuu da ɔkyɩɩ mʋ.”
43008008	Nɩɩ o bwii nyɔn mu kumu yii tɔ ɛɛ kyʋrɔɔ kasɛ.
43008009	Nɩɩ ba maa nu kanɩn mʋ, ba piili bɛɛ lɩɩ kʋkʋlʋn‐kʋkʋlʋn. Abɩlɩsa mʋ ba gyankpaa lɩɩ pɔyɩ. Nɩɩ ɩ san Yesu maa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nkʋn yɛgɛ ɔ yɩlɛ tʋtɔ.
43008010	Nɩɩ Yesu kusaa mu kumu nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkyɩɩ, ba bʋ fɩnɛ? Ɔkʋ man bʋ tɔ kɛ o bun fʋ kʋpwɛ fʋ?”
43008011	Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, ayee, ɔkʋ man bʋ tɔ.” Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ngbaa mɛ mɛɛ yɛ n bun fʋ kʋpwɛ. Natɛ, lɩɩ ndaga ɩɩ sʋ ii kpee man bɩla naa waa alibi.”
43008012	Nɩɩ Yesu bwii tɔwɛ Farasii abi mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ dulinyaa tɔ ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o buu mɛ mʋ, mɛɛ yɛ ɔ natɛ kitentenbiri tɔ, amaa ee biti ɔ nyɛ ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ sa nkpa mʋ.”
43008013	Nɩɩ Farasii abi mʋ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ, fii gyii fʋ gbaa‐gbaa fʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kesintin nɩn, ɩmʋ sʋ a mɛɛ yɛ a taalɛ kɔɔlɛ fu gyii.”
43008014	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Halɩɩ nɩɩ n gyii mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kesintin gbaa mʋ, mɛ asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ kesintin. Lɩɩ fɛɛ n nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n lɩɩ nɩɩ n nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n kpee. Amaa fanɛɛ fanɛ bɩrɛ, fan man nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n lɩɩ, nɩɩ fan man nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n kpee.
43008015	Fanɛ bɩrɛ, nyɩmɩsa ɩkpa sʋ nɩɩ fɛn yɩlɛ sʋ fen gyii asɩn. Mɛɛ mɛ bɩrɛ n mee gyii ɔkʋ asɩn.
43008016	Amaa nɩɩ n kan gyii asɩn mʋ, mɛ asɩn kigyii kɩ dɛ ɔkpa, lɩɩ fɛɛ man gyɛ mɛ nkʋn ii gyii asɩn mʋ. Amaa maa Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ.
43008017	Ba kyʋrɔɔ fanɛ Nbara tɔ yɛ, nɩɩ asa anyɔ bee gyii kesintin lɩɩ asɩn kʋ sʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ nnɔ ɩ man kpakyarɛ mʋ, bamʋ asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ kesintin.
43008018	Mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ ii gyii mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kesintin, nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ gbaa ii gyii mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kesintin.”
43008019	Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ‐sɛ bʋ fɩnɛ?” Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan man nyi mɛ, nɩɩ fan man nyi Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ gbaa. Nɩɩ fan daa fan nyi mɛ nɩn, naafɔɔ fan bɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ gbaa.”
43008020	Yesu tɔwɛ asɩn nɩmʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kaapʋ asɩn Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ afulee ɔyɩlɛkpa mʋ. Amaa ɔkʋ man kɩtaa mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ saŋa man pɩɩta fʋʋ.
43008021	Nɩɩ Yesu bwii tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N kpee nɩmʋ. Nɩɩ fen biti fan kɩɩ biti mɛ, kɛ fan wu fanɛ alibi tɔ. Nɩɩ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n kpee mʋ fɛn mɛɛ taalɛ ba tʋtɔ.”
43008022	Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi mʋ bɛɛ taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Maa tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n kpee mʋ fɛn mɛɛ taalɛ ba tʋtɔ’ mʋ, ee biti ɔ mɔɔ mʋ n‐yɩɩ nɩn abɛɛ?”
43008023	Nɩɩ ɔ kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan lɩɩ kasɛ sʋ nfɩɩ nɩn, mɛɛ mɛ n lɩɩ sʋsʋ. Nɩɩ fan gyɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ lɛɛ nɩn, mɛɛ mɛ bɩrɛ n man gyɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ lɛɛ.
43008024	Kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, fen biti fan wu fanɛ alibi tɔ mʋ. Nɩɩ fan man kan kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii yɛ, mɛ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ yɛ n gyɛ mʋ, fen biti fan wu fanɛ alibi tɔ kesintin.”
43008025	Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ anɩmʋ?” Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ n dan wʋla n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ n gyɛ mʋ.
43008026	N sʋ asɩn gaa n tɔwɛ lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ, kɛ n taa gyii fanɛ asɩn. Amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ gyɛ kesintin wuya, nɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n nu lɩɩ mʋ asɛ mʋ nkʋn nɩɩ n tɔwɛ n sa dulinyaa abi.”
43008027	Ɩmʋ kpini gbaa mʋ ba man pɩɩta bɩɩ fɛɛ Mʋ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ bamʋ.
43008028	Ɩmʋ sʋ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fan kan ba kʋsaa mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ sʋsʋ mʋ, tʋtɔ nɩɩ fen biti fan bɩɩ fɛɛ n gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ n wʋla tɔwɛ yɛ n gyɛ mʋ, nɩɩ n mɛɛ waa kʋtɔ kʋ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ ɔlʋn sʋ, amaa asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ kaapʋ mɛ mʋ, ɩmʋ nɩɩ n sʋ n tɔwɛ.
43008029	Ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ bʋ mɛ asɛ, ɔ man yɛgɛ mɛ nkʋn, lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa kʋmaa n waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ pɩrɛ mʋ.”
43008030	Nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba nu Yesu maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ kpini mʋ gaalaagaa ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.
43008031	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii mʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fan kan fan buu mɛ asɩn kaapʋsa mʋ, fan gyɛ mɛ abɩɩlapʋ kesintin tɔ.
43008032	Nɩɩ fen biti fan bɩɩ kesintin mʋ, kɛ kesintin mʋ ɔ yɛgɛ fan nyɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ.”
43008033	Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “An gyɛ Abraham kɩnaana tɔ asa nɩn. Nɩɩ anɛɛnɛ bɩrɛ, kakaakʋ a man pɩɩta waa ɔkʋ kɩnyɛ. Nɩɩ mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ an biti a nyɛ anɛ n‐yɩɩ?”
43008034	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa alibi mʋ gyɛ kɩnyɛ sa alibi nɩn.
43008035	Nɩɩ kɩnyɛ man gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ o tii kɩkpaara abi sʋ, amaa obii bɩrɛ gyɛ kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ obii kakpaa.
43008036	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɔkʋ nyɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ mʋ, kesintin tɔ ɔ nyɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kakpaa.
43008037	N nyi fan maa gyɛ Abraham anaana‐bii. Amaa ɩnɩmʋ kpini gbaa mʋ, fen biti fɛɛ fan mɔɔ mɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fɛn mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ mɛ asɩn mʋ fɛn waa fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ.
43008038	Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ kaapʋ mɛ mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ falɛ. Nɩɩ fanɛɛ fanɛ fɛn waa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan nu lɩɩ fanɛ‐sɛ asɛ.”
43008039	Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Anɛ‐sɛ ɩ gyɛ Abraham.” Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan daa fan gyɛ Abraham mu‐bii ana kesintin tɔ nɩn, naafɔɔ fen biti fan waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ.
43008040	Amaa n maa tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin mʋ nɩɩ n nu lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ gbaa mʋ, fen biti fan mɔɔ mɛ. Abraham man waa falɛ atɔ.
43008041	Atɔ mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ‐sɛ waa mʋ, nɩɩ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fɛn waa.” Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “A man gyɛ akuyurubi, ɔsɛ kʋlʋn nɩɩ an sʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ.”
43008042	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ daa ɔ gyɛ fanɛ‐Sɛ nɩn, naafɔɔ fen biti fan nyɛ kebiti sa mɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ n lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ nɩn, nɩɩ n ba nfɩɩ. Man gyɛ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ ɔlʋn sʋ nɩɩ n ba, amaa mʋ i sun mɛ.
43008043	Nɩɩ mɩnɛ waa sʋ nɩɩ fen mee nu mɛ asɩn tɔwɛsa mʋ kasɛ? Lɩɩ fɛɛ fɛn mɛɛ taalɛ fen nu mɛ asɩn mʋ.
43008044	Fan gyɛ fanɛ‐sɛ Sɩtaanɛ mu‐bii ana nɩn, ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan waa fanɛ‐sɛ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ biti. Lɩɩ npiili asɛ mʋ kpini nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ ɔmɔɔpʋ, nɩɩ ɔ man buu kesintin, lɩɩ fɛɛ kesintin man bʋ mʋ tɔ. Mʋ lɛɛ kpini ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ ɔ tɔwɛ antɩŋɛsa, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ gyɛ antɩŋɛsa wuya, yɛ antɩŋɛsa wuya ana bamʋ‐sɛ.
43008045	Amaa mɛɛ mɛ bɩrɛ n gyii fanɛ kesintin nɩn, ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ fɛɛ mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ mɛ fen gyii.
43008046	Fanɛ tɔ anɩmʋ ɩ taalɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ n gyii alibi kʋpwɛ? Nɩɩ n maa tɔwɛ kesintin mʋ, mɩnɛ waa nɩɩ fɛn mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ fen gyii?
43008047	Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ, ii nu asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ. Kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ fen mee nu Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ fan man gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ.”
43008048	Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi mʋ mɔɔ ba tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Nɩɩ a maa tɔwɛ yɛ fʋ gyɛ Kasamariya‐nyɩn nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba tɛ fʋ tɔ mʋ, ɩ man gyɛ kesintin?”
43008049	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ “Nbwɩɩ libi akʋ ba man tɛ mɛ tɔ, amaa n bʋnyaa mɛ‐Sɛ, yɛgɛ fanɛɛ fanɛ fɛn mɛɛ bʋnyaa mɛ.
43008050	N mee biti bʋnyaa n sa mɛ n‐yɩɩ. Amaa ɔkʋ bʋ tɔ ee biti kɩmʋ ɛɛ sa mɛ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ asɩn ogyipu mʋ.
43008051	N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o buu mɛ kɩkaapʋ mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ yɛ o wu kakaakʋ.”
43008052	Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi mʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ an wu kesintin tɔ fɛɛ nbwɩɩ libi ba bʋ fʋ tɔ. Abraham wu, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ gbaa ba wu. Amaa fʋ, fʋ tɔwɛ yɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o buu fʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ ɔ mɛɛ yɛ o wu.
43008053	Ɩmʋ sʋ fii biti fʋ kaapʋ fɛɛ fʋ kyɔ anɛ‐sɛ Abraham abɛɛ? O wu, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ gbaa ba wu. Anɩmʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ fʋ gyɛ?”
43008054	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nɩɩ n kan sa mɛ n‐yɩɩ bʋnyaa mʋ, mɛ bʋnyaa mʋ gyɛ kɩyan. Amaa mɛ‐Sɛ, mʋ nɩɩ fɛn tɔwɛ yɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ bʋnyaa mɛ.
43008055	Fan man nyi mʋ, mɛɛ mɛ bɩrɛ n nyi mʋ. Nɩɩ n kan n tɔwɛ yɛ n man n nyi mʋ mʋ, n gyɛ antɩŋɛsa wuya fɛɛ fanɛ, amaa n nyi mʋ, nɩɩ n nu mʋ asɛ.
43008056	Fanɛ‐sɛ Abraham mu ansi i gyii fɛɛ ee biti o wu mɛ kɩba. Nɩɩ o wu mɛ kɩba mʋ, nɩɩ mu ansi i gyii.”
43008057	Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi mʋ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ man pɩɩta gyii nsu adunuu nɩɩ fʋ yɛ fu wu Abraham?”
43008058	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, pɔyɩ kɛ ba kʋʋgɛ Abraham mʋ, yɛgɛ n bʋ tɔ.”
43008059	Ba maa nu falɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ba kukuri abuu yɛ ba tʋʋ mʋ. Amaa Yesu loo asa mʋ tɔ bʋlɛ, nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ kyʋn.
43009001	Yesu maa naa ɛɛ kyʋn mʋ, o wu ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ gyaatanapʋ lɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ.
43009002	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ gyaatanapʋ? Mʋ gbaa‐gbaa alibi sʋ abɛɛ mʋ akʋʋgɛpʋ alibi sʋ?”
43009003	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mʋ kɩgyatana mʋ, ɩ man lɩɩ mu alibi sʋ abɛɛ mʋ akʋʋgɛpʋ alibi sʋ. Amaa ɩ waa kanɩn nɩn kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ yɛgɛ asa ba wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa sa mʋ.
43009004	Kyɔwɛ maa dan san ɔ bʋ tɔ falɛ bɩrɛ, ɩ dagaa a maa waa ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mu kusun. Kyɔwɛ ii biti ɔ lʋwɛ yɛgɛ ɔkʋ mɛɛ bɩla taalɛ sun kusun.
43009005	N maa dan san n bʋ dulinyaa tɔ falɛ bɩrɛ, mɛ ɩ gyɛ dulinyaa tɔ ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ.”
43009006	Yesu maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tʋʋ nkyɔlɛ tʋʋ kasɛ nɩɩ ɔ palɛ ɩsɛ, taa tayɩ ɔnyɩn mu ansi sʋ.
43009007	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ yɛ, “Kpe Silom kapatɩyɛ mʋ tɔ naa fwɩɩ fu ansi.” (Silom kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ ba sun mʋ). Ɔnyɩn mʋ maa naa fwɩɩ mu ansi bwii ba mʋ, mu ansi mʋ a bugi.
43009008	Mʋ bɩrɩsa ana yɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba wʋla be nyi mʋ maa kyɩna ɔkpa asɛ ɛɛ kʋlɛ mʋ, bɛɛ taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Man gyɛ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ ɩɩ kyɩna ɔkpa asɛ ɛɛ kʋlɛ mʋ?”
43009009	Nɩɩ bamʋ akʋ ba yɛ, “Mʋ nɩn.” Nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba yɛ, “Man gyɛ mʋ nɩn, o duli mʋ nɩn.” Amaa ɔnyɩn mʋ gbaa‐gbaa tɔwɛ yɛ, “Mɛ nɩn.”
43009010	Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɩ waa nɛnɛ nɩɩ fu ansi i bugi?”
43009011	Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Yesu mʋ, ɩ palɛ ɩsɛ tayɩ mi ansi sʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ n kpee Silom kapatɩyɛ mʋ tɔ naa fwɩɩ mi ansi. Ɩmʋ sʋ n kpee tʋtɔ naa fwɩɩ mi ansi, nɩɩ opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ mi ansi i bugi.”
43009012	Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn mʋ bʋ fɩnɛ?” Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N man nyi.”
43009013	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba taa ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ mu ansi i bugi mʋ kpee Farasii abi mu ansi tɔ.
43009014	Kanɩn kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu palɛ ɩsɛ tayɩ kanɩn ɔnyɩn ansi sʋ mʋ, gyɛ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa nɩn.
43009015	Nɩɩ Farasii abi mʋ mɔɔ ba taasɛ mʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa nɩɩ mu ansi i bugi. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɔ palɛ ɩsɛ nɩn tayɩ mi ansi sʋ, nɩɩ n naa fwɩɩ, nɩɩ mi ansi i bugi.”
43009016	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Farasii abi mʋ akʋ ba yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa kanɩn asɩn maŋa mʋ, man lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ o mee buu kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa nbara mʋ.” Amaa akʋ mɔɔ ba yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ alibi ɔwaapʋ ɩ taalɛ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa falɛ kudubi?” Nɩɩ nbarɩgɛ ɩ ba bamʋ nsana.
43009017	Ɩnɩmʋ kpini kamaa mʋ, Farasii abi mʋ ba bwii taasɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ o bugi fu ansi mʋ, mɩnɛ asɩn nɩɩ fʋ sʋ fʋ tɔwɛ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ?” Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ nɩn.”
43009018	Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ be mee biti ba kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ ɔ wʋla ɔ gyɛ gyaatanapʋ, nɩɩ mu ansi i bugi, ɩmʋ sʋ ba sun tɩɩ mʋ akʋʋgɛpʋ.
43009019	Ba maa ba mʋ, ba taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ‐bii‐nyɩnsa ndee? Fan yɛ fan kʋʋgɛ mʋ gyaatanapʋ nɩn, nɛnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ?”
43009020	Nɩɩ mʋ akʋʋgɛpʋ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “An nyi maa gyɛ anɛ‐bii‐nyɩnsa nɩn, nɩɩ an kʋʋgɛ mʋ gyaatanapʋ nɩn.
43009021	Amaa a man nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa nɩɩ mu ansi ɩ kɩɩ, abɛɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o bugi mu ansi. Ɔ man bɩla ɔ gyɛ kebii, ɩmʋ sʋ fan taasɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa, ɛɛ taalɛ lɛɛ kɔnɔ.”
43009022	Kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ kanɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ ba sɩlɛ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ. Kpalɩ fɛɛ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ ba wʋla tɔwɛ yɩla yɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ Yesu ɩ gyɛ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ mʋ, bɛɛ gya mʋ ba lɛɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa obu mʋ tɔ.
43009023	Kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ mʋ akʋʋgɛpʋ mʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔ man bɩla ɔ gyɛ kebii, fan taasɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mu.”
43009024	Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ ba bwii tɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ naafɔɔ ɔ gyɛ gyaatanapʋ mʋ kɩnyɔsapʋ, nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Bɔ Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ kesintin nɩɩ fɩɩ tɔwɛ. An nyi fɛɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ o bugi fu ansi mʋ gyɛ alibi ɔwaapʋ nɩn.”
43009025	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɛɛ mɛ man nyi yɛ ɔ gyɛ alibi ɔwaapʋ abɛɛ ɔ man gyɛ. Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n nyi mʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, n kyɩna n gyɛ gyaatanapʋ, amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ n kɩɩ.”
43009026	Nɩɩ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ ba bɩla taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ ɔ waa fʋ? Nɛnɛ nɩɩ ɔ waa kyɛ fu ansi?”
43009027	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ ba, nɩɩ fan kina kunu. Mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan bwii nu kɩnyɔsapʋ? Abɛɛ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fen biti fɛɛ fan biliŋi mʋ abɩɩlapʋ nɩn?”
43009028	Nɩɩ ba saalɛ mʋ, tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ mu obuupu, amaa anɛɛnɛ bɩrɛ an gyɛ Mosesi abuupu nɩn.
43009029	An nyi ɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ maa kyɩna tɔwɛ Mosesi asɛ, amaa kanɩn Yesu maŋa bɩrɛ, a man nyi mʋ ɔlɩɩkpa!”
43009030	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ alɩmankarɛ nɩɩ fɛn tɔwɛ kanɩn! Fan yɛ fan man nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ, amaa mʋ i bugi mi ansi falɛ.
43009031	An nyi yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mee nu alibi awaapʋ asɛ. Amaa asa mʋ nɩɩ bee sun Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa mʋ kɔkɔlɔ biti mʋ, bamʋ asɛ nɩɩ ee nu.
43009032	Lɩɩ koo saŋa mʋ nɩɩ dulinyaa piili mʋ, a man pɩɩta nu fɛɛ ɔsa kʋ bugi nyɩmɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ gyaatanapʋ ansi.
43009033	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ man dɩn lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ, naafɔɔ ɔ man dɩn taalɛ waa ɩnɩmʋ.”
43009034	Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Kɩɩ, fʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ fʋ alibi tɔ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ fʋ ii biti fʋ ba kaapʋ anɛ asɩn?” Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba gya mʋ lɛɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa obu mʋ tɔ.
43009035	Yesu maa nu yɛ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ ba gya ɔnyɩn mʋ lɛɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa obu mʋ tɔ kanɩn mʋ, ɔ naa wu mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fɩɩ kɔɔlɛ Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ fii gyii.”
43009036	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ anɩmʋ? Tɔwɛ mɛ kɛ n kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.”
43009037	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ tɛɛ wʋla wu mʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ fʋ asɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ falɛ.”
43009038	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Mɛ‐nyɩrɩpɛ, n kɔɔlɛ fu gyii.” Nɩɩ ɔ kyʋn muŋa Yesu ayaa tɔ.
43009039	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “N ba dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ kɛ n ba gyii asa asɩn, kɛ agyaatanapʋ ansi i bugi, kɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kɩɩ mʋ, mɔɔ ba biliŋi agyaatanapʋ.”
43009040	Farasii abi mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ, nɩɩ ba nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ, ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ anɛ gbaa anɛ an gyɛ agyaatanapʋ nɩn abɛɛ?”
43009041	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan kan fan gyɛ agyaatanapʋ bɩrɛ, naafɔɔ fan mɛɛ yɛ fan gyii alibi kʋpwɛ. Amaa fan maa tɔwɛ yɛ fan kɩɩ falɛ bɩrɛ, fan gyii alibi kʋpwɛ.”
43010001	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ, ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ bɔla nbʋlʋpʋ kubunlun kebunɔ mʋ tɔ ee loo, nɩɩ ɔ naa bɔla opula pʋpwɛ loo to mʋ, gyɛ oyu yɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee yuuri ɔlʋn sʋ.
43010002	Amaa ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ bɔla kebunɔ ee loo mʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ ɔkpapʋ.
43010003	Nɩɩ ɔkpapʋ mʋ kan ba mʋ, kebunɔ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ ii tigi sa mʋ, nɩɩ ee loo to. Ɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ maa mʋ kɩtɩɩ, nɩɩ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ be nyi mʋ ɔbʋlɛ, nɩɩ ɛɛ lɩɩ gyankpaa bamʋ.
43010004	Ɔkpapʋ mʋ maa tɛɛ lɛɛ bamʋ kpini lɩɩ kubunlun mʋ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɛɛ kyʋn gyankpaa bamʋ yɛgɛ bee buu mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ be nyi mʋ ɔbʋlɛ.
43010005	Amaa ba mɛɛ yɛ ba buu ɔfɔ, bee biti ba sɩlɛ yɛgɛ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba man nyi mʋ ɔbʋlɛ.”
43010006	Yesu bɔ bamʋ kɩŋasan kɩnɩmʋ nɩn, amaa ba man nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ bamʋ mʋ kasɛ.
43010007	Ɩmʋ sʋ Yesu bwii tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ mɛ ɩ gyɛ nbʋlʋpʋ kubunlun kebunɔ mʋ.
43010008	Bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyankpaa mɛ ba mʋ kpini, nɩɩ ba waa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ nbʋlʋpʋ akpapʋ mʋ, ba gyɛ ayu yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee yuuri ɔlʋn sʋ, kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ ba man nu bamʋ asɛ mʋ.
43010009	Mɛ ɩ gyɛ kebunɔ mʋ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɔla mɛ sʋ loo mʋ, ii biti ɔ nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ. Mʋ kɩlɩɩ kpee yɛ mʋ kibwii ba mʋ ɛɛ nyɛ agyitɔ o gyii.
43010010	Oyu bɩrɛ, mʋ lɛɛ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ o be yuuri, kɛ ɔ mɔɔ, kɛ o nyita. Amaa mɛɛ mɛ n ba nɩn kɛ asa ba nyɛ nkpa, kɛ ba nyɛ ɩmʋ kʋkyɔ‐kʋkyɔ.
43010011	“Mɛ ɩ gyɛ nbʋlʋpʋ ɔkpapʋ danbɩrasa mʋ. Mɛ, nbʋlʋpʋ ɔkpapʋ danbɩrasa mʋ n taa mɛ nkpa sa nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ halɩɩ lewu tɔ.
43010012	Paa ogyipu bɩrɛ, ɔ man du fɛɛ nbʋlʋpʋ ɔkpapʋ danbɩrasa mʋ. Nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ ba maa man gyɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ lɛɛ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kan wu fɛɛ kuntun ɩɩ ba mʋ, ɛɛ sɩlɛ yɛgɛ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ nɩn, kɛ kuntun mʋ ɔ ba kɩtaa bamʋ ɔkʋ kɛ ɔ yaasɛ asansa.
43010013	Kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ sɩlɛ ɛɛ yɛgɛ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, ɔ gyɛ paa ogyipu nɩn, bamʋ asɩn ɩ man tiri mʋ.
43010014	“Mɛ ɩ gyɛ nbʋlʋpʋ ɔkpapʋ danbɩrasa mʋ. N nyi mɛ nbʋlʋpʋ, nɩɩ mɛ nbʋlʋpʋ gbaa be nyi mɛ.
43010015	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ mu nyi mɛ, nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n nyi Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n biti n taa mɛ nkpa sa mɛ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ halɩɩ lewu tɔ.
43010016	N san n sʋ nbʋlʋpʋ akʋ nɩɩ mʋ ba man bʋ nbʋlʋpʋ anɩmʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ ii tiri fɛɛ n naa taa bamʋ gbaa ba. Bee biti ba be nu mɛ ɔbʋlɛ, kɛ bamʋ kpini ba ba waa kʋbʋ kʋlʋn yɛ ɔkpapʋ kʋlʋn.
43010017	Kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ ii biti mɛ asɩn ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, n kyula yɛ n taa mɛ nkpa sa halɩɩ lewu tɔ, kɛ n bɩla bwii nyɛ kɩmʋ.
43010018	Ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ kɔɔlɛ mɛ nkpa lɩɩ mɛ abaa tɔ. Amaa mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mi kebiti tɔ nɩɩ n kyula yɛ n wu. N sʋ ɔkpa fɛɛ n taa mɛ nkpa sa halɩɩ lewu tɔ, kɛ n bɩla bwii nyɛ kɩmʋ. Falɛ kɔnɔsa kanɩmʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ sa mɛ yɛ n waa.”
43010019	Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ falɛ sʋ mʋ, nbarɩgɛ ɩ bɩla bwii ba Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ tɔ.
43010020	Asa mʋ tɔ gaalaagaa bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nbwɩɩ libi ba bʋ mʋ tɔ, ɛɛ lɔ ɩbʋn. Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fen nu mʋ asɛ?”
43010021	Amaa bamʋ akʋ mɔɔ ba yɛ, “Ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba bʋ mʋ tɔ mʋ, mɛɛ tɔwɛ falɛ ntɔwɛ nɩmʋ. Nɛnɛ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ɩ taalɛ bugi gyaatanapʋ ansi?”
43010022	Nɩɩ saŋa fʋʋ fɛɛ Gyiwu abi ba gyii Kesu kɔnɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ nyiŋi saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba bugi Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ Gyerusalem kadɛ tɔ mʋ. Saŋa maŋa ɩ gyɛ awɔɔ tɔ nɩn,
43010023	nɩɩ Yesu bʋ Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ, yɛgɛ ɔ naa katɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Owura Solomon kasɔrɔga mʋ tɔ.
43010024	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ ba yɩlɛ kyaabɔɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Saŋa mɔɔ nɩɩ fii biti fɛɛ a gyoo naa fʋʋ, pɔyɩ kɛ a wu asɩn mʋ tɔ kyɛɛkyɛɛ? Nɩɩ fʋ ɩ kan fʋ gyɛ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ, dan tiisi tɔwɛ anɛ kesintin.”
43010025	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ, amaa fan man kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii. Asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ n waa Mɛ‐Sɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ mʋ, ɩmʋ ii gyii mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kesintin.
43010026	Amaa fan man kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan maa man gyɛ mɛ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ sʋ.
43010027	Mɛ nbʋlʋpʋ bee nyi mɛ ɔbʋlɛ, nɩɩ n nyi bamʋ, nɩɩ bee buu mɛ.
43010028	N sa bamʋ nkpa kakpaa, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ yɛ ba fɔyɩ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ bɩɩtɛ bamʋ kɔɔlɛ lɩɩ mɛ abaa tɔ.
43010029	Mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa bamʋ sa mɛ mʋ, kyɔ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ bɩɩtɛ bamʋ kɔɔlɛ lɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ abaa tɔ.
43010030	N maa Mɛ‐Sɛ an gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn nɩn.”
43010031	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi ba bɩla naa taa abuu kɛ ba tʋʋ mʋ.
43010032	Amaa nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N waa asɩn kyinkyinsa damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ asɛ kaapʋ fanɛ. Ɩmʋ ɩmɔɔ sʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan tʋʋ mɛ abuu?”
43010033	Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi mʋ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Man gyɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ waa sʋ nɩɩ an biti a tʋʋ fʋ abuu. Amaa fʋ tɔwɛ nbusaa asɩn yii Ɩbwaarɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ gyɛ nyɩmɩsa nɩn, nɩɩ fɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ fʋ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ.”
43010034	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan man nyi ba maa kyʋrɔɔ waa fanɛ Nbara mʋ tɔ yɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ, ‘Fan gyɛ mɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ mɛ kedubi’?
43010035	An nyi fɛɛ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ kyɛɛgɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ. Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla tɔwɛ bamʋ nɩɩ mʋ asɩn ɩ ba bamʋ asɛ mʋ yɛ ba gyɛ mu keduli mʋ, mɛɛ mɛ bɩrɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ lɛɛ mɛ nɩɩ o sun mɛ ba dulinyaa tɔ.
43010036	Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɛn yɛ n tɔwɛ nbusaa asɩn yii Ɩbwaarɛ, fɛɛ maa tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘N gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ’?
43010037	Nɩɩ n mɛɛ kan n waa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ ii biti fɛɛ n waa mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ fan man kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii.
43010038	Amaa nɩɩ n kan waa ɩmʋ bɩrɛ, nɩɩ halɩɩ fan man kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii gbaa mʋ, fan kɔɔlɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ n waa mʋ kpini gyii, kɛ fan nyɛ bɩɩ fɛɛ n maa Mɛ‐Sɛ an gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn.”
43010039	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ asa mʋ ba biti fɛɛ ba kɩtaa mʋ, amaa ɔ bʋlɛ bamʋ tɔ lɩɩ kyʋn.
43010040	Nɩɩ Yesu bwii naa faa Gyɔdan ɔbʋn kpee kɩmʋ benben, opula mʋ nɩɩ Gyɔn kyɩna gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee mʋ. Ɔ maa bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ,
43010041	nɩɩ asa damantɛ ba ba mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Halɩɩ Gyɔn maa man waa asɩn kyinkyinsa ɩkʋ gbaa mʋ, kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ lɩɩ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, kpini gyɛ kesintin.”
43010042	Nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ gaalaagaa ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.
43011001	Ɔnyɩn kʋ ɩ kyɩna ɔ bʋ tɔ, nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Lasarusi, nɩɩ ɔ dɛ ɛɛ lɔɔ. Mʋ pɩɩkyɩɩ ana ɩ gyɛ Mɛɛrɩ yɛ Mata, nɩɩ bamʋ kpini ba lɩɩ Betani kadɛ tɔ.
43011002	Mɛɛrɩ nɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔkyɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɩna ɔ ba kyɛɛgɛ tulale wʋrɩgɛ Yesu ayaa sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ inyini bʋnswɩɩsa mʋ kpayɩ‐kpayɩ ɩmʋ mʋ. Mʋ pɩɩnyɩn ɩ gyɛ Lasarusi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ dɛ ɛɛ lɔ mʋ.
43011003	Nɩɩ mʋ pɩɩkyɩɩ ana ba sun Yesu asɛ naa tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, fʋ kyɛmɩnɛ danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ kebiti sa mʋ mʋ, dɛ ɛɛ lɔ.”
43011004	Yesu maa nu ɩnɩmʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kʋlɔ kɩnɩmʋ man gyɛ lewu kʋlɔ. Ii biti ɩ bɩya Ɩbwaarɛ bʋnyaa nɩn, kɛ mɛ, Mu‐Bii mʋ n nyɛ bʋnyaa lɩɩ ɩmʋ sʋ.”
43011005	Yesu sʋ kebiti sa Mata maa Mɛɛrɩ yɛ bamʋ pɩɩnyɩn Lasarusi.
43011006	Amaa maa nu fɛɛ Lasarusi ɩɩ lɔ mʋ, o bwii kyɩna katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ mʋ nkɛ nnyɔ tii sʋ.
43011007	Ɩmʋ kamaa mʋ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ a bwii kpee Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ.”
43011008	Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ. “Ɔkaapʋpʋ, nkɛ nnyɔ nɩmʋ tɔ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi bee biti ba tʋʋ fʋ abuu mɔɔ, mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ bɩla fii kpee tʋtɔ?”
43011009	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Man gyɛ kerefi kudu anyɔ ɩ bʋ kayɩkɛ tɔ? Nyɩmɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ naa kayɩkɛ tɔ mʋ mee siti, lɩɩ fɛɛ kyɔwɛ kɩɩ tɔ ɛɛ sa mʋ katɩn kʋmaa.
43011010	Amaa nɩɩ ɔ natɛ kagyanbwɛ bɩrɛ ee siti, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ man sʋ ɩŋmaŋɛsa.”
43011011	Maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Anɛ kyɛmɩnɛ Lasarusi dɛ nsɩɩrɛ nɩn, amaa n biti n kpee tʋtɔ n naa kyiŋi mʋ.”
43011012	Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, nɩɩ ɔ kan dɛ nsɩɩrɛ bɩrɛ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ alanfɩya.”
43011013	Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu ɩɩ kaapʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ Lasarusi wu, amaa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ bɩrɛ be nyi nɩn fɛɛ nsɩɩrɛ gbaa‐gbaa asɩn nɩɩ ɔ dɩyɛ.
43011014	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ tɔwɛ tigi bamʋ yɛ, “Lasarusi wu.
43011015	Amaa lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ mʋ, mi ansi i gyii fɛɛ n maa man bʋ tʋtɔ nɩɩ o wu. Ɩnɩmʋ ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ kɛ fan nyɛ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii. Kanɩn sʋ fan yɛgɛ a kpee mʋ asɛ.”
43011016	Nɩɩ Tomasi mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ Kabwaara‐bii mʋ, tɔwɛ abɩɩlapʋ asansa mʋ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ anɛ gbaa anɛ a kpee kɛ anaa mʋ a naa wu.”
43011017	Yesu maa fʋʋ Betani kadɛ tɔ mʋ, o nu yɛ ba tee pula Lasarusi ɩmʋ nkɛ nna.
43011018	Lɩɩ Betani kpee Gyerusalem man bʋ kata, ɩ waa fɛɛ ɩmaalɩ ɩnyɔ,
43011019	nɩɩ Gyiwu abi mʋ gaalaagaa ba ba Mata maa Mɛɛrɩ asɛ, ba ba tɔwɛ yuula bamʋ nkɔlɔ lɩɩ bamʋ pɩɩnyɩn kelewu sʋ.
43011020	Mata maa nu fɛɛ Yesu ɩɩ ba mʋ, ɔ lɩɩ naa gyaŋa mʋ ɔkpa tɔ, amaa Mɛɛrɩ bɩrɛ o sii kɩkpaara sʋ.
43011021	Mata maa gyaŋa mʋ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, fʋ daa fʋ bʋ nfɩɩ nɩn, naafɔɔ mɛ pɩɩnyɩn man dɩn wu.
43011022	Amaa halɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ gbaa n nyi yɛ, kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ taasɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, ee biti ɔ waa sa fʋ.”
43011023	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ pɩɩnyɩn ii biti o bwii kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ.”
43011024	Mata lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N nyi yɛ ee biti o kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ kakɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti o kyiŋi asa ba nkpa tɔ mʋ.”
43011025	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ n kyiŋi asa n lɩɩ lewu tɔ, nɩɩ ɛɛ sa bamʋ nkpa mʋ. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ, halɩɩ o wu gbaa ee biti ɔ nyɛ nkpa.
43011026	Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ nkpa tɔ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ yɛ o wu kakɛ akʋ. Fʋ kɔɔlɛ ɩnɩmʋ gyii?”
43011027	Nɩɩ Mata kyula yɛ, “Ɛɛhn! Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ n kɔɔlɛ gyii yɛ fʋ ɩ gyɛ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ ee biti o sun mʋ ba dulinyaa tɔ mʋ.”
43011028	Maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, o bwii kpee kɩkpaara sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ naa tɩɩ mu‐supu Mɛɛrɩ lɩɩ ɩkaa sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkaapʋpʋ mʋ bʋ nfɩɩ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ fʋ sʋ.”
43011029	Mɛɛrɩ maa nu kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ bilen ee kpee mʋ asɛ.
43011030	Yesu man pɩɩta loo kadɛ mʋ tɔ, amaa ɔ san ɔ bʋ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ Mata naa gyaŋa mʋ mʋ.
43011031	Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Mɛɛrɩ asɛ kɩkpaara sʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ bee yuula mʋ kɔkɔlɔ mʋ, ba maa wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ bilen lɩɩ kewu mʋ, ba lɩɩ buu mʋ, be nyi fɛɛ ee kpee kakyan mʋ asɛ ɔ naa kyɩna saawʋ.
43011032	Mɛɛrɩ maa fʋʋ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ Yesu bʋ, nɩɩ o wu mʋ mʋ, o muŋa mʋ ayaa tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ fʋ daa fʋ bʋ nfɩɩ nɩn, naafɔɔ mɛ pɩɩnyɩn man dɩn wu.”
43011033	Yesu maa wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ yɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ ba buu mʋ mʋ bee su mʋ, ɩ kɔ mʋ nɩɩ i duŋi mʋ ɔbʋlɛ tɔ.
43011034	Nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ fan pula mʋ?” Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, ba kɩɩ.”
43011035	Nɩɩ Yesu su.
43011036	Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi mʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan kɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa mʋ.”
43011037	Amaa bamʋ tɔ akʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Man gyɛ Yesu nɩmʋ i bugi agyaatanapʋ ansi mʋ? Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ ɔ man taalɛ kɔɔlɛ Lasarusi kɛ ɔ man wu?”
43011038	Yesu ɔbʋlɛ tɔ bwii duŋi mʋ, nɩɩ o kpee kakyan mʋ asɛ. Kɩ gyɛ kɩfʋlɛbɔ nɩn, nɩɩ ba taa kubuu tii kɩmʋ kɔnɔ.
43011039	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan tigi kubuu mʋ lɩɩ tʋtɔ.” Nɩɩ Mata, olewupu mʋ pɩɩkyɩɩ mʋ tɔwɛ yɛ “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, ee biti ɔ ba ɛɛ lɩɩsɔn, ndaga nkɛ nna nɩmʋ a maa pula mʋ.”
43011040	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ Mata yɛ, “N man tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ nɩɩ fʋ kan kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ, fii biti fu wu Ɩbwaarɛ bʋnyaa?”
43011041	Ɩmʋ sʋ ba tigi kubuu mʋ. Nɩɩ Yesu kɩɩ sʋsʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nsɛ, n fwaala fʋ fɛɛ fʋ maa nu mɛ kɩkʋlɛ.
43011042	N nyi saŋa kʋmaa fii nu mɛ kɩkʋlɛ, amaa asa mʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ nfɩɩ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ kanɩn, kɛ ba nyɛ kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ fu i sun mɛ.”
43011043	Maa tɔwɛ kanɩn lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ o kuusi kenken yɛ, “Lasarusi, lɩɩ ba!”
43011044	Nɩɩ olewupu mʋ lɩɩ ba, yɛgɛ taafuli mili mʋ abaa yɛ ayaa sʋ, yɛgɛ kikyibi fufuli ŋmina mu ansi sʋ. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan saŋɛ mʋ kɛ ɔ natɛ.”
43011045	Gyiwu abi adamantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba ba Mɛɛrɩ afwaala, nɩɩ ba wu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu waa mʋ, ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.
43011046	Amaa bamʋ akʋ ba kpee Farasii abi asɛ naa tɔwɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu waa.
43011047	Ɩmʋ sʋ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ Farasii abi ba tɩɩ kadɛ mʋ tɔ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa amu‐amu ngyaŋɛ. Nɩɩ ba taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ an biti a waa. Fan kɩɩ asɩnkaala yɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ ɩɩ waa falɛ.”
43011048	An kan yɛgɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kyaga sʋ ɛɛ waa kanɩn mʋ, ɔsa kʋmaa nɩmʋ ii biti ɔ kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii, kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ Roma abi ba ba nyita anɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ nɩmʋ kɛ ba mɔɔ anɛ asa.
43011049	Nɩɩ bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Kayifasi nɩɩ ɔ kyɩna ɔ gyɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ kesu maŋa tɔ mʋ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan man nyi sɛhn!
43011050	Fan man nyi yɛ, ɩ bɔ sa fanɛ fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa kʋlʋn o wu sa asa kpini, ɩ kyɔ fɛɛ anɛ asa kpini ba maa muuri?”
43011051	Kesintin tɔ man gyɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mu kebiti tɔ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ. Amaa maa gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ kanɩn kesu maŋa tɔ sʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɩla yɛ Yesu ii biti o wu sa Gyiwu abi kpini.
43011052	Nɩɩ man gyɛ Gyiwu abi nkʋn, amaa yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii ana mʋ nɩɩ ba yaasɛ tɔ ba bʋ dulinyaa tɔ katɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ mʋ, kɛ ba ba bʋga waa kʋkʋlʋn.
43011053	Ɩmʋ sʋ lɩɩ kanɩn kakɛ maŋa Gyiwu abɩlɩsa ba ŋmina yɛ ba mɔɔ Yesu.
