43011054	Lɩɩ kanɩn sʋ Yesu man bɩla lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ ifuli ɛɛ natɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ tɔ. Amaa ɔ lɩɩ Gyerusalem kpee bɛɛ tɩɩ kɩmʋ yɛ Efarim kadɛ mʋ, nɩɩ kɩ bʋ tiri kiperi sʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba naa kyɩna tʋtɔ.
43011055	Gyiwu abi Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kensi‐gyii saŋa maa tiri tɔ mʋ, asa gaalaagaa ba lɩɩ bamʋ ndɛ sʋ kpee Gyerusalem. Ba gyankpaa nɩn ba naa fwɩɩ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ ineesi fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba wʋla bɛɛ waa, pɔyɩ kɛ bamʋ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kakɛ mʋ kɩ fʋʋ.
43011056	Asa mʋ bɛɛ kɩɩ bee biti Yesu. Nɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ asɛ mʋ, bɛɛ taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ gyɛ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ? Fen nyi fɛɛ ee biti ɔ ba Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ ngyaŋɛ nɩmʋ tɔ?”
43011057	Ɩmʋ gbaa mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu yɛ Farasii abi mʋ ba wʋla sa kɔnɔ yɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o wu katɩn mʋ nɩɩ Yesu bʋ mʋ, ɔ ba tɔwɛ bamʋ kɛ ba nyɛ kɩtaa mʋ.
43012001	Ɩ maa san fɛɛ nkɛ nsiye kɛ ba gyii Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ lala mʋ, Yesu kpee Betani kadɛ tɔ. Tʋtɔ ɩ gyɛ Lasarusi mʋ nɩɩ Yesu daa kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ ayɛ.
43012002	Nɩɩ ba waa agyitɔ kɩtaa Yesu kɩfɔ. Mata ɩ waa agyitɔ maŋa, Lasarusi gbaa tii asa mʋ nɩɩ ba maa Yesu bee gyii mʋ sʋ.
43012003	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ taa tuulaale liifensa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ sʋ ɔgyalɩn pʋrʋntʋwa bɔla ba, nɩɩ nadi nɩɩ ba taa waa ɩmʋ. Mɛɛrɩ taa ba kyɛɛgɛ wʋrɩgɛ Yesu ayaa sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ inyini bʋnswɩɩsa kpayɩ‐kpayɩ ɩmʋ. Nɩɩ tuulaale maŋa ofen kɔɔlɛ kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ kpini femm.
43012004	Amaa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gyudasi Isikariyoti bʋ tʋtɔ. Mʋ ɩɩ ba ɔ ba lɛɛ Yesu sa mʋ. Maa wu Mɛɛrɩ maa waa kanɩn mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ,
43012005	“Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ ba man taa tuulaale nɩmʋ fɛ, kɛ ba nyɛ afulee fɛɛ dinari asa, abɛɛ ɩbwaayɩ kudu kusun osunpu kʋkɔka, kɛ ba taa afulee mʋ kɛɛ atiripu?”
43012006	Man gyɛ atiripu mʋ asɩn i tiri mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ kanɩn, amaa ɔ gyɛ oyu nɩn. Nɩɩ mʋ ɩɩ kɩtaa bamʋ afulee ɔwaakpa mʋ, yɛgɛ ee yuuri afulee mʋ ɩkʋ ee gyii.
43012007	Amaa Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan yɛgɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ! Ɔ waa ɩmʋ yɩla mi kepula akɛ nɩn.
43012008	Saŋa kʋmaa fanaa atiripu anɩmʋ ii biti fan baa fan bʋ tɔ, amaa mɛɛ yɛ n baa n bʋ fanɛ asɛ saŋa kʋmaa.”
43012009	Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi adamantɛ ba maa nu fɛɛ Yesu bʋ Betani kadɛ tɔ mʋ, ba kpee mʋ asɛ tʋtɔ. Man gyɛ Yesu nkʋn sʋ nɩɩ ba kpee tʋtɔ, amaa ba kpee ba naa kɩɩ Lasarusi mʋ nɩɩ Yesu kyiŋi mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ gbaa.
43012010	Ɩmʋ sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa ba ŋmina ba mɔɔ Lasarusi gbaa,
43012011	lɩɩ fɛɛ taa lɩɩ Lasarusi kelewu kyiŋi mʋ sʋ mʋ, Gyiwu abi mʋ gaalaagaa bee kina bamʋ abɩlɩsa mʋ, nɩɩ bee kpee bɛɛ kɔɔlɛ Yesu bee gyii.
43012012	Ɩmʋ lɩɩkaakɛ mʋ, kʋbʋ damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba ba bamʋ Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kensi‐gyii mʋ tɔ mʋ, ba nu fɛɛ Yesu kɩtaa ɔkpa ɛɛ ba Gyerusalem.
43012013	Ɩmʋ sʋ ba taa abɩlafɛ lɩɩ kyʋn, kɛ ba naa gyaŋa mʋ, yɛgɛ bɛɛ yɩn mʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Hosana! Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ naa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ ɛɛ ba! Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa Ɩsɩrayɩ Owura!”
43012014	Nɩɩ Yesu wu kuruma kadanba kʋ nɩɩ o dii mʋ. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ ba tɔ kesintin. Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ,
43012015	“O Siyon abi, fan man waa kufuu, fan kɩɩ, fanɛ owura ɩɩ ba, ɔ tɛ kuruma kadanba sʋ ɛɛ ba.”
43012016	Kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ, mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ba man nu ɩnɩmʋ kpini kasɛ. Amɔɔ kamaa tɔ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa mʋ bʋnyaa mʋ, pɔyɩ nɩɩ ba lan nyiŋi fɛɛ ba kyʋrɔɔ asɩn nɩmʋ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɩ ba tɔ kesintin.
43012017	Nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Yesu asɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ Lasarusi lɩɩ kakyan tɔ, nɩɩ o kyiŋi mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ, ɩɩ kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ asɩn nɩmʋ katɩn kʋmaa.
43012018	Kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ asa damantɛ ba lɩɩ ba naa gyaŋa Yesu, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba maa nu asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ sʋ.
43012019	Ɩmʋ sʋ Farasii abi ba tɔwɛ abaa yɛ, “Fan man wu, a mɛɛ bɩla taalɛ waa sɛhn. Fan kɩɩ, dulinyaa tɔ asa kpini ba biliŋi kpee ba buu mʋ.”
43012020	Nɩɩ Giriki abi mʋ akʋ gbaa ba tii bamʋ nɩɩ ba kpee Gyerusalem mʋ sʋ. Ba naa sun Ɩbwaarɛ Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kensi‐gyii mʋ tɔ.
43012021	Kanɩn asa maŋa ba ba Filipu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Betisayida kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Galile ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ asɛ, ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔbɩlɩsa, an biti fɛɛ a wu Yesu.”
43012022	Nɩɩ Filipu naa tɔwɛ Andiruwu, nɩɩ bamʋ anyɔ ba kpee naa tɔwɛ Yesu.
43012023	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ, saŋa mʋ fʋʋ fɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa bʋnyaa lala mʋ ɩ lɛɛ ifuli.
43012024	N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin, kuyu kibi, nɩɩ kɩ man kan tɩyɛ ɩsɛ tɔ gyɔɔ mʋ, kɩ san kɩ gyɛ kuyubi kʋlʋn. Amaa nɩɩ kɩ kan tɩyɛ ɩsɛ tɔ gyɔɔ, nɩɩ kɩ kɔyɩ bɩrɛ, kɩɩ sɔyɩ abi damantɛ.
43012025	Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa mʋ nkpa gaa mʋ, ee biti ɔ pan kɩmʋ. Amaa ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ taa mʋ nkpa ɛɛ tɩɩ sɛhn dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, ee biti ɔ lɔŋɔ mʋ n‐yɩɩ yɩla sa nkpa kakpaa.
43012026	Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee sun mɛ mʋ, dagaa maa buu mɛ. Nɩɩ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ mʋ, tʋtɔ nɩɩ mi osunpu mʋ gbaa ii biti ɔ baa ɔ bʋ. Nɩɩ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ee sun mɛ mʋ, Mɛ‐Sɛ ii biti ɔ sa mʋ bɛɛrɛɛ.”
43012027	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ, mɛ kɔkɔlɔ man dɛ mɛ. N bɩɩ kʋlɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ kɛ n tɔwɛ yɛ, Nsɛ, mɔlɩgɛ mɛ lɩɩ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩɩ ba mɛ sʋ falɛ abɛɛ? Ayee, falɛ awʋrʋfɔ anɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n ba.
43012028	Nsɛ, bʋnyaa fʋ kɩtɩɩ!” Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔbʋlɛ kʋ lɩɩ sʋsʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “N wʋla bʋnyaa kɩmʋ nɩɩ n biti n bwii bʋnyaa kɩmʋ.”
43012029	Sakyɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ ba maa nu ɔbʋlɛ mʋ, ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Bʋlayɩ pʋntɛ!” Nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ ɩ tɔwɛ mʋ asɛ!”
43012030	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩ man gyɛ mɛ sʋ nɩɩ ɔbʋlɛ nɩmʋ tɔwɛ, amaa lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ.
43012031	Nbɩɩnbɩɩ ɩ gyɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti o gyii dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ asa asɩn. Nbɩɩnbɩɩ ɩ gyɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ kʋsaa dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ owura lɩɩ mʋ kagya sʋ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ Sɩtaanɛ mʋ.
43012032	Amaa nɩɩ ba kan kʋsaa mɛ sʋsʋ lɩɩ kasɛ sʋ bɩrɛ, n biti n bɩɩtɛ asa kpini ba mɛ asɛ.”
43012033	Ɔ tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ nɩn kaapʋ tɔ lɩɩ kelewu mʋ nɩɩ ee biti o wu.
43012034	Nɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “An nu lɩɩ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ fɛɛ, Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ, ii biti ɔ kyɩna nkpa tɔ kakpaa. Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, Ɩ dagaa ba maa kʋsaa Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ sʋsʋ? Anɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ?”
43012035	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ lɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ yɛ, “Ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ ɩ man bɩla yɛ ɩ kyɛɛrɛɛ fanɛ asɛ. Ɩmʋ sʋ fan kyaga sʋ natɛ ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ tɔ, kɛ kitentenbiri kɩ man nyɛ loo fanɛ tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ naa kitentenbiri tɔ mʋ man nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ee kpee.
43012036	Fan maa san fan sʋ ɩŋmaŋɛsa fanɛ asɛ falɛ bɩrɛ, fan kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ gyii, kɛ fan baa fan gyɛ ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ asa.” Yesu maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ kamaa tɔ mʋ, ɔ lɩɩ tʋtɔ naa baala bamʋ sʋ mʋ nkʋn.
43012037	Halɩɩ asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu waa asa ansi tɔ kpini falɛ gbaa mʋ, ba san ba mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ mʋ bee gyii.
43012038	Asɩn nɩmʋ a waa nɩn, kɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Isaya wʋla tɔwɛ mʋ, ɩ ba tɔ kesintin. Falɛ nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, anɩmʋ ɩ kɔɔlɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ an tɔwɛ mʋ gyii? Nɩɩ asa mɔɔ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ ɔlʋn mʋ kaapʋ?”
43012039	Kpalɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, ba man taalɛ kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii, lɩɩ fɛɛ Isaya bɩla tɔwɛ mʋ ɔwʋlɛ tɔ katɩn kʋ yɛ,
43012040	“Ɩbwaarɛ waa bamʋ agyaatanapʋ, kɛ bamʋ ansi ɩ man wu. Ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba waa kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn, kɛ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ ii mee nu asɩn kasɛ, kɛ ba biliŋi ba mɛ asɛ, kɛ n kyɛ bamʋ.”
43012041	Isaya gyankpaa wu Yesu bʋnyaa mʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ mʋ.
43012042	Halɩɩ ɩ maa ɩmʋ gbaa mʋ, Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ adamantɛ ba kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii. Amaa lɩɩ Farasii abi mʋ sʋ mʋ, ba man taalɛ lɛɛ bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ ifuli, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba sʋ kufuu fɛɛ bee biti ba gya bamʋ lɩɩ ɔgyaŋɛkpa mʋ tɔ.
43012043	Kpalɩ fɛɛ abɩlɩsa mʋ bee biti kɩyɩn lɩɩ nyɩmɩsa asɛ ba kyɔ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa kanɩn.
43012044	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ kenken yɛ, “Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ, man gyɛ mɛ nkʋn nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ gyii, amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ gyii.
43012045	Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o wu mɛ mʋ, o wu ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ.
43012046	Mɛ ɩ gyɛ ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ ba dulinyaa nɩmʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ, ɔ man sii kitentenbiri tɔ.
43012047	“Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o nu mɛ asɩn tɔwɛsa, nɩɩ ɔ man buu ɩmʋ mʋ, man gyɛ mɛ ii biti n bun mʋ kʋpwɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ n man ba nɩn yɛ n ba bun dulinyaa tɔ asa kʋpwɛ, amaa n ba nɩn kɛ n ba mɔlɩgɛ kɩmʋ asa.
43012048	Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o kina mɛ, nɩɩ ɔ man kɔɔlɛ mɛ asɩn mʋ, wʋla nyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti o bun mʋ kʋpwɛ. Nɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ mʋ ii biti i bun mʋ kʋpwɛ kakɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ.
43012049	Kpalɩ fɛɛ ɩ man gyɛ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ ɔlʋn tɔ nɩɩ n sʋ n tɔwɛ, amaa mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ, sa mɛ kɔnɔsa lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ɩmʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ.
43012050	Nɩɩ n nyi fɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔsa mʋ ɩɩ sa nkpa kakpaa. Ɩmʋ sʋ asɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ n tɔwɛ.”
43013001	Ɩ maa san gbɛrɛɛ kɛ ba piili Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kensi‐gyii mʋ, Yesu bɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa fʋʋ fɛɛ ɔ lɩɩ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ bwii kpee Mʋ‐sɛ asɛ. Maa sʋ kebiti sa mʋ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ sʋ mʋ, ɔ nyɛ kebiti sa bamʋ naa fʋʋ ɔkaa.
43013002	Pɔyɩ kɛ ba piili kalaatɩpwɛ sʋ agyitɔ kigyii mʋ, Sɩtaanɛ wʋla loo Simon mu‐bii, Gyudasi Isikariyoti mʋ tɔ yɛ, ɔ lɛɛ Yesu sa.
43013003	Yesu nyi Mʋ‐sɛ maa taa kʋtɔ kʋmaa waa mʋ kɩbaa tɔ, nɩɩ o nyi maa lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ nɩn, nɩɩ mʋ asɛ nɩɩ ee biti o bwii kpee.
43013004	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ kʋsʋ lɩɩ agyitɔ mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ o bugi mʋ balɩmaasʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa bɔrɩdɩba dɩla mʋ kasɩyɛ.
43013005	Nɩɩ ɔ kyɛɛgɛ nkyu waa lapɛ gyeesa tɔ, nɩɩ o piili ɛɛ fwɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ayaa sʋ, yɛgɛ ɔ sʋ bɔrɩdɩba mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa maalɛ mʋ kasɩyɛ mʋ ɛɛ kpayɩ bamʋ ayaa sʋ.
43013006	Maa waa kanɩn naa fʋʋ Simon Pita sʋ mʋ, ɔ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, fii biti fʋ fwɩɩ mɛ ayaa sʋ nɩn?”
43013007	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ ɩmʋ nɩɩ n waa falɛ fɩɩ mɛɛ yɛ fʋ nu kasɛ, amaa kamaa tɔ fii biti fʋ ba nu ɩmʋ kasɛ.”
43013008	Nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ayee, n mɛɛ yɛgɛ fʋ fwɩɩ mɛ ayaa sʋ kakaakʋ.” Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fʋ man yɛgɛ nɩɩ n fwɩɩ fʋ ayaa sʋ bɩrɛ, fʋ man bɩla fii tii mɛ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ sʋ.”
43013009	Nɩɩ Simon Pita tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Kanɩn bɩrɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, man fwɩɩ mɛ ayaa sʋ nkʋn, fwɩɩ mɛ abaa yɛ mi kumu tɔ gbaa tii sʋ.”
43013010	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tee gyee mʋ, mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ ɩ man bɩla ɩ sʋ ineesi, ɩmʋ sʋ mʋ ayaa sʋ nkʋn nɩɩ ɛɛ fwɩɩ. Fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ ɩ man sʋ ineesi kʋ, amɔɔ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋlʋn.”
43013011	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ tɛɛ wʋla o nyi ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɛɛ mʋ sa, ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “amɔɔ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋlʋn” ɩ sʋ ineesi.
43013012	Maa fwɩɩ bamʋ ayaa sʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ o bwii taa mʋ balɩmaasʋ bun, nɩɩ o bwii naa kyɩna mʋ ɔkyɩnakpa. Nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan nu ɩmʋ nɩɩ n waa sa fanɛ falɛ kasɛ?”
43013013	Fɛn tɩɩ mɛ yɛ “Ɔkaapʋpʋ” yɛ “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ” nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kesintin, lɩɩ fɛɛ kanɩn nɩɩ n gyɛ.
43013014	Nɩɩ mɛ, fanɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ yɛ fanɛ Ɔkaapʋpʋ n fwɩɩ fanɛ ayaa sʋ falɛ, ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan fwɩɩ abaa ayaa sʋ.
43013015	N waa sɩnkaala sa fanɛ, yɛ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan waa fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n waa sa fanɛ falɛ.
43013016	N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin, kɩyaafɔlɛ mɛɛ taalɛ ɔ kyɔ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ, nɩɩ kabɔɔ mɛɛ taalɛ ɔ kyɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mʋ mʋ.
43013017	Nbɩɩnbɩɩ fan maa bɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ falɛ, nɩɩ fan kan waa ɩmʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ waa fanɛ kusee.
43013018	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Man gyɛ fanɛ kpini asɩn nɩɩ n tɔwɛ falɛ. N nyi bamʋ nɩɩ n lɛɛ mʋ. Amaa asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɩ dagaa ɩ maa ba tɔ. Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ n maa mʋ an bʋga lapɛ kʋlʋn tɔ an gyii mʋ, biliŋi ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ mɛ sʋ.’
43013019	“N tɔwɛ fanɛ nɩn pɔyɩ kɛ ɩ ba waa. Nɩɩ ɩ ba mʋ, fen biti fan bɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ ɩ gyɛ ‘Ɔmʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ yɛ n gyɛ mʋ’.
43013020	N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ n sun mʋ mʋ, kɔɔlɛ mɛ gbaa mɛ nɩmʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ mʋ, kɔɔlɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ gbaa nɩmʋ.”
43013021	Yesu maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ kpini lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ nyita mʋ. Nɩɩ o bugi tɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ ii biti ɔ lɛɛ mɛ sa.”
43013022	Nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba piili bɛɛ kɩɩ abaa ansi tɔ, fɛ nfɛɛrɛ bamʋ tɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ dɛɛ.
43013023	Mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋlʋn, ɔmʋ nɩɩ Yesu sʋ kebiti sa mʋ mʋ, tɛ ɔ maa Yesu.
43013024	Nɩɩ Simon Pita ŋabɛɛ mu ansi yɛ, “Taasɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ yɛ, anɩmʋ asɩn nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ falɛ?”
43013025	Maa kpɛɛ Yesu mʋ, ɔ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, anɩmʋ nɩɩ fʋ dɛɛ?”
43013026	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N kan taa agyitɔ waa lapɛ tɔ mʋ, ɔmʋ nɩɩ n biti n taa sa mʋ mʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ kanɩn nyɩmɩsa maŋa.” Maa kpɛɛ agyitɔ mʋ waa lapɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɔ taa sa Gyudasi Isikariyoti.
43013027	Gyudasi maa dan kɔɔlɛ agyitɔ maŋa mʋ, nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ loo mʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ. Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fii biti yɛ fʋ waa mʋ, waa bilen‐bilen.”
43013028	Bamʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ ogyikpa maŋa kpini, ɔkʋ man nu asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ kasɛ.
43013029	Amaa Gyudasi maa gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩtaa bamʋ afulee sʋ mʋ, akʋ ba fɛ nfɛɛrɛ yɛ, Yesu sun mʋ yɛ ɔ naa sɔɔ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ii tiri sa Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ agyitɔ mʋ. Nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ o sun mʋ nɩn yɛ ɔ taa afulee naa sa atiripu.
43013030	Gyudasi maa dan kɔɔlɛ agyitɔ mʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ kewu kyʋn. Saŋa maŋa gyɛ kagyanbwɛ nɩn.
43013031	Gyudasi maa lɩɩ kyʋn mʋ, nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Saŋa fʋʋ fɛɛ mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa bʋnyaa ɩ lɩɩ ifuli, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa ɔ bɔla mɛ sʋ lɛɛ mʋ bʋnyaa mʋ.
43013032	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kan bɔla mɛ sʋ lɛɛ mʋ bʋnyaa mʋ ifuli mʋ, ee biti ɔ bʋnyaa mɛ, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ. Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ waa ɩmʋ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ.
43013033	“Mi‐bii ana, saŋa gbɛrɛɛ ɩ san kɛ n kyɩna fanɛ asɛ. Fen biti fan kɩɩ biti mɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ Gyiwu abi abɩlɩsa mʋ, kanɩn nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ falɛ yɛ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n biti n kpee mʋ, fan mɛɛ yɛ fan taalɛ ba tʋtɔ.
43013034	“Nbɩɩnbɩɩ n sa fanɛ kɔnɔsa pʋpwɛ yɛ, fan nyɛ kebiti sa abaa. Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n nyɛ kebiti sa fanɛ mʋ, kanɩn maŋa sʋ nɩɩ fan nyɛ kebiti sa abaa.
43013035	Nɩɩ fan kan nyɛ kebiti sa abaa mʋ, ɩmʋ ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ asa kpini ba bɩɩ yɛ fan gyɛ mɛ abɩɩlapʋ.”
43013036	Nɩɩ Simon Pita taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ fɩnɛ nɩɩ fii kpee?” Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n kpee mʋ fʋ mɛɛ yɛ fʋ taalɛ buu mɛ kpee nbɩɩnbɩɩ, amaa fii biti fu buu mɛ ba kamaa tɔ.”
43013037	Nɩɩ Pita taasɛ mʋ yɛ “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, mɩnɛ waa nɩɩ n mɛɛ taalɛ buu fʋ nbɩɩnbɩɩ. N biti n taa mɛ nkpa taga apʋ sa fʋ.”
43013038	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fii biti fu taa fʋ nkpa taga apʋ sa mɛ kesintin? N tɔwɛ fʋ kesintin yɛ, pɔyɩ kɛ kyaasɛ ɔ bʋn mʋ, fii biti fʋ kyɛɛ ɩlɩɩ ɩsa yɛ fʋ man nyi mɛ.”
43014001	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Fan man yɛgɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ ɩ ŋmaa fanɛ. Fan kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gyii kɛ fan kɔɔlɛ ngbaa mɛ gyii.
43014002	Ibu damantɛ ɩ bʋ Mɛ‐Sɛ kɩkpaara sʋ. Nɩɩ ɩ daa ɩ man gyɛ kanɩn nɩn, naafɔɔ n tɔwɛ fanɛ. N kpee n naa lɔŋɔ ɔkyɩnakpa sa fanɛ.
43014003	Nɩɩ n kan kpee naa lɔŋɔ ɔkyɩnakpa sa fanɛ mʋ, n biti n bwii ba taa fanɛ kpee mɛ asɛ, kɛ fan naa kyɩna katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɛ mʋ.
43014004	Fen nyi ɔkpa mʋ, nɩɩ fen nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n kpee mʋ.”
43014005	Nɩɩ Tomasi tɔwɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, a man nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ fii kpee. Nɩɩ nɛnɛ nɩɩ an biti a waa bɩɩ ɔkpa mʋ?”
43014006	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ ɔkpa mʋ yɛ kesintin mʋ yɛ nkpa mʋ. Ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ kpee Mɛ‐Sɛ asɛ, amɔɔ ɔ bɔla mɛ sʋ.
43014007	Nɩɩ fan kan fan nyi mɛ kesintin tɔ mʋ, naafɔɔ fan nyi Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ gbaa. Lɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ ɩɩ sʋ ii kpee mʋ, fen nyi mʋ, nɩɩ fen wu mʋ.”
43014008	Nɩɩ Filipu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, kaapʋ anɛ Fʋ‐sɛ mʋ, kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri anɛ nɩn.”
43014009	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Filipu, amɔɔ fʋ man nyi mɛ, halɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n kyɩna fanɛ asɛ kyɛɛrɛɛ falɛ? Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o wu mɛ mʋ, o wu Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ. Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fʋ bɩla fɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Kaapʋ anɛ Fʋ‐sɛ mʋ?’
43014010	Abɛɛ fʋ man kɔɔlɛ gyii yɛ n maa Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ an gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn? Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ mʋ man gyɛ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ lɛɛ. Amaa Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ mɛ tɔ mʋ ii sun mu kusun.
43014011	Kanɩn sʋ fan kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii fɛɛ n maa tɔwɛ yɛ, n maa Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ an gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn. Nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ kanɩn gbaa mʋ, fan kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii lɩɩ asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ fan wu n maa waa falɛ sʋ.
43014012	N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin, ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɔɔlɛ mɛ ee gyii mʋ, ee biti ɔ waa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ n waa mʋ. Ee biti ɔ waa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ kyɔ falɛ gbaa, lɩɩ fɛɛ n kpee Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ asɛ nɩn.
43014013	Nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fan kʋlɛ mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ mʋ, n biti n waa sa fanɛ, kɛ mɛ, Obii mʋ n bɩya bʋnyaa sa Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ.
43014014	Kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fɛn kʋlɛ mɛ lɩɩ mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ mʋ, n biti n waa sa fanɛ.” Yesu da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ kii biti kɩ ba.
43014015	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fan kan fan sʋ kebiti sa mɛ mʋ, fen biti fan buu mɛ kɔnɔsa.
43014016	N biti n kʋlɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ kɛ ɔ sa fanɛ Ɔkyɛtɔpʋ pʋpwɛ mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ baa ɔ bʋ fanɛ asɛ kakpaa.
43014017	Mʋ ɩ gyɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kesintin mʋ ɛɛ kaapʋ. Dulinya abi ba mɛɛ yɛ ba taalɛ kɔɔlɛ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba man nyi mʋ, nɩɩ be mee wu mʋ. Amaa fanɛɛ fanɛ fan nyi mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ bʋ fanɛ asɛ, nɩɩ ee biti ɔ baa ɔ bʋ fanɛ tɔ.
43014018	N mɛɛ yɛ n yɛgɛ fanɛ fɛɛ aŋmengyi, n biti n bwii ba fanɛ asɛ.
43014019	Ɩ san gbɛrɛɛ, dulinyaa abi ba man bɩla yɛ ba wu mɛ. Amaa fanɛɛ fanɛ bɩrɛ fen biti fan wu mɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ n maa tɛ nkpa tɔ falɛ, fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fen biti fan baa fan tɛ nkpa tɔ.
43014020	Kanɩn kakɛ maŋa fen biti fan bɩɩ fɛɛ n maa Mɛ‐Sɛ an gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn, nɩɩ n maa fanɛ gbaa an gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn.
43014021	“Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ kɔnɔsa, nɩɩ o buu ɩmʋ mʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa mɛ. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa mɛ mʋ, Mɛ‐Sɛ gbaa ii biti ɔ nyɛ kebiti sa mʋ. Ngbaa mɛ n biti n nyɛ kebiti sa mʋ, kɛ n lɛɛ mɛ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ mʋ.”
43014022	Nɩɩ Gyudasi (man gyɛ Gyudasi Isikariyoti mʋ) tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, mɩnɛ waa nɩɩ fii biti fʋ lɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ anɛ nkʋn, nɩɩ man gyɛ dulinyaa abi mʋ?”
43014023	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa mɛ mʋ, ii biti o buu mɛ kɩkaapʋ mʋ. Mɛ‐Sɛ ii biti ɔ nyɛ kebiti sa mʋ, nɩɩ maa Mɛ‐Sɛ an biti a ba mʋ asɛ, kɛ a taa mʋ biliŋi anɛ ayɛ.
43014024	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ kebiti sa mɛ mʋ, mɛɛ yɛ o buu mɛ kɩkaapʋ mʋ. Kɩkaapʋ mʋ nɩɩ fen nu falɛ man gyɛ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ kɩkaapʋ, ɩɩ lɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ asɛ nɩn.
43014025	“N maa san n bʋ fanɛ asɛ falɛ sʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ falɛ asɩn.
43014026	Amaa Ɔkyɛtɔpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ, mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ ii biti o sun mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ mʋ, ii biti ɔ kaapʋ fanɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa kɛ o nyiŋi fanɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ falɛ.
43014027	Kayɩɩ‐yuuli kɩ baa kɩ bʋ fanɛ asɛ, mɛ gbaa‐gbaa kayɩɩ‐yuuli nɩɩ n sʋ n sa fanɛ. Amaa ɩ man du fɛɛ dulinyaa kayɩɩ‐yuuli mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ sa mʋ. Fan man yɛgɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ i nyita, fan man waa kufuu.
43014028	“Fan nu n maa tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ‘N kpee kɛ n bɩla bwii ba fanɛ asɛ.’ Nɩɩ fɛn kan fen biti mɛ asɩn mʋ, naafɔɔ fanɛ ansi ii biti i gyii fɛɛ n maa kpee Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ asɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔkparɛ ɔ kyɔ mɛ.
43014029	N wʋla n tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ kpini nbɩɩnbɩɩ pɔyɩ kɛ ɩ ba waa, nɩɩ ɩ kan ba waa mʋ kɛ fan kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii.
43014030	N mɛɛ bɩla yɛ n tɔwɛ fanɛ asɛ kyɛɛrɛɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ dulinyaa tɔ owura ɩɩ ba. Ɔ man sʋ ɔlʋn mɛ sʋ,
43014031	amaa i tiri fɛɛ n maa waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ sa mɛ kɔnɔ yɛ n waa mʋ, kɛ dulinyaa abi ba bɩɩ fɛɛ n sʋ kebiti sa Mɛ‐Sɛ. Fan ba kɛ a lɩɩ nfɩɩ.”
43015001	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ wayɩn oyu gbaa‐gbaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ sɔyɩ abi, nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ ɩ gyɛ oyu mʋ ɔdɔɔpʋ.
43015002	Kayaa‐bi kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ kyaa mɛ sʋ nɩɩ kɩ mɛɛ sɔyɩ abi mʋ, ɛɛ ŋɛ kɩmʋ nɩn ɛɛ fɔyɩ, nɩɩ kayaa‐bi kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ sɔyɩ abi mʋ, ɛɛ kpaalɛ kayaa‐bi mʋ kɛ kɩ nyɛ sɔyɩ abi tii sʋ.
43015003	Lɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ sa fanɛ sʋ mʋ, fan tɛɛ waa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ.
43015004	Fan baa fan bʋ mɛ asɛ, kɛ ngbaa mɛ n baa n bʋ fanɛ asɛ. Kɩyaa‐bi nkʋn mɛɛ taalɛ sɔyɩ abi, amɔɔ kɩ kyaa oyu mʋ sʋ. Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fɛn mɛɛ taalɛ sɔyɩ abi, amɔɔ fan bʋ mɛ asɛ.
43015005	“Mɛ ɩ gyɛ oyu mʋ, nɩɩ fanɛ ɩ gyɛ kɩmʋ n‐yaabi mʋ. Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kan ɔ bʋ mɛ asɛ, nɩɩ ngbaa n bʋ mʋ asɛ sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ sɔyɩ abi gaa, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ kayaa‐bi kyaa oyu sʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ sɔyɩ abi mʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ fan man tii mɛ sʋ bɩrɛ, fɛn mɛɛ taalɛ waa sɛhn.
43015006	Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kan ɔ bʋ mɛ asɛ bɩrɛ, o du nɩn fɛɛ kayaa‐bi mʋ nɩɩ ba ŋɛ tʋʋ nɩɩ kɩ wʋlɛ. Kanɩn n‐yaabi nɩɩ bɛɛ tasɛ bɛɛ tʋʋ fʋlɔn tɔ, kɛ ɩ dɩyɛ mʋ.
43015007	Nɩɩ fan kan fan bʋ mɛ asɛ, nɩɩ mɛ asɩn mʋ bʋ fanɛ tɔ mʋ, kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fen biti, nɩɩ fan kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, ee biti ɔ waa sa fanɛ.
43015008	Nɩɩ fan kan sɔyɩ abi gaa, mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ fan gyɛ mɛ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ, ɩmʋ ɩ nyɛ lɛɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ bʋnyaa mʋ ifuli kaapʋ.
43015009	“Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ sʋ kebiti sa mɛ mʋ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n sʋ kebiti sa fanɛ. Ɩmʋ sʋ fan kyaga sʋ kyɩna mi kebiti mʋ tɔ.
43015010	Nɩɩ fan kan buu mɛ kɔnɔsa mʋ, n biti n kyaga sʋ nyɛ kebiti sa fanɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n buu Mɛ‐Sɛ kɔnɔsa nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa mɛ mʋ.
43015011	N tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ nɩn kɛ mi kensi‐gyii ɔ kyɩna fanɛ tɔ, kɛ fanɛ kensi‐gyii mʋ ɔ naa lʋwɛ kyɛɛkyɛɛ.
43015012	Mɛ kɔnɔsa ɩ gyɛ yɛ, Fan nyɛ kebiti sa abaa, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n nyɛ kebiti sa fanɛ mʋ.
43015013	Kebiti kɩ man bʋ tɔ kɩ kyɔ kɩnɩmʋ fɛɛ ɔkʋ maa wu sa mʋ kyɛmɩnɛ ana.
43015014	Nɩɩ fan kan buu mɛ kɔnɔsa mʋ bɩrɛ, fan gyɛ mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana nɩn.
43015015	N mɛɛ bɩla yɛ n tɩɩ fanɛ mɛ ayaafɔlɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ man nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ɩɩ waa. Amaa n tɩɩ fanɛ mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana nɩn, lɩɩ fɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n bɩɩla lɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ asɛ mʋ, n lɛɛ kaapʋ fanɛ.
43015016	Man gyɛ fanɛ ɩ lɛɛ mɛ. Amaa mɛ ɩ lɛɛ fanɛ, nɩɩ n sun fanɛ yɛ fan naa sɔyɩ abi mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ kyɛɛrɛɛ. Nɩɩ fan kan waa kanɩn mʋ, kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fan kʋlɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ mʋ, ee biti ɔ waa sa fanɛ.
43015017	Mɛ kɔnɔsa ɩ gyɛ yɛ, fan nyɛ kebiti sa abaa.”
43015018	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ dulinyaa abi ba kan bɛɛ kisi fanɛ mʋ, fan baa fan nyiŋi fɛɛ mɛ nɩɩ ba daa kikisi.
43015019	Nɩɩ fan kan fan du fɛɛ dulinyaa tɔ abi bɩrɛ, naafɔɔ dulinyaa abi bee biti ba nyɛ kebiti sa fanɛ fɛɛ kɩmʋ asa. Amaa fan man gyɛ dulinyaa abi. Mɛ ɩ lɛɛ fanɛ lɩɩ dulinyaa abi tɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ dulinyaa abi bee kisi fanɛ mʋ.
43015020	Fan nyiŋi asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Kɩyaafɔlɛ mɛɛ taalɛ ɔ kyɔ mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ.’ Ɩmʋ sʋ n maa wu awʋrʋfɔ bamʋ abaa tɔ falɛ, kanɩn nɩɩ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fen biti fan wu awʋrʋfɔ bamʋ abaa tɔ. Nɩɩ ba kan buu mɛ kɩkaapʋ mʋ, bee biti ba buu fanɛ kɩkaapʋ mʋ gbaa.
43015021	Lɩɩ mɛ kɩtɩɩ sʋ, nɩɩ bee biti ba waa fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ kpini, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba man nyi Ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ.
43015022	Nɩɩ n daa man ba tɔwɛ asɩn mʋ sa bamʋ nɩn, naafɔɔ ba mɛɛ yɛ ba wu alibi kʋpwɛ. Amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ ba man sʋ kɔnɔ kɩlɛɛ lɩɩ bamʋ alibi sʋ.
43015023	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee kisi mɛ mʋ, ee kisi Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ gbaa.
43015024	N ba waa asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ man pɩɩ taalɛ waa bamʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ ba daa ba man wu ɩmʋ bɩrɛ nɩn, naafɔɔ ba mɛɛ yɛ ba wu alibi kʋpwɛ. Amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ ba wu asɩn kyinkyinsa nɩmʋ kpini. Halɩɩ ɩmʋ kpini gbaa mʋ ba kisi maa Mɛ‐Sɛ.
43015025	Amaa ɩnɩmʋ ɩ yɛgɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ ba tɔ. Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, ‘Ba kisi mɛ yɛgɛ ɩ man sʋ kasɛ.’
43015026	“Amaa n biti n sun Ɔkyɛtɔpʋ mʋ lɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ asɛ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɛɛ kesintin lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ ɛɛ kaapʋ.
43015027	Nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan gyii mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kesintin, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan bʋ mɛ asɛ lɩɩ npiili asɛ.
43016001	“N tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ kpini nɩn, kɛ fan man nyɛ yɛgɛ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ.
43016002	Bee biti ba gya fanɛ lɩɩ Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa. Saŋa kʋ ii biti ɔ ba, nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ba mɔɔ fanɛ gbaa mʋ, ee biti ɔ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ee sun kusun ɛɛ kyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔ nɩn.
43016003	Bee biti ba waa falɛ atɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba man nyi Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ba man nyi mɛ.
43016004	N tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ nɩn, nɩɩ saŋa mʋ kan fʋʋ mʋ, fen biti fan nyiŋi fɛɛ n wʋla da fanɛ amu tɔ. N man tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ bilen, lɩɩ fɛɛ n san n bʋ fanɛ asɛ.”
43016005	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ n kpee ɔmʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ mʋ asɛ nɩn, amaa fanɛ ɔkʋ man taasɛ mɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n kpee.
43016006	Lɩɩ fɛɛ n maa tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ kpini sʋ mʋ, fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ i nyita.
43016007	Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin, mi kikpe mʋ kɩ gyɛ tɔnɔ sa fanɛ nɩn. Nɩɩ n man kan kpee mʋ, Ɔkyɛtɔpʋ mʋ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ ba fanɛ asɛ. Amaa nɩɩ n kan kpee mʋ, n biti n sun mʋ fanɛ asɛ.
43016008	Nɩɩ ɔ kan ba mʋ, ee biti ɔ ba yɛgɛ dulinyaa tɔ asa ba bɩɩ fɛɛ ba fɔyɩ ɔkpa lɩɩ bamʋ alibi sʋ, yɛ ɩkpa kikyiigi mʋ sʋ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn kigyii sʋ.
43016009	Ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ba fɔyɩ lɩɩ bamʋ alibi sʋ mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ ba mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ mɛ bee gyii.
43016010	Ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ba fɔyɩ lɩɩ ɩkpa kikyiigi sʋ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ yɛ n kpee Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ asɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ fan man bɩla yɛ fan wu mɛ.
43016011	Ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ba fɔyɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn kigyii sʋ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɛɛ wʋla bun dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ Owura mʋ kʋpwɛ.
43016012	“N sʋ asɩn kʋkyɔ n tɔwɛ fanɛ, amaa fan mɛɛ taalɛ kɩtaa ɩmʋ kpini nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ.
43016013	Amaa nɩɩ Kayaayu mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɛɛ kesintin ɛɛ kaapʋ kan ba mʋ, ee biti ɔ kaapʋ fanɛ kɛ fan bɩɩ kesintin mʋ kpini. Man gyɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa ɔlʋn sʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ. Amaa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ee nu mʋ nkʋn nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ, nɩɩ ee biti ɔ tɔwɛ fanɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ ba.
43016014	Lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ o nu lɩɩ mɛ asɛ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɛɛ kaapʋ fanɛ, kɛ ee biti ɔ bɩya mɛ bʋnyaa.
43016015	Kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ, gyɛ mɛ lɛɛ nɩn. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ Kayaayu mʋ ii biti ɔ taa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ mɛ lɛɛ mʋ ba kaapʋ fanɛ.”
43016016	Nɩɩ Yesu kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɩ san gbɛrɛɛ fan man bɩla yɛ fen wu mɛ, nɩɩ ɩ bɩla waa gbɛrɛɛ fen biti fen wu mɛ.”
43016017	Tʋtɔ maŋa nɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ akʋ bɛɛ taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ mʋ katɔwɛ mʋ ɩɩ kaapʋ? Maa tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɩ san gbɛrɛɛ fan man bɩla yɛ fan wu mɛ, nɩɩ ɩ bɩla waa gbɛrɛɛ, fen biti fan wu mɛ’ nɩɩ ɔ bɩla bwii tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘N kpee Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ asɛ’ mʋ, mɩnɛ nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ɩɩ kaapʋ?”
43016018	Nɩɩ ba maa sʋ bɛɛ taasɛ yɛ, “ ‘Ɩ san gbɛrɛɛ’ mʋ, ɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ nɛnɛ? A mee nu asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ kasɛ.”
43016019	Nɩɩ Yesu bɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ bee biti ba taasɛ mʋ asɩn mʋ kasɛ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N maa tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɩ san gbɛrɛɛ fan man bɩla yɛ fen wu mɛ, nɩɩ ɩ bɩla waa gbɛrɛɛ fen biti fan wu mɛ’ mʋ, ɩmʋ asɩn nɩɩ fɛn taasɛ abaa?
43016020	N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ, fen biti fan su kɛ fan bɔta tɔ, yɛgɛ dulinyaa abi mɔɔ bee gyii bamʋ ansi. Fanɛ nkɔlɔ ii biti ii nyita fanɛ, amaa fanɛ nkɔlɔ kinyita ii biti ɩ ba biliŋi nkɔlɔ fuuli.
43016021	I du nɩn fɛɛ keduŋidi maa kɩtaa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ, ɩ kɔ mʋ lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ awʋrʋfɔ saŋa fʋʋ. Amaa nɩɩ ɔ kʋʋgɛ kebii mʋ, ɛɛ tan mʋ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ kʋʋgɛ kebii waa dulinyaa tɔ.
43016022	Kanɩn nɩɩ i du sa fanɛ gbaa fanɛ. Nbɩɩnbɩɩ fan bʋ awʋrʋfɔ tɔ. Amaa n biti n bɩla wu fanɛ, kɛ fanɛ ansi i gyii. Nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ lɛɛ kanɩn kensi‐gyii maŋa lɩɩ fanɛ tɔ.
43016023	Nɩɩ kakɛ maŋa kan fʋʋ mʋ, fan man bɩla yɛ fan taasɛ mɛ sɛhn. N tɔwɛ fanɛ kesintin yɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ ii biti ɔ sa fanɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fan kʋlɛ lɩɩ mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ.
43016024	Halɩɩ ba lɩɩ ndaga fan man pɩɩta kʋlɛ kʋtɔ kʋ lɩɩ mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ. Fan kʋlɛ, fen biti fan nyɛ, kɛ fanɛ kensi‐gyii ɔ nyɛ akyɔ.
43016025	“Ɩ gyɛ kesintin fɛɛ aŋasan tɔ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ asɩn nɩmʋ. Amaa saŋa kʋ ɩɩ ba nɩɩ n man bɩla yɛ n tɔwɛ fanɛ aŋasan tɔ. N biti n lɛɛ ifuli tɔwɛ fanɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ lɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ sʋ.
43016026	Kanɩn kakɛ maŋa fen biti fan kʋlɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ lɩɩ mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ. N mɛɛ tɔwɛ nɩn yɛ n biti n yɩlɛ fanɛ ayaa tɔ kʋlɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ sa fanɛ.
43016027	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa sʋ kebiti sa fanɛ, kpalɩ fɛɛ fan sʋ kebiti sa mɛ nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ n lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ.
43016028	N lɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ asɛ ba dulinyaa tɔ. Nɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ n lɩɩ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ n bwii n kpee Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ asɛ.”
43016029	Nɩɩ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ, fʋ man bɩla fɩɩ tɔwɛ aŋasan tɔ, fii sii fii bugi tɔ nɩn fɩɩ tɔwɛ.
43016030	Nbɩɩnbɩɩ an wu fɛɛ fu nyi kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ, nɩɩ ɩ man bɩla i tiri fɛɛ ɔkʋ a taasɛ fʋ kʋtɔ kʋ. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ an kɔɔlɛ fu gyii yɛ fʋ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ.”
43016031	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ fan kɔɔlɛ gyii?
43016032	Amaa saŋa kʋ ɩɩ ba, nɩɩ kɩ tɛɛ ba gbaa, nɩɩ fanɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ii biti ɔ yaasɛ tɔ kpee mʋ ayɛ. Fen biti fan yɛgɛ mɛ nkʋn. Amaa ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ san mɛ nkʋn lɩɩ fɛɛ Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ bʋ mɛ asɛ.
43016033	“N tɔwɛ fanɛ falɛ asɩn nɩn, kɛ lɩɩ mɛ sʋ mʋ, kɛ fan nyɛ kayɩɩ‐yuuli. Fen biti fan gyii awʋrʋfɔ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ. Amaa fan nyɛ nkɔlɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ n kɔ gyii dulinyaa mʋ sʋ.”
43017001	Yesu maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, ɔ kʋsaa mu kumu kɩɩ sʋsʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ, “Nsɛ saŋa mʋ fʋʋ. Sa mɛ, Fu‐bii mʋ bʋnyaa, kɛ mɛ, Fu‐bii mʋ gbaa n sa fʋ bʋnyaa.
43017002	Lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ sa mɛ ɔlʋn lɩɩ asa kpini sʋ, fɛɛ n sa asa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ taa bɔɔta mɛ mʋ kpini nkpa kakpaa.
43017003	Nkpa kakpaa mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ asa ba bɩɩ fʋ, kesintin Ɩbwaarɛ kʋlʋn mʋ, kɛ ba bɩɩ mɛ, Yesu Krisito mʋ nɩɩ fu sun mʋ.
43017004	N bɩya fʋ bʋnyaa kasɛ sʋ nfɩɩ, lɩɩ n maa lʋwɛ fu kusun mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sa mɛ yɛ n ba waa mʋ sʋ.
43017005	Mɛ‐Sɛ, sa mɛ bʋnyaa fu ansi tɔ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ, bʋnyaa mʋ nɩɩ n wʋla n sʋ fʋ asɛ pɔyɩ nɩɩ fʋ tʋʋ dulinyaa mʋ.”
43017006	Nɩɩ Yesu kyaga sʋ yɛ, “N lɛɛ fu kedubi kaapʋ bamʋ nɩɩ fʋ lɛɛ bamʋ lɩɩ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ sa mɛ mʋ. Ba daa ba gyɛ fʋ lɛɛ nɩn, nɩɩ fʋ taa bamʋ sa mɛ. Nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ fʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba buu ɩmʋ.
43017007	Nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ, ba bɩɩ fɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ mʋ lɩɩ fʋ asɛ nɩn.
43017008	Lɩɩ fɛɛ n tɔwɛ bamʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sa mɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ. Ba bɩɩ kesintin tɔ fɛɛ n lɩɩ fʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ fu i sun mɛ.
43017009	N kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ n sa bamʋ. N mɛɛ kʋlɛ n sa dulinyaa abi, amaa bamʋ nɩɩ fʋ taa sa mɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba gyɛ fʋ lɛɛ mʋ.
43017010	Asa mʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ mɛ lɛɛ mʋ kpini, ba gyɛ fʋ lɛɛ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ fʋ lɛɛ mʋ ba gyɛ mɛ lɛɛ. Lɩɩ bamʋ sʋ nɩɩ mɛ bʋnyaa mʋ lɩɩ ifuli.
43017011	N man bɩla yɛ n kyɩna dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ, n ba fʋ asɛ nɩn. Amaa bɛɛ bamʋ bɩrɛ ba san ba bʋ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ. Nsɛ Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ taa fʋ kɩtɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sa mɛ ɔlʋn mʋ kun bamʋ, kɛ ba nyɛ waa kʋkʋlʋn fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ maa fʋ an gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn mʋ.
43017012	Maa kyɩna n bʋ bamʋ asɛ mʋ, kɩtɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sa mɛ mʋ, kɩmʋ ɔlʋn tɔ nɩɩ n taa kɩɩ bamʋ sʋ, nɩɩ n kun bamʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋ man fɔyɩ, amɔɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ dagaa fɛɛ ɔ fɔyɩ mʋ, kɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ ba tɔ.
43017013	“Nbɩɩnbɩɩ n ba fʋ asɛ nɩmʋ. Amaa maa san n bʋ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ, kɛ ba nyɛ mɛ kensi‐gyii bamʋ tɔ danbɩrasa naa lʋwɛ.
43017014	N taa fʋ asɩn mʋ sa bamʋ, nɩɩ dulinyaa abi ba kisi bamʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba man bɩla ba gyɛ dulinyaa tɔ abi, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n man gyɛ dulinyaa tɔ obii mʋ.
43017015	N mɛɛ kʋlɛ fʋ nɩn yɛ fʋ lɛɛ bamʋ lɩɩ dulinyaa tɔ, amaa n kʋlɛ nɩn yɛ fu kun bamʋ lɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ sʋ.
43017016	Ba man gyɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ lɛɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n man gyɛ kɩmʋ lɛɛ mʋ.
43017017	Taa fʋ asɩn kesintin lɔŋɔ bamʋ yɩla, lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ kesintin.
43017018	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fu sun mɛ dulinyaa tɔ mʋ, kanɩn nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n sun bamʋ dulinyaa tɔ.
43017019	Lɩɩ bamʋ sʋ nɩɩ n taa mɛ n‐yɩɩ sa fʋ, kɛ ngbaa bamʋ ba nyɛ taa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sa fʋ kesintin tɔ.”
43017020	Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ, “Man gyɛ mɛ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ nkʋn nɩɩ n kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ n sa. N kʋlɛ n sa bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba be nu mɛ asɩn lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ kɛ ba kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii mʋ gbaa.
43017021	Nsɛ, mɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ bamʋ kpini ba waa kʋkʋlʋn, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ bʋ mɛ tɔ nɩɩ ngbaa n bʋ fʋ tɔ mʋ. N kʋlɛ fʋ yɛ, ba baa ba bʋ anɛ tɔ, kɛ dulinyaa abi ba kɔɔlɛ gyii yɛ fu i sun mɛ.
43017022	N sa bamʋ bʋnyaa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sa mɛ mʋ, kɛ ba nyɛ waa kʋkʋlʋn fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn mʋ.
43017023	N ba n bʋ bamʋ tɔ yɛgɛ fʋ bʋ mɛ tɔ, kɛ ba bʋga waa kɔnɔ kʋlʋn naa lʋwɛ. Ɩnɩmʋ ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ dulinyaa abi ba bɩɩ fɛɛ fu i sun mɛ, nɩɩ fʋ sʋ kebiti sa bamʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ kebiti sa mɛ mʋ.
43017024	“Nsɛ n biti fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ fʋ taa sa mɛ mʋ, ba baa ba bʋ mɛ asɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ mʋ. Kɛ ba wu mɛ bʋnyaa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ taa sa mɛ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ sʋ kebiti sa mɛ pɔyɩ nɩɩ fʋ tʋʋ dulinyaa mʋ.
43017025	“Nsɛ, ɩkpa kyiigisa wuya, dulinyaa abi ba maa man nyi fʋ, amaa mɛɛ mɛ n nyi fʋ, nɩɩ mi abuupu mʋ be nyi fɛɛ fu i sun mɛ.
43017026	N lɛɛ fu kedubi kaapʋ bamʋ, nɩɩ n biti n kyaga sʋ lɛɛ fʋ kaapʋ bamʋ, kɛ fu kebiti mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ sa mɛ mʋ kɩ baa kɩ bʋ bamʋ tɔ, kɛ ngbaa mɛ n baa n bʋ bamʋ tɔ.”
43018001	Yesu maa kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ lʋwɛ mʋ, maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba faa kɩpantan mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ kɩmʋ yɛ Kidiron kpee kɩmʋ benbe. Kadɔɔ‐bi kʋ kʋbʋ tʋtɔ, nɩɩ ba loo kɩmʋ tɔ.
43018002	Nɩɩ Gyudasi mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɛɛ Yesu ɛɛ sa mʋ, nyi tʋtɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ, Yesu maa mʋ abɩɩlapʋ bɛɛ taalɛ bɛɛ gyaŋɛ tʋtɔ.
43018003	Ɩmʋ sʋ aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ Farasii abi ba yɛgɛ nɩɩ Gyudasi gyankpaa Roma anaakɔpʋ yɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ akɩɩsʋpʋ, yɛgɛ ba sʋ ɩgyaa yɛ ɩfɩtɩla yɛ adʋntɔ ba kadɔɔ‐bi mʋ tɔ.
43018004	Yesu maa nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ ba mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ lɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ nɩɩ fen biti?”
43018005	Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “An biti Yesu Kanasareti‐nyɩn mʋ nɩn.” Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɛ gyɛ mʋ.” Yɛgɛ Gyudasi mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɛɛ mʋ sa mʋ yɩlɛ bamʋ asɛ tʋtɔ.
43018006	Yesu maa tɔwɛ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ mʋ” mʋ, nɩɩ ba bwii kamaa tɩyɛ kasɛ.
43018007	Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ nɩɩ fen biti?” Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “An biti Yesu Kanasareti‐nyɩn mʋ nɩn.”
43018008	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ mɛ ɩ gyɛ mʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ mɛ nɩɩ fen biti bɩrɛ, fan yɛgɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba tii mɛ sʋ falɛ ba natɛ.”
43018009	Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ waa nɩn, kɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla tɔwɛ mʋ ɩ ba tɔ. Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “N man yɛgɛ bamʋ nɩɩ fʋ taa bamʋ sa mɛ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ fɔyɩ” mʋ.
43018010	Simon Pita sʋ sakunde, nɩɩ ɔ bɩɩtɛ kɩmʋ lɔɔrɛ nɩɩ ɔ ŋɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ gyisa kʋsʋ tɩn. Kɩyaafɔlɛ maŋa kɩtɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Malikusi.
43018011	Yesu tɔwɛ Pita yɛ, “Bwiiyaa fʋ sakunde mʋ waa kɩmʋ kukufee tɔ. Fʋ man nyi fɛɛ i tiri fɛɛ n gyii awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ Nsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ŋmina yɩla mɛ mʋ?”
43018012	Nɩɩ anaakɔpʋ mʋ yɛ bamʋ ɔbɩlɩsa yɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ akɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ ba kɩtaa Yesu, nɩɩ ba ŋmina mʋ.
43018013	Nɩɩ ba gyankpaa taa mʋ kpee Anasi asɛ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ Kayifasi mʋ‐saa, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ kanɩn kesu maŋa.
43018014	Kayifasi maŋa ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ daa tɔwɛ waa Gyiwu abi mʋ yɛ ɩ bɔ fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa kʋlʋn o wu sa asa kpini mʋ.
43018015	Simon Pita maa ɔbɩɩlapʋ kʋ ba buu Yesu. Fɛɛ ɔbɩɩlapʋ mʋ maa nyi Oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, o buu Yesu loo oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ.
43018016	Amaa Pita gyoo kebunɔ. Ɔbɩɩlapʋ mʋ nɩɩ o nyi Oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ, bwii ba tɔwɛ kibite mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ kebunɔ mʋ sʋ mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ taa Pita loo.
43018017	Kibite mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɩɩ kebunɔ mʋ taasɛ Pita yɛ, “Fʋ man gyɛ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ɔkʋ nɩn?” Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ayee, n man gyɛ.”
43018018	Ɩ kyɩna ɩ gyɛ awɔɔ tɔ nɩn, nɩɩ ayaafɔlɛ yɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ akɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ ba dɩyɛla fʋlɔn bɛɛ wʋlɛ, nɩɩ Pita gbaa ba yɩlɛ bamʋ asɛ ɛɛ wʋlɛ fʋlɔn.
43018019	Oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ Anasi taasɛ Yesu lɩɩ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kaapʋ mʋ sʋ.
43018020	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Saŋa kʋmaa nɩmʋ sakyɔ tɔ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ asɩn, yɛgɛ n kaapʋ atɔ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩgyaŋɛkpa yɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi kpini bɛɛ gyaŋɛ mʋ. N man tɔwɛ kʋtɔ kʋ baala asiri tɔ.
43018021	Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ taasɛ mɛ falɛ asɩn? Taasɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba nu mɛ asɛ mʋ. Ba nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ.”
43018022	Yesu maa tɔwɛ kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ akɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ yɩlɛ tʋtɔ mʋ kpa mʋ ɔtan, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Falɛ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fʋ maa lɛɛ Oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ kɔnɔ?”
43018023	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nɩɩ n kan tɔwɛ asɩn akʋ nɩɩ ɩ man bʋrɔn mʋ, tɔwɛ asɩn maŋa kɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ o nu. Amaa nɩɩ mɛ asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ kesintin mʋ, mɩnɛ waa nɩɩ fʋ da mɛ ɔtan?”
43018024	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔbɩlɩsa Anasi yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba taa Yesu yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba ŋmina mʋ mʋ naa sa Kayifasi, Oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ.
43018025	Simon Pita san ɔ yɩlɛ ɛɛ wʋlɛ fʋlɔn, nɩɩ ɔkʋ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ man gyɛ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ nɩn?” Nɩɩ Pita kyɛ yɛ, “Ayee, n man gyɛ.”
43018026	Nɩɩ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ ayaafɔlɛ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ, ɔmʋ nɩɩ Pita ŋɛ mʋ kʋsʋ tɩn mʋ, mʋ kʋʋpʋ, taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “N man wu fʋ maa bʋ mʋ asɛ kadɔɔ‐bi mʋ tɔ?”
43018027	Nɩɩ Pita bwii kyɛ. Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ kyaasɛ bʋn.
43018028	Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ Yesu lɩɩ Kayifasi asɛ nyenyenfuu, kpee Ɔsʋwʋlɛ Ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ kɩkpaara tɔ Amaa Gyiwu abi mʋ ba man loo kɩkpaara mʋ tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ nɩɩ ba kan loo tʋtɔ mʋ, bee biti ba waa ineesi kɛ i tii bamʋ ɔkpa kɛ ba man nyɛ gyii Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ mʋ.
43018029	Ɩmʋ sʋ Ɔsʋwʋlɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ Paleti lɩɩ kɩkpaara sʋ ba bamʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ asɩn pwɩɩsa nɩɩ fan sʋ lɩɩ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ sʋ?”
43018030	Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔ daa ɔ man waa alibi akʋ nɩn, naafɔɔ a mɛɛ yɛ a taa mʋ ba waa fʋ abaa tɔ.”
43018031	Paleti tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan taa mʋ bwii kɛ fan naa taa fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ nbara gyii mʋ asɩn.” Amaa ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fanɛ Roma abi fan man sa anɛ ɔkpa yɛ a mɔɔ ɔkʋ.”
43018032	Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ waa nɩn kɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ lɩɩ mu lewu mʋ nɩɩ ee biti o wu mʋ kudubi ɩ ba tɔ.
43018033	Nɩɩ Paleti bwii loo mʋ kɩkpaara tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ Yesu ba yɩlɛ mu ansi tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Gyiwu abi Owura mʋ?”
43018034	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fʋ taasɛ mɛ falɛ lɩɩ fʋ asɛ nɩn abɛɛ ɔsa kʋ ɩ tɔwɛ mɛ asɩn sa fʋ?”
43018035	Paleti lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N gyɛ Gyiwu obii nɩn? Fʋ gbaa‐gbaa fʋ asa yɛ fʋ aseepu bɩlɩsa ɩ taa fʋ waa mɛ kɩbaa tɔ. Mɩnɛ nɩɩ fʋ waa?”
43018036	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mi kuwura‐gyii kɩ man gyɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ lɛɛ. Nɩɩ n daa n gyɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ lɛɛ nɩn, naafɔɔ mi abuupu ba dɩn kɔ sa mɛ, kɛ Gyiwu abi ba man nyɛ mɛ kɩtaa waa bamʋ abɩlɩsa abaa tɔ. Amaa mi kuwura‐gyii mʋ kɩ man gyɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ lɛɛ.”
43018037	Nɩɩ Paleti lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Kanɩn bɩrɛ fʋ gyɛ owura nɩn!” Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fʋ maa tɔwɛ yɛ n gyɛ owura mʋ, ɩ gyɛ kesintin. Ɩnɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mɛ ba dulinyaa tɔ, kɛ n ba tɔwɛ lɩɩ kesintin mʋ sʋ. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti kesintin mʋ ii nu mɛ asɛ.”
43018038	Nɩɩ Paleti taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ gyɛ kesintin?” Maa taasɛ mʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ o bwii lɩɩ kpee Gyiwu abi mʋ asɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N man wu asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n yɩlɛ sʋ kɛ n bun ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ kʋpwɛ.
43018039	Amaa ɩ gyɛ fanɛ anaana tɔ nɩn fɛɛ Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kensi‐gyii saŋa n yɛgɛ n lɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba tii bamʋ obu mʋ ɔkʋ mʋ nɩɩ fen biti mʋ, n sa fanɛ. Ɩmʋ sʋ fen biti fɛɛ n yɛgɛ fanɛ Gyiwu abi owura mʋ sa fanɛ abɛɛ?”
43018040	Nɩɩ ba kuusi tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ayee! Man gyɛ mʋ, lɛɛ Barabasi sa anɛ.” Barabasi ɩ kyɩna ɔ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ awura sʋ bɩya keluu.
43019001	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Paleti taa Yesu sa, nɩɩ ba tɩŋɛ mʋ awulibi.
43019002	Nɩɩ anaakɔpʋ mʋ ba taa iwii bɔɔ kuwura‐wʋrʋ bun mʋ, nɩɩ ba bun mʋ kɩrɩman‐kyu balɩmaasʋ fɛɛ owura.
43019003	Nɩɩ bɛɛ ba mʋ asɛ bɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Eee! Gyiwu abi owura, eee, owura!” Nɩɩ bɛɛ kpee bɛɛ kpa mʋ ɩtan.
43019004	Nɩɩ Paleti bɩla lɩɩ ba kewu Gyiwu abi mʋ asɛ ba tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan nu nfɩɩ, n sʋ mʋ n bɩya fanɛ, kɛ fan bɩɩ fɛɛ mɛɛ mɛ n man wu alibi akʋ mʋ sʋ, mʋ nɩɩ n taa bun mʋ kʋpwɛ.”
43019005	Yesu maa lɩɩ ba mʋ, o bun iwii kuwura‐wʋrʋ yɛ kɩrɩman‐kyu balɩmaasʋ, nɩɩ Paleti tɔwɛ asa mʋ yɛ, “Fan kɩɩ, ɔnyɩn mʋ ndee!”
43019006	Aseepu bɩlɩsa yɛ Gyiwu anaakɔpʋ ba maa wu Yesu mʋ ba kuusi yɛ, “Da mʋ mata oyu laasa sʋ mɔɔ. Da mʋ mata.” Nɩɩ Paleti tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ fan taa mʋ naa da mata oyu laasa sʋ. Mɛɛ mɛ n man wu alibi akʋ mʋ nɩɩ n taa bun mʋ kʋpwɛ.”
43019007	Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi mʋ ba lɛɛ Paleti kɔnɔ yɛ, “An sʋ nbara kʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ dagaa maa wu, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ mʋ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii.”
43019008	Paleti maa nu ɩnɩmʋ mʋ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa mʋ tii sʋ.
43019009	Nɩɩ o bwiiyaa Yesu loo kɩkpaara mʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fɩnɛ nɩɩ fʋ lɩɩ?” Amaa Yesu man tʋwɛ mʋ.
43019010	Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fu kina mɛ asɛ kɩ tɔwɛ? Fʋ man nyi fɛɛ n sʋ ɔlʋn n taalɛ yɛgɛ fʋ natɛ kɩyan, abɛɛ ba da fʋ mata oyu laasa sʋ mɔɔ?”
43019011	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ daa ɔ man sa fʋ ɔlʋn mɛ sʋ nɩn, naafɔɔ fʋ mɛɛ taalɛ waa mɛ sɛhn. Amaa ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mɛ sa fʋ mʋ, mu alibi ɩ kyɔ fʋ lɛɛ gaa.”
43019012	Paleti maa nu kanɩn mʋ, o biti ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɔla yɛgɛ Yesu ɔ natɛ kɩyan. Amaa Gyiwu abi mʋ ba kuusi yɛ, “Fʋ dan kan yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ natɛ kɩyan bɩrɛ, fʋ man gyɛ Owura lala Kasaro mʋ kyɛmɩnɛ. Kpalɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ ɔ gyɛ owura mʋ, gyɛ Owura lala Kasaro mʋ dʋn nɩn.”
43019013	Paleti maa nu kanɩn mʋ, ɔ taa Yesu lɩɩ ba kɩlandɛ sʋ, nɩɩ Paleti naa kyɩna kagya mʋ nɩɩ awura bɛɛ kyɩna kɩmʋ tɔ bɛɛ gyii asɩn mʋ. Bɛɛ tɩɩ tʋtɔ yɛ, “Abuu ɔtagakpa.” Gyiwu abi katɔwɛ tɔ bɛɛ tɩɩ kɩmʋ yɛ, “Gabata.”
43019014	Kanɩn kakɛ maŋa gyɛ kakɛ kʋlasa sa Kesu kɔnɔ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kensi‐gyii mʋ. Lɩɩ ɩ maa fʋʋ kyɔwɛ amu nsana mʋ. Nɩɩ Paleti tɔwɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ yɛ, “Fan kɩɩ fanɛ Owura!”
43019015	Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi ba kuusi yɛ, “Mɔɔ mʋ, mɔɔ mʋ. Da mʋ mata oyu laasa sʋ mɔɔ.” Nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N mɔɔ fanɛ owura mʋ abɛɛ?” Nɩɩ aseepu bɩlɩsa mʋ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “A man sʋ owura kʋ tii Owura lala Kasaro sʋ.”
43019016	Tʋtɔ maŋa nɩɩ Paleti taa mʋ sa bamʋ yɛ ba naa da mʋ mata oyu laasa sʋ mɔɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ anaakɔpʋ mʋ ba taa Yesu kyʋn.
43019017	Nɩɩ Yesu lɩɩ tʋtɔ ɔ kyɛ mʋ oyu laasa naa fʋʋ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ “Kumu kawɛ opula.” Nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ kɩmʋ Gyiwu abi katɔwɛ tɔ yɛ, “Goligota” mʋ.
43019018	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba da mʋ anyenbi mata oyu laasa sʋ. Nɩɩ ba bɩla da asa nyɔ anyenbi mata iyu laasa sʋ, ɔkʋ bʋ mʋ gyisa sʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɔɔ bʋ mʋ bɩna sʋ.
43019019	Nɩɩ Paleti yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ asɩn gyaga kʋtɔ kʋ sʋ naa mata oyu laasa mʋ sʋ yɛ, “YESU KANASARETI‐NYƖN, GYIWU ABI OWURA.”
43019020	Ba kyʋrɔɔ ɩmʋ Gyiwu abi yɛ Roma abi yɛ Giriki abi ntɔwɛ tɔ, nɩɩ Gyiwu abi gaalaagaa ba kalɛ ɩmʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba da mʋ mata oyu laasa sʋ mʋ, man bʋ kata yɛ kadɛ mʋ.
43019021	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu bɩlɩsa mʋ ba ba tɔwɛ Paleti yɛ, “Man kyʋrɔɔ yɛ ‘Gyiwu abi Owura’, amaa kyʋrɔɔ yɛ ‘Ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ Gyiwu abi owura.’ ”
43019022	Nɩɩ Paleti tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n dan kyʋrɔɔ mʋ kɩmʋ nɩɩ n kyʋrɔɔ.”
43019023	Anaakɔpʋ mʋ ba maa da Yesu mata oyu laasa sʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, ba barɩgɛ mʋ atɔ bunsa mʋ tɔ ntun nna, nɩɩ bamʋ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ nyɛ katɩn kʋlʋn. Nɩɩ ɩ san mʋ kaalɛ bʋnswɩɩsa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ ɔbaatakpa, nɩɩ ba lʋʋ kɩmʋ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba yii kasɛ nɩn.
43019024	Nɩɩ anaakɔpʋ mʋ ba tɔwɛ abaa yɛ, “A man kyatɛ kɩmʋ barɩgɛ tɔ. Fan yɛgɛ a tʋʋ kɩmʋ sʋ nbii, kɛ a kɩɩ anɛ tɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti o gyii kɩmʋ.” Ba maa waa kanɩn mʋ, ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ ba tɔ kesintin. Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “Ba barɩgɛ mɛ atɔ bunsa tɔ sa abaa, nɩɩ ba tʋʋ nbii mɛ kaalɛ bʋnswɩɩsa sʋ.” Ɩmʋ sʋ kanɩn nɩɩ anaakɔpʋ mʋ ba waa.
43019025	Yesu mu‐nyi yɛ mʋ nɩkarɛ yɛ Kilopa mʋ‐ka Mɛɛrɩ yɛ Mɛɛrɩ Magidalen ba yɩlɛ Yesu oyu laasa mʋ asɛ.
43019026	Yesu maa wu mu‐nyi yɛ mʋ ɔbɩɩlapʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa mʋ ba maa yɩlɛ tʋtɔ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ mu‐nyi yɛ, “Ɔkyɩɩ, fu‐bii ndee.”
43019027	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ ɔbɩɩlapʋ mʋ mɔɔ yɛ, “Fɔɔ fʋ, fu‐nyi ndee.” Lɩɩ kanɩn saŋa mʋ, nɩɩ ɔbɩɩlapʋ mʋ taa mʋ naa kyɩna mʋ asɛ.
43019028	Asɩn nɩmʋ kpini kamaa mʋ, Yesu nyi fɛɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa kɩ lʋwɛ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Bʋlɩfɔ sʋ mɛ.” Ɔ tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ nɩn kɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ nyɛ ba tɔ.
43019029	Tʋtɔ mʋ, nta nyaŋɛsa ɩ bɔla kɔlɔ‐bi ɩ yɩlɛ, nɩɩ anaakɔpʋ mʋ ba taa ɔkyɛɛ ba nyɔ nta mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ba taa sɔgɩta hisopi oyu sʋ, nɩɩ ba kʋsaa kɩmʋ naa tii mʋ kɔnɔ.
43019030	Yesu maa kyʋkyʋʋ nta mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ ɩ lʋwɛ.” Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ ɔŋɛɛ.
43019031	Kanɩn kakɛ maŋa kɩ gyɛ kakɛ kʋlasa akɛ sa Kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa. Kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa maŋa maa gyɛ Kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa lala mʋ, nɩɩ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ be mee biti fɛɛ asa mʋ ba baa ba saa iyu laasa mʋ sʋ naa fʋʋ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa maŋa. Kanɩn sʋ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ ba naa kʋlɛ Paleti yɛ ɔ yɛgɛ ba naa gyayɩ‐gyayɩ bamʋ ayaa, kɛ ba wu bilen, kɛ ba nyɛ saatɛ bamʋ lɩɩ iyu laasa mʋ sʋ.
43019032	Ɩmʋ sʋ anaakɔpʋ mʋ ba ba asa anyɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba da bamʋ mata iyu laasa sʋ tii Yesu sʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ ba gyayɩ ɔgyankpaasa mʋ ayaa yɛ ɔbanban mʋ gbaa lɛɛ.
43019033	Amaa ba maa fʋʋ Yesu asɛ mʋ, ba wu fɛɛ ɔ tɛɛ wʋla wu, kanɩn sʋ ba man gyayɩ mʋ ayaa.
43019034	Amaa anaakɔpʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ taa kɩkpɛ yii Yesu kikelebi tɔ. Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ nkalan yɛ nkyu ɩ lɩɩ wʋrɩgɛ.
43019035	Ɔmʋ nɩɩ o wu ɩmʋ yɛ ansi ɩ maa waa mʋ, mʋ ii gyii ɩmʋ kesintin, kɛ fan nyɛ kɔɔlɛ gyii. Nɩɩ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ kesintin, nɩɩ o nyi fɛɛ mʋ asɩn mʋ gyɛ kesintin.
43019036	Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ waa nɩn kaapʋ fɛɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ ba tɔ kesintin. Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “Mu kuwuya kʋlʋn gbaa kɩ mɛɛ yɛ kɩ gya.”
43019037	Nɩɩ bɩla kyʋrɔɔ yɩla katɩn kʋ gbaa tɔwɛ yɛ, “Asa bee biti ba kɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ba taa kɩkpɛ yii mʋ mʋ.”
43019038	Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa tɔ mʋ, ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gyosefu mʋ kpee Paleti asɛ naa kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ, ɔ sa mʋ ɔkpa kɛ ɔ naa saatɛ Yesu kibuni naa pula. Nɩɩ Paleti sa mʋ ɔkpa, nɩɩ o kpee naa taa Yesu kibuni mʋ. Gyosefu maŋa lɩɩ Arimatiya kadɛ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Yesu ɔbɩɩlapʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ. Amaa maa sɩlɛ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa sʋ mʋ, ɔ man lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ ifuli.
43019039	Gyosefu maa Nikodemusi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɩna kpee naa wu Yesu kagyanbwɛ kʋ mʋ i kpee. Nikodemusi maŋa bɩya tulale mʋ nɩɩ ba taa mɩɩrɛ yɛ kibondiri waa, nɩɩ ba sʋ ba sʋswa abuni mʋ. Ɩmʋ odu ɩ waa fɛɛ akyembee bɔɔta kʋlʋn.
43019040	Anyɩn anyɔ mʋ ba taa Yesu kibuni mʋ, nɩɩ ba taa taafuli mili mʋ, nɩɩ ba bɔ mʋ tulale fɛɛ kanɩn mʋ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi bɛɛ waa bamʋ obuni, pɔyɩ nɩɩ bee pula mʋ.
43019041	Kadɔɔ‐bi kʋ bʋ tiri katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba da Yesu anyenbi mata oyu laasa sʋ mʋ. Kanɩn kadɔɔ‐bi maŋa tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ba lɔŋɔ kakyan kʋ kʋfʋlɛ tɔ yɩla, nɩɩ ba man pɩɩta pula ɔkʋ kɩmʋ tɔ.
43019042	Lɩɩ fɛɛ kanɩn kakɛ maŋa maa gyɛ Gyiwu abi kakɛ kʋlasa sa Kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ kakyan mʋ maa tiri tʋtɔ sʋ mʋ, ba taa Yesu naa pula tʋtɔ.
43020001	Kwasida akɛ kabwaayɩkɛ ɩ maa man pɩɩ ŋmaŋɛ tɔ mʋ, Mɛɛrɩ Magidalen kpee kakyan mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ o wu fɛɛ ba lɛɛ kubuu mʋ nɩɩ ba gbiliti ba tii kɩfʋlɛ tɔ kakyan mʋ kɔnɔ mʋ.
43020002	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ sɩlɛ bwii kpee Simon Pita yɛ ɔbɩɩlapʋ banban mʋ nɩɩ Yesu su kebiti sa mʋ mʋ asɛ, naa tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ba taa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ lɩɩ kakyan mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ a man nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba taa mʋ naa yɩla.”
43020003	Ɩmʋ sʋ Pita maa ɔbɩɩlapʋ banban mʋ ba lɩɩ bee kpee kakyan mʋ asɛ.
43020004	Nɩɩ bamʋ anyɔ maa kpini ba sɩlɛ kyɛɛkyɛɛ bee kpee, amaa ɔbɩɩlapʋ banban mʋ sɩlɛ kyʋn Pita sʋ gyankpaa naa fʋʋ kakyan mʋ asɛ.
43020005	Nɩɩ o muŋa kɩɩ kakyan mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ o wu taafuli maa dɛ tɔ, amaa ɔ man loo to.
43020006	Nɩɩ Simon Pita ba kamaa tɔ, nɩɩ o loo kakyan mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ o wu taafuli maa dɛ tʋtɔ,
43020007	yɛ kikyibi fufuli mʋ nɩɩ ba taa ŋmina mu kumu mʋ. Kikyibi mʋ kɩ bɔɔ kɩ dɛ kɩmʋ kʋkwɛ.
43020008	Ɔbɩɩlapʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyankpaa fʋʋ tʋtɔ gbaa maa loo to nɩɩ o wu ɩmʋ mʋ, ɔ kɔɔlɛ gyii.
43020009	Ba san ba man pɩɩta nu Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ kasɛ fɛɛ Yesu dagaa maa kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ.
43020010	Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba bwii kpee bamʋ akpaara sʋ.
43020011	Amaa Mɛɛrɩ bɩrɛ ɔ yɩlɛ kakyan mʋ asɛ ee su. Maa yɩlɛ ee su mʋ, nɩɩ o muŋa suŋa kɩɩ kakyan mʋ tɔ.
43020012	Nɩɩ o wu Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ anyɔ yɛgɛ ba bun atɔ fufuli, ba maa tɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba daa taa Yesu kibuni yɩla mʋ, ɔkʋ tɛ mu amu sʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɔɔ tɛ mʋ ayaa kasɛ.
43020013	Ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkyɩɩ, mɩnɛ waa nɩɩ fii su?” Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ba taa mɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ kyʋn, nɩɩ n man nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba taa mʋ naa yɩla.”
43020014	Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, ɔ gbɛɛ kɩɩ nɩɩ o wu Yesu maa yɩlɛ tʋtɔ, amaa ɔ man bɩɩ yɛ Yesu nɩn.
43020015	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkyɩɩ, mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fii su? Anɩmʋ nɩɩ fii biti?” Mɛɛrɩ maa fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ɔ gyɛ kʋdɔɔ mʋ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ, ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔbɩlɩsa, nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ fʋ ɩ kan taa mʋ mʋ, tɔwɛ mɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ fʋ taa mʋ naa yɩla kɛ n naa taa mʋ.”
43020016	Yesu tɩɩ mʋ yɛ, “Mɛɛrɩ!” Maa biliŋi kɩɩ mʋ, o kuusi tɔwɛ Hibriwu katɔwɛ tɔ yɛ, “Raboni!” (kɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ ɔkaapʋpʋ).
43020017	Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Man mata mɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ n man pɩɩta bwii kpee Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ asɛ. Amaa kpee mi abuupu mʋ asɛ naa tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, n bwii n kpee Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ fanɛ‐Sɛ, yɛ mɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ asɛ.”
43020018	Nɩɩ Mɛɛrɩ Magidalen bwii kpee abɩɩlapʋ mʋ asɛ naa tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N wu Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ”! Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ tɔwɛ mʋ mʋ.
43020019	Kwasida maŋa kalaatɩpwɛ sʋ mʋ, abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba bʋ obu to, nɩɩ ba tii ɔpʋnʋ mʋ biri bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ waa tɔ, lɩɩ ba maa sɩlɛ Gyiwu abɩlɩsa mʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ Yesu ba yɩlɛ bamʋ nsana, nɩɩ ɔ fwaala bamʋ yɛ, “Kayɩɩ yuuli kɩ ba fanɛ asɛ!”
43020020	Maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ abaa yɛ mu kikelebi kaapʋ bamʋ. Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ mu ansi i gyii fɛɛ ba maa wu Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ.
43020021	Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Kayɩɩ yuuli kɩ ba fanɛ asɛ. Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Mɛ‐Sɛ sun mɛ mʋ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n sun fanɛ.”
43020022	Nɩɩ ɔ fʋʋtɛ bun bamʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan kɔɔlɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ.
43020023	Nɩɩ fan kan taa ɔkʋ alibi kɛɛ mʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa ii biti ɔ taa mu alibi kɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fan man kan taa mu alibi kɛɛ mʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa mɛɛ yɛ ɔ taa mu alibi kɛɛ mʋ.”
43020024	Tomasi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ abɩɩlapʋ kudu anyɔ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ, nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Kabwaarabi mʋ, ɔ man bʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ asɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu ba bamʋ asɛ mʋ.
43020025	Ɩmʋ sʋ abɩɩlapʋ banban mʋ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “An wu Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ.” Amaa ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ n man kan wu anyenbi alɔpanɛ mʋ abaa tɔ, kɛ n taa mɛ kɩbaa‐bi yii ɩmʋ tɔ, kɛ n taa mɛ kɩbaa yii mʋ kikelebi tɔ mʋ, n mɛɛ yɛ n kɔɔlɛ gyii.”
43020026	Ɩmʋ nkɛ nsunɔ kamaa mʋ, abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba bɩla ba bʋ kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ, yɛgɛ Tomasi bʋ bamʋ asɛ. Ba tii bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ biri sʋ waa obu to. Ba ba kɩɩ mʋ, Yesu ba yɩlɛ bamʋ nsana, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Kayɩɩ yuula ɩ ba fanɛ sʋ!”
43020027	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ Tomasi yɛ, “Taa fʋ kɩbaa‐bi yii nfɩɩ, kɛ fʋ kɩɩ mɛ abaa tɔ. Tɛɛŋɛ fʋ kɩbaa yii mɛ kikelebi tɔ. Yɛgɛ sika‐sika kɩwaa kɛ fʋ kɔɔlɛ gyii.”
43020028	Nɩɩ Tomasi tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ mɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ yɛ mɛ Ɩbwaarɛ.”
43020029	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Tomasi, fʋ maa wu mɛ sʋ nɩɩ fʋ kɔɔlɛ gyii? Kusee ɩ gyɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man wu mɛ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ gyii.”
43020030	Yesu waa ɩsɩnkaala gaalaagaa abɩɩlapʋ mu ansi tɔ, mʋ nɩɩ ba man kyʋrɔɔ ɩmʋ waa ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ tɔ.
43020031	Amaa ba kyʋrɔɔ ɩnɩmʋ nɩn, kɛ fan nyɛ kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ Yesu ɩ gyɛ Krisito, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ, nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ. Nɩɩ fan kan kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii mʋ, fen biti fan nyɛ nkpa.
43021001	Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, Yesu bɩla lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ ɔbʋn lala mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Tiberiya mʋ kɔnɔ. Falɛ nɩɩ ɩ ba.
43021002	Kakaakʋ abɩɩlapʋ mʋ akʋ ba baa ba bʋ katɩn kʋlʋn. Bamʋ ɩ gyɛ Simon Pita maa Tomasi mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ Kabwaarabi mʋ, yɛ Nataneli mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Kena, yɛ Sebedi mu‐bii ana anyɔ yɛ abɩɩlapʋ anyɔ akʋ.
43021003	Nɩɩ Simon Pita tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “N kpee n naa kɩtaa ɩkɩn.” Nɩɩ ngbaa bamʋ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “An biti a buu fʋ kpee.” Nɩɩ bamʋ kpini ba naa loo ɔkʋlɩ tɔ, amaa kanɩn kagyanbwɛ maŋa ba man kɩtaa sɛhn.
43021004	Kayɩ maa kɛ nyenyenfuu mʋ, Yesu ba nɩɩ ɔ yɩlɛ ɔlɩɩkaa, amaa abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ba man bɩɩ yɛ mʋ nɩn.
43021005	Nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana, fan man kɩtaa ɩkɩn?” Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ayee, a man kɩtaa sɛhn.”
43021006	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan tʋʋ fanɛ kisewu mʋ ɔkʋlɩ mʋ gyisa sʋ, fen biti fan nyɛ akʋ kɩtaa.” Ba maa tʋʋ kisewu mʋ, ba kɩtaa ɩkɩn damantɛ, halɩɩ ba man taalɛ bɩɩtɛ kisewu mʋ waa ɔkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ.
43021007	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔbɩɩlapʋ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu ii biti mʋ asɩn gaa mʋ tɔwɛ Pita yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ nɩn.” Simon maa nu yɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ kaalɛ lala mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla lɛɛ yɩla mʋ bun, nɩɩ ɔ kpɩlɩgɛ loo nkyu mʋ tɔ ba kidenbi sʋ.
43021008	Nɩɩ abɩɩlapʋ asansa mʋ ba palɛ ɔkʋlɩ mʋ buu mʋ, yɛgɛ bɛɛ bɩɩtɛ kisewu mʋ yɛ ɩkɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba maa kebunɔ mʋ ba man bʋ kata. Ɩmʋ kata ɩ waa fɛɛ abaa nswɩɩ tɔ adunuu.
43021009	Ba maa dan mʋ, ba wu ɔkɩn maa gyan afʋlɔn‐gyi sʋ yɛgɛ bodobodo dɛ tʋtɔ.
43021010	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan taa ɩkɩn mʋ nɩɩ fan dan kɩtaa mʋ akʋ ba.”
43021011	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Simon Pita loo ɔkʋlɩ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ bɩɩtɛ kisewu mʋ ba kidenbi sʋ. Ɩkɩn lala mʋ nɩɩ ba bɔla kɩmʋ mʋ ba gyɛ kɩlɩfa kʋlʋn yɛ adunuu yɛ asa, amaa halɩɩ ɩkɩn damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba bɔla kɩmʋ falɛ gbaa mʋ kisewu mʋ kɩ man kyatɛ.
43021012	Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan ba biri kɔnɔ.” Amaa abɩɩlapʋ mʋ ɔkʋ man taalɛ nyɛ kɔkɔlɔ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ anɩmʋ?” Yɛgɛ be nyi yɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ nɩn.
43021013	Nɩɩ Yesu naa taa bodobodo mʋ sa bamʋ, nɩɩ kanɩn gbaa nɩɩ ɔ taa ɔkɩn mʋ sa bamʋ.
43021014	Yesu maa kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ, kɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ kɩsasapʋ maa lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ mʋ abɩɩlapʋ.
43021015	Ba maa biri kɔnɔ lʋwɛ mʋ, Yesu taasɛ Simon Pita yɛ, “Simon, Gyɔn mu‐bii, fii biti mɛ fʋ kyɔ kanan mʋ nɩɩ banɩmʋ bee biti mɛ mʋ?” Nɩɩ Pita lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɛɛhn Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, fu nyi n maa sʋ kebiti sa fʋ.” Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Sa mɛ nbʋlʋpʋ‐bi mʋ agyitɔ.”
43021016	Nɩɩ Yesu bɩla taasɛ mʋ kɩnyɔsapʋ yɛ, “Simon, Gyɔn mu‐bii, fʋ sʋ kebiti sa mɛ?” Nɩɩ Simon lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, fu nyi n maa sʋ kebiti sa fʋ.” Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kɩɩ mɛ nbʋlʋpʋ sʋ.”
43021017	Nɩɩ Yesu taasɛ mʋ kɩlɩɩ sasapʋ yɛ, “Simon, Gyɔn mu‐bii, fʋ sʋ kebiti sa mɛ?” Nɩɩ ɩ tɔɔrɔɔ Pita fɛɛ Yesu maa taasɛ mʋ ɩlɩɩ ɩsa yɛ, “Fʋ sʋ kebiti sa mɛ.” Nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, fu nyi kʋtɔ kʋmaa, fu nyi n maa sʋ kebiti sa fʋ.” Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Sa mɛ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ agyitɔ.
43021018	N tɔwɛ fʋ kesintin, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ gyɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ, fii bun fʋ atɔ bunsa, nɩɩ fii kpee katɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fii biti, amaa fʋ ba waa kɩnyɩn bɩlɩsa mʋ, fɩɩ tɛɛŋɛ fʋ abaa tɔ kɛ ɔkʋ o bun fʋ, kɛ ɔ taa fʋ kpee katɩn mʋ nɩɩ fii mee biti.”
43021019	Yesu tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ nɩn kaapʋ lewu mʋ nɩɩ Pita ii biti o be wu mu kedubi, kɛ ɩ lɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ bʋnyaa kaapʋ. Yesu maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Buu mɛ!”
43021020	Pita maa biliŋi mu ansi kɩɩ mʋ, o wu fɛɛ ɔbɩɩlapʋ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu sʋ kebiti sa mʋ mʋ, buu bamʋ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ ɔ kpɛɛ Yesu saŋa mʋ nɩɩ bee gyii kalaatɩpwɛ sʋ agyitɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ Yesu yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, anɩmʋ ii biti ɔ lɛɛ fʋ sa mʋ?”
43021021	Pita maa wu mʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, ɔnɩmʋ mɔɔ de?”
43021022	Nɩɩ Yesu lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nɩɩ n kan n biti yɛ ɔ baa ɔ tɛ nkpa tɔ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n biti n bwii ba mʋ, ɩ gyɛ fʋ asɩn? Fɛɛ fʋ buu mɛ.”
43021023	Lɩɩ falɛ sʋ mʋ, asɩn nɩmʋ a yaasɛ tɔ loo kpee Krisito abuupu kpini asɛ fɛɛ, ɔbɩɩlapʋ nɩmʋ man bʋ tɔ o wu. Amaa Yesu man tɔwɛ yɛ ɔ mɛɛ yɛ o wu. Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ n kan n biti yɛ ɔ baa ɔ tɛ nkpa tɔ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ mʋ nɩɩ n biti n bwii ba mʋ, ɩ gyɛ fʋ asɩn?”
43021024	Ɔbɩɩlapʋ nɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mʋ nɩɩ ee gyii asɩn nɩmʋ kesintin, nɩɩ mʋ ɩ kyʋrɔɔ ɩmʋ yɩla. Nɩɩ an nyi fɛɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ gyɛ kesintin.
43021025	Yesu waa atɔ gaalaagaa tii sʋ. Nɩɩ ba daa kyʋrɔɔ ɩmʋ kpini yɩla nɩn, naafɔɔ ɩwʋlɛ mʋ ii biti i tiri dulinyaa tɔ, nɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ nyɛ opula yɩlakpa.
44001001	Ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ lɩɩ mɛ Luka asɛ kɩ ba fʋ Tiyofilosi asɛ. Mɛ ɔwʋlɛ gyankpaasa mʋ tɔ mʋ, n kyʋrɔɔ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu kaapʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ kpini, lɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ o yii mu kusun kasɛ mʋ,
44001002	naa fʋʋ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa mʋ kyʋn sʋsʋ mʋ. Pɔyɩ kɛ ɔ taa mʋ kpee sʋsʋ mʋ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu bɔla Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ sʋ kaapʋ mu asunpu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ bamʋ mʋ, atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba waa.
44001003	Yesu kelewu kamaa nkɛ adɩna mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɔ lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ mu asunpu fɛɛ ɔ tɛ nkpa tɔ, nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ kamɔɔrɛ‐gyii. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ asɩn.
44001004	Maa bamʋ ba maa nsarɛ bee gyii kakaakʋ mʋ, ɔ sa bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Fan man kan waa lɩɩ Gyerusalem, amaa fan gyoo fanɛ kɛkɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ n wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, Nsɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɛ ee biti ɔ sa fanɛ mʋ.
44001005	Nkyu nɩɩ Gyɔn sʋ ee gyee fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee, amaa nkɛ gbɛrɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba falɛ tɔ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ taa mʋ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ gyee fanɛ.”
44001006	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ asunpu mʋ ba maa Yesu ba bwii sarɛ mʋ, ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩɩ fii biti fu bwii taa kuwura‐gyii mʋ sa anɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi abɛɛ?”
44001007	Nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Saŋa abɛɛ kakɛ yɛ mʋ awaasa mʋ kpini mʋ, mɛ‐Sɛ ɩ yɩla ɩmʋ lɩɩ mʋ ɔlʋn tɔ sʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ man tiri fɛɛ fan bɩɩ saŋa mʋ.
44001008	Amaa nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ kan ba fanɛ sʋ mʋ, fen biti fan nyɛ ɔlʋn kɛ fan naa tɔwɛ mɛ asɩn mʋ Gyerusalem tɔ yɛ Gyudeya kpini yɛ Samariya tɔ, taa naa fʋʋ dulinyaa ɔkaa.”
44001009	Maa tɔwɛ ɩ nɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ taa mʋ kpee sʋsʋ bamʋ ansi tɔ, nɩɩ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ a bun mʋ sʋ lɩɩ bamʋ ansi sʋ.
44001010	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ sʋ mʋ ii kpee yɛgɛ bɛɛ kɩɩ sʋsʋ haa mʋ, opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ anyɩn anyɔ akʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bun atɔ fufuli ba ba yɩlɛ bamʋ asɛ,
44001011	nɩɩ ba taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Galile abi, mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fan yɩlɛ nfɩɩ fɛn kɩɩ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ tɔ kanɩn? Yesu mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa mʋ lɩɩ fanɛ asɛ kpee sʋsʋ mʋ, kanɩn nɩɩ ee biti o bwii ba fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan kɩɩ mʋ maa kpee sʋsʋ falɛ.”
44001012	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ asunpu mʋ ba lɩɩ Olifu kɩbɩɩ mʋ asɛ bwii ba Gyerusalem, ɩ man bʋ kata kpini‐kpini.
44001013	Ba maa loo Gyerusalem kadɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, ba dii naa loo abansʋrʋ obu, mʋ nɩɩ ba wʋla ba bʋ kɩmʋ tɔ mʋ. Asunpu mʋ ɩ gyɛ Pita maa Gyɔn, yɛ Gyemisi yɛ Andiruwu yɛ Filipu yɛ Tomasi yɛ Batolome yɛ Matiwu yɛ Alifeyo mu‐bii Gyemisi maa Simon Seloti mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɔ bee kun bamʋ ɔsʋwʋlɛ mʋ bamʋ ɔkʋ, yɛ Gyemisi mu‐bii Gyudasi.
44001014	Bamʋ kpini ba taalɛ ba bʋga saŋa kʋmaa yɛ akyɩɩ akʋ yɛ Yesu mu‐nyi yɛ mu‐supu ana.
44001015	Nkɛ nfɩnɛ nkʋ kamaa tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ Krisito akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu bɛɛ waa fɛɛ asa kɩlɩfa yɛ adʋnyɔ ba ba sarɛ, nɩɩ Pita kʋsʋ yɩlɛ,
44001016	nɩɩ o yii kasɛ yɛ, “Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ bɔla owura Dawidi sʋ wʋla tɔwɛ yɩla yɛ Gyudasi ii biti ɔ gyankpaa kɛ ba kɩtaa Yesu mʋ, ɩ dagaa ɩ ba kanɩn.
44001017	Gyudasi kyɩna ɔ gyɛ anɛ kʋbʋ kudu‐anyɔ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ nɩn, nɩɩ ɔ sʋ ɔyɩlɛkpa kusun mʋ tɔ.
44001018	“Afulee mʋ nɩɩ Gyudasi nyɛ lɩɩ mu alibi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa sʋ mʋ, ɔ sɔɔ kasɛ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩyɛ ketulaamu nɩɩ o wu, ɔ patɩyɛ nɩɩ mʋ ipuni kpini ɩ patɩyɛ lɩɩ.
44001019	Gyerusalem abi kpini ba nu asɩn nɩmʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ba yɩla ɔsʋwʋlɛ mʋ kɩtɩɩ bamʋ katɔwɛ tɔ yɛ Akeledama, kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, ‘Nkalan kasɛ.’ ”
44001020	Nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ yɛ owura Dawidi wʋla kyʋrɔɔ Gyudasi asɩn waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Mʋ kɩkpaara ki biliŋi kɩtakpan, kɛ ɔkʋ ɔ man kyɩna kɩmʋ tɔ.” Nɩɩ Dawidi bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ba yɛgɛ kɛ ɔkʋ o yii mu kusun kɩbɩlɩsa mʋ ayaa tɔ.”
44001021	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ a lɛɛ anɛ asa mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ ba tii anɛ sʋ. An biti ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla ɔ bʋ anɛ asɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ anaa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu an dii an kpɩlɩgɛ mʋ,
44001022	lɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Gyɔn okyugyeepu gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee, naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa Yesu kpee sʋsʋ. Ɩ dagaa fɛɛ kanɩn asa maŋa tɔ ɔkʋ maa tii anɛ sʋ fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu kelewu kyiŋi kesintin ogyipu.
44001023	Ɩmʋ sʋ ba lɛɛ asa anyɔ yɛ ba yɩlɛ. Bamʋ ɩ gyɛ Gyosefu mʋ nɩɩ bɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Basabasi, nɩɩ ba bɩla bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ Gyusitu, nɩɩ ɔbanban mʋ mɔɔ gyɛ Matiyasi.
44001024	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, fu nyi ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ fii biti fʋ kaapʋ anɛ asa anyɔ anɩmʋ tɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ fʋ lɛɛ.
44001025	Kɛ ɔ ba waa fu asunpu mʋ kusun mʋ nɩɩ Gyudasi yɛgɛ yɩla mʋ, kpee katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa mʋ mʋ.”
44001026	Nɩɩ ba tʋʋ nbii biti ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ ba tii bamʋ sʋ, nɩɩ Matiyasi gyii, nɩɩ ba taa mʋ tii bamʋ asunpu kudu‐ɔkʋ mʋ sʋ.
44002001	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi Pentekosi kakɛ gyisa maa fʋʋ mʋ, Krisito akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ kpini ba ba sarɛ opula kʋlʋn.
44002002	Opula tɔ nɩɩ ɩlawʋ ɩkʋ ɩ lɩɩ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ tɔ a maa kpira fɛɛ afuu bʋlʋnsa akʋ a maa da ba loo kɩkpaara mʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ kɩmʋ sʋ mʋ kpini.
44002003	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba wu atɔ kʋ fɛɛ fʋlɔn anobi a maa yaasɛ ba gyaga ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ sʋ.
44002004	Nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ bɔla bamʋ kpini tɔ, nɩɩ bamʋ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ yii kasɛ ɛɛ tɔwɛ katɔwɛ pʋpwɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ kɩ sa bamʋ yɛ ba tɔwɛ mʋ.
44002005	Saŋa maŋa tɔ mʋ Gyiwu abi akʋ mʋ nɩɩ be sun Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, ba lɩɩ dulinyaa tɔ ɩsʋwʋlɛ kpini sʋ ba baa ba bʋ Gyerusalem tʋtɔ.
44002006	Ba maa kanan ɩlawʋ maŋa mʋ, nɩɩ kʋbʋ damantɛ kʋkʋ kɩ sarɛ. Ɩ waa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kɩyan, kpalɩ fɛɛ bamʋ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ nu akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ kpini ba maa tɔwɛ asa mʋ bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kadɛ tɔwɛsa.
44002007	Ɩ waa bamʋ kanankʋ, nɩɩ ba taasɛ yɛ, “Asa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ falɛ mʋ, ba man gyɛ Galile abi nɩn abɛɛ?
44002008	Ɩ waa nɛnɛ sʋ nɩɩ anɛ kpini an nu ba maa tɔwɛ anɛ ntɔwɛ nusa?
44002009	Anɛ kpini an lɩɩ‐lɩɩ ndɛ kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ fɛɛ, Patiya yɛ Medeya yɛ Elam yɛ Mesopotamiya yɛ Gyudeya yɛ Kapadosiya yɛ Pontisi yɛ Asiya yɛ
44002010	Firigiya yɛ Panfiliya yɛ Egyipiti yɛ Libiya kɩbaafʋn mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ ki tiri Sereni, nɩɩ Gyiwu abi yɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba biliŋi Gyiwu abi, nɩɩ bamʋ kpini ba lɩɩ Roma mʋ.
44002011	Anɛ akʋ an lɩɩ Kereti nɩɩ anɛ akʋ mɔɔ an lɩɩ Arabiki. Anɛ kpini an nu asa anɩmʋ ntɔwɛ tɔ ba maa tɔwɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ waa.”
44002012	Ɩ maa waa bamʋ kɩyan nɩɩ ɩ kɩtaa bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ, nɩɩ bɛ taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ kasɛ ɩɩ kaapʋ?”
44002013	Amaa yɛgɛ akʋ mɔɔ be keesi akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Asa maŋa ba bʋʋ nɩn.”
44002014	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Pita maa asunpu kudu‐ɔkʋ bambam mʋ, ba kʋsʋ yɩlɛ nɩɩ Pita diyaa mʋ ɔbʋlɛ sʋsʋ kenken ɔ tɔwɛ ɛɛ sa kʋbʋ mʋ yɛ, “Mɛ tɔmaa ana Gyiwu abi yɛ ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ Gyerusalem mʋ kpini, fan kan fanɛ asʋ kɛ n lɛɛ ɩnɩmʋ kasɛ sa fanɛ.
44002015	Asa anɩmʋ ba man bʋʋ nɩn, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan fɛ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ falɛ, ɩ dan san ɩ gyɛ kerefi akpanɔ nyanyan nɩmʋ.
44002016	Amaa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ ba falɛ ɩ gyɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Gyoweli wʋla tɔwɛ ɩmʋ asɩn yɛ,
44002017	‘Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ yɩla yɛ nkɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ, n biti n yɛgɛ mɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ɔ ba asa kpini sʋ. N biti n bɔla fanɛ nbii‐nyɩnsa yɛ akyɩɩsa sʋ kɛ n tɔwɛ asɩn. Fanɛ ayaafɔlɛ bee biti be wu ansi sʋ kɩlɛɛkaapʋ, kɛ fanɛ anyɩn bɩlɩsa bɛ kɔɔ idee.
44002018	Kakɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ n biti n yɛgɛ mɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ɔ sa fanɛ ayaafɔlɛ yɛ abite kɛ ba tɔwɛ mɛ asɩn.
44002019	N biti n waa asɩn kyinkyinsa sʋsʋ, kɛ n waa ɩsɩnkaala kasɛ sʋ. Nkalan yɛ fʋlɔn yɛ idiisii ii biti ɩ waa kudu‐kudu.
44002020	Kyɔwɛ ii biti o biliŋi kitentenbiri, kɛ ɔbwaayɩ ɔ payɩ fɛɛ nkalan, pɔyɩ kɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kakɛ bʋnyaa lala mʋ kɩ ba.
44002021	Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩtɩɩ mʋ, ee biti ɔ mɔlɩgɛ mʋ.’
44002022	“Mɛ asa Ɩsɩrayɩ abi fan bɩla nu asɩn nɩmʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ Yesu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Kanasareti‐nyɩn yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɔ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa yɛ ɩsɩnkaala yɛ adangana nɩɩ ɩ kaapʋ tɔ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ i sun mʋ. Nɩɩ fanɛ kpini fen nyi ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa falɛ.
44002023	Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ o nyi kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ kyula, nɩɩ o ŋmina yɩla fɛɛ bee biti ba lɛɛ Yesu sa fanɛ, nɩɩ ɩ ba kanɩn. Fan yɛgɛ nɩɩ asa libi ba da Yesu anyenbi mata oyu laasa sʋ nɩɩ ba mɔɔ mʋ.
44002024	Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ kyiŋi mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ, lɛɛ mʋ lɩɩ lewu awʋrʋfɔ tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ lewu man taalɛ tii mʋ yɩla.
44002025	Dawidi wʋla tɔwɛ Yesu n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn yɛ, ‘Saŋa kʋmaa nɩmʋ, n wu Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mi ansi sʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ o tii mɛ sʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ sɛhn mɛɛ tɔɔrɔɔ mɛ.
44002026	Ɩnɩmʋ sʋ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ ki fuuli mɛ, nɩɩ kensi‐gyii kɩ bɔla mɛ atɔwɛsa tɔ, nɩɩ halɩɩ n wu gbaa mʋ, n sʋ tamaa.
44002027	Lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ mɛɛ yɛ fʋ yɛgɛ mɛ kala o sii kamandɛ, nɩɩ fʋ mɛɛ yɛ fʋ yɛgɛ fʋ Ɔkyɩrɛkyɩrɛpʋ ɔ gyɔɔ nyita.
44002028	Fʋ kaapʋ mɛ nkpa ɔkpa, nɩɩ fʋ bʋ mɛ asɛ, ɩmʋ sʋ n nyɛ kensi‐gyii gaa.’
44002029	“Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, fɛn yɛgɛ n lɛɛ anɛ naana Dawidi nɩmʋ asɩn kaapʋ fanɛ. Dawidi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ gbaa wu nɩn, nɩɩ ba pula mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ kakyan kɛ san kɩ dɛ anɛ asɛ.
44002030	Amaa ɔ dan ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ nɩn, nɩɩ o nyi fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔ ntan da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɛ ee biti ɔ yɛgɛ mʋ kɩnaana tɔ ɔkʋ ɔ ba kyɩna mʋ Dawidi kuwura‐gya sʋ.
44002031	Dawidi wʋla wu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ waa, kanɩn sʋ ɔ tɔwɛ Krisito kiwu kyiŋi mʋ asɩn yɛ, ‘Ɔ man yɛgɛ nɩɩ o sii abuni tɔ, nɩɩ mu kibuni man gyɔɔ kakyan tɔ.’
44002032	Yesu nɩmʋ asɩn nɩɩ Dawidi tɔwɛ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ kyiŋi mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ. Anɛ kpini ɩ gyɛ ɩmʋ kesintin agyipu.
44002033	Nɩɩ mʋ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ diyaa mʋ yɩla mʋ gyisa sʋ, sa mʋ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ mʋ. Ɩmʋ nɩɩ fen nu, nɩɩ fen wu falɛ ɩ gyɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sa anɛ.
44002034	Dawidi gbaa‐gbaa man kpee sʋsʋ, amaa ɔ tɔwɛ fɛɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ tɔwɛ sa mɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ yɛ, “Kyɩna mɛ gyisa sʋ,
44002035	amɔɔ n taa fu akisipu kpini waa fʋ ayaa kasɛ.” ’
44002036	“Fanɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi kpini, fan nu danbɩrasa fɛɛ, Yesu nɩmʋ, mʋ nɩɩ fan da mʋ oyu laasa sʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ waa mʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ yɛ Krisito nɩɩ ɩɩ kaapʋ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ.”
44002037	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ asa mʋ ba nu ɩnɩmʋ kanɩn mʋ, i loo bamʋ nkɔlɔ tɔ, nɩɩ ba taasɛ Pita maa asunpu bambam mʋ yɛ, “Anɛ‐daa ana, mɩnɛ nɩɩ an biti a waa?”
44002038	Nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa, kɛ ba gyee mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee lɩɩ Yesu Krisito kɩtɩɩ tɔ, kɛ fan nyɛ alibi kɩtaakɛɛ, kɛ fan nyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kakɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ mʋ Kayaayu mʋ.
44002039	Ɩnɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ sa fanaa fanɛ‐bii ana mʋ, yɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kata‐kata mʋ kpini, bamʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ anɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ tɩɩ ba mʋ asɛ mʋ.”
44002040	Nɩɩ Pita gyii bamʋ kesintin bwii tɔwɛ ntɔwɛ gaalaagaa waa bamʋ aniya tɔ yɛ, “Fan lɛɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ ndaga asa libi nɩmʋ tɔ.”
44002041	Asa mʋ gaalaagaa ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ asɩn mʋ gyii nɩɩ ba gyee bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee. Asa mʋ nɩɩ ba be tii kʋbʋ mʋ sʋ kakɛ maŋa mʋ ba waa fɛɛ asa ngbɩn nsa.
44002042	Nɩɩ bamʋ kpini bɛ bɩɩla bɛɛ lɩɩ asunpu mʋ asɛ, ba sʋ kakyɛmɩnɛ ɔkɔn yɛ abaa, nɩɩ bee gyii Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ agyitɔ, nɩɩ bɛɛ bʋga bɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ.
44002043	Asunpu mʋ ba waa ɩsɩnkaala yɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa gaalaagaa, nɩɩ asɩn mʋ ɩ waa ɔkʋmaa anɩmʋ kɩyan.
44002044	Akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ kpini bɛɛ bʋga katɩn kʋlʋn, nɩɩ ba sʋ kɔnɔ kʋlʋn, yɛgɛ bamʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ gyɛ bamʋ kpini lɛɛ.
44002045	Bɛɛ fɛ bamʋ npatɩyɛ yɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ mʋ kpini, kɛ ba barɩgɛ afulee mʋ tɔ sa abaa kanan kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ i tiri ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ.
44002046	Kakɛ kʋmaa nɩmʋ bɛɛ naa sarɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ kasɔrɔga tɔ fɛɛ kɩbʋlɛ kʋlʋn, bɛɛ bʋga nɩn bee gyii Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ agyitɔ bamʋ akpaara sʋ, nɩɩ bɛɛ bʋga bee gyii bamʋ gbaa‐gbaa bamʋ agyitɔ kensi‐gyii yɛ nkɔlɔ fuuli,
44002047	yɛgɛ bɛɛ yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ bamʋ awaasa kpini a gyii asa ansi. Nɩɩ kakɛ kʋmaa nɩmʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ sʋ bamʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ mɔlɩgɛ mʋ, ee tii bamʋ Krisito abi kʋbʋ mʋ sʋ.
44003001	Kakaakʋ ɩ waa fɛɛ kakyʋwapɛ kerefi asa nɩɩ Pita maa Gyɔn bee kpee kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa tɔ ba naa kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ.
44003002	Kewusunɔ Danbɩrasa, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ kɩmʋ mʋ, tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba naa tu ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ yɛgɛ ɔ gyɛ boobi maa tɛ. Kakɛ kʋmaa bɛɛ sʋla mʋ bee kpee naa yɩla tʋtɔ yɛgɛ ɛɛ kʋlɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ bee kpee kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ afulee.
44003003	Maa wu Pita maa Gyɔn ba maa biti ba loo tʋtɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kʋlɛ bamʋ yɛ ba sa mu afulee.
44003004	Nɩɩ Pita maa Gyɔn ba kɩɩ mʋ kyimm, nɩɩ Pita yɛ, “Diyaa ansi kɩɩ anɛ danbɩrasa.”
44003005	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ kɩɩ bamʋ kyimm, nɩɩ ɔ waa nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ee biti ɔ nyɛ kʋtɔ kʋ lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ.
44003006	Amaa Pita tɔwɛ mʋ nɩn yɛ, “Man sʋ afulee kpini‐kpini mɛ asɛ, amaa n biti n sa fʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ. Lɩɩ Yesu Krisito Kanasareti‐nyɩn kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ mʋ n yɛ fʋ, kʋsʋ natɛ.”
44003007	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Pita kɩtaa mʋ gyisa kɩbaa tɔ kyɛ mʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ. Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ ayaa yɛ mu amulii ɩ waa ɔlʋn,
44003008	nɩɩ o fugi yii mʋ ayaa sʋ, o piili ɔ naa. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ maa bamʋ ba loo obu mʋ kasɔrɔga tɔ, ɔ naa ee fugi yɛgɛ ɛɛ yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ.
44003009	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ asa mʋ kpini ba wu mʋ maa naa ɛɛ yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ,
44003010	nɩɩ ba bɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ boobi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ kewusunɔ Danbɩrasa ɛɛ kʋlɛ afulee mʋ, ɩ waa bamʋ kɩyan, nɩɩ ɩ waa bamʋ kanankʋ maa kʋsʋ ɔ naa mʋ.
44003011	Lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ ba Pita maa Gyɔn asɛ sʋ mʋ, ɩ waa asa mʋ kanankʋ nɩɩ ba sɩlɛ kpee bamʋ asɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛ tɩɩ yɛ Solomon lenbu mʋ.
44003012	Pita maa wu asa mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩsɩrayɩ abi, mɩnɛ ɩ yɛgɛ sʋ nɩɩ asɩn nɩmʋ a waa fanɛ kanankʋ? Nɩɩ mɩnɛ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fan kɩɩ anɛ gbaa fɛɛ anɛ gbaa‐gbaa anɛ ɔlʋn yɛ anɛ kabwaarɛ‐sun ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ kʋsʋ ɔ naa falɛ?
44003013	Ɩ gyɛ anɛ naana Abraham maa Isaki maa Gyekobu bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ, ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ anɛ naana ana kpini Ɩbwaarɛ, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sa mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ Yesu bʋnyaa kparɛ. Mʋ maŋa nɩɩ fan taa mʋ sa agyankpaapʋ, nɩɩ fan kina mʋ Paleti ansi tɔ, yɛgɛ Paleti waa mʋ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ee biti ɔ yɛgɛ mʋ.
44003014	Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋrɔn nɩɩ o du kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ, mʋ, nɩɩ fan kina, nɩɩ fan kpalɩ ɩmʋ sʋ tɔwɛ Paleti yɛ ɔ yɛgɛ asa ɔmɔɔpʋ mʋ sa fanɛ.
44003015	Fan taa Yesu mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ sa nkpa mʋ mɔɔ, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ kyiŋi mʋ ba nkpa tɔ. Anɛ ɩ gyɛ asɩn maŋa kesintin agyipu.
44003016	Lɩɩ Yesu Krisito kɩtɩɩ tɔ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ, nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn boobi mʋ nɩɩ fen nyi nɩɩ fen wu mʋ falɛ nyɛ alanfɩya. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ maa kɔɔlɛ Yesu Krisito kɩtɩɩ gyii sʋ mʋ, ɔ kpaarɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fen wu mʋ falɛ.
44003017	“Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, nbɩɩnbɩɩ n bɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ yɛ fanɛ agyankpaapʋ ba waa Yesu falɛ, ɩ lɩɩ fanɛ kɩman‐nyi sʋ.
44003018	Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla bɔla mʋ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ kpini sʋ tɔwɛ asɩn nɩmʋ fɛɛ, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ ii biti o wu awʋrʋfɔ gaa, nɩɩ ɩ ba kanɩn mɔɔ kesintin.
44003019	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa fanɛ kakyɩna tɔ kɛ fɛn buu Ɩbwaarɛ, kɛ ɔ taa fanɛ alibi kɛɛ fanɛ.
44003020	Fɛn kan waa kanɩn mʋ, kayɩɩ yuuli kakyɩna ii biti ɩ lɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ asɛ, kɛ o sun Yesu Krisito mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ sa fanɛ mʋ kɛ ɔ ba fanɛ asɛ.
44003021	Ɩ dagaa fɛɛ Yesu maa sii sʋsʋ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ waa kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ ki biliŋi kɩpʋpwɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla bɔla mʋ atɔwɛpʋ kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ sʋ tɔwɛ asɩn nɩmʋ lɩɩ koo dɩdaa mʋ.
44003022	Kanɩn sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Mosesi tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ lɛɛ fanɛ tɔ ɔtɔwɛpʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ falɛ, nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ nyɩmɩsa. Nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fɛn kan fanɛ asʋ, kɛ fen nu kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ tɔwɛ fanɛ.
44003023	Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o mee nu kanɩn ɔtɔwɛpʋ maŋa asɛ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ lɛɛ mʋ lɩɩ mʋ asa tɔ kɛ o nyita mʋ.’
44003024	“Lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Samuweli yɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ kanɩn katɔwɛ maŋa yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba lɩɩ Samuweli kamaa ba mʋ kpini ba tɔwɛ kanɩn asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa ndaga anɛ kakyɩna kanɩmʋ tɔ falɛ.
44003025	Ɩbwaarɛ maa bɔla mʋ atɔwɛpʋ sʋ ɛɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ mʋ kpini ɩ dɛ sa fanɛ. Kɛ katɔwɛ kyula mʋ nɩɩ fanaa Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ fanɛ naana ana ba waa mʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ Abraham yɛ, ‘Lɩɩ fʋ kɩnaana sʋ mʋ, n biti n waa kasɛ sʋ asa kpini kusee.’
44003026	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ Yesu nɩɩ ɔ gyankpaa sun mʋ fanɛ asɛ, kɛ fan yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa ɔkpa kʋmaa sʋ kɛ ɔ waa fanɛ kusee.”
44004001	Pita maa Gyɔn ba san ba maa sʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ asa mʋ asɛ mʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu akʋ, yɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ akunpu mʋ ɔbɩlɩsa yɛ, Sadusi abi ba ba fʋʋ tʋtɔ.
44004002	Nɩɩ ba nyɛ agbʋ waa Pita maa Gyɔn fɛɛ ba maa kaapʋ bɛ tɔwɛ asa mʋ yɛ Yesu bwii kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ, nɩɩ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ kelewu kyiŋi kɩ bʋ tɔ sa asa kpini.
44004003	Ɩmʋ sʋ ba kɩtaa Pita maa Gyɔn naa tii bamʋ obu naa fʋʋ kayɩkɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ kyɔwɛ maa tɛɛ lʋwɛ sʋ mʋ ba tii bamʋ obu naa fʋʋ kayɩkɛ.
44004004	Amaa asa gaalaagaa mʋ nɩɩ ba nu Yesu Krisito asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, ba kɔɔlɛ gyii nɩɩ kʋbʋ mʋ kɩ nyɛ akyɔ bɛɛ waa fɛɛ anyɩn ngbɩn‐nnuu.
44004005	Lɩɩkaakɛ mʋ Gyiwu abi agyankpaapʋ yɛ abɩlɩsa yɛ Mosesi nbara akaapʋpʋ ba naa sarɛ Gyerusalem.
44004006	Bamʋ nɩɩ ba sarɛ tʋtɔ ɩ gyɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ Anasi yɛ Kefasi yɛ Gyɔn yɛ Alekisanda yɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ, mʋ kʋʋpʋ ana.
44004007	Ba taa Pita maa Gyɔn ba ba yɩlɛ bamʋ ansi tɔ, nɩɩ ba taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɔlʋn nɩɩ fan nyɛ abɛɛ anɩmʋ kɩtɩɩ nɩɩ fan sʋ fan waa ɩnɩmʋ falɛ?”
44004008	Tʋtɔ mʋ, Pita mʋ nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ kɩ bɔla mʋ tɔ mʋ lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Agyankpaapʋ yɛ abɩlɩsa,
44004009	fan taasɛ anɛ ndaga asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ an waa boobi nɩmʋ, nɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ alanfɩya.
44004010	Kanɩn sʋ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fanɛ yɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi kpini fan bɩɩ fɛɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ yɩlɛ nfɩɩ falɛ, Yesu Krisito mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Nasareti, ɔmʋ nɩɩ fan da mʋ mata oyu laasa sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bwii kyiŋi mʋ ba nkpa tɔ mʋ, ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ alanfɩya.
44004011	Nɩɩ Yesu ɩ gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Kubuu mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ, apɔyɩpʋ fan kina yɛ kɩ man bʋrɔn mʋ, kanɩn kubuu maŋa ɩ ba biliŋi kubuu kparɛ ɩmʋ kpini tɔ.’
44004012	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ mɔlɩgɛ asa, amɔɔ Yesu nkʋn, lɩɩ fɛɛ kɩtɩɩ pʋpwɛ kʋ man bɩla ɔ bʋ dulinyaa tɔ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa sa yɛ kɩ mɔlɩgɛ anɛ.”
44004013	Ɩ waa abɩlɩsa mʋ kpini kanankʋ fɛɛ Pita maa Gyɔn ba maa yɩlɛ kɩnyɩn tɔ, nɩɩ ba bɩɩ fɛɛ ba man gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ be nyi ɩwʋlɛ. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba wu fɛɛ ba wʋla ba gyɛ Yesu abuupu nɩn.
44004014	Kpalɩ fɛɛ ba maa wu boobi mʋ nɩɩ ba kyɛ mʋ, maa yɩlɛ Pita maa Gyɔn asɛ mʋ, ba man taalɛ nyɛ asɩn kʋ ba tɔwɛ.
44004015	Ɩmʋ sʋ ba dan sii tɔwɛ bamʋ nɩn yɛ ba lɩɩ nsarɛ obu mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ba sii ba taa Pita maa Gyɔn sʋ nfɛɛrɛ.
44004016	Nɩɩ ba taasɛ abaa yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ an biti a waa asa anɩmʋ? Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ Gyerusalem nyi yɛ bamʋ ɩ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa nɩmʋ, nɩɩ a mɛɛ taalɛ gyii ɩ mʋ ɩmɔɔrɛ.
44004017	Amaa pɔyɩ kɛ a tii asɩn nɩmʋ kɛ ɩ man naa lɩɩ asa asɛ kata‐kata mʋ, a da bamʋ amu tɔ yɛ, ɩ nɩmʋ i gyii bamʋ ɔkaa, ba man bɩla taa Yesu kɩtɩɩ asɩn tɔwɛ sa asa.”
44004018	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ba bwii tɩɩ Pita maa Gyɔn ba lenbu mʋ tɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ kakaakʋ ba man bɩla lɩɩ tɔwɛ abɛɛ kaapʋ lɩɩ Yesu kɩtɩɩ tɔ.
44004019	Amaa Pita maa Gyɔn ba lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ nɩn yɛ, “Fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ fan kɩɩ damu maŋa tɔ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ. An nu fanɛ asɛ abɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ?
44004020	Lɩɩ fɛɛ a mɛɛ taalɛ yɛgɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ anɛ gbaa‐gbaa anɛ an wu nɩɩ an nu mʋ kɩtɔwɛ.”
44004021	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ abɩlɩsa mʋ ba lɔŋɔ da Pita maa Gyɔn amu tɔ kenken nɩɩ ba yɛgɛ bamʋ yɛ ba natɛ. Ba man nyɛ ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ sʋ taa bɩɩtɛ bamʋ asʋ, kpalɩ fɛɛ asa kpini ba maa yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba waa mʋ sʋ.
44004022	Ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba waa asɩn kyinkyinsa kyɛ mʋ mʋ, gyii ɔ kyɔ nsu adɩna.
44004023	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba dan yɛgɛ Pita maa Gyɔn mʋ, ba bwii kpee bamʋ kyɛmɩnɛ ana akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ asɛ naa tɔwɛ bamʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ abɩlɩsa yɛ aseepu‐bɩlɩsa mʋ ba tɔwɛ.
44004024	Akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ ba maa dan nu kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ kpini ba waa kɔnɔ kʋlʋn kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, fʋ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ tʋʋ sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ yɛ ɔpʋ yɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ ɩmʋ tɔ kpini.
44004025	Fʋ bɔla Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ sʋ nɩɩ fʋ yɛgɛ anɛ naana Dawidi, fʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ ndɛndɛmandɛ bɛɛ nyɛ agbʋ? Mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ asa anɩmʋ bɛɛ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ libi kanɩn?
44004026	Kasɛ sʋ awura bɛɛ kʋʋla bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ, nɩɩ akɩɩsʋpʋ mɔɔ bɛɛ sarɛ bɛɛ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ maa Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ sʋ.’
44004027	Kesintin, asɩn nɩmʋ a ba tɔ fɛɛ Herodi maa Pontiyu Paleti yɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi yɛ ndɛndɛmandɛ ba sarɛ kadɛ nɩmʋ tɔ, bee ŋmina agyina kʋsʋ yɩlɛ Yesu sʋ fʋ Kɩyaafɔlɛ Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ lɛɛ mʋ.
44004028	Kesintin ba sarɛ kanɩn nɩn ba ba waa kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ lɩɩ fʋ ɔlʋn sʋ, yɛ fʋ kɔkɔlɔ biti mʋ nɩɩ fʋ wʋla paa yɛ ɩ waa mʋ.
44004029	Ɩmʋ sʋ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩɩ aŋaala mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ ŋaala anɛ falɛ kɛ fʋ sa anɛ, fʋ ayaafɔlɛ kɔkɔlɔ ɔsɩɩ kɛ a taalɛ tɔwɛ fʋ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ.
44004030	Tɛɛŋɛ fʋ abaa kɛ alɔpʋ ba nyɛ alanfɩya, kɛ fʋ waa adangana yɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa bɔla fʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ Yesu kɩtɩɩ sʋ waa kaapʋ asa.”
44004031	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ lʋwɛ mʋ, opula mʋ nɩɩ ba sarɛ mʋ gyingyen. Nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ loo bɔla bamʋ kpini nɩɩ ba piili bɛ tɔwɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ yɛ kɔkɔlɔ ɔsɩɩ.
44004032	Akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu kʋbʋ mʋ kpini ba waa nfɛɛrɛ kʋlʋn yɛ kɔkɔlɔ kʋlʋn. Bamʋ ɔkʋ mɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ. Kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ mʋ gyɛ bamʋ kpini lɛɛ.
44004033	Asunpu mʋ ba tɔwɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kelewu kyiŋi mʋ asɩn ba kaapʋ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔlʋn lala mʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ waa bamʋ kpini kusee.
44004034	Ɔkʋ man bʋ bamʋ kʋbʋ mʋ tɔ nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋ ki tiri mʋ kpaa. Lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ kasɛ abɛɛ akpaara mʋ, ba fɛ ɩmʋ yɛgɛ ba sʋ afulee mʋ ba ba,
44004035	ba yɩla asunpu mʋ kagya kasɛ, nɩɩ ba barɩgɛ ɩmʋ tɔ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ i tiri ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ.
44004036	Kanɩn nɩɩ Gyosefu, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Lewi kebunɔ, nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ Sipuru, nɩɩ asunpu mʋ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Banabasi, (kɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ, Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa asa aniya tɔ).
44004037	Mʋ gbaa mʋ fɛ mʋ kasɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa afulee mʋ ba waa asunpu mʋ kagya kasɛ.
44005001	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Ananiyasi maa mʋ‐ka Safira ba fɛ bamʋ kasɛ kʋkʋ.
44005002	Nɩɩ Ananiyasi maa mʋ‐ka ba waa kɔnɔ nɩɩ ɔ barɩgɛ afulee mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ taa ɩkʋ yɩla, nɩɩ ɔ taa asansa mʋ kpiya asunpu mʋ kagya kasɛ.
44005003	Nɩɩ Pita taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ananiyasi, mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fʋ yɛgɛ nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ i gyii fu kumu nɩɩ fʋ tɩn antɩŋɛsa sa Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ kanɩn? Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fʋ fɛ fʋ kasɛ nyɛ afulee nɩɩ fʋ barɩgɛ tɔ taa ɩkʋ yɩla?
44005004	Pɔyɩ kɛ fʋ fɛ kasɛ maŋa mʋ, kɩ gyɛ fʋ lɛɛ nɩn, nɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ fɛ lʋwɛ mʋ, afulee mʋ gbaa a gyɛ fʋ lɛɛ nɩn. Mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ fʋ waa kanɩn asɩn maŋa? Man gyɛ asa nɩɩ fʋ tɩn antɩŋɛsa sa, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ fʋ tɩn antɩŋɛsa sa.”
44005005	Ananiyasi maa dan nu kanɩn asɩn maŋa mʋ, tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɩ tɩn mʋ tʋʋ nɩɩ o wu. Nɩɩ ɩ waa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o nu kanɩn mʋ kufuu gaa.
44005006	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ayaafɔlɛ ba loo bɔlɔɔ mʋ, kukuri lɩɩ naa pula.
44005007	Ɩ maa waa gbɛrɛɛ mʋ, mʋ‐ka Safira gbaa loo ba ɔ man nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa.
44005008	Nɩɩ Pita taasɛ, mʋ yɛ, “Tɔwɛ mɛ kesintin, kasɛ afulee mʋ nɩɩ faa fu‐kuli fan fɛ mʋ kpini ndee?” Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Oo, ɩmʋ afulee kpini nɩn.”
44005009	Nɩɩ Pita taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ faa fu‐kuli fan waa kɔnɔ kʋlʋn yɛ fan tʋʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Kayaayu mʋ tɔ kɩɩ. Kɩɩ! Ayaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba naa pula fu‐kuli mʋ ba yɩlɛ kebunɔ tʋtɔ nbɩɩnbɩɩ, kanɩn nɩɩ bee biti ba kukuri ngbaa fʋ lɩɩ naa pula nɩn.”
44005010	Opula tɔ, nɩɩ ɩ tɩn mʋ tʋʋ Pita ayaa tɔ nɩɩ o wu. Nɩɩ ayaafɔlɛ mʋ ba be loo, nɩɩ ba wu yɛ o wu ɔ dɛ, nɩɩ ba bɔlɔɔ mʋ kukuri lɩɩ naa pula mata mu‐kuli.
44005011	Krisito abi kʋbʋ yɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ kpini ba maa nu kanɩn mʋ, ɩ waa bamʋ kufuu gaa.
44005012	Asunpu mʋ ba waa ɩsɩnkaala yɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa asa mu ansi tɔ. Akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ kpini bɛɛ taalɛ bɛɛ gyaŋɛ Ɩbwaarɛ osunkpa ayɛ mʋ opula mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Solomon kasɔrɔga tɔ mʋ.
44005013	Asa mʋ ba sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ bɛ sa bamʋ gaa, amaa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ ɔkʋ man taalɛ nyɛ kɔkɔlɔ naa tii bamʋ sʋ.
44005014	Amaa kamaa tɔ mʋ, anyɩn yɛ akyɩɩ gaalaagaa ba kɔɔlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ gyii, nɩɩ ba naa tii bamʋ kʋbʋ mʋ sʋ.
44005015	Lɩɩ kanɩn sʋ, asa ba sʋla alɔpʋ ba yɩla agbenbi ɔkaa yɛgɛ ba dɛ bamʋ mpaa yɛ ɩkalan sʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa kɛ Pita kan ɛɛ kyʋn mʋ, mʋ kayaayu kɩ natɛ bamʋ sʋ.
44005016	Ndɛ‐bii mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ kyaabɔɔ Gyerusalem mʋ asa ba taa bamʋ alɔpʋ yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi bɛɛ tɔɔrɔɔ bamʋ kpini ba, nɩɩ ba nyɛ alanfɩya.
44005017	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ, yɛ mʋ kamaa abi mʋ nɩɩ ba lɩɩ Sadusi kʋbʋ mʋ tɔ mʋ, ba nyɛ kayɩɩ basa lɩɩ asunpu mʋ sʋ.
44005018	Ba kɩtaa asunpu mʋ naa tii katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba tii bamʋ asa obu mʋ.
44005019	Amaa kanɩn kagyanbwɛ maŋa mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ ba tigi obu mʋ kebunɔ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ bamʋ.
44005020	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kpee naa yɩlɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ kɛ fan tɔwɛ asa mʋ, nkpa pʋpwɛ nɩmʋ asɩn.”
44005021	Kayɩ kɩ maa kɛ mʋ Krisito asunpu mʋ ba kpee kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ katɔwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ba yii kasɛ bɛɛ tɔwɛ asa mʋ nkpa mʋ asɩn. Oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ maa mʋ kamaa abi, ba maa ba mʋ, ɔ tɩɩ Sanhediri mʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ Gyiwu abi kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ abɩlɩsa mʋ kpini ba ba gyaŋɛ, nɩɩ o sun yɛ ba naa lɛɛ asunpu mʋ ba.
44005022	Apurusi mʋ nɩɩ ba sun mʋ, ba maa fʋʋ obu tiisa mʋ tɔ mʋ, ba man wu asunpu mʋ obu maŋa tɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ba bwii naa tɔwɛ abɩlɩsa mʋ nɩɩ bee gyoo bamʋ mʋ yɛ,
44005023	“An wu obu mʋ maa biri sʋ danbɩrasa yɛgɛ akɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ ba yɩlɛ nbunɔ, amaa a maa tigi nbunɔ mʋ a man wu ɔkʋ obu mʋ tɔ.”
44005024	Ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ akɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ, yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa ba maa nu kanɩn mʋ i kyinkyin bamʋ, kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɩ ba kanɩn.
44005025	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔkʋ ba tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan kɩɩ! Anyɩn mʋ nɩɩ fan tii bamʋ obu mʋ bɛɛ yɩlɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ kasɔrɔga tɔ bɛɛ kaapʋ asa.”
44005026	Ba maa nu kanɩn mʋ akɩɩsʋpʋ ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ yɛ mʋ ayaafɔlɛ ba kpee naa bɩya asunpu mʋ. Ba maa sɩlɛ kufuu fɛɛ asa mʋ, bee biti ba tʋʋ bamʋ abuu su mʋ, ba man taa bamʋ yɛ ɔlʋn sʋ.
44005027	Nɩɩ ba taa bamʋ ba yɩlɛ abɩlɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ba sarɛ mu ansi tɔ. Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ,
44005028	“Yɛ an da fanɛ amu tɔ yɛ, fan man bɩla taa Yesu kɩtɩɩ tɔ kaapʋ? Amaa fan taa fanɛ kɩkaapʋ kyaabɔɔ Gyerusalem kpini. Fen biti fan taa ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ kelewu ba anɛ sʋ.”
44005029	Nɩɩ Pita maa asunpu banban mʋ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɩ dagaa fɛɛ a maa nu Ɩbwaarɛ kɔnɔ nɩn, man gyɛ nyɩmɩsa lɛɛ.
44005030	Anɛ naana ana bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ i kyiŋi Yesu mʋ nɩɩ fan da mʋ oyu laasa mɔɔ mʋ, lɩɩ lewu tɔ.
44005031	Ɩbwaarɛ diyaa mʋ naa kyɩna mʋ gyisa sʋ fɛɛ Ɔgyankpaapʋ yɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ mʋ, nɩɩ o bugi ɔkpa sa Ɩsɩrayɩ abi kɛ ba yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ taa bamʋ alibi kɛɛ bamʋ.
44005032	Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba buu mʋ mʋ, yɛ anɛ asunpu mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɩmʋ kesintin agyipu ɩnɩmʋ kpini sʋ.”
44005033	Nɩɩ nbara abɩlɩsa kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ ba maa nu kanɩn mʋ, ɩ nyɛ bamʋ agbʋ gaa nɩɩ ba waa bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ba mɔɔ asunpu mʋ.
44005034	Amaa bamʋ tɔ ɔnyɩn kʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gamaliye, nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Farasii obii yɛ Mosesi nbara ɔkaapʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ asa kpini bɛɛ sa mʋ bɛɛrɛɛ mʋ, kʋsʋ yɩlɛ bamʋ nsana nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, ba yɛgɛ asunpu mʋ ba lɩɩ kewu gbɛrɛɛ.
44005035	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩsɩrayɩ abi, fan lɔŋɔ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan taa lɩɩ anyɩn anɩmʋ sʋ danbɩrasa.
44005036	Saŋa kʋ tɔ mʋ, Tewuda kʋ gbaa daa kyɩna kʋsʋ yɛ ɔ gyɛ ɔkʋ nɩn. Ɔ nyɛ kʋbʋ fɛɛ asa alɩfa ana nɩɩ ba buu mʋ. Amaa ba mɔɔ mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ kʋbʋ kɩ yaasɛ tɔ, nɩɩ mʋ awaasa kpini ɩ waa kɩyan.
44005037	Mʋ kamaa mʋ Gyudasi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Galile mʋ, asa kɩkalɛ saŋa mʋ ngbaa mʋ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ kʋbʋ lala kʋ nɩɩ ba buu mʋ. Amaa ba mɔɔ mʋ, nɩɩ mu abuupu gbaa ba yaasɛ tɔ.
44005038	Ɩmʋ sʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ndaga ɩ ba falɛ, n biti n tɔwɛ fanɛ fɛɛ fɛn yɛgɛ asa anɩmʋ ba natɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ nɩɩ bamʋ kusun kɩnɩmʋ kɩ gyɛ nyɩmɩsa lɛɛ bɩrɛ kii biti ki nyita.
44005039	Amaa nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ bɩrɛ fɛn mɛɛ taalɛ tii asa anɩmʋ, nɩɩ ɩ waa kanɩn bɩrɛ fen biti fen wu fɛɛ fɛn kɔ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ.”
44005040	Ba nu sa Gamaliye katɔwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ba tɩɩ asunpu mʋ tɩŋɛ bamʋ. Nɩɩ ba da bamʋ amu tɔ yɛ, ba man bɩla tɔwɛ Yesu kɩtɩɩ tɔ asɩn. Nɩɩ ba yɛgɛ bamʋ yɛ ba natɛ.
44005041	Asunpu mʋ ba lɩɩ Ɩsɩrayɩ kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ tɔ kpini abɩlɩsa mu ansi tɔ, taa kensi‐gyii fɛɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ kalɛ bamʋ tii bamʋ nɩɩ ba wu awʋrʋfɔ lɩɩ Yesu kɩtɩɩ tɔ mʋ sʋ.
44005042	Kakɛ kʋmaa nɩmʋ ba naa kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ nsɔrɔga tɔ yɛ asa akpaara sʋ. Ba man yɛgɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ kɩtɔwɛ yɛ Yesu ɩ gyɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ.
44006001	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu abuupu mʋ ba nyɛ akyɔ mʋ, kamɔɔrɛ‐gyii kɩ ba Gyiwu ndɛ‐bii mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ Giriki mʋ yɛ Gyiwu ndɛ‐bii mʋ nsana. Ba fabɩlɛ yɛ Gyiwu ndɛ‐bii mʋ ba mɛɛ sa bamʋ akulapu‐kyɩɩ atɔ barɩgɛsa kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa.
44006002	Ɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, asunpu kudu‐anyɔ mʋ ba sarɛ Yesu abuupu mʋ kpini. Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Ɩ man dagaa fɛɛ a yɛgɛ abwaarɛsɩn kɩtɔwɛ yɩla kɛ a ba kɩɩ atɔ kɩbarɩgɛ sʋ.
44006003	Kanɩn sʋ anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana, fan lɛɛ fanɛ tɔ anyɩn asunɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛ sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ yɛ kanyaasɩn nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ kɩ bɔla bamʋ tɔ mʋ, kɛ a taa kusun nɩmʋ waa bamʋ abaa tɔ,
44006004	kɛ a nyɛ saŋa sa kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ yɛ abwaarɛsɩn kɩtɔwɛ mʋ.”
