44006005	Kanɩn nfɛɛrɛ mʋ ɩ pɩrɛ bamʋ kpini. Nɩɩ Yesu abuupu mʋ ba lɛɛ Sitefen mʋ nɩɩ mʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii yɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ kɩ kyɔ mʋ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ba lɛɛ Filipi yɛ Pokoro yɛ Nikano yɛ Timon yɛ Pamena maa Nikolasi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Antiyoki, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ biliŋi Gyiwu abi, nɩɩ ɔ ba kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii mʋ.
44006006	Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ bamʋ kaapʋ asunpu mʋ, nɩɩ asunpu mʋ ba taa bamʋ abaa gyaga bamʋ sʋ nɩɩ ba kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ sa bamʋ.
44006007	Ɩmʋ sʋ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ ɩ yɛlɩgɛ. Yesu abuupu mʋ ba nyɛ akyɔ tii sʋ Gyerusalem ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ. Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ aseepu mʋ gaalaagaa gbaa ba kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii.
44006008	Sitefen mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ ɔlʋn nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bwaala mʋ mʋ, waa asɩn kyinkyinsa yɛ asɩnkaala asa mʋ tɔ.
44006009	Amaa Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ ba lɩɩ Kirini yɛ Alekisanda kabwaarɛ kʋlɛkpa mʋ nɩɩ bɛ tɩɩ yɛ ba kɔɔlɛ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba lɩɩ Silisiya, Asiya ɩsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ kpini ba gyii Sitefen ɩmɔɔrɛ.
44006010	Lɩɩ mʋ kanyaasɩn yɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ ɔkpa katɔwɛ tɔ sʋ mʋ, ba man taalɛ yɩlɛ mu ansi tɔ.
44006011	Ba lɩɩ asiiri tɔ naa wu asa akʋ yɛ ba ba tɩn atɩntɩnsa gyaga Sitefen sʋ, kɛ ba ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “An nu Sitefen maa tɔwɛ nbusaa asɩn ɛɛ gyaga Mosesi maa Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ.”
44006012	Nɩɩ amɔɔrɛ‐gyipu ba tɔwɛ fun waa abɩlɩsa mʋ yɛ Mosesi nbara akaapʋpʋ yɛ asa mʋ kpini nkɔlɔ nɩɩ ba kɩtaa Sitefen ba Ɩsɩrayɩ kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ abɩlɩsa mu ansi tɔ.
44006013	Ba bɩya antɩŋɛsa wuya ana nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Saŋa kʋmaa ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ ɩ tɔwɛ nbusaa asɩn ee yii kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ yɛ Mosesi nbara mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sa anɛ mʋ.
44006014	Nɩɩ an bɩla nu maa tɔwɛ yɛ Yesu Kanasareti‐nyɩn mʋ biti o boyi Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ, kɛ ɔ kyɛɛgɛ anɛ anaana atɔ mʋ nɩɩ anɛ naana Mosesi taa sa anɛ mʋ.”
44006015	Ɩsɩrayɩ kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ abɩlɩsa mʋ kpini mʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ asɩn mʋ tɔ mʋ, ba kɩɩ Sitefen kyimm, nɩɩ ba wu mu ansi tɔ ɩ maa du fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ ansi tɔ mʋ.
44007001	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ taasɛ Sitefen yɛ, “Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ lɩɩ fʋ sʋ falɛ kpini, ɩ gyɛ kesintin?”
44007002	Sitefen lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Mɛ‐Sɛ ana yɛ mɛ‐daa ana, fen nu mɛ asɛ! Ɩbwaarɛ bʋnyaa wuya mʋ lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ anɛ naana Abraham, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ Mesopotamiya kasɛ sʋ, pɔyɩ nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ ba Haran mʋ.
44007003	Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Kʋsʋ lɩɩ fʋ ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ yɛ fʋ asa asɛ, kɛ fu kpee ɔsʋwʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ n biti n kaapʋ fʋ falɛ sʋ.’
44007004	“Ɩmʋ sʋ Abraham lɩɩ Kalidiya ɔsʋwʋlɛ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ naa kyɩna Haran. Mʋ‐sɛ lewu kamaa nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ tʋtɔ naa kyɩna ɔsʋwʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ndaga fan tɛ sʋ falɛ.
44007005	Ɩbwaarɛ man pɩɩta taa kasɛ mʋ ntɩn kʋ sa mʋ, halɩɩ kɩyaa tantan tɔ kasɛ gbaa man pɩɩta biliŋi mʋ lɛɛ. Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ ɔsʋwʋlɛ mʋ ii biti o be biliŋi maa mʋ anaana‐bii lɛɛ nɩn. Yɛgɛ saŋa maa Abraham man pɩɩta kʋʋgɛ.
44007006	Asɩn nɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ Abraham yɛ, ‘Fʋ anaana‐bii bee biti ba naa biliŋi afɔ ɔkʋ ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, kɛ ba taa bamʋ biliŋi anyɛ kɛ ba nyanla bamʋ nsu alɩfa ana.
44007007	N biti n bɩɩtɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba biliŋaa bamʋ anyɛ mʋ asʋ, ɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, fʋ anaana‐bii mʋ bee biti ba lɩɩ kanɩn ɔsʋwʋlɛ maŋa sʋ kɛ ba be sun mɛ nfɩɩ’.
44007008	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ maa Abraham ba nyɛ katɔwɛ kyula fɛɛ, mʋ yɛ mʋ kamaa tɔ kpini ba tɩŋɛ iduu. Ɩmʋ sʋ Abraham maa kʋʋgɛ Isaki mʋ ɔ tɩn mʋ oduu kakɛ buruwasapu, nɩɩ Isaki kʋʋgɛ Gyekobu nɩɩ ɔ tɩn mʋ oduu, nɩɩ Gyekobu kʋʋgɛ anɛ naana ana kudu‐anyɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɩŋɛ bamʋ kpini iduu.
44007009	“Gyosefu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ kudu anyɔ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ mʋ, mʋ daa ana ba nyɛ mʋ sʋ kayɩɩ basa, nɩɩ ba fɛ mʋ fɛɛ kɩnyɛ sa Egyipiti abi.
44007010	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ Gyosefu lɩɩ mʋ awʋrʋfɔ kpini tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ sa mʋ kanyaasɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ kebiti lɩɩ Egyipiti Owura Faro asɛ. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ o yii mʋ kuwura fɛɛ ɔ kɩɩ mʋ owura‐kpa yɛ Egyipiti ɔsʋwʋlɛ kpini sʋ.
44007011	“Nɩɩ akʋn damantɛ ɩ ba tɩyɛ Egyipiti yɛ Kaanan ɩsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ɩ bɩya awʋrʋfɔ gaa. Nɩɩ anɛ naana ana ba man nyɛ agyitɔ.
44007012	Bamʋ‐sɛ Gyekobu maa nu fɛɛ agyitɔ ɩ bʋ Egyipiti mʋ, o sun mu‐bii ana mʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ anɛ naana ana kpee tʋtɔ kɩgyankpaasa ba naa sɔɔ agyitɔ.
44007013	Ba maa bwii kpee Egyipiti kɩnyɔsapʋ ba naa sɔɔ agyitɔ mʋ, Gyosefu lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ mʋ‐daa ana, nɩɩ Faro gbaa nu Gyosefu mʋ kʋʋpʋ ana sʋ.
44007014	Kamaa tɔ mʋ Gyosefu sun yɛ ba naa taa mʋ‐sɛ Gyekobu yɛ mʋ kʋʋpʋ ana mʋ nɩɩ bɛ waa fɛɛ asa adusunɔ yɛ anu mʋ kpini ba mʋ asɛ.
44007015	Nɩɩ Gyekobu kʋsʋ kpee Egyipiti, tʋtɔ nɩɩ maa mu‐bii ana ba naa wu.
44007016	Nɩɩ ba bwiiyaa bamʋ ba Sekem ba pula kakyan mʋ nɩɩ Abraham sɔɔ lɩɩ Hamo mu‐bii ana asɛ mʋ tɔ.
44007017	“Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kɔkɔlɔ kɩda sa Abraham maa tiri tɔ fɛɛ ɩ ba tɔ mʋ, anɛ asa mʋ ba nyɛ akyɔ Egyipiti ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
44007018	Kanɩn saŋa maa nɩɩ owura pʋpwɛ kʋ ba kyɩna Egyipiti kagya sʋ, amaa ɔ man nyi Gyosefu asɩn.
44007019	Nɩɩ owura pʋpwɛ nɩmʋ nyanla anɛ asa nɩɩ ɔ waa bamʋ awʋrʋfɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ nyan bamʋ yɛ ba lɛɛ bamʋ nbii pʋpwɛ kewu kɛ ɔ mɔɔ bamʋ.
44007020	“Saŋa maŋa tɔ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ Mosesi nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ kebii danbɩrasa Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ nɩɩ mʋ kɩbaabʋtɔ kwɩɩ. Nɩɩ ba baala mʋ, kɩɩ mʋ sʋ ɩbwaayɩ ɩsa mʋ‐sɛ kɩkpaara sʋ.
44007021	Ɩmʋ kamaa tɔ mʋ, ba lɛɛ mʋ kewu nɩɩ Owura Faro mu‐bii kyɩɩsa taa mʋ naa bɩla nɩɩ o biliŋi mu‐bii.
44007022	Nɩɩ ba kaapʋ Mosesi, nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ Egyipiti abi kɩbɩɩla yɛ bamʋ kanyaasɩn, nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kinyi yɛ katɔwɛ yɛ awaasa tɔ.
44007023	“Mosesi maa gyii nsu adɩna kamaa mʋ, ɔ waa mʋ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ o kpee ɔ naa bɔɔ mʋ ayɛ abi Ɩsɩrayɩ abi sʋ.
44007024	Tʋtɔ maa nɩɩ o wu Egyipiti ɔnyɩn kʋ maa nyanla Ɩsɩrayɩ ɔnyɩn kʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ Mosesi naa kɔɔlɛ mʋ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɔ mɔɔ Egyipiti ɔnyɩn mʋ ka kʋkɔ.
44007025	Mosesi nyi fɛɛ mʋ ayɛ abi bee biti ba bɩɩ fɛɛ, mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ biti ɔ bɔla sʋ mɔlɩgɛ bamʋ, amaa ba man bɩɩ.
44007026	Lɩɩkaakɛ mʋ, Mosesi ba tu Ɩsɩrayɩ abi asa anyɔ ba maa kɔ. Maa biti ɔ barɩgɛ bamʋ tɔ mʋ, ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, ‘Fan gyɛ asa kʋlʋn nɩn, mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fɛn nyanla abaa kanɩn?’
44007027	“Nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ nyanla mʋ bɩrɩsa mʋ nin Mosesi naa yɩlɛ ɩkaa sʋ nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ yɛ, ‘Anɩmʋ ɩ yɩla fʋ yɛ fʋ kɩɩ anɛ sʋ kɛ fu gyii anɛ asɩn?
44007028	Fii biti fʋ mɔɔ mɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ndee fʋ mɔɔ Egyipiti ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩn?’
44007029	Mosesi maa nu kanɩn mʋ ɔ sɩlɛ lɩɩ Egyipiti kpee Midiyan ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, naa kyɩna fɛɛ ɔfɔ. Tʋtɔ maŋa nɩɩ ɔ kʋʋgɛ nbii nnyɔ.
44007030	“Mosesi maa kyɩna tʋtɔ nsu adɩna kamaa mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ mʋ, kɩpʋnfa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ dɛɛ ofuli sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɩ maa Sinayi kɩbɩɩ mʋ.
44007031	Maa wu falɛ atɔ mʋ, ɩ waa mʋ kanankʋ. Maa nin tiri kɛ ɔ kɩɩ danbɩrasa mʋ, o nu Ɩbwaarɛ maa tɔwɛ yɛ,
44007032	‘Mɛ ɩ gyɛ fʋ naana ana Ɩbwaarɛ, Abraham yɛ Isaki yɛ Gyekobu Ɩbwaarɛ.’ Mosesi maa yɩnŋɛ nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa mʋ gaa sʋ mʋ, ɔ man bɩla taalɛ kɩɩ kʋtɔ maŋa.
44007033	“Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Lɛɛ fʋ asɩbɩta, lɩɩ fɛɛ ntɩn mʋ nɩɩ fʋ yɩlɛ mʋ gyɛ kasɛ kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ nɩn.
44007034	Kesintin, n wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ nyanla mɛ asa Egyipiti tɔ. Nɩɩ n nu bamʋ kusu, nɩɩ n kpɩlɩgɛ ba n ba mɔlɩgɛ bamʋ. Kanɩn sʋ n sun fʋ kɛ fʋ bwii kpee Egyipiti tɔ.’
44007035	“Mosesi kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ mʋ asa ba kina mʋ, tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Anɩmʋ ɩ yɩla fʋ anɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ yɛ asɩn ogyipu?’ mʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɩla bɔla mʋ kabɔɔ sʋ fʋlɔn nnɔ‐bi tɔ yɛ, ɔ naa waa bamʋ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ yɛ ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ.
44007036	Ɔ lɛɛ bamʋ lɩɩ Egyipiti nɩɩ ɔ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa yɛ adangana Egyipiti tɔ yɛ ɔpʋ pɩpɛɛ mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ba gyii nsu adɩna ofuli mʋ sʋ.
44007037	“Mosesi nɩmʋ ɩ tɔwɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi yɛ, ‘Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ lɛɛ mʋ ɔtɔwɛpʋ pʋpwɛ lɩɩ fanɛ tɔ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mɛ mʋ’.
44007038	Mosesi nɩmʋ tii Ɩsɩrayɩ kʋbʋ mʋ sʋ lɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ ofuli sʋ mʋ. Mosesi maa anɛ naana ana yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ ba bʋ tʋtɔ. Sɩnayɩ kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ nkpa asɩn mʋ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ asɛ yɛ ɔ taa bɩya anɛ.
44007039	“Ba waa kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn nɩɩ ba man nu Mosesi asɛ, nɩɩ bamʋ nkɔlɔ tɔ mʋ, naafɔɔ ba daa nyɛ nɩn bee biti ba bwii kpee Egyipiti.
44007040	Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ Aron yɛ, ‘Mosesi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ anɛ lɩɩ Egyipiti mʋ, a man nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa mʋ kɩbɩɩ Sɩnayɩ sʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ waa ɩdakpa sa anɛ kɛ bɛɛ gyankpaa anɛ.’
44007041	Kanɩn saŋa maa tɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba pɔyɩ kanaatɛ‐bi taa biliŋi bamʋ ɔdakpa. Nɩɩ ba lɔŋɔ ɔdakpa maŋa yɛgɛ bee gyii bamʋ ansi lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba taa bamʋ abaa pɔyɩ mʋ sʋ.
44007042	Ɩmʋ sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ palɛ mʋ kamaa sa bamʋ yɛ ba kyaga sʋ be sun kyɔwɛ yɛ ɔbwaayɩ yɛ akyikpebi, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba wʋla kyʋrɔɔ waa Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ ɩwʋlɛ tɔ yɛ, ‘Ɩsɩrayɩ abi! Man gyɛ mɛ nɩɩ fɛn daa fɛn lɔŋɔ atɔbwaaya fɛn sa nsu adɩna ofuli sʋ mʋ.
44007043	Fanɛ nkɔlɔ ɩ gyan ɔdakpa Moleki yɛ ɔdakpa Refan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ fanɛ kikyikpebi ɔdakpa, mʋ nɩɩ fan taa fanɛ abaa pɔyɩ nɩɩ fen sun mʋ sʋ nɩn. Ɩmʋ sʋ n biti n yɛgɛ fanɛ akiisipu ba taa fanɛ kpee kata‐kata kyʋn Babilon sʋ’.
44007044	“Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ anɛ naana ana ba naa ba naa ofuli mʋ sʋ mʋ, ba sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kubuu lala mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ bʋ bamʋ asɛ. Ba waa kɩmʋ nɩn fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ kaapʋ Mosesi yɛ ɔ waa kɩmʋ mʋ.
44007045	Ɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, anɛ naana ana ba nyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kubuu mʋ, lɩɩ bamʋ‐sɛ ana asɛ, nɩɩ Gyosuwa maa bamʋ ba sʋla Ɩbwaarɛ kubuu lala maŋa, naa fʋʋ ɩsʋwʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ gya asɛ lɩɩ ɩmʋ tɔ asa, nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ anɛ asa ba kyɩna tʋtɔ mʋ. Nɩɩ kubuu mʋ sii tʋtɔ naa fʋʋ halɩɩ Dawidi saŋa mʋ.
44007046	Dawidi mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi gyii mʋ sʋ mʋ kʋlɛ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ yɛgɛ ɔ pɔyɩ osunkpa ayɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ anɛ naana Gyekobu Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ.
44007047	Amaa mu‐bii Solomon ɩ gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ ba pɔyɩ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ.
44007048	“Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ Owura lala mɛɛ kyɩna akpaara mʋ nɩɩ asa ba taa bamʋ abaa pɔyɩ mʋ tɔ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla mʋ ɔtɔwɛpʋ sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ,
44007049	‘Sʋsʋ ɩ gyɛ mɛ kuwura gya, nɩɩ kasɛ mɔɔ ɩ gyɛ mɛ ayaa ɔgyagakpa. Mɩnɛ obu nɩɩ fen biti fan pɔyɩ sa mɛ? Abɛɛ fɩnɛ ɩ taalɛ waa mɛ ɔkyɩnakpa?
44007050	Man gyɛ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ ɩ waa ɩnɩmʋ kpini?’
44007051	“Fan gyɛ asʋ tɔ ɔlʋn wuya ana, nɩɩ fan kina Ɩbwaarɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ, nɩɩ fan waa akpawu sa abwaarɛsɩn mʋ. Fan dan fan du nɩn fɛɛ fanɛ naana ana, mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kɔ bee tii Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ɔkpa.
44007052	Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ mɔɔ ɩ kyɩna nɩɩ fanɛ naana ana ba man nyanla mʋ? Ba mɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ gaalaagaa mʋ nɩɩ dɩdaa ba wʋla tɔwɛ ɔkpa kyiigisa wuya mʋ kɩba asɩn. Nɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ fan waa mʋ kadɛ‐boyi nɩɩ fan mɔɔ mʋ.
44007053	Fanɛ ɩ nyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbara mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ ba taa bɩya fanɛ mʋ, amaa fan kina ɩmʋ ki buu.”
44007054	Ɩsɩrayɩ kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba gyaŋɛ mʋ ba maa nu Sitefen asɛ mʋ, ba nyɛ agbʋ nɩɩ ba duŋi bamʋ anobi.
44007055	Amaa Sitefen mʋ nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ kɩ bɔla mʋ tɔ mʋ, diyaa mu ansi kɩɩ sʋsʋ nɩɩ o wu Ɩbwaarɛ bʋnyaa, nɩɩ o wu Yesu maa yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gyisa sʋ.
44007056	Nɩɩ Sitefen yɛ, “Fan kɩɩ! N wu sʋsʋ maa bugi nɩɩ n wu Yesu, Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ maa yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gyisa sʋ.”
44007057	Maa tɔwɛ kanɩn kamaa tɔ mʋ ba tii bamʋ asʋ nɩɩ ba kuusi kenken. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ bamʋ kpini ba naa mili mʋ sʋ.
44007058	Nɩɩ ba bɩɩtɛ mʋ lɩɩ kadɛ mʋ tɔ naa twɩɩ mʋ abuu. Nyamaanyɩlɛpʋ mʋ ba taa bamʋ ɩkaalɛ sa kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Sɔɔlɩ yɛ ɔ kɩɩ sʋ.
44007059	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ twɩɩ mʋ abuu mʋ, Sitefen kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu, kɔɔlɛ mɛ kala.”
44007060	Nɩɩ Sitefen muŋa mʋ ayaa muli sʋ tɔwɛ kenken yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu, man taa alibi mʋ nɩɩ ba waa falɛ ka bamʋ kʋkɔ.” Maa tɔwɛ kanɩn mʋ nɩɩ o wu.
44008001	Sɔɔlɩ gbaa bʋ tʋtɔ nɩɩ o kyula Sitefen kelewu mʋ. Kanɩn kakɛ maŋa nɩɩ kanyanla kɩ ba Krisito abi kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyerusalem mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ kpini ba yaasɛ tɔ loo Gyudeya maa Samariya ɩsʋwʋlɛ sʋ. Amaa Krisito asunpu mʋ nkʋn ɩ man yaasɛ tɔ.
44008002	Nɩɩ anyɩn mʋ nɩɩ bee sun Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ akʋ ɩ lɛɛ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ naa pula Sitefen, nɩɩ ba su mʋ keli.
44008003	Amaa Sɔɔlɩ bɩrɛ piili ee nyita Krisito abi kʋbʋ mʋ, yɛgɛ ɔ naa akpaara‐akpaara sʋ ɛɛ bɩɩtɛ anyɩn yɛ akyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba buu Yesu mʋ ee kpee ee tii ibu.
44008004	Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba yaasɛ tɔ mʋ ba naa bɛɛ tɔwɛ Yesu asɩn danbɩrasa katɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba kpee mʋ.
44008005	Nɩɩ Filipu gbaa kpee Samariya kadɛ lala kʋ tɔ naa tɔwɛ Yesu asɩn.
44008006	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ kʋbʋ damantɛ mʋ nu Filipu asɛ nɩɩ ba wu asɩn kyinkyinsa yɛ ɩsɩnkaala mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ, ba kan bamʋ asʋ ba nu mʋ katɔwɛ.
44008007	Nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi ba kuusi kenken lɩɩ asa gaalaagaa tɔ, nɩɩ amʋgʋlɛ‐mʋgʋlɛ yɛ aboobi gaalaagaa ba nyɛ alanfɩya.
44008008	Ɩmʋ sʋ kensi‐gyii lala kɩ ba kadɛ lala maŋa tɔ.
44008009	Kanɩn saŋa maŋa tɔ mʋ, ɔnyɩn kʋ bʋ tɔ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Simon, nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Sɩtaanɛ adangana ɔwaapʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ Samariya kadɛ mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ mʋ awaasa mʋ ɩ waa Samariya abi kɩyan. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɛɛ kaapʋ mʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ ɔ gyɛ nyɩmɩsa kparɛ.
44008010	Lɩɩ falɛ sʋ mʋ asa kparɛ yɛ asansa mʋ kpini bɛɛ nu mʋ asɛ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ ‘Ɔlʋn lala mʋ’.”
44008011	Ɔ waa Sɩtaanɛ adangana ɩnɩmʋ kyɛɛrɛɛ, nɩɩ ɩ waa bamʋ kɩyan nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ asa bee nu mʋ asɛ.
44008012	Amaa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Filipu taa Yesu Krisito kɩtɩɩ tɔ tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii sʋ mʋ, asa mʋ ba kɔɔlɛ asɩn mʋ gyii. Nɩɩ ba gyee anyɩn yɛ akyɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee.
44008013	Nɩɩ Simon mʋ gbaa wu asɩn kyinkyinsa yɛ ɩsɩnkaala mʋ nɩɩ Filipu waa mʋ, ɩ waa mʋ kanankʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ gyii, nɩɩ ba gyee mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee, nɩɩ o buu Filipu kpee katɩn kʋmaa.
44008014	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Krisito asunpu mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyerusalem ba nu yɛ Samariya abi ba kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ gyii mʋ, ba sun Pita maa Gyɔn bamʋ asɛ.
44008015	Ba maa fʋʋ bamʋ asɛ mʋ, ba kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ sa bamʋ yɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ sa bamʋ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ.
44008016	Lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba taa Yesu kɩtɩɩ tɔ gyee bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee mʋ, ba man pɩɩta nyɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ.
44008017	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Pita maa Gyɔn ba taa bamʋ abaa gyaga bamʋ sʋ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ nɩɩ ba nyɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ.
44008018	Simon mʋ maa wu fɛɛ Pita maa Gyɔn ba taa bamʋ abaa gyaga akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ba nyɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ, Simon biti fɛɛ ɔ sa Pita maa Gyɔn afulee. Nɩɩ ɔ yɛ,
44008019	“Fan sa mɛ kanɩn ɔlʋn maŋa, nɩɩ saŋa kʋmaa nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n kan taa mɛ abaa gyaga ɔkʋmaa sʋ mʋ, kɛ ɔ nyɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ maŋa.”
44008020	Amaa Pita tɔwɛ Simon yɛ, “Faa fʋ afulee a biliŋi kɩyan. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ fɩɩ taalɛ taa afulee sɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ kakɛɛ.
44008021	Fʋ man tii sʋ abɛɛ fʋ man sʋ ɔ lɛɛ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kakɛɛ kusun nɩmʋ tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ kɔkɔlɔ kɩ man dɛ Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ.
44008022	Kanɩn sʋ kyɛɛgɛ fʋ nfɛɛrɛ libi kɛ fʋ kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ. Akʋtɔ fɛɛ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ fɛ fʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ taa kɛɛ fʋ.
44008023	Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ n wu fɛɛ kayɩɩ basa kɩ bʋ fʋ tɔ gaa, nɩɩ alibi ɩ bɔla fʋ tɔ.”
44008024	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Simon lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Kʋlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ sa mɛ kɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ falɛ ɩ man ba mɛ sʋ.”
44008025	Pita maa Gyɔn ba gyii Yesu asɩn mʋ kesintin, nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ asɩn mʋ gaa sa bamʋ. Kamaa tɔ mʋ, ba bwii kpee Gyerusalem. Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ bee bwii bee kpee mʋ, ba tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ Samariya ndɛ‐bii gaalaagaa tɔ.
44008026	Nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kabɔɔ tɔwɛ Filipu yɛ, “Kʋsʋ kpee akpɩlɩgɛ ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ dɛ ofuli sʋ mʋ. Kanɩn ɔkpa maŋa kɩ dɛ lɩɩ Gyerusalem naa fʋʋ Gasa kadɛ sʋ.”
44008027	Ɩmʋ sʋ Filipu kʋsʋ yii ɔkpa sʋ ee kpee. Maa kpee mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ naa gyaŋa Etiyopiya ɔwʋlɛ nyipu kparɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ Etiyopiya owura kyɩɩsa afulee sʋ. Ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ kpee Gyerusalem naa sun Ɩbwaarɛ.
44008028	Saŋa maŋa tɔ mʋ, ɔ tɛ mʋ ɩgbaŋɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ bɩɩtɛ asa ɔkyɩnakpa sʋ ee bwii ee kpewu yɛgɛ ɛɛ kalɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Isaya ɔwʋlɛ.
44008029	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu tɔwɛ Filipu yɛ, “Kpe kanɩn ɩgbaŋɛ nɩmʋ asɛ naa yɩlɛ tiri mʋ.”
44008030	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Filipu sɩlɛ kpee Etiyopiya‐nyɩn mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ o nu ɔnyɩn mʋ maa kalɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Isaya ɔwʋlɛ. Nɩɩ Filipu taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɩmʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ kalɛ falɛ fii nu kasɛ?”
44008031	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Nɛnɛ nɩɩ n waa nu kasɛ amɔɔ n nyɛ ɔkʋ kɛ ɔ lɛɛ kasɛ sa mɛ.” Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ tɩɩ Filipu yɛ ɔ ba kyɩna tiri mʋ tɔ.
44008032	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ ɩɩ kalɛ ɛɛ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlɛsa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “O du fɛɛ kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ mʋ ba naa mɔɔ mʋ, abɛɛ kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ be kyiigi mʋ ifuu, yɛgɛ ɔ man bugi mʋ kɔnɔ halɩɩ ee su.
44008033	Nɩɩ ba gyila mʋ ipeeli, nɩɩ ba man gyii kesintin sa mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋ man taalɛ tɔwɛ kaapʋ mʋ kɩnaana, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba tɩn mʋ nkpa sʋ kasɛ sʋ.”
44008034	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ taasɛ Filipu yɛ, “Ɔbɩlɩsa, n kʋlɛ fʋ lɛɛ kasɛ sa mɛ. Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ mʋ, ɩ tɔwɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn nɩn abɛɛ ɔkʋ lɛɛ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ?”
44008035	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Filipu piili ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kalɛ lɩɩ Isaya ɔwʋlɛ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ Yesu n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa mʋ.
44008036	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba naa ɔkpa mʋ tɔ bee kpee mʋ, ba naa tu nkyu kʋ ɩ maa dɛ. Nɩɩ Etiyopiya‐nyɩn mʋ tɔwɛ Filipu yɛ, “Kɩɩ nkyu ndee, mɩnɛ i tii mɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee ɔkpa?”
44008037	Nɩɩ Filipu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ nyɛ nɩɩ fʋ kɔɔlɛ gyii fʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ bɩrɛ, fii biti fʋ nyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee.” Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ Yesu Krisito ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii kʋlʋn mʋ.”
44008038	Nɩɩ Etiyopiya‐nyɩn mʋ yɛgɛ mʋ gbaŋɛ mʋ yɩla. Nɩɩ maa Filipu kpini ba kpɩlɩgɛ loo nkyu mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ Filipu gyee mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyu gyee.
44008039	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba lɩɩ nkyu mʋ tɔ mʋ, opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Kayaayu taa Filipu lɩɩ ɔnyɩn mu ansi sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ man bɩla wu mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ taa kensi‐gyii kyaga mʋ ɔkpa sʋ ee kpewu.
44008040	Nɩɩ ɩ taa Filipu naa lɩɩ Asotusi kadɛ tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ natɛ ndɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ kpini, ɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa halɩɩ ɔ naa fʋʋ Kasariya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
44009001	Saŋa maŋa tɔ mʋ, Sɔɔlɩ dan san ɔ yɩlɛ sʋ, ɔ sʋ kanyanla yɛ kɩmɔɔ aŋala lɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu abuupu mʋ sʋ. Kanɩn sʋ o kpee Ɩbwaarɛ Oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ asɛ,
44009002	nɩɩ ɔ naa tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ ɔ sa mʋ ɩwʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ sa ɔkpa fɛɛ o kpee kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩgyaŋɛkpa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ Damasiko kadɛ mʋ tɔ, kɛ ɔ naa kɩtaa anyɩn yɛ akyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ bee buu Yesu kɩkaapʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ kan nyɛ kanɩn abuupu maŋa kɛ ɔ kɩtaa bamʋ bwii ba Gyerusalem ba tii obu.
44009003	Nɩɩ Sɔɔlɩ maa naa ee kpee mʋ, ɔ naa tiri Damasiko kadɛ lala mʋ. Opula tɔ nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋ kɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba tɩn mu ansi sʋ fɛɛ bʋlayɩ maa wɛɛ ɩsɛɛ mʋ.
44009004	Nɩɩ ɩ tɩn mʋ tʋʋ kasɛ nɩɩ o nu ɔbʋlɛ kʋ maa taasɛ yɛ, “Sɔɔlɩ, Sɔɔlɩ, mɩnɛ waa nɩɩ fii kisi mɛ kanɩn?”
44009005	Nɩɩ Sɔɔlɩ taasɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, fʋ anɩmʋ nɩn?” Nɩɩ ɔbʋlɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɩ gyɛ mɛ Yesu mʋ nɩɩ fii kisi mʋ nɩn.
44009006	Ɩmʋ sʋ kʋsʋ kpee Damasiko kadɛ lala mʋ tɔ, tʋtɔ nɩɩ bee biti ba tɔwɛ fʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ waa.”
44009007	Nɩɩ anyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba maa Sɔɔlɩ ba naa mʋ, ba nu katɔwɛ mʋ, amaa ba man wu ɔkʋ. Nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ, nɩɩ be sii ba yɩlɛ ba man bɩla bugi bamʋ nnɔ.
44009008	Nɩɩ Sɔɔlɩ kʋsʋ maa yɩlɛ nɩɩ o bugi mu ansi mʋ, ɔ man bɩla ɔ kɩɩ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ba sii kɩtaa mʋ kɩbaa tɔ nɩn taa mʋ kpee Damasiko.
44009009	Nɩɩ Sɔɔlɩ biliŋi gyaatanapʋ nkɛ nsa, o mee gyii yɛgɛ o mee nu.
44009010	Nɩɩ Yesu ɔbɩɩlapʋ kʋ bʋ Damasiko kadɛ tɔ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Ananiyasi. Nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu lɛɛ ansi sʋ atɔ kaapʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ, “Ananiyasi.” Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ n kyula.”
44009011	Nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ tɔwɛ Ananiyasi yɛ, “Kʋsʋ kpee Gyudasi kɩkpaara mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ kigbenbi kyiigisa mʋ sʋ, naa taasɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Tasusi kadɛ tɔ nɩɩ bɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Sɔɔlɩ mʋ. Ɔ bʋ tʋtɔ ɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ.”
44009012	Nɩɩ Sɔɔlɩ gbaa wu ansi sʋ kɩlɛɛkaapʋ mʋ tɔ, fɛɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Ananiyasi maa ba kɛ ɔ ba taa mʋ abaa gyaga mʋ sʋ kɛ mu ansi i bugi.
44009013	Amaa Ananiyasi lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, n nu asɩn damantɛ lɩɩ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ sʋ, kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ nyanla fʋ asa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyerusalem mʋ.
44009014	An nu yɛ Sɔɔlɩ nɩmʋ nyɛ ɔlʋn lɩɩ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ ba Damasiko nfɩɩ, ɔ ba kɩtaa asa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ fʋ Yesu kɩtɩɩ mʋ.”
44009015	Amaa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu tɔwɛ Ananiyasi yɛ, “Kʋsʋ kpee! Lɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ ɩ lɛɛ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ fɛɛ mɛ kɩbaa tɔ nyɩmɩsa, kɛ ɔ taa mɛ asɩn mʋ naa tɔwɛ bamʋ nɩɩ be mee sun Ɩbwaarɛ, yɛ ba maa bamʋ awura, yɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi.
44009016	Nɩɩ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ n biti n kaapʋ mʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ee biti o gyii awʋrʋfɔ lɩɩ mɛ kɩtɩɩ sʋ.”
44009017	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Ananiyasi kpee kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ naa taa mʋ abaa gyaga Sɔɔlɩ sʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Mɛ bɩrɩsa Sɔɔlɩ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ fʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ ba nfɩɩ mʋ, i sun mɛ fʋ asɛ kɛ fu ansi i bwii bugi, kɛ fʋ nyɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ.”
44009018	Nɩɩ opula tɔ atɔ kʋ fɛɛ ɔkɩn agyafɔyɩ ɩ lɩɩ Sɔɔlɩ ansi tɔ tɩyɛ, nɩɩ mu ansi i bugi. Nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ nɩɩ ba naa gyee mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee.
44009019	Maa gyii agyitɔ kamaa tɔ mʋ, ɔ nyɛ ɔlʋn. Nɩɩ Sɔɔlɩ gyii nkɛ nkʋ Damasiko Yesu abuupu mʋ asɛ.
44009020	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ kpee Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩgyaŋɛkpa naa tɔwɛ Yesu asɩn yɛ, “Yesu ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii.”
44009021	Asa mʋ nɩɩ ba nu Sɔɔlɩ katɔwɛ mʋ, ɩ waa bamʋ kɩyan nɩɩ ba taasɛ yɛ, “Man gyɛ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ ɩ kyɩna ɛɛ nyanla asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyerusalem bɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn Yesu kɩtɩɩ tɔ mʋ? Nɩɩ man gyɛ kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ o bwii ba, kɛ ɔ ba kɩtaa bamʋ naa sa Ɩbwaarɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa o tii obu?”
44009022	Amaa Sɔɔlɩ nyɛ ɔlʋn tii sʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ, ɛɛ kaapʋ tɔ yɛ Yesu ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋnɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ yɛ ɔ ba mɔlɩgɛ asa. Nɩɩ i kyinkyin Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Damasiko kadɛ tɔ mʋ.
44009023	Nɩɩ ɩmʋ kamaa tɔ ɩ maa gyii nkɛ nkʋ mʋ Gyiwu abi ba ŋmina yɛ ba mɔɔ Sɔɔlɩ.
44009024	Amaa Sɔɔlɩ bɩɩ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ mʋ kɩmɔɔ mʋ sʋ lɩɩ fɛɛ ba sii ba tɛ bɛɛ kɩɩ kadɛ mʋ nwusunɔ mʋ sʋ kakyʋwapɛ yɛ kagyanbwɛ kʋmaa kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba nyɛ mʋ mɔɔ.
44009025	Amaa Yesu abuupu ba taa mʋ waa kɩlantan tɔ kakyanbwɛ, baala mʋ taa mʋ bʋlɛ kɩbandɩyɛ ɔbɔ tɔ kpɩlɩgaa mʋ yii.
44009026	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Sɔɔlɩ kpee Gyerusalem mʋ, o biti fɛɛ ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ naa tii abɩɩlapʋ mʋ sʋ, amaa ba waa kufuu yɛ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba man kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii yɛ o tii Yesu abuupu mʋ sʋ.
44009027	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Banabasi taa mʋ kpee asunpu mʋ asɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Sɔɔlɩ wu Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ Damasiko ɔkpa tɔ, yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ tɔwɛ Sɔɔlɩ mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla tɔwɛ bamʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Sɔɔlɩ man waa kufuu, nɩɩ ɔ yɩlɛ tɔwɛ lɩɩ Yesu Krisito kɩtɩɩ tɔ Damasiko kadɛ tɔ.
44009028	Ɩmʋ sʋ Sɔɔlɩ kyɩna bamʋ asɛ Gyerusalem yɛgɛ ɔ sʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ kɩtɩɩ tɔ ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛgɛ ɔ man sʋ kufuu.
44009029	Nɩɩ Sɔɔlɩ maa Giriki abi mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ Gyiwu katɔwɛ mʋ, ba gyii abaa ɩmɔɔrɛ, amaa yɛgɛ ba biti mʋ kɩmɔɔ ɔkpa.
44009030	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ mʋ tɔɔmaa ana ba bɩɩ kanɩn mʋ, ba taa mʋ kpee Kasariya kadɛ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ naa kyaga sʋ kpee mʋ kadɛ tɔ Tasusi.
44009031	Ɩmʋ sʋ Krisito abi kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ Gyudeya yɛ Galile yɛ Samariya kpini ba nyɛ kayɩɩ yuuli. Nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ waa bamʋ aniya tɔ, nɩɩ ba nyɛ akyɔ bɛɛ kpan bamʋ n‐yɩɩ, yɛgɛ ba sɩlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ.
44009032	Nɩɩ Pita kʋsʋ ɔ naa ɔ naa ɩsʋwʋlɛ mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ naa bɔɔ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Lida mʋ sʋ.
44009033	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ naa wu ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ i wu, nɩɩ ɔ dɛ nsu nburuwa nɩɩ bɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Aneyasi.
44009034	Nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Aneyasi, kʋsʋ taa fʋ kalan, Yesu Krisito kyɛ fʋ.” Opula tɔ nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ.
44009035	Ɩmʋ sʋ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Lida yɛ Saron mʋ kpini ba maa wu kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ba kyɛɛgɛ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ biliŋi ba Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ asɛ.
44009036	Nɩɩ Gyopa kadɛ tɔ ɔkyɩɩ kɔɔlɛ‐gyipu kʋ bʋ tʋtɔ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Tabita. Tabita ɩmʋ Giriki katɔwɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ Dokasi. Dokasi maŋa ɩ waa adanbɩrasa yɛgɛ ɛɛ kyɛ atiripu tɔ saŋa kʋmaa.
44009037	Kanɩn saŋa maa mʋ kɩlɔ kɩ daa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ o wu. Nɩɩ ba gyee mʋ kubuni naa dɩɩla abansʋrʋ obu to.
44009038	Lida kadɛ kɩ man bʋ kata yɛ Gyopa kadɛ. Ɩmʋ sʋ Yesu abuupu mʋ ba maa nu fɛɛ Pita bʋ Lida mʋ, nɩɩ ba sun anyɩn anyɔ Pita asɛ naa tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Waa bilen kɛ fʋ ba anɛ asɛ.”
44009039	Ɩmʋ sʋ Pita maa bamʋ nɩɩ ba sun mʋ asɛ mʋ, ba bwii kpee Gyopa. Nɩɩ ba taa Pita kpee abansʋrʋ obu mʋ tɔ, ntɩn mʋ nɩɩ obuni mʋ dɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ akulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ obu mʋ tɔ mʋ kpini, ba kyaabɔɔ Pita bɛ sawʋ yɛgɛ ba sʋ atɔ bunsa mʋ nɩɩ Dokasi baata sa bamʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ nkpa tɔ mʋ bɛɛ kaapʋ Pita.
44009040	Amaa nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ obu mʋ tɔ kpini yɛ, ba lɩɩ kewu. Nɩɩ Pita muŋa mʋ ayaa muuli sʋ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ, nɩɩ o biliŋi mu ansi kaapʋ obuni mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Tabita, kʋsʋ.” Nɩɩ o bugi mʋ ansi wu Pita, nɩɩ ɔ kʋsʋ kyɩna.
44009041	Nɩɩ Pita kɩtaa mʋ kɩbaa tɔ kʋsaa mʋ yɩlɛ. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu yɛ akulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ taa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ o kyiŋi mʋ sa bamʋ.
44009042	Falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ ɩ yaasɛ loo Gyopa kadɛ tɔ kpini. Nɩɩ asa gaalaagaa ba kɔɔlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu mʋ gyii.
44009043	Nɩɩ Pita kyɩna Gyopa kadɛ tɔ, ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ Simon nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ gbansaba mʋ asɛ nkɛ nnyɔ kʋ.
44010001	Ɔbɩlɩsa kʋ bʋ tɔ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Koneliyo. Nɩɩ ɔ tɛ Kasariya kadɛ tɔ. Ɔ kyɩna ɔ gyɛ anaakɔpʋ ɔbɩlɩsa sa Roma anaakɔpʋ kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ kɩmʋ yɛ Itali abi kʋbʋ mʋ.
44010002	Maa mʋ kʋʋpʋ ana ba taa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sa Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ ba sɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ. Ɔ gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɛɛ atiripu atɔ nɩɩ ɔ bɩla ɔ sʋ saŋa sa kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ.
44010003	Kanyɩn nɩmʋ nyɛ kɩlɛɛkaapʋ kakɛ kʋ kakyʋwapɛ ɩ waa fɛɛ kerefi asa saŋa tɔ. O wu Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ maa ba mʋ asɛ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ, “Koneliyo!”
44010004	Nɩɩ ɔ kɩɩ mʋ yɛ kufuu nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mɩnɛ nɩn?” Nɩɩ kabɔɔ mʋ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ ansi i gyii fʋ kakɛɛ yɛ fʋ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ee biti o kyula fʋ.
44010005	Nbɩɩnbɩɩ, sun asa kʋ kpee Gyopa ba naa tɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Simon Pita mʋ ba.
44010006	Ɔ bʋ Simon mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ gbansaba mʋ ayɛ nɩn, nɩɩ kɩ bʋ kɩ maa ɔpʋ mʋ.”
44010007	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ ɩ kyʋn mʋ, nɩɩ Koneliyo tɩɩ mʋ ayaafɔlɛ anyɔ yɛ mʋ anaakɔpʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa kʋtɔ kʋmaa ɛɛ sa mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ.
44010008	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o wu nɩɩ o sun bamʋ Gyopa.
44010009	Lɩɩkaakɛ mʋ Koneliyo nbɔɔ ba maa tiri Gyopa mʋ Pita mɔɔ dii kpee abansʋrʋ sʋsʋ ɔ naa kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ kakyʋwapɛ maŋa.
44010010	Akʋn a kɩtaa mʋ, nɩɩ ee biti kʋtɔ kʋ o gyii. Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa agyitɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ ansi sʋ kɩlɛɛkaapʋ.
44010011	O wu sʋsʋ maa bugi nɩɩ o wu kʋtɔ kʋ, maa lɩɩ sʋsʋ fɛɛ kɩtaa lala kɩɩ kpɩlɩgɛ kɩɩ ba kasɛ. Kɩ maa kɩmʋ anobi ana.
44010012	Kɩtaa mʋ sʋ mʋ, o wu atɔbwaaya kʋmaa yɛ nbwiibi yɛ atɔbwaaya mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kpɩɩ ɩtɔ sʋ kpini.
44010013	Nɩɩ o nu ɔbʋlɛ kʋ maa tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Pita! Kʋsʋ mɔɔ kɛ fu gyii.”
44010014	Nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ ayee, n man pɩɩta gyii falɛ ineesi atɔ abɛɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ anɛ Gyiwu abi ikisii.”
44010015	Nɩɩ ɔbʋlɛ mʋ bɩla tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Man bɩla tɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɔŋɔ kɩmʋ mʋ, yɛ ineesi kʋtɔ.”
44010016	Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ waa kanɩn ɩlɩɩ ɩsa, nɩɩ ɩ taa kɩtaa mʋ yɛ atɔ mʋ bwii kyʋn sʋsʋ.
44010017	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Pita san ɛɛ fɛ ɩmʋ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ, nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ Koneliyo sun mʋ ba bɩɩ Simon kɩkpaara mʋ, nɩɩ ba ba yɩlɛ kɩmʋ kewusunɔ.
44010018	Nɩɩ ba tɩɩ ɔkʋ taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn kʋ bʋ nfɩɩ nɩɩ bɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Simon Pita?”
44010019	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Pita san ɛɛ fɛ mʋ kɩlɛɛkaapʋ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Anyɩn asa akʋ bee biti fʋ.
44010020	Ɩmʋ sʋ kpɩlɩgɛ kpee bamʋ asɛ, man kan kina katɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ faa bamʋ fen biti fan kpee, lɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ ɩ sun bamʋ fʋ asɛ.”
44010021	Nɩɩ Pita kpɩlɩgɛ ba kasɛ tɔ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ anyɩn mʋ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ fen biti mʋ. Mɩnɛ ɩ waa?”
44010022	Nɩɩ anyɩn mʋ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ “Anaakɔpʋ ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Koneliyo mʋ i sun anɛ. Ɔ gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ mʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi nɩɩ ɔ sɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ Gyiwu abi kpini bɛ sa mʋ bɛɛrɛɛ. Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ ɔ tɩɩ fʋ ba mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ, kɛ o nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ sa mʋ.”
44010023	Nɩɩ Pita taa anyɩn mʋ loo kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ bamʋ, kɩtaa bamʋ kɩfɔ. Lɩɩkaakɛ mʋ, nɩɩ Pita maa Yesu abɩɩlapʋ akʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba lɩɩ Gyopa mʋ ba buu bamʋ.
44010024	Ɩmʋ lɩɩkaakɛ nɩɩ ba fʋʋ Kasariya. Yɛgɛ Koneliyo maa mʋ kʋʋpʋ ana yɛ mʋ kyɛmɩnɛ ana ba sarɛ bee gyoo mʋ.
44010025	Pita maa biti o loo kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ Koneliyo gyaŋa mʋ, nɩɩ o muŋa o sun mʋ.
44010026	Amaa Pita kɩtaa mʋ kɩbaa tɔ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ “Kʋsʋ yɩlɛ! Ngbaa mɛ n dan n gyɛ nyɩmɩsa nɩn fɛɛ fʋ falɛ!”
44010027	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ maa Pita bɛɛ waa kiligyima bee loo kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ naa tu asa ba maa sarɛ ba tɛ.
44010028	Nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ fan dan fen nyi fɛɛ naafɔɔ ɩ man dɛ ɔkpa fɛɛ Gyiwu nyɩmɩsa maa bʋga ɔmʋ nɩɩ o mee sun Ɩbwaarɛ abɛɛ ɔ bɔɔ mʋ sʋ. Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ kaapʋ mɛ fɛɛ n man tɔwɛ ɔkʋ yɛ ɔ man du kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ.
44010029	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan maa sun tɩɩ mɛ mʋ n man kina, kanɩn sʋ fan tɔwɛ mɛ kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ fan tɩɩ mɛ.”
44010030	Nɩɩ Koneliyo lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ndaga nkɛ nna nɩmʋ n maa kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ kerefi asa kakyʋwapɛ saŋa mʋ. Opula tɔ nɩɩ n wu ɔnyɩn kʋ maa bun kaalɛ fufuli ba yɩlɛ mi ansi tɔ.”
44010031	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, “Koneliyo Ɩbwaarɛ nu fʋ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ, nɩɩ o wu fʋ kakɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ kɛɛ atiripu mʋ.
44010032	Ɩmʋ sʋ sun asa kpee Gyopa kɛ ba naa tɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Simon Pita mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ ɔfɔ ɔ bʋ Simon mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ gbansaba nɩɩ mʋ kɩkpaara bʋ mata ɔpʋ mʋ.
44010033	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n sun tɩɩ fʋ bilen, nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn fɛɛ fʋ maa ba. Nbɩɩnbɩɩ an gyaŋɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ an nu fʋ asɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ taa sa fʋ yɛ fʋ ba tɔwɛ anɛ mʋ.”
44010034	Nɩɩ Pita tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ n bɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ gyɛ kesintin Ɩbwaarɛ mɛɛ kɩɩ nyɩmɩsa ansi tɔ pɔyɩ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa kʋtɔ kʋ.
44010035	Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ kɔɔlɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ ndɛndɛmandɛ ɔ sɩlɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɛɛ waa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa mʋ.
44010036	Fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fan nu asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa bɩya Gyiwu abi nɩɩ ɔ bɔla Yesu Krisito mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ dulinyaa tɔ atɔ kpini Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ sʋ taa kayɩɩ yuuli asɩn danbɩrasa sa bamʋ.
44010037	Nɩɩ fan nyi asɩn kparɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa Gyiwu ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ nɩɩ i piili lɩɩ Galile mʋ. Ɩ waa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Gyɔn tɔwɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee asɩn mʋ kamaa.
44010038	Fan nu Yesu Kanasareti‐nyɩn mʋ asɩn, kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa mʋ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ yɛ ɔlʋn bɔla mʋ tɔ mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tii mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ katɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o kpee mʋ ɛɛ waa adanbɩrasa yɛgɛ ɛɛ kyɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ bʋ mʋ tɔ.
44010039	“Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa Gyerusalem yɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ kpini‐kpini mʋ, anɛ asunpu nɩmʋ an gyɛ ɩmʋ kesintin agyipu. Ba da mʋ oyu laasa sʋ mɔɔ mʋ.
44010040	Amaa nkɛ nsa kamaa tɔ mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kyiŋi mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ. Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ.
44010041	Man gyɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ amɔɔ anɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ yɛ an baa an gyɛ mʋ kesintin agyipu mʋ maa wu kyiŋi kamaa tɔ mʋ ana mʋ a bʋga gyii nɩɩ an nu.
44010042	Nɩɩ Yesu sa anɛ kɔnɔ yɛ a taa tɔwɛ Abwaarɛsɩn mʋ sa Gyiwu kasɛ sʋ asa kpini. Kɛ a lɛɛ kesintin mʋ kaapʋ fɛɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ asa kɩɩsa yɛ alewupu kpini ɔtalɛpʋ.
44010043	Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ kpini ba tɔwɛ mʋ asɩn mʋ kaapʋ tɔ yɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii mʋ, lɩɩ mʋ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ taa mu alibi kɛɛ mʋ.”
44010044	Pita maa san ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ, Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ba loo bamʋ nɩɩ bee nu asɩn mʋ kpini tɔ.
44010045	I kyinkyin Gyiwu akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ nɩɩ ba buu Pita lɩɩ Gyopa ba mʋ gaa, fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ maa taa mʋ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi.
44010046	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba nu ba maa tɔwɛ ntɔwɛ pʋpwɛ yɛgɛ bɛɛ yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ. Nɩɩ Pita taasɛ yɛ,
44010047	“Ba maa nyɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an nyɛ falɛ mʋ, ɔkʋ ɩ taalɛ tii ɔkpa fɛɛ ba man gyee bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee?”
44010048	Nɩɩ Pita sa kɔnɔ yɛ ba gyee bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee lɩɩ Yesu Krisito kɩtɩɩ tɔ. Nɩɩ ba kʋlɛ Pita yɛ ɔ kyɩna bamʋ asɛ nkɛ nyɔ nkʋ.
44011001	Krisito asunpu mʋ yɛ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyudeya mʋ kpini ba nu yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ gbaa ba kɔɔlɛ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ.
44011002	Ɩmʋ sʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Pita bwii kpee Gyerusalem mʋ, akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ tɔ sa iduu kɩtɩn mʋ
44011003	ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fu loo bamʋ nɩɩ ba man tɩn iduu mʋ akpaara sʋ nɩɩ faa bamʋ fan bʋga gyii.”
44011004	Nɩɩ Pita lɛɛ kasɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa kʋkʋlʋn‐kʋkʋlʋn sa bamʋ tɔwɛ yɛ,
44011005	“Kakaakʋ n bʋ Gyopa kadɛ tɔ n kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ. Nɩɩ n nyɛ ansi sʋ kɩlɛɛkaapʋ wu sʋsʋ maa bugi. Nɩɩ n wu kʋtɔ kʋ maa lɩɩ sʋsʋ fɛɛ kɩtaa lʋʋsa kɩlala, nɩɩ ba sʋ kɩmʋ anobi ana mʋ tɔ ba kasɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ.
44011006	N maa kɩɩ kɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, n wu atɔbwaaya yɛ nbwiibi yɛ atɔbwaaya mʋ nɩɩ bɛ kpɩɩ ɩtɔ sʋ.
44011007	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ n nu ɔbʋlɛ kʋ maa tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, ‘Pita kʋsʋ mɔɔ kɛ fu gyii.’
44011008	“Nɩɩ n lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, ‘Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ ayee, falɛ ineesi atɔ abɛɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ anɛ Gyiwu abi ii kisi ɩ man pɩɩta loo mɛ kɔnɔ tɔ.’
44011009	“Nɩɩ ɔbʋlɛ maŋa bɩla tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ man bɩla tɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɔŋɔ kɩmʋ kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ yɛ ineesi kʋtɔ.
44011010	Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ waa kanɩn ɩlɩɩ ɩsa, nɩɩ ɩ taa kɩtaa mʋ yɛ atɔ mʋ bwii kyʋn sʋsʋ.
44011011	“Saŋa maŋa tɔ anyɩn asa mʋ nɩɩ ba sun bamʋ lɩɩ Kasariya ba ba mɛ asɛ mʋ, ba ba yɩlɛ kɩkpaara mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ kɩmʋ sʋ mʋ.
44011012	Nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ man kan gyii ɩmɔɔrɛ, faa bamʋ fan kpee. Akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu asiye anɩmʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba lɩɩ Gyopa mʋ i sun mɛ kpee naa loo, ɔnyɩn mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ.
44011013	Ɔ tɔwɛ anɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ o wu Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ maa ba yɩlɛ mu obu to, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, ‘Sun asa akʋ kpee Gyopa ba naa tɩɩ Simon mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Pita mʋ.
44011014	Ee biti ɔ tɔwɛ fanɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ faa fʋ kɩkpaara sʋ abi kpini fan nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ.’
44011015	“N maa piili n tɔwɛ bamʋ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ, Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ ba bamʋ tɔ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ o loo anɛ tɔ npiili asɛ mʋ.
44011016	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ n nyiŋi asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu wʋla tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Gyɔn taa nkyu nɩn gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee. Amaa fanɛɛ fanɛ bɩrɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ taa mʋ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ gyee fanɛ.’
44011017	Ɩmʋ sʋ fɛɛ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa bamʋ kakɛɛ kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sa anɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ an kɔɔlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu gyii mʋ, mɛ ɩ gyɛ anɩmʋ kɛ n taalɛ tii Ɩbwaarɛ ɔkpa?”
44011018	Krisito abuupu mʋ maa nu kanɩn mʋ, ba man bɩla taalɛ tɔwɛ sɛhn, nɩɩ ba yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ. Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ gbaa ɔkpa fɛɛ ba yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa kɛ ba nyɛ nkpa.
44011019	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba twɩɩ abuu mɔɔ Sitefen mʋ, kanyanla kɩ ba Yesu akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ akʋ ba yaasɛ tɔ loo Fonesiya yɛ Sipuru yɛ Antiyoki kasɛ sʋ yɛgɛ bɛɛ tɔwɛ Yesu asɩn mʋ bɛɛ sa Gyiwu abi nkʋn.
44011020	Yesu akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu akʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba lɩɩ Sipuru yɛ Siren ba Antiyoki mʋ, ba tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa lɩɩ Yesu Krisito sʋ sa Giriki abi gbaa.
44011021	Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kɩbaa kɩmaa gyan bamʋ sʋ sʋ mʋ, asa damantɛ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii nɩɩ ba be buu Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ.
44011022	Krisito abi kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyerusalem mʋ ba maa nu kanɩn asɩn nɩmʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ba sun Banabasi kpee Antiyoki.
44011023	Maa naa fʋʋ tʋtɔ mʋ, nɩɩ o wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bwaala bamʋ mʋ, mu ansi i gyii nɩɩ ɔ waa bamʋ aniya tɔ yɛ ba nyɛ kɔkɔlɔ kʋlʋn Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ.
44011024	Banabasi kyɩna ɔ gyɛ nyɩmɩsa danbɩrasa nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩkyɔ nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ bɔla mʋ tɔ lɩɩ kanɩn sʋ asa damantɛ ba ba kɔɔlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ gyii.
44011025	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Banabasi kpee Tasusi kadɛ tɔ ɔ naa biti Sɔɔlɩ.
44011026	Maa naa wu mʋ mʋ, o bwiiyaa mʋ ba Antiyoki. Nɩɩ maa mʋ kpini ba sii Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ asɛ kesu laalaamuu yɛgɛ bɛ kaapʋ asa damantɛ. Antiyoki tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba piili kasɛ bɛɛ tɩɩ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ yɛ Krisito abi.
44011027	Kanɩn saŋa maŋa tɔ mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ akʋ ba lɩɩ Gyerusalem kpee Antiyoki.
44011028	Bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Agabu mʋ, kʋsʋ yɩlɛ lɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ ɔlʋn tɔ sʋ tɔwɛ yɩla yɛ, akʋn lala a biti a tɛ Roma Ɩsʋwʋlɛ kpini sʋ. (Kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ nɩɩ Kuludi gyɛ Roma Owura lala mʋ.)
44011029	Kanɩn sʋ Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Antiyoki mʋ, ba taa nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ taa kɩkyɛtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ nyɛ, kɛ ba taa naa sa Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyudeya mʋ.
44011030	Nɩɩ ba taa bamʋ nkyɛtɔ mʋ sa Banabasi maa Sɔɔlɩ yɛ ba taa naa sa Krisito abɩɩlapʋ abɩlɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyerusalem mʋ.
44012001	Saŋa maŋa tɔ nɩɩ Owura Herodi yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba naa kɩtaa Krisito abɩɩlapʋ akʋ, nɩɩ ee biti fɛɛ ɔ nyanla bamʋ.
44012002	Ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba tɩn Gyɔn mʋ‐daa Gyemisi kumu.
44012003	Maa wu fɛɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ maa pɩrɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ, ɔ kyaga sʋ naa kɩtaa Pita gbaa. Ɩnɩmʋ kpini ɩ waa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ bee gyii Kesu kɔnɔ kɔlɔŋɔ bodobodo mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ kɩfɛ tinsa mʋ.
44012004	Maa kɩtaa mʋ mʋ, ɔ taa mʋ tii obu nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ naa waa anaakɔpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ ana ntun nna mʋ abaa tɔ yɛ bɛ kɩɩ obu tiisa mʋ sʋ. Herodi waa mʋ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ, nɩɩ ba kan gyii Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ Kesu kɔnɔ kɔlɔŋɔ kyʋn lʋwɛ mʋ, ee biti ɔ lɛɛ Pita ifuli kɛ ba gyii mʋ asɩn.
44012005	Ɩmʋ sʋ Pita san o tii obu, amaa Krisito abi kʋbʋ mʋ ba payɩ kinsi bɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ bɛ sa mʋ.
44012006	Ɩmʋ kagyanbwɛ pɔyɩ kayɩ kɩ kɛ, kɛ Owura Herodi lɛɛ mʋ o be gyii mʋ asɩn mʋ, ba da mʋ ɩgbɛɛ yɛgɛ ɔ dɛ anaakɔpʋ anyɔ nsana yɛgɛ anaakɔpʋ akʋ ba bɩla ba yɩlɛ kebunɔ.
44012007	Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ ba obu tiisa mʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɩ ŋmaŋɛ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ da Pita kyiŋi, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Kʋsʋ yɩlɛ bilen.” Nɩɩ agbeeleebi mʋ nɩɩ ba taa da mʋ ɩgbɛɛ mʋ ɩ saŋɛ ɩ lɩɩ tɩyɛ.
44012008	Nɩɩ kabɔɔ mʋ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Bun fʋ atɔ kɛ fʋ waa asɩbɩta, kɛ fu bun fʋ balɩmaasʋ kɛ fʋ buu mɛ.”
44012009	Nɩɩ Pita buu kabɔɔ mʋ lɩɩ abu tiisa mʋ tɔ, amaa Pita man nyi fɛɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kabɔɔ mʋ ɩ waa mʋ gyɛ kesintin. Ɩ waa mʋ nɩn fɛɛ ɩ gyɛ ansi sʋ kɩlɛɛkaapʋ nɩn.
44012010	Ba kyʋn nbunɔ akɩɩsʋpʋ gyankpaasa kɩnyɔsapʋ mʋ sʋ naa fʋʋ kebunɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba taa abɩlɩtɔ waa mʋ, nɩɩ lɩɩ kɩmʋ tɔ taa kpee kadɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ. Ba maa fʋʋ tʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kebunɔ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa tigi nɩɩ ba lɩɩ. Ba maa natɛ ɔkpa mʋ sʋ kpee ansi tɔ gbɛrɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ kɩ nyaa mu ansi sʋ.
44012011	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɩ ŋmaŋɛ Pita sʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɩ gyɛ kesintin nɩn fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ sun mʋ kabɔɔ yɛ ɔ ba kɔɔlɛ mɛ lɩɩ Owura Herodi abaa tɔ yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi ba da ŋmina yɛ ba waa mɛ mʋ.”
44012012	Maa fɛ ɩnɩmʋ kpini nfɛɛrɛ mʋ o kpee Maki Gyɔn mu‐nyi Mɛɛrɩ kɩkpaara sʋ, opula mʋ nɩɩ asa kʋkyɔ, ba gyaŋɛ bɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ mʋ.
44012013	Nɩɩ Pita da kewusunɔ ɔpʋnʋ, nɩɩ kibite mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Roda mʋ ba suŋa kɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ daa.
44012014	Kebite mʋ maa bɩɩ yɛ ɩ gyɛ Pita ɔbʋlɛ mʋ, ɩ maa waa mʋ ɔkɔn gaa sʋ o man tigi ɔpʋnʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ sɩlɛ naa tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ Pita ɩ yɩlɛ kewusunɔ.
44012015	Roda maa tɔwɛ kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fɩɩ lɔ ɩbʋn nɩn?” Maa dan san ɔ yɩlɛ sʋ ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ ɩ gyɛ kesintin mʋ, nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Falɛ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ Pita sʋ nɩn.”
44012016	Amaa Pita dan san ɔ yɩlɛ kewusunɔ ɛɛ daa ɔpʋnʋ mʋ. Ba maa tigi ɔpʋnʋ mʋ, ba wu Pita, nɩɩ ɩ waa bamʋ kɩyan.
44012017	Nɩɩ Pita nyɛɛ bamʋ kɩbaa yɛ ba bun bamʋ nnɔ sʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ lɛɛ mʋ lɩɩ obu tiisa mʋ tɔ mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Fan naa tɔwɛ sa Gyɔn maa akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ nɩɩ ba san mʋ, kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa.” Pita maa tɔwɛ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ kpee katɩnkʋ.
44012018	Ɩmʋ nyenyenfuu mʋ, nfɛɛrɛ ɩ kɩtaa anaakɔpʋ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba man nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa Pita.
44012019	Owura Herodi sa kɔnɔ yɛ ba naa biti Pita ba. Amaa ba biti mʋ kpɩnɛ nɩɩ ba man wu mʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ Owura mʋ taasɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ tɔ asɩn kpɩnɛ, nɩɩ ɔ sa kɔnɔ yɛ ba mɔɔ bamʋ kpini. Nɩɩ Owura Herodi lɩɩ Gyudeya kpee Kasariya naa kyɩna tʋtɔ gyii nkɛ gbɛrɛɛ.
44012020	Owura Herodi nyɛ agbʋ lɩɩ Tayi yɛ Sidon abi sʋ. Nɩɩ ba waa kɔnɔ kʋlʋn sun kpee Herodi asɛ. Ba bɔla Owura Herodi kɩyaafɔlɛ bɩlɩsa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Bilasitu mʋ sʋ, sun ɩmata Herodi asɛ lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ nyɛ bamʋ agyitɔ bɛɛ lɩɩ.
44012021	Kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba yɩla maa fʋʋ mʋ, Owura Herodi bun mʋ awura tɔ naa kyɩna mʋ kuwura‐gya sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ asɩn mʋ tɔwɛ sa bamʋ.
44012022	Nɩɩ asa mʋ ba kuusi nɩɩ ba gyaabii mʋ yɛ, “Ɩnɩmʋ bɩrɛ ɩ man gyɛ nyɩmɩsa ɔbʋlɛ nɩn, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ kʋ ɔbʋlɛ nɩn.
44012023	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Owura Herodi maa man taa kanɩn bʋnyaa sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ. Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ kɩlɔ kɩ da mʋ, nɩɩ ɔtɔ tɔ asʋnswɛɛ ba wɛ mʋ mɔɔ.
44012024	“Amaa abwaarɛsɩn mʋ ɩ dan san ɩ kyaga sʋ ɩ yɛlɩgɛ i tii sʋ i kpee ansi tɔ.”
44012025	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Banabasi maa Sɔɔlɩ ba lʋwɛ bamʋ kusun mʋ, ba lɩɩ Gyerusalem bwii kpee Antiyoki, nɩɩ ba taa Gyɔn mʋ nɩɩ ba bɩla bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Maki mʋ tii bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ.
44013001	Kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ Krisito abi kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Antiyoki mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ yɛ akaapʋpʋ akʋ ba bʋ tʋtɔ. Nɩɩ bamʋ ɩ gyɛ Banabasi, yɛ Simeyon mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Nigya, yɛ Lusiyu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Siren, yɛ Sɔɔlɩ maa Maniya mʋ nɩɩ ba bɩla maa Herodi bʋga mʋ.
44013002	Ba maa kyaga sʋ bee sun Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ bee ŋmina kɔnɔ mʋ, Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ba tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan lɛɛ Banabasi maa Sɔɔlɩ kɛ ba naa waa kusun mʋ nɩɩ n tɩɩ bamʋ yɛ ba ba waa mʋ.”
44013003	Nɩɩ ba bwii ŋmina kɔnɔ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ taa bamʋ abaa gyaga bamʋ sʋ sa bamʋ ɔkpa.
44013004	Nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ maŋa ɩ kaapʋ bamʋ, nɩɩ ɔ gyankpaa bamʋ, nɩɩ ba lɩɩ tʋtɔ kpee Selusiya, nɩɩ ba bɔla nkyu sʋ kpee Sipuru kifintin sʋ.
44013005	Ba maa fʋʋ Salami mʋ ba tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa, nɩɩ Gyɔn Maki gbaa kyɛ bamʋ tɔ.
44013006	Ɩmʋ kamaa ba natɛ kyaabɔɔ kifintin mʋ sʋ kpini naa fʋʋ Pafosi. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba tu Kagyiwu‐nyɩn kʋ mu nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Baa‐Yesu. Ɔ sʋ nbwɩɩ libi ɛɛ waa adangana nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ.
44013007	Kifintin mʋ sʋ owura mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Segusi Polusi kyɩna ɔ gyɛ Baa Yesu mʋ kyɛmɩnɛ nɩn. Owura mʋ sʋ kanyaasɩn gaa. O sun tɩɩ Banabasi maa Pɔɔlɩ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ee biti o nu abwaarɛsɩn lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ.
44013008	Amaa nbwɩɩ libi wuya Baa‐Yesu, nɩɩ mʋ Giriki katɔwɛ tɔ ɩ gyɛ Elimasi mʋ, mee biti fɛɛ owura mʋ o nu kɛ ɔ kɔɔlɛ gyii.
44013009	Nɩɩ Sɔɔlɩ mʋ nɩɩ bɛ bɩla bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ Pɔɔlɩ, nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ bɔla mʋ tɔ mʋ, kɩɩ Elimasi kyiim nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ,
44013010	“Fʋ gyɛ Sɩtaanɛ obii nɩn nɩɩ fʋ gyɛ ɔdʋn sa kesintin kpini. Fʋ naa alibi ɔkpa sʋ fɩɩ pɩna asa, nɩɩ fii biti fu biliŋi Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ asɩn mʋ yɛ ɩ man waa kesintin.
44013011	Kɩɩ, Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ kɩbaa fʋ sʋ. Fii biti fu biliŋi gyaatanapʋ kɛ fʋ man bɩla wu kyɔwɛ naa fʋʋ saŋa kʋ.” Opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ ɩ waa mu ansi sʋ kitentenbiri. Nɩɩ o sii ɛɛ kyaabɔɔ ee biti ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɩtaa mʋ kɩbaa tɔ kaapʋ mʋ ɔkpa.
44013012	Owura mʋ maa wu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa mʋ, yɛ abwaarɛsɩn kɩkaapʋ mʋ, ɩ waa mʋ kɩyan nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ asɩn mʋ gyii.
44013013	Pɔɔlɩ maa mʋ kʋbʋ ba lɩɩ Pafosi bɔla nkyu sʋ ba Pega kadɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Panfiliya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba maa Gyɔn Maki ba barɩgɛ abaa nɩɩ Gyɔn bwii kpee Gyerusalem.
44013014	Amaa Banabasi maa Pɔɔlɩ ba lɩɩ Pega kpee Antiyoki mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Pisidiya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ. Kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ mʋ, ba kpee Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa tɔ naa kyɩna.
44013015	Asa mʋ ɔkʋ maa kalɛ lɩɩ Mosesi nbara ɩwʋlɛ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ ɩwʋlɛ lʋwɛ mʋ, tʋtɔ alʋlʋnpʋ ba taa tʋʋ Pɔɔlɩ maa Banabasi ansi tɔ yɛ, “Anɛ bɩrɩsa ana, nɩɩ fan sʋ asɩn tɔwɛ waa asa mʋ, fan tɔwɛ anɛ.”
44013016	Nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ nɩɩ ɔ kʋsaa mʋ kɩbaa nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Gyiwu abi yɛ fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan man gyɛ Gyiwu abi, nɩɩ fen sun Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, fan nu mɛ asɛ.
44013017	Anɛ Gyiwu abi anɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, lɛɛ anɛ naana ana nɩɩ ɔ sa bamʋ kanyɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Egyipiti ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ ɔlʋn lɛɛ bamʋ lɩɩ ɔsʋwʋlɛ maŋa tɔ.
44013018	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩɩ bamʋ sʋ nsu adɩna saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ ofuli sʋ mʋ.
44013019	Ɩsʋwʋlɛ isunɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ Kena kasɛ sʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ gya bamʋ lɩɩ tʋtɔ, nɩɩ ɔ taa kasɛ mʋ sa Ɩsɩrayɩ abi nɩɩ ki biliŋi bamʋ kapatɩyɛ.
44013020	Ɩmʋ kpini ɩ waa nsu alɩfa ana yɛ adunuu. “Kamaa mʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa bamʋ atalapʋ naa fʋʋ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Samuweli sʋ.
44013021	Nɩɩ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi ba tɔwɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ ɔ lɛɛ owura sa bamʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ Kiisi mu‐bii Sɔɔlɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Bengyamin kanaan tɔ, nɩɩ o gyii kuwura nsu adɩna.
44013022	Ɩbwaarɛ maa kʋsaa Sɔɔlɩ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa Dawidi yii Ɩsɩrayɩ kuwura. Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ, ‘N wu Dawidi. Gyeese mu‐bii mʋ nɩɩ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ ki biti, nɩɩ mʋ ii biti ɔ waa mɛ kɔkɔlɔ biti.’
44013023	“Dawidi kanaan tɔ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ Yesu mʋ lɩɩ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ tɔwɛ mʋ.
44013024	Pɔyɩ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ Yesu ɔ ba mʋ, Gyɔn wʋla gyankpaa ba tɔwɛ Gyiwu abi yɛ ba yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa, kɛ ba nyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee.
44013025	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Gyɔn ii biti ɔ lʋwɛ mu kusun mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ, ‘Fen nyi fɛɛ mɛ ɩ gyɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ mʋ? N man gyɛ mɛ ɩ gyɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ mʋ, mɛɛ mʋ ɔ bʋ mɛ kamaa ɛɛ ba. N man dagaa fɛɛ n saŋɛ mu asɩbɩta gbaa.’
44013026	“Mɛ tɔmaa ana Abraham anaana abi yɛ fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan man gyɛ Gyiwu abi nɩɩ fen sun Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, anɛ sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa kamɔlɩgɛ asɩn mʋ.
44013027	Nɩɩ Gyerusalem abi yɛ bamʋ abɩlɩsa kpini ba man bɩɩ fɛɛ Yesu ɩ gyɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ mʋ. Yɛgɛ bee nu mʋ asɩn mʋ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ ɔwʋlɛ tɔ mʋ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa kʋmaa, amaa ba man nu kasɛ. Ba bun mʋ kʋpwɛ nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ ba wʋla tɔwɛ yɩla mʋ ɩ ba tɔ.
44013028	Yɛgɛ ba man taalɛ wu mu alibi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa nɩɩ ɔ dagaa lewu, nɩɩ ba yɛgɛ nɩɩ Ɔbɩlɩsa Paleti mɔɔ mʋ.
44013029	Ba maa waa ɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ ba wʋla kyʋrɔɔ yɩla lɩɩ mʋ sʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, ba kpɩlɩgaa mʋ lɩɩ oyu laasa mʋ sʋ naa waa kakyan tɔ.
44013030	Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ kyiŋi mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ ba nkpa tɔ.
44013031	Nɩɩ nkɛ gaalaagaa mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɔ lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ bamʋ nɩɩ maa bamʋ ba daa bɛɛ natɛ lɩɩ Galile bee kpee Gyerusalem mʋ. Bamʋ ɩ gyɛ mu kuwu kyiŋi kesintin agyipu bɛɛ sa Gyiwu abi.
44013032	“Nɩɩ an tɔwɛ falɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ sa anɛ naana ana mʋ sa fanɛ.
44013033	Kanɩn asɩn maŋa nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɩ ba tɔ sa anɛ, mʋ nɩɩ an gyɛ bamʋ‐bii ana mʋ, kpalɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kyiŋi Yesu lɩɩ lewu tɔ sʋ. Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Dawidi ɔlʋn nyɔsapʋ mʋ tɔ yɛ, ‘Ndaga n lɛɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ fʋ ɩ gyɛ mi‐bii.’
44013034	Kikyiŋi mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kyiŋi Yesu lɩɩ kelewu tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ gyɔɔ kakaakʋ kɩɩ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ ɩmʋ asɩn gbaa yɛ, ‘N biti n waa fanɛ kusee sa fanɛ atɔ kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n da mɛ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ tɔwɛ Dawidi mʋ’.
44013035	Nɩɩ Dawidi tɔwɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ, ‘Fʋ mɛɛ yɛgɛ kɛ fʋ Ɔkyɩrɛkyɩrɛpʋ mʋ ɔ gyɔɔ nyita’.
44013036	“Asɩn nɩmʋ man gyɛ Dawidi asɩn, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ natɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti sʋ, mʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɩna, nɩɩ o wu, nɩɩ ba pula mʋ naa tii mʋ naana ana sʋ nɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ ɩ gyɔɔ.
44013037	Amaa Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kyiŋi mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ bɩrɛ man gyɔɔ.
44013038	“Kanan sʋ mɛ bɩrɩsa ana Gyiwu abi, lɩɩ Yesu kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ nɩɩ an tɔwɛ alibi kɩtaa kɛɛ asɩn an sa fanɛ falɛ.
44013039	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ man bʋ tɔ ɔ taalɛ gyii lɩɩ Mosesi nbara mʋ kpini sʋ, amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii bɩrɛ, ee biti o gyii lɩɩ.
44013040	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan kɩɩ sʋ danbɩrasa kɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ ba tɔwɛ yɩla mʋ, ɩ man ba fanɛ sʋ. Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ,
44013041	‘Fanɛ ahin‐sɩn wuya ana, ii biti ɩ waa fanɛ kɩyan fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n biti n mɔɔ fanɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ saŋa nɩmʋ tɔ n biti n waa kʋtɔ kʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ba tɔwɛ gbaa, fan mɛɛ yɛ fan kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii’.”
44013042	Pɔɔlɩ maa Banabasi ba maa lɩɩ Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ asa mʋ ba tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ ba bɩla bwii ba kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ, kɛ ba ba tɔwɛ bamʋ asɩn nɩmʋ tii sʋ.
44013043	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ asa mʋ ba lɩɩ ɔgyaŋɛkpa nɩɩ ba yaasɛ tɔ mʋ, Gyiwu abi mʋ gaalaagaa, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi, nɩɩ ba kyɛɛgɛ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ ba Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa tɔ mʋ, ba buu Pɔɔlɩ maa Banabasi. Nɩɩ ba waa asa mʋ ɔlʋn tɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ ba kyɩna Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ tɔ.
44013044	Nɩɩ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa pʋpwɛ mʋ maa fʋʋ mʋ, kadɛ mʋ tɔ asa kɩbaafʋn mʋ nɩɩ ba kpee mʋ ɩ kyɔ gaa nɩɩ ba naa gyaŋɛ ba nu abwaarɛsɩn.
44013045	Amaa Gyiwu abɩlɩsa ba maa wu asa damantɛ ba maa nu Banabasi maa Pɔɔlɩ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ, ba nyɛ bamʋ kayɩɩ basa yɛgɛ bɛɛ tɔwɛ nbusaa asɩn bee nyita asɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ.
44013046	Pɔɔlɩ maa Banabasi ba yɩlɛ kɩnyɩn tɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ Gyiwu abi nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ a maa gyankpaa tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn sa pɔyɩ. Amaa fan maa man kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ gyii nɩɩ fan kɩɩ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ fan man dagaa sa nkpa kakpaa mʋ, an biti a taa asɩn mʋ naa sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi.
44013047	Ɩnɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ sa kɔnɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘N taa fanɛ waa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ fɩtɩla. Kɛ fan taa kamɔlɩgɛ mʋ naa sa asa dulinyaa katɩn kʋmaa’.
44013048	“Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ ba maa nu falɛ mʋ, ɩ waa bamʋ ɔkɔn gaa, nɩɩ ba taa bʋnyaa sa Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ. Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ bamʋ fɛɛ ba ba nyɛ nkpa kakpaa mʋ ba kɔɔlɛ gyii.”
44013049	Ɩmʋ sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ ɩ yɛlɩgɛ kanɩn ɔsʋwʋlɛ maŋa sʋ kpini.
44013050	Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi ba fun waa akyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba sɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ ba sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ, yɛ anyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ Antiyoki kadɛ mʋ tɔ agyankpaapʋ. Nɩɩ bamʋ kpini ba kʋsʋ yɩlɛ Pɔɔlɩ maa Banabasi sʋ bɛɛ nyanla bamʋ, nɩɩ ba gya bamʋ lɩɩ kanɩn ofuli maŋa sʋ.
44013051	Nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ maa Banabasi ba kpɩkpaa bamʋ ayaa ɩsɛ, nɩɩ ba waa bamʋ ahee. Nɩɩ ba lɩɩ tʋtɔ kpee Ikoniyum kadɛ mʋ tɔ.
44013052	Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Antiyoki tʋtɔ mʋ kpini ba nyɛ kensi‐gyii gaa. Nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ bɔla bamʋ.
44014001	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ maa Banabasi ba wʋla bɛɛ waa mʋ, ba kpee Ikoniyum Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa. Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ gaalaagaa ba kɔɔlɛ gyii.
44014002	Amaa Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ ba man kɔɔlɛ asɩn mʋ gyii mʋ, ba fun waa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ, nyita bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ nɩɩ ba nyɛ nfɛɛrɛ libi lɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ maa Banabasi sʋ.
44014003	Pɔɔlɩ maa Banabasi ba gyii nkɛ gbɛrɛɛ tʋtɔ. Ba yɩlɛ kɩnyɩn tɔ bɛɛ tɔwɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ kabwaala asɩn. Nɩɩ ngbaa mʋ yɩlɛ bamʋ kamaa nɩɩ ba waa asɩn kyinkyinsa yɛ ɩsɩnkaala.
44014004	Nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ kadɛ mʋ tɔ asa mʋ ba barɩgɛ tɔ ntun nnyɔ, akʋ ba buu Gyiwu abi nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba buu Yesu asunpu mʋ.
44014005	Saŋa maŋa mʋ, bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ akʋ yɛ Gyiwu abi, taa tii bamʋ agyankpaapʋ sʋ mʋ ba waa kɔnɔ kʋlʋn fɛɛ ba tɔɔrɔɔ bamʋ kɛ ba tʋʋ bamʋ abuu mɔɔ.
44014006	Amaa Pɔɔlɩ maa Banabasi ba maa bɩɩ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ba sɩlɛ kpee Lisitira yɛ Debe ndɛ yɛ ndɛ‐bii mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ Likoniya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ kpini.
44014007	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ.
44014008	Ɔnyɩn kʋ tɛ Lisitira tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ ayaa yɛ abaa wusa wuya ana, nɩɩ ɔ man natɛ kakaakʋ.
44014009	Ɔ tɛ tʋtɔ ee nu Pɔɔlɩ maa tɔwɛ. Nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ kɩɩ mʋ kyimm wu fɛɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii, nɩɩ ɔ taalɛ nyɛ alanfɩya.
44014010	Nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ pʋntɛ yɛ, “Kʋsʋ yɩlɛ fʋ ayaa sʋ.” Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ fugi yɩlɛ mʋ ayaa sʋ nɩɩ o piili ɔ naa.
44014011	Sakyɔ mʋ maa wu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ waa mʋ, ba kuusi Likoniya katɔwɛ tɔ yɛ, “Anɛ ɩdakpa mʋ ba biliŋi asa ba anɛ asɛ.”
44014012	Nɩɩ ba sa Banabasi kɩtɩɩ yɛ Sewu, nɩɩ ba sa Pɔɔlɩ gbaa kɩtɩɩ yɛ Hemesi lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ asɩn mʋ ɔtɔwɛpʋ.
44014013	Nɩɩ ɔdakpa Sewu oseepu obu yɩlɛ kadɛ mʋ ɩkaa sʋ. Nɩɩ kɩmʋ oseepu taa ɩnaa‐nyɩn yɛ ntʋtʋlɛ ba kadɛ mʋ kewusunɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ maa sakyɔ mʋ bee biti ba waa kɔlɔŋɔ sa Krisito asunpu mʋ.
44014014	Amaa ba maa nu kanɩn mʋ, ba kɩtaa bamʋ atɔ bunsa kyatɛ sɩlɛ loo sakyɔ mʋ tɔ, bee kuusi yɛ,
44014015	“Anyɩn, mɩnɛ nɩɩ fɛn waa falɛ? Anɛ gbaa anɛ an gyɛ asa nɩn fɛɛ fanɛ falɛ. An sʋ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ an bɩya fanɛ nɩn. An tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ fan lɛɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ atɔ gyaga sʋ, kɛ fan bwii ba Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ nkpa kakpaa tɔ mʋ asɛ. Mʋ ɩ tʋʋ sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ yɛ ɔpʋ yɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ ɩmʋ kpini tɔ mʋ.
44014016	Dɩdaa mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mu ansi yɛgɛ nɩɩ dulinyaa tɔ asa kpini ba natɛ waa bamʋ gbaa‐gbaa bamʋ nkɔlɔ biti.
44014017	Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ waa adanbɩrasa kaapʋ asa fɛɛ maa bʋ tɔ, fɛɛ maa sa bʋlayɩ nɩɩ atɔ duusa a waa saŋa kyɛɛkyɛɛ tɔ. Nɩɩ ɛɛ sa fanɛ agyitɔ kɩkyɔ nɩɩ ɛɛ yɛgɛ fanɛ ansi i gyii.”
44014018	Halɩɩ ba maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ kamaa gbaa mʋ, ɩ waa ɔlʋn pɔyɩ nɩɩ ba taalɛ gya sakyɔ mʋ yɛ ba man waa kɔlɔŋɔ mʋ.
44014019	Tʋtɔ mʋ Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ ba lɩɩ Antiyoki yɛ Ikoniyum mʋ ba ba tɔwɛ kyɛɛgɛ sakyɔ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ. Nɩɩ ba tʋʋ Pɔɔlɩ abuu waa nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ o wu nɩn, nɩɩ ba kpɩɩ mʋ lɩɩ kadɛ mʋ tɔ.
44014020	Amaa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ ba ba kyaabɔɔ Pɔɔlɩ mʋ, ɔ kʋsʋ nɩɩ o bwii kpee kadɛ mʋ tɔ. Ɩmʋ lɩɩkaakɛ mʋ Pɔɔlɩ maa Banabasi ba lɩɩ tʋtɔ kpee Debe.
44014021	Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ Debe kadɛ tɔ, nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ asa kɩkyɔ ba be buu Yesu. Nɩɩ ba bwii kpee Lisitira yɛ Ikoniyum ndɛ yɛ Antiyoki mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Pisidiya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ.
44014022	Ba tɔwɛ waa Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ, waa bamʋ ɔlʋn tɔ fɛɛ ba yɩlɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ, pɔyɩ kɛ ba nyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ loo mʋ, ɩ dagaa ba maa gyii awʋrʋfɔ.
44014023	Krisito abi kʋbʋ kʋmaa tɔ mʋ, ba lɛɛ abɩlɩsa sa bamʋ. Nɩɩ ba ŋmina kɔnɔ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ taa bamʋ waa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii mʋ abaa tɔ.
44014024	Ɩmʋ kamaa tɔ mʋ, ba bɔla lɩɩ Pisidiya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ taa ba fʋʋ Panfiliya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
44014025	Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ Pega kadɛ tɔ kyaga sʋ kpee Ataliya kadɛ tɔ.
44014026	Ba lɩɩ Ataliya bɔla nkyu sʋ kpee Antiyoki mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Siriya. Antiyoki tʋtɔ nɩɩ Krisito abi kʋbʋ mʋ ba wʋla kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ taa bamʋ waa Ɩbwaarɛ kɩbaa tɔ, fɛɛ ɔ bwaala bamʋ kɛ ba taalɛ waa kusun mʋ nɩɩ ba waa lʋwɛ falɛ.
44014027	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba fʋʋ Antiyoki mʋ, ba tɩɩ Krisito abi kʋbʋ mʋ ba sarɛ katɩn kʋlʋn. Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ bamʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla bamʋ sʋ waa, yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ o bugi ɔkpa sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi, nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ Yesu asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ gyii mʋ.
44014028	Nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ maa Banabasi ba kyɩna Yesu abɩɩlapʋ mʋ asɛ kyɛɛrɛɛ.
44015001	Amaa asa akʋ ba lɩɩ Gyudeya ba Antiyoki, nɩɩ ba ba bɛɛ kaapʋ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ yɛ, nɩɩ ba kan man tin bamʋ iduu fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Mosesi nbara ɩ kaapʋ mʋ, ba mɛɛ yɛ ba nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ.
44015002	Nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ bɩɩtɛ yɛ kamɔɔrɛ‐gyii kɩ ba Pɔɔlɩ maa Banabasi yɛ asa mʋ nsana. Ɩmʋ sʋ ba lɛɛ Pɔɔlɩ maa Banabasi yɛ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ akʋ fɛɛ ba kpee Gyerusalem naa wu Krisito asunpu yɛ abɩlɩsa lɩɩ kamɔɔrɛ‐gyii mʋ sʋ.
44015003	Nɩɩ Krisito abi kʋbʋ mʋ ba lɛɛ bamʋ ɔkpa. Ba maa kpee mʋ ba bɔla lɩɩ Fonesiya yɛ Samariya. Yɛgɛ bɛɛ tɔwɛ bamʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ ba kɔɔlɛ Krisito gyii mʋ. Nɩɩ ɩ waa akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ ɔkɔn.
44015004	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba fʋʋ Gyerusalem mʋ, Krisito abi kʋbʋ yɛ Krisito asunpu yɛ kʋbʋ mʋ bamʋ abɩlɩsa mʋ ba waa bamʋ nsa‐nsa. Nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ maa Banabasi ba lɛɛ tɔwɛ bamʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla bamʋ sʋ waa mʋ.
44015005	Amaa Farasii kʋbʋ mʋ tɔ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ akʋ ba kʋsʋ yɩlɛ tɔ yɛ, “Ɩ dagaa fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi, nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ Krisito gyii mʋ, ba maa tɩŋɛ iduu fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Mosesi nbara mʋ ɩ kaapʋ tɔ mʋ.”
44015006	Kanɩn sʋ Krisito asunpu mʋ yɛ abɩlɩsa mʋ ba gyaŋɛ kɛ ba taa ɩmʋ nfɛɛrɛ.
44015007	Ba maa kyɩna asɩn mʋ sʋ gyii abaa ɩmɔɔrɛ kyɛɛrɛɛ mʋ, Pita kʋsʋ yɩlɛ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɛ daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, fan nyi fɛɛ nsu nkʋ tɔ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ maa lɛɛ mɛ lɩɩ fanɛ tɔ yɛ n tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ ba nu kɛ ba kɔɔlɛ gyii.
44015008	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ o nyi nyɩmɩsa kɔkɔlɔ tɔ asɩn mʋ, waa nɩɩ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ ɔ kɔɔlɛ bamʋ, fɛɛ ɔ maa sa bamʋ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sa anɛ gbaa anɛ mʋ.
44015009	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ man sʋ nbarɩgɛ tɔ yɛ anaa bamʋ nsana tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ, lɩɩ bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ ɔ lɔŋɔ bamʋ nkɔlɔ tɔ.
44015010	Ɩmʋ sʋ mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fen biti fan tʋʋ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔ kɩɩ, nɩɩ fɛn taa ɩsʋla budusa fɛn sʋla Yesu abuupu mʋ nɩɩ anɛ yɛ anɛ naana ana gbaa an man taalɛ sʋla?
44015011	An kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ, lɩɩ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu kabwaala mʋ sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ mɔlɩgɛ anɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ gbaa bamʋ ba nyɛ mʋ.”
44015012	Nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba sarɛ tʋtɔ mʋ kpini ba laatɔ bee nu Banabasi yɛ Pɔɔlɩ ba maa tɔwɛ ɩsɩnkaala yɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla bamʋ sʋ waa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ tɔ.
44015013	Ba maa tɔwɛ lʋwɛ mʋ, Gyemisi kʋsʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, fan nu mɛ asɛ.
44015014	Simon Pita tɔwɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ gyankpaa waa, nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ ee biti bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi gbaa, nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ bamʋ tɔ akʋ biliŋi mʋ lɛɛ.
44015015	Ɩmʋ sʋ asɩn nɩmʋ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ waa kʋkʋlʋn.
44015016	Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ, ‘Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa n biti n bwii kɛ n pɔyɩ Dawidi kɩkpaara mʋ nɩɩ kɩ lɩɩ tɩyɛ mʋ. N biti n lɔŋɔ‐lɔŋɔ ɩmʋ atɔ nyitasa mʋ kɛ n bwii kʋsaa kɩmʋ yɩlɛ.
44015017	Kɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba san mʋ yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi, nɩɩ mɛ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩtɩɩ kɩ gyan bamʋ sʋ mʋ, kɛ ba kɩɩ biti mɛ.
44015018	Mɛ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ n wʋla lɛɛ ɩnɩmʋ kaapʋ lɩɩ koo dɩdaa mʋ, ɩ tɔwɛ kanɩn.’
44015019	“Kanɩn sʋ mɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ n tɔwɛ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, an man nyan bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi nɩɩ ba kyɛɛgɛ ba Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ.
44015020	Amaa ɩ dagaa a maa kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ naa tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, ba lɛɛ ɩdakpa agyitɔ kigyii yɛ kagyɩɩ abɛɛ kanyɩn‐biti. Kɛ ba man gyii atɔbwaaya mʋ nɩɩ ba man tɩn bamʋ amu nɩɩ ba wu abɛɛ nkalan.
44015021	Nɩɩ koo dɩdaa mʋ, ba wʋla bɛɛ kaapʋ Mosesi nbara mʋ ndɛ kʋmaa tɔ, nɩɩ bɛɛ kalɛ ɩmʋ Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩgyaŋɛkpa kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa kʋmaa.”
44015022	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Krisito asunpu mʋ yɛ abɩlɩsa mʋ yɛ Krisito abi kʋbʋ mʋ kpini ba tɔwɛ kyula yɛ, ba lɛɛ bamʋ tɔ anyɩn akʋ, kɛ ba sun ba maa Pɔɔlɩ yɛ Banabasi kɛ ba kpee Antiyoki. Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ Gyudasi mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ Basabasi yɛ Silasi. Bamʋ anyɔ ba gyɛ Krisito abi agyankpaapʋ mʋ akʋ.
44015023	Nɩɩ ba taa falɛ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ waa bamʋ abaa tɔ. Nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ mʋ falɛ. “Ɩ gyɛ anɛ Krisito asunpu yɛ abɩlɩsa yɛ Krisito abi mʋ kpini. “An kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ an sa fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ. “Nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii mʋ, nɩɩ fan bʋ Antiyoki yɛ Siriya yɛ Sisiliya mʋ kpini. “Anɛ fanɛ bɩrɩsa ana an fwaala fanɛ.
44015024	“An nu fɛɛ anɛ tɔ asa akʋ ba ba fanɛ asɛ, ba sʋ asɩn akʋ ba nyan fanɛ, yɛgɛ bee nyita fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ. Yɛgɛ an man sa bamʋ ɔkpa fɛɛ ba waa kanɩn, nɩɩ an man nyi bamʋ sʋ.
44015025	Ɩmʋ sʋ anɛ kpini a tɔwɛ kyula fɛɛ a lɛɛ asa akʋ kɛ ba maa anɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana Banabasi maa Pɔɔlɩ, an sun bamʋ ba fanɛ asɛ.
44015026	Bamʋ ɩ gyɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba taga apʋ lɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ.
44015027	Kanɩn sʋ an bɩla sun Gyudasi maa Silasi fanɛ asɛ an tii sʋ. Kɛ ba naa taa bamʋ kɔnɔ tɔ tɔwɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ an kyʋrɔɔ mʋ.
44015028	Nɩɩ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn sa anɛ yɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, a mee biti fɛɛ a taa kasʋla budusa kʋ sʋla fanɛ tii sʋ, lɩɩ ɩmʋ nɩɩ an biti an tɔwɛ fanɛ falɛ.
44015029	Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ fan lɛɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba taa lɔŋɔ sa ɩdakpa yɛ atɔbwaaya nkalan yɛ atɔbwaaya mʋ nɩɩ ba man tɩn bamʋ amu nɩɩ ba wu mʋ, kɛ fan bɩla lɛɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ kagyɩɩ abɛɛ kanyɩn‐biti tɔ. Ii biti ɩ waa ɔdan sa fanɛ fɛɛ fan maa lɛɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ tɔ. “An kala fanɛ.”
44015030	Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ bamʋ, nɩɩ ba sun bamʋ ɔkpa. Nɩɩ nbɔɔ mʋ ba maa naa fʋʋ Antiyoki mʋ, ba tɩɩ Krisito abi mʋ sarɛ, nɩɩ ba lɛɛ ɔwʋlɛ mʋ sa bamʋ.
44015031	Ba maa kalɛ ɔwʋlɛ mʋ, katɔwɛ waa nkyɛtɔ asɩn mʋ, ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ bamʋ ansi i gyii.
44015032	Gyudasi maa Silasi mʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ ba tɔwɛ waa Krisito abi kʋbʋ mʋ ɔlʋn tɔ.
44015033	Nɩɩ ba maa gyii nkɛ nkʋ bamʋ asɛ mʋ, ba lɛɛ bamʋ ɔkpa kayɩɩ yuuli tɔ. Nɩɩ ba bwii naa fʋʋ bamʋ nɩɩ ba sun bamʋ mʋ asɛ.
44015034	(Amaa Silasi waa mʋ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ o sii kyɩna tʋtɔ. Nɩɩ Gyudasi nkʋn bwii kpee Gyerusalem).
44015035	Amaa Pɔɔlɩ maa Banabasi ba sii Antiyoki. Nɩɩ ba maa asa gaalaagaa bɛɛ tɔwɛ bɛɛ kaapʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ asɩn mʋ.
44015036	Ɩmʋ kamaa tɔ mʋ, Pɔɔlɩ tɔwɛ Banabasi yɛ, “Yɛgɛ a bwii kpee naa bɔɔ Krisito abi mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ ndɛ‐ndɛ sʋ mʋ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ an wʋla tɔwɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ asɩn mʋ. Kɛ a kpee naa wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba du.”
44015037	Nɩɩ Banabasi ii biti fɛɛ ɔ taa Gyɔn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Maki mʋ o tii bamʋ sʋ.
44015038	Amaa Pɔɔlɩ man kyula fɛɛ ba taa Maki buu bamʋ n‐yɩɩ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ bamʋ tɔ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Panfiliya bɛɛ waa kusun mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ.
44015039	Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ bɩɩtɛ tɩyɛ Pɔɔlɩ maa Banabasi nsana, nɩɩ ba barɩgɛ tɔ. Nɩɩ Banabasi taa Maki buu mʋ n‐yɩɩ bɔla nkyu sʋ kpee Sipuru.
44015040	Amaa Pɔɔlɩ bɩrɛ taa Silasi tii mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ, nɩɩ Krisito abi mʋ ba kʋlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ fɛɛ ɔ bwaala bamʋ, nɩɩ ba kyʋn.
44015041	Nɩɩ ba bɔla lɩɩ Siriya yɛ Silisiya nɩɩ ba waa Krisito abi kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ ɔlʋn tɔ.
44016001	Nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ maa Silasi ba ba Debe, nɩɩ ba lɩɩ tʋtɔ kpee Lisitira. Tʋtɔ maa nɩɩ ba wu Yesu obuupu kʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Timoti. Nɩɩ mu‐nyi gyɛ Gyiwu obii mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ Krisito gyii, amaa mʋ‐sɛ bɩrɛ gyɛ Giriki obii nɩn.
44016002	Krisito akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Lisitira yɛ Ikoniyum mʋ, ba tɔwɛ Timoti n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn danbɩrasa.
44016003	Ɩmʋ sʋ Pɔɔlɩ ii biti fɛɛ ɔ taa Timoti buu mʋ n‐yɩɩ kpee ɔkpa. Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ tɩn Timoti oduu, lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ kpini be nyi fɛɛ Timoti mʋ‐sɛ maa gyɛ Giriki obii nɩn.
44016004	Ba maa naa ndɛ sʋ mʋ, bɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ kɔnɔsa mʋ nɩɩ Krisito asunpu mʋ yɛ abɩlɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyerusalem ba sa bamʋ fɛɛ ɔsa kʋmaa o buu ɩmʋ.
44016005	Ɩmʋ sʋ Krisito abi ba nyɛ ɔlʋn kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ, yɛgɛ kakɛ kʋmaa bɛɛ nyɛ akyɔ bee tii sʋ.
44016006	Nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ maa mʋ bɩrɩsa ana ba bɔla Firigiya maa Galati ifuli sʋ kyʋn, lɩɩ fɛɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ man sa bamʋ ɔkpa fɛɛ ba tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn Asiya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
44016007	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba fʋʋ Misiya ngyaŋɛ mʋ, ba kpan bamʋ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ ba faa loo Bitiniya, amaa Yesu Kayaayu mʋ man sa bamʋ ɔkpa.
44016008	Ɩmʋ sʋ ba lɩɩ Misiya kpee Trowa kadɛ tɔ.
44016009	Ɩmʋ kagyanbwɛ mʋ, Pɔɔlɩ nyɛ ansi sʋ kɩlɛɛkaapʋ. O wu Masedoniya ɔnyɩn kʋ maa yɩlɛ ɛɛ kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ, “Faa ba Masedoniya, ba kyɛ anɛ tɔ.”
44016010	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ wu ansi sʋ kɩlɛɛkaapʋ mʋ, opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ an kʋʋla anɛ n‐yɩɩ an biti a kpee Masedoniya. Lɩɩ fɛɛ an kɔɔlɛ kyula fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ tɩɩ anɛ yɛ a naa tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa bamʋ.
44016011	An lɩɩ Trowa kyɩna nkyu sʋ yii sʋ kpee Samotiri. Ɩmʋ lɩɩkaakɛ mʋ, nɩɩ an fʋʋ Neyapoli.
44016012	Nɩɩ an lɩɩ tʋtɔ kyaga sʋ natɛ kpee Filipi mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ Masedoniya kabaafʋn kʋ kadɛ lala, nɩɩ tʋtɔ bʋ Roma abi kasɛ. An gyii tʋtɔ nkɛ nkʋ.
44016013	Nɩɩ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ mʋ an lɩɩ kadɛ mʋ tɔ kpee ɔlɩɩkaa. An waa nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ an biti an wu kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ opula. A maa wu kʋkʋ mʋ, an kyɩna piili an tɔwɛ an sa akyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba ba gyaŋɛ tʋtɔ mʋ.
44016014	Akyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ bee nu asɩn mʋ bɛɛ tɩɩ bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋ yɛ Lidiya, nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ ataa kɩrɩman‐kyu ɔfɛpʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Tatira kadɛ lala tɔ nɩɩ ɔ sɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ. Nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ bugi mʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ Pɔɔlɩ asɩn mʋ gyii.
44016015	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ an gyee maa mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ abi kpini Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee mʋ, ɔ tɩɩ anɛ ba mʋ ayɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ anɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fan kɩɩ mɛ fɛɛ n kɔɔlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ gyii bɩrɛ, fan ba kyɩna mɛ kɩkpaara sʋ.” Nɩɩ ɔ dan mata sʋ halɩɩ an kyula naa kyɩna mʋ asɛ.
44016016	Kakaakʋ an maa kpee kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ opula mʋ, an gyaŋa kɩnyɛ kibite mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kabwɩɩ libi. Nɩɩ ɛɛ kpalɩ ee wu asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba, yɛgɛ ɛɛ nyɛ afulee gaa ɛɛ sa mʋ wuya ana.
44016017	Nɩɩ kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi nɩmʋ buu anaa Pɔɔlɩ, yɛgɛ ee kuusi ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Asa anɩmʋ ba gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lala mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ ayaafɔlɛ. Nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ fanɛ ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan bɔla sʋ nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ.”
44016018	Ɔ maa sʋ ɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn nɩmʋ kakɛ kʋmaa. Amaa kamaa tɔ mʋ kibite mʋ asɩn mʋ i fii Pɔɔlɩ, nɩɩ o biliŋi tɔwɛ kabwɩɩ libi mʋ yɛ, “N tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ, lɩɩ Yesu Krisito kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ mʋ, lɩɩ mʋ tɔ.” Nɩɩ opula tɔ nɩɩ kabwɩɩ libi mʋ lɩɩ mʋ tɔ.
44016019	Amaa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ kebii kyɩɩsa‐bi mʋ wuya ana, ba wu fɛɛ ba man bɩla ba sʋ tamaa mʋ nɩɩ ba nyɛ afulee lɩɩ mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ ba kɩtaa Pɔɔlɩ maa Silasi nɩɩ ba bɩɩtɛ bamʋ kpee asɩn ogyikpa alʋnpʋ mu ansi tɔ.
44016020	Nɩɩ ba taa bamʋ ba asɩn agyipu abɩlɩsa asɛ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Anyɩn anɩmʋ ba gyɛ Gyiwu abi nɩn nɩɩ bee biti ba boyi anɛ kadɛ,
44016021	yɛgɛ bɛɛ kaapʋ anɛ atɔ pʋpwɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man dagaa anɛ Roma abi fɛɛ a buu abɛɛ a waa.”
44016022	Nɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ nyaŋɛ tɔ ba tii Pɔɔlɩ maa Silasi waa tɔ, nɩɩ asɩn agyipu mʋ ba sa ɔkpa fɛɛ ba bugi bamʋ ɩkaalɛ mʋ kɛ ba tɩŋɛ bamʋ.
44016023	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba tɩŋɛ bamʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, ba taa bamʋ naa tii obu. Nɩɩ ba sa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee kun obu mʋ sʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, ɔ kɩɩ bamʋ sʋ danbɩrasa.
44016024	Ba maa sa mʋ kɔnɔ lʋwɛ mʋ, ɔ taa bamʋ naa tii nsana tɔ obu mʋ tɔ, taa agbeeleebi ŋmina bamʋ ayaa kyaga kigbilin.
44016025	Amaa kiyiridi nsana mʋ, Pɔɔlɩ maa Silasi bɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ yɛgɛ bɛɛ bɩɩ ɩlʋn bɛɛ yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ, yɛgɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba tii obu mʋ gbaa bee nu bamʋ asɛ.
44016026	Nɩɩ opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ kasɛ ki gyingyen nɩɩ obu mʋ gyingyen naa lɩɩ halɩɩ kɩmʋ kasɛ. Nɩɩ saŋa maŋa tɔ obu mʋ ɩpʋnʋ i tigi nɩɩ agbeeleebi mʋ nɩɩ ba taa ŋmina bamʋ ɔkʋmaa mʋ ɩ saŋɛ.
44016027	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ obu tiipu okunpu kyiŋi wu fɛɛ ɩpʋnʋ mʋ i tigi mʋ ɔ bɩɩtɛ deebi lɛɛ nɩɩ ee biti fɛɛ ɔ mɔɔ mʋ n‐yɩɩ, o nyi fɛɛ obu atiipu mʋ ba lɩɩ sɩlɛ nɩn.
44016028	Amaa Pɔɔlɩ pʋntɛ mʋ sʋ yɛ, “Man waa fʋ n‐yɩɩ sɛhn, anɛ kpini a bʋ tɔ.”
44016029	Nɩɩ okunpu mʋ biti fɩtɩla, sɩlɛ taa kufuu yɛ kɩkyɩkya ba tɩyɛ Pɔɔlɩ maa Silasi ayaa tɔ.
44016030	Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ bamʋ ba kewu taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Anyɩn, mɩnɛ ɩ dagaa n waa kɛ n nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ?”
44016031	Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Kɔɔlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu gyii kɛ faa fʋ kɩkpaara sʋ abi fan nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ.”
44016032	Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ asɩn sa mʋ yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ kpini.
44016033	Kanɩn kagyanbwɛ saŋa maŋa tɔ nɩɩ okunpu mʋ taa Pɔɔlɩ maa Silasi lɩɩ naa nyɛɛ bamʋ ɩlɔ. Nɩɩ kanɩn opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ ba gyee maa mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ abi kpini Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee.
44016034	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ obu atiipu okunpu mʋ taa bamʋ kpee mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ naa dɩŋa agyitɔ sa bamʋ. Nɩɩ maa mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ abi kpini ansi i gyii lɩɩ ba maa kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gyii mʋ sʋ.
44016035	Amaa ɩ maa ba ŋmaŋɛ tɔ mʋ, asɩn agyipu mʋ ba sun Apurusi yɛ ba naa tɔwɛ okunpu mʋ yɛ, “O tigi anyɩn mʋ kɛ ba natɛ.”
44016036	Nɩɩ okunpu mʋ tɔwɛ Pɔɔlɩ yɛ, “Asɩn agyipu mʋ ba sa kɔnɔ yɛ, n tigi faa Silasi. Ɩmʋ sʋ fɛn taalɛ natɛ kayɩɩ yuuli tɔ.”
44016037	Amaa nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ tɔwɛ Apurusi mʋ yɛ, “Ba kɩtaa anɛ ba man gyii anɛ asɩn nɩɩ ba dayɩ anɛ sakyɔ tɔ, yɛgɛ an gyɛ Roma abi nɩɩ ba kɩtaa anɛ tii. Nɩɩ bee biti ba lɛɛ anɛ lɩɩ nfɩɩ asiri tɔ? Ayee! Kanɩn sʋ yɛgɛ bamʋ gbaa‐gbaa bamʋ ba ba lɛɛ anɛ.”
44016038	Nɩɩ Apurusi mʋ ba kpee naa tɔwɛ asɩn agyipu mʋ. Nɩɩ ba maa nu fɛɛ Pɔɔlɩ maa Silasi ba gyɛ Roma abi mʋ, kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ.
44016039	Ɩmʋ sʋ asɩn agyipu mʋ ba ba kɩtaa bamʋ ayaa tɔ. Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ bamʋ lɩɩ obu tiisa mʋ tɔ, kʋlɛ bamʋ yɛ ba lɩɩ kadɛ mʋ tɔ.
44016040	Nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ maa Silasi ba maa lɩɩ obu tiisa mʋ tɔ mʋ, ba kpee Lidiya kɩkpaara sʋ. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ba naa tu Krisito abi mʋ, nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ waa bamʋ. Nɩɩ ba lɩɩ tʋtɔ kyʋn.
44017001	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ maa Silasi ba bɔla lɩɩ Amfipolisi yɛ Apoloniya ndɛ tɔ mʋ, ba naa fʋʋ Tesalonika kadɛ tɔ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa bʋ mʋ.
44017002	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla ɛɛ waa mʋ, Pɔɔlɩ kpee ɔgyaŋɛkpa mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn sa bamʋ nkɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ kanɩn ɩlɩɩ ɩsa.
44017003	Pɔɔlɩ lɛɛ kaapʋ tɔ fɛɛ, “Ɩ dagaa fɛɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Wʋla lɛɛ mʋ o gyii awʋrʋfɔ, kɛ o wu kɛ ɔ bɩla kyiŋi.” Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Yesu mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ mʋ asɩn falɛ ɩ gyɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Wʋla lɛɛ mʋ.”
44017004	Gyiwu abi mʋ akʋ yɛ Giriki abi mʋ nɩɩ ba sɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, yɛ akyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ kadɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ kpini ba kɔɔlɛ Pɔɔlɩ asɩn mʋ kyula yɛ ɩ gyɛ kesintin nɩɩ ba buu bamʋ.
44017005	Amaa Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ ba san mʋ ba nyɛ kayɩɩ basa. Nɩɩ ba kpee kɩgya tɔ naa biti asa gyaga. Nɩɩ ba be tii bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ, nɩɩ ba piili bɛɛ waa ɩlawʋ kadɛ mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ ba kpala kpee Yasin ayɛ ba naa biti Pɔɔlɩ maa Silasi, kɛ ba kɩtaa bamʋ ba sakyɔ mʋ tɔ.
44017006	Amaa ba maa man wu bamʋ mʋ, ba kɩtaa Yasin maa Yesu akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu akʋ bɩya bamʋ kadɛ mʋ abɩlɩsa ansi tɔ. Nɩɩ ba kuusi yɛ, “Ba nɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba biliŋaa dulinyaa bee bun mʋ, ba ba nfɩɩ.
44017007	Nɩɩ Yasin kɔɔlɛ bamʋ waa mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ. Bamʋ kpini ba fɔyɩ Owura lala Kasaro kɔnɔsa nbara, nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɛ Owura pʋpwɛ kʋ bʋ tɔ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Yesu.”
44017008	Sakyɔ mʋ yɛ kadɛ abɩlɩsa mʋ ba maa nu falɛ asɩn mʋ, ɩ tɔɔrɔɔ bamʋ gaa.
44017009	Nɩɩ ba yɛgɛ Yasin maa mʋ tɔmaa ana ba ka afulee mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa, nɩɩ ba yɛgɛ bamʋ.
44017010	Kanɩn kakɛ maŋa kagyanbwɛ, nɩɩ Yesu akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu ba sun Pɔɔlɩ maa Silasi kpee Bereya kadɛ tɔ. Ba maa fʋʋ tʋtɔ mʋ ba kpee Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa.
44017011	Asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Bereya mʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ dɛ kasɛ ɩ kyɔ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Tesalonika. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba taa bamʋ nkɔlɔ kpini kɔɔlɛ asɩn mʋ yɛgɛ bɛɛ bɩla bɛɛ kɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ, kakɛ kʋmaa bɛɛ kɩɩ yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ tɔwɛ mʋ ɩ bʋ tɔ kanɩn.
44017012	Kanɩn sʋ Gyiwu abi damantɛ yɛ Giriki akyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ yɛ anyɩn gaalaagaa ba kɔɔlɛ asɩn mʋ gyii.
44017013	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Tesalonika ba nu yɛ Pɔɔlɩ bʋ Bereya ɛɛ tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ, ba ba tʋtɔ, bee fun bɛɛ waa asa mʋ.
44017014	Nɩɩ Yesu akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ ba waa bilen taa Pɔɔlɩ kpee kebunɔ, amaa Silasi maa Timoti ba sii Bereya kadɛ tɔ.
44017015	Nɩɩ anyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba sun Pɔɔlɩ ɔkpa mʋ, ba sun mʋ ɔkpa kpee Antensi. Nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ kala bamʋ fɛɛ Silasi maa Timoti ba waa bilen ba tu mʋ Antensi.
44017016	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ gyoo Silasi maa Timoti Antensi mʋ, maa wu fɛɛ ɩdakpa ɩ bɔla kadɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɩ tɔɔrɔɔ mʋ gaa.
44017017	Ɩmʋ sʋ saŋa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o kpee Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa mʋ, maa Gyiwu abi yɛ Giriki abi mʋ nɩɩ ba sɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ bee gyii abwaarɛsɩn mʋ ɩmɔɔrɛ. Kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ ee kpee kɩgya tɔ kakɛ kʋmaa yɛgɛ maa asa bee gyii ɩmɔɔrɛ.
44017018	Nɩɩ Epikuriyan ɩwʋlɛ anyipu kʋbʋ yɛ Sitoki ɩwʋlɛ anyipu kʋbʋ bee piili bee gyii Pɔɔlɩ ɩmɔɔrɛ. Mʋ katɔwɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, Pɔɔlɩ ɩ tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa lɩɩ Yesu maa mu kiwu kyiŋi asɩn. Nɩɩ bamʋ akʋ ba taasɛ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa gyaga nɩmʋ ii biti ɔ kaapʋ?” Nɩɩ akʋ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “I du fɛɛ ɛɛ kaapʋ akʋ ɩdakpa asɩn nɩn.”
44017019	Nɩɩ ba kɩtaa Pɔɔlɩ taa mʋ kpee Aropago ɔgyaŋɛkpa abɩlɩsa ansi tɔ. Nɩɩ ba taasɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ taalɛ tɔwɛ anɛ kɩkaapʋ pʋpwɛ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ bɩya mʋ?
44017020	Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ fʋ bɩya anɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ anɛ asʋ tɔ asɩn pʋpwɛ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ba kaapʋ anɛ ɩmʋ kasɛ.”
44017021	Antensi abi yɛ afɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kadɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ gaalaagaa ba mɛɛ waa sɛhn tii asɩn pʋpwɛ mʋ kunu sʋ yɛ ɩmʋ katɔwɛ sʋ.
44017022	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ Aropago ngyaŋɛ mʋ tɔ, tɔwɛ yɛ, “Antensi anyɩn, n wu fɛɛ ɔkpa kʋmaa sʋ mʋ, kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fen sun mʋ, fɛn sʋ kensi payɩ fen sun mʋ.
44017023	Lɩɩ fɛɛ n maa naa kadɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, n wu atɔ mʋ nɩɩ fen muŋa fen sun. Nɩɩ n wu saraga kaswɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ bɛ kyʋrɔɔ kɩmʋ sʋ yɛ, ƖBWAARƖ MƲ NƖƖ AN MAN NYI MƲ MƲ LƐƐ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔmʋ nɩɩ fen sun, nɩɩ fen mee nyi mʋ mʋ, mʋ asɩn nɩɩ n biti n tɔwɛ fanɛ.
44017024	“Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tʋʋ dulinyaa yɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ kɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ. Ɔ mɛɛ kyɩna kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba taa abaa pɔyɩ mʋ tɔ.
44017025	Kʋtɔ kʋ kɩ man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ mɛɛ taalɛ waa, nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa ɔ waa sa mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ ɩ sa nyɩmɩsa nkpa yɛ ɔ fʋʋtɛ yɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ.
44017026	Ɔ tʋʋ nyɩmɩsa kʋlʋn nɩɩ ɔ bɔla mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ tʋʋ ndɛndɛmandɛ kpini, nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba kyɩna dulinyaa ɩsʋwʋlɛ mʋ sʋ kpini. Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla ŋmina yɩla opula mʋ nɩɩ asa ba kyɩna yɛ ɩmʋ saŋa.
44017027	Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ waa ɩnɩmʋ nɩn, lɩɩ fɛɛ ee biti fɛɛ asa ba kɩɩ biti mʋ kɛ ba wu mʋ. Amaa yɛgɛ ɔ man bʋ kata yɛ anɛ tɔ ɔkʋ.
44017028	Nɩɩ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ an sʋ nkpa, nɩɩ an taalɛ an naa yɛgɛ an bʋ tɔ falɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ ɔlʋn‐bɩɩpʋ kʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Anɛ gbaa anɛ an gyɛ mu‐bii ana nɩn’.
44017029	“Nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kesintin fɛɛ anɛ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii ana bɩrɛ mʋ, an man kan fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ keduli du fɛɛ suwa abɛɛ gbiti abɛɛ kubuu nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa taalɛ taa mʋ kanyaasɩn yɛ adawʋ pɔyɩ mʋ fɛɛ ɔdakpa.
44017030	Dɩdaa mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ man taa asa kimennyi waa sɛhn, amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ ɔ sa asa kpini kɔnɔsa katɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ fɛɛ ba yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa.
44017031	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ lɛɛ kakɛ yɩla mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ bɔla ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ kɛ ɔ talɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kesintin ɔkpa sʋ. O kyiŋi kanɩn nyɩmɩsa maŋa lɩɩ lewu tɔ, waa kanɩn kaapʋ sa asa kpini yɛ ɩnɩmʋ ii biti ɩ waa.”
44017032	Ba maa nu Pɔɔlɩ asɛ lɩɩ kelewu kyiŋi asɩn mʋ, akʋ ba waa mʋ ahin‐sɩn, nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “An biti fɛɛ fu bwii tɔwɛ anɛ kanɩn asɩn nɩmʋ.”
44017033	Nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ lɩɩ ɔgyaŋɛkpa mʋ.
44017034	Nɩɩ anyɩn akʋ ba buu mʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii. Bamʋ akʋ atɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Diyonisi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Aropago kʋbʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ, yɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Damarisi, yɛ asa mʋ akʋ.
44018001	Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ Pɔɔlɩ lɩɩ Antensi kpee Korinto kadɛ tɔ.
44018002	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ naa tu Gyiwu obii kʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Akwila, nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ Pontu kadɛ tɔ, maa mʋ‐ka Prisila. Ba lɩɩ Itali ba Korinto ɩ man pɩɩ kyɛɛrɛɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Owura lala Kiladiyo maa gya Gyiwu abi kpini lɩɩ Roma kadɛ tɔ mʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ kpee ɔ naa kɩɩ bamʋ.
44018003	Lɩɩ fɛɛ maa bamʋ kpini ba gyɛ tantɩ awaapʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ kyɩna bamʋ asɛ nɩɩ maa bamʋ ba bʋga waa kusun.
44018004	Kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa kʋmaa nɩmʋ, Pɔɔlɩ ii kpee Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa, ɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ ɛɛ sa Gyiwu abi yɛ Giriki abi kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ gyii.
44018005	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Silasi maa Timoti ba lɩɩ Masedoniya ba mʋ asɛ Korinto mʋ, Pɔɔlɩ nyɛ saŋa sa abwaarɛsɩn kɩtɔwɛ, yɛgɛ ɛɛ lɛɛ asɩn mʋ kesintin ɛɛ kaapʋ tɔ ɛɛ sa Gyiwu abi mʋ yɛ Yesu ɩ gyɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ.
44018006	Amaa Gyiwu abi ba maa kina asɩn mʋ, nɩɩ ba saalɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ fwɩɩ mʋ abaa yɛ mʋ ayaa nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Fanɛ lewu i bwii fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ amu sʋ. Mɛɛ mɛ bɩrɛ ɩ man gyɛ mɛ asɩn. Lɩɩ ndaga ɩ sʋ ii kpee mʋ, n biti n kpee bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ asɛ.”
44018007	Ɩmʋ sʋ Pɔɔlɩ lɩɩ Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa mʋ, nɩɩ o kpee ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Titusi Gyusitu mʋ asɛ. Ɔ man gyɛ Gyiwu obii, amaa ee sun Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ mʋ kɩkpaara kɩ man bʋ kata yɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa mʋ.
44018008	Kirisipu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ yɛ mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ abi kpini ba kɔɔlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu gyii. Nɩɩ Korinto abi gaalaagaa mʋ nɩɩ ba nu abwaarɛsɩn mʋ ba kɔɔlɛ gyii, nɩɩ ba gyee bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee.
44018009	Kakaakʋ kagyanbwɛ nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ nyɛ ansi sʋ kɩlɛɛkaapʋ, nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Man waa kufuu, man laatɔ, kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ.
44018010	N tii fʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ mata fʋ abɛɛ ɔ waa fʋ kʋtɔ kʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ kadɛ kɩnɩmʋ tɔ asa gaalaagaa ba gyɛ mɛ lɛɛ.”
44018011	Ɩmʋ sʋ Pɔɔlɩ kyɩna tʋtɔ kesu kʋlʋn yɛ kɩdɩyɛ, ɛɛ kaapʋ abwaarɛsɩn ɛɛ sa bamʋ.
44018012	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Galiyo gyɛ Akiya kadɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ, Gyiwu abi akʋ ba bʋga kʋsʋ naa tii Pɔɔlɩ, taa mʋ kpee asɩn ogyikpa.
44018013	Nɩɩ ba pwɩɩ mʋ fɛɛ, “Ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ ɩɩ kaapʋ asa Kabwaarɛ‐sun kʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɩmaa anɛ nbara mʋ ɩ man gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn.”
44018014	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ piili yɛ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ, kadɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ Galiyo tɔwɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ pwɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ mʋ yɛ, “Ɩ daa ɩ gyɛ alibi akʋ abɛɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man dɛ ɔkpa nɩn, naafɔɔ n daa nu fanɛ asɛ.
44018015	Amaa ɩ maa gyɛ ntɔwɛ kɩtaasɛ yɛ atɩɩ yɛ fanɛ Gyiwu abi nbara falɛ bɩrɛ, fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fan naa gyii asɩn mʋ. Man gyɛ mɛ ɩ gyɛ kanɩn asɩn nɩmʋ ɔtalɛpʋ.”
44018016	Nɩɩ ɔ gya bamʋ lɩɩ asɩn ogyikpa mʋ.
44018017	Nɩɩ ba kɩtaa Sotene mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa ɔbɩlɩsa mʋ, dayɩ mu asɩn ogyikpa ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ Galiyo mu ansi tɔ. Amaa ɔ man tɔwɛ sɛhn.
44018018	Nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ kyɩna akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Korinto mʋ asɛ nkɛ nkʋ, nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ kpee Siriya. Maa lɩɩ tʋtɔ ee kpee mʋ, Prisila maa Akwila ba buu mʋ kpee. Pɔyɩ kɛ ba faa mʋ, Pɔɔlɩ sɩyɛ mu inyini Kenkera kadɛ tɔ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɔ ntan mʋ.
44018019	Ba maa fʋʋ Efeso mʋ, Pɔɔlɩ yɛgɛ Prisila maa Akwila, nɩɩ o kpee Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa, kɛ maa Gyiwu abi ba naa gyii Yesu asɩn mʋ ɩmɔɔrɛ.
44018020	Ba maa kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ ɔ kyɩna bamʋ asɛ nkɛ nnyɔ kʋ mʋ, nɩɩ o kina.
44018021	Amaa maa kpee mʋ, ɔ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kan kyula, n biti n bwii ba.” Nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Efeso bɔla nkyu sʋ kyʋn.
44018022	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ naa dan Kasariya mʋ, ɔ naa fwaala Krisito abi kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Gyerusalem mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ kyaga sʋ kpee Antiyoki.
44018023	Pɔɔlɩ maa gyii nkɛ nkʋ Antiyoki mʋ, ɔ lɩɩ tʋtɔ ɔ naa ɛɛ bɔɔ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ o kpee Galati yɛ Firigiya yɛgɛ ɛɛ tɔwɛ ɛɛ waa bamʋ ɔlʋn tɔ.
44018024	Saŋa maa mʋ, Gyiwu ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Apolosi nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ Alekisanda kadɛ tɔ mʋ ba Efeso. Ɔ gyɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kinyi katɔwɛ tɔ, nɩɩ o nyi Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ danbɩrasa.
44018025	Ba kaapʋ mʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ ɔkpa mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ yɩlɛ kɩnyɩn tɔ ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛgɛ ɛɛ kaapʋ lɩɩ Yesu sʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ sʋ. Amaa Gyɔn kekyu gyee nkʋn nɩɩ o nyi.
44018026	Prisila maa Akwila ba maa nu Apolosi maa tɔwɛ Yesu asɩn Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa yɛ kɩnyɩn tɔ mʋ, ba tɩɩ mʋ kpee bamʋ kɩkpaara sʋ, nɩɩ ba naa lɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔkpa mʋ kaapʋ mʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ sʋ tii sʋ.
44018027	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Apolosi waa mʋ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ee biti o kpee Akiya mʋ, akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Efeso mʋ ba waa mʋ ɔlʋn tɔ. Nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ naa sa akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Akiya mʋ yɛ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ. Mu kikpe tʋtɔ mʋ, ɩ kyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ tɔ.
44018028	Nɩɩ Apolosi yɩlɛ kɩnyɩn tɔ gyii biri Gyiwu abi mʋ sakyɔ tɔ. Ɔ taa Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ kaapʋ bamʋ fɛɛ Yesu ɩ gyɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ.
44019001	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Apolosi bʋ Korinto mʋ, Pɔɔlɩ taa kasɛ sʋ halɩɩ ɔ ba fʋʋ Efeso. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ naa wu akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu akʋ.
44019002	Nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan maa kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ, fan nyɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ?” Nɩɩ ba yɛ, “Ayee, an man pɩɩta nu gbaa yɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ kʋ bʋ tɔ.”
44019003	Ɩmʋ sʋ Pɔɔlɩ bɩla taasɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Kanɩn bɩrɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee mɔmɔ nɩɩ fan nyɛ?” Nɩɩ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Gyɔn kekyugyee mʋ nɩɩ an nyɛ.”
44019004	Nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Gyɔn kekyugyee kɩ gyɛ nfɛɛrɛ kɩkyɛɛgɛ lɩɩ alibi tɔ ba Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ nɩn. Kanɩn sʋ Gyɔn tɔwɛ asa yɛ, ba kɔɔlɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ mʋ kamaa tɔ ɛɛ ba mʋ gyii, mʋ ɩ gyɛ Yesu.”
44019005	Ba maa nu kanɩn mʋ, Pɔɔlɩ gyee bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee lɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu kɩtɩɩ tɔ.
44019006	Pɔɔlɩ maa taa mʋ abaa gyaga bamʋ sʋ mʋ, Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ kɩ ba bɔla bamʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ ntɔwɛ pʋpwɛ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla bamʋ sʋ tɔwɛ asɩn.
44019007	Asa mʋ ba gyɛ anyɩn kudu‐anyɔ nɩn.
44019008	Ɩbwaayɩ ɩsa mʋ tɔ mʋ, Pɔɔlɩ i kpee Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔgyaŋɛkpa, ɔ yɩlɛ kɩnyɩn tɔ ɛɛ tɔwɛ bamʋ kɛ ba kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ asɩn gyii.
44019009	Amaa akʋ ba waa nkɔlɔ ɔsɩɩ kina, ba man kɔɔlɛ Yesu asɩn mʋ gyii. Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ asɩn libi yii Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɔkpa mʋ sakyɔ maŋa tɔ. Nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ lɩɩ ɔgyaŋɛkpa mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ buu mʋ n‐yɩɩ. Kakɛ kʋmaa nɩmʋ maa akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ bee kpee Tiranu ɔkaapʋkpa nɩɩ ɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ.
44019010	Ɔ kaapʋ kanɩn nsu nnyɔ nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi yɛ Giriki abi mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Asiya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ kpini ba nu Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu asɩn mʋ.
44019011	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla Pɔɔlɩ sʋ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa gaa.
44019012	Nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ asa ba taa atɔ fɛɛ bɔrɩdɩba‐bi yɛ ntaa‐bi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ wʋla mata Pɔɔlɩ n‐yɩɩ mʋ, ba taa naa mata alɔpʋ nɩɩ ba nyɛ alanfɩya, nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi mɔɔ nɩn, kɛ ba lɩɩ.
44019013	Gyiwu abi akʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba naa bɛɛ gya nbwɩɩ libi mʋ, ba waa kɔkɔlɔ ɔsɩɩ taa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu kɩtɩɩ fɛɛ ba taalɛ gya nbwɩɩ libi lɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ nbwɩɩ libi yɛ, “Lɩɩ Yesu kɩtɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ tɔwɛ mʋ asɩn mʋ sʋ mʋ, n sa fanɛ kɔnɔ yɛ fan lɩɩ.”
44019014	Ɩ gyɛ Gyiwu oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Sikefa mu‐bii anaa anyɩnsa asunɔ ɩ waa kanɩn mʋ.
44019015	Kakaakʋ ba maa kpee ba naa waa kanɩn mʋ, nɩɩ kabwɩɩ libi mʋ lɛɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N nyi Yesu, nɩɩ n bɩla n nyi Pɔɔlɩ, amaa anɩmʋ ana ɩ gyɛ fanɛ?”
44019016	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ kabwɩɩ libi mʋ bʋ mʋ tɔ mʋ, tɩyɛ bamʋ sʋ, taalɛ bamʋ kpini. Nɩɩ ɔ dayɩ bamʋ larɩgɛ, nɩɩ ba taa kubolonkpan sɩlɛ lɩɩ kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ.
44019017	Gyiwu abi yɛ Giriki abi mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Efeso mʋ, ba maa nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa mʋ, ɩ kɩtaa bamʋ kufuu. Nɩɩ ba taa bɛɛrɛɛ taa sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu kɩtɩɩ mʋ.
44019018	Nɩɩ asa damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii mʋ, ba lɛɛ bamʋ nnɔ tɔ alibi mʋ nɩɩ ba waa tɔwɛ sakyɔ tɔ.
44019019	Bamʋ adamantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ Sɩtaanɛ adangana awaapʋ mʋ, ba taa bamʋ ɩwʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kaapʋ bamʋ afasɩn mʋ, ba bʋga tɔ nɩɩ ba tuwa ɩmʋ sakyɔ mʋ tɔ. Ba maa waa ɩwʋlɛ mʋ kpini afulee kɔnɔ mʋ, ɩ waa fɛɛ nderebi ngbɩn adunuu.
44019020	Kanɩn sʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu asɩn mʋ ɩ yɩlɛ nɩɩ ɩ nyɛ ɔlʋn.
44019021	Ɩnɩmʋ kpini kamaa mʋ, Pɔɔlɩ waa nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ee biti ɔ bɔla lɩɩ Masedoniya yɛ Akiya kɛ o kpee Gyerusalem. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ n kan kpee tʋtɔ kamaa mʋ, ɩ dagaa maa bɔɔ Roma gbaa sʋ.”
44019022	Nɩɩ o sun mʋ akyɛtɔpʋ Timoti maa Erasitu kpee Masedoniya. Nɩɩ mɛɛ mʋ sii Asiya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ gbɛrɛɛ.
44019023	Kanɩn saŋa maŋa tɔ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɔkpa mʋ sʋ mʋ, tɔɔrɔɔ damantɛ tɩyɛ Efeso kadɛ tɔ.
44019024	Gbiti ɔŋalagɛpʋ kʋ bʋ Efeso tʋtɔ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Demetirisu. Ɔ sʋ gbiti ɛɛ bɩlɛ ibu‐pipi fɛɛ ɔdakpa kyɩɩsa Atemisi obu. Nɩɩ mʋ yɛ abuupu mʋ kpini ba sʋ kusun mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ nyɛ kɩmʋ afulee.
44019025	Nɩɩ Demetirisu tɩɩ abuupu mʋ kpini yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ɩ maa bamʋ kusun kɩ gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn mʋ gyaŋɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Mɛ tɔɔmaa ana fen nyi fɛɛ an nyɛ anɛ kigyii an lɩɩ kusun nɩmʋ sʋ.
44019026	Yɛ fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fan wu nɩɩ fan nu, fɛɛ Pɔɔlɩ nɩmʋ naa ee nyita asa damantɛ nfɛɛrɛ. Nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ Efeso nfɩɩ nkʋn, amaa Asiya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ kpini. Nɩɩ ɔ naa ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Anyɩrɩpɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba taa abaa pɔyɩ mʋ, man gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ gbaa kpini‐kpini.’
44019027	Man gyɛ anɛ kusun wʋlɛ nkʋn ii biti i nyita. Amaa anɛ ɔdakpa kyɩɩsa obu yɛ mʋ kɩtɩɩ Atemisi mʋ, ee biti o wu. Nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Asiya ɔsʋwʋlɛ yɛ dulinyaa tɔ kpini, mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ bɛɛ sa ɔdakpa lala nɩmʋ mʋ, ii biti i biliŋi kɩyan.”
44019028	Ba maa nu falɛ mʋ, ɩ nyɛ bamʋ agbʋ. Nɩɩ ba piili bee kuusi yɛ, “Anɛ Efeso abi, anɛ ɔdakpa Atemisi mʋ, ɩ gyɛ ɔdakpa lala!”
44019029	Opula tɔ nɩɩ kadɛ mʋ tɔ kyaŋɛ ɔlanba. Nɩɩ asa mʋ ba naa kɩtaa Gayusi maa Arisitako mʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ Masedoniya abi, nɩɩ bee buu Pɔɔlɩ mʋ. Nɩɩ ba bʋga bamʋ kpee asa ɔgyaŋɛkpa.
44019030	Nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ daa ee biti fɛɛ o kpee sakyɔ mʋ tɔ, amaa akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ ba man sa mʋ ɔkpa.
44019031	Nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ mʋ kyɛmɩnɛ ana gbaa mʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ Asiya abɩlɩsa akʋ ba sa kɔnɔ kʋlɛ mʋ fɛɛ ɔ man waa kɛ o kpee sakyɔ mʋ tɔ.
44019032	Nɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ be mee nu abaa kasɛ. Akʋ bee kuusi yɛ falɛ, nɩɩ banɩmʋ mɔɔ ba yɛ bamʋ lɛɛ ndee. Nɩɩ akʋ mɔɔ ba bʋ tʋtɔ yɛgɛ ba man nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii kpee sʋ tʋtɔ.
44019033	Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi mʋ ba nin Alekisanda kyʋŋɛ kʋbʋ mu ansi tɔ ɔ yɩlɛ bamʋ ayaa tɔ tɔwɛ sa bamʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ nyɛɛ bamʋ kɩbaa yɛ ba laatɔ kɛ ɔ lɛɛ asa mʋ kɔnɔ sa bamʋ.
44019034	Amaa asa mʋ ba maa bɩɩ fɛɛ Alekisanda gyɛ Gyiwu obii mʋ, ba kuusi kyɛɛrɛɛ fɛɛ kerefi anyɔ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Anɛ Efeso abi, anɛ ɔdakpa Atemisi mʋ, ɩ gyɛ ɔdakpa lala!”
44019035	Nɩɩ kadɛ mʋ tɔ ɔwʋlɛ kyanpʋ yɛgɛ nɩɩ sakyɔ mʋ yɛgɛ ɔlanba mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ yɛ, “Efeso abi, ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ nyi fɛɛ anɛ ɔdakpa lala Atemisi, yɛ ɩmʋ kubuu mʋ nɩɩ kɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba tɩyɛ mʋ, ɩmʋ kumu ɩ gyɛ Efeso kadɛ nɩmʋ.
44019036	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ man sʋ kamɔɔrɛ‐gyii, fan laatɔ kɛ fan man kpala.
44019037	Asa mʋ nɩɩ fan bɩya nfɩɩ falɛ, ba man yuuri ɔdakpa kʋtɔ kʋkʋ, nɩɩ ba man tɔwɛ da anɛ ɔdakpa kyɩɩsa mʋ sʋ.
44019038	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ Demetirisu maa mʋ tɔɔmaa ana be nyi fɛɛ ba sʋ asɩn akʋ ba pwɩɩ bamʋ bɩrɛ, an sʋ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ an gyii asɩn kɩbanɛ abɩlɩsa ansi tɔ. Kanɩn sʋ bɛɛ taalɛ ba pwɩɩ bamʋ asɩn ogyikpa tʋtɔ.
44019039	Nɩɩ fan san fan sʋ asɩn akʋ mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ fan naa gyii fanɛ asɩn ogyikpa fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ nbara mʋ ɩ kaapʋ mʋ.
44019040	Nɩɩ an man bɩɩ mʋ, an biti an nyɛ ndaga ɔlanba nɩmʋ kɩpwɩɩ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ nɩɩ ba naa taasɛ anɛ ɩmʋ asɩn mʋ, an man sʋ asɩn akʋ nɩɩ an taalɛ taa kaapʋ tɔ lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔlanba mʋ waa.”
44019041	Nɩɩ kadɛ mʋ tɔ ɔwʋlɛ kyanpʋ mʋ maa tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ sakyɔ mʋ yaasɛ tɔ.
44020001	Ɔlanba mʋ kamaa mʋ, Pɔɔlɩ sun tɩɩ Krisito akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ waa bamʋ, kala bamʋ, nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ tʋtɔ kpee Masedoniya.
44020002	Ɔ natɛ tʋtɔ kyaabɔɔ, ɛɛ tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn yɛgɛ ɛɛ tɔwɛ ɛɛ waa asa, nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ tʋtɔ kpee Akiya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
