45007024	Mɛ awʋrʋfɔ wuya nɩmʋ! Anɩmʋ ii biti ɔ mɔlɩgɛ mɛ lɩɩ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ awaasa libi mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ sʋ mɛ kii kpee lewu tɔ falɛ?
45007025	N afwaala Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ ɔ bɔla anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito sʋ mɔlɩgɛ mɛ. Mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ mʋ, n buu Ɩbwaarɛ nbara mʋ, amaa mɛ kɩbaabʋtɔ dɩdaa mʋ, kii biti alibi kɩwaa.
45008001	Ɩmʋ sʋ, nbɩɩnbɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kʋpwɛ kubun man bʋ tɔ sa anɛ mʋ nɩɩ anaa Yesu Krisito an waa kʋkʋlʋn mʋ.
45008002	Lɩɩ fɛɛ a maa bɔla Yesu Krisito sʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu nbara pʋpwɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ sa nyɩmɩsa nkpa mʋ, ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ n nyɛ mɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ nbara mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, nɩɩ n kan waa mʋ alibi n biti n wu mʋ.
45008003	Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Mosesi nbara mʋ ɩ man taalɛ waa, kpalɩ fɛɛ anɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ maa man bɩla kɩ bʋlʋn ki buu nbara mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ taalɛ waa fɛɛ maa sun mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mu‐bii fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa alibi awaapʋ keduli. Nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ waa saraga sa anɛ alibi, ba bun alibi mʋ nɩɩ i gyii nyɩmɩsa kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ sʋ mʋ kʋpwɛ.
45008004	Ɩbwaarɛ waa falɛ nɩn kɛ a taalɛ waa kesintin ɩkpa danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ nbara ii biti mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ an man bɩla an buu anɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ dɩdaa mʋ, amaa an buu Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu kebiti mʋ.
45008005	Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba naa kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ dɩdaa tɔ mʋ, bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ dɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kebiti sʋ nɩn, amaa bamʋ nɩɩ ba naa Kayaayu tɔ mʋ, bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ dɛ Kayaayu kebiti tɔ nɩn.
45008006	Fɛɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kebiti kan gyii ɔkʋ nfɛɛrɛ sʋ mʋ, ɩ bɩya mʋ lewu nɩn, amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu kebiti gyii mʋ nfɛɛrɛ sʋ mʋ, ɩ bɩya mʋ nkpa yɛ keyuula.
45008007	Lɩɩ fɛɛ nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan taa mʋ nfɛɛrɛ tʋʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kebiti sʋ mʋ, ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ okisipu. Nɩɩ o mee buu Ɩbwaarɛ nbara, nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ buu sʋ gbaa.
45008008	Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa bamʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kebiti mʋ, ba mɛɛ bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ ansi.
45008009	Amaa fanɛ bɩrɛ fɛn mɛɛ waa fanɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kebiti, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ fanɛ tɔ mʋ kebiti nɩɩ fɛn waa. Nɩɩ ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ Krisito Kayaayu mʋ, ɔ man gyɛ Krisito lɛɛ.
45008010	Amaa fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ Krisito bʋ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ mʋ bɩrɛ, fanɛ n‐yaayu mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ fanɛ tɔ mʋ ɩ sʋ nkpa. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ yɛ fanɛ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ asɛ, amaa lɩɩ fanɛ alibi sʋ mʋ fanɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kii biti ki wu.
45008011	Nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ o kyiŋi Yesu lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ Kayaayu bʋ fanɛ tɔ bɩrɛ, kanɩn Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ o kyiŋi Yesu lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ, ii biti ɔ sa fanɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ nkpa, lɩɩ mʋ Kayaayu mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ fanɛ tɔ falɛ sʋ.
45008012	Ɩmʋ sʋ mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, nbɩɩnbɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ dagaa ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ a man taa anɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kebiti waa anɛ kakyɩna tɔ.
45008013	Nɩɩ fan kan taa kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ asun libi waa fanɛ kakyɩna tɔ bɩrɛ fen biti fen wu, amaa nɩɩ fan bɔla Kayaayu mʋ sʋ kina nɩɩ fan yɛgɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ asun libi mʋ bɩrɛ, fen biti fan nyɛ nkpa.
45008014	Bamʋ nɩɩ ba buu Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu ɔkpa kaapʋsa bamʋ mʋ, bamʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii ana.
45008015	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Kayaayu mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa fanɛ mʋ, mɛɛ waa fanɛ anyɛ kɛ fan baa fan sʋ kufuu. Amaa fan nyɛ Kayaayu mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ waa fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii ana. Ɩmʋ ɔlʋn tɔ nɩɩ an taalɛ tɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ, “Abaa! Anɛ‐Sɛ.”
45008016	Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ gbaa‐gbaa ɩ lɛɛ ɩ kaapʋ anɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ kesintin fɛɛ an gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii ana.
45008017	Nɩɩ a maa gyɛ mu‐bii ana falɛ sʋ mʋ, an biti a nyɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɛ ee biti ɔ sa anɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ anaa Krisito an biti a bʋga nyɛ kanɩn kʋtɔ maŋa. Amɔɔ ana mʋ an bʋga gyii mʋ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ, pɔyɩ kɛ ana mʋ a bʋga gyii mʋ bʋnyaa mʋ.
45008018	Nɩɩ n wu fɛɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ an gyii falɛ mʋ, ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ taa kaala bʋnyaa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ lɛɛ kaapʋ anɛ mʋ.
45008019	Ɩbwaarɛ atɔ tʋʋsa mʋ kpini bɛɛ gyʋgyʋʋ ba gyoo Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ ba lɛɛ mu‐bii ana mʋ kaapʋ.
45008020	Nɩɩ atɔ tʋʋsa mʋ kpini ɩ ba waa atɔ kɩyan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ ɩmʋ kebiti sʋ, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ waa ɩmʋ kanɩn kɛ ɔ sa ɩmʋ tamaa.
45008021	Lɩɩ fɛɛ atɔ tʋʋsa mʋ kpini bee biti ba kɔɔlɛ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ lewu yɛ kinyita tɔ, kɛ ba ba nyɛ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ bʋnyaa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii ana mʋ.
45008022	Nɩɩ an nyi fɛɛ atɔ tʋʋsa mʋ kpini bɛɛ yɩyɛɛ ba fʋʋ halɩɩ ndaga, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ ii duŋi mʋ.
45008023	Nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ ɩmʋ nkʋn ɩɩ yɩyɛɛ, amaa anɛ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ nɩɩ an nyɛ Kayaayu mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kakɛɛ gyankpaasa mʋ gbaa an yɩyɛɛ anɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ. An yɩyɛɛ an gyoo kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ taa anɛ waa mu‐bii ana, kɛ ɔ kɔɔlɛ anɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ yɛgɛ mʋ.
45008024	Lɩɩ tamaa mʋ nɩɩ an sʋ mʋ sʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ mɔlɩgɛ anɛ. Amaa nɩɩ ɔkʋ sʋ tamaa lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛɛ wʋla wu mʋ, man gyɛ tamaa kpini‐kpini. Nɩɩ anɩmʋ ɩ sʋ tamaa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛɛ wʋla ɔ sʋ mʋ sʋ?
45008025	Amaa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ an man pɩɩta nyɛ nɩɩ an sʋ ɩmʋ sʋ tamaa mʋ an nyɛ kenyiita nɩn an gyoo kɩmʋ.
45008026	Kanɩn ɔkpa kʋlʋn sʋ nɩɩ Kayaayu mʋ ɩ kyɛ anɛ tɔ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ anɛ n‐yɩɩ ɩ yɔɔ anɛ mʋ. Kpalɩ fɛɛ a maa man nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ a kʋlɛ, nɩɩ a man nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ a tɔwɛ anɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ tɔ mʋ, Kayaayu mʋ gbaa‐gbaa ii muusi ɛɛ tɔwɛ atɔwɛ‐bi mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ taa kɔnɔ tɔwɛ nɩɩ ɔ yɩlɛ tɔ ɛɛ kʋlɛ ɛɛ kyɛ anɛ tɔ.
45008027	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ o nyi anɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ mʋ, nyi nfɛɛrɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ Kayaayu mʋ tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Kayaayu mʋ ɩ yɩlɛ tɔ ɛɛ kʋlɛ ɛɛ sa akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti sʋ.
45008028	Nɩɩ an nyi fɛɛ atɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ ba mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ ɩmʋ kpini ɛɛ waa kusun, kɛ i kpee naa lʋwɛ danbɩrasa sa bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti mʋ asɩn mʋ. Bamʋ ɩ gyɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla tɩɩ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla tɔwɛ yɩla mʋ.
45008029	Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla o nyi mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ bamʋ yɩla kɛ ba ba waa fɛɛ mu‐bii keduli mʋ, kɛ mu‐bii mʋ ɔ ba waa nbii damantɛ mʋ tɔ obii gyankpaasa.
45008030	Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ yɩla mʋ, ɔ tɩɩ bamʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ bamʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bamʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ asɛ mʋ, ɔ taa mʋ bʋnyaa mʋ sa bamʋ.
45008031	Ɩnɩmʋ kpini kamaa mʋ, mɩnɛ nɩɩ an biti a tɔwɛ? Fɛɛ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kan ɔ yɩlɛ anɛ kamaa mʋ, anɩmʋ ɩ taalɛ kɔ yɛ anɛ?
45008032	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kina mu‐bii kɩtaa sa, nɩɩ lɩɩ anɛ alibi sʋ mʋ, ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ o be wu sa anɛ mʋ, mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ taa atɔ kpini tii mʋ sʋ bwaala anɛ?
45008033	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa‐gbaa maa tɔwɛ yɛ an gyii asʋ mʋ, anɩmʋ ii biti ɔ taalɛ pwɩɩ anɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ yɩla sa mʋ n‐yɩɩ mʋ?
45008034	Anɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋnɩ o bun anɛ kʋpwɛ? Yesu Krisito abɛɛ. Ayee! Mʋ i wu sa anɛ nɩɩ o kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ sa anɛ, nɩɩ ɔ tɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gyisa sʋ ɔ yɩlɛ tɔ ɛɛ kʋlɛ ɛɛ kyɛ anɛ tɔ.
45008035	Mɩnɛ ɩ taalɛ barɩgɛ anɛ lɩɩ Krisito kebiti mʋ tɔ? Kayɩyɛɛ, abɛɛ kɩkpɩnɛ, abɛɛ kanyanla, abɛɛ akʋn, abɛɛ kitiri, atɔ mʋ nɩɩ a sʋ kufuu, abɛɛ kɩmɔmɔ? Ɩnɩmʋ kpini ɩ mɛɛ taalɛ barɩgɛ anɛ lɩɩ Yesu kebiti mʋ tɔ.
45008036	N tɔwɛ kanɩn lɩɩ fɛɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “O! Ɩbwaarɛ, kpalɩ fʋ sʋ bɛɛ mɔɔ anɛ kakɛ kʋmaa, nɩɩ ba taa anɛ waa fɛɛ nbʋlʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba naa mɔɔ bamʋ mʋ.”
45008037	Amaa lɩɩ Yesu Krisito kebiti mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ sa anɛ sʋ mʋ, an kɔ an lɩɩ ɩmʋ kpini‐kpini tɔ.
45008038	Nɩɩ n nyi ɩ maa gyɛ kesintin fɛɛ lewu nɩn o, nkpa nɩn o, Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ nɩn o, nbwɩɩ libi nɩn o, atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ tɔ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩn o, atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba nɩn o, kasɛ sʋ atɔ nɩn o, ɔlʋn nɩn o,
45008039	sʋsʋ nɩn o, kasɛ tɔ kasɛ tɔ atɔ nɩn o, atɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tʋʋ mʋ, kʋkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ barɩgɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ an naa mʋ nsana lɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito sʋ.
45009001	Lɩɩ maa Krisito a maa gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn sʋ mʋ, asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ falɛ ɩ gyɛ kesintin, n mɛɛ tɩn antɩŋɛsa. Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ yɛ mɛ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ ii gyii mɛ kesintin, fɛɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ falɛ ɩ man gyɛ antɩŋɛsa.
45009002	Mɛ ɔtɔ tɔ ɩ fɔyɩ mɛ nɩɩ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ ki nyita sa mɛ asa.
45009003	Naafɔɔ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ waa mʋ, n biti n taa mɛ n‐yɩɩ sa kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ tɔwɛ mɛ nnɔ, kɛ ɩ barɩgɛ maa Yesu nsana, kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ mɛ asa Ɩsɩrayɩ abi ba nyɛ nkpa.
45009004	Ɩsɩrayɩ abi ba gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asa. Bamʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ nɩɩ ɔ taa bamʋ waa mʋ asa, bamʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ bʋnyaa kparɛ mʋ kaapʋ, nɩɩ maa bamʋ ba waa katɔwɛ kyula, nɩɩ ɔ sa bamʋ mʋ Nbara mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kaapʋ bamʋ ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ba taa sʋ sun mʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ɔ da kɔkɔlɔ sʋ sa.
45009005	Nɩɩ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi banɩmʋ tɔ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asa kparɛ‐kparɛ mʋ ba lɩɩ, nɩɩ Krisito maa ba fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ tɔ mʋ, ɔ lɩɩ kanɩn kɩnaana maŋa tɔ. Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋnɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa kɩ bʋ mʋ kasɛ, nɩɩ ayɩn‐bi a gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ kakpaa. Amen!
45009006	Amaa ɩ man gyɛ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ man waa asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ tɔwɛ yɩla mʋ tɔ nɩn. Kpalɩ fɛɛ man gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba lɩɩ Ɩsɩrayɩ kɩnaana mʋ tɔ kpini ɩ gyɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi kesintin.
45009007	Abɛɛ ɩ man gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba lɩɩ Abraham kɩnaana mʋ tɔ kpini ɩ gyɛ Abraham anaana‐bii. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ sa Abraham yɛ, “Lɩɩ Isaki kanan tɔ nɩɩ fii biti fʋ nyɛ anaana‐bii.
45009008	Asɩn mʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, man gyɛ nbii mʋ nɩɩ Abraham kʋʋgɛ mʋ kpini ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii ana. Amɔɔ bamʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ sa Abraham mʋ nkʋn ɩ gyɛ mʋ anaana‐bii.
45009009	Kpalɩ fɛɛ falɛ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ tɔwɛ Abraham, ‘Kesu kakʋ falɛ saŋa kɛ n ba bwii ba mʋ, fʋ‐ka Sara ii biti ɔ kʋʋgɛ kebii‐nyɩnsa‐bii.’
45009010	“Man gyɛ ɩmʋ nkʋn. Amaa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Rebeka mʋ ɔ kʋʋgɛ nbwaara‐bii mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ‐sɛ gyɛ anɛ naana Isaki.
45009011	Amaa ba maa man pɩɩta kʋʋgɛ bamʋ gbaa kɛ ba waa asɩn danbɩrasa abɛɛ alibi mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɛɛ ɔkʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ mʋ, ɩ man bɔla ɔsa maa awaasa sʋ.
45009012	Lɩɩ fɛɛ pɔyɩ ba kʋʋgɛ nbii mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ Rebeka yɛ, ‘Ɔbɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ ii biti o be sun kebii asɛ mʋ.’
45009013	Kanɩn nɩɩ ɔ wʋla tɔwɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, ‘N biti Gyekobu, amaa n kisi Esawu.’
45009014	“Ɩmʋ sʋ nɛnɛ nɩɩ an biti a tɔwɛ? A tɔwɛ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mɛɛ waa mʋ asɩn kyɛɛkyɛɛ abɛɛ? Ayee, ɩ man gyɛ kanɩn.
45009015	Kpalɩ fɛɛ ɔ tɔwɛ Mosesi yɛ, ‘Ɔmʋ nɩɩ n biti n wu kʋwɛɛ mʋ, mʋ nɩɩ n biti n wu kʋwɛɛ, nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ kɩɩ kyɔɔ mʋ sʋ mʋ, mʋ nɩɩ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ kii biti kɩ kyɔɔ mʋ sʋ.’
45009016	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ man gyɛ nyɩmɩsa kɩpɩrɛ sʋ abɛɛ maa kpan mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ, amaa ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kʋwɛɛ kuwu nɩn.
45009017	Kpalɩ fɛɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ Faro yɛ, ‘Ɩnɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n bun fu kuwura kɛ n bɔla fʋ sʋ lɛɛ mɛ ɔlʋn kaapʋ, kɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ dulinyaa kpini tɔ ba yɩn mɛ kɩtɩɩ.’
45009018	Ɩnɩmʋ kpini ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti o wu kʋwɛɛ mʋ, bamʋ nɩɩ ee wu kʋwɛɛ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ee biti ba waa mʋ kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn mʋ, ɛɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba waa kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn.
45009019	“Fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ ii biti ɔ taasɛ mɛ yɛ, ‘Nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kanɩn bɩrɛ, ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ kina Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti mʋ, mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ san ɛɛ pwɩɩ anɛ kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn sʋ?’
45009020	Amaa nyɩmɩsa, fʋ ɩ gyɛ anɩmʋ, nɩɩ fɩɩ taalɛ tɔwɛ gyaŋa Ɩbwaarɛ? Kʋtɔ pɔyɩsa ɩ taalɛ tɔwɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ pɔyɩ kɩmʋ mʋ yɛ, ‘Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fʋ pɔyɩ mɛ falɛ?’
45009021	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔpɔyɩpʋ sʋ ɔkpa fɛɛ ɔ barɩgɛ kabɔlɛ kuli tɔ kɩnyɔ, kɛ ɔ taa kʋkʋ pɔyɩ lapɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ yɛgɛ bɛɛ yɩla kensi‐gyii akɛ, kɛ ɔ taa kʋkʋ pɔyɩ lapɛ mʋ nɩɩ bee gyii tɔ kakɛ kʋmaa.
45009022	“Kanɩn ɔkpa kʋlʋn sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti fɛɛ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ agbʋ kaapʋ asa, kɛ ba wu mʋ ɔlʋn mʋ, amaa bamʋ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ agbʋ bamʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ o nyita bamʋ mʋ, ɔ nyɛ kenyiita gaa sa bamʋ.
45009023	Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla ee biti fɛɛ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ bʋnyaa kparɛ mʋ kaapʋ mʋ asa mʋ nɩɩ ee wu bamʋ kʋwɛɛ, nɩɩ ba gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɔŋɔ bamʋ yɩla sa mʋ bʋnyaa mʋ.
45009024	Anɛ ɩ gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ tɔ nkʋn, amaa ɔ tɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ tɔ gbaa.
45009025	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Hoseya ɔwʋlɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ yɛ, ‘Asa mʋ nɩɩ naafɔɔ ba man gyɛ mɛ asa mʋ, n biti n tɩɩ bamʋ mɛ asa. Nɩɩ ɔsʋwʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ n man sʋ kebiti sa bamʋ mʋ, n biti n biti bamʋ.’
45009026	Nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba fɛɛ opula mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, ‘Fan man gyɛ mɛ asa mʋ, kanɩn opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ bee biti ba tɩɩ bamʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ nkpa wuya mu‐bii ana.’ ”
45009027	Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Isaya gbaa kuusi tɔwɛ lɩɩ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi sʋ yɛ, “Halɩɩ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi ba maa kyɔ fɛɛ ɔpʋ kɔnɔ kɩkyafa falɛ gbaa mʋ, bamʋ tɔ akalɩsa akʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ ba mɔlɩgɛ.
45009028	Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti o gyii mʋ asɩn kasɛ sʋ bilen‐bilen kɛ ɔ lʋwɛ ɩmʋ kɛ ɔ tɩn ɩmʋ kɩdɩyɛ.”
45009029	I du nɩn fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Isaya wʋla tɔwɛ yɩla mʋ yɛ, “Fɛɛ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Ɔlʋn kpini wuya man dɩn dan yɛgɛ anɛ odu tɔ sa akʋ yɩla mʋ, naafɔɔ an dɩn muuri fɛɛ Sodom yɛ Gomora abi mʋ.”
45009030	Ɩmʋ sʋ mɩnɛ nɩɩ an biti a tɔwɛ? An biti an tɔwɛ yɛ, bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi, nɩɩ bamʋ ansi an man payɩ bee biti ɩkpa kyiigisa mʋ, lɩɩ bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii sʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ kɔɔlɛ bamʋ fɛɛ bamʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ asɛ.
45009031	Amaa Ɩsɩrayɩ abi mʋ bɩrɛ, ba payɩ ansi bee buu nbara mʋ bee biti fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ kɔɔlɛ bamʋ yɛ bamʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ asɛ, yɛgɛ ba man nyɛ ɩmʋ.
45009032	Mɩnɛ maa waa sʋ? Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba man taa kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ bee biti, amaa ba sʋ ba naa yɛ awaasa sʋ nɩn. Nɩɩ ba siti “Kubuu sitisa” mʋ lɩɩ tɩyɛ,
45009033	fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ lɩɩ Yesu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ yɩlɛ sa kubuu nɩmʋ asɩn Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Fan kɩɩ! N taa kubuu mʋ nɩɩ kɩ yɛgɛ asa ba siti mʋ yɩla Siyon kadɛ tɔ. Kɛ kanɩn kɩfʋlɛ‐buu maŋa kɩ yɛgɛ asa ba lɩɩ bɛɛ tɩyɛ. Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii mʋ, mɛɛ yɛ o gyii ipeeli.”
45010001	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, mɛ kɔkɔlɔ biti yɛ mɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ mɔlɩgɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi.
45010002	Lɩɩ fɛɛ n taalɛ gyii kesintin lɩɩ bamʋ sʋ kaapʋ fɛɛ bɛɛ payɩ ansi bee buu Ɩbwaarɛ bɩrɛ, amaa bamʋ kensi payɩ man yɩlɛ kinyi sʋ.
45010003	Nɩɩ ba man nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩɩ kɔɔlɛ asa fɛɛ bamʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ asɛ. Ɩmʋ sʋ bɛɛ kɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ gbaa‐gbaa bamʋ awaasa ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ bamʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi. Ɩmʋ sʋ ba man bɩya bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ ba buu Ɩbwaarɛ ɩkpa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ o kyula fɛɛ bamʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ asɛ.
45010004	Ɩmʋ kesintin ɩ gyɛ yɛ Krisito ɩ waa nbara mu kusun mʋ lʋwɛ, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ mʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ asɛ.
45010005	Mosesi kaapʋ asa kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba buu nbara mʋ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ kɔɔlɛ bamʋ fɛɛ bamʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ asɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ kyʋrɔɔ yɛ, “Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o buu ɩnɩmʋ mʋ ee biti ɔ nyɛ nkpa lɩɩ ɩmʋ sʋ.”
45010006	Amaa fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ lɩɩ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ kɔɔlɛ asa yɛ bamʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ asɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, “Man kan tɔwɛ fʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ yɛ, anɩmʋ ii biti o dii kpee sʋsʋ? (ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, kɛ ɔ kpɩlɩgaa Yesu ba kasɛ),
45010007	abɛɛ man tɔwɛ yɛ, anɩmʋ ii biti ɔ kpɩlɩgɛ kpee kasɛ‐kasɛ tɔ? (ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, kɛ ɔ naa kʋsaa Yesu lɩɩ kamandɛ tɔ ba.)”
45010008	Amaa nɛnɛ nɩɩ ɩ kyaga sʋ ɩ tɔwɛ? “Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ i tiri fʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɩ bʋ fʋ kɔnɔ tɔ yɛ fʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ.” Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii asɩn mʋ nɩɩ an tɔwɛ mʋ.
45010009	Nɩɩ fʋ kan taa fʋ kɔnɔ lɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, Yesu ɩ gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ, nɩɩ fʋ kɔɔlɛ gyii fʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kyiŋi mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ, fii biti fʋ nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ.
45010010	Lɩɩ fɛɛ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa ɩ kɔɔlɛ ee gyii, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kɔɔlɛ mʋ fɛɛ mʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi. Nɩɩ ɔ kan lɛɛ kɔnɔ tɔwɛ yɛ Yesu ɩ gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ.
45010011	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ yɛ o gyii ipeeli kpaa.”
45010012	Gyiwu abi ba man kwɩɩ yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kʋlʋn ɩ gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ sa asa kpini. Nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kʋsee kʋkyɔ ɛɛ sa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ kɩtɩɩ mʋ,
45010013	fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ kɩtɩɩ mʋ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ.”
45010014	Nɛnɛ nɩɩ bee biti ba waa kɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩta kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii mʋ, ba taalɛ tɩɩ mʋ kɩtɩɩ? Nɩɩ ba man kan nu mʋ asɩn mʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ bee biti ba waa kɛ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii? Nɩɩ ɔkʋ man pɩɩta tɔwɛ bamʋ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ bee biti ba waa kɛ ba nu?
45010015	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ man kan sun bamʋ yɛ ba naa tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ bee biti ba waa kɛ ba naa tɔwɛ asɩn mʋ? Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Bamʋ nɩɩ ba naa bɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, bamʋ kɩnatɛ mʋ kɩ bʋrɔn gaa.”
45010016	Amaa man gyɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi kpini ɩ kɔɔlɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ gyii. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Isaya tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, anɩmʋ ɩ kɔɔlɛ anɛ asɩn tɔwɛsa mʋ gyii?”
45010017	Kanɩn bɩrɛ lɩɩ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ kɩtɔwɛ lɩɩ Yesu Krisito sʋ nɩɩ asa bee nu asɩn mʋ. Nɩɩ lɩɩ asɩn mʋ kinu sʋ, nɩɩ asa bɛɛ kɔɔlɛ bee gyii.
45010018	Amaa n taasɛ yɛ, Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ ba man kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ, ba man nu asɩn mʋ nɩn? Ba nu yɛ bamʋ asʋ. Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Asɩn danbɩrasa kɩtɔwɛ mʋ, ii kpee dulinyaa tɔ kpini, nɩɩ asɩn tɔwɛsa nɩmʋ i kpee ɩsʋwʋlɛ kpini sʋ.”
45010019	N bɩla taasɛ yɛ, “Ɩsɩrayɩ abi ba man nu kasɛ nɩn? Ba nu kasɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Mosesi wʋla gyankpaa tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ, ‘N biti n taa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ, nɩɩ ba man gyɛ kʋbʋ fɛɛ fanɛ mʋ, waa fanɛ kensi payɩ. N biti n taa asa mʋ nɩɩ ba man nyi mɛ mʋ waa fanɛ agbʋ.’
45010020	Nɩɩ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Isaya yɩlɛ kɩnyɩntɔ kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ, ‘Bamʋ nɩɩ ba man kɩɩ biti mɛ gbaa mʋ, bamʋ nɩɩ n yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba wu mɛ. Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man taasɛ mɛ sʋ mʋ, n lɛɛ mɛ n‐yɩɩ n kaapʋ bamʋ.’
45010021	Amaa lɩɩ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi mʋ sʋ bɩrɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Halɩɩ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi ba maa bamʋ kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn, yɛ bamʋ kikina mɛ sʋ mʋ, n san n da kɩbaa n tɩɩ bamʋ kakɛ kʋmaa yɛ ba ba mɛ asɛ.’ ”
45011001	Nɩɩ n taasɛ yɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ kina mʋ asa Ɩsɩrayɩ abi nɩn abɛɛ? Ayee! Ngbaa mɛ n gyɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ obii nɩn. Nɩɩ n gyɛ Abraham kanaana‐bii nɩɩ n lɩɩ Bengyamin kebunɔ.
45011002	Ɩbwaarɛ man kina mʋ asa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla o nyi bamʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ fan man nyiŋi asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Eligya tɔwɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ mʋ? Eligya maa fabɩlɛ ɛɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ lɩɩ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi sʋ yɛ,
45011003	“Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, ba mɔɔ fʋ atɔwɛpʋ kpini, nɩɩ ba boyi fʋ saraga nswɩɩ kpini. Nɩɩ mɛ nkʋn i sii nɩɩ bee biti ba mɔɔ mɛ.”
45011004	Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “N lɛɛ anyɩn ngbɩn nsunɔ yɩla sa mɛ n‐yɩɩ, nɩɩ bamʋ ɔkʋ gbaa man muŋa ɔdakpa Baali.”
45011005	Kanɩn sʋ anɛ saŋa nɩmʋ tɔ gbaa, Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ asa kalɩsa akʋ lɩɩ mʋ kabwaala sʋ.
45011006	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩlɛɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ kabwaala sʋ bɩrɛ, kanɩn bɩrɛ ɩ man bɩla ɩ gyɛ kusun mʋ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa sun. Nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ gyɛ kusun sʋ bɩrɛ, kabwaala man bɩla kɩ gyɛ kabwaala.
45011007	Ɩmʋ sʋ mɩnɛ? Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi bɛɛ kpan bamʋ n‐yɩɩ bee biti mʋ ba man nyɛ kɩmʋ, amɔɔ bamʋ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ bamʋ mʋ ɩ nyɛ. Amaa bamʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba san mʋ nkɔlɔ ɩ bʋlʋn.
45011008	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Isaya tɔwɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ waa bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ fɛɛ amelensipu, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ taalɛ taa bamʋ ansi wu, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ taalɛ taa bamʋ asʋ gbaa nu ba fʋʋ ndaga kakɛ nɩmʋ.”
45011009	Nɩɩ Dawidi gbaa tɔwɛ lɩɩ Ɩlʋn ɩwʋlɛ mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ yɛgɛ bamʋ ansi ogyikpa i biliŋi ɔdʋʋ da bamʋ, kɛ ɩ bɩla yɛgɛ ba lɩɩ tɩyɛ, kɛ ɩ baa ɩ gyɛ bamʋ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ.
45011010	Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ yɛgɛ bamʋ ansi i bun kɛ ba man bɩla wu, kɛ ɔ yɛgɛ awʋrʋfɔ i nu bamʋ kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ ba nyɔn tɔ kakpaa.”
45011011	Nɩɩ n bɩla taasɛ yɛ, “Ɩsɩrayɩ abi ba maa siti tɩyɛ mʋ, ba mɛɛ bɩla taalɛ kʋsʋ? Ayee!” Amaa lɩɩ bamʋ alibi sʋ mʋ, bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi mʋ bee biti ba ba nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi ba nyɛ kayɩɩ basa.
45011012	Nɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi alibi ɩnɩmʋ ɩ yɛgɛ dulinyaa tɔ asa kpini ba nyɛ atɔ kparɛ, nɩɩ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi kɩtɩyɛ kɩnɩmʋ kɩ yɛgɛ kɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi ba nyɛ tɔnɔ gaa mʋ, mɩnɛ tɔnɔ nɩɩ dulinyaa tɔ asa ba mɛɛ yɛ ba nyɛ nɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi mʋ ba kan bwii kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ?
45011013	Nbɩɩnbɩɩ n tɔwɛ n sa fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩn. Fɛɛ n maa gyɛ Krisito osunpu mʋ nɩɩ o sun mɛ fanɛ asɛ mʋ, kusun mʋ ki gyii mi ansi.
45011014	N sʋ tamaa fɛɛ akʋtɔ mi kusun mʋ kii biti kɩ taalɛ yɛgɛ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ asa ba nyɛ kayɩɩ basa kɛ bamʋ akʋ ba nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ.
45011015	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kina Ɩsɩrayɩ abi mʋ, ɩmʋ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ dulinyaa abi ba bwii ba Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ. Kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bwii kɔɔlɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi mʋ, ii biti ɩ baa i du nɩn fɛɛ alewupu ii bwii kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ.
45011016	Fɛɛ nɩɩ ba kan lɛɛ atɔ kʋ tɔ ɩkʋ waa saraga sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ san mʋ gbaa ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ nɩn. Fɛɛ nɩɩ ba taa oyu ilin waa saraga sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ n‐yaabi mʋ kpini ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ.
45011017	Ɩsɩrayɩ abi ba du nɩn fɛɛ olifu oyu mʋ nɩɩ ba duu kɩmʋ kewu tɔ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ, ba du fɛɛ olifu oyu mʋ nɩɩ kɩ kɔyɩ afitiri tɔ mʋ. I du nɩn fɛɛ ba maa ŋɛ kewu tɔ oyu duusa mʋ kɩyaa‐bi kʋ fɔyɩ, kɛ ba taa afitiri tɔ lɛɛ mʋ kɩyaa‐bi ba ŋmina kyaga kuduusa mʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ ɩ kan ba kanɩn mʋ n‐yaabi mʋ nɩɩ ba ŋmina kyaga mʋ, ɩɩ nyɛ nkyu danbɩrasa ɩɩ lɩɩ oyu duusa mʋ ilin tɔ. Nɩɩ fan kɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ mʋ, fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ, fanɛ ɩ gyɛ n‐yaabi mʋ nɩɩ ba taa lɩɩ afitiri tɔ mʋ.
45011018	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan man kaapʋ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ fan kyɔ kewu tɔ oyu duusa mʋ n‐yaabi mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ man gyɛ fanɛ ɩɩ sa ilin mʋ nkpa, amaa ilin mʋ ɩɩ sa fanɛ nkpa.
45011019	Akʋtɔ fii biti fʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ba ŋɛ n‐yaabi fɔyɩ kɛ ba nyɛ taa mɛ ŋmina kyaga sʋ.”
45011020	Ɩ bʋ tɔ kanɩn. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba maa man kɔɔlɛ gyii sʋ nɩɩ ba ŋɛ bamʋ fɔyɩ. Nɩɩ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ nɩɩ fan ba yii bamʋ ayaa tɔ. Kanɩn sʋ fan man kan kʋsaa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ, amaa fan baa fan daa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ.
45011021	Lɩɩ fɛɛ fan baa fen nyi fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ maa man yɛgɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ sa oyu duusa mʋ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ mʋ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ yɛgɛ fanɛ gbaa.
45011022	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan kɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wu asa kʋwɛɛ yɛ mʋ katalɛ ɔkpa sʋ. Bamʋ nɩɩ ba waa mʋ kʋsʋ ɔlʋn mʋ, ɛɛ talɛ bamʋ ɔkpa sʋ, amaa fanɛɛ fanɛ bɩrɛ ee su fanɛ kʋwɛɛ. Nɩɩ fan kan kyaga sʋ kɔɔlɛ mʋ kʋwɛɛ kuwu gyii mʋ, ee biti ɔ kyaga sʋ ee wu fanɛ kʋwɛɛ. Nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ kanɩn mʋ, ee biti ɔ ŋɛ fanɛ tʋʋ.
45011023	Nɩɩ Gyiwu abi bɩrɛ, nɩɩ ba kan yɛgɛ bamʋ kɩman kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ bɩrɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti o bwiiyaa bamʋ ba kyaga oyu duusa mʋ sʋ. Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ ɔlʋn ɔ taalɛ waa kanɩn.
45011024	Fan kɩɩ, fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ ɩ gyɛ afitiri tɔ olifu n‐yaabi, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ŋɛ fanɛ lɩɩ tʋtɔ ba kyaga kewu tɔ olifu oyu duusa mʋ sʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ ba ɩ bʋlʋn sa Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ o bwiiyaa kewu oyu duusa mʋ n‐yaabi ba kyaga kɩmʋ gbaa‐gbaa sʋ.
45011025	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, n biti fɛɛ fan baa fen nyi falɛ asɩn baalasa nɩmʋ sʋ, kɛ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ ɔ man kʋsaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ. Gyiwu abi akʋ ba nyɛ kɔkɔlɔ ɔsɩɩ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ gaalaagaa ba ba kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii.
45011026	Lɩɩ falɛ ɔkpa sʋ nɩɩ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi kpini bee biti ba nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ. Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Siyon kadɛ tɔ nɩɩ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ mʋ ii biti ɔ lɩɩ. Ee biti ɔ ba yɛgɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi kpini ba yɛgɛ asɩn gyaga kɩwaa.
45011027	Nɩɩ n kan taa bamʋ alibi kɛɛ bamʋ mʋ, ɩmʋ ii biti ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ maa bamʋ katɔwɛ kyula mʋ kɩ ba tɔ.”
45011028	Lɩɩ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ kekina sʋ mʋ, ba biliŋi Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ‐dʋn ana. Amaa bamʋ kekina mʋ ɩ yɛgɛ fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan man gyɛ Gyiwu abi fan nyɛ tɔnɔ. Amaa lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩlɛɛ tɔ mʋ, ba gyɛ mʋ asa bitisa lɩɩ bamʋ naana ana sʋ.
45011029	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kan kɛɛ ɔkʋ kakɛɛ abɛɛ nɩɩ ɔ kan tɩɩ ɔkʋ mʋ, ɔ man bɩla yɛ ɔ kyɛɛgɛ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ.
45011030	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan man gyɛ Gyiwu abi fan kyɩna waa Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn, nɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wu fanɛ kʋwɛɛ, kpalɩ fɛɛ Gyiwu abi ba maa waa kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn sʋ,
45011031	lɩɩ kanɩn maŋa sʋ nɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ ngbaa bamʋ bɛɛ waa kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn, kɛ ɩ ba fɛɛ ngbaa bamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ o wu bamʋ kʋwɛɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ o wu fanɛ gbaa fanɛ kʋwɛɛ mʋ.
45011032	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ asa kpini kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn gyii bamʋ sʋ, kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa kɛ o wu bamʋ kʋwɛɛ.
45011033	Fan kɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔ kparɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ. Ɩbwaarɛ kanyaasɩn yɛ mʋ kinyi man sʋ ɔkaa. Anɩmʋ ɩ taalɛ bɩɩ mʋ ntalɛ tɔ kyɛɛkyɛɛ? Nɩɩ anɩmʋ ɩ taalɛ kɩɩ biti wu mʋ ɩkpa naa lʋwɛ?
45011034	“Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ yɩla Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, Nɩɩ anɩmʋ i nyi Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nfɛɛrɛ abɛɛ anɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mʋ ɔtɔwɛwaapʋ?”
45011035	“Nɩɩ anɩmʋ ɩ tɛɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ atɔ kʋ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ ba ka ɩmʋ kʋkɔ?”
45011036	Lɩɩ fɛɛ atɔ kpini ɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, nɩɩ mʋ ɔlʋn sʋ nɩɩ ɩmʋ kpini ɩ bʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɩmʋ kpini ɩ gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ. Mʋ nɩɩ bʋnyaa gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ kakpaa. Ɩ ba kanɩn.
45012001	Ɩmʋ sʋ mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, n sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kʋwɛɛ kuwu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ sa anɛ mʋ, n kʋlɛ fanɛ fɛɛ fan taa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kpini sa Ɩbwaarɛ, kɛ ɩ waa fɛɛ saraga kɔlɔŋɔ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ tɛ nkpa tɔ, nɩɩ i du kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ, nɩɩ ɩ bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ ansi. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ fanɛ kabwaarɛ‐sun mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa.
45012002	Fan man kasɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ asɩn waasa, amaa fan kyɛɛgɛ fanɛ kɩbaabʋtɔ, kɛ fan nyɛ nfɛɛrɛ pʋpwɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn. Ɩmʋ ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ fan taalɛ kaala bɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋrɔn yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ i gyii mu ansi yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ dɛ kyɛɛkyɛɛ naa fʋʋ ɔkaa.
45012003	N bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ bwaala kɛkɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa sa mɛ mʋ sʋ, n tɔwɛ n sa fanɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ yɛ, ɔ man kɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ ɔ kyɔ kanan mʋ nɩɩ o du, amaa ɔ bɩya mʋ nfɛɛrɛ kasɛ lɩɩ mʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kaala sa mʋ sʋ mʋ.
45012004	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ anɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kʋlʋn yɛ ɩkyagakpa kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ, nɩɩ kʋkʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ kɩmʋ kusun sunsa mʋ,
45012005	kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ a maa kyɔ gbaa mʋ, an bʋga waa kʋbʋ kʋlʋn Krisito tɔ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ sʋ ɩkyagakpa kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ, nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kayɩɩ kʋlʋn mʋ.
45012006	Nɩɩ an sʋ kabwaala kakɛɛ kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa sa anɛ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋ lɛɛ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ maa bɔla mʋ sʋ ɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn mʋ, ɔ taa waa Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ kusun fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ mʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ kaapʋ mʋ.
45012007	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ lɛɛ kan ɔ gyɛ ɔ taa sun mʋ tɔɔmaa ana mʋ, ɔ taa sun bamʋ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋ lɛɛ kan ɔ gyɛ kɩkaapʋ mʋ, ɔ taa kaapʋ asa.
45012008	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ lɛɛ kan ɔ gyɛ kɩtɔwɛ waa mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ waa. Nɩɩ ɔkʋ lɛɛ kan ɔ gyɛ kɛkɛɛ sa asa mʋ nɩɩ ii tiri bamʋ mʋ, ɔ lɛɛ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ sa. Nɩɩ ɔkʋ lɛɛ kan ɔ gyɛ kɩbɩlɩsa mʋ, ɔ kɩɩ sʋ kpan mʋ n‐yɩɩ waa. Nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɔɔ lɛɛ kan ɔ gyɛ kʋwɛɛ kuwu mʋ, o bugi mʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ su asa sʋ.
45012009	Fan biti abaa lɩɩ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ. Fan yɛgɛ alibi ɩ waa fanɛ kʋtɔ kisisa, kɛ fan kɩtaa kɩdanbɩrasa tɔ kinkin.
45012010	Fan biti fanɛ bɩrɩsa ana Krisito abi fɛɛ kinyi‐bii. Kɛ fan taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa abaa fan kyɔ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ.
45012011	Fan kpan fanɛ n‐yɩɩ, kɛ fan man waa wʋlʋgyɔ, amaa fan taa fanɛ ɔlʋn kpini sun Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ.
45012012	Fan yɛgɛ fanɛ ansi i gyii lɩɩ fanɛ tamaa mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ mʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ fɛn kan fen gyii awʋrʋfɔ mʋ, fan nyɛ kɔkɔlɔ yɩlɛ tɔ, kɛ fan kyaga sʋ fɛn kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ saŋa kʋmaa.
45012013	Nɩɩ fanɛ bɩrɩsa ana Krisito abuupu mʋ nɩɩ atɔ kʋ i tiri bamʋ mʋ, fɛn kyɛ bamʋ tɔ, kɛ fan waa aniya kɩtaa afɔ fanɛ akpaara sʋ.
45012014	Fan kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ waa bamʋ nɩɩ bee kisi fanɛ gbaa mʋ kusee. Ɛɛhn! Fan kʋlɛ mʋ ɔ waa bamʋ kusee, kɛ fan man tɔwɛ bamʋ nnɔ.
45012015	Bamʋ nɩɩ bee gyii ansi mʋ, fan naa bamʋ fan bʋga gyii ansi, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ bɔta bee su mʋ, fan naa bamʋ fɛn bɔta tɔ su.
45012016	Fan waa kɔnɔ kʋlʋn tɔwɛ kyula abaa. Fan man kaapʋ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ, amaa fan taa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ bʋga asa mʋ nɩɩ ba man bʋ sɛhn tɔ mʋ. Fan man fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ fan nyi fan kyɔ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ.
45012017	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa fanɛ alibi mʋ, fan man taa alibi ka mʋ kʋkɔ. Fan kɩɩ yɛ ɔdan kɛ fan waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa ii biti o wu fɛɛ ɩ bʋrɔn.
45012018	Fan waa fanɛ abaa ɔkaa lɛɛ, kɛ fan naa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ fan kyɩna kayɩɩ yuuli tɔ.
45012019	Mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana, fan man taa alibi ka ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa fanɛ alibi mʋ kʋkɔ. Fan yɛgɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa sa Ɩbwaarɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ n tɛɛla asa, nɩɩ n ka alibi kʋkɔ.”
45012020	Nɩɩ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa ɩ bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fɛɛ nɩɩ akʋn ɩ kan ɩ sʋ fu okisipu mʋ, sa mʋ agyitɔ kɛ o gyii, nɩɩ bʋlɩfɔ kan ɔ sʋ mʋ mʋ, sa mʋ nkyu kɛ o nuu. Fʋ nyɛ nɩɩ fʋ waa kanɩn mʋ, i du nɩn fɛɛ fʋ maa kʋʋla afʋlɔn‐gyi gyaga mu kumu nsana.”
45012021	Fan man yɛgɛ alibi i gyii fanɛ sʋ, amaa fan taa fanɛ adanbɩrasa gyii alibi sʋ.
45013001	Ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ maa bɩya mʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ sa kɩbanɛ alʋlʋnpʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔlʋnpʋ kʋ man bʋ tɔ, amɔɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɩla mʋ. Nɩɩ alʋlʋnpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tɔ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ i yii bamʋ.
45013002	Kanɩn sʋ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kʋsʋ ɛɛ yɩlɛ ɔlʋnpʋ kʋ sʋ mʋ, ɛɛ kʋsʋ ɛɛ yɩlɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɩla mʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa kanɩn mʋ, bee biti ba bɩya kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ sa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ.
45013003	Kpalɩ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa adanbɩrasa mʋ ba man sɩlɛ ɩsʋwʋlɛ akɩɩsʋpʋ, amɔɔ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa alibi nkʋn ɩ sɩlɛ bamʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ fen mee biti fan baa fan sɩlɛ alʋlʋnpʋ mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ fan baa fɛn waa adanbɩrasa, kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ ba yɩn fanɛ.
45013004	Kpalɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ lɛɛ bamʋ waa akɩɩsʋpʋ kɛ ɩ kyɛ fanɛ tɔ kɛ ɩ waa ɔdan sa fanɛ. Amaa nɩɩ fan waa alibi bɩrɛ, fan sɩlɛ bamʋ kpalɩ fɛɛ man gyɛ kɩyan sʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ ɔlʋn fanɛ sʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ayaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ mʋ ayaa tɔ ba bɩɩtɛ alibi awaapʋ asʋ.
45013005	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fan bɩya fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ sa alʋlʋnpʋ mʋ. Man gyɛ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ nkʋn sʋ, amaa fen nyi fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ fɛɛ ɩmʋ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fan waa.
45013006	Ɩnɩmʋ kpini sʋ mʋ fan ka fanɛ tʋʋtʋʋ sa kɩbanɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ alʋlʋnpʋ mʋ ba gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ayaafɔlɛ nɩn, nɩɩ ba sʋ bamʋ saŋa kpini bɛɛ waa bamʋ kusun.
45013007	Fan ka ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kʋkɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa mʋ. Nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ gyɛ tʋʋtʋʋ mʋ fan ka tʋʋtʋʋ. Nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ gyɛ lenpoo mʋ, fan ka lenpoo. Nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ gyɛ n‐yɩɩ kɩbɩya kasɛ mʋ, fan bɩya n‐yɩɩ kasɛ. Nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ gyɛ bɛɛrɛɛ mɔɔ mʋ, fan taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa.
45013008	Fan man yɛgɛ ɔkʋ kʋkɔ ki sii fanɛ sʋ, amaa kʋkɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ dagaa kɩ dɛ fanɛ sʋ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ fan biti abaa. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa mʋ bɩrɩsa mʋ, mʋ ii buu Mosesi nbara mʋ sʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ.
45013009	Mosesi nbara mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Man lɩɩ fʋ‐ka abɛɛ fu‐kuli kamaa, man mɔɔ nyɩmɩsa, man kan yuuri, man kan yɛgɛ fu ansi ɩ payɩ ɔkʋ atɔ sʋ.” Nbara mʋ yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ bɩla i tii sʋ mʋ, ɩmʋ kpini kumu ɩ gyɛ nbara mʋ nɩɩ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Biti fʋ bɩrɩsa fɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ.”
45013010	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa mʋ bɩrɩsa mʋ, mɛɛ waa mʋ alibi. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ fʋ kan fii biti fʋ bɩrɩsa ana mʋ, fu buu nbara mʋ nɩmʋ.
45013011	Kanɩn sʋ fan buu nbara nɩmʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fen nyi nbɩɩnbɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ an bʋ kɩmʋ tɔ falɛ. Saŋa mʋ fʋʋ fɛɛ fan kyiŋi lɩɩ fanɛ nsɩɩrɛ tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ anɛ kamɔlɩgɛ saŋa mʋ tiri tɔ nbɩɩnbɩɩ ɩ kyɔ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ an kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii mʋ.
45013012	Kagyanbwɛ kɩ tɛɛ kɩɩ lʋwɛ, nɩɩ kayɩkɛ mɔɔ kii tiri tɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ fan yɛgɛ a lɛɛ kitentenbiri awaasa mʋ tʋʋ, kɛ a taa fɩtɩla atɔ mʋ nɩɩ an taa kɔ kitentenbiri tɔ awaasa mʋ taa bun.
45013013	Fan yɛgɛ anɛ kɩbaabʋtɔ kɩ baa kɩ bʋrɔn yɛgɛ kɩ kɩɩ tɔ fɛɛ kakyʋwapɛ, kɛ an man nyita saŋa iseeli libi abɛɛ kata‐bʋʋ tɔ, abɛɛ anɛ tɔ ɔkʋ ɔ man lɩɩ mʋ‐ka abɛɛ mu‐kuli kamaa, an man waa ineesi atɔ, kɛ a man kɔ nluu kɛ a man waa kensi payɩ libi yɛ abaa.
45013014	Amaa fan taa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito waa fɛɛ fanɛ ɩkaalɛ bunsa. Kɛ fan man fɛ nfɛɛrɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ alibi kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ kɩ taa waa kɩmʋ kebiti.
45014001	Nɩɩ fanɛ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ man bʋlʋn mʋ, fan kɔɔlɛ mʋ, amaa fan man gyii mʋ ɩmɔɔrɛ.
45014002	A taa fɛɛ ɔkʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ gyii kʋtɔ kʋmaa, amaa ɔkʋ mʋ nɩɩ mʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ man bʋlʋn mʋ, ee gyii afatɛɛ ɩpʋ nkʋn.
45014003	Ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ee gyii kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ mʋ, ɔ man kɩɩ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ o mee gyii ɩmʋ mʋ kɩyan. Nɩɩ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ o mee gyii kanɩn atɔ mʋ, ɔ man pwɩɩ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ee gyii kanɩn atɔ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kyula sa mʋ.
45014004	Ɩmʋ sʋ, fʋ ɩ gyɛ anɩmʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ pwɩɩ ɔkʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ? Mʋ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa ɩ taalɛ wu fɛɛ ɔ yɩlɛ tɔ abɛɛ ɔ waa tɩyɛ. Nɩɩ ee biti ɔ taalɛ yɩlɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ yɛgɛ ɔ taalɛ yɩlɛ.
45014005	Ɔkʋ sʋ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ kakɛ kʋ ki tiri kɩ kyɔ nkɛ nkʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɔɔ ɩ kɩɩ fɛɛ nkɛ mʋ kpini ɩ gyɛ kyɛɛkyɛɛ. Fanɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ fɛ yɛ ɩ bʋrɔn mʋ, ɔ yɩlɛ ɩmʋ tɔ.
45014006	Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ fɛɛ kakɛ kʋ ki tiri mʋ, ɛɛ waa kanɩn ɛɛ sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ. Nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee gyii kunun mʋ, ee gyii yɛgɛ ɛɛ taa bɛɛrɛɛ ɛɛ sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ sʋ afwaala ɛɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ. Nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o mee gyii mɔɔ mʋ, ɛɛ waa kanɩn ɔ sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ ɛɛ sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, kɛ mʋ gbaa mʋ ɔ taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ.
45014007	Nɩɩ anɛ ɔkʋ man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ sa mʋ n‐yɩɩ, nɩɩ kanɩn gbaa nɩɩ fu wu mʋ, fʋ man wu sa fʋ n‐yɩɩ.
45014008	Nɩɩ an kan a tɛ nkpa tɔ, an tɛ sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ nɩn. Nɩɩ an kan wu gbaa mʋ, an san an gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ lɛɛ. Ɩmʋ sʋ an tɛ nkpa tɔ nɩn oo, an wu nɩn oo, an gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ lɛɛ.
45014009	Krisito wu nɩɩ o bwii kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ, lɩɩ falɛ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ nkpa tɔ yɛ alewupu.
45014010	Ɩmʋ sʋ mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fii bun fʋ bɩrɩsa kʋpwɛ, abɛɛ nɩɩ fɩɩ kɩɩ fʋ bɩrɩsa kɩyan? Lɩɩ fɛɛ anɛ kpini an biti an naa yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ, kɛ o gyii anɛ asɩn.
45014011	Kpalɩ fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ Isaya Asɩnkyan yɩlasa ɔwʋlɛ mʋ tɔ yɛ, “N maa dan n bʋ tɔ falɛ, ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ii biti o muŋa mɛ, kɛ nyɩmɩsa kʋmaa nɩmʋ o bugi kɔnɔ tɔwɛ yɛ mɛ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ.”
45014012	Ɩmʋ sʋ anɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ii biti ɔ ba lɛɛ kɔnɔ lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ sa Ɩbwaarɛ.
45014013	Kanɩn sʋ, fan yɛgɛ kɛ a yɛgɛ abaa kʋpwɛ kubun. Amaa fan man waa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ fanɛ bɩrɩsa ana ba siti abɛɛ ba waa alibi.
45014014	Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu maa lɛɛ kaapʋ mɛ, nɩɩ n kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋ kɩ man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ kʋtɔ kisisa kɩmʋ kɩbaa sʋ. Amaa nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan kɩɩ fɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋ kɩ gyɛ ikisii bɩrɛ, kɩ gyɛ ikisii sa mʋ.
45014015	Fɛɛ nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ gyɛ fu agyitɔ gyisa sʋ, nɩɩ fʋ bɩrɩsa kɔkɔlɔ ki nyita mʋ mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ fʋ awaasa ɩ mɛɛ kaapʋ kebiti. Man taa fu agyitɔ gyisa nyita fʋ bɩrɩsa mʋ nɩɩ Krisito wu sa mʋ mʋ
45014016	Man yɛgɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fii nyi fɛɛ kɩ gyɛ kʋtɔ danbɩrasa mʋ, ki biliŋi kʋtɔ libi asa asɛ.
45014017	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii tɔ kakyɩna mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɩ man gyɛ kegyi yɛ kunuu asɩn nɩn, amaa ɩ gyɛ awaasa danbɩrasa yɛ kayɩɩ yuuli yɛ kensi‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ kɩɩ sa mʋ.
45014018	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee sun Krisito falɛ ɔkpa sʋ mʋ, ɩɩ bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ ansi, nɩɩ asa gbaa bee wu yɛ ɩ bʋrɔn.
45014019	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan yɛgɛ a kpan anɛ n‐yɩɩ waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ bɩya kayɩɩ yuuli, kɛ a kyɛ abaa tɔ kɛ a dan anɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ.
45014020	Fan man kpalɩ agyitɔ sʋ nyita Ɩbwaarɛ kusun. Agyitɔ kpini ɩ bʋrɔn, amaa ɩ man dɛ ɔkpa fɛɛ fu gyii agyitɔ kʋ kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ fʋ bɩrɩsa ɔ waa alibi.
45014021	Ɩ bʋrɔn fɛɛ fu man gyii kunun kɛ fu man nuu nta abɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ yɛgɛ fʋ bɩrɩsa ɔ tɩyɛ.
45014022	Ɩmʋ sʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ kɔɔlɛ gyii lɩɩ atɔ nɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, yɛgɛ ɩ baa ɩ bʋ faa Ɩbwaarɛ nsana. Kumu ɔkɔn wuya ɩ gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man bun mʋ n‐yɩɩ kʋpwɛ lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɩɩ fɛɛ kɩ bʋrɔn sa mʋ mʋ sʋ.
45014023	Amaa ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ i du sika‐sika lɩɩ kʋtɔ kigyii sʋ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ee gyii kɩmʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ wʋla bun mu kʋpwɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ kigyii mʋ man lɩɩ mʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ. Nɩɩ awaasa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man lɩɩ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ mʋ gyɛ alibi nɩn.
45015001	Anɛ mʋ nɩɩ an yɩlɛ Yesu Krisito kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ yɛ ɔlʋn mʋ, ɩ dagaa fɛɛ an maa kyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ man bʋlʋn mʋ tɔ, kɛ a man taa waa anɛ nkɔlɔ biti.
45015002	Fan yɛgɛ anɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ waa kɩdanbɩrasa kyɛ mʋ bɩrɩsa tɔ, kɛ ɔ nyɛ ɔlʋn yɩlɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ.
45015003	Kpalɩ fɛɛ Krisito gbaa man waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bɔla mʋ nkʋn ansi, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɔwɛ lɩɩ Asɩnkya yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Asebi kpini mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ saalɛ fʋ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, mɛ nɩɩ bɛɛ saalɛ.”
45015004	Lɩɩ fɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ yɩla Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ dɩdaa mʋ, ba kyʋrɔɔ nɩn yɛ ɩ ba kaapʋ anɛ asɩn. Ɩnɩmʋ ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ ɩ waa anɛ aniya tɔ, kɛ ɩ sa anɛ kenyiita, yɛgɛ an sʋ tamaa.
45015005	N kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ sa asa kenyiita nɩɩ ɛɛ waa bamʋ aniya tɔ mʋ, fɛɛ fan maa buu Yesu Krisito falɛ mʋ, ɔ sa fanɛ kɔnɔ kʋlʋn.
45015006	Saamʋ lɩɩ fanɛ kɔkɔlɔ kʋlʋn yɛ kɔnɔ kʋlʋn sʋ mʋ, fen biti fan bʋga yɩn anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito Mʋ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ.
45015007	Fan taa kɔkɔlɔ fuuli kɔɔlɛ abaa fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Krisito kɔɔlɛ fanɛ mʋ, kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ ɩ bɩya ayɩn‐bi sa Ɩbwaarɛ.
45015008	N tɔwɛ fanɛ fɛɛ Krisito ɩ ba biliŋi Gyiwu abi kɩyaafɔlɛ, kɛ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ gyɛ kesintin wuya, nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ sa adɩdaapʋ mʋ ɩ ba tɔ.
45015009	Nɩɩ ɩ bɩla yɛgɛ nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ, ba taa bʋnyaa sa Ɩbwaarɛ lɩɩ mʋ kʋwɛɛ kuwu sʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɩmʋ sʋ n biti n yɩn fʋ, bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ tɔ, n biti n bɩɩ ɩlʋn yɩn fʋ kɩtɩɩ.”
45015010	Nɩɩ ɩ bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ fanaa Ɩbwaarɛ asa ansi i gyii.”
45015011	Nɩɩ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan man gyii Gyiwu abi mʋ kpini fan yɩn Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, kɛ ndɛndɛmandɛ kpini fan bɩɩ ayɩn‐bi ɩlʋn sa mʋ.”
45015012	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Isaya bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ, “Gyeese kanan tɔ mʋ ɔkʋ ii biti ɔ kʋsʋ be gyii kuwura bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ kpini sʋ. Mʋ tɔ nɩɩ ba sʋ tamaa.”
45015013	N kʋlɛ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ sa asa tamaa mʋ, fɛɛ fan maa kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii falɛ mʋ, ɔ sa fanɛ kensi‐gyii yɛ keyuula. Kɛ mʋ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ ɔlʋn mʋ ɩ yɛgɛ fanɛ tamaa ɔ nyɛ akyɔ.
45015014	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ n kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ kɩdanbɩrasa kɩ bʋ fanɛ tɔ, nɩɩ fan sʋ kinyi gaa nɩɩ fan taalɛ kaapʋ abaa.
45015015	Lɩɩ mɛ ɔwʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ n kyʋrɔɔ fanɛ falɛ sʋ mʋ, n bugi mɛ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ n nyiŋi fanɛ asɩn akʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa sa mɛ mʋ sʋ.
45015016	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mɛ waa Yesu Krisito osunpu sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ. Nɩɩ n sun fɛɛ mu‐seepu, kɛ n tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ, nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ lɔŋɔ bamʋ yɩla mʋ, ba ba waa fɛɛ saraga mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ ansi.
45015017	Ɩmʋ sʋ n taalɛ kaapʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ Yesu Krisito sʋ lɩɩ kusun mʋ nɩɩ n sun sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ sʋ.
45015018	N waa mɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ n mɛɛ yɛ n tɔwɛ kʋtɔ kʋ, amɔɔ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Krisito bɔla mɛ atɔwɛsa yɛ mɛ awaasa sʋ bɩya bamʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ ba be buu Ɩbwaarɛ.
45015019	Lɩɩ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa mɛ ɩ gyɛ sɩnkaala yɛ adangana lɩɩ mʋ Kayaayu mʋ ɔlʋn tɔ sʋ, kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ Krisito asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa lɩɩ Gyerusalem, kyaabɔɔ ndɛ‐bii sʋ naa fʋʋ Ilirikum.
45015020	Mi kebiti ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ n tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ ntɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩta nu Krisito sʋ, saamʋ kɛ n man kyaga ɔkʋ kusun piilisa sʋ.
45015021	Amaa fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Asa mʋ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩta tɔwɛ bamʋ mʋ asɩn mʋ, bee biti ba wu mʋ. Kɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩta nu mʋ, bee biti ba nu kasɛ.”
45015022	Ɩnɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n kpan mɛ n‐yɩɩ saŋa kʋmaa fɛɛ n ba bɔɔ fanɛ sʋ, amaa i tii mɛ ɔkpa fanɛ asɛ kɩba.
45015023	Amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ opula kʋ man bɩla ɔ bʋ kɩbaafʋn kɩnɩmʋ katɩn kʋ mʋ nɩɩ n maa waa kusun, nɩɩ n bɩla n kpan mɛ n‐yɩɩ nsu damantɛ fɛɛ n ba bɔɔ fanɛ sʋ
45015024	Ɩmʋ sʋ n waa nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ n kan kpee Sipen mʋ, n biti n bɔla fanɛ asɛ. N sʋ tamaa fɛɛ n ba bɔɔ fanɛ sʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n biti n bɔla kyʋn mʋ, kɛ maa fanɛ an bʋga gyii ansi, kɛ fan kyɛ mɛ tɔ kɛ n naa fʋʋ tʋtɔ.
45015025	Amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ n bʋ ɔkpa sʋ n kpee Gyerusalem n naa kyɛ Krisito abuupu tɔ.
45015026	Masedoniya yɛ Akyɩya akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu bɩrɛ ba taa kensi‐gyii waa tʋʋtʋʋ sa Krisito abuupu mʋ tɔ atiripu mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyerusalem mʋ.
45015027	Masedoniya yɛ Akyɩya akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu bamʋ ansi i gyii fɛɛ ba maa waa kanɩn sa Gyiwu abi akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ. Nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ba maa waa kanɩn kɛ ba taa ka bamʋ kʋkɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ, ba nyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ Kayaayu tɔ nkyɛtɔ atɔ, ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ba baraga bamʋ kakyɩna tɔ atɔ sa Gyiwu abi mʋ.
45015028	Nɩɩ n kan taa tʋʋtʋʋ nɩmʋ waa bamʋ abaa tɔ lʋwɛ mʋ, n biti n bɔla fanɛ asɛ kpee Sipen kadɛ tɔ.
45015029	N nyi fɛɛ mɛ kɩba mʋ nɩɩ n ba fanɛ asɛ mʋ, n sʋ Krisito kabwaala lala mʋ n bɩya fanɛ.
45015030	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, n sʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito yɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ kɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu tɔ fɛɛ fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɔlʋn kyɛ mɛ tɔ.
45015031	Fan kʋlɛ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ lɛɛ mɛ lɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man kɔɔlɛ gyii Gyudeya ifuli sʋ mʋ abaa tɔ. Kɛ fan bɩla kʋlɛ fɛɛ Krisito abuupu mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Gyerusalem mʋ ba kɔɔlɛ nkyɛtɔ mʋ abaa anyɔ.
45015032	Lɩɩ kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kan kyula mʋ n biti n taa kensi‐gyii lala ba fanɛ asɛ, kɛ ɩ waa maa fanɛ aniya tɔ.
45015033	Ɩbwaarɛ keyuula wuya ɔ baa ɔ bʋ fanɛ kpini asɛ. Amen!
45016001	N biti n lɛɛ anɛ pɩɩkyɩɩ Fobe mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ ɛɛ bɩya fanɛ falɛ n kaapʋ fanɛ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ Krisito abuupu mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Kenkireya, nɩɩ ɛɛ kyɛ bamʋ tɔ mʋ.
45016002	N kʋlɛ fanɛ, fan kɔɔlɛ mʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ Krisito abuupu ba kɩtaa abaa mʋ, kɛ fan sa mʋ nkyɛtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ i tiri mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ kyɛ asa gaalaagaa tɔ nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n tii sʋ.
45016003	Fan fwaala Prisila maa Akwila, mʋ nɩɩ n maa bamʋ an waa Yesu Krisito kusun mʋ.
45016004	Nɩɩ ba taga apʋ lɩɩ mɛ sʋ. Ɩ man gyɛ mɛ nkʋn ɩ fwaala bamʋ, amaa yɛ Krisito abi kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ kpini bɛɛ fwaala bamʋ nsa yɛ kusun.
45016005	Fan fwaala Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ gyaŋɛ Prisila ana kɩkpaara sʋ mʋ. Fan fwaala mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ danbɩrasa Epanetu. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ da kɩkɔɔlɛ Yesu Krisito gyii Asiya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ kpini.
45016006	Fan fwaala Mɛɛrɩ mʋ nɩɩ o sun kusun gaa sa fanɛ mʋ.
45016007	Fan fwaala Androniko maa Gyuniya, mɛ kʋʋpʋ ana mʋ nɩɩ ba tii maa bamʋ obu mʋ. Nɩɩ asa gaalaagaa be nyi bamʋ yɛ ɔdan Krisito asunpu mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ba gyankpaa mɛ kɔɔlɛ Yesu Krisito gyii.
45016008	Fan fwaala Ampiliyatu mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ kebiti sa mʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ tɔ.
45016009	Fan fwaala Ubano, anɛ bɩrɩsa kusun ɔwaapʋ Krisito tɔ, yɛ mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ danbɩrasa Sitakusi.
45016010	Fan fwaala Apelesi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kaapʋ kesintin yɛ ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ sa Krisito. Fan fwaala bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Arisitobulu kɩkpaara sʋ kpini.
45016011	Fan fwaala mɛ kʋʋpʋ Herodiyon. Fan fwaala Nasiso kɩkpaara sʋ abi kpini mʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ lɛɛ mʋ.
45016012	Fan fwaala akyɩɩ nɩmʋ, Trifina maa Trifosa mʋ nɩɩ ba kpan bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sun Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kusun mʋ. Fan fwaala mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ danbɩrasa Pesi, nɩɩ ngbaa mʋ ɔ gyɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kpan mʋ n‐yɩɩ waa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kusun mʋ.
45016013	Fan fwaala Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ Rufusi, yɛ mu‐nyi, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa mɛ waa mu‐bii kʋʋgɛsa.
45016014	Fan fwaala Asinkrito, yɛ Felegon yɛ Hemesi yɛ Patrobasi yɛ Hemesi yɛ Krisito abuupu mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ bamʋ asɛ mʋ.
45016015	Fan fwaala Filologo yɛ Gyuliya yɛ Neresu maa mʋ pɩɩkyɩɩ yɛ Olipasi yɛ Krisito abuupu mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ bamʋ asɛ mʋ kpini.
45016016	Fan taa kinyi‐bii afwaala fwaala abaa. Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ kpini bɛɛ fwaala fanɛ.
45016017	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, n kʋlɛ fanɛ nɩn, kɛ fan kɩɩ danbɩrasa lɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba bɩya nbarɩgɛ fanɛ tɔ, nɩɩ bɛɛ kpakyarɛ kɩbɩɩla mʋ nɩɩ ba kaapʋ fanɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ asa bee tutu bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ. Fan lɛɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ bamʋ tɔ.
45016018	Kpalɩ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa kanɩn mʋ, be mee sun anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito, amaa bamʋ kɩpɩrɛ lɛɛ nɩɩ bee biti. Lɩɩ bamʋ ntɔwɛ danbɩrasa yɛ kɩgyaa‐bi sʋ mʋ, ba sʋ bɛɛ pɩna akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩ dan kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ.
45016019	Ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ nu kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan taa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sa Krisito mʋ. Kanɩn sʋ mi ansi i gyii fanɛ sʋ gaa. Amaa n biti fɛɛ fan baa fan gyɛ anyaasɩnpʋ lɩɩ kɩdanbɩrasa kɩwaa sʋ, kɛ fan lɛɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ alibi kɩwaa tɔ.
45016020	Ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ kyɛɛrɛɛ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ keyuula wuya mʋ, ii biti ɔ yɛgɛ kɛ fan gyii Sɩtaanɛ sʋ. Anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu kabwaala mʋ kɩ baa kɩ bʋ fanɛ sʋ.
45016021	Mɛ bɩrɩsa osunsunpu Timoti ɩ fwaala fanɛ. Kanɩn maa nɩɩ mɛ kʋʋpʋ ana Lukiyo yɛ Gyason yɛ Sosipata gbaa bɛɛ fwaala fanɛ.
45016022	Mɛ Tetiyo mʋ nɩɩ n kyʋrɔɔ Pɔɔlɩ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ, n fwaala fanɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ.
45016023	Gayusi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ mɛ kɩkpaara wuya, nɩɩ Krisito abi gbaa bɛɛ gyaŋɛ mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ mʋ, ɩ fwaala fanɛ. Erasitu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ kadɛ mʋ tɔ afulee ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ yɛ anɛ‐supu Kwatu bɛɛ fwaala fanɛ.
45016024	(Anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kabwaala mʋ kɩ baa kɩ bʋ fanɛ asɛ. Amen.)
45016025	Fan yɛgɛ a taa bʋnyaa sa Ɩbwaarɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ ɩ taalɛ yɛgɛ fan nyɛ ɔlʋn yɩlɛ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ Asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ lɩɩ Yesu Krisito sʋ mʋ. Kanɩn asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ kesintin asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ baala lɩɩ koo dɩdaa mʋ.
45016026	Nɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ ɩ bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ sʋ lɛɛ kaapʋ. Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ kakpaa mʋ sa kɔnɔ, yɛ ba tɔwɛ kanɩn kesintin asɩn baalasa sa ndɛndɛmandɛ kpini, kɛ ba kɔɔlɛ Yesu Krisito gyii kɛ ba nu mʋ asɛ.
45016027	Lɩɩ Yesu Krisito sʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ kanyaasɩn wuya mʋ nkʋn nɩɩ bʋnyaa gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ kakpaa. Amen!
46001001	Ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ lɩɩ mɛ, Pɔɔlɩ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla mu kebiti sʋ tɩɩ mɛ, fɛɛ n ba waa Yesu Krisito osunpu, yɛ anɛ bɩrɩsa Sositini asɛ.
46001002	An kyʋrɔɔ kɩmʋ an sa fanɛ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ fan bʋ Korinto kadɛ tɔ, fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɩɩ ba waa mʋ lɛɛ, nɩɩ fan ba biliŋi Ɩbwaarɛ asa, taa bʋga yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ katɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ bee sun anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ anaa bamʋ kpini Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ.
46001003	Anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito ba bwaala fanɛ kɛ ba sa fanɛ kayɩɩ yuuli.
46001004	Saŋa kʋmaa nɩmʋ n fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ n sa fanɛ lɩɩ kabwaala mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɔla Yesu Krisito sʋ taa sa fanɛ mʋ.
46001005	Kpalɩ fɛɛ fan maa bʋ Yesu Krisito tɔ sʋ mʋ, fan dan kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ lɩɩ fanɛ katɔwɛ yɛ fanɛ kinyi tɔ.
46001006	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Yesu Krisito asɩn mʋ nɩɩ an lɛɛ tɔwɛ fanɛ mʋ ɩ kyɩna fanɛ tɔ danbɩrasa.
46001007	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan man pan Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu kakɛɛ mʋ kʋkʋ, fɛɛ fan maa tɛ fan gyoo saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ ba lɛɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kaapʋ mʋ.
46001008	Mʋ ii biti ɔ waa fanɛ ɔlʋn tɔ kanɩn naa fʋʋ ɔkaa, kɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ ɩ man nyɛ alibi akʋ, kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito ii biti o bwii ba mʋ.
46001009	Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ fanɛ yɛ fan naa mu‐bii Yesu Krisito mʋ fan ba waa kɩkyɛmɩnɛ ɔkɔn mʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ lɩɩ ɩmʋ kamaa.
46001010	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, n sʋ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kɩtɩɩ, n kʋlɛ fanɛ fɛɛ, fanɛ kpini fan tɔwɛ kyula abaa, kɛ nbarɩgɛ tɔ kʋ ɩ man ba fanɛ tɔ. Kɛ fan waa kɔnɔ kʋlʋn fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ yɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ.
46001011	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, Kilowe kɩkpaara sʋ abi akʋ ba ba tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, nluu ɩ bʋ fanɛ nsana.
46001012	Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ ɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “N buu Pɔɔlɩ.” Nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɔɔ yɛ, “Mɛɛ mɛ n buu Apolosi”, nɩɩ ɔnɩmʋ mɔɔ yɛ, “Mɛɛ mɛ n buu Pita.” Nɩɩ ɔkʋ gbaa yɛ, “Mɛɛ mɛ n buu Krisito nɩn.”
46001013	Ba barɩgɛ Krisito tɔ waa kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ nɩn abɛɛ? Pɔɔlɩ nɩɩ ba da oyu laasa sʋ sa fanɛ abɛɛ? Abɛɛ Pɔɔlɩ kɩtɩɩ tɔ nɩɩ ba gyee fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee?
46001014	N sʋ afwaala n sa Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ n maa man gyee fanɛ ɔkʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee, amɔɔ Krisipu maa Gayusi nkʋn nɩɩ n gyee.
46001015	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ tɔwɛ yɛ mɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ nɩɩ ba gyee mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee.
46001016	N bɩla n nyiŋi fɛɛ n maa gyee Sitefen maa mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ abi Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee. Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, n mɛɛ bɩla nyiŋi fɛɛ n gyee ɔkʋ.
46001017	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Krisito man sun mɛ yɛ n ba gyee asa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee. Amaa o sun mɛ nɩn yɛ n ba tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa asa, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ nyɩmɩsa kanyaasɩn nɩɩ n sʋ n tɔwɛ, kɛ ɩ naa ba fɛɛ Krisito kelewu mʋ nɩɩ o wu oyu laasa sʋ asɩn mʋ ɩ pan ɩmʋ ɔlʋn.
46001018	Krisito oyu laasa mʋ sʋ kelewu asɩn mʋ, ɩ gyɛ amelensi‐sɩn sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kemuuri ɔkpa sʋ mʋ. Amaa anɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩɩ mɔlɩgɛ mʋ, asɩn maŋa ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔlʋn mʋ.
46001019	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “N biti n nyita anyaasɩnpʋ kanyaasɩn, kɛ n yɛgɛ anyipu kinyi ɩ waa kɩyan.”
46001020	Nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kanan bɩrɛ mʋ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ ɔnyaasɩnpʋ bʋ fɩnɛ? Nɩɩ ɔwʋlɛ‐nyipu bʋ fɩnɛ? Abɛɛ ɔkaapʋpʋ bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ bʋ fɩnɛ? Ɩbwaarɛ man kaapʋ fɛɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ kanyaasɩn gyɛ amelensi‐sɩn mʋ asɛ nɩn abɛɛ?
46001021	Lɩɩ mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kanyaasɩn mʋ tɔ mʋ, o ŋmina yɩla fɛɛ, dulinyaa asa ba mɛɛ taalɛ bɔla bamʋ kanyaasɩn sʋ bɩɩ mʋ. Amaa ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩpɩrɛ sʋ fɛɛ, ɔ bɔla asɩn mʋ nɩɩ asa bɛɛ kɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ gyɛ amelensi‐sɩn mʋ nɩɩ an tɔwɛ falɛ mʋ sʋ mɔlɩgɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kɔɔlɛ bee gyii mʋ.
46001022	Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ amelensi‐sɩn sa bamʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Gyiwu abi bɛɛ kɩɩ bee biti asɩn kyinkyinsa, nɩɩ Giriki abi mɔɔ bɛɛ kɩɩ bee biti kanyaasɩn.
46001023	Amaa anɛɛnɛ bɩrɛ an tɔwɛ Yesu Krisito kelewu oyu laasa mʋ sʋ asɩn, nɩɩ ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ii tii Gyiwu abi ɔkpa, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ bee gyii, nɩɩ ɩ bɩla ɩ gyɛ amelensi‐sɩn sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ.
46001024	Amaa bamʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɩɩ ba kamɔlɩgɛ mʋ tɔ bɩrɛ, bɛ gyɛ Gyiwu abi nɩn oo, ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi nɩn oo, asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ tɔ ɩ gyɛ yɛ Krisito ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔlʋn yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kanyaasɩn.
46001025	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ amelensi‐sɩn mʋ ɩ kyɔ nyɩmɩsa kanyaasɩn, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kapɔɔsɛ ɩ sʋ ɔlʋn ɩ kyɔ nyɩmɩsa ɔlʋn.
46001026	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, fan nyiŋi kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan daa fan du pɔyɩ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɩɩ fanɛ ba kamɔlɩgɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ. Kanan saŋa maŋa nyɩmɩsa ansi sʋ mʋ, fanɛ tɔ gbɛrɛɛ kʋ ɩ gyɛ anyaasɩnpʋ, nɩɩ gbɛrɛɛ kʋ ɩ gyɛ alʋnpʋ, nɩɩ gbɛrɛɛ kʋ ɩ lɩɩ kuwura‐gyii kebunɔ.
46001027	Amaa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ dulinyaa asa bɛɛ kɩɩ yɛ ɩ gyɛ amelensi‐sɩn mʋ, ɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ taa gyila dulinyaa tɔ anyaasɩnpʋ ipeeli. Nɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man bʋlʋn dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɩla taa gyila ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋlʋn mʋ ipeeli.
46001028	Nɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ dulinyaa asa bɛɛ kɩɩ kɩyan, nɩɩ ba man taa tɩɩ sɛhn, nɩɩ bɛɛ kɩɩ yɛ ɩ man sʋ tɔnɔ mʋ, ɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa ŋaabaa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ dulinyaa asa bɛɛ kɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ gyɛ atɔ kparɛ mʋ,
46001029	kɛ nyɩmɩsa kʋ ɔ man nyɛ kaapʋ mʋ n‐yɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ.
46001030	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ anaa Yesu Krisito an waa kʋkʋlʋn, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ waa Krisito nɩɩ ɔ baa ɔ gyɛ anɛ kanyaasɩn wuya. Nɩɩ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wu fɛɛ anɛ ɩkpa i kyiigi, nɩɩ anɛ ɩ gyɛ mʋ asa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ, nɩɩ a nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ.
46001031	Ɩmʋ sʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ kaapʋ mʋ n‐yɩɩ mʋ, ɔ kaapʋ mʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ waa mʋ sʋ.”
46002001	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, n maa ba fanɛ asɛ ba lɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kesintin asɩn mʋ tɔwɛ fanɛ mʋ, n man taa kɔnɔ tɔ ɔkɔn abɛɛ kanyaasɩn kɩbansa nɩn ba tɔwɛ fanɛ.
46002002	Lɩɩ fɛɛ n waa mɛ nfɛɛrɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ fanɛ asɛ mʋ fɛɛ, n mee biti n bɩla bɩɩ asɩn akʋ tɔwɛ tii Yesu Krisito, yɛ mʋ kelewu mʋ nɩɩ o wu oyu laasa sʋ mʋ nkʋn.
46002003	N maa ba fanɛ asɛ mʋ, n taa kɩpɔɔsɛ yɛ kufuu yɛ kɩkyɩkya gaa nɩn ba.
46002004	Mɛ asɩn tɔwɛsa yɛ mɛ abwaarɛsɩn kɩtɔwɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, n man taa nyɩmɩsa kanyaasɩn pʋpɔlɛ fanɛ, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ ɩ lɛɛ mʋ ɔlʋn mʋ kaapʋ fanɛ.
46002005	Saamʋ, fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ mɛɛ yɛ kɩ baa kɩ gyan nyɩmɩsa kanyaasɩn sʋ, amaa kɩ baa kɩ gyan Ɩbwaarɛ ɔlʋn sʋ.
46002006	Ɩnɩmʋ kpini gbaa mʋ, an tɔwɛ kanyaasɩn asɩn an sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba tɛɛ dan kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ mʋ, man gyɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ kanyaasɩn, abɛɛ kɩmʋ alʋnpʋ kanyaasɩn mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ ɔlʋn mʋ ii biti ɩ ba fʋʋ ɔkaa mʋ.
46002007	Amaa kanyaasɩn asɩn mʋ nɩɩ an tɔwɛ fanɛ falɛ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kanyaasɩn baalasa, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla ŋmina yɩla yɛ ee biti ɔ taa kanyaasɩn maŋa bʋnyaa anɛ, pɔyɩ nɩɩ o piili dulinyaa mʋ.
46002008	Nɩɩ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ alʋnpʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ man taalɛ bɩɩ kanɩn kanyaasɩn maŋa, nɩɩ ba daa bɩɩ nɩn, naafɔɔ ba man dɩn da Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ bʋnyaa wuya mʋ oyu laasa sʋ.
46002009	Amaa i du nɩn fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ mʋ yɛ, “Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ ansi ɩ man pɩɩ wu, nɩɩ asʋ ɩ man pɩɩ nu, nɩɩ ɔkʋ man pɩɩ fɛ ɩmʋ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɔŋɔ yɩla sa bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti mʋ mʋ.”
46002010	Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla mʋ Kayaayu sʋ lɛɛ mʋ kanyaasɩn baalasa mʋ kaapʋ anɛ. Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ ɩɩ mɛɛgɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ ɛɛ kɩɩ, halɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ mʋ ɔtɔ tɔ asɩn nɩɩ ɩ baala mʋ gbaa.
46002011	Ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ bɩɩ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ ɩɩ fɛ, amɔɔ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ. Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ bɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nfɛɛrɛ, amɔɔ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ Kayaayu mʋ nkʋn.
46002012	Man gyɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ kayaayu nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa sa anɛ, amaa Kayaayu mʋ nɩɩ kɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ, nɩɩ an nyɛ, kɛ a taalɛ nu atɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa kɛɛ anɛ mʋ kasɛ.
46002013	Ɩmʋ sʋ man gyɛ nyɩmɩsa kanyaasɩn asɩn kaapʋsa nɩɩ an sʋ an tɔwɛ fanɛ. Amaa ɩ gyɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Kayaayu mʋ kaapʋ anɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an lɛɛ Kayaayu tɔ asɩn mʋ kasɛ an kaapʋ bamʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ Kayaayu mʋ.
46002014	Amaa ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ, mɛɛ yɛ ɔ taalɛ kɔɔlɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ asɛ mʋ kyula. Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ amelensi‐sɩn sa ɔsa mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ taalɛ nu ɩmʋ kasɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ nkʋn ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ asa bee nu ɩmʋ kasɛ.
46002015	Nɩɩ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ bɩrɛ, ɛɛ taalɛ mɛɛgɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa tɔ wu ɩmʋ tɔ, amaa mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ lɛɛ bɩrɛ, ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ mɛɛgɛ ɩmʋ tɔ wu sɛhn.
46002016	I du nɩn fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ mʋ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ ɩ taalɛ bɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nfɛɛrɛ? Nɩɩ anɩmʋ ɩ taalɛ tɔwɛ waa mʋ?” Amaa anɛɛnɛ bɩrɛ an fɛ nfɛɛrɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Krisito ɩɩ fɛ mʋ.
46003001	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, n man taalɛ tɔwɛ fanɛ asɛ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ. Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ gyan dulinyaa atɔ sʋ, abɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩta dan Krisito kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ.
46003002	Kanɩn sʋ man gyɛ agyitɔ budusa nɩɩ n taa sa fanɛ, amaa kɩnyapʋ‐kyu nɩɩ n taa sa fanɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ, fan man pɩɩta dan fʋʋ agyitɔ maŋa kigyii, nɩɩ halɩɩ ba lɩɩ ndaga gbaa mʋ fan man pɩɩta fʋʋ ɩmʋ kigyii.
46003003	Lɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ san ɩ gyan dulinyaa atɔ sʋ. Kayɩɩ‐basa kɩ maa bʋ fanɛ tɔ, nɩɩ fɛn kɔ yɛ abaa mʋ, ɩɩ mɛɛ kaapʋ nɩn fɛɛ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ san ɩ gyan dulinyaa atɔ sʋ abɛɛ? Ɩnɩmʋ ɩɩ kaapʋ nɩn fɛɛ fɛn san fɛn waa fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ dulinyaa asa bɛɛ waa mʋ.
46003004	Nɩɩ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ ɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “N buu Pɔɔlɩ.” Nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɔɔ ɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “N buu Apolosi nɩn.” Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ mɛɛ kaapʋ nɩn fɛɛ fɛn san fen du fɛɛ dulinyaa asa nɩn abɛɛ?
46003005	Ɩnɩmʋ kpini mʋ, anɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Apolosi? Nɩɩ mɛ, Pɔɔlɩ ɩ gyɛ anɩmʋ? An gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ayaafɔlɛ nɩn, nɩɩ fan bɔla anɛ sʋ ba kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii. Anɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ waa mu kusun fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu taa sa mʋ yɛ ɔ waa mʋ.
46003006	Mɛ i duu, nɩɩ Apolosi mɔɔ ɩ wʋrɩgɛ sʋ nkyu, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ kɩ kɔyɩ dan.
46003007	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee duu, yɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ wʋrɩgɛ sʋ nkyu mʋ, bamʋ asɩn man tiri, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn i tiri, lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ atɔ duusa mʋ ɩɩ dan.
46003008	Ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ee duu yɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ wʋrɩgɛ sʋ nkyu mʋ kpini bɛɛ waa kusun kʋlʋn nɩn. Nɩɩ bamʋ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ii biti ɔ nyɛ mʋ kʋkɔka, lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa mu kusun mʋ sʋ.
46003009	Lɩɩ fɛɛ anɛ kpini an bʋga nɩn an waa Ɩbwaarɛ kusun. Nɩɩ fen du nɩn fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kʋdɔɔ, nɩɩ fɛn bɩla fen du fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ obu.
46003010	Lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa bwaala mɛ sʋ mʋ, n du nɩn fɛɛ ɔpɔyɩpʋ onyipu mʋ nɩɩ o yii obu kasɛ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ ɩɩ pɔyɩ ɛɛ gyaga kɩmʋ sʋ. Amaa ɔkʋmaa ɔ baa ɔ da sʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ pɔyɩ ɛɛ gyaga sʋ.
46003011	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋ mɛɛ bɩla taalɛ yii ɔpɔrɛ gyankpaasa, tii kɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla yii mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ kɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Yesu Krisito.
46003012	Akʋ bee biti ba taa suwa, abɛɛ gbiti abɛɛ abuu mʋ nɩɩ ɩ sʋ ɔgyalɩn abɛɛ iyu abɛɛ afitiri abɛɛ afatɛɛ pɔyɩ gyaga ɔpɔrɛ gyankpaasa mʋ sʋ.
46003013	Ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kusun mʋ nɩɩ o sun sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, ii biti ɩ lɩɩ ifuli. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Krisito kakɛ lala mʋ nɩɩ ee biti o bwii ba mʋ, ii biti ɩ lɛɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kusun kudubi kaapʋ. Fʋlɔn ii biti ɔ ba lɛɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kusun kaapʋ, kɛ ɩ kaala kusun mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ waa sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, ɔ dan kɩɩ.
46003014	Nɩɩ fʋlɔn mʋ man kan taalɛ nyita ɔkʋ kapɔyɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ pɔyɩ gyaga sʋ mʋ, mʋ ii biti ɔ nyɛ kʋkɔka.
46003015	Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fʋlɔn mʋ dɛɛ mu kusun mʋ bɩrɛ, o sun fɔyɩ nɩmʋ. Nɩɩ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ bɩrɛ ee biti ɔ nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ, amaa ii biti ɩ baa i du nɩn fɛɛ maa sɩlɛ lɩɩ fʋlɔn tɔ.
46003016	Abɛɛ fan man nyi yɛ fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ ɩ gyɛ Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ tɛ fanɛ tɔ abɛɛ?
46003017	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan nyita Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa ii biti o nyita mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ, kɩ gyɛ kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ nɩn, nɩɩ fanɛ ɩ gyɛ kanɩn Kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ maŋa.
46003018	Ɔkʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔkʋ ɔ man pɩna mʋ n‐yɩɩ. Nɩɩ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ kan ɛɛ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ɔ gyɛ ɔnyaasɩnpʋ dulinyaa asa ansi sʋ mʋ, ɩ dagaa maa waa mʋ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ omelensipu, kɛ ɔ nyɛ biliŋi ɔnyaasɩnpʋ gbaa‐gbaa.
46003019	Lɩɩ fɛɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ kanyaasɩn gyɛ amelensi‐sɩn Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ. I du nɩn fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Anyaasɩnpʋ mʋ, bamʋ kanyaasɩn awaasa mʋ tɔ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ ɛɛ kɩtaa bamʋ.”
46003020	Nɩɩ ba bɩla kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ ntɩn kʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ nyi fɛɛ anyaasɩnpʋ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ maa gyɛ kɩyan.”
46003021	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔkʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔkʋ, ɔ man taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ tʋʋ nyɩmɩsa sʋ kɛ ɔ kaapʋ mʋ n‐yɩɩ, lɩɩ fɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ gyɛ fanɛ lɛɛ nɩn.
46003022	Nɩɩ mɛ Pɔɔlɩ nɩn‐oo, abɛɛ Apolosi nɩn‐oo, abɛɛ Pita nɩn‐oo, abɛɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ nɩn‐oo, abɛɛ nkpa nɩn‐oo, abɛɛ lewu nɩn‐oo, abɛɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩn‐oo, abɛɛ ɔkɛ asɩn nɩn‐oo, ɩmʋ kpini ɩ gyɛ fanɛ lɛɛ nɩn
46003023	Nɩɩ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan gyɛ Krisito lɛɛ nɩn, nɩɩ Krisito mɔɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ.
46004001	Kanɩn sʋ ɩ dagaa fan maa kɩɩ anɛ fɛɛ an gyɛ Krisito ayaafɔlɛ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa mʋ kesintin asɩn baalasa mʋ waa anɛ abaa tɔ yɛ a lɛɛ ɩmʋ kaapʋ.
46004002	Nɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ dagaa sa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ba taa asɩn waa mʋ abaa mʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, o buu mʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ mʋ asɩn mʋ sʋ.
46004003	Amaa mɛɛmɛ asɛ bɩrɛ, nɩɩ fanɛ abɛɛ asɩn ogyipu kʋ gyii mɛ asɩn mʋ, ɩ man tiri mɛ, mɛ gbaa‐gbaa n mee gyii mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn.
46004004	Mɛ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ mʋ, n man wu asɩn pwɩɩsa kʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ, amaa ɩ mɛɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ n gyii asʋ. Amɔɔ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ nkʋn ɩ gyɛ mɛ asɩn ogyipu.
46004005	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan man kan gyii ɔkʋ asɩn, bun mʋ kʋpwɛ, pɔyɩ kɛ kakɛ mʋ ɔ fʋʋ. Fan gyoo Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ ɔ ba pɔyɩ. Ee biti ɔ ba lɛɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ baala kitentenbiri tɔ mʋ ba fɩtɩla tɔ, kɛ ɔ lɛɛ asa nkɔlɔ tɔ asɩn baalasa ifuli. Kanɩn saŋa maŋa nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa ii biti ɔ nyɛ kɩyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa mʋ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ.
46004006	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ nɩɩ n taa n maa Apolosi waa sɩnkaala sa fanɛ, kɛ fan bɩɩla asɩn tɔwɛsa mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Fan man waa asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ yɩla mʋ kyʋn sʋ.” Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, fan man kaapʋ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ naa yɩlɛ ɔkʋ kamaa kɛ fan kina ɔkʋ.
46004007	Mɩnɛ nɩɩ fan sʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ fan kyɔ asansa? Mɩnɛ nɩɩ fan sʋ nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ sa fanɛ? Nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ sa fanɛ ɩmʋ mʋ, mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ fɛn kaapʋ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ, fɛɛ man gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ sa fanɛ?
46004008	Fan tɛɛ nyɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fen biti nɩn abɛɛ? Fan tɛɛ ba waa afulee wuya ana nɩn abɛɛ? Fan tɛɛ ba biliŋi awura yɛgɛ a man gyɛ nɩn abɛɛ? Nɩɩ fan daa fan gyɛ awura kesintin tɔ mʋ, naafɔɔ ɩ bʋrɔn gaa kɛ anaa fanɛ a ba bʋga gyii kuwura.
46004009	Mɛ asɛ mʋ, i du nɩn fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ maa taa anɛ mʋ nɩɩ an gyɛ Yesu asunpu mʋ, waa asii‐amaapʋ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bun bamʋ kʋpwɛ, nɩɩ bee biti ba naa mɔɔ bamʋ asa nsana mʋ. Nɩɩ i du fɛɛ an biliŋi sɩnkɩɩ sa kasɛ sʋ asa yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ yɛ dulinyaa kpini.
46004010	Krisito sʋ an gyɛ amelensipu, amaa fanɛɛ fanɛ fan gyɛ anyaasɩnpʋ lɩɩ Krisito sʋ. Anɛɛnɛ bɩrɛ a man bʋlʋn, amaa fanɛɛ fanɛ bɩrɛ fan bʋlʋn. Asa bɛɛ sa fanɛ bɛɛrɛɛ, nɩɩ anɛɛnɛ bɩrɛ ba man taa anɛ tɩɩ sɛhn.
46004011	Taa ba fʋʋ ndaga mʋ, an naa akʋn yɛ bʋlɩfɔ, nɩɩ an bun akyiibi, nɩɩ an nyɛ kɩdayɛ libi‐libi, nɩɩ an man sʋ anɛ gbaa‐gbaa kewu‐kyɩnasa.
46004012	Anɛ gbaa‐gbaa anɛ abaa nɩɩ an sʋ an sun kusun. Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan tɔwɛ anɛ nnɔ mʋ, an waa mʋ kusee. Nɩɩ ba kan nyanla anɛ mʋ, an nyɛ kenyiita an yɩlɛ tɔ.
46004013	Nɩɩ ba maa saalɛ anɛ mʋ, an nyɛ kenyiita an lɛɛ bamʋ kɔnɔ danbɩrasa. An biliŋi dulinyaa kpini akpaa nɩɩ asa bɛɛ kɩɩ anɛ fɛɛ kɩgyaakpa ba lɩɩ ndaga.
46004014	N man kyʋrɔɔ ɩnɩmʋ n sa fanɛ n gyila fanɛ ipeeli. Amaa fan maa gyɛ mɛ nbii bitisa sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ n da fanɛ amu tɔ.
46004015	Halɩɩ nɩɩ fan kan fan sʋ asa fɛɛ ngbɩn kudu nɩɩ bɛɛ kaapʋ fanɛ Krisito asɩn mʋ gbaa mʋ, fanɛ‐sɛ ana ba man gyɛ adamantɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ, lɩɩ Yesu Krisito sʋ mʋ n ba biliŋi fanɛ‐sɛ, lɩɩ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ sa fanɛ mʋ sʋ.
46004016	Ɩmʋ sʋ n kʋlɛ fanɛ nɩn yɛ fan kasɛ mɛ tɔ.
46004017	Lɩɩ falɛ sʋ nɩɩ n sun Timoti fanɛ asɛ. Nɩɩ mʋ ɩ gyɛ mi‐bii mʋ nɩɩ n biti mʋ asɩn gaa, nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ kesintin ogyipu Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ mʋ ii biti o be nyiŋi fanɛ mɛ ɩkpa mʋ nɩɩ n taa n buu Krisito Yesu, nɩɩ ɩmaa ɩmʋ nɩɩ n kaapʋ Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ katɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ mʋ, ɩ waa kʋkʋlʋn.
46004018	Fanɛ akʋ fɛn kʋsaa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ fɛn fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ, akʋtɔ n mɛɛ bɩla yɛ n ba bɔɔ fanɛ sʋ.
46004019	Amaa nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kan kyula bɩrɛ, ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ kyɛɛrɛɛ n biti n ba fanɛ asɛ kɛ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ n ba wu ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ mʋ ba sʋ, man gyɛ bamʋ ntɔwɛ nkʋn.
46004020	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ man gyɛ asɩn kɩtɔwɛ, amaa kɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔlʋn mʋ tɔ atɔ waasa nɩn.
46004021	Kɩmɔmɔ nɩɩ fen biti n taa ba fanɛ asɛ? Fen biti fɛɛ n taa kʋkyʋkyʋʋ nɩn n ba, abɛɛ n taa kebiti yɛ keyuula ba fanɛ asɛ?
46005001	Kesintin tɔ, n nu asɩn lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ fɛɛ, kakyɩɩ abɛɛ kanyɩn biti agyaga‐sɩn kɩbansa ɩ maa bʋ fanɛ tɔ. Nɩɩ halɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ be mee sun Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa, ba mɛɛ waa kanɩn agyaga‐sɩn maŋa. Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ ɩɩ dɛ yɛ mʋ‐sɛ mʋ‐ka.
46005002	Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ bʋ fanɛ tɔ, nɩɩ fɛn kʋsaa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ? Ɩ dagaa fan maa bɔɔta tɔ, kɛ fan lɛɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ o sun falɛ kusun mʋ lɩɩ fanɛ kʋbʋ mʋ tɔ.
46005003	Halɩɩ n maa man bʋ fanɛ asɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ tɔ gbaa mʋ, n bʋ fanɛ asɛ kayaayu tɔ. Nɩɩ n tɛɛ wʋla bun ɔnyɩn maŋa kʋpwɛ fɛɛ n maa bʋ fanɛ asɛ tʋtɔ mʋ.
46005004	Nɩɩ fan kan gyaŋɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kɩtɩɩ tɔ, nɩɩ n bʋ fanɛ asɛ kayaayu tɔ, nɩɩ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito ɔlʋn mʋ bʋ fanɛ asɛ mʋ,
46005005	fan lɛɛ falɛ ɔnyɩn nɩmʋ lɩɩ fanɛ asɛ sa Sɩtaanɛ, o nyita mu alibi kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ mɔlɩgɛ mʋ kala kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu ii biti ɔ ba mʋ.
46005006	Fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kɩkaapʋ kɩ man bʋrɔn. Fan man nyi fɛɛ kɩfɛ tinsa pii ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ bodobodo ii tin?
46005007	Fan lɛɛ kɩfɛ tinsa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ alibi mʋ lɩɩ fanɛ tɔ, yɛgɛ fan man sʋ ineesi ɩkʋ. Kɛ fan baa fan du fɛɛ bodobodo pʋpwɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ kɩfɛ tinsa, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n nyi fan maa du mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Yesu Krisito mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ tɛɛ taa mʋ waa kɔlɔŋɔ sa anɛ.
46005008	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan yɛgɛ a gyii Kanyaŋɛ nbunɔ kesu kɔnɔ, kɛ a lɛɛ alibi yɛ kumu tɔ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ i du fɛɛ bodobodo mʋ nɩɩ kɩ sʋ kɩfɛ tinsa dɩdaa mʋ. Amaa fan yɛgɛ i gyii Kesu kɔnɔ mʋ, fɛɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ kɩdanbɩrasa yɛ kesintin mʋ fɛɛ bodobodo mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ kɩfɛ tinsa mʋ.
46005009	N wʋla kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ sa fanɛ yɛ, fan man taa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ bʋga asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kakyɩɩ abɛɛ kanyɩn biti kɩgyagaa mʋ tɔ.
46005010	N maa tɔwɛ kanɩn mʋ, man gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ be mee sun Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ bɛɛ waa kakyɩɩ abɛɛ kanyɩn biti kɩgyagaa, yɛ onsi‐payɩ libi abɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee yuuri abɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ sun ɩdakpa, nɩɩ n dɩyɛ. Naafɔɔ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ yɛ fan man taa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ bʋga yɛ kanɩn asa maŋa bɩrɛ, amɔɔ fan lɩɩ dulinyaa tɔ kpini‐kpini.
46005011	Amaa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n kyʋrɔɔ n sa fanɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, fan man taa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ bʋga yɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ Krisito obuupu, yɛgɛ ɔ gyɛ akyɩɩ abɛɛ anyɩn bitipu, yɛ onsi‐payɩ libi wuya, abɛɛ ɔdakpa osunpu, abɛɛ asa atɩɩ onyitapu, abɛɛ ɔtabʋʋpʋ, abɛɛ oyu. Fan naa ɔsa maŋa fan man bʋga gyii gbaa.
46005012	Ɩ man gyɛ mi kusun fɛɛ n gyii bamʋ nɩɩ ba man bʋ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ tɔ asɩn, amaa bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɩ dagaa n maa gyii bamʋ asɩn.
46005013	Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti o gyii bamʋ nɩɩ ba man tii Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ sʋ asɩn. Amaa fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ mʋ, “Fan gya alibi ɔwaapʋ lɩɩ fanɛ tɔ.”
46006001	Nɩɩ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ maa mʋ bɩrɩsa, Krisito obuupu ba kan nyɛ asɩn mʋ, mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ ee kpee naa samaa mʋ asɩn agyipu mʋ nɩɩ ba man nyi Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ man taa mʋ kpee Krisito abuupu mʋ asɛ kɛ ba lɔŋɔ bamʋ?
46006002	Fan man nyi yɛ anɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ asa ii biti a talɛ dulinyaa abi? Nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ anɛ ii biti a talɛ dulinyaa abi asɩn bɩrɛ, mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ fɛn mɛɛ taalɛ lɔŋɔ fanɛ nsana tɔ asɩn wuribi?
46006003	Fan man nyi fɛɛ anɛ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ yɛgɛ a talɛ mʋ nbɔɔ mʋ? Ɩmʋ sʋ mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fɛn mɛɛ taalɛ lɔŋɔ abaa ndaga kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ asɩn?
46006004	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ fan kan fan sʋ falɛ asɩn fanɛ nsana mʋ, mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ fan sʋ fen kpiya asɩn agyipu mʋ nɩɩ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ ba man sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ sa bamʋ mʋ, yɛ ba gyii fanɛ asɩn?
46006005	Ɩ man sʋ fanɛ ipeeli? Amɔɔ fan man sʋ ɔnyaasɩnpʋ kʋlʋn fanɛ tɔ, mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ lɔŋɔ fanɛ wʋlɛ‐wʋlɛ nsana?
46006006	Amaa fanɛɛ fanɛ bɩrɛ, Krisito obuupu ɩɩ taa mʋ bɩrɩsa Krisito obuupu asɩn ee kpee ɛɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii mʋ asɛ.
46006007	Fan maa nyɛ asɩn nɩɩ fɛn samaa abaa mʋ, ɩ kaapʋ nɩn fɛɛ fan tɛɛ wʋla gyii tɩyɛ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ nɩn. Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ odunwura mʋ mee kyula yɛ mʋ asɩn ɩ man bʋrɔn? Mɩnɛ ɩ waa nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ yɛgɛ kɛ ba sisii mʋ?
46006008	Amaa fanɛ wʋlɛ‐wʋlɛ Krisito abi fen siisi abaa, nɩɩ fɛn waa fanɛ bɩrɩsa ana kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man bʋrɔn.
46006009	Fan man nyi yɛ alibi awaapʋ mʋ, ba mɛɛ yɛ ba nyɛ loo Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ? Fan man yɛgɛ ɔkʋ ɔ pɩna fanɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa kakyɩɩ abɛɛ kanyɩn biti kɩgyagaa, yɛ ɩdakpa asunpu, abɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ lɩɩ bamʋ‐kuli ana abɛɛ bamʋ‐ka ana kamaa, yɛ anyɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ dɛ yɛ bamʋ bɩrɩsa ana anyɩn,
46006010	yɛ ayuu, yɛ onsi‐payɩ libi wuya ana, yɛ atabʋʋpʋ, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee nyita asa atɩɩ, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ pɩna asa bee gyii mʋ, falɛ asa anɩmʋ ɔkʋ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ nyɛ loo Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ.
46006011	Falɛ nɩɩ fanɛ akʋ fan kyɩna fan du, amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ Ɩbwaarɛ fwɩɩ fanɛ alibi, nɩɩ ɔ lɔŋɔ fanɛ yɩla sa mʋ n‐yɩɩ, nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ fanɛ kyula yɛ fanɛ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ asɛ lɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito yɛ anɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ sʋ.
46006012	Fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “N sʋ ɔkpa fɛɛ n waa kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ.” Ɩ gyɛ kesintin, amaa man gyɛ ɩmʋ kpini ɩ bʋrɔn sa mʋ. Ngbaa mɛ n taalɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, n sʋ ɔkpa fɛɛ n waa kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ, amaa n mɛɛ yɛ n waa mɛ n‐yɩɩ kɩnyɛ sa kʋtɔ kʋ.
46006013	Fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Agyitɔ ɩ bʋ tɔ sa ɔtɔ, nɩɩ ɔtɔ gbaa bʋ tɔ sa agyitɔ.” Ɩ gyɛ kesintin, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti o nyita ɩmʋ kpini. Nyɩmɩsa kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kɩ man bʋ tɔ sa kakyɩɩ yɛ kanyɩn biti kɩgyagaa, amaa kɩ gyɛ sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ nɩn, nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mɔɔ bʋ tɔ sa kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ.
46006014	Ɩbwaarɛ taa mʋ ɔlʋn kyiŋi Yesu lɩɩ lewu tɔ, kanɩn nɩɩ ee biti o kyiŋi anɛ gbaa anɛ lɩɩ lewu tɔ.
46006015	Fan man nyi yɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Yesu kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ abaafʋn mʋ abɛɛ? Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ n taa mɛ n‐yɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ Krisito kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kɩbaafʋn mʋ naa dɛ yɛ ɔbʋrʋkɔɔnɛ‐kyɩɩ abɛɛ? Afuloo! Ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ ba kanɩn.
46006016	Fan man nyi fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ naa bʋga yɛ ɔbʋrʋkɔɔnɛ‐kyɩɩ mʋ, maa mʋ ba biliŋi kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kʋlʋn nɩn? Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Bamʋ anyɔ ba biliŋi kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kʋlʋn nɩn.”
46006017	Amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ bʋga yɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ, maa mʋ ba biliŋi kʋkʋlʋn nɩn kayaayu tɔ.
46006018	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan sɩlɛ lɩɩ kakyɩɩ abɛɛ kanyɩn biti kɩgyagaa tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ alibi kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa ɩ waa mʋ, ɩ mɛɛ waa mʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ ineesi, amaa nyɩmɩsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa kanyɩn abɛɛ kakyɩɩ biti kɩgyagaa mʋ, ɔ waa mʋ gbaa‐gbaa kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ alibi nɩn.
46006019	Fan man nyi yɛ fanɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ ɩ gyɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ? Fan man nyi yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ sa fanɛ Kayaayu maŋa, nɩɩ ɔ tɛ fanɛ tɔ? Fan man tɛ fanɛ kɩbaa sʋ,
46006020	lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ sɔɔ fanɛ ɔgyalɩn. Ɩmʋ sʋ fan taa fanɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ waa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa Ɩbwaarɛ bʋnyaa.
46007001	Nɩɩ lɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fan kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ bɩya mɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, n biti n lɛɛ ɩmʋ kɔnɔ. Ɩ bʋrɔn fɛɛ ɔnyɩn maa kyɩna yɛgɛ ɔ man mata ɔkyɩɩ.
46007002	Amaa lɩɩ kakyɩɩ abɛɛ kanyɩn biti kɩgyagaa sʋ mʋ, ɩ dagaa ɔnyɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ maa nyɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ‐ka, kɛ ɔkyɩɩ kʋmaa gbaa ɔ nyɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mu‐kuli.
46007003	Ɔnyɩn kilipu o kyula maa mʋ‐ka ba bʋga ɔdɛkpa, kɛ ɔkyɩɩ kilipu gbaa o kyula maa mu‐kuli ba bʋga ɔdɛkpa.
46007004	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkyɩɩ kilipu kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ man bɩla kɩ gyɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ nkʋn lɛɛ nɩn, amaa kɩ gyɛ mu‐kuli gbaa lɛɛ nɩn. Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kilipu gbaa kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ man gyɛ mʋ nkʋn lɛɛ, amaa kɩ gyɛ mʋ‐ka gbaa lɛɛ nɩn.
46007005	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔnyɩn maa mʋ‐ka ba man kina abaa asɛ kɩdɛ kɩnyɩn yɛ kɩkyɩɩ. Amɔɔ fan tɔwɛ kyula abaa yɛ fan mɛɛ yɛ fan dɛ yɛ abaa saŋa gbɛrɛɛ, kɛ fan nyɛ‐nyɛ saŋa sa kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ. Amaa ɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, fan bwii bʋga dɛ kɩnyɩn yɛ kɩkyɩɩ, saamʋ Sɩtaanɛ mɛɛ nyɛ tʋʋ fanɛ tɔ kɩɩ, lɩɩ fan maa mɛɛ taalɛ kɩtaa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ.
46007006	N maa tɔwɛ yɛ ɔkʋmaa ɔ nyɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ‐ka abɛɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mu‐kuli mʋ, man gyɛ yɛ n nyan fanɛ nɩn, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ nbara nɩn yɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ o kili.
46007007	Naafɔɔ n biti fɛɛ ɔnyɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ baa o du fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n du falɛ. Amaa nyɩmɩsa kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa kakɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa sa mʋ, ɔnɩmʋ lɛɛ kwɩɩ, nɩɩ ɔnɩmʋ lɛɛ gbaa kwɩɩ.
46007008	Nbɩɩnbɩɩ lɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩta kili yɛ akulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ, n tɔwɛ bamʋ fɛɛ ɩ bʋrɔn sa bamʋ fɛɛ ba maa man kili fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n man kili mʋ.
46007009	Amaa nɩɩ ba mɛɛ yɛ ba kan taalɛ kɩtaa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ bɩrɛ, ɩ dagaa ba maa kili. Lɩɩ fɛɛ nɩɩ ba kili mʋ, ɩ bʋrɔn sa bamʋ ɩ kyɔ kakyɩɩ abɛɛ kanyɩn biti kayalaga kɩ maa bʋ bamʋ tɔ.
46007010	Lɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kili mʋ mɔɔ, n sa fanɛ kɔnɔ, nɩɩ kanɩn kɔnɔsa maŋa man lɩɩ mɛ asɛ, ɩ lɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito asɛ nɩn. Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ ɔkyɩɩ kilipu ɔ man kina mu‐kuli.
46007011	Amaa nɩɩ ɔ kan kina mu‐kuli mʋ, ɔ man bɩla kili, amɔɔ o bwii kpee, kɛ maa mu‐kuli ba naa lɔŋɔ abaa. Nɩɩ ɔkpa kʋlʋn maŋa sʋ ɔnyɩn gbaa ɔ man kina mʋ‐ka.
46007012	Nɩɩ asansa mʋ mɔɔ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ ɩ tɔwɛ ɩnɩmʋ, man gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ. Nɩɩ fanɛ Krisito abuupu ɔkʋ kan ɔ sʋ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man gyɛ ɔkɔɔlɛ‐gyipu, nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ kyula yɛ maa ɔnyɩn mʋ ba kyɩna mʋ, ɔnyɩn mʋ ɔ man kina mʋ.
46007013	Nɩɩ fanɛ Krisito obuupu ɔkyɩɩ kan ɔ sʋ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man gyɛ ɔkɔɔlɛ‐gyipu, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ kyula yɛ maa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ ba kyɩna mʋ, ɔkyɩɩ mʋ ɔ man kina ɔnyɩn mʋ.
46007014	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ maa gyɛ ɔkɔɔlɛ‐gyipu sʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ wu fɛɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man gyɛ ɔkɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ, n‐yɩɩ sʋ ɩ man bɩla ɩ sʋ ineesi. Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ ɔkɔɔlɛ‐gyipu sʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ wu fɛɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man gyɛ ɔkɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ, mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ ɩ man bɩla ɩ sʋ ineesi. Nɩɩ man gyɛ kanɩn mʋ bamʋ‐bii ana bee biti ba baa ba gyɛ ineesi nbii, amaa ɩ maa ba falɛ sʋ mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ wu fɛɛ ba man sʋ ineesi.
46007015	Amaa Krisito obuupu mʋ nɩɩ mʋ‐ka abɛɛ mu‐kuli mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man gyɛ Krisito obuupu, nɩɩ ee biti fɛɛ o kina mʋ bɩrɛ mʋ, ɔ yɛgɛ mʋ ɔ natɛ. Nɩɩ ɩ kan ba kanɩn mʋ, kekili nbara ɩ man ŋmina mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɩɩ anɛ nɩn yɛ a ba kyɩna kayɩɩ yuuli tɔ.
46007016	Fʋ Krisito obuupu ɔkyɩɩ, akʋtɔ fʋ sʋ nɩɩ fu‐kuli ii biti ɔ bɔla nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ? Nɩɩ fʋ Krisito obuupu ɔnyɩn, akʋtɔ fɛɛ fʋ sʋ nɩɩ fʋ‐ka ii biti ɔ bɔla nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ?
46007017	Ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ kyaga sʋ kyɩna kakyɩna mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ taa sa mʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla o du pɔyɩ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ o be sun mʋ mʋ. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ kɔnɔsa mʋ nɩɩ n kaapʋ Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ kpini tɔ.
46007018	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩn mʋ oduu pɔyɩ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɩɩ mʋ mʋ, ɔ man bun mʋ oduu kɩlɔpanɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kan tɩn oduu, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɩɩ mʋ mʋ, ɔ man tɩn mʋ oduu.
46007019	Fʋ tɩn oduu oo, fʋ man tɩn oduu oo, man gyɛ ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri. Amaa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ fan buu Ɩbwaarɛ nbara mʋ sʋ.
46007020	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ baa o du fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla o du pɔyɩ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ o be sun mʋ mʋ.
46007021	A taa fɛɛ nɩɩ fʋ kan fʋ gyɛ kɩnyɛ pɔyɩ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɩɩ fʋ yɛ fʋ ba sun mʋ mʋ man yɛgɛ ɩ tɔɔrɔɔ fʋ. Amaa nɩɩ fʋ nyɛ ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ taa kɔɔlɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ bɩrɛ, waa kanɩn.
46007022	Lɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ kɩnyɛ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ tɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ o be biliŋi Krisito obuupu mʋ, Krisito ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ. Nɩɩ ɔkpa kʋlʋn maŋa sʋ, fanɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ ɔ ba waa Krisito obuupu mʋ, gyɛ Krisito kɩnyɛ.
46007023	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Krisito sɔɔ fanɛ kpini ɔgyalɩn, ɩmʋ sʋ fan man gyɛ anyɛ sa asa.
46007024	Mɛ bɩrɩsa ana Krisito abuupu, kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ wʋla o du pɔyɩ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɩɩ mʋ mʋ, ɔ kyɩna kanɩn yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ.
46007025	Nbɩɩnbɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩta kili mʋ bɩrɛ, n man nyɛ nbara kʋ lɩɩ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu asɛ lɩɩ bamʋ sʋ. Amaa mɛ Pɔɔlɩ gbaa‐gbaa n tɔwɛ n sa bamʋ lɩɩ mɛ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ, fɛɛ n maa gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ wu kʋwɛɛ sʋ mʋ, fɛn taalɛ kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii fɛɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ falɛ, n mɛɛ pɩna fanɛ nɩn.
46007026	Mɛ asɛ mʋ, ɩ bʋrɔn fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩ kili mʋ, ba kyɩna kanɩn, lɩɩ fɛɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ kakyɩna kanɩmʋ tɔ waa ɔlʋn.
46007027	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ o tee kili mʋ, ɔ man kina mʋ‐ka. Amaa ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man pɩɩta kili mʋ, ɔ man mata ɔkyɩɩ.
46007028	Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kan kili mʋ, ɔ man waa alibi. Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man pɩɩta kili nɩɩ ɔ kan kili mʋ, ɔ man waa alibi. Amaa asa mʋ nɩɩ ba kili mʋ, awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ bee biti be wu kakyɩna kanɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, ɩmʋ nɩɩ n mee biti fan maa wu.
46007029	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana Krisito abuupu, kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n kaapʋ mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, saŋa man bɩla ɔ kyɔ kɛ dulinyaa kɩ ba laalaalʋwɛ, ɩmʋ sʋ lɩɩ ndaga ɩɩ sʋ ii kpee mʋ, anyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba kili mʋ ba kyɩna fɛɛ anyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba man sʋ akyɩɩ.
46007030	Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bɔɔta tɔ mʋ, ba waa fɛɛ ɩ maa man tiri bamʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bamʋ ansi i gyii mʋ mɔɔ, ba waa fɛɛ bamʋ ansi ii mee gyii, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba sɔɔ mʋ, ba waa fɛɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba sɔɔ mʋ, ɩ man gyɛ bamʋ lɛɛ.
46007031	Bamʋ nɩɩ ba taa dulinyaa atɔ waasa bee sun kusun mʋ, ba waa fɛɛ ɩ man tiri bamʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ dulinyaa du nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ mʋ, kɩɩ kyʋn nɩmʋ.
46007032	N biti fɛɛ fan lɛɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ nfɛɛrɛ kɩbansa tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mu kusun i tiri mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɛɛ kpan mʋ n‐yɩɩ ɛɛ waa kusun kanan mʋ nɩɩ i gyii Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ ansi.
46007033	Amaa ɔnyɩn kilipu bɩrɛ, mʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ gyan dulinyaa asɩn sʋ nɩn, kanan mʋ nɩɩ ee biti o gyii mʋ‐ka ansi.
46007034	Ɩmʋ sʋ nfɛɛrɛ nnyɔ‐nnyɔ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ. Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kili mʋ mɔɔ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mu kusun i tiri mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ mʋ kala kpini sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ. Amaa ɔkyɩɩ‐kilipu bɩrɛ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ gyan dulinyaa asɩn sʋ nɩn, yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ waa kɛ o gyii mu‐kuli ansi.
46007035	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kyɛ fanɛ tɔ sʋ, nɩɩ n tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ n man gyɛ yɛ n nyan fanɛ nɩn. Amaa n biti fan waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ dɛ ɔkpa yɛgɛ kɩ bʋrɔn, kɛ fan nyɛ taa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kpini sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ naa lʋwɛ.
46007036	Nɩɩ ɩ kan ba fɛɛ ɔnyɩn maa ɔkyɩɩ ba ŋmina fɛɛ ba kili, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ mɛɛ taalɛ kɩtaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ mɔɔ dan fʋʋ kekili mʋ, ɔnyɩn mʋ ɔ waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ dagaa, kɛ ba kili abaa. Ɩ man gyɛ alibi nɩn.
46007037	Amaa nɩɩ ɔnyɩn kan fɛ nfɛɛrɛ yɛ ɔ mɛɛ yɛ o kili, nɩɩ ɔ yɩlɛ sʋ kanɩn mʋ, ɔkʋ ɔ man nyan mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taalɛ kɩtaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ mʋ ɩ bʋrɔn.
46007038	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ o kili ɔkyɩɩ mʋ ɩ bʋrɔn, nɩɩ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kili ɔkyɩɩ mɔɔ mʋ ɩ bʋrɔn gaa.
46007039	Ɔkyɩɩ kilipu mʋ nɩɩ mu‐kuli san ɔ tɛ nkpa tɔ mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ kina mu‐kuli kɛ ɔ naa kili ɔnyɩn pʋpwɛ. Amaa nɩɩ mu‐kuli mʋ wu bɩrɛ, ɔ sʋ ɔkpa ɔ taalɛ kili ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ kii biti, amaa ɔ baa ɔ gyɛ Krisito obuupu.
46007040	Mɛ asɛ mʋ, ɔkyɩɩ kyɩna mʋ nkʋn mʋ, ii biti ɩ waa ɔdan sa mʋ, ɩ kyɔ maa kili. Nɩɩ n kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ kɩ tɛ mɛ tɔ.
46008001	Nbɩɩnbɩɩ, taa lɩɩ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba taa lɔŋɔ sa ɩdakpa mʋ, an nyi fɛɛ anɛ kpini an sʋ kinyi fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fɛn taalɛ fɛn tɔwɛ mʋ. Kinyi ɩɩ bɩya n‐yɩɩ kɩkʋsaa, amaa kebiti kɩɩ kyɛ asa tɔ.
46008002	Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ o nyi kʋtɔ kʋ mʋ, o mee nyi naa fʋʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ɔ baa o nyi mʋ.
46008003	Amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nyi.
46008004	Ɩmʋ sʋ lɩɩ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba taa lɔŋɔ sa ɩdakpa mʋ kigyii mʋ, an nyi fɛɛ ɔdakpa kʋ man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ kɩ sʋ nkpa, nɩɩ an nyi fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kʋlʋn nkʋn ɩ bʋ tɔ.
46008005	Halɩɩ ɩdakpa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ bamʋ yɛ anyɩrɩpɛ nɩɩ ba bʋ sʋsʋ abɛɛ kasɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kesintin fɛɛ ɩdakpa yɛ anyɩrɩpɛ gaalaagaa ba bʋ tɔ gbaa mʋ,
46008006	anɛɛnɛ bɩrɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ kʋlʋn nɩɩ an nyi maa bʋ tɔ, nɩɩ mʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɔsɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tʋʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ, nɩɩ an bʋ tɔ sa mʋ, nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kʋlʋn ɩ bʋ tɔ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ Yesu Krisito mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla mʋ sʋ tʋʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ, nɩɩ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ an bʋ tɔ.
46008007	Amaa man gyɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ i nyi falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ. Ɩdakpa asɩn mʋ ɩ wʋla dɩn akʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ ba lɩɩ ndaga nɩɩ ba kan gyii kanɩn agyitɔ mʋ, bɛɛ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ agyitɔ mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɩdakpa lɛɛ nɩn. Ba maa man pɩɩ bɩɩ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ tɔ gaa sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ba kan gyii mʋ bɛɛ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ nɩn fɛɛ ba waa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ ineesi.
46008008	Amaa agyitɔ mɛɛ taalɛ kyɛ anɛ tɔ kɛ a nin tiri Ɩbwaarɛ. Nɩɩ a man kan gyii mʋ, a mɛɛ yɛ a pan sɛhn, nɩɩ an kan gyii mɔɔ mʋ, a mɛɛ yɛ a nyɛ sɛhn.
46008009	Amaa fan baa fan da sʋ lɩɩ ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ fan nyɛ mʋ sʋ, kɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩ bɩɩ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ tɔ gaa mʋ, ba man tɩyɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ.
46008010	Nɩɩ ɩ kan ba fɛɛ ɔkʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man pɩɩ bɩɩ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ tɔ gaa, nɩɩ o wu fʋ mʋ nɩɩ fu nyi abwaarɛsɩn mʋ tɔ gaa, fʋ maa tɛ ɔdakpa tɔ fii gyii mʋ, ɩnɩmʋ ɩ mɛɛ yɛgɛ, kɛ ngbaa mʋ ɔ naa gyii agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba taa lɔŋɔ sa ɔdakpa mʋ abɛɛ?
46008011	Ɩmʋ sʋ fʋ bɩrɩsa mʋ nɩɩ Krisito wu sa mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ man pɩɩ bɩɩ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ tɔ gaa mʋ, ee biti o nyita lɩɩ fʋ kinyi gaa mʋ sʋ.
46008012	Nɩɩ fʋ kan waa fʋ bɩrɩsa alibi falɛ ɔkpa sʋ mʋ, fɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ mʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ lɛɛ sʋ, nɩɩ fʋ waa Krisito alibi.
46008013	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ n gyii, ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ mɛ bɩrɩsa ɔ tɩyɛ alibi tɔ bɩrɛ, n mɛɛ bɩla yɛ n gyii kanɩn agyitɔ maŋa, kɛ n yɛgɛ ɔ lɩɩ tɩyɛ.
46009001	N man bʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ nɩn abɛɛ? N man gyɛ Krisito osunpu nɩn abɛɛ? N man wu Yesu anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ nɩn abɛɛ? Man gyɛ fanɛ ɩ gyɛ kusun mʋ nɩɩ n waa sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ tɔnɔ?
46009002	Halɩɩ nɩɩ akʋ ba man kɩɩ mɛ fɛɛ n gyɛ Krisito osunpu gbaa mʋ, fanɛɛ fanɛ bɩrɛ n gyɛ Krisito osunpu sa fanɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ kakyɩna Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɩmʋ ii duligi fɛɛ n gyɛ Krisito osunpu nɩn.
46009003	Falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ nɩɩ n sʋ n lɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ n man gyɛ Krisito osunpu mʋ kɔnɔ.
46009004	N maa Banabasi a man sʋ ɔkpa fɛɛ i gyii kɛ anuu lɩɩ kusun mʋ nɩɩ an sun mʋ sʋ abɛɛ?
46009005	A man sʋ ɔkpa fɛɛ a kili Krisito abuupu akyɩɩ, kɛ a taa bamʋ buu anɛ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Krisito asunpu akʋ, yɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu mu‐supu ana yɛ Pita bɛɛ waa mʋ abɛɛ?
46009006	Abɛɛ anɛ nkʋn ɩ dagaa fɛɛ a taa anɛ abaa waa kusun biti anɛ agyitɔ‐gyisa?
46009007	Ɔnaakɔpʋ mɔɔ ii sun kusun, nɩɩ ɛɛ ka mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ kʋkɔ? Ɔdɔɔpʋ mɔɔ ɩ bʋ tɔ, nɩɩ o mee gyii mʋ ndɔɔ tɔ agyitɔ? Atɔbwaayaa ɔkpapʋ mɔɔ ɩ bʋ tɔ, nɩɩ o mee nuu mʋ atɔbwaaya mʋ kɩnyapʋ‐kyu.
46009008	Man gyɛ nyɩmɩsa nfɛɛrɛ nɩɩ n sʋ n tɔwɛ falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ bʋ Ɩbwaarɛ nbara mʋ tɔ gbaa.
46009009	Ba kyʋrɔɔ yɩla Mosesi Nbara mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Man ŋmina naatɛ‐nyɩnsa kɔnɔ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa agyitɔ tɔ kusun mʋ.” Amɔɔ fu nyi fɛɛ ɩnaatɛ‐nyɩnsa asɩn nkʋn nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ falɛ?
46009010	Ɩbwaarɛ maa tɔwɛ kanɩn mʋ, man gyɛ anɛ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ ɛɛ sa abɛɛ? Ɛɛhn! Kesintin, anɛ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ ɩmʋ sa. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ baŋɛ ɩfɔlɛ, yɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɩŋɛ ayu mʋ, bamʋ kpini bɛɛ waa kanɩn yɛgɛ ba sʋ tamaa fɛɛ bɛɛ nyɛ bamʋ agyitɔ‐gyisa lɩɩ ɩmʋ tɔ.
46009011	Nɩɩ an maa duu kayaayu tɔ atɔ duusa fanɛ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ a nyɛ kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ atɔ tirisa lɩɩ fanɛ asɛ mʋ, ii kisi nɩn?
46009012	Nɩɩ akʋ ba sʋ ɔkpa fɛɛ ba kɔɔlɛ falɛ atɔ tirisa lɩɩ fanɛ asɛ mʋ, a man sʋ ɔkpa an kyɔ bamʋ? Halɩɩ a maa sʋ kanɩn ɔkpa gbaa mʋ, a man taa ɩmʋ waa sɛhn. Amaa an nyɛ kenyiita yɩlɛ tɔ, kɛ ɩ man nyɛ tii Asɩn danbɩrasa lɩɩ Krisito sʋ mʋ kɩ yɛlɩgɛ.
46009013	Fan man nyi fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee sun kusun kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, bɛɛ nyɛ bamʋ agyitɔ bɛɛ lɩɩ tʋtɔ nɩn? Nɩɩ fan man nyi fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ lɛɛ saraga Ɩbwaarɛ kaswɩɩ mʋ sʋ gbaa, bɛɛ nyɛ bamʋ lɛɛ lɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba taa ba lɛɛ saraga sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ.
46009014	Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu sa kɔnɔ yɩla yɛ, bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, bee biti ba nyɛ bamʋ agyitɔ gyisa lɩɩ bamʋ asɩn danbɩrasa kɩtɔwɛ mʋ tɔ.
46009015	Amaa n man taa falɛ ɩkpa ɩnɩmʋ tɔ ɔkʋ waa kusun. Nɩɩ n man kyʋrɔɔ ɩnɩmʋ nɩn kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ fan waa kanɩn atɔ sa mɛ. Nɩɩ n kan wu gbaa mʋ, ɩ bɔ fɛɛ ɔkʋ ɔ maa yɛgɛ nɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩmʋ sʋ n kaapʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ mʋ ɩ maa waa kɩyan.
46009016	Nɩɩ n kan tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, n man sʋ ɔkpa fɛɛ n kaapʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ. Ɩ dan ɩ gyɛ nɩn fɛɛ, n tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n kan n man tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, mɛ laakʋ.
46009017	Nɩɩ n kan n waa kusun mʋ mɛ kɩpɩrɛ tɔ mʋ, n biti n nyɛ kʋkɔka lala. Nɩɩ n man kan sun kusun mʋ lɩɩ mɛ kɩpɩrɛ tɔ bɩrɛ, n dan waa kusun mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa sa mɛ yɛ n waa mʋ nɩn dee.
46009018	Nɩɩ mɩnɛ ɩ gyɛ mɛ kʋkɔka? Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ n tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ yɛgɛ n man kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ sɛhn, nɩɩ n mɛɛ taa ɩkpa mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ lɩɩ asɩn danbɩrasa kɩtɔwɛ mʋ sʋ taa nyɛ mɛ atɔ tirisa.
46009019	N bʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ nɩn, n man gyɛ ɔkʋ kɩnyɛ, amaa n waa mɛ n‐yɩɩ kɩnyɛ sa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ, kɛ n nyɛ‐nyɛ asa kʋkyɔ ba be biliŋi Krisito lɛɛ.
46009020	Nɩɩ n maa bʋ Gyiwu abi asɛ mʋ, n waa mɛ n‐yɩɩ nɩn fɛɛ Gyiwu obii, kɛ n nyɛ‐nyɛ bamʋ ba be biliŋi Krisito lɛɛ. Nɩɩ n maa bʋ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Mosesi nbara mʋ kasɛ mʋ, yɛgɛ mɛɛ mɛ n man bʋ nbara mʋ kasɛ mʋ, n waa mɛ n‐yɩɩ nɩn fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba du mʋ, kɛ n nyɛ‐nyɛ bamʋ ba ba biliŋi Krisito lɛɛ.
46009021	Kanɩn ɔkpa kʋlʋn sʋ nɩɩ n maa bʋ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man bʋ Mosesi nbara mʋ kasɛ mʋ, n waa mɛ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man bʋ nbara mʋ kasɛ, kɛ n nyɛ‐nyɛ bamʋ kɛ ba be buu Krisito. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ mɛɛ kaapʋ nɩn fɛɛ n mee buu Ɩbwaarɛ nbara mʋ, n buu Krisito nbara mʋ nɩn.
46009022	Nɩɩ n maa bʋ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩ bɩɩ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ tɔ gaa asɛ mʋ, n waa mɛ n‐yɩɩ nɩn fɛɛ ngbaa mɛ n man pɩɩ bɩɩ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ tɔ gaa, kɛ n nyɛ‐nyɛ bamʋ ba be buu Krisito. N taa mɛ n‐yɩɩ waa kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ sa asa kpini, kɛ n nyɛ‐nyɛ ɔkpa kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ yɛgɛ bamʋ akʋ ba nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ.
46009023	Asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sʋ nɩɩ n waa ɩnɩmʋ kpini, kɛ n nyɛ‐nyɛ kusee mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ tɔ mʋ.
46009024	Fan man nyi fɛɛ asɩlɛpʋ kʋkyɔ bɛɛ waa kadandan abaa kɩsɩlɛ tɔ mʋ, bamʋ tɔ ɔkʋlʋn ii biti o gyii sʋ kɛ ɔ nyɛ kakɛɛ. Ɩmʋ sʋ fan payɩ ansi sɩlɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan nyɛ gyii sʋ, kɛ fan nyɛ ɩmʋ kakɛɛ.
46009025	Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ kadandan abaa ɔsɩlɛpʋ mʋ, ɛɛ payɩ mu ansi ɛɛ kʋʋla mʋ n‐yɩɩ danbɩrasa. Bamɛɛ bamʋ bɩrɛ, bɛɛ waa kanɩn bee biti kakɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ kii biti ki be nyita. Amaa anɛɛnɛ bɩrɛ, an payɩ ansi an sun an biti kakɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ ki mee nyita kpini‐kpini.
46009026	Kanɩn sʋ n mɛɛ sɩlɛ fɛɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ sɩlɛ kɩyan, nɩɩ n mɛɛ kɔ kolu fɛɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tʋʋ akɔtɔɔ afuu tɔ.
46009027	N nyan mɛ n‐yɩɩ, nɩɩ n yɛgɛ nɩɩ kii nu mɛ asɛ, kɛ ɩ man naa ba fɛɛ, nɩɩ n kan tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa sa asa mʋ, kɛ mɛɛmɛ n pan kakɛɛ mʋ.
46010001	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, n biti fɛɛ fan nyiŋi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ kyɩna waa anɛ naana ana mʋ. Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋsʋ lɩɩ Egyipiti ba buu Mosesi bee kpee mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ kabwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ kun bamʋ kpini, nɩɩ ɔpʋ baŋɛ tɔ kɩnyɔ nɩɩ bamʋ kpini ba natɛ kɩmʋ tɔ bʋlɛ lɩɩ.
46010002	Lɩɩ kabwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ki kun bamʋ yɛ ɔpʋ mʋ tɔ kɩnatɛ faa mʋ sʋ mʋ, ba nyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee biliŋi Mosesi abuupu.
46010003	Bamʋ kpini ba gyii agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ.
46010004	Nɩɩ bamʋ kpini ba nuu nkyu mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ kɩfʋlɛ tɔ mʋ. Ba nuu lɩɩ kɩfʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩmaa bamʋ ba naa mʋ, nɩɩ kanɩn kɩfʋlɛ maŋa ɩ gyɛ Krisito.
