47013003	Lɩɩ fan maa biti fɛɛ n kaapʋ fanɛ fɛɛ Krisito ɩɩ bɔla mɛ sʋ ɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ, fen biti fan wu. Lɩɩ fɛɛ man gyɛ yɛ o yuuli yɛ fanɛ nɩn, amaa ɔ gyɛ ɔlʋnpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ fanɛ tɔ.
47013004	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ gyɛ kesintin fɛɛ mu keyuuli sʋ nɩɩ ba da mʋ mata oyu laasa sʋ, amaa lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔlʋn tɔ sʋ mʋ ɔ tɛ nkpa tɔ. Kanɩn nɩɩ anɛ gbaa anɛ an yuuli fɛɛ mʋ, amaa lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔlʋn tɔ sʋ mʋ, an tii Krisito sʋ kɛ a bʋga kyɩna sun fanɛ.
47013005	Fan kɩɩ fanɛ kakyɩna tɔ kɛ fan kɩɩ yɛ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ fan sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii abɛɛ? Fan man nyi fɛɛ Krisito Yesu tɛ fanɛ tɔ? Ɔ tɛ fanɛ tɔ, amɔɔ kanɩn bɩrɛ fan tɩyɛ fanɛ kakyɩna tɔ nɩn.
47013006	Nɩɩ n sʋ tamaa fɛɛ fen biti fan bɩɩ yɛ anɛɛnɛ bɩrɛ a man tɩyɛ.
47013007	An kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ fan man kan waa alibi. Ɩ man gyɛ yɛ asa ba wu anɛ yɛ an waa atɔ, amaa fan waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ dɛ ɔkpa, halɩɩ nɩɩ i du fɛɛ an waa tɩyɛ gbaa.
47013008	Lɩɩ fɛɛ a mɛɛ taalɛ waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii tii Krisito kesintin mʋ ɔkpa, amɔɔ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ kyɛ kesintin mʋ tɔ nkʋn.
47013009	Nɩɩ fan kan fan bʋlʋn, nɩɩ anɛɛnɛ an pɔɔ mʋ, ɩɩ waa anɛ ɔkɔn. Nɩɩ anɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ fan dan fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ naa lʋwɛ kyɛɛkyɛɛ.
47013010	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ fan wu fɛɛ n maa man bʋ fanɛ asɛ falɛ mʋ, n kyʋrɔɔ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ. Saamʋ nɩɩ n kan ba fanɛ asɛ mʋ, n mee biti fɛɛ n taa ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu taa sa mɛ mʋ tɔwɛ ŋmanyan fanɛ. Ɔlʋn maŋa nɩɩ ɔ taa sa mɛ yɛ n kyɛ fanɛ tɔ, kɛ fan dan fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ, man gyɛ yɛ a taa ɔlʋn mʋ nin fanɛ tʋʋ.
47013011	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, mɛ katɔwɛ mʋ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, fan kyɩna danbɩrasa, fan payɩ fanɛ anɛ ansi kɛ fanɛ kakyɩna tɔ kɩ waa ɔdan kyɛɛkyɛɛ, fan nu mɛ asɛ, fan tɔwɛ kyula abaa, kɛ fan kyɩna kayɩɩ‐yuuli tɔ. N kʋlɛ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ kebiti wuya yɛ kayɩɩ yuuli wuya mʋ, ɔ baa ɔ bʋ fanɛ asɛ.
47013012	Fan taa kibiri abaa tɔ fwaala abaa.
47013013	Ɩbwaarɛ asa mʋ kpini bɛɛ fwaala fanɛ.
47013014	Anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kabwaala, yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti, yɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ kɩkyɛmɩnɛ ɔkɔn mʋ, ɩ baa ɩ bʋ fanɛ kpini asɛ.
48001001	Mɛ Pɔɔlɩ mʋ nɩɩ n gyɛ Krisito osunpu, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ asa kʋbʋ kʋ, abɛɛ ɔsa kʋ ɩ lɛɛ mɛ. Amaa Yesu Krisito yɛ Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ o kyiŋi mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ ɩ lɛɛ mɛ waa osunpu.
48001002	N kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ n kyʋŋɛ fanɛ Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ fan bʋ Galati ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, nɩɩ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ nfɩɩ mʋ kpini ba tii mɛ sʋ nɩɩ an fwaala fanɛ.
48001003	Anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ maa anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito ba bwaala fanɛ kɛ ba sa fanɛ kayɩɩ‐yuuli.
48001004	Lɩɩ anɛ alibi sʋ mʋ, Yesu kyula taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ lɛɛ saraga wu sa anɛ, kɛ ɔ nyɛ lɛɛ anɛ lɩɩ ndaga kakyɩna libi ɔlʋn mʋ tɔ. Anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti tɔ nɩɩ o kyula nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ kpini ɩ waa kanɩn.
48001005	Bʋnyaa ɔ baa ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ kakpaa! Amen.
48001006	I kyinkyin mɛ gaa fɛɛ fan maa tee biliŋi fanɛ kamaa sa Ɩbwaarɛ bilen, yɛgɛ mʋ ɩ bɔla Krisito kabwaala mʋ sʋ tɩɩ fanɛ. Nɩɩ fan biliŋi kpee fan buu asɩn kʋkwɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ akʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ.
48001007	Kesintin yɛgɛ asɩn danbɩrasa kʋ man bɩla ɩ bʋ tɔ. Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ nɩn, lɩɩ fɛɛ asa akʋ bɛɛ wuliti fanɛ tɔ, bee biti fɛɛ ba kyɛɛgɛ Krisito asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ.
48001008	Amaa, halɩɩ anɛ abɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ, kan lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba tɔwɛ fanɛ asɩn danbɩrasa kʋ, nɩɩ ɩ kwɩɩ yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ an tɔwɛ sa fanɛ mʋ, mʋ laakʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ bɩɩtɛ mʋ kʋsʋ kakpaa.
48001009	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an wʋla tɔwɛ mʋ, n bɩla n pɩla tɔ yɛ, nɩɩ ɔsa kʋ kan ɛɛ tɔwɛ fanɛ asɩn danbɩrasa kʋ, nɩɩ ɩ kwɩɩ yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ waa fanɛ lɛɛ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ bɩɩtɛ mʋ kʋsʋ kakpaa.
48001010	Nɩɩ ɩmʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ falɛ mʋ, ɩ kaapʋ nɩn fɛɛ n biti nyɩmɩsa ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ kyula nɩn abɛɛ? Ayee! N biti Ɩbwaarɛ nkʋn ɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ kyula. N biti nyɩmɩsa ansi i gyii mɛ sʋ nɩn abɛɛ? Nɩɩ n kan n biti fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa ansi i gyii mɛ sʋ mʋ, naafɔɔ n mɛɛ yɛ n bɩla n gyɛ Krisito kɩyaafɔlɛ.
48001011	Mɛ bɩrɩsa ana akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu, n biti fan bɩɩ fɛɛ, asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ mʋ, ɩ man gyɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ daadimaadi asɛ.
48001012	Nɩɩ man gyɛ nyɩmɩsa kʋ asɛ nɩɩ n nyɛ ɩmʋ, abɛɛ ɔsa kʋ ɩ kaapʋ mɛ ɩmʋ. Amaa Yesu Krisito ɩ lɛɛ ɩmʋ kaapʋ mɛ.
48001013	Lɩɩ fɛɛ fan daa nu mɛ kakyɩna mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ kɩmʋ tɔ dɩdaa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n daa n bʋ Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐sun mʋ tɔ mʋ. Nɩɩ fan nu kanan mʋ nɩɩ n daa taa kumu tɔ ɔlʋn nyanla Krisito abi mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ n kpan mɛ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ n nyita Krisito kabwaarɛ‐sun mʋ.
48001014	Nɩɩ mɛ sara sʋ Gyiwu abi adamantɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, n gyankpaa bamʋ anɛ Gyiwu abi kabwaarɛ‐sun mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ anɛ anaana‐tɔ awaasa mʋ n yɛgɛ nɩɩ i gyii mi kumu, nɩɩ n kpan mɛ n‐yɩɩ yɛ ɩ yɩlɛ.
48001015	Amaa lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala sʋ mʋ, ɔ wʋla lɛɛ mɛ yɩla pɔyɩ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mɛ, nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ mɛ yɛ n ba sun mʋ.
48001016	Nɩɩ ɩ bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ ansi fɛɛ ɔ lɛɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ kaapʋ mɛ, kɛ n tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ lɩɩ Mu‐Bii mʋ sʋ, sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ, nɩɩ n man taasɛ biti kɩkaapʋ lɩɩ ɔsa kʋ asɛ.
48001017	Nɩɩ n man kpee Gyerusalem naa wu bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ Krisito asunpu mʋ pɔyɩ nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n ba waa osunpu mʋ. Amaa n dan kʋsʋ opula maŋa tɔ nɩn, kpee Arabiya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, nɩɩ kamaa tɔ n lɩɩ tʋtɔ bwii ba Damasiko kadɛ tɔ.
48001018	Nsu nsa kamaa tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ n kpee Gyerusalem naa wu Pita. Nɩɩ n kyɩna mʋ asɛ nkɛ kudu anu.
48001019	N man wu Krisito asunpu mʋ ɔkʋ tii sʋ, amɔɔ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Krisito mu‐supu Gyemisi nkʋn.
48001020	Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ, kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n kyʋrɔɔ n sa fanɛ falɛ gyɛ kesintin, n mɛɛ tɩn antɩŋɛsa.
48001021	Ɩmʋ kamaa tɔ mʋ n kpee Siriya yɛ Kilisiya ɩsʋwʋlɛ sʋ.
48001022	Kanɩn saŋa maŋa tɔ mʋ, Krisito abi kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ Gyudeya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ, ba man pɩɩ wu mɛ yɛ ansi.
48001023	Amaa kʋtɔ kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ba nu lɩɩ asa asɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ daa ɛɛ nyanla anɛ mʋ, nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ ɛɛ tɔwɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii asɩn mʋ nɩɩ naafɔɔ ɔ daa kpan mʋ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ o nyita mʋ.”
48001024	Ɩmʋ sʋ ba yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba nu lɩɩ mɛ sʋ.
48002001	Nsu kudu ana kamaa tɔ mʋ, n bwii kpee Gyerusalem. N maa Banabasi i kpee nɩɩ n taa Titusi tii sʋ kpee.
48002002	N kpee tʋtɔ nɩn, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ lɛɛ kaapʋ mɛ fɛɛ n kpee. N maa abɩlɩsa mʋ an gyaŋɛ anɛ nkʋn, nɩɩ n lɛɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ n sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ kasɛ kaapʋ bamʋ. N waa kanɩn nɩn kɛ ɩ man naa ba fɛɛ kusun mʋ nɩɩ n waa yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ n san n waa falɛ mʋ, ɩ man ba biliŋi kɩyan.
48002003	Amaa Titusi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ mɛ asɛ, yɛgɛ be nyi maa gyɛ Giriki nyɩmɩsa gbaa mʋ, ɔkʋ man nyan mʋ yɛ ɔ tɩn mʋ oduu.
48002004	Amaa falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ ɩ ba, lɩɩ fɛɛ asa kʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ pɩna yɛ ba gyɛ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu fɛɛ anɛ mʋ ba be loo anɛ tɔ, kɛ ba ba kɩɩ anɛ n‐yɩɩ kɩnyɛ Krisito Yesu tɔ, kɛ ba nyɛ taa anɛ biliŋi Gyiwu nbara mʋ anyɛ.
48002005	Amaa a man daa yɛgɛ anɛ n‐yɩɩ sa bamʋ. An waa kanɩn nɩn kɛ kesintin asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ ɩ nyɛ sii fanɛ tɔ kanɩn.
48002006	Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba daa ba gyɛ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ agyankpaapʋ mʋ, ba man taa sɛhn tii mɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ n kaapʋ mʋ sʋ. Halɩɩ ba maa gyɛ agyankpaapʋ gbaa mʋ, ɩ man tiri mɛ. Lɛɛ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ bɩrɛ mɛɛ kɩɩ nyɩmɩsa ansi sʋ.
48002007	Amaa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ agyankpaapʋ banɩmʋ ba wu ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ taa asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ waa mɛ abaa tɔ yɛ n tɔwɛ ɩmʋ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa asɩn kʋlʋn maŋa waa Pita abaa tɔ yɛ ɔ tɔwɛ sa Gyiwu abi mʋ.
48002008	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ mʋ ɔlʋn bɔla Pita, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Krisito osunpu sa Gyiwu abi, nɩɩ ɔlʋn mʋ ii sun kusun bamʋ tɔ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ maŋa ɔlʋn ɩ bɔla mɛ, Pɔɔlɩ gbaa, mʋ nɩɩ n gyɛ Krisito osunpu sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ, nɩɩ ɔlʋn maŋa ii sun kusun bamʋ tɔ.
48002009	Gyemisi maa Pita yɛ Gyɔn nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ nyi ba maa gyɛ kʋbʋ mʋ abɩlɩsa gbaa‐gbaa mʋ, ba bɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ bwaala ngbaa mɛ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ba gyɔɔ n maa Banabasi abaa tɔ kaapʋ fɛɛ anaa bamʋ kpini an sun kusun kʋlʋn. Nɩɩ an kyula yɛ n maa Banabasi a waa kusun bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ tɔ, kɛ bamʋ mɔɔ ba waa kusun mʋ Gyiwu abi tɔ.
48002010	Kʋtɔ kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ anɛ tii sʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, a nyiŋi atiripu mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ bamʋ tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n wʋla payɩ mi ansi n waa.
48002011	Saŋa kʋ Pita maa kyɩna ba Antiyoki mʋ, n tɔwɛ tigi mʋ yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ man dɛ ɔkpa.
48002012	Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, pɔyɩ kɛ Gyemisi o sun anyɩn akʋ kpee Antiyoki mʋ, naafɔɔ Pita maa Krisito abuupu mʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ ɩ bʋga bee gyii lapɛ kʋlʋn tɔ. Amaa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ anyɩn mʋ ba naa fʋʋ tʋtɔ mʋ, Pita tɩn mʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ Krisito abuupu mʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ asɛ kigyii, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ sɩlɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi gbaa ba tɩn oduu mʋ.
48002013	Kanɩn gbaa nɩn, nɩɩ Gyiwu abi asansa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tʋtɔ mʋ ba gyɛ nnɔ nnyɔ‐nnyɔ wuya ana fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Pita waa mʋ, halɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ Banabasi gbaa fɔyɩ ɔkpa o buu bamʋ.
48002014	N maa wu fɛɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa mʋ, man buu asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ kesintin ɔkpa sʋ mʋ, n tɔwɛ Pita Krisito abuupu mʋ kpini ansi tɔ yɛ, “Gyiwu obii ɩ gyɛ fʋ, yɛgɛ fʋ kakyɩna tɔ du fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi. Mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ nyan Krisito abuupu mʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ yɛ ba kyɩna fɛɛ Gyiwu abi?”
48002015	Kakʋʋgɛ tɔ mʋ, maa fʋ an gyɛ Gyiwu abi gbaa‐gbaa, a man gyɛ “bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi, nɩɩ ba man buu Gyiwu nbara mʋ”.
48002016	Amaa an nyi fɛɛ ɩ man gyɛ Mosesi nbara mʋ kibuu sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ taa nyɩmɩsa fɛɛ, mʋ ɩkpa ii kyiigi, amɔɔ ɔ kɔɔlɛ Yesu Krisito gyii. Ɩmʋ sʋ, amɔɔ anɛ gbaa anɛ an kɔɔlɛ Krisito Yesu gyii, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ o wu anɛ fɛɛ anɛ ɩkpa ii kyiigi lɩɩ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ an sʋ Krisito tɔ, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ nbara mʋ kibuu sʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋ man bʋ tɔ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ i wu fɛɛ maa buu nbara mʋ sʋ nɩɩ mʋ ɩkpa ii kyiigi.
48002017	Nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ anɛ kɩbɔla Krisito sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ i wu fɛɛ anɛ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ an wu fɛɛ anɛ gbaa anɛ an gyɛ alibi awaapʋ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ, ɩnɩmʋ ɩɩ kaapʋ nɩn fɛɛ Krisito sa alibi kɩwaa ɔlʋn tii sʋ nɩn abɛɛ? Ayee! Ɩ man gyɛ kanɩn!
48002018	Nɩɩ n kan kina nbara mʋ, nɩɩ n bwii n kyiŋi ɩmʋ mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ n tɩyɛ alibi tɔ.
48002019	Lɩɩ fɛɛ n maa buu nbara mʋ, n wu fɛɛ ɩ mɛɛ sa nkpa. Ɩmʋ sʋ n wu sa nbara mʋ, kɛ n nyɛ kyɩna sa Ɩbwaarɛ.
48002020	Nɩɩ ɩ waa nɩn fɛɛ n maa Krisito nɩɩ ba daa mata oyu laasa sʋ. Nɩɩ n man bɩla n tɛ sa mɛ n‐yɩɩ, amaa Krisito Kayaayu mʋ kɩ bʋ mɛ tɔ. Nɩɩ kakyɩna mʋ nɩɩ n tɛ kɩmʋ tɔ nbɩɩnbɩɩ falɛ mʋ, kɩkɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐Bii gyii mʋ tɔ nɩɩ n tɛ, mʋ ii biti mɛ asɩn, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ nkpa yɩla sa mɛ.
48002021	Nɩɩ n man taa Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ yɩla ɩkaa sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ gyɛ nbara mʋ kɩbɔla sʋ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa ɩkpa ii biti i kyiigi Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ ɩ kaapʋ nɩn fɛɛ Krisito kelewu mʋ man tiri.
48003001	Fanɛ Galati abi nfɛɛrɛ ɩ man fʋʋ fanɛ! Anɩmʋ ɩ waa fanɛ biila kanɩn? Fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ ansi tɔ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ bugi tɔ Yesu Krisito kelewu oyu laasa mʋ sʋ asɩn sa fanɛ.
48003002	Kʋtɔ kʋlʋn nɩɩ n biti n taasɛ fanɛ. Fan maa daa nyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ, Mosesi nbara kibuu mʋ sʋ nɩɩ fan nyɛ Kayaayu mʋ, abɛɛ fan maa nu asɩn danbɩrasa nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ sʋ nɩɩ fan nyɛ kɩmʋ?
48003003	Mɩnɛ nɩɩ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ man fʋʋ fanɛ kanɩn? Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu nɩɩ fan taa piili fanɛ Krisito kusun mʋ, amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan taa fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa ɔlʋn taa lʋwɛ?
48003004	Awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan wu falɛ kpini mʋ ɩ waa kɩyan nɩn abɛɛ? N kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ ɩ man waa kɩyan.
48003005	Fan nyi fɛɛ fan maa buu Mosesi nbara mʋ sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa fanɛ mʋ Kayaayu nɩɩ ɛɛ waa ɩsɩnkaala ɛɛ sa fanɛ mʋ, abɛɛ lɩɩ fan maa nu asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ gyii sʋ?
48003006	Ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Abraham kɩkɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gyii sʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kɔɔlɛ mʋ kyula fɛɛ mʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi.”
48003007	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan bɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gyii mʋ, ɩ gyɛ Abraham anaana‐bii gbaa‐gbaa.
48003008	Ba gyankpaa kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ fɛɛ lɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ kɔɔlɛ bamʋ kyula fɛɛ bamʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi. Kanɩn sʋ ɔ wʋla tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa Abraham yɛ, “Fʋ sʋ nɩɩ n biti n bɔla waa dulinyaa asa kpini kusee.”
48003009	Abraham maa kɔɔlɛ gyii sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ waa mʋ kusee. Ɩmʋ sʋ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ kpini, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ waa bamʋ kusee tii Abraham sʋ.
48003010	Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba taa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kpini gyaga nbara mʋ kibuu sʋ kɛ ba bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ ansi mʋ, ba bʋ Ɩbwaarɛ nnɔ kɩtɔwɛ mʋ tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kyaga sʋ ee buu kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Mosesi nbara ɔwʋlɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ nnɔ kɩtɔwɛ mʋ gyan bamʋ sʋ.”
48003011	I bugi tɔ kaapʋ kesintin fɛɛ, ɔkʋ man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɛɛ bɔla nbara kibuu mʋ sʋ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ o wu mʋ fɛɛ mʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ asɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ, ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ nɩɩ ɩkpa kyiigisa wuya ii biti ɔ nyɛ nkpa.”
48003012	Nbara mʋ kibuu man gyan kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ nbara mʋ ɩ kaapʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ nkpa lɩɩ ɩmʋ kibuu sʋ.”
48003013	Amaa nnɔ kɩtɔwɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyan anɛ sʋ fɛɛ a maa man buu nbara mʋ, Krisito ka ɩmʋ kʋkɔ. Maa wu oyu laasa sʋ mʋ, ɔ kɔɔlɛ kɔnɔ tɔwɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyan anɛ sʋ mʋ sʋla. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ nnɔ waa ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ saa oyu sʋ mʋ.”
48003014	Krisito ka anɛ alibi kʋkɔ, kɛ kusee mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ waa Abraham mʋ, ɩ nyɛ bɔla Krisito Yesu sʋ taa ba sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ gbaa, taa lɩɩ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ mʋ, a nyɛ Kayaayu mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɛ ee biti ɔ sa mʋ.
48003015	Mɛ bɩrɩsa ana Krisito abuupu, n biti n taa dulinyaa kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ asɩn kaala asɩn nɩmʋ. Nɩɩ asa kʋ ba kan bɔ ntan yɩla bamʋ nsana mʋ, ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ nyita ɩmʋ abɛɛ ɔ taa kʋtɔ kʋ tii sʋ.
48003016	Ɩbwaarɛ maa da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ sa Abraham maa mʋ kanaana‐bii mʋ, ba man kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “fʋ anaana‐bii,” nɩɩ ɩmʋ ii biti ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ asa mʋ ba kyɔ. Amaa asɩn mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “fʋ kanaana‐bii,” nɩɩ ɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ mʋ kanaana‐bii kʋlʋn, nɩɩ obii maŋa ɩ gyɛ Krisito.
48003017	Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n kaapʋ mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ sa Abraham. Nɩɩ nsu ana yɛ adɩsa kamaa tɔ pɔyɩ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa nbara mʋ, amaa nbara mʋ ɩ man taalɛ nyita abɛɛ kpayɩ katɔwɛ kyula mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ waa yɩla mʋ.
48003018	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ gyɛ nbara mʋ kibuu sʋ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa ii biti ɔ nyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kusee mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ, ɩ man gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ kɩda mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɩ bɩla ɩ gyan. Amaa lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ bɔla mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ kɩda mʋ sʋ taa kusee sa Abraham.
48003019	Nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kanɩn bɩrɛ, mɩnɛ sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa nbara mʋ? Ɩbwaarɛ daa taa nbara mʋ nɩn tii sʋ kɛ ɩ kaapʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ alibi ɩ gyɛ. Ɩ dagaa nbara mʋ maa kyɩna naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Abraham kanaana‐bii mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɩla sa mʋ mʋ, ɔ ba. Ɩbwaarɛ taa nbara mʋ bɔla mʋ nbɔɔ sʋ taa sa Mosesi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ maa asa nsana mʋ abaa tɔ.
48003020	Amaa nɩɩ ɩ dan ɩ gyɛ nyɩmɩsa kʋlʋn mʋ, nsana ɔyɩlɛpʋ man tiri. Ɩbwaarɛ bɩrɛ gyɛ ɔkʋlʋn nɩn.
48003021	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩɩ kaapʋ nɩn fɛɛ, nbara mʋ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ kɩda mʋ, mɛɛ kyɩna abaa sʋ nɩn abɛɛ? Ayee, man gyɛ kanɩn nɩn kpini‐kpini! Lɩɩ fɛɛ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa daa nyɛ nbara kʋ nɩɩ ɩ taalɛ sa nyɩmɩsa nkpa mʋ, naafɔɔ kanɩn nbara maŋa kibuu ɩ taalɛ yɛgɛ nyɩmɩsa ɩkpa i kyiigi Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ.
48003022	Amaa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, dulinyaa asa kpini ba bʋ alibi kɩbaa tɔ nɩn. Ɩmʋ sʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɛ ee biti ɔ sa mʋ, gyan Yesu Krisito kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ, nɩɩ ee biti ɔ taa sa.
48003023	Pɔyɩ kɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ kɩ ba mʋ, nbara mʋ ɩ dan nyan anɛ waa tɔ nɩn fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba tii bamʋ obu biri sʋ, naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ kɩ ba lɩɩ ifuli.
48003024	Ɩmʋ sʋ nbara mʋ ɩ kyɩna ɩ gyɛ anɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Krisito ba. Saamʋ, bɔla lɩɩ anɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti o wu fɛɛ anɛ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ asɛ.
48003025	Nbɩɩnbɩɩ kɩkɔɔlɛ Krisito gyii maa ba falɛ bɩrɛ, a man bɩla an bʋ nbara mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ anɛ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ kasɛ.
48003026	Kpalɩ fɛɛ fan maa kɔɔlɛ Krisito Yesu gyii sʋ mʋ, fanɛ kpini fan gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii ana.
48003027	Nɩɩ fanɛ kpini mʋ nɩɩ ba gyee fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee waa Krisito lɛɛ mʋ, ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ Krisito kudubi mʋ bʋ fanɛ tɔ.
48003028	Ɩmʋ sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ bɩrɛ, ɩ man bɩla ɩ bʋ tɔ fɛɛ akʋ ba gyɛ Gyiwu abi abɛɛ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi, abɛɛ akʋ ba gyɛ anyɛ abɛɛ akʋ ba gyɛ ndɛ abi, abɛɛ akʋ ba gyɛ anyɩn abɛɛ ba gyɛ akyɩɩ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ kpini fan gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn Krisito Yesu tɔ.
48003029	Nɩɩ fan kan fan gyɛ Krisito lɛɛ mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ fan gyɛ Abraham anaana‐bii, nɩɩ fen biti fan nyɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ sa Abraham mʋ.
48004001	Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, kebii‐pii mʋ nɩɩ ee biti o gyii mʋ‐sɛ kapatɩyɛ nɩɩ ɔ man pɩɩ dan, nɩɩ halɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa maa gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ gbaa mʋ, ɔ man kwɩɩ yɛ kɩnyɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ mʋ.
48004002	Maa san ɔ gyɛ kebii‐pii mʋ, ɔ sʋ asa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kɩɩ mʋ sʋ, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kɩɩ mʋ atɔ mʋ sʋ bɛɛ sa mʋ, naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ mʋ‐sɛ yɩla mʋ yɛ o gyii kapatɩyɛ mʋ.
48004003	Kanɩn nɩɩ anɛ gbaa anɛ an daa an du fɛɛ nbii mʋ nɩɩ anɛ anaana‐tɔ yɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ atɔ kaapʋsa, ɩɩ nyan anɛ fɛɛ anyɛ.
48004004	Amaa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɩla kyɛɛkyɛɛ maa fʋʋ mʋ, o sun mʋ gbaa‐gbaa Mu‐Bii dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ kʋʋgɛ mʋ Gyiwu obii waa nbara mʋ tɔ,
48004005	kɛ ɔ nyɛ kɔɔlɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ nbara mʋ kasɛ mʋ yɛgɛ, kɛ anɛ kpini an nyɛ ba biliŋi Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii ana.
48004006	Lɩɩ fan maa gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii ana sʋ mʋ, o sun Mu‐Bii Kayaayu mʋ ɔ ba kyɩna fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ. Kayaayu mʋ ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ an taalɛ tɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ, “Aba abɛɛ Ɔsɛ.”
48004007	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan man bɩla fan gyɛ anyɛ, amaa fan gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii ana nɩn. Nɩɩ fan maa gyɛ mu‐bii ana falɛ bɩrɛ, fan gyɛ mʋ kapatɩyɛ mʋ agyipu.
48004008	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fan man nyi Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, fan gyɛ anyɛ sa ɩdakpa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ anyɩrɩpɛ kʋ.
48004009	Amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ fan maa bɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ falɛ, abɛɛ n tɔwɛ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ bɩrɛ ɩ ba bɩɩ fanɛ falɛ mʋ, nɛnɛ sʋ nɩɩ fɛn bɩla bwii naa buu kanɩn ɩdakpa atɔ kaapʋsa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ ɔlʋn kʋ, nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ tɔnɔ? Fen biti fan bɩla biliŋi anyɛ sa ɩmʋ nɩn abɛɛ?
48004010	Fan sʋ kensi‐gyii nkɛ sa Gyiwu abi nkɛ nkʋ, yɛ ɩbwaayɩ ɩkʋ, yɛ ɩsaŋa ɩkʋ, yɛ nsu nkʋ.
48004011	Fanɛ asɩn ɩ sʋ mɛ kufuu, nɩɩ n fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ akʋtɔ mɛ kɩkpɩnɛ mʋ nɩɩ n kpɩnɛ fanɛ sʋ falɛ ii biti ɩ waa kɩyan.
48004012	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, n kʋlɛ fanɛ nɩn fɛɛ fan baa fan du fɛɛ mɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ngbaa n maa gyɛ Gyiwu obii mʋ, n ba waa mɛ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ. Nɩɩ fan man waa mɛ alibi akʋ.
48004013	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan nyi mʋ, lɩɩ mɛ kʋlɔ sʋ nɩɩ n gyankpaa ba tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa fanɛ.
48004014	Halɩɩ mɛ kʋlɔ kɩ maa gyɛ kasʋla sa fanɛ gbaa mʋ, fan man lɛɛ fanɛ ansi yɛgɛ mɛ, nɩɩ fan man kina mɛ. Amaa fan kɔɔlɛ mɛ abaa anyɔ fɛɛ n maa gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ, abɛɛ n maa gyɛ Krisito Yesu gbaa‐gbaa mʋ.
48004015	Nɩɩ kanɩn saŋa maa mʋ, kensi‐gyii lala bʋ fanɛ tɔ lɩɩ mɛ sʋ. Nɩɩ n taalɛ n tɔwɛ gbaa yɛ, nɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fɛn taalɛ nɩn, naafɔɔ fɛn kyɔlɛ fanɛ ansi gbaa fan sa mɛ. Nɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ, mɩnɛ ɩ waa?
48004016	N ba biliŋi fanɛ dʋn lɩɩ kesintin mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ n sa fanɛ mʋ sʋ nɩn abɛɛ?
48004017	Nɩɩ kanɩn asa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kaapʋ fanɛ asɩn kʋkwɩɩ mʋ bɩrɛ, bamʋ ansi ɩ payɩ fanɛ sʋ, amaa bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ man bʋrɔn. Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ bee biti mʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, ba barɩgɛ fanɛ lɩɩ mɛ asɛ, kɛ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan baa fen nu bamʋ asɛ.
48004018	Ɩ bʋrɔn fɛɛ fanɛ ansi ɩ maa payɩ lɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋ sʋ, nɩɩ kʋtɔ maa gyɛ kʋtɔ danbɩrasa, kɛ ɩ man naa waa fɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ fanɛ asɛ mʋ nkʋn, amaa saŋa kʋmaa.
48004019	Mi‐bii ana danbɩrasa, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ keduŋidi ɩɩ kɩtaa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ɩ bɩla ɩɩ waa mɛ sa fanɛ, naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Krisito kudubi mʋ ki loo bɔla fanɛ tɔ.
48004020	N daa biti nɩn fɛɛ n san n bʋ fanɛ asɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ, naafɔɔ n nyɛ kyɛɛgɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ ɔlʋn sʋ n sa fanɛ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ tɔɔrɔɔ mɛ fanɛ sʋ.
48004021	Fan yɛgɛ n taasɛ fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan buu nbara mʋ. Fan man nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ nbara mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ mʋ kasɛ nɩn abɛɛ?
48004022	Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, Abraham sʋ nbii‐nyɩnsa anyɔ, kɩnyɛ Haga mu‐bii ɩ gyɛ ɔkʋ, nɩɩ odibii Sara mɔɔ mu‐bii gyɛ ɔkʋ.
48004023	Obii mʋ nɩɩ kɩnyɛ‐kyɩɩ kʋʋgɛ mʋ, mʋ kakʋʋgɛ du nɩn fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ daadimaadi kʋʋgɛ obii mʋ, amaa odibii mu‐bii mʋ bɩrɛ, ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ bɔla asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ tɔwɛ yɩla mʋ sʋ nɩn.
48004024	Falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ asɩn kaalasa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ sʋ kasɛ. Akyɩɩ anyɔ mʋ ba yɩlɛ sa ntɔwɛ‐kyula anyɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ waa maa asa nsana mʋ. Kɩnyɛ‐kyɩɩ Haga ɩ yɩlɛ sa katɔwɛ kyula mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ waa Sinayi kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ nbii mʋ nɩɩ Haga kʋʋgɛ mʋ gyɛ anyɛ nɩn.
48004025	Nɩɩ Haga ɩ yɩlɛ sa Sinayi kɩbɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Arabiya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ kɩ bɩla yɩlɛ sa ndaga Gyerusalem kadɛ lala mʋ, nɩɩ kɩmaa kɩmʋ asa kpini ba gyɛ anyɛ nɩn.
48004026	Amaa sʋsʋ Gyerusalem mʋ bɩrɛ gyɛ odibii‐kyɩɩ, nɩɩ mʋ ɩ gyɛ anɛ‐nyi.
48004027	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “O ogbentipu‐kyɩɩ, fʋ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ man kʋʋgɛ kɩɩ, yɛgɛ ɩ waa fʋ ɔkɔn, fʋ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ man pɩɩta duŋi kɩɩ mʋ, taa kensi‐gyii lala kuusi waa ɩlawʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ mu‐kuli sɩlɛ yɛgɛ mʋ mʋ, ii biti ɔ nyɛ nbii ɔ kyɔ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ mu‐kuli man sɩlɛ yɛgɛ mʋ.”
48004028	Ɩmʋ sʋ mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, fan gyɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɩla pɔyɩ nɩɩ Sara ba kʋʋgɛ Isaki mʋ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan gyɛ.
48004029	Kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ, obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ daadimaadi kakʋʋgɛ ɩkpa sʋ mʋ, nyanla obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kayaayu ɔlʋn tɔ mʋ. Nɩɩ kanɩn nɩɩ i du nbɩɩnbɩɩ gbaa.
48004030	Amaa mɩnɛ asɩn nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ mʋ? Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “Gya kɩnyɛ‐kyɩɩ mʋ maa mu‐bii‐nyɩnsa mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ kɩnyɛ‐kyɩɩ mu‐bii maa odibii‐kyɩɩ mʋ mu‐bii ba mɛɛ bʋga bee gyii ɔsɛ mʋ kapatɩyɛ.”
48004031	Ɩmʋ sʋ mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, an man gyɛ kɩnyɛ‐kyɩɩ mʋ mu‐bii ana nɩn, amaa an gyɛ odibii‐kyɩɩ mʋ mu‐bii ana nɩn.
48005001	Krisito kɔɔlɛ anɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ an nyɛ anɛ n‐yɩɩ. Kanɩn sʋ fan yɩlɛ tɔ kenken, kɛ fan man bɩla yɛgɛ ba taa fanɛ waa nbara mʋ kibuu anyɛ.
48005002	Fan nu! Mɛ Pɔɔlɩ n gyii fanɛ kesintin fɛɛ nɩɩ fan kan yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba tɩŋɛ fanɛ iduu mʋ, ɩ bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ ansi mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ Krisito man bɩla ɔ sʋ kyaarɛ sa fanɛ kpini‐kpini.
48005003	N bɩla n da fanɛ amu tɔ yɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba tɩn mʋ oduu mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ ɩ dagaa maa buu nbara mʋ kpini.
48005004	Fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fɛɛ fan buu nbara mʋ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ o wu fɛɛ fanɛ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ asɛ mʋ, fan barɩgɛ lɩɩ Krisito asɛ, nɩɩ fan lɛɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ tɔ.
48005005	Amaa anɛɛnɛ bɩrɛ, Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ yɛgɛ nɩɩ an sʋ tamaa an gyoo Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ kɔɔlɛ anɛ kyula fɛɛ, anɛ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ asɛ lɩɩ anɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ.
48005006	Lɩɩ fɛɛ, a maa buu Krisito Yesu falɛ mʋ, an tɩŋɛ iduu‐o, an man tɩŋɛ iduu‐o, man gyɛ ɩmʋ i tiri. Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri ɩ gyɛ yɛ Krisito kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ an nyɛ kebiti sa abaa.
48005007	Naafɔɔ fan kyɩna fan yɩlɛ tɔ danbɩrasa. Anɩmʋ i fun waa fanɛ nɩɩ fan yɛgɛ kesintin ɔkpa mʋ kibuu?
48005008	N nyi fɛɛ man gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ fanɛ yɛ fan ba waa mʋ lɛɛ mʋ, ɩ waa kanɩn.
48005009	Fan nyiŋi fɛɛ, “Bodobodo inyifo kɩfa‐tinsa gbɛrɛɛ ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ bodobodo inyifo mʋ kpini i tin.”
48005010	N kɔɔlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ gyii fɛɛ, fan man yɛ fan kyɛɛgɛ naa buu ɔkpa pʋpwɛ kʋ. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee nyita fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ maŋa mʋ, ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ bɩɩtɛ mʋ kʋsʋ.
48005011	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, nɩɩ n kan n kaapʋ yɛ iduu kɩtɩn ɩ gyɛ asɩn tirisa nɩn, naafɔɔ mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ Gyiwu abi ba san bɛɛ nyanla mɛ? Nɩɩ ɩ daa ɩ gyɛ kanɩn nɩn, naafɔɔ Krisito kiwu oyu laasa sʋ asɩn mʋ, man dɩn bɩya asɩn kʋ.
48005012	N biti fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔɔrɔɔ fanɛ lɩɩ iduu kɩtɩn sʋ mʋ, naafɔɔ ba lɛɛ bamʋ awɛɛ tii bamʋ iduu kɩtɩn sʋ!
48005013	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, fanɛ bɩrɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ kɔɔlɛ fanɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fan nyɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ kanɩn Mosesi nbara kibuu mʋ tɔ. Amaa fan man kan yɛgɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kɩnyɛ mʋ kɩ sa fanɛ ɔkpa, kɛ fanɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kayalaga mʋ ki gyii fanɛ sʋ. Amaa fan taa kebiti sun abaa.
48005014	Mosesi nbara mʋ kpini ɩ lɩɩ kɔnɔsa kʋlʋn tɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Biti fʋ bɩrɩsa fɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ.”
48005015	Nɩɩ fan kan fan du fɛɛ ndʋnbwɛ nɩɩ fen duŋi nɩɩ fɛn larɩgɛ abaa mʋ, fan baa fan da sʋ, man gyɛ kanɩn mʋ fen biti fan mɔɔ abaa.
48005016	Ɩmʋ sʋ n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, fan yɛgɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ɔ kaapʋ fanɛ ɔkpa, kɛ fan man nyɛ buu fanɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kayalaga.
48005017	Lɩɩ fɛɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Kayaayu mʋ ii biti mʋ, mɛɛ kyɩna yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ ɩɩ yalaga mʋ, nɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ ɩɩ yalaga mʋ gbaa mɛɛ kyɩna yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Kayaayu mʋ ii biti mʋ. Bɛɛ kɔ yɛ abaa saŋa kʋmaa, ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋlʋn fɛɛ fan waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fen biti mʋ.
48005018	Amaa nɩɩ fan yɛgɛ nɩɩ Kayaayu mʋ kaapʋ fanɛ ɔkpa mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ fan man bʋ nbara mʋ kasɛ.
48005019	Kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ asun libi ɩ mɛɛ baala. Ɩmʋ ɩkʋ ɩ gyɛ kɩlɩɩ okuli abɛɛ ɔkaa kamaa, yɛ kɩgyagaa ineesi, yɛ kabʋrʋkɔɔnɛ,
48005020	yɛ ɩdakpa kusun, yɛ akpa‐sɩn, yɛ kekisi, yɛ keluu, yɛ kayɩɩ‐basa, yɛ kɩnyɛ agbʋ, yɛ mɛ nkʋn n nyɛ, yɛ nbarɩgɛ tɔ, yɛ nfɛɛrɛ kɩfɛ fɛɛ mɛ nkʋn asɩn ɩ bʋrɔn.
48005021	Ɩkʋ mɔɔ ɩ gyɛ yɛ kensi payɩ libi, yɛ kata‐bʋʋ, yɛ kensi‐gyii kɩbansa, yɛ alibi kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ i tii sʋ. N da fanɛ amu tɔ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n wʋla da fanɛ amu tɔ mʋ yɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ falɛ kakyɩna tɔ mʋ, mɛɛ yɛ ɔ nyɛ loo Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ.
48005022	Amaa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ asa bɛɛ waa mʋ ɩ gyɛ kebiti, yɛ kensi‐gyii, yɛ keyuula, yɛ kenyiita, yɛ kʋwɛɛ kuwu, yɛ kɩdanbɩrasa kɩwaa, yɛ kesintin kigyii,
48005023	yɛ kɩbwahn kɩwaa, yɛ n‐yɩɩ kɩkɩta. Nbara kʋ man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɩɩ kɔ ii tii ɩnɩmʋ.
48005024	Bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ Krisito Yesu asa mʋ bɩrɛ, ba taa bamʋ alibi kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kayalaga yɛ kɩmʋ kɔkɔlɔ biti mʋ da mata oyu laasa mʋ sʋ mɔɔ ɩmʋ kpini.
48005025	Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ maa sa anɛ kakyɩna pʋpwɛ falɛ bɩrɛ, fan yɛgɛ kɛ ɔ gyankpaa anɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ.
48005026	Fan man yɛgɛ kɛ a kaapʋ anɛ n‐yɩɩ, kɛ a man waa anɛ bɩrɩsa ana agbʋ‐sɩn, kɛ fan man kɔ abaa kɔkʋrʋkɔ.
48006001	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, nɩɩ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ kan tɩyɛ alibi tɔ mʋ, fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan buu Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ ɔkpa kyɛɛkyɛɛ sʋ mʋ, fan taa kebiti kyɛ mʋ tɔ, kɛ o bwii ba ɔkpa danbɩrasa mʋ sʋ. Amaa fan kɩɩ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ danbɩrasa, kɛ Sɩtaanɛ ɔ man nyɛ ɔkpa tʋʋ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ tɔ kɩɩ.
48006002	Fan yɛgɛ fanɛ bɩrɩsa ana asɩn ɩ baa ɩ gyɛ fanɛ asɩn. Nɩɩ fan kan waa kanɩn mʋ, ɩmʋ ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ fen gyii Krisito nbara nɩmʋ sʋ.
48006003	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan fɛ nfɛɛrɛ yɛ ɔ gyɛ kʋtɔ kʋ, yɛgɛ ɔ man gyɛ sɛhn mʋ, ɛɛ pɩna mʋ n‐yɩɩ nɩn.
48006004	Ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ kɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ awaasa i du. Nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ bʋrɔn mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ ɛɛ taalɛ kaapʋ mʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ awaasa mʋ sʋ, yɛgɛ ɔ man taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaala ɔkʋ lɛɛ.
48006005	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ dagaa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ maa sʋla mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ kasʋla.
48006006	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kaapʋ mʋ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ, ɩ dagaa maa kyɛ mʋ ɔkaapʋpʋ mʋ tɔ, lɩɩ atɔ danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ.
48006007	Fan man pɩna fanɛ n‐yɩɩ. Ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ sisii Ɩbwaarɛ. Kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa duu mʋ, kɩmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɩŋɛ.
48006008	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee duu kɛ o gyii mu alibi kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ ansi mʋ, mʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ maŋa tɔ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ tɩŋɛ lewu, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee duu kɛ o gyii Kayaayu mu ansi mʋ, Kayaayu maŋa tɔ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ nyɛ nkpa kakpaa.
48006009	A man yɛgɛ kɩdanbɩrasa kɩwaa o fii anɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ nɩɩ an man kan yɛgɛ ɩmʋ kɩwaa mʋ, kakaakʋ an biti a ba gyii ɩmʋ tɔnɔ.
48006010	Ɩmʋ sʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an nyɛ ɩmʋ ɔkpa falɛ, fan yɛgɛ kɛ a waa kɩdanbɩrasa sa asa kpini, fɔnfɔn bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ anɛ bɩrɩsa ana akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ.
48006011	Yɛ fan wu akyʋrɔɔ‐bi lala nɩmʋ? Mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ kɩbaa nɩɩ n taa kyʋrɔɔ ɩmʋ nfɩɩ bɩya fanɛ!
48006012	Bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti yɛ asa ba wu bamʋ ifuli sʋ kɩdanbɩrasa mʋ, ɩɩ nyan fanɛ yɛ fan tɩŋɛ fanɛ iduu. Kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa kanɩn ɩ gyɛ yɛ, be mee biti ba tɔwɛ Krisito kelewu oyu laasa mʋ sʋ asɩn, kɛ ɔkʋ nyanla bamʋ.
48006013	Halɩɩ Gyiwu abi ba maa buu iduu kɩtɩn gbaa mʋ, be mee buu Gyiwu abi nbara mʋ. Amaa bee biti yɛ fan tɩŋɛ fanɛ iduu, kɛ ba nyɛ kaapʋ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ fan nu bamʋ katɔwɛ.
48006014	Amaa mɛ bɩrɛ, n mɛɛ kaapʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ, amɔɔ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kelewu oyu laasa mʋ sʋ nkʋn, nɩɩ kɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ dulinyaa atɔ man gyɛ sɛhn mi ansi sʋ, nɩɩ ngbaa n man bɩla n gyɛ sɛhn dulinyaa tɔ.
48006015	Nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa tɩn oduu oo, ɔ man tɩn oduu nɩn oo, man gyɛ ɩmʋ i tiri. Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri mʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ Krisito sa anɛ kɩbaabʋtɔ pʋpwɛ.
48006016	Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ kɩbaabʋtɔ pʋpwɛ nɩɩ bee buu ɩmʋ asɩn mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ keyuula yɛ mʋ kʋwɛɛ kuwu i bun bamʋ sʋ, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ kpini sʋ.
48006017	Lɩɩ ndaga ɩɩ sʋ ii kpee mʋ, ɔkʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔkʋ ɔ man bɩla sa mɛ tɔɔrɔɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ alɔpanɛ mʋ nɩɩ n nyɛ lɩɩ Yesu sʋ mʋ, ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ n gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ.
48006018	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kabwaala mʋ kɩ baa kɩ bʋ fanɛ kpini asɛ. Amen.
49001001	Mɛ, Pɔɔlɩ mʋ nɩɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti sʋ nɩɩ n ba waa Krisito Yesu osunpu mʋ, ɩ kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ n bɩya fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asa, nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ Krisito Yesu gyii kesintin tɔ, nɩɩ fan bʋ Efeso kadɛ tɔ mʋ.
49001002	Anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito ba bwaala fanɛ kɛ ba sa fanɛ kayɩɩ‐yuuli.
49001003	Fan yɛgɛ a fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito Mʋ‐Sɛ. Kpalɩ fɛɛ a maa waa kʋkʋlʋn yɛ Krisito mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ taa kusee kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ mʋ ayɛ sʋsʋ mʋ bwaala anɛ.
49001004	Pɔyɩ kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ tʋʋ dulinyaa mʋ, ɔ bɔla anaa Krisito kɩwaa kʋkʋlʋn mʋ sʋ lɛɛ anɛ waa mʋ lɛɛ, kɛ a ba waa asa mʋ nɩɩ a man sʋ alibi abɛɛ asɩn pwɩɩsa kʋ mʋ asɛ. Lɩɩ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ sa anɛ sʋ mʋ,
49001005	o ŋmina yɩla yɛ, bɔla Yesu Krisito sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ taa anɛ biliŋi mu‐bii ana. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ biti.
49001006	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan yɛgɛ an yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ kabwaala damantɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ bɔla mu‐Bii bitisa mʋ sʋ bwaala anɛ atɔ kpini.
49001007	Lɩɩ mu‐Bii Yesu nkalan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɛɛgɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, an nyɛ anɛ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ maa taa anɛ alibi kɛɛ anɛ, nɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ kabwaala lala mʋ sʋ mʋ,
49001008	ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ an nyɛ kanyaasɩn yɛ kinyi.
49001009	Asɩn baalasa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ŋmina yɩla mʋ, nbɩɩnbɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ ɩmʋ kaapʋ anɛ. Ɩmʋ nɩɩ o ŋmina kpini yɩlɛ Yesu Krisito sʋ lɩɩ koo dɩdaa kanan mʋ nɩɩ ee biti.
49001010	Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ŋmina yɩla mʋ, nɩɩ ɩmʋ saŋa kyɛɛkyɛɛ kan fʋʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ taa kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ sʋ bʋga tɔ, kɛ Krisito ɔ waa ɩmʋ kpini kumu.
49001011	Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ ɩ waa, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla ŋmina yɩla, nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ anaa Krisito kɩwaa kʋkʋlʋn sʋ mʋ, ɔ wʋla lɛɛ anɛ lɩɩ koo npiili asɛ yɛ a ba waa mʋ asa lɩɩ mu kebiti mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla ŋmina yɩla mʋ sʋ.
49001012	Saamʋ, anɛ mʋ nɩɩ an gyankpaa an sʋ tamaa Krisito tɔ mʋ, a yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ bʋnyaa mʋ.
49001013	Kanɩn nɩɩ i du sa fanɛ. Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fan nu kesintin asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ asɩn danbɩrasa, nɩɩ ɩ bɩya fanɛ kamɔlɩgɛ mʋ, fan kɔɔlɛ Krisito gyii, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa mu keduligi gyaga fanɛ sʋ. Kɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɩla yɛ ee biti ɔ sa fanɛ mʋ.
49001014	Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa yɩla kasɛ, fɛɛ an biti a nyɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɛ ee biti ɔ sa mʋ asa mʋ. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ anɛ tamaa fɛɛ anɛ mʋ nɩɩ an gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ, an biti an nyɛ anɛ n‐yɩɩ. Fan yɛgɛ a yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ bʋnyaa mʋ.
49001015	Falɛ sʋ, lɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n nu fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu gyii, yɛ fanɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ sa Ɩbwaarɛ asa mʋ,
49001016	n man yɛgɛ afwaala kɩtaa sa Ɩbwaarɛ mɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ tɔ lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ. Nɩɩ n nyiŋi fanɛ sʋ,
49001017	n kʋlɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ bʋnyaa wuya mʋ yɛ, ɔ sa fanɛ mʋ Kayaayu mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ sa fanɛ kanyaasɩn, kɛ ɔ lɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kaapʋ fanɛ, kɛ fan nyɛ bɩɩ mʋ danbɩrasa.
49001018	N bɩla n kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ o bugi fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ, kɛ fan nyɛ bɩɩ tamaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ fanɛ kɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, yɛ bʋnyaa kapatɩyɛ kparɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɛ ee biti ɔ sa mʋ asa mʋ.
49001019	N kʋlɛ mʋ yɛ ɔ yɛgɛ fan bɩɩ mʋ ɔlɔn kparɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa waa anɛ mʋ nɩɩ an kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii mʋ tɔ. Ɔlʋn lala nɩmʋ man sʋ bɩrɩsa,
49001020	nɩɩ ɔlʋn maŋa nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ kaapʋ Krisito tɔ fɛɛ maa kyiŋi mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ kyɩna mʋ kɩbaa gyisa sʋ sʋsʋ.
49001021	Nɩɩ Krisito ii gyii kuwura awura yɛ alʋnpʋ yɛ kɩnyɩn kigyii yɛ anyɩrɩpɛ kpini sʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ sʋ ɔlʋn kparɛ ɔ kyɔ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ sʋ kɩtɩɩ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ yɛ kɩmʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ ba ba mʋ tɔ.
49001022	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ waa Krisito kasɛ, nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ ba waa kumu sa mʋ kʋbʋ mʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa tɔ.
49001023	Kʋbʋ mʋ kpini ɩ gyɛ Krisito kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ, nɩɩ mʋ ɩ gyɛ kumu sa kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ, nɩɩ mʋ ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ ɩɩ lʋwɛ kyɛɛkyɛɛ ɔkpa kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ.
49002001	Fanɛ fanɛ naafɔɔ fan kyɩna fan du nɩn fɛɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba wu mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan waa Ɩbwaarɛ kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn yɛ alibi.
49002002	Kanɩn saŋa maŋa fanɛ kakyɩna tɔ mʋ, fan kyɩna fan buu dulinyaa nɩmʋ awaasa, nɩɩ fan buu n‐yaayu libi kpini owura mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ asa tɔ ee sun kusun nbɩɩnbɩɩ, nɩɩ be mee nu bɛɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ.
49002003	Anɛ kpini an kyɩna an du fɛɛ bamʋ saŋa kʋ tɔ, yɛgɛ an bʋ anɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kɩpɩrɛ tɔ, nɩɩ an buu ɩmʋ kayalaga yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ anɛ nkɔlɔ ii biti mʋ. Naafɔɔ anɛ kpini an tii bamʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ dɛ o gyoo bamʋ mʋ sʋ.
49002004	Amaa lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti lala mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ sa anɛ yɛ mʋ kʋwɛɛ kuwu kʋkyɔ mʋ sʋ mʋ,
49002005	anɛ mʋ nɩɩ an kyɩna an du fɛɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba waa Ɩbwaarɛ kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn mʋ, ɔ bɔla Krisito sʋ sa anɛ nkpa. Lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ sʋ nɩɩ fan nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ.
49002006	Anaa Krisito Yesu kɩwaa kʋkʋlʋn sʋ mʋ, ɩ waa fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ bʋga kʋsaa anaa Yesu lɩɩ lewu tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ sa anɛ ɔkyɩnakpa Yesu asɛ sʋsʋ,
49002007	kɛ ɔ taa lɛɛ kaapʋ saŋa kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ fɛɛ mʋ kabwaala yɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ sa anɛ mʋ, ba mɛɛ taalɛ taa kaala sɛhn, lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu Krisito waa mʋ sʋ.
49002008	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɔlɩgɛ fanɛ kpalɩ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ awaasa sʋ, ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kakɛɛ nɩn.
49002009	Nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ ɔkʋ kusun sunsa sʋ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ, kɛ ɔkʋ ɔ man nyɛ kaapʋ mʋ n‐yɩɩ.
49002010	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ waa anɛ asa pʋpwɛ, nɩɩ anaa Krisito Yesu kɩwaa kʋkʋlʋn sʋ mʋ, ɔ tʋʋ anɛ yɛ a waa atɔ danbɩrasa, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla lɔŋɔ yɩla anɛ yɛ an waa mʋ.
49002011	Ɩmʋ sʋ fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan man gyɛ Gyiwu abi kakʋʋgɛ tɔ mʋ, Gyiwu abi mʋ bɛɛ tɩɩ fanɛ yɛ, “bamʋ nɩɩ ba man tɩŋɛ iduu,” nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ, “iduu atɩŋɛpʋ.” (Amaa ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ nyɩmɩsa awaasa mʋ nɩɩ ba waa ɩmʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ sʋ nɩn).
49002012	Fan nyiŋi fɛɛ kanɩn saŋa maŋa mʋ, fan man tii Krisito sʋ, fan kyɩna fan gyɛ afɔ kyilim nɩɩ fan man tii Ɩsɩrayɩ abi mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ fan man tii katɔwɛ kyula mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɩla mʋ sʋ, fan man nyi Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ fan man sʋ tamaa.
49002013	Amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ naafɔɔ fan kyɩna fan bʋ kata yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, fanaa Krisito fan waa kʋkʋlʋn, nɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ nkalan kɩkyɛɛgɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ bɩɩtɛ fanɛ tiri mʋ tɔ.
49002014	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Yesu gbaa‐gbaa ɩ bɩya anɛ keyuula nɩɩ mʋ ɩ taa Gyiwu abi yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ bʋga waa asa kʋlʋn. Nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kekisi mʋ nɩɩ kɩ barɩgɛ bamʋ nsana fɛɛ kɩbandɩyɛ mʋ tʋʋ.
49002015	Ɔ taa mʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ waa saraga tɩn Gyiwu abi nbara mʋ kibuu yɛ ɩmʋ kɩkaapʋ, kɛ ɔ nyɛ taa asa yiri ntun nnyɔ mʋ bʋga waa asa kʋlʋn yɛ mʋ Krisito. Ɔ waa kanɩn nɩn bɩya keyuula.
49002016	Nɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ kelewu oyu laasa mʋ sʋ mʋ, o nyita kekisi mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ bamʋ nsana mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ waa bamʋ kʋkʋlʋn. Nɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ kelewu mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ lɔŋɔ bamʋ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nsana.
49002017	Ɩmʋ sʋ Krisito ba, nɩɩ ɔ ba tɔwɛ keyuula asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan kyɩna fan bʋ kata yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, yɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ tiri Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ.
49002018	Nbɩɩnbɩɩ lɩɩ Krisito sʋ mʋ, anɛ mʋ nɩɩ an gyɛ Gyiwu abi yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ kpini, an taalɛ bɔla Kayaayu kʋlʋn mʋ sʋ ba Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ.
49002019	Kanɩn sʋ, fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ, fan man bɩla fan gyɛ afɔ kyilim yɛ ndɛndɛmandɛ abi, amaa fanaa Ɩbwaarɛ asa fan gyɛ ndɛ‐bii yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩkpaara sʋ asa nɩn,
49002020	nɩɩ fan du nɩn fɛɛ ɔpɔrɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba pɔyɩ gyaga kisibi mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ Krisito asunpu yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ Krisito Yesu gbaa‐gbaa ɩ gyɛ kɩmʋ kɩbɔntɔnbʋlɔntɔ kubuu kparɛ mʋ.
49002021	Nɩɩ mʋ ɩɩ sʋ obu mʋ katɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ bʋga tɔ, nɩɩ ɛɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ kii dii sʋsʋ kɩ ba waa kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ.
49002022	Fanaa Krisito kɩwaa kʋkʋlʋn sʋ mʋ, fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan man gyɛ Gyiwu abi nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ taa fanɛ bʋga yɛ asansa mʋ, kɛ fan ba waa mʋ Kayaayu mʋ ɔkyɩnakpa.
49003001	Lɩɩ falɛ sʋ, mɛ Pɔɔlɩ, mʋ nɩɩ ba tii mɛ obu Krisito Yesu sʋ, lɩɩ Krisito asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ n sa fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ sʋ mʋ, n kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ n sa fanɛ.
49003002	Kesintin tɔ fan nu yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa kusun nɩmʋ sa mɛ lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ.
49003003	Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ asɩn baalasa, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ kaapʋ mɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n wʋla kyʋrɔɔ ɩmʋ gbɛrɛɛ yɩla mʋ.
49003004	Nɩɩ fan kan kalɛ ɩmʋ mʋ, fen biti fan taalɛ wu fɛɛ n nu asɩn baalasa lɩɩ Krisito sʋ mʋ kasɛ.
49003005	Saamʋ dɩdaa mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ man lɛɛ asɩn maŋa kaapʋ dɩdaa asa mʋ, amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ ɔ bɔla mʋ Kayaayu mʋ sʋ lɛɛ kanɩn asɩn baalasa maŋa kaapʋ Krisito asunpu yɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ.
49003006	Asɩn baalasa mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, lɩɩ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sʋ mʋ, bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ bee biti ba ba nyɛ kusee damantɛ mʋ bʋga tii Gyiwu abi mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ kpini bee biti ba baa ba gyɛ asa kʋlʋn, kɛ ba nyɛ kusee atɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla Krisito Yesu sʋ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɩla mʋ.
49003007	Ɩbwaarɛ bwaala mɛ, lɩɩ mʋ ɔlʋn kusun mʋ sʋ waa mɛ asɩn danbɩrasa nɩmʋ osunpu.
49003008	Halɩɩ n maa man fʋʋ Ɩbwaarɛ asa mʋ tɔ kalʋwɛ asɛ gbaa mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ taa asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ kɩtɔwɛ bwaala mɛ yɛ, n tɔwɛ Krisito kusee mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ taa kala sɛhn mʋ, sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ.
49003009	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa waa mɛ kabaa tɔ yɛ, n yɛgɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ o wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ asɩn baalasa nɩmʋ ii sun kusun. Saamʋ dɩdaa mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tʋʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ mʋ taa asɩn mʋ baala,
49003010	kɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ ɔ nyɛ bɔla Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ sʋ lɛɛ mʋ kanyaasɩn damantɛ kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ mʋ kaapʋ nbɔɔ yɛ awura yɛ alʋnpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ.
49003011	Ɔ waa ɩnɩmʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla ŋmina yɩla lɩɩ npiili asɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ bɔla anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Krisito Yesu sʋ waa kanɩn.
49003012	Lɩɩ a maa waa kʋkʋlʋn yɛ Krisito, nɩɩ an kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii sʋ mʋ, an taalɛ yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ kɩnyɩn tɔ yɛgɛ a man sʋ kufuu.
49003013	Ɩmʋ sʋ n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, fan man yɛgɛ fanɛ abaa ɩ yɔɔ, lɩɩ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ n wu fanɛ sʋ falɛ. Ɩnɩmʋ ii biti ɩ bɩya fanɛ tɔnɔ.
49003014	Nɩɩ n kan fɛ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ waa sa fanɛ falɛ mʋ, n muŋa mɛ amulii sʋ n kʋlɛ anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ n sa fanɛ.
49003015	Mʋ tɔ nɩɩ yiri kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ kasɛ sʋ yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ kpini ɩ lɩɩ.
49003016	N kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ, lɩɩ mʋ bʋnyaa kparɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɔ bɔla mʋ Kayaayu mʋ sʋ, waa fanɛ kala ana ɔlʋn gaa.
49003017	Mɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, lɩɩ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ mʋ, Krisito ɔ ba kyɩna fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ. Nɩɩ n bɩla n kʋlɛ yɛ, fan nyɛ ilin kɛ fan yɩlɛ fanɛ kebiti tɔ kenken,
49003018	kɛ fan naa Ɩbwaarɛ asa mʋ kpini fan nyɛ ɔlʋn nu Krisito kebiti mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ ɔkaa nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ bɩrɩsa mʋ kasɛ.
49003019	Halɩɩ ɩ maa bʋ tɔ fɛɛ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ nu Krisito kebiti mʋ kasɛ lʋwɛ gbaa mʋ, n kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ ɔ yɛgɛ fan nu kebiti mʋ kasɛ, kɛ fanɛ kɩbaabʋtɔ kɩ baa ki du fɛɛ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa.
49003020	Fan yɛgɛ a yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ii sun kusun anɛ tɔ mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɛɛ taalɛ waa atɔ damantɛ ɔ kyɔ ɩmʋ nɩɩ an kʋlɛ mʋ, yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ a mɛɛ fɛ ɩmʋ nfɛɛrɛ gbaa mʋ.
49003021	Nɩɩ lɩɩ Krisito Yesu sʋ mʋ, mu abuupu mʋ kpini ba taa bʋnyaa bɛɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ lɩɩ ndaga ɩɩ sʋ ii kpee naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ ɔkaa. Amen!
49004001	Kanɩn sʋ, mɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba tii mɛ obu kpalɩ kusun mʋ nɩɩ n sun n sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ sʋ mʋ, n kʋlɛ fanɛ yɛ, fan kyɩna kakyɩna mʋ nɩɩ kɩ dagaa yɛ kɩtɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ fanɛ ba waa mʋ lɛɛ mʋ.
49004002	Fan baa fɛn bɩya fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ, kɛ fan baa fen du bɔhn, yɛgɛ fan sʋ kenyiita, nɩɩ lɩɩ kebiti sʋ mʋ fan man taa abaa asɩn waa fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ.
49004003	Fan bɔla fanɛ kayɩɩ yuuli mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋga fanɛ mʋ sʋ kpan fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kɩtaa kɔnɔ kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ sa fanɛ mʋ tɔ kenken.
49004004	Anɛ kpini an gyɛ fɛɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kʋlʋn nɩn, nɩɩ Kayaayu kʋlʋn kpen nɩɩ an sʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɩɩ anɛ ba tamaa kʋlʋn tɔ mʋ.
49004005	An sʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kʋlʋn nɩn, yɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kʋlʋn, yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee kʋlʋn.
49004006	An sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ anɛ kpini Ɔsɛ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ anɛ kpini Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, ɛɛ bɔla anɛ kpini sʋ ee sun kusun, nɩɩ ɔ bʋ anɛ kpini nkɔlɔ tɔ.
49004007	Amaa Krisito taa mʋ kabwaala nkɛɛ mʋ sa anɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ barɩgɛ tɔ yɩla mʋ.
49004008	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Ɔ maa dii kpee sʋsʋ legelege mʋ, ɔ taa bamʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔ nyɛ mʋ kpee nɩɩ ɔ kɛɛ asa atɔ damantɛ.”
49004009	Maa tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔ maa dii kpee sʋsʋ legelege” mʋ, kɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ nɛnɛ? Kɩmʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ pɔyɩ kɛ o dii kpee sʋsʋ mʋ, ɔ wʋla lɩɩ sʋsʋ nɩn ba kasɛ sʋ, kasɛ tɔ kasɛ tɔ.
49004010	Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ kpɩlɩgɛ ba kasɛ sʋ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o dii kpee sʋsʋ mʋ. O dii kpee sʋsʋ‐sʋsʋ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ kamaa, kɛ ɔ nyɛ ɔ bʋ kasɛ sʋ yɛ sʋsʋ katɩn kʋmaa.
49004011	Mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ sa nkɛɛ. Ɔ lɛɛ akʋ waa mu asunpu, nɩɩ ɔ waa akʋ mʋ atɔwɛpʋ, ɔ waa akʋ asɩn danbɩrasa atɔwɛpʋ, nɩɩ ɔ waa akʋ mɔɔ agyankpaapʋ yɛ akaapʋpʋ.
49004012	Krisito waa bamʋ kanɩn nɩn kɛ ba nyɛ lɔŋɔ Ɩbwaarɛ asa ba waa Krisito kusun mʋ, kɛ mʋ kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ mʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ kɩ nyɛ kɩɩ dan kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ,
49004013	naa fʋʋ fɛɛ anɛ kpini an nyɛ kɔnɔ kʋlʋn kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ, kɛ a bɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐Bii mʋ, kɛ a dan danbɩrasa naa lʋwɛ fɛɛ Krisito kudubi mʋ.
49004014	Saamʋ an man bɩla an gyɛ nbii kɛ asa ba nyɛ taa antɩŋɛsa kɩkaapʋ yɛ kigolongolon kɔnɔ tɔ kɔn pɩna anɛ kɛ anɛ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ baa i du fɛɛ afuu ɩmaa da nɩɩ apaa i kyenkpen tɔ mʋ.
49004015	Amaa a taa kebiti tɔwɛ kesintin asɩn mʋ, kɛ a dan ba waa fɛɛ Krisito ɔkpa kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ, nɩɩ mʋ ɩ gyɛ kumu mʋ.
49004016	Krisito sʋ nɩɩ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ abaafʋn‐abaafʋn mʋ ɩ kyaa abaa sʋ, nɩɩ ɩkyagakpa mʋ ɩɩ kɩtaa abaafʋn mʋ bʋga abaa tɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ kɩbaafʋn kʋmaa nɩmʋ waa kɩmʋ kusun yɛ ɔdan mʋ, kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ kpini ɩɩ dan nɩɩ ɩɩ nyɛ ɔlʋn kebiti tɔ.
49004017	Ɩmʋ sʋ n tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ, nɩɩ n yɩlɛ ɩmʋ sʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ yɛ, fan man kyɩna fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ be mee sun Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ. Falɛ asa nfɛɛrɛ ɩ man sʋ kyaarɛ.
49004018	Kitentenbiri ki bun bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ yɛ ba nyɛ nkpa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ ɛɛ sa mʋ, lɩɩ bamʋ kɩman nyi yɛ bamʋ nkɔlɔ ɔsɩɩ mʋ sʋ.
49004019	Lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ipeeli ɩ man bɩla ɩ bʋ bamʋ ansi sʋ mʋ, ba taa bamʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ bɛɛ waa asɩn gyaga kʋmaa nɩmʋ mʋ nɩɩ i gyii bamʋ amu.
49004020	Amaa fanɛɛ fanɛ bɩrɛ, man gyɛ ɩnɩmʋ nɩɩ fan bɩɩla lɩɩ Krisito sʋ.
49004021	N nyi fan maa nu mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ba kaapʋ fanɛ kesintin asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ Yesu tɔ mʋ.
49004022	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan yɛgɛ fanɛ kakyɩna dɩdaa mʋ fɔyɩ. Kakyɩna dɩdaa mʋ kayalaga daa kyɩna ɩɩ pɩna fanɛ nɩn, nɩɩ ii nyita fanɛ.
49004023	Nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fanɛ nkɔlɔ yɛ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ kpini i waa apʋpwɛ,
49004024	kɛ fan kyɩna kakyɩna pʋpwɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tʋʋ kɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩmʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi, nɩɩ i du kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ, nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ keduli mʋ.
49004025	Ɩmʋ sʋ fanɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ yɛgɛ atɩŋɛsa, kɛ fan baa fen gyii kesintin fɛn sa fanɛ bɩrɩsa ana. Lɩɩ fɛɛ anɛ kpini an gyɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kʋlʋn asa nɩn.
49004026	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan nyɛ agbʋ mʋ, ɔ man yɛgɛ mʋ agbʋ mʋ ɩ yɛgɛ ɔ waa alibi, nɩɩ ɔ man kyaga agbʋ mʋ sʋ naa tɩyɛ kyɔwɛ.
49004027	Kɛ ɔ man sa Sɩtaanɛ ɔkpa kpini‐kpini.
49004028	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɩna ee yuuri mʋ, ɔ man bɩla yuuri, amaa ɔ taa mʋ abaa sun kusun mʋ nɩɩ kɩ sʋ tɔnɔ, kɛ ɔ nyɛ ɩkʋ kyɛ atiripu tɔ.
49004029	Fan man yɛgɛ ntɔwɛ libi kʋ ɩ lɩɩ fanɛ nnɔ tɔ, amɔɔ nkyɛtɔ ntɔwɛ mʋ nɩɩ ii kpiya asa ansi tɔ, nɩɩ bɛɛ nyɛ bamʋ atɔ tirisa mʋ. Saamʋ bamʋ nɩɩ bee nu mʋ, ba nyɛ‐nyɛ fanɛ katɔwɛ mʋ tɔnɔ.
49004030	Fan man waa kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ o nyita mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Kayaayu maŋa nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa dulugi fanɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ, mʋ asa ɩ gyɛ fanɛ sa Kakɛ lala mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ mɔlɩgɛ fanɛ mʋ.
49004031	Fan man bɩla yɛgɛ asɩn ɩ kɔ fanɛ, abɛɛ fan taa asɩn waa fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ, abɛɛ fan nyɛ agbʋ. Fan man pʋntɛ abaa sʋ, abɛɛ fan saalɛ abaa, abɛɛ fan kisi abaa ɩkpa kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ sʋ.
49004032	Amaa fan baa fɛn waa abaa kɩdanbɩrasa, kɛ fan baa fan su asa kʋwɛɛ, kɛ fan baa fan sʋ alibi fɛn kɛɛ abaa fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla Krisito sʋ taa fanɛ alibi kɛɛ fanɛ mʋ.
49005001	Kpalɩ fan maa gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii ana mʋ nɩɩ ee biti fanɛ gaa sʋ mʋ, fan kasɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔ.
49005002	Fan nyɛ kebiti sa abaa fanɛ kakyɩna tɔ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Krisito nyɛ kebiti sa anɛ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ lɛɛ saraga nɩɩ o wu fwɩɩ anɛ alibi, nɩɩ kanɩn saraga mʋ ii lii fen femm nɩɩ kɩɩ bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ ansi mʋ.
49005003	Lɩɩ fan maa gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asa sʋ mʋ, ɩ man dagaa ɔkʋ maa nu fɛɛ kanyɩn abɛɛ kakyɩɩ biti kɩgyagaa, abɛɛ ineesi ɩkʋ, abɛɛ onsi‐payɩ libi kʋ ɩ baa ɩ bʋ fanɛ tɔ.
49005004	Nɩɩ ɩ man dagaa fan maa tɔwɛ ineesi asɩn, abɛɛ amelensi‐sɩn, abɛɛ agyaga‐sɩn, amaa fan taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ.
49005005	Fan dan fen nyi kesintin tɔ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa kakyɩɩ abɛɛ kanyɩn biti kɩgyagaa, abɛɛ ineesi asɩn, abɛɛ onsi‐payɩ libi mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ nyɛ loo Krisito maa Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ. Onsi‐payɩ libi du nɩn fɛɛ kusun ɩdakpa mʋ.
49005006	Lɩɩ fɛɛ falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ agbʋ ii biti ɩ ba bamʋ nɩɩ ba waa mʋ kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn mʋ sʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ fan man yɛgɛ ɔkʋ ɔ taa ntɔwɛ kɩyan pɩna fanɛ,
49005007	kanɩn sʋ faa naa kanɩn asa maŋa fan man bʋga waa sɛhn.
49005008	Fanɛ gbaa fanɛ kitentenbiri kɩ kyɩna kɩ bʋ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ nɩn, amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ fan maa gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ asa sʋ mʋ, kaŋmaŋɛ bʋ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ nɩn. Ɩmʋ sʋ fan yɛgɛ fanɛ kakyɩna tɔ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ fan gyɛ ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ tɔ asa.
49005009	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩŋmaŋɛsa nɩmʋ ɩ bɩya kɩdanbɩrasa kɩwaa yɛ ɩkpa kikyiigi yɛ kesintin kigyii.
49005010	Kɛ fan waa aniya waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ ansi.
49005011	Fan man taa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ naa tii kitentenbiri awaasa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ kʋʋgɛ obii danbɩrasa mʋ sʋ, amaa fan lɛɛ ɩmʋ kaapʋ yɛ ɩ gyɛ alibi.
49005012	Ɩ gyɛ apeeli‐sɩn gbaa fɛɛ fan tɔwɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ asʋtɔ ɔlʋn wuya ana bɛɛ baala bɛɛ waa mʋ asɩn.
49005013	Amaa kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ lɛɛ ifuli sʋ mʋ, ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ii wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ ki du.
49005014	Lɩɩ fɛɛ nɩɩ ɩŋmaŋɛsa ɩ ba kʋtɔ kʋmaa sʋ mʋ, kanɩn kʋtɔ maŋa mɛɛ baala. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ yɩla yɛ, “Fʋ, nsɩɩrɛ ɔdɛpʋ, kyiŋi, kʋsʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ, kɛ Krisito ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ ɩ ba fʋ sʋ.”
49005015	Fan kɩɩ danbɩrasa kɛ fan man kyɩna fɛɛ amelensipu, amaa fan kyɩna fɛɛ anyaasɩnpʋ.
49005016	Nɩɩ fan kan nyɛ ɔkpa kʋmaa nɩmʋ yɛ fan waa kɩdanbɩrasa mʋ, fan man yɛgɛ ɩ kyʋn fanɛ sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa nɩmʋ tɔ mʋ libi ɩ nyɛ akyɔ.
49005017	Fan man waa fɛɛ amelensipu, amaa fan kpan fanɛ n‐yɩɩ bɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu ii biti fɛɛ fan waa.
49005018	Fan man kan nuu nta bʋʋ, kɛ ɩ nyɛ nyita fanɛ amu. Amaa fan yɛgɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ o loo bɔla fanɛ tɔ gaa.
49005019	Fan taa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩlʋn yɛ abwaarɛsɩn ɩlʋn yɛ Kayaayu kɩlɛɛkaapʋ ɩlʋn fɛn tɔwɛ fɛn waa abaa. Fan taa fanɛ nkɔlɔ kpini bɩɩ ɩlʋn sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ.
49005020	Saŋa kʋmaa nɩmʋ fan taa afwaala sa Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ, lɩɩ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ.
49005021	Fan bɩya fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ sa fanɛ bɩrɩsa ana kɛ ɩ sa Krisito bɛɛrɛɛ.
49005022	Akyɩɩ‐kilipu, fan bɩya fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ sa fanɛ‐kuli ana fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ nɩɩ fɛn waa fɛn sa mʋ.
49005023	Lɩɩ fɛɛ okuli mʋ ɩ gyɛ kumu sa mʋ‐ka, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Krisito gyɛ kumu sa mu abuupu kʋbʋ, mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ mʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ, nɩɩ mʋ ɩ gyɛ kɩmʋ ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ mʋ.
49005024	Ɩmʋ sʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Krisito abuupu mʋ bɛɛ bɩya bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ bɛɛ sa Krisito mʋ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ akyɩɩ‐kilipu gbaa ba bɩya bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ sa bamʋ‐kuli ana kʋtɔ kʋmaa tɔ.
49005025	Anyɩn‐kilipu, fan nyɛ kebiti sa fanɛ‐ka ana fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Krisito nyɛ kebiti sa mʋ kʋbʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ waa saraga wu sa bamʋ mʋ.
49005026	Kɛ ɔ nyɛ bɔla nkyu yɛ mʋ asɩn mʋ sʋ gyee bamʋ waa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ sa mʋ n‐yɩɩ.
49005027	Ɔ waa kanɩn nɩn kɛ mʋ kʋbʋ mʋ ba baa ba gyɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ, yɛgɛ ba man sʋ ineesi, abɛɛ alibi akʋ, abɛɛ awaasa libi, yɛgɛ ba du kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ, nɩɩ ba man sʋ asɩn pwɩɩsa akʋ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ.
49005028	Ɔkpa kʋlʋn maŋa sʋ, ɩ dagaa fɛɛ anyɩn‐kilipu ba maa nyɛ kebiti sa bamʋ‐ka ana, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ kebiti sa bamʋ gbaa‐gbaa n‐yɩɩ mʋ. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti mʋ‐ka mʋ, ii biti mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ nɩn.
49005029	Ɔsa kʋ man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ee kisi mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ, amaa ɛɛ bɩla kɩmʋ, yɛgɛ ɛɛ kɩɩ kɩmʋ sʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Krisito ɩɩ kɩɩ mʋ kʋbʋ mʋ sʋ mʋ.
49005030	Lɩɩ fɛɛ anɛ ɩ gyɛ Krisito kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ yɛ ɩmʋ abaafʋn kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ mʋ.
49005031	Ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Lɩɩ falɛ sʋ ɔnyɩn ii biti ɔ lɩɩ mu‐nyi yɛ mʋ‐sɛ asɛ, kɛ ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ naa bʋga mʋ‐ka tɔ, kɛ bamʋ asa anyɔ mʋ ba ba waa kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kʋlʋn.”
49005032	Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ asɩn baalasa mʋ nɩɩ i budu, amaa mɛɛ mɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ falɛ mʋ ɩ yɩlɛ sa Krisito maa mʋ kʋbʋ mʋ nɩn.
49005033	Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, ɔnyɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ nyɛ kebiti sa mʋ‐ka, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ ɩ dagaa ɔkyɩɩ‐kilipu kʋmaa nɩmʋ mɔɔ maa bɩya mʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ sa mu‐kuli.
49006001	Nbii, lɩɩ fan maa gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ lɛɛ sʋ mʋ, fan nu fanɛ akʋʋgɛpʋ asɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩmʋ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fan waa.
49006002	Ɩbwaarɛ nbara mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nu sa fʋ‐sɛ yɛ fu‐nyi,” mʋ, ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ nbara gyankpaasa mʋ nɩɩ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ kɩda tii sʋ.
49006003	Kɔkɔlɔ sʋ kɩda mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, nɩɩ fʋ kan nu sa fʋ‐sɛ yɛ fu‐nyi mʋ, “ii biti ɩ waa ɔdan sa fʋ, kɛ fʋ kyɩna kasɛ sʋ kyɛɛrɛɛ.”
49006004	Akʋgɛpʋ, fan man waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ yɛgɛ fanɛ nbii ba nyɛ agbʋ, amaa fan kɩɩ bamʋ sʋ, kɛ fan taa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kɩkaapʋ mʋ bɩla bamʋ.
49006005	Anyɛ, fan nu sa fanɛ kasɛ sʋ anyɩrɩpɛ ana, kɛ fan sɩlɛ bamʋ lɩɩ fanɛ nkɔlɔ kpini tɔ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan waa sa Krisito mʋ.
49006006	Fan man nu sa bamʋ ansi sʋ wʋlɛ kɛ fan nyɛ gyii bamʋ amu, amaa fan maa gyɛ Krisito anyɛ sʋ mʋ, fan waa kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ lɩɩ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩpɩrɛ sʋ.
49006007	Fan sun bamʋ lɩɩ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ fɛɛ fan maa sun Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ, nɩɩ man gyɛ asa nɩɩ fen sun mʋ.
49006008	Lɩɩ fɛɛ fan nyi fɛɛ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ ii biti ɔ ka ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kʋkɔ lɩɩ kusun danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ sʋ. Ɩ man tiri fɛɛ ɔ gyɛ kɩnyɛ abɛɛ ee gyii mʋ kɩbaa sʋ.
49006009	Anyɩrɩpɛ mɔɔ, kanɩn maŋa sʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fan waa fanɛ anyɛ. Fan man ŋaala bamʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fu nyi fɛɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ fanaa bamʋ kpini Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ bʋ sʋsʋ nɩn, nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ mɛɛgɛ tɔ.
49006010	Mɛ asɩn laalaalʋwɛ mʋ gyɛ yɛ, fan nyɛ ɔlʋn lɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ yɛ mʋ ɔlʋn lala mʋ tɔ.
49006011	Fan taa adʋn tɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa fanɛ mʋ kpini bun, kɛ fan nyɛ taalɛ kɔ yɛ Sɩtaanɛ kanyaasɩn ɩkpa libi mʋ.
49006012	Lɩɩ fɛɛ man gyɛ anaa anyɩmɩsa ɩɩ kɔ. Amaa an kɔ yɛ awuragyipu yɛ alʋlʋnpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ afuu tɔ. An kɔ yɛ n‐yaayu libi mʋ nɩɩ ii gyii kuwura dulinyaa kitentenbiri nɩmʋ tɔ.
49006013	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan taa adʋntɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa fanɛ mʋ kpini bun. Saamʋ nɩɩ nkɛ libi kan ba mʋ, fɛn taalɛ nyɛ ɔlʋn kɔ tii Sɩtaanɛ ɩkpa libi mʋ. Nɩɩ fan kan kɔ lʋwɛ gbaa mʋ, fan yɩlɛ fanɛ ayaa sʋ.
49006014	Fan yɩlɛ tɔ kenken, kɛ fan taa kesintin waa kɩrɩsʋ ŋmina fanɛ nsɛ tɔ. Kɛ fan taa ɩkpa kigyiigi waa fɛɛ kɩbɩlɛ tɔ panpasan kun fanɛ nkɔlɔ sʋ.
49006015	Fan kʋʋla fanɛ n‐yɩɩ biti asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ bɩya keyuula mʋ kɩtɔwɛ fɛɛ fanɛ ayaa sʋ asɩbɩta.
49006016	Saŋa kʋmaa fan taa kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩtaa fɛɛ kɩbaa tɔ kʋtɔ kunsa. Kɩmʋ nɩɩ fɛn taalɛ taa dunla Olibilibi fʋlɔn anyenbi mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tʋʋ fanɛ mʋ kɔnɔ.
49006017	Fan taa kamɔlɩgɛ fɛɛ abɩlɩtɔ kʋwʋrʋ bun, kɛ fan taa abwaarɛsɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kɩnaa tɔ sakunde, mʋ nɩɩ Kayaayu mʋ ɩɩ sa mʋ kɩtaa.
49006018	Kɛ fan taa Kayaayu mʋ ɔlʋn kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa tɔ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ kyɛ fanɛ tɔ. Lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, fan baa fan da sʋ, kɛ fan waa aniya kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ saŋa kʋmaa fɛn sa Ɩbwaarɛ asa mʋ kpini.
49006019	Fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ sa ngbaa mɛ fɛɛ saŋa kʋmaa nɩɩ n kan bugi mɛ kɔnɔ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ sa mɛ asɩn tɔwɛsa, kɛ n nyɛ yɩlɛ kɩnyɩn tɔ lɛɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ naafɔɔ ɩ baala mʋ kaapʋ.
49006020	Asɩn danbɩrasa nɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ Krisito sun mɛ, nɩɩ ba tii mɛ obu falɛ. Fan kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ n taalɛ tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ kɩnyɩn tɔ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa.
49006021	Anɛ bɩrɩsa bitisa Tikiku, ɔ gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa kɔkɔlɔ kʋlʋn ee sun mʋ, mʋ ii biti ɔ ba tɔwɛ fanɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa, kɛ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan nyɛ bɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n du yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n waa.
49006022	Falɛ sʋ nɩɩ n sun mʋ fanɛ asɛ, kɛ fan nyɛ bɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an du kɛ ɔ tɔwɛ waa fanɛ aniya tɔ.
49006023	Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito ba sa fanɛ, anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana keyuula yɛ kebiti yɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii.
49006024	Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ bwaala bamʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ ɔkaa sa anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito mʋ.
50001001	Ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ lɩɩ mɛ Pɔɔlɩ yɛ Timoti, mʋ nɩɩ an gyɛ Krisito Yesu ayaafɔlɛ mʋ asɛ. Nɩɩ an kyʋrɔɔ an sa fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asa kpini mʋ nɩɩ fanaa Krisito Yesu fan waa kʋkʋlʋn, yɛ fanɛ abɩlɩsa yɛ akyɛtɔpʋ mʋ nɩɩ fan bʋ Filipi kadɛ tɔ mʋ.
50001002	Anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito ba bwaala fanɛ kɛ ba sa fanɛ kayɩɩ yuuli.
50001003	N fwaala mɛ Ɩbwaarɛ saŋa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n nyiŋi fanɛ sʋ mʋ.
50001004	Nɩɩ saŋa kʋmaa n maa kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ n sa fanɛ kpini mʋ, n kʋlɛ yɛ kɔkɔlɔ fuuli tɔ,
50001005	lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan ba tii mɛ sʋ nɩɩ an waa asɩn danbɩrasa kɩtɔwɛ kusun saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ gyii ba fʋʋ halɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ.
50001006	Ɩmʋ sʋ n dan n nyi fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ o piili kusun danbɩrasa fanɛ tɔ mʋ, ee biti ɔ kɩɩ sʋ kɛ ii kpee sʋ naa lʋwɛ kyɛɛkyɛɛ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Krisito Yesu ii biti o bwii ba mʋ.
50001007	Kpalɩ fɛɛ saŋa kʋmaa fan maa bʋ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ sʋ mʋ, ɩmʋ ɔkpa nɩn fɛɛ n fɛ falɛ nfɛɛrɛ nɩmʋ lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ. Halɩɩ n maa bʋ obu tiisa tɔ gbaa mʋ, abɛɛ n maa kɔ n kun asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ yɛ ɩ yɩlɛ mʋ, fanɛ kpini fan taa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ tii Ɩbwaarɛ kusun mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa bwaala mɛ mʋ sʋ.
50001008	N sʋ Krisito Yesu kebiti mʋ n sa fanɛ kpini, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ yɩlɛ mɛ sʋ fɛɛ n wu fanɛ.
50001009	Mɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ sa fanɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, fanɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ mʋ kɩ nyɛ akyɔ tii sʋ, kɛ fan dan fanɛ kinyi yɛ kasɛ kunu kʋtɔ kʋmaa tɔ,
50001010	saamʋ fɛn nyɛ taalɛ bɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋrɔn kyʋn sʋ yɛgɛ ineesi yɛ asɩn pwɩɩsa kʋ man bʋ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ naa fʋʋ Krisito kɩba mʋ.
50001011	Kɛ fanɛ kakyɩna tɔ awaasa kpini i kyiigi lɩɩ Yesu Krisito sʋ waa ɔdan, kɛ ɩ taa bʋnyaa yɛ ayɩn‐bi sa Ɩbwaarɛ.
50001012	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, n biti fan bɩɩ fɛɛ, kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tu mɛ mʋ, ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ yɛlɩgɛ kpee ansi tɔ.
50001013	Lɩɩ kanɩn sʋ mʋ, owura‐kpa akunpu mʋ kpini yɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ nfɩɩ mʋ, ba bɩɩ fɛɛ ba maa tii mɛ obu lɩɩ n maa gyɛ Krisito kɩnyɛ mʋ sʋ.
50001014	Kpalɩ ba maa tii mɛ obu sʋ mʋ, ɩ yɛgɛ Krisito akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu gaalaagaa ba yɩlɛ kɩnyɩn tɔ bɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, yɛgɛ ba man sʋ kufuu.
50001015	Nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kesintin nɩn fɛɛ akʋ lɩɩ kayɩɩ basa yɛ kolu biti mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ mɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ba sʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn lɩɩ Krisito sʋ, amaa akʋ bɩrɛ ba taa nfɛɛrɛ danbɩrasa nɩn bɛɛ tɔwɛ Krisito asɩn mʋ.
50001016	Ba mɛɛ bamʋ bɩrɛ, kebiti sʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa kanɩn, lɩɩ fɛɛ be nyi Ɩbwaarɛ maa taa asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ kukun waa mɛ abaa tɔ.
50001017	Amaa akʋ bɩrɛ, bɛɛ kɩɩ bee biti bamʋ nkʋn lɛɛ sʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ, man gyɛ nfɛɛrɛ danbɩrasa sʋ, be nyi fɛɛ bɛɛ waa kanɩn nɩn kɛ mɛ awʋrʋfɔ ɩ lɔŋɔ tii sʋ yɛgɛ n tii obu.
50001018	Ɩmʋ sʋ mɩnɛ i tiri? Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, nɩɩ nfɛɛrɛ libi nɩɩ ba sʋ oo, abɛɛ kesintin tɔ nɩn oo, ɔkpa kʋmaa anɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, ba tɔwɛ Krisito asɩn mʋ. Nɩɩ lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ mi ansi i gyii. Nɩɩ n biti n kyaga sʋ gyii mi ansi,
50001019	lɩɩ fɛɛ n nyi lɩɩ fanɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ tɔ yɛ Yesu Krisito Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ nkyɛtɔ sʋ mʋ, asɩn mʋ nɩɩ i tu mɛ mʋ, ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ n nyɛ mɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ ɩmʋ tɔ.
50001020	Mɛ kɩpɩrɛ yɛ tamaa mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, n mɛɛ yɛ n waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii gyila mɛ ipeeli, amaa n yɩlɛ kɩnyɩn tɔ, saamʋ, lewu tɔ nɩn oo, nkpa tɔ nɩn oo, lɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ yɛ saŋa kʋmaa, asa ba bʋnyaa Krisito lɩɩ mɛ sʋ.
50001021	Lɩɩ fɛɛ mɛɛ mɛ bɩrɛ, n maa tɛ nkpa tɔ falɛ mʋ, n tɛ sa Krisito, nɩɩ n kan wu mɔɔ nɩn, ɩɩ gyɛ tɔnɔ sa mɛ.
50001022	Amaa nɩɩ n kan n san n tɛ nkpa tɔ mʋ, n taalɛ waa kusun danbɩrasa. Ɩmʋ sʋ nkpa nɩn oo, lewu nɩn oo, n man n nyi kɩmʋ nɩɩ n lɛɛ.
50001023	N sii n kyɔlɛ ɩmʋ anyɔ nsana. Mɛ kɩpɩrɛ tɔ n gyɛ fɛɛ n lɩɩ kasɛ sʋ nfɩɩ, kɛ n naa kyɩna Krisito asɛ, ɩmʋ ɩ bɔ.
50001024	Amaa n maa san n tɛ kasɛ sʋ falɛ mʋ, ɩmʋ bʋrɔn sa fanɛ.
50001025	N maa kɔɔlɛ ɩnɩmʋ gyii mʋ, n nyi fɛɛ n biti n baa n bʋ tɔ, kɛ n kyaga sʋ kyɩna yɛ fanɛ kpini, kɛ i kpiya fanɛ ansi tɔ, kɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ i fuuli fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ.
50001026	Saamʋ, mɛ kɩbɩla ba kyɩna fanɛ asɛ mʋ, bɔla mɛ sʋ mʋ, fanɛ ansi ii biti i gyii Krisito Yesu tɔ tii sʋ.
50001027	Nɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, fan yɛgɛ fanɛ kakyɩna tɔ awaasa ɩmaa asɩn danbɩrasa lɩɩ Yesu Krisito sʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kaapʋ mʋ, ɩ waa kʋkʋlʋn. Saamʋ n kan bʋ fanɛ asɛ oo, n man bʋ fanɛ asɛ oo, n biti n nu fɛɛ fan yɩlɛ tɔ kenken kɔnɔ kʋlʋn tɔ, nɩɩ fan sʋ nfɛɛrɛ kʋlʋn fɛn payɩ ansi lɩɩ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ.
50001028	Nɩɩ n biti n bɩla nu yɛ fan man sɩlɛ fanɛ dʋn ana ɔkpa kʋmaa sʋ. Nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ii biti ɩɩ kaapʋ bamʋ fɛɛ bee biti ba wu muuri, kɛ fanɛ bɩrɛ fan nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ ba kanɩn.
50001029	Lɩɩ fɛɛ man gyɛ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ sa fanɛ ɔkpa yɛ fan ba kɔɔlɛ Krisito gyii nkʋn, amaa awʋrʋfɔ kigyii lɩɩ mʋ sʋ gbaa tii sʋ.
50001030	Nbɩɩnbɩɩ fan ba tii mɛ sʋ kolu mʋ tɔ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan daa kyɩna wu n maa kɔ mʋ, kanɩn kolu kʋlʋn maŋa nɩɩ n san n kɔ falɛ.
50002001	Fɛɛ nɩɩ fanɛ abaa ɩ man yɔɔ lɩɩ fan maa bʋ Krisito tɔ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ sa fanɛ sʋ nɩɩ fanɛ nkɔlɔ ii fuuli fanɛ mʋ, nɩɩ fan naa Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ fan sʋ kɔnɔ kʋlʋn mʋ, nɩɩ fan sʋ kebiti yɛ kʋwɛɛ kuwu sa abaa mʋ,
50002002	kanɩn bɩrɛ fan yɛgɛ nɩɩ mi ansi i gyii naa lʋwɛ kyɛɛkyɛɛ, fɛɛ fan maa sʋ nfɛɛrɛ kʋlʋn yɛ kebiti kʋlʋn yɛ nɩɩ fan yɩlɛ kʋtɔ kʋlʋn sʋ.
50002003	Fan man waa kʋtɔ kʋ biti fanɛ nkʋn lɛɛ abɛɛ fan waa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ alala‐sɩn tɔ, amaa fan bɩya fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ, kɛ fan fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ fanɛ bɩrɩsa ana ba kyɔ fanɛ.
50002004	Fanɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ man kɩɩ biti kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ kyɛ mʋ nkʋn tɔ, amaa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ kyɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ.
50002005	Ɩ dagaa fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ ɩɩ baa i du fɛɛ Krisito Yesu lɛɛ mʋ.
50002006	Krisito maa gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kedubi falɛ gbaa mʋ, ɔ man yɩlɛ kɩmʋ sʋ kɩtaa tɔ fɛɛ maa Ɩbwaarɛ ba gyɛ kyɛɛkyɛɛ.
50002007	Amaa ɔ waa mʋ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ man gyɛ sɛhn, nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ n‐yɩɩ kɩnyɛ, nɩɩ o be biliŋi nyɩmɩsa, nɩɩ ba wu mʋ maa gyɛ nyɩmɩsa,
50002008	ɔ bɩya mʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ nyɛ kʋsʋ‐nu sa Ɩbwaarɛ naa fʋʋ lewu tɔ, halɩɩ oyu laasa sʋ lewu.
50002009	Lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kʋsaa mʋ naa kyɩna sʋsʋ opula kparɛ, nɩɩ ɔ sa mʋ kɩtɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ kyɔ atɩɩ kpini,
50002010	kɛ nyɩmɩsa yɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ sʋ yɛ kamandɛ tɔ kpini, ba muŋa sun Yesu kɩtɩɩ,
50002011	kɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ o bugi kɔnɔ lɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, Yesu Krisito ɩ gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ, kɛ bʋnyaa ɔ baa ɔ gyɛ Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ.
50002012	Ɩmʋ sʋ mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana danbɩrasa, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ fanɛ asɛ nɩɩ fan nu sa mɛ saŋa kʋmaa mʋ, halɩɩ nɩɩ n man bʋ fanɛ asɛ gbaa mʋ, fan waa kanɩn tii sʋ gaa. Fan taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ kɛ fan sɩlɛ mʋ kɛ fan sun kamɔlɩgɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan nyɛ mʋ kusun naa lʋwɛ.
50002013	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa kusun fanɛ tɔ saŋa kʋmaa, nɩɩ ɛɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fɛn waa mʋ kɔkɔlɔ biti yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ yɩlɛ sʋ.
50002014	Kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fɛn waa mʋ, fan man kɔlɩtɛ abɛɛ fan gyii abaa ɩmɔɔrɛ.
50002015	Saamʋ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ nyɛ asɩn pwɩɩsa yɛ ineesi ɩkʋ, yɛgɛ fan gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii ana mʋ nɩɩ fan man sʋ alibi kʋ, nɩɩ fan sʋ fan tɛ yɛ nfɛɛrɛ libi wuya ana yɛ asun libi awaapʋ. Nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fan maa ŋalɩgɛ sʋ bamʋ tɔ fɛɛ akyikpebi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ sʋsʋ ɩɩ ŋalɩgɛ mʋ,
50002016	fɛɛ fan maa sʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nkpa fɛn sa bamʋ falɛ. Nɩɩ fan kan waa kanɩn mʋ, ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ kɛ n nyɛ kaapʋ mɛ n‐yɩɩ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Krisito ii biti o bwii ba mʋ, kɛ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ mɛ kɩkpan n‐yɩɩ yɛ kɩpayɩ ansi waa kusun fanɛ tɔ mʋ, ɩ man waa kɩyan.
50002017	Fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ gyii yɛ kusun sa mʋ mʋ, du nɩn fɛɛ saraga sa mʋ, halɩɩ nɩɩ bee biti ba kyɛɛgɛ mɛ nkalan wʋrɩgɛ tii waa saraga mʋ sʋ, ii biti ɩ waa mɛ ɔkɔn gaa kɛ n maa fanɛ ansi i gyii.
50002018	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ dagaa fanɛ gbaa fanɛ ɩ waa fanɛ ɔkɔn, kɛ maa fanɛ ansi i gyii.
50002019	Nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu kebiti tɔ mʋ, n sʋ tamaa fɛɛ ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ kyɛɛrɛɛ n biti n sun Timoti fanɛ asɛ, kɛ n nyɛ nu fanɛ sʋ kɛ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ ɔ nyɛ dɛ mɛ.
50002020	N man bɩla n sʋ ɔkʋ fɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ fanɛ kɩbaabʋtɔ asɩn i tiri mʋ.
50002021	Lɩɩ fɛɛ asansa mʋ kpini bamʋ lɛɛ nkʋn nɩɩ bee biti, man gyɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Yesu Krisito lɛɛ.
50002022	Amaa fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fan nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ Timoti lɛɛ mʋ daa kaapʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ o tii mɛ sʋ nɩɩ an sun asɩn danbɩrasa kusun mʋ, fɛɛ ɔsɛ yɛ obii.
50002023	Ɩmʋ sʋ, n sʋ tamaa fɛɛ nɩɩ n dan nyɛ wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ ii kpee sʋ ɩɩ sa mɛ mʋ, n biti n sun mʋ fanɛ asɛ.
50002024	Nɩɩ n sʋ tamaa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ tɔ fɛɛ, ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ kyɛɛrɛɛ n gbaa‐gbaa mɛ n biti n ba fanɛ asɛ.
50002025	Amaa n fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ii tiri fɛɛ, n bwii sun anɛ bɩrɩsa Epafuroditu fanɛ asɛ. N maa mʋ an bʋga an waa kusun, nɩɩ an kɔ an kun asɩn danbɩrasa fanɛ asɛ. Nɩɩ mʋ ɩ bɩla ɔ gyɛ fanɛ kabɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan sun, nɩɩ ɔ ba kyɛ mɛ tɔ ɩmʋ nɩɩ i tiri mɛ mʋ.
50002026	Ɩ gyʋgyʋʋ mʋ yɛ o wu fanɛ kpini, nɩɩ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ ki nyita mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan maa nu yɛ ɛɛ lɔ sʋ mʋ.
50002027	Ɩ gyɛ kesintin fɛɛ ɔ lɔ, halɩɩ ɩ san gbɛrɛɛ o wu. Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ wu mʋ kʋwɛɛ nɩɩ man gyɛ mʋ nkʋn, amaa yɛ ngbaa mɛ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ n man bɔɔta tɔ tii sʋ.
50002028	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ gyʋgyʋʋ mɛ gaa fɛɛ n sun mʋ fanɛ asɛ. Saamʋ, nɩɩ fan kan bɩla wu mʋ mʋ, kɛ ɩ waa fanɛ ɔkɔn tii sʋ, kɛ mɛ kɩbɔɔta tɔ mʋ ɩ lʋwɛ.
50002029	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan taa kensi‐gyii kɔɔlɛ mʋ abaa anyɔ fɛɛ maa gyɛ fanɛ bɩrɩsa ɔkɔɔlɛ‐gyipu Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu tɔ mʋ. Fan taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa asa fɛɛ mu kudubi,
50002030	lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ san gbɛrɛɛ o wu kpalɩ Krisito kusun mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ nkpa taga apʋ, kyɛ mɛ tɔ lɩɩ nkyɛtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan man taalɛ kyɛ mɛ tɔ mʋ.
50003001	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ san mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, fanɛ ansi i gyii lɩɩ fan maa waa kʋkʋlʋn yɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu sʋ mʋ! Nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ asɩn tɔɔrɔɔsa sa mɛ fɛɛ n maa bɩla n kyʋrɔɔ atɔ kʋlʋn maŋa n sa fanɛ, amaa ɩ gyɛ nkyɛtɔ sa fanɛ nɩn.
50003002	Fan kɩɩ yɛ ɔdan lɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ be du fɛɛ igyoonɔ nɩɩ ba gyɛ alibi awaapʋ, nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kɩtɩn sʋ.
50003003	Lɩɩ fɛɛ anɛ mʋ nɩɩ an bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ sʋ an sun mʋ, nɩɩ an kaapʋ anɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ anɛ kɩwaa kʋkʋlʋn yɛ Krisito Yesu sʋ mʋ, anɛ nɩɩ ba tɩŋɛ iduu kesintin tɔ mʋ. Nɩɩ a man taa anɛ n‐yɩɩ tʋʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kɩtɩn sʋ.
50003004	Naafɔɔ ngbaa mɛ n sʋ ɔkpa n taa mɛ n‐yɩɩ tʋʋ kanɩn awaasa sʋ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ɛɛ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ ɔ sʋ ɔkpa ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ tʋʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kɩtɩn sʋ mʋ, naafɔɔ mɛ ɩ sʋ ɔkpa n kyɔ mʋ.
50003005	Ba tɩn mɛ oduu kakɛ buruwasapu, nɩɩ n gyɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ obii nɩn, nɩɩ n lɩɩ Bengyamin kebunɔ, nɩɩ n gyɛ Hibriwu obii gbaa‐gbaa, nɩɩ taa lɩɩ nbara mʋ kibuu sʋ mʋ, n kyɩna n gyɛ Farasii nɩn,
50003006	nɩɩ lɩɩ mɛ n‐yɩɩ kɩkpan Gyiwu kabwaarɛ‐sun tɔ mʋ, n nyanla Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ, nɩɩ lɩɩ ɔkʋ kɩnyɛ ɩkpa kigyiigi lɩɩ Gyiwu nbara mʋ kibuu sʋ mʋ, n man sʋ kilibi ɩmʋ tɔ.
50003007	Amaa kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n daa kɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ gyɛ tɔnɔ sa mɛ mʋ, nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ lɩɩ Yesu Krisito sʋ mʋ, ɩ man bɩla ɩ gyɛ sɛhn mɛ asɛ.
50003008	Man gyɛ ɩmʋ nkʋn, kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ gyɛ mɛ asɛ fɛɛ atɔ fɔyɩsa, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ atɔ kparɛ sa mɛ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ n ba bɩɩ Mɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito. Lɩɩ Krisito sʋ mʋ n pan kʋtɔ kʋmaa, nɩɩ n kɩɩ ɩmʋ fɛɛ kɩgyaakpa sʋ atɔ, kɛ n nyɛ‐nyɛ Krisito.
50003009	Saamʋ, n waa kʋkʋlʋn yɛ mʋ kakpaa, yɛgɛ n man bɩla n sʋ n gbaa‐gbaa mɛ ɩkpa kikyiigi lɩɩ nbara mʋ kibuu sʋ, amaa ɩkpa kikyiigi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bɔla kɩkɔɔlɛ Krisito gyii sʋ. Nɩɩ ɩkpa kikyiigi nɩmʋ, mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ, gyan kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ nɩn.
50003010	Nɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n biti ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, n baa n nyi Krisito yɛ mʋ kelewu kyiŋi ɔlʋn mʋ, kɛ n gyii mʋ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ ɩkʋ, kɛ n ba waa fɛɛ n wu bʋga yɛ mʋ,
50003011	saamʋ ɩ waa nɛnɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ nyɛ kyiŋi ngbaa mɛ lɩɩ alewupu tɔ, ba nkpa tɔ.
50003012	N mɛɛ kaapʋ nɩn fɛɛ n tɛɛ nyɛ ɩmʋ abɛɛ n tɛɛ wʋla waa kyɛɛkyɛɛ naa lʋwɛ. Amaa n kpan mɛ n‐yɩɩ kɛ n kɩtaa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Krisito Yesu tɩɩ mɛ waa mʋ lɛɛ mʋ tɔ.
50003013	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, n mɛɛ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ mɛ kɩbaa tɛɛ kɩtaa ɩmʋ. Amaa kʋtɔ kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ n waa mʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ wʋla kyʋn mɛ kamaa mʋ, n tan kɩmʋ sʋ, kɛ n waa aniya fʋʋ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ dɛ mi ansi tɔ mʋ.
50003014	Ɩmʋ sʋ n kpan mɛ n‐yɩɩ nɩn n sɩlɛ ntintin naa lʋwɛ, kɛ n nyɛ‐nyɛ nkpa kakɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla Krisito Yesu sʋ tɩɩ asa mʋ.
50003015	Nɩɩ anɛ mʋ nɩɩ an dan kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ mʋ kpini, ɩ dagaa a maa sʋ nfɛɛrɛ kʋlʋn nɩmʋ. Amaa nɩɩ fanɛ akʋ bɛɛ kan bɛɛ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kwɩɩ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ lɛɛ ɩmʋ gbaa kasɛ sa fanɛ.
50003016	Nɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, fan yɛgɛ a kɩtaa kɩkaapʋ mʋ nɩɩ an wʋla nyɛ mʋ nkʋn.
50003017	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, fan kasɛ mɛ awaasa tɔ, kɛ fan pɛɛsɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ kakyɩna mʋ nɩɩ an kaapʋ tɔ yɩla sa fanɛ mʋ.
50003018	Lɩɩ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ, nɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ n bɩla n tɔwɛ ɩmʋ yɛ ansikyu gbaa, yɛ asa gaalaagaa bamʋ kakyɩna tɔ du nɩn fɛɛ ba maa kisi Krisito kelewu oyu laasa mʋ sʋ asɩn.
50003019	Asa anɩmʋ bɩrɛ, bamʋ kala ana bee biti ba muuri, nɩɩ bamʋ ɩtɔ nɩɩ bee sun, nɩɩ bamʋ ipeeli‐sɩn tɔ nɩɩ bɛɛ kʋsaa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ. Nɩɩ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ gyan dulinyaa atɔ wʋlɛ nkʋn sʋ nɩn.
50003020	Amaa anɛɛnɛ bɩrɛ, anɛ ayɛ bʋ sʋsʋ nɩn. Nɩɩ ɩ gyʋgyʋʋ anɛ an gyoo anɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ lɩɩ tʋtɔ ba mʋ.
50003021	Nɩɩ ɔ kan ba mʋ, ee biti ɔ kyɛɛgɛ anɛ n‐yɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ii wu falɛ, kɛ ɔ waa ɩmʋ fɛɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ sʋ bʋnyaa mʋ. Ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ ɛɛ yɛgɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa kɩ baa kɩ bʋ mʋ kasɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ee biti ɔ taa waa kanɩn.
50004001	Ɩmʋ sʋ mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana mʋ nɩɩ n biti fanɛ asɩn gaa mʋ, n biti kuwu fanɛ. Fanɛ sʋ nɩɩ mi ansi i gyii nɩɩ n nyɛ kɩtɩɩ. Mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana danbɩrasa, fan yɩlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ tɔ kenken kanɩn.
50004002	N kʋlɛ Yuwodiya maa Sintike fɛɛ ba maa gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ asa falɛ sʋ mʋ, ba tɔwɛ kyula abaa.
50004003	Nɩɩ n kʋlɛ ngbaa fʋ mɛ bɩrɩsa kusun ɔwaapʋ kesintin tɔ, fɛɛ fʋ kyɛ kanɩn akyɩɩ anyɔ mʋ tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba kyɛ mɛ tɔ asɩn danbɩrasa kusun mʋ kɩ yɛlɩgɛ tɔ. Akyɩɩ nɩmʋ maa Kelementi yɛ mɛ tɔmaa ana asunpu kpini mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ atɩɩ ɩ bʋ Ɩbwaarɛ nkpa ɔwʋlɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, ba kyɔ mɛ tɔ gaa.
50004004	Fan yɛgɛ fanɛ ansi i gyii saŋa kʋmaa, fɛɛ fan maa gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ lɛɛ mʋ, n bɩla n pɩla tɔ yɛ, fan yɛgɛ fanɛ ansi i gyii!
50004005	Fan yɛgɛ ɔkʋmaa o wu fanɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fen du bwahn. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kɩba mʋ ki tiri tɔ.
50004006	Fan man yɩyɛɛ lɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋ sʋ, amaa kʋtɔ kʋmaa tɔ mʋ, fɛn kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ kɛ fɛn taa fanɛ asɩn tirisa kpini tʋʋ mu ansi tɔ.
50004007	Saamʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ sa fanɛ mʋ kayɩɩ yuuli gaa mʋ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa mɛɛ taalɛ nu kasɛ, kɛ ki kun fanɛ nkɔlɔ yɛ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ fan maa kɔɔlɛ Krisito Yesu gyii mʋ.
50004008	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, mɛ asɩn laalaalʋwɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, fan yɛgɛ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ baa ɩ gyan kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ kesintin sʋ, yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ, yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ dɛ ɔkpa, yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ ineesi, yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ sʋ kebiti, yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ansi ii gyii sʋ. Nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋ kɩ kan kɩ bʋrɔn gaa abɛɛ kɩ sʋ kɩyɩn mʋ, falɛ atɔ ɩnɩmʋ nɩɩ fɛn fɛ ɩmʋ nfɛɛrɛ.
50004009	Fan waa kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fan bɩɩla abɛɛ fan nyɛ lɩɩ mɛ asɛ, abɛɛ fan nu abɛɛ fan wu n maa waa, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kayɩɩ yuuli wuya mʋ ɔ baa ɔ bʋ fanɛ asɛ.
50004010	Lɩɩ n maa gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ lɛɛ sʋ mʋ, mi ansi i gyii gaa, fɛɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ bɩrɛ fan bɩla kaapʋ fɛɛ mɛ asɩn i tiri fanɛ. Nɩɩ kesintin tɔ n nyi mɛ asɩn ɩ maa tiri fanɛ, amaa ɔkpa nɩɩ fan man nyɛ kɛ fan kaapʋ fɛɛ mɛ asɩn i tiri fanɛ.
50004011	Man gyɛ yɛ mɛ n‐yɩɩ ɩ kɩtaa mɛ sʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ kanɩn, lɩɩ fɛɛ n bɩɩla ɔkpa kʋmaa sʋ fɛɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ n sʋ mʋ ɩ kʋkwɛ mɛ.
50004012	Nɩɩ n nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri kakyɩna tɔ, nɩɩ n bɩla n nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kanyɛ kʋkyɔ tɔ gbaa du. N bɩɩla ɩmʋ ɔkpa kʋmaa sʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ saŋa kʋmaa yɛ katɩn kʋmaa ɩmʋ nɩɩ n sʋ mʋ ɩ kʋkwɛ mɛ. Halɩɩ n nyɛ gyii ŋmɛ abɛɛ n naa akʋn, halɩɩ n sʋ naa bansʋ abɛɛ n man sʋ gbaa mʋ ɩ kʋkwɛ mɛ.
50004013	N taalɛ waa kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ lɩɩ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ Krisito ɩɩ sa mɛ mʋ sʋ.
50004014	Amaa fan waa kusun gaa fɛɛ fan maa kyɛ mɛ tɔ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ awʋrʋfɔ tɔ mʋ.
50004015	Fanɛ Filipi abi gbaa fan nyi danbɩrasa fɛɛ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n piili asɩn danbɩrasa katɔwɛ Masedoniya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ, nɩɩ n lɩɩ fanɛ asɛ tʋtɔ mʋ, Krisito kʋbʋ kʋ man kɛɛ mɛ afulee lɩɩ kusee mʋ nɩɩ ba nyɛ mʋ sʋ, amɔɔ fanɛ nkʋn.
50004016	Halɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ Tesalonika kadɛ tɔ nɩɩ i tiri mɛ mʋ, fan kyɛ mɛ tɔ afulee ɩlɩɩ kanankʋ.
50004017	Man gyɛ fɛɛ nkɛɛ nɩɩ n dan n kɩɩ n biti lɩɩ fanɛ asɛ sʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ kanɩn, amaa n biti fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ taa agyaga tii fanɛ awaasa danbɩrasa kʋkɔka mʋ sʋ.
50004018	Nɩɩ n tɛɛ nyɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ii tiri mɛ mʋ, halɩɩ naa ban kanan mʋ nɩɩ n biti mʋ gbaa sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan taa sa Epafuroditu yɛ ɔ bɩya mɛ mʋ i loo mɛ abaa tɔ. Atɔ mʋ i du fɛɛ saraga atɔ liifensa mʋ nɩɩ ba taa lɛɛ saraga sa Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ, nɩɩ ɩ bɔla mu ansi.
50004019	Mɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, lɩɩ mʋ atɔ kparɛ damantɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, ee biti ɔ sa fanɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kii tiri fanɛ lɩɩ fan maa gyɛ Krisito Yesu lɛɛ sʋ.
50004020	Bʋnyaa ɔ baa ɔ gyɛ anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ kakpaa‐kakpaa. Amen.
50004021	N fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Krisito Yesu lɛɛ mʋ. Krisito abi mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ mɛ asɛ nfɩɩ gbaa bɛɛ fwaala fanɛ.
50004022	Ɩbwaarɛ asa kpini mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ nfɩɩ mʋ bɛɛ fwaala fanɛ, fɔnfɔn bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Roma abi Owura lala kɩkpaara sʋ mʋ.
50004023	Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kabwaala kɩ baa kɩ bʋ fanɛ kpini asɛ. Amen!
51001001	Mɛ, Pɔɔlɩ mʋ nɩɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti sʋ nɩɩ n ba waa Krisito Yesu osunpu, yɛ anɛ bɩrɩsa Timoti ɩ kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ.
51001002	An kyʋrɔɔ an sa fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asa, mʋ nɩɩ fan gyɛ anɛ bɩrɩsa ana nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ Krisito gyii, nɩɩ fan bʋ Kolose kadɛ tɔ mʋ. An kʋlɛ anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ mʋ kabwaala yɛ keyuula ɩ baa ɩ bʋ fanɛ asɛ.
51001003	Saŋa kʋmaa nɩɩ an kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ an sa fanɛ mʋ, an fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ, anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito Mʋ‐Sɛ.
51001004	Lɩɩ fɛɛ an nu kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ Krisito Yesu gyii, yɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ sa Ɩbwaarɛ asa kpini mʋ.
51001005	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ kesintin asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ gyankpaa ba fanɛ asɛ mʋ, fan nu tamaa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ sʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii yɛ kebiti mʋ gyan kanɩn tamaa, mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa yɩla sa fanɛ sʋsʋ.
51001006	Dulinya nɩmʋ kpini tɔ mʋ, asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ ɩɩ sɔyɩ abi, yɛgɛ ɩɩ yɛlɩgɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa fanɛ tɔ, lɩɩ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan nu asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, nɩɩ fan nu Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ kasɛ kesintin tɔ.
51001007	Epafarasi, anɛ bɩrɩsa Krisito kɩyaafɔlɛ kesintin tɔ mʋ, ɩ ba yɩlɛ anɛ ayaa tɔ tɔwɛ fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ asɩn,
51001008	nɩɩ mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ anɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ sa fanɛ.
51001009	Lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ, lɩɩ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ an nu fanɛ sʋ mʋ, a man yɛgɛ kɩkʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ sa fanɛ. An kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ ɔ sa fanɛ kanyaasɩn yɛ kasɛ kunu bɔla Kayaayu mʋ sʋ, kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ fan taalɛ bɩɩ mu kebiti mʋ.
51001010	Nɩɩ an kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kanɩn nɩn kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ fan kyɩna kakyɩna mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ ii biti, nɩɩ ii gyii mu ansi ɔkpa kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ, kɛ fanɛ kɩbaabʋtɔ ɩ bɩya adanbɩrasa kɛ fan dan Ɩbwaarɛ kinyi tɔ.
51001011	An kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ ɔ sa fanɛ ɔlʋn kparɛ lɩɩ mʋ bʋnyaa ɔlʋn mʋ tɔ, saamʋ fɛn nyɛ‐nyɛ kenyiita yɛ nkɔlɔ yɩlɛ tɔ. Fan yɛgɛ fanɛ ansi i gyii,
51001012	kɛ fan taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fan dagaa mu kuwura‐gyii kɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ tɔ npatɩyɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ ɛɛ sa mʋ asa mʋ.
51001013	Lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ ɩ mɔlɩgɛ anɛ lɩɩ kitentenbiri ɔlʋn mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ taa anɛ ba mu‐Bii bitisa mu kuwura‐gyii tɔ.
51001014	Mʋ ɩ mɔlɩgɛ anɛ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa anɛ alibi kɛɛ anɛ.
51001015	Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ man pɩɩta wu mʋ mʋ, mʋ kudubi ɩ gyɛ Krisito Yesu, Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ bʋ tɔ pɔyɩ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tʋʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa.
51001016	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla mʋ sʋ nɩn tʋʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa, sʋsʋ atɔ yɛ kasɛ sʋ atɔ, ɩmʋ nɩɩ an wu yɛ ansi yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ a mɛɛ wu yɛ ansi, awuragya, yɛ n‐yaayu libi, yɛ awuragyipu yɛ alʋlʋnpʋ. Mʋ sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla tʋʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa, nɩɩ ɔ taa ɩmʋ kpini waa mʋ abaa tɔ.
51001017	Ɔ bʋ tɔ pɔyɩ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tʋʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ, nɩɩ mʋ kɩpɩrɛ sʋ nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa kɩ bʋ tɔ kyɛɛkyɛɛ.
51001018	Nɩɩ mʋ ɩ gyɛ kumu sa mʋ kʋbʋ mʋ kpini, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ kumu gyɛ sa kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ mʋ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ sʋ nkpa, yɛ ɔgyankpaapʋ mʋ nɩɩ o kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ, kɛ ɔ baa ɔ gyɛ ɔgyankpaapʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ.
51001019	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩpɩrɛ nɩn fɛɛ mu kedubi mʋ kpini ɩ baa ɩ bʋ mu‐bii mʋ tɔ.
51001020	Mu‐Bii Yesu kelewu oyu laasa mʋ sʋ, yɛ nkalan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɛɛgɛ mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla sʋ taa lɔŋɔ sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ sʋ atɔ mʋ kpini yɛ mʋ nsana.
51001021	Saŋa kʋ tɔ mʋ, naafɔɔ fanɛ kamaa nɩɩ fan taa kaapʋ Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ lɩɩ fanɛ alibi sʋ mʋ fan kisi mʋ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ.
51001022	Amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla Krisito mʋ nɩɩ o be biliŋi nyɩmɩsa nɩɩ o wu mʋ sʋ, lɔŋɔ fanaa mʋ nsana. Ɔ waa ɩnɩmʋ kɛ fan ba waa asa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ, yɛgɛ fan man sʋ ineesi yɛ asɩn pwɩɩsa kʋ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ,
51001023	nɩɩ fan kan kyaga sʋ kɔɔlɛ Krisito gyii, nɩɩ fan yɩlɛ tɔ kenken nɩɩ fan man kyɛɛgɛ lɩɩ tamaa mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ lɩɩ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ tɔ mʋ. Asɩn danbɩrasa maŋa nɩɩ fan nu, nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ sa ɔsa kʋmaa nɩmʋ kasɛ sʋ, nɩɩ mɛ, Pɔɔlɩ n baa n gyɛ kusun mʋ osunpu falɛ.
51001024	Nbɩɩnbɩɩ mi ansi i gyii fɛɛ n man gyii awʋrʋfɔ sa fanɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ awʋrʋfɔ tɔ mʋ, ngbaa mɛ n wu Krisito awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ san mʋ sa mʋ asa, mʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ mʋ kʋbʋ kpini mʋ.
51001025	Ɩbwaarɛ waa mɛ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ kɩyaafɔlɛ, nɩɩ o sun mɛ yɛ n ba waa mu kusun. Kusun mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ n lɛɛ mʋ asɩn mʋ kpini kasɛ sa fanɛ.
51001026	Asɩn baalasa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ man lɛɛ ɩmʋ ifuli sa dɩdaa abi, amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ ɔ lɛɛ ɩmʋ kaapʋ mʋ asa.
51001027	Ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩpɩrɛ tɔ fɛɛ ɔ lɛɛ asɩn baalasa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ bʋnyaa asɩn mʋ kaapʋ ndɛndɛmandɛ asa kpini. Asɩn baalasa mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ Krisito maa bʋ fanɛ tɔ mʋ, fan sʋ tamaa yɛ bʋnyaa lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ.
51001028	An taa kanyaasɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa anɛ mʋ an tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn, nɩɩ an da ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kumu tɔ, yɛgɛ an kaapʋ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kɛ a taa mʋ waa Ɩbwaarɛ abaa tɔ fɛɛ ɔ nyɛ dan kɩkɔɔlɛ Krisito gyii mʋ tɔ kyɛɛkyɛɛ.
51001029	Ɩnɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n taa ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ Krisito sa mɛ nɩɩ ii sun kusun mɛ tɔ mʋ, n kpan mɛ n‐yɩɩ n sun mʋ.
51002001	N biti fan wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ n mɔɔ mɛ n‐yɩɩ gaa n sa fanɛ, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Lawodisiya kadɛ tɔ yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩta wu mɛ yɛ ansi mʋ.
51002002	N waa ɩnɩmʋ kɛ ɩ waa fanɛ kpini ɔlʋn tɔ, kɛ fan taa kebiti waa kɔnɔ kʋlʋn. Falɛ sʋ mʋ, fen biti fan nu asɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ naa lʋwɛ, kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ fan bɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn baalasa mʋ, ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Krisito gbaa‐gbaa mʋ.
51002003	Mʋ nkʋn tɔ nɩɩ kanyaasɩn yɛ kinyi lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ kpini baala.
51002004	N tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ nɩn kɛ ɔkʋ ɔ man nyɛ taa kɔnɔ tɔ kɔn asɩn pʋpwɛ kʋ ba pɩna fanɛ.
51002005	Halɩɩ n maa man bʋ fanɛ asɛ falɛ gbaa mʋ, mɛ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ gyan fanɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ɩ waa mɛ ɔkɔn n maa nu fɛɛ fɛn waa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa, nɩɩ fɛn sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ Krisito gyii mʋ tɔ kenken.
51002006	Ɩmʋ sʋ, fɛɛ fan maa tɛɛ kɔɔlɛ Krisito Yesu fɛɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ fanɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ mʋ, fan kyɩna yɛ mʋ kanɩn.
51002007	Kɛ fan nyɛ ilin yɩlɛ mʋ tɔ kɛ fan dan, kɛ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii Krisito tɔ mʋ ɩ waa ɔlʋn tii sʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kaapʋ fanɛ mʋ. Kɛ fan taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ gaa.
51002008	Fan baa fan da sʋ kɛ fan man yɛgɛ akʋ ba taa nyɩmɩsa kanyaasɩn yɛ antɩŋɛsa pɩna fanɛ biliŋi bamʋ anyɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ gyɛ anaana‐tɔ yɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ n‐yaayu libi lɛɛ nɩn, nɩɩ ɩ man lɩɩ Krisito asɛ.
51002009	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Krisito Yesu tɔ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ laalaamuu mʋ kpini bʋ,
51002010	nɩɩ fan naa Krisito kɩwaa kʋkʋlʋn sʋ mʋ, fan nyɛ mʋ nkpa nɩmʋ lʋwɛ kyɛɛkyɛɛ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ kumu sa awura yɛ alʋnpʋ kpini.
51002011	Fan naa Krisito kɩwaa kʋkʋlʋn sʋ mʋ, ɩ waa nɩn fɛɛ Krisito maa tɩŋɛ fanɛ iduu mʋ, nɩɩ man gyɛ nyɩmɩsa ɩ taa abaa tɩŋɛ fanɛ. Krisito kɩtɩŋɛ fanɛ iduu mʋ, ɩ kaapʋ nɩn fɛɛ ɔ lɛɛ fanɛ lɩɩ alibi ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ mʋ.
51002012	Ba maa gyee fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee mʋ, i du nɩn fɛɛ ba maa pula fanɛ tii Krisito sʋ, nɩɩ ba bɩla kyiŋi fanɛ tii mʋ sʋ ba nkpa tɔ mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fan kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa kyiŋi mʋ ba nkpa tɔ mʋ gyii.
51002013	Fan kyɩna fan du nɩn fɛɛ alewupu mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ lɩɩ fanɛ alibi, yɛ fanɛ kɩman buu Ɩbwaarɛ nbara sʋ. Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ kyiŋi fanɛ tii Krisito sʋ ba nkpa tɔ. Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa anɛ alibi kpini kɛɛ anɛ,
51002014	nɩɩ ɔ kpayɩ kʋpwɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ yɩla lɩɩ anɛ kɩman buu nbara mʋ sʋ mʋ. Ɔ lɛɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ i du nɩn fɛɛ ba da ɩmʋ tii Krisito sʋ mata oyu laasa mʋ sʋ.
51002015	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla Krisito kelewu oyu laasa mʋ kɔɔlɛ n‐yaayu libi yɛ alʋnpʋ mʋ ɔlʋn kpini, nɩɩ ɔ ŋaabaa bamʋ sakyɔ tɔ kaapʋ fɛɛ o gyii bamʋ sʋ.
51002016	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan man yɛgɛ ɔkʋ o bun fanɛ kʋpwɛ lɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ fen gyii abɛɛ fen nuu mʋ sʋ, abɛɛ fan maa mee gyii kesu kɔnɔ kʋ yɛ ɔbwaayɩ pʋpwɛ kakɛ gyankpaasa abɛɛ Gyiwu abi kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ kensi‐gyii.
51002017	Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ sɩnkaala sa atɔ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba mʋ. Nɩɩ atɔ gbaa‐gbaa maŋa ɩ gyɛ Krisito nɩn.
51002018	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan man kan yɛgɛ ɔkʋ o bun fanɛ kʋpwɛ tɔwɛ yɛ fan man dagaa kʋkɔka mʋ, lɩɩ fan maa man bɩya fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ nɩɩ fan mee sun Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ fɛɛ mʋ mʋ. Kanɩn ɔsa maŋa ɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ ɔ nyɛ ansi sʋ kɩlɛɛkaapʋ mʋ, amaa nyɩmɩsa nfɛɛrɛ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ ɛɛ waa alala‐sɩn kanɩn.
51002019	Nɩɩ ɔ man bɩla taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ tii Krisito mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ kumu mʋ sa kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ kpini. Nɩɩ Krisito ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ mʋ kpini kɩɩ nyɛ ɔlʋn, ikyini yɛ ɩkyagakpa mʋ kpini bʋga kɩtaa abaa, nɩɩ ɩɩ dan kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti.
51002020	Lɩɩ fan maa wu tii Krisito sʋ nɩɩ fan barɩgɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ dulinyaa nɩmʋ atɔ kaapʋsa tɔ falɛ mʋ, mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ fan san fan bʋ kakyɩna dɩdaa mʋ tɔ nɩɩ fan buu ɩmʋ ɩkpa?
51002021	Kanɩn akaapʋsa mʋ akʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, “Fan man kɩtaa kɩnɩmʋ tɔ! Fan man gyii ɩnɩmʋ! Fan man mata ɩnɩmʋ!”
51002022	Atɔ kisisa mʋ kpini ii biti ɩ ba kyʋn. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ gyɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ asa kɩkaapʋ nɩn.
51002023	Kanɩn nbara mʋ du nɩn fɛɛ kanyaasɩn maa bʋ ɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kpan bamʋ n‐yɩɩ bɛɛ waa fɛɛ ba maa sun Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ gaa mʋ, nɩɩ bɛɛ pɩna yɛ bɛɛ bɩya bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ, nɩɩ bɛɛ waa bamʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ awʋrʋfɔ. Amaa ɩnɩmʋ kpini mɛɛ kyɛ bamʋ tɔ kɛ ba yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa.
51003001	Lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ maa kyiŋi fanɛ tii Krisito sʋ ba nkpa tɔ sʋ mʋ, fan taa fanɛ nkɔlɔ gyaga sʋsʋ atɔ sʋ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ Krisito tɛ kuwura‐gya sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ gyisa sʋ mʋ.
51003002	Fan taa fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ gyaga sʋsʋ atɔ sʋ, man gyɛ kasɛ sʋ atɔ sʋ.
51003003	Lɩɩ fɛɛ fan wu sa fanɛ kakyɩna dɩdaa mʋ, nɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ fanɛ nkpa ɩ baala tii Krisito sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ.
51003004	Nɩɩ Krisito mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ fanɛ nkpa kan lɩɩ ifuli mʋ, fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fen biti fan lɩɩ ifuli yɛ mʋ bʋnyaa mʋ.
51003005	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan lɛɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ kasɛ sʋ kɩbaabʋtɔ libi kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ, fɛɛ abawʋlɛ kebiti, yɛ agyaga‐sɩn, yɛ kanyɩn yɛ kakyɩɩ biti kayɛlɩgɛ, yɛ onsi‐payɩ libi, yɛ mɛ nkʋn n nyɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kusun ɩdakpa mʋ.
51003006	Lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ agbʋ lala mʋ ɩ bʋ ɔkpa ɩɩ ba.
51003007	Naafɔɔ kanɩn nɩɩ fan kyɩna fɛn waa, nɩɩ alibi mʋ ii gyii fanɛ sʋ.
51003008	Amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ, n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ fan lɛɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ kpini tɔ, fɛɛ agbʋ yɛ agbʋ libi, yɛ kekisi yɛ nyɩmɩsa kɩtɩɩ‐nyita yɛ ntɔwɛ gyaga mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ lɩɩ fanɛ nnɔ tɔ.
51003009	Fan man tɩn antɩŋɛsa sa abaa, lɩɩ fan maa lɛɛ fanɛ kɩbaabʋtɔ dɩdaa yɛ ɩmʋ awaasa libi tʋʋ mʋ.
51003010	Nbɩɩnbɩɩ anɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ biliŋi nyɩmɩsa pʋpwɛ nɩn, nɩɩ fan baa fan du fɛɛ fanɛ ɔtʋʋpʋ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, kɛ fan ba bɩɩ mʋ danbɩrasa.
51003011	Lɩɩ kɩbaabʋtɔ pʋpwɛ nɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, ɩ man bɩla i tiri fɛɛ ɔkʋ gyɛ Giriki obii abɛɛ Gyiwu obii, abɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba tɩn iduu abɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man tɩn iduu. Ɩ man tiri fɛɛ ɔkʋ gyɛ ɔfɔ kyilim abɛɛ ɔkʋ ansi ɩ man bugi, abɛɛ ɔkʋ gyɛ kɩnyɛ abɛɛ ɔkʋ man gyɛ kɩnyɛ, amaa ɩmʋ nɩɩ i tiri mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ Krisito ɩ gyɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa, nɩɩ mʋ ɩ bʋ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu kpini tɔ.
51003012	Kanɩn sʋ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ maa tɩɩ fanɛ ba waa mʋ asa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ, nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa fanɛ mʋ, fan taa kʋwɛɛ kuwu, yɛ kɩdanbɩrasa kɩwaa, yɛ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ kɩbɩya, yɛ bwahn kɩwaa yɛ kenyiita bun fɛɛ kaalɛ.
51003013	Nɩɩ fanɛ bɩrɩsa kan waa fanɛ alibi mʋ, fan kpala ɩmʋ sʋ, kɛ fan taa alibi kɛɛ abaa. Fan taa kɛɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ taa kɛɛ fanɛ mʋ.
51003014	Nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ kpini kumu ɩ gyɛ kɩnyɛ kebiti sa abaa, kɩmʋ ɩɩ bɩɩtɛ ɩmʋ kpini bʋga waa kɔnɔ kʋlʋn kyɛɛkyɛɛ.
51003015	Lɩɩ fan maa gyɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kʋlʋn abi sʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ tɩɩ fanɛ ba waa Krisito keyuula mʋ tɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ fan yɛgɛ keyuula mʋ ki gyii kuwura fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ. Fan taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ.
51003016	Fan yɛgɛ Krisito asɩn mʋ ɩ kyɩna fanɛ tɔ gaa. Fan taa kanyaasɩn kaapʋ abaa kɛ fan da abaa amu tɔ. Fan taa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩlʋn yɛ abwaarɛsɩn ɩlʋn yɛ Kayaayu kɩlɛɛkaapʋ ɩlʋn fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ lɩɩ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ.
51003017	Nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fɛn waa abɛɛ fɛn tɔwɛ mʋ, fan waa ɩmʋ kpini Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ, kɛ fan bɔla mʋ sʋ taa afwaala sa Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ.
51003018	Akyɩɩ‐kilipu, fan bɩya fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ sa fanɛ‐kuli ana, kanɩn ɩ dagaa Krisito ɔkyɩɩ maa waa.
51003019	Anyɩn‐kilipu, fan nyɛ kebiti sa fanɛ‐ka ana kɛ fan man ŋmanyan bamʋ.
51003020	Nbii, fan nu sa fanɛ akʋʋgɛpʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩnɩmʋ ii gyii Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu mu ansi.
51003021	Akʋgɛpʋ fan man waa fanɛ‐bii ana agbʋ, man gyɛ kanɩn bamʋ abaa ii biti ɩ yɔɔ.
51003022	Anyɛ, fan nu sa fanɛ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ana mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kasɛ sʋ nfɩɩ mʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ. Man gyɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ ansi ɩ gyan fanɛ sʋ mʋ nkʋn nɩɩ fan waa, kɛ fan nyɛ kʋwɛɛ kuwu lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ. Amaa fan nu sa bamʋ kesintin tɔ lɩɩ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ, lɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ bɛɛrɛɛ sʋ.
51003023	Kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fɛn waa mʋ, fan taa fanɛ nkɔlɔ kpini waa ɩmʋ fɛɛ fan maa waa ɩmʋ fɛn sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ, nɩɩ man gyɛ asa,
51003024	fɛɛ fan nyi fan maa biti fan nyɛ kʋkɔka mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ taa yɩla mʋ asa mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Krisito ɩ gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ nɩɩ fen sun mʋ.
51003025	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa alibi mu alibi kʋkɔka nɩɩ ee biti ɔ nyɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ man sʋ nmɛɛgɛ tɔ.
51004001	Kasɛ sʋ anyɩrɩpɛ, fan kɩɩ fanɛ anyɛ sʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn, lɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan nyi fan maa sʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ sʋsʋ.
