51004002	Fan nyɛ saŋa sa kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ saŋa kʋmaa, kɛ fan baa fan da sʋ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ tɔ, kɛ fan taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ.
51004003	Kɛ fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ sa anɛ gbaa‐gbaa anɛ fɛɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ o bugi ɔkpa sa mʋ asɩn mʋ kɩtɔwɛ, kɛ a nyɛ ɔkpa tɔwɛ asɩn baalasa lɩɩ Krisito sʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n tii obu falɛ.
51004004	Fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ fɛɛ n taalɛ n bugi tɔ n tɔwɛ asɩn mʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ n tɔwɛ mʋ.
51004005	Fan bɩɩ kanyaasɩn lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan kyɩna yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Krisito abuupu mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkpa kʋ kan bugi sa fanɛ yɛ fan tɔwɛ bamʋ Krisito asɩn mʋ, fan tɔwɛ ɩmʋ sa bamʋ.
51004006	Fan yɛgɛ fanɛ ntɔwɛ ɩ baa ɩ bʋkɔn fɛɛ nfɔlɛ, kɛ fan bɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan lɛɛ kɔnɔ sa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taasɛ fanɛ asɩn mʋ.
51004007	Anɛ bɩrɩsa Tikiku danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ kesintin obuupu yɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kusun tɔ mʋ, ii biti ɔ ba tɔwɛ fanɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n du nfɩɩ.
51004008	Ɩnɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n sun mʋ fanɛ asɛ, kɛ fan nyɛ bɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an du nfɩɩ, kɛ ɔ bɛ tɔwɛ saŋɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ.
51004009	Maa anɛ bɩrɩsa danbɩrasa Krisito ɔkɔɔlɛ‐gyipu Onesimu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ fanɛ ayɛ obii mʋ, nɩɩ n sun mʋ fanɛ asɛ. Bamʋ ii biti ba tɔwɛ fanɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ii kpee sʋ nfɩɩ kpini.
51004010	Mɛ bɩrɩsa Arisitako mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ mɛ asɛ obu tiisa tɔ mʋ ɩɩ fwaala fanɛ. Kanɩn nɩɩ Banabasi mu‐supu Maki gbaa ɩɩ fwaala fanɛ. N wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ nɩɩ ɔ kan ba fanɛ asɛ mʋ, fan kɩɩ mʋ sʋ danbɩrasa.
51004011	Gyosuwa mʋ nɩɩ ba bɩla bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gyusitusi mʋ gbaa ɩ fwaala fanɛ. Bamʋ nkʋn ɩ gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ nɩɩ ba tii mɛ bɩrɩsa ana sʋ, nɩɩ ba gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ asunsunpu, nɩɩ ba kyɛ mɛ tɔ yɛ ɔdan.
51004012	Epafarasi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ fanɛ ayɛ abi nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Yesu Krisito kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ ɩɩ fwaala fanɛ. Saŋa kʋmaa nɩmʋ ɛɛ kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gaa ɛɛ sa fanɛ fɛɛ, ɔ waa fanɛ kɛ fan yɩlɛ tɔ kenken, kɛ fan dan kɛ fanɛ Krisito kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii ɩ nyɛ ilin gaa, kɛ fan waa Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti sʋ.
51004013	Ngbaagbaa mɛ n nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ Epafarasi taa fanɛ asɩn yɛ Lawodisiya abi yɛ Hirapoli abi asɩn waa mʋ asɩn tirisa, nɩɩ ee wu fanɛ lewu.
51004014	Anɛ kyɛmɩnɛ danbɩrasa Luka mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ ɔkyɛpʋ mʋ, yɛ Demasi bɛɛ fwaala fanɛ.
51004015	Ngbaa mɛ n fwaala anɛ bɩrɩsa ana mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Lawodisiya mʋ, yɛ ɔkyɩɩ Nimfa yɛ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ gyaŋɛ mʋ ayɛ mʋ.
51004016	Nɩɩ ba kan kalɛ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ sa fanɛ lʋwɛ mʋ, fan kɩɩ sʋ kɛ ba kalɛ ɔwʋlɛ maŋa sa Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Lawodisiya kadɛ tɔ mʋ gbaa, kɛ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan kalɛ ɔwʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ n kyʋrɔɔ naa sa Lawodisiya abi mʋ.
51004017	Fan tɔwɛ Akipusi yɛ, “Kɩɩ sʋ kɛ fʋ lʋwɛ kusun mʋ nɩɩ fʋ nyɛ lɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ asɛ mʋ.”
51004018	Mɛ Pɔɔlɩ ɩ taa mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ kɩbaa kyʋrɔɔ afwaala nɩmʋ n sa fanɛ. Fan man tan sʋ fɛɛ n san n bʋ obu kitii tɔ. Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ bwaala fanɛ.
52001001	Mɛ Pɔɔlɩ maa Silasi yɛ Timoti ɩ kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ an sa fanɛ Krisito abi kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ fan bʋ Tesalonika mʋ, nɩɩ fan gyɛ Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito asa mʋ. Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala yɛ kayɩɩ‐yuuli kɩ baa kɩ bʋ fanɛ asɛ.
52001002	Saŋa kʋmaa an fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ, nɩɩ an nyiŋi fanɛ kpini sʋ anɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ tɔ.
52001003	Anɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ anɛ‐Sɛ mʋ, an nyiŋi fanɛ sʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan sun kusun lɩɩ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ, yɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ fan taa waa kusun bʋlʋnsa, yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan nyɛ kɔkɔlɔ yɩlɛ tɔ lɩɩ tamaa mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito tɔ mʋ.
52001004	Anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana, an nyi fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti sʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ fanɛ waa mʋ lɛɛ.
52001005	Lɩɩ fɛɛ an man taa asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ ba tɔwɛ sa fanɛ kɔnɔ tɔ nkʋn nɩn. Amaa an ba tɔwɛ fanɛ asɩn mʋ yɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ɔlʋn tɔ, nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ asɩn mʋ gyii yɛ ɩ gyɛ kesintin. Nɩɩ fan wu kakyɩna danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ an kyɩna yɛ fanɛ, kɛ ɩ kyɛ fanɛ tɔ.
52001006	Fan kasɛ anɛ yɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ awaasa tɔ, ɩmʋ sʋ halɩɩ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan bʋ ɩmʋ tɔ gbaa mʋ, fan kɔɔlɛ asɩn mʋ yɛ kensi‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ sa fanɛ mʋ.
52001007	Ɩmʋ sʋ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Masedoniya yɛ Akiya mʋ kpini bɛɛ kɩɩ fanɛ awaasa nɩɩ bɛɛ bɩɩla ɩmʋ.
52001008	Nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ asɩn mʋ ɩ man yalagɛ lɩɩ fanɛ asɛ kpee Masedoniya yɛ Akiya nkʋn, amaa fanɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii asɩn mʋ, ɩ yalagɛ kpee katɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ. Kanɩn sʋ ɩ man daaga fɛɛ a bɩla tɔwɛ kʋtɔ kʋ lɩɩ ɩmʋ sʋ.
52001009	Lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ gbaa‐gbaa bamʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ kɩfɔ kɩtaa mʋ nɩɩ fan kɩtaa anɛ. Bɛɛ tɔwɛ asa kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan kyɛɛgɛ lɩɩ ɩdakpa kusun tɔ, ba sun Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ nkpa yɛ kesintin mʋ.
52001010	Nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan gyoo Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii Yesu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kusaa mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ, mʋ kibwii lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba mʋ asɩn. Nɩɩ mʋ ɩɩ kɔɔlɛ anɛ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ agbʋ lala mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ ba asa sʋ mʋ.
52002001	Anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana Krisito abuupu, fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ fen nyi fɛɛ anɛ kɩba mʋ nɩɩ an ba fanɛ asɛ mʋ man waa kɩyan.
52002002	Pɔyɩ kɛ a ba fanɛ asɛ mʋ, fen nyi kanan mʋ Filipi abi ba saalɛ anɛ nɩɩ ba yɛgɛ nɩɩ an gyii awʋrʋfɔ. Amaa halɩɩ ba maa kʋsʋ yɩlɛ anɛ sʋ gbaa mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ kyɛ anɛ tɔ nɩɩ an nyɛ kɔkɔlɔ yɩlɛ tɔ, nɩɩ an taalɛ tɔwɛ fanɛ mʋ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ.
52002003	Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ an tɔwɛ an kʋlɛ fanɛ falɛ mʋ, an man fɔyɩ ɔkpa, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ nfɛɛrɛ libi kʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ npɩna asɩn.
52002004	Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ ɩɩ kɩɩ wu anɛ nɩɩ ɔ taa Asɩn danbɩrasa katɔwɛ waa anɛ abaa tɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ man gyɛ nyɩmɩsa kebiti sʋ nɩɩ an waa, amaa kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ ansi mʋ. Mʋ ii nyi anɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ yɛ anɛ nfɛɛrɛ.
52002005	Fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fen nyi fɛɛ an man taa kɔnɔ tɔ kɔn asɩn tɔwɛ fanɛ. Nɩɩ an man taa sɛhn baala fanɛ sʋ kɛ a nyɛ kʋtɔ kʋ lɩɩ fanɛ asɛ. Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ gyɛ anɛ kesintin ogyipu.
52002006	An man kyɩna an biti ayɩn‐bi lɩɩ asa asɛ abɛɛ fanɛ asɛ abɛɛ ɔkʋ asɛ. Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an gyɛ Krisito Asunpu falɛ mʋ, naafɔɔ an sʋ ɔkpa fɛɛ a biliŋi kasʋla fanɛ sʋ,
52002007	amaa an yɔɔ anɛ n‐yɩɩ kyɩna fanɛ asɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ talapʋ ɩɩ yɔɔ mʋ n‐yɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ mu‐bii ana sʋ mʋ.
52002008	A maa biti fanɛ asɩn gaa sʋ mʋ, man gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nkʋn nɩɩ an taa bɩya fanɛ. Amaa an taa anɛ n‐yɩɩ gbaa sa fanɛ tii sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan biliŋi anɛ abitipu.
52002009	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, n kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ fen nyiŋi kanan mʋ nɩɩ an waa kusun gaa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ an bʋ fanɛ asɛ mʋ. An waa kusun kakyʋwapɛ yɛ kagyanbwɛ an kɩɩ anɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ an tɔwɛ fanɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, kanan mʋ nɩɩ a man biliŋi kasʋla fanɛ ɔkʋ sʋ.
52002010	Fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii mʋ, fan naa Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ gyɛ anɛ kesintin agyipu lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an kyɩna fanɛ tɔ, nɩɩ an man sʋ ineesi ɩkʋ, nɩɩ anɛ ɩkpa i kyiigi, nɩɩ alibi kʋ man bʋ anɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ.
52002011	Lɩɩ fɛɛ fan nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ an bɩla fanɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔsɛ ɩɩ bɩla mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mu‐bii ana mʋ.
52002012	An waa fanɛ aniya tɔ, nɩɩ an tɔwɛ yuula fanɛ nkɔlɔ, nɩɩ an tɔwɛ waa fanɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan kyɩna kakyɩna danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ ansi. Mʋ ɩ tɩɩ fanɛ ba mu kuwura‐gyii yɛ mʋ bʋnyaa mʋ tɔ.
52002013	Nɩɩ anɛ gbaa anɛ an bɩla an kyaga sʋ an fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan maa kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fan nu lɩɩ anɛ asɛ mʋ, fan man kɔɔlɛ asɩn mʋ fɛɛ asa asɩn, amaa fan kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ gyii fɛɛ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ gbaa‐gbaa, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kesintin mʋ. Kanɩn Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn maŋa ii sun kusun fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ tɔ.
52002014	Fanɛ, mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, an wu fɛɛ asɩn libi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ ba tu Ɩbwaarɛ kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Krisito lɛɛ, nɩɩ ɩ bʋ Gyudeya mʋ, kanɩn asɩn libi kʋlʋn maŋa ɩ ba tu fanɛ gbaa. Lɩɩ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan wu awʋrʋfɔ fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa asa abaa tɔ mʋ, kanɩn nɩɩ ba wu awʋrʋfɔ Gyiwu abi abaa tɔ.
52002015	Bamʋ ɩ gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba mɔɔ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu, nɩɩ dɩdaa mʋ bamʋ ɩ mɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ akʋlʋn maŋa ɩ gya anɛ kyʋŋɛ mʋ. Bamʋ asɩn i mee gyii Ɩbwaarɛ ansi, nɩɩ ba kʋsʋ yɩlɛ asa kpini sʋ.
52002016	Nɩɩ ba kpan bamʋ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ naafɔɔ bee tii anɛ ɔkpa, kɛ a man nyɛ tɔwɛ Asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ, kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ mɔlɩgɛ bamʋ. Lɩɩ falɛ ɔkpa sʋ mʋ, ba kʋʋla bamʋ alibi gyaga abaa sʋ naa fʋʋ ɩmʋ laalaalʋwɛ. Nbɩɩnbɩɩ mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ nyɛ agbʋ waa bamʋ, nɩɩ ee biti ɔ bɩɩtɛ bamʋ asʋ.
52002017	Amaa mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, saŋa dɛɛ kʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba barɩgɛ anaa fanɛ nsana mʋ, an lɩɩ fanɛ ansi sʋ bɩrɛ, amaa fanɛ asɩn ɩ san ɩ bʋ anɛ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ yɩlɛ anɛ ansi sʋ gaa fɛɛ ɔkpa kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ mʋ a bwii ba wu fanɛ.
52002018	An biti gaa fɛɛ a ba fanɛ asɛ. Mɛ Pɔɔlɩ, n kpan mɛ n‐yɩɩ saŋa gaalaagaa sʋ fɛɛ a ba fanɛ asɛ, amaa Sɩtaanɛ tii anɛ ɔkpa.
52002019	Anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kibwii ba mʋ, mɩnɛ ɩ gyɛ anɛ tamaa yɛ anɛ kensi‐gyii yɛ anɛ bʋnyaa kɩnyɛ mu ansi tɔ? Man gyɛ fanɛ?
52002020	Kesintin mʋ, fanɛ ɩ gyɛ anɛ bʋnyaa yɛ kensi‐gyii.
52003001	Ɩmʋ sʋ a maa wu yɛ a man bɩla yɛ a taalɛ waa kʋtɔ kʋ lɩɩ ɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, an waa anɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ anɛ nkʋn an sii Antensi kadɛ tɔ nfɩɩ.
52003002	Nɩɩ an sun anɛ‐supu Timoti mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ anɛ bɩrɩsa Ɩbwaarɛ kusun obuupu mʋ nɩɩ anaa mʋ an tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa lɩɩ Krisito sʋ. An sun mʋ yɛ ɔ ba waa fanɛ ɔlʋn tɔ yɛ aniya tɔ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ.
52003003	Kɛ kanyanla mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ ba fanɛ sʋ falɛ, ɩ man yɛgɛ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ o bwii kamaa. Fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ fen nyi fɛɛ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti nɩɩ kanyanla nɩmʋ ɩ ba anɛ sʋ.
52003004	Kesintin tɔ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ an bʋ fanɛ asɛ mʋ, an taalɛ an tɔwɛ fanɛ fɛɛ an biti an nyɛ kanyanla. Nɩɩ ɩ ba kanɩn kesintin fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan nyi mʋ.
52003005	Lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ n maa man bɩla yɛ n taalɛ kyɩna yɛgɛ n man wu fanɛ mʋ, n sun Timoti yɛ ɔ ba kɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan yɩlɛ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ sʋ mɛ kufuu fɛɛ falɛ ɔtʋʋtɔkɩɩpʋ mʋ ba tʋʋ fanɛ tɔ kɩɩ, kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ anɛ kɩkpɩnɛ mʋ ɩ waa kɩyan.
52003006	Amaa Timoti dan lɩɩ fanɛ asɛ ba nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɩya asɩn bʋkɔnsa lɩɩ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii yɛ fanɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ anɛ yɛ anɛ asɩn a bʋ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ nɩɩ fen nyiŋi anɛ sʋ gaa saŋa kʋmaa nɩmʋ, nɩɩ fen biti fɛɛ anaa fanɛ an wu abaa, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ anɛ gbaa anɛ an biti mʋ.
52003007	Ɩmʋ sʋ, mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, anaa anɛ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ an gyii yɛ kanyanla mʋ nɩɩ a wu mʋ kpini mʋ, lɩɩ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ mʋ ɩ waa anɛ ɔlʋn tɔ.
52003008	Nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ, anɛ nkɔlɔ ɩ tɩyɛ anɛ lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan yɩlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ tɔ kenken mʋ.
52003009	Afwaala mɔɔ nɩɩ an biti a taa sa Ɩbwaarɛ lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ, lɩɩ kensi‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ an nyɛ lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ falɛ?
52003010	Kakyʋwapɛ yɛ kagyanbwɛ kpini an kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ gaa lɩɩ anɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ fɛɛ a bɩla nyɛ wu fanɛ, kɛ a sa fanɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ.
52003011	Nɩɩ anɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa‐gbaa yɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu ba bugi ɔkpa sa anɛ kɛ a ba fanɛ asɛ.
52003012	An kʋlɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu yɛ, ɔ yɛgɛ fanɛ kebiti kɩ nyɛ akyɔ tii sʋ, kɛ fan biti abaa yɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ gaa, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ anɛ gbaa an sʋ kebiti sa fanɛ mʋ.
52003013	An kʋlɛ fɛɛ ɔ sa fanɛ kɔkɔlɔ ɔsɩɩ, kɛ alibi yɛ ineesi ɩkʋ ɩ man bʋ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu ii biti ɔ ba maa Ɩbwaarɛ asa mʋ.
52004001	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, an sa fanɛ kɔnɔ yɛ fan kyɩna kakyɩna mʋ nɩɩ i gyii Ɩbwaarɛ ansi, nɩɩ fan nu sa anɛ. Anɛ laalaalʋwɛ asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ an sʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu an kʋlɛ fanɛ yɛ, fan kɩtaa tɔ kɛ fan waa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ kyɔ falɛ tii sʋ.
52004002	Lɩɩ fɛɛ fen nyi kɩkaapʋ mʋ nɩɩ an kaapʋ fanɛ lɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu ɔlʋn tɔ.
52004003	Ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti nɩn fɛɛ fan man waa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ ineesi, kɛ fan lɛɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ abawʋlɛ‐sɩn tɔ.
52004004	Kɛ fanɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ o kun mʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ kakyɩɩ abɛɛ kanyɩn biti sʋ, kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ baa o du kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ kɛ ɔ nyɛ bɛɛrɛɛ.
52004005	Kɛ mʋ awaasa ɩ man ba ɩ gyɛ kayalaga ɔkpa sʋ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man nyi Ɩbwaarɛ maa mʋ ɩkpa mʋ.
52004006	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ ɔ man taa falɛ awaasa libi nɩmʋ waa mʋ bɩrɩsa, abɛɛ o sisii mʋ kayalaga asɩn kʋ tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ ii biti ɔ bɩɩtɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa falɛ alibi asʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ nɩɩ an da fanɛ amu tɔ mʋ.
52004007	Ɩbwaarɛ man tɩɩ anɛ yɛ an ba waa agyaga‐sɩn nɩn, amaa a ba kyɩna kakyɩna kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ tɔ.
52004008	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee kina kɩkaapʋ nɩmʋ mʋ, man gyɛ nyɩmɩsa nɩɩ ee kina, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ sa anɛ mʋ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ee kina.
52004009	Nɩɩ lɩɩ kinyi‐bii kebiti bɩrɛ sʋ mʋ, ɩ man bɩla i tiri fɛɛ a kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ sa fanɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kaapʋ fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan biti abaa.
52004010	Nɩɩ kesintin tɔ mʋ, fen biti fanɛ bɩrɩsa ana mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Masedoniya kasɛ sʋ kpini. Amaa anɛ bɩrɩsa ana, an tɔwɛ an waa fanɛ aniya tɔ fɛɛ fan kyaga sʋ waa kanɩn tii sʋ.
52004011	Fan kpan fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kɛ fan kyɩna kayɩɩ yuuli tɔ, kɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ man taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ waa asa asɩn tɔ, kɛ fan taa fanɛ abaa sun kusun. An wʋla tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ kpini.
52004012	Lɩɩ kanɩn sʋ mʋ, fen biti fan nyɛ bɛɛrɛɛ lɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba man tii fanɛ sʋ mʋ asɛ, kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ kɛ fan man taa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ tʋʋ ɔkʋ sʋ.
52004013	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, a mee biti fɛɛ fan baa fan bʋ kitentenbiri tɔ lɩɩ alewupu sʋ, abɛɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ i nyita fanɛ fɛɛ asansa mʋ nɩɩ ba man sʋ tamaa mʋ.
52004014	An kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ Yesu wu nɩɩ o bwii kyiŋi ba nkpa tɔ, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ an bɩla kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii nɩɩ ba wu mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ bwii kyiŋi bamʋ ba nkpa tɔ, kɛ ba maa Yesu ba bwii ba.
52004015	Lɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa kɔnɔ tɔ asɩn mʋ, nɩɩ an tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ anɛ mʋ nɩɩ an san an tɛ nkpa tɔ naa fʋʋ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ ii biti ɔ ba mʋ, a mɛɛ yɛ a gyankpaa alewupu mʋ.
52004016	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa ii biti ɔ kpɩlɩgɛ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ɛɛ ba kasɛ, yɛ ɩlawʋ lala kɔnɔsa yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ bɩlɩsa ɔbʋlɛ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɩlɛ, kɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba wu Krisito tɔ mʋ ba gyankpaa kyiŋi.
52004017	Ɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, anɛ mʋ nɩɩ an sii nɩɩ an san an bʋ nkpa tɔ mʋ, ee biti ɔ kɩtaa anɛ bʋga bamʋ tɔ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ tɔ, kɛ a naa gyaŋa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ sʋsʋ. Kɛ a naa kyɩna yɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ kakpaa.
52004018	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan taa falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ tɔwɛ waa abaa ɔlʋn tɔ.
52005001	Mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, ɩ man bɩla i tiri fɛɛ a kyʋrɔɔ asɩn kʋ lɩɩ saŋa yɛ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ii biti i ba mʋ sa fanɛ.
52005002	Lɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fen nyi kesintin tɔ fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Kakɛ Lala mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ ba mʋ, ii biti ɩ baa i du nɩn fɛɛ oyu maa ba kagyanbwɛ mʋ.
52005003	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ asa bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “An sʋ kayɩɩ yuuli nɩɩ sɛhn man bɩla yɛ ɔ waa anɛ” mʋ, tʋtɔ nɩɩ kenyiita kii biti kɩ ba bamʋ sʋ opula tɔ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ keduŋidi kɩɩ kɩtaa ɔtɔ wuya mʋ. Nɩɩ bamʋ ɔkʋ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ taalɛ lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ kanɩn awʋrʋfɔ mʋ tɔ.
52005004	Amaa fanɛ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu bɩrɛ, fan man bʋ kitentenbiri tɔ, kɛ kanɩn kakɛ maŋa kɩ ba purigi fanɛ fɛɛ oyu mʋ.
52005005	Fanɛ kpini fɛn gyɛ fɩtɩla tɔ asa nɩɩ fɛn naa kayɩkɛ tɔ. Amaa a man gyɛ kagyanbwɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ an naa kitentenbiri tɔ.
52005006	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan man yɛgɛ an baa an du fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba dɛ tan sʋ mʋ, amaa fan yɛgɛ an kʋʋla anɛ n‐yɩɩ kɛ an baa an da sʋ.
52005007	Lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ dɛ mʋ, bɛɛ dɛ kagyanbwɛ nɩn, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ bʋʋ nta mʋ, bɛɛ bʋʋ kagyanbwɛ nɩn.
52005008	Amaa fɛɛ a maa gyɛ kayɩkɛ tɔ asa mʋ, fan yɛgɛ an kʋʋla anɛ n‐yɩɩ, kɛ a taa anɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii yɛ kebiti waa kʋtɔ kunsa kun anɛ nkɔlɔ sʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ anaakɔpʋ bɛɛ waa mʋ. Kɛ a taa kamɔlɩgɛ mʋ nɩɩ an sʋ tamaa mʋ waa kʋwʋrʋ bun anɛ amu sʋ fɛɛ anaakɔpʋ awʋrʋ.
52005009	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ man tɩɩ anɛ yɛ a ba gyii awʋrʋfɔ lɩɩ mʋ agbʋ lala mʋ sʋ. Amaa ɔ tɩɩ anɛ yɛ lɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito sʋ kɛ a ba nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ.
52005010	Yesu Krisito wu sa anɛ nɩn, ɩmʋ sʋ an kan an tɛ nkpa tɔ nɩn oo, abɛɛ an wu nɩn oo, anaa mʋ a bʋga kyɩna.
52005011	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan tɔwɛ waa abaa ɔlʋn tɔ, kɛ fan kyɛ abaa tɔ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fɛn wʋla fɛn waa falɛ.
52005012	Anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana, an kʋlɛ fanɛ fɛɛ fan taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa fanɛ agyankpaapʋ mʋ nɩɩ fanaa bamʋ fen sun Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito mʋ. Bɛɛ kpan bamʋ n‐yɩɩ bɛɛ waa kusun nɩɩ bɛɛ kaapʋ fanɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan kyɩna kakyɩna danbɩrasa tɔ.
52005013	Lɩɩ kusun mʋ nɩɩ bee sun sʋ mʋ, fan taa bɛɛrɛɛ lala sa bamʋ kɛ fan biti bamʋ asɩn gaa. Kɛ fan taa kayɩɩ‐yuuli kyɩna yɛ abaa.
52005014	Anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana, an tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, fan da awʋlɛgyɔpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ fanɛ tɔ mʋ amu tɔ, kɛ fan tɔwɛ waa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man sʋ nkɔlɔ mʋ, kɛ fan kyɛ apɔɔsɩpʋ mʋ tɔ, kɛ fan nyɛ kenyiita sa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ.
52005015	Fan kɩɩ sʋ yɛ ɔdan kɛ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ ɔ man taa alibi ka alibi kʋkɔ. Amaa saŋa kʋmaa fan kpan fanɛ n‐yɩɩ fan waa kɩdanbɩrasa fɛn sa abaa yɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ.
52005016	Fan yɛgɛ fanɛ ansi i gyii saŋa kʋmaa.
52005017	Fan kyaga sʋ fɛn kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ saŋa kʋmaa.
52005018	Fan taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩnɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti fɛɛ fan waa lɩɩ Yesu Krisito ɔlʋn tɔ sʋ.
52005019	Fan man dun Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ fʋlɔn mʋ kusun.
52005020	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu kan lɛɛ asɩn sa mʋ atɔwɛpʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ fanɛ mʋ, fan man mirigi asɩn mʋ nnɔ.
52005021	Amaa fan tʋʋ bamʋ asɩn tɔwɛsa yɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa tɔ kɩɩ, kɛ fan kɩtaa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn.
52005022	Kɛ fan lɛɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ alibi kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ.
52005023	Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ keyuula wuya mʋ, ɔ lɔŋɔ fanɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ yɩla sa mʋ n‐yɩɩ. Kɛ ɔ kɩɩ fanɛ kayaayu yɛ fanɛ kala yɛ fanɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kpini sʋ, kɛ alibi akʋ ɩ man ba ɩ bʋ fanɛ sʋ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito ii biti o bwii ba mʋ.
52005024	Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ fanɛ waa mʋ lɛɛ mʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ kesintin wuya nɩɩ ee biti ɔ waa kanɩn.
52005025	Anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana, fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ sa anɛ.
52005026	Fan fwaala Krisito abi mʋ kpini kɛ fan taa kebiti baari abaa.
52005027	Lɩɩ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ, n tɔwɛ fan yɛ fan kalɛ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ sa akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ kpini.
52005028	Anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kabwaala kɩ baa kɩ bʋ fanɛ asɛ.
53001001	Mɛ Pɔɔlɩ maa Silasi yɛ Timoti ɩ kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ an sa fanɛ Krisito abi kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ fan bʋ Tesalonika, nɩɩ fan gyɛ anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito asa mʋ.
53001002	Anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito ba bwaala fanɛ kɛ ba sa fanɛ kayɩɩ yuuli.
53001003	Anɛ‐daa yɛ anɛ‐supu ana, i tiri fɛɛ an fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ saŋa kʋmaa nɩmʋ lɩɩ fanɛ sʋ. Nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ a maa waa kanɩn. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩɩ dan kii tii sʋ, nɩɩ fanɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ sa abaa mʋ kii tii sʋ.
53001004	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ anɛ gbaa‐gbaa anɛ an taalɛ da anɛ nkɔlɔ sʋ, an tɔwɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn an sa Ɩbwaarɛ kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ tɔ kpini, lɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fɛn nyɛ nkɔlɔ yɩlɛ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ, lɩɩ fanɛ kanyanla yɛ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ fen gyii mʋ tɔ.
53001005	Ɩnɩmʋ kpini ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ katalɛ mʋ ki du kyɛɛkyɛɛ. Ɩmʋ ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ kɛ fan baa fan dagaa sa Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ fen gyii kɩmʋ sʋ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ.
53001006	Ɩbwaarɛ gyɛ kesintin ogyipu nɩn. Mʋ ii biti ɔ taa awʋrʋfɔ tɛɛla bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ nyanla fanɛ mʋ.
53001007	Ee biti ɔ sa fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fen gyii awʋrʋfɔ mʋ yɛ anɛ kpini ɔfʋʋtɛ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu ee biti ɔ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba maa mʋ nbɔɔ lʋlʋnpʋ yɛ fʋlɔn mʋ.
53001008	Nɩɩ fʋlɔn nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ taa bɩɩtɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee kina mʋ mʋ, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba waa kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn sa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito Asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ.
53001009	Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ bɩɩtɛ bamʋ kʋsʋ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ kenyiita kakpaa, kɛ ɔ gya bamʋ lɩɩ mu ansi yɛ mʋ bʋnyaa mʋ ɔlʋn tɔ.
53001010	Kanɩn kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu ii biti ɔ ba mʋ, mʋ asa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɔŋɔ yɩla mʋ, bee biti ba kʋsaa mʋ kɩtɩɩ sʋsʋ, kɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ ba yɩn mʋ. Fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fan tii sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan kɔɔlɛ mʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ an tɔwɛ fanɛ mʋ gyii.
53001011	Ɩnɩmʋ kpini ɩ maa bʋ anɛ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ sʋ mʋ, an kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ an sa fanɛ saŋa kʋmaa nɩmʋ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ lɔŋɔ fanɛ, kɛ fan dagaa kɩtɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ fanɛ mʋ. Kɛ lɩɩ mʋ ɔlʋn tɔ sʋ mʋ ɔ yɛgɛ kʋtɔ danbɩrasa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fan fɛ nfɛɛrɛ yɛ fen biti fan waa mʋ, ɩ waa ɔdan sa fanɛ, kɛ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kusun mʋ nɩɩ fɛn waa mʋ fan taalɛ waa kɩmʋ naa lʋwɛ.
53001012	An kʋlɛ ɩnɩmʋ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ fɛɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kɩtɩɩ ki dii sʋsʋ, kɛ asa ba wu mʋ bʋnyaa fanɛ tɔ, kɛ lɩɩ Yesu Krisito sʋ mʋ, fanɛ kɩtɩɩ ki dii sʋsʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ maa anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito ba bwaala fanɛ mʋ.
53002001	Anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana, lɩɩ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kɩba mʋ sʋ yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ a bʋga naa gyaŋa mʋ sʋ mʋ, an kʋlɛ fanɛ yɛ,
53002002	nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ba fanɛ asɛ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ asɩn sa mʋ yɛ ɔ tɔwɛ fanɛ mʋ, abɛɛ ɔ nyɛ ɔkala kʋ abɛɛ ɔ nyɛ ɔwʋlɛ lɩɩ anɛ asɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu kakɛ lala mʋ kɩ tɛɛ ba mʋ, fan man yɛgɛ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ i wuliti fanɛ tɔ abɛɛ ɩ ŋmaa fanɛ nkɔlɔ.
53002003	Ɔkpa kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ mʋ fan man yɛgɛ ɔkʋ ɔ pɩna fanɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ kanɩn kakɛ mʋ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ ba, amɔɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ ba kʋsʋ yɩlɛ kina Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, ɔ ba pɔyɩ. Nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa mʋ nɩɩ o mee buu sɛhn, nɩɩ ee biti o wu fɔyɩ kakpaa mʋ, ii biti ɩ lɛɛ mʋ ifuli pɔyɩ kɛ kakɛ mʋ kɩ fʋ.
53002004	Ee biti ɔ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa ii sun fɛɛ ɩdakpa yɛ ɩmʋ tɔ atɔ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa. Ɩmʋ sʋ ee biti ɔ kʋsaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ kpini sʋ, kɛ ɔ naa kyɩna kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ tɔ, ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ.
53002005	Fen mee nyiŋi fɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n kyɩna n bʋ fanɛ asɛ mʋ n tɔwɛ fanɛ ɩnɩmʋ kpini?
53002006	Nɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ fan nyi kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii tii ɔmʋ nɩɩ o mee buu sɛhn mʋ ɔkpa, lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba lɛɛ mʋ ifuli mʋ ɩ man pɩɩ fʋʋ.
53002007	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o mee buu sɛhn mʋ ɔlʋn mʋ ɩ wʋla ii sun kusun asiri tɔ, nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ asa bɛɛ waa kʋsʋ tɔ alʋn. Amaa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee kun kɩmʋ nbɩɩnbɩɩ mʋ, ii biti ɔ kyaga sʋ ee kun kanɩn naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ lɛɛ mʋ lɩɩ ɔkpa mʋ sʋ.
53002008	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ lɛɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o mee buu sɛhn mʋ ifuli, nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu kan bwii ba mʋ, kɛ ɔ taa mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ afuu mʋ mɔɔ mʋ, kɛ ɔ taa mʋ bʋnyaa nyita mʋ kakpaa.
53002009	Ɔmʋ nɩɩ o mee buu sɛhn mʋ kɩba mʋ, ee biti o sun Sɩtaanɛ kusun. Ee biti ɔ taa Sɩtaanɛ ɔlʋn waa adangana yɛ sɩnkaala yɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa pɩna asa.
53002010	Nɩɩ ee biti ɔ bɔla ɔkpa kʋmaa sʋ taa asɩn libi pɩna bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba nyita mʋ. Bee nyita, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba kina kesintin mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ mɔlɩgɛ bamʋ mʋ.
53002011	Lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ antɩŋɛsa lala ba bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ, kɛ ba lan bɛɛ kɔɔlɛ antɩŋɛsa mʋ bee gyii,
53002012	kɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kina kesintin kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ ansi i gyii alibi kɩwaa sʋ mʋ kpini bee biti ba gyii kʋpwɛ.
53002013	Anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ ii biti fanɛ asɩn, ɩ dagaa saŋa kʋmaa nɩmʋ a maa fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ sa fanɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ fanɛ lɩɩ npiili asɛ mʋ yɛ ee biti ɔ mɔlɩgɛ fanɛ. Ɔ waa ɩnɩmʋ nɩn lɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ɔlʋn tɔ yɛ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ kesintin mʋ gyii, kɛ fan baa fan gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɔŋɔ yɩlɛ sa mʋ n‐yɩɩ.
53002014	Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla mʋ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ an tɔwɛ mʋ sʋ tɩɩ fanɛ yɛ fan ba nyɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito bʋnyaa mʋ.
53002015	Kanɩn sʋ, anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana, anɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ an kaapʋ fanɛ yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ an kyʋrɔɔ sa fanɛ mʋ, fan yɩlɛ tɔ kɛ fan kɩtaa ɩmʋ tɔ kenken.
53002016	Anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito gbaa‐gbaa yɛ anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ bee biti anɛ asɩn gaa mʋ, ba bɔla kabwaala mʋ sʋ tɔwɛ waa anɛ ɔlʋn tɔ kakpaa, nɩɩ ba sa anɛ tamaa danbɩrasa.
53002017	An kʋlɛ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ tɔwɛ kɩtaa fanɛ nkɔlɔ, kɛ ɔ waa fanɛ ɔlʋn tɔ lɩɩ fanɛ kʋtɔ danbɩrasa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fɛn waa yɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ fɛn tɔwɛ.
53003001	Anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana, anɛ laalaalʋwɛ asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ sa anɛ kɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ asɩn mʋ ɩ nyɛ yalagɛ bilen‐bilen, kɛ ɩ nyɛ bɛɛrɛɛ lala fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ nyɛ fanɛ asɛ mʋ.
53003002	Kɛ fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ lɛɛ anɛ lɩɩ amu tɔ ɔlʋn wuya ana yɛ asɩn libi wuya ana abaa tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ man gyɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɩɩ kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii.
53003003	Amaa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ gyɛ kesintin wuya nɩn, nɩɩ mʋ ii biti ɔ sa fanɛ ɔlʋn kɛ o kun fanɛ lɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ kɩbaa tɔ.
53003004	An sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ tɔ fɛɛ ɛɛ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fɛn waa, nɩɩ fen biti fan kyaga sʋ waa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ an sa fanɛ kɔnɔ yɛ fan waa mʋ.
53003005	An kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ yɛ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ o biliŋaa fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ kpee Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti mʋ tɔ yɛ Yesu Krisito kɔkɔlɔ kɩnyɛ yɩlɛ tɔ mʋ tɔ.
53003006	Anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana, lɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ mʋ, an sa fanɛ kɔnɔ yɛ fanɛ bɩrɩsa mʋ nɩɩ o mee biti kusun kɩwaa, nɩɩ mʋ kɩbaabʋtɔ kɩ man naa yɛ kɩkaapʋ mʋ nɩɩ fan nyɛ lɩɩ anɛ asɛ mʋ, fan kɩtaa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ mʋ sʋ.
53003007	Fanɛ gbaa‐gbaa fanɛ fen nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fan buu anɛ ayaa natɛsa. Lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ an bʋ fanɛ asɛ mʋ a man kyɩna waa wʋlʋgyɔ,
53003008	nɩɩ an man gyii ɔkʋ agyitɔ yɛgɛ a man ka ɩmʋ kʋkɔ. Amaa an payɩ ansi waa kusun yɛ kɩkpɩnɛ kakyʋwapɛ yɛ kagyanbwɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ anɛ kɩkyɩna fanɛ asɛ mʋ ɩ man waa kasʋla sa fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ.
53003009	A maa waa ɩnɩmʋ mʋ, ɩ man gyɛ nɩn yɛ a man sʋ ɔkpa kɛ a taa anɛ n‐yɩɩ tʋʋ fanɛ nkyɛtɔ sʋ, amaa an waa yɩla nɩn kɛ fan nyɛ buu anɛ ayaa natɛsa sʋ.
53003010	Halɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ an bʋ fanɛ asɛ mʋ an sa fanɛ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o mee biti kusun kɩwaa mʋ, ɔ man gyii.”
53003011	An nu yɛ akʋ ba bʋ fanɛ tɔ ba sʋ wʋlʋgyɔ. Be mee sun kusun kʋ, amɔɔ asa asɩn tɔ kɩnatɛ loo.
53003012	Bamʋ nɩɩ be du kanɩn mʋ, an sa bamʋ kɔnɔ nɩɩ an tɔwɛ an sa bamʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kɩtɩɩ tɔ sʋ yɛ ba biti kusun waa biti bamʋ agyitɔ gyisa.
53003013	Amaa fanɛ, anɛ‐daa ana yɛ anɛ‐supu ana bɩrɛ, fan man yɛgɛ kɩdanbɩrasa kɩwaa i fii fanɛ.
53003014	Nɩɩ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ kan kina anɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ an kyʋrɔɔ waa ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ tɔ falɛ mʋ, fan baa fan da mʋ sʋ. Fanaa mʋ fan man bɩla bʋga waa sɛhn, kɛ ipeeli ɩ kɩtaa mʋ.
53003015	Fan man taa mʋ waa fɛɛ fanɛ dʋn, amaa fan tɔwɛ waa mʋ fɛɛ fanɛ‐nyi mu‐bii ana tɔ ɔkʋ.
53003016	Anɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito gbaa‐gbaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ kayɩɩ‐yuuli wuya mʋ, ɔ sa fanɛ kayɩɩ‐yuuli saŋa kʋmaa yɛ ɔkpa kʋmaa sʋ. Anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu ɔ baa ɔ bʋ fanɛ kpini asɛ.
53003017	Mɛ Pɔɔlɩ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ ɩ taa mɛ kɩbaa kyʋrɔɔ afwaala nɩmʋ. Kanɩn nɩɩ n duligi mɛ ɩwʋlɛ kpini. Falɛ nɩɩ n kyʋrɔɔ.
53003018	Anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kabwaala kɩ baa kɩ bʋ fanɛ kpini asɛ.
54001001	Mɛ, Pɔɔlɩ ɩ kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ. Lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ anɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ yɛ Krisito Yesu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ anɛ tamaa kɩpɩrɛ sʋ nɩɩ n ba waa Krisito Yesu Osunpu.
54001002	N kyʋrɔɔ n sa fʋ Timoti mʋ nɩɩ lɩɩ Yesu kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ nɩɩ fʋ gyɛ mɛ kesintin tɔ kebii. Kabwaala yɛ kʋwɛɛ kuwu yɛ kayɩɩ yuuli mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Krisito Yesu asɛ mʋ kɩ ba fʋ sʋ.
54001003	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ waa fʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n kpee Masedoniya mʋ, sii kyɩna Efeso tʋtɔ kɛ fʋ nyɛ tii antɩŋɛsa akaapʋpʋ mʋ kɩkaapʋ ɔkpa.
54001004	Tɔwɛ sa bamʋ yɛ ba yɛgɛ asɩrɩkpan ikisii‐sɩn yɛ kakʋʋgɛ tɔ nkyaga sʋ asɩn. Lɩɩ fɛɛ falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ ɩɩ bɩya ɩmɔɔrɛ‐libi nɩn, nɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ kyɛ asa kabwaarɛ‐sun mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ bɔla kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ mʋ tɔ.
54001005	Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ mɛ kɔnɔsa nɩmʋ yɩlɛ sʋ mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, asa ba nyɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ kɩ lɩɩ kɔkɔlɔ fuuli tɔ, yɛ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn, yɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kesintin tɔ.
54001006	Akʋ ba man bɩla ba buu ɩnɩmʋ, amaa ba buu ntɔwɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ kasɛ.
54001007	Bee biti ba baa ba gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbara akaapʋpʋ mʋ, amaa ba man nyi nɩɩ be mee nu asɩn mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ yɩlɛ ɩmʋ sʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ kasɛ.
54001008	An nyi fɛɛ nbara mʋ ɩ bʋrɔn, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kan buu ɩmʋ ɔkpa sʋ mʋ, ɩ bʋrɔn sa mʋ.
54001009	Nɩɩ an bɩla an nyi yɛ nbara mʋ ɩ man dɛ sa ɩkpa kyiigisa wuya ana, amaa ɩ dɛ sa nbara anyitapu yɛ kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn wuya ana, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba mɛɛ bʋnyaa Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ alibi awaapʋ, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man du kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ be mee sun Ɩbwaarɛ, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ mɔɔ bamʋ‐sɛ ana abɛɛ bamʋ‐nyi ana, yɛ asa amɔɔpʋ.
54001010	Nbara mʋ ɩ bʋ tɔ sa bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ lɩɩ bamʋ‐kuli ana abɛɛ bamʋ‐ka ana kamaa, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa agyaga‐sɩn, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɩtaa asa bɛɛ fɛ kɛ ba nyɛ afulee, yɛ antɩŋɛsa wuya ana, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩn antɩŋɛsa bɛɛ bɔ ntan, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa asɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ i mee buu kesintin kɩkaapʋ mʋ.
54001011	Kɩkaapʋ nɩmʋ kɩ lɩɩ bʋnyaa asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ayenbi ɩ gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ taa waa mɛ abaa tɔ yɛ n tɔwɛ n sa asa.
54001012	N sʋ afwaala n sa anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Krisito Yesu, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sa mɛ ɔlʋn yɛ n waa kusun, nɩɩ o wu mɛ fɛɛ kesintin‐gyipu, nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mɛ yɛ n ba waa mu kusun mʋ.
54001013	Naafɔɔ saŋa kʋ tɔ mʋ, n kyɩna n tɔwɛ n nyita Krisito mʋ, yɛgɛ n nyanla mu abuupu, nɩɩ n biti bamʋ keluu. Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ wu mɛ kʋwɛɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ n man kyɩna n nyi nɩn, nɩɩ n man kyɩna kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii.
54001014	Anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Krisito bwaala mɛ gaa, nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ n kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii, nɩɩ n nyɛ mu kebiti mʋ.
54001015	Katɔwɛ nɩmʋ gyɛ kesintin nɩn, nɩɩ i tiri fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa ɔ kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ gyii. Asɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, Krisito Yesu ba dulinyaa tɔ nɩn yɛ ɔ ba mɔlɩgɛ alibi awaapʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ tɔ kpini mʋ, mɛ ɩ gyɛ olibilibi mʋ.
54001016	Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ wu mɛ kʋwɛɛ, saamʋ Krisito Yesu ɩ nyɛ lɛɛ mu kenyiita lala mʋ kaapʋ, kɛ ɩ ba waa sɩnkaala sa asa mʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii mʋ kpini, kɛ ba nyɛ nkpa kakpaa.
54001017	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan yɛgɛ a taa bɛɛrɛɛ yɛ bʋnyaa sa Owura mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ kakpaa naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ ɔkaa. Nɩɩ mʋ nkʋn ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ o mee wu, nɩɩ a mee wu mʋ yɛ ansi. Amen!
54001018	Mi‐bii Timoti, n sa fʋ falɛ kɔnɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ii buu asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ wʋla tɔwɛ yɩla lɩɩ fʋ sʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ fʋ kan taa ɩmʋ waa kusun mʋ, fii biti fʋ kɔ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ asɩn mʋ ɩkɔ,
54001019	yɛgɛ fʋ sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ nɩɩ fʋ bɩɩ fʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ yɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ waa mʋ ɩ bʋrɔn. Akʋ ba kina ɩnɩmʋ nɩɩ bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii i muuri fɛɛ afuu maa muuri ɔkʋlɩ mʋ.
54001020	Bamʋ tɔ akʋ ɩ gyɛ Himenasu yɛ Alekisanda. N yɛgɛ bamʋ waa Sɩtaanɛ abaa tɔ, kɛ ɩ kaapʋ bamʋ yɛ ba man bɩla tɔwɛ yii Ɩbwaarɛ.
54002001	Kanɩn sʋ, kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri nɩɩ n kʋlɛ yɛ fan waa mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, fan taa asa asɩn tirisa tʋʋ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ, kɛ fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ, kɛ fan yɩlɛ bamʋ ayaa tɔ kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ sa bamʋ, kɛ fan taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ.
54002002	Fan kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ sa awura yɛ alʋlʋnpʋ kpini, kɛ a kyɩna keyuula yɛ kayɩɩ‐yuuli tɔ, kɛ a sun Ɩbwaarɛ danbɩrasa, kɛ a kyɩna kakyɩna mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa.
54002003	Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ bʋrɔn, nɩɩ ɩmʋ ii gyii Ɩbwaarɛ anɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ mu ansi,
54002004	nɩɩ mʋ ii biti fɛɛ asa kpini ba nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ kɛ ba ba bɩɩ kesintin mʋ.
54002005	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kʋlʋn ɩ bʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔsa kʋlʋn ɩ yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ maa asa nsana, nɩɩ Krisito Yesu ɩ gyɛ kanɩn nyɩmɩsa maŋa,
54002006	nɩɩ mʋ ɩ taa mʋ nkpa lɛɛ saraga wu kɔɔlɛ asa kpini, ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ adansɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ kaapʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa.
54002007	Kanɩn maŋa sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mɛ waa asɩn mʋ kabɔɔ yɛ Krisito osunpu. Nɩɩ n gyɛ kesintin yɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ ɔkaapʋpʋ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ. N tɔwɛ kesintin nɩn, n mɛɛ tɩn antɩŋɛsa.
54002008	N biti fɛɛ Krisito kʋbʋ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, anyɩn ba kʋsaa bamʋ abaa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ kʋlɛ yɛgɛ agbʋ yɛ kamɔɔrɛ‐gyii man bʋ bamʋ tɔ.
54002009	N bɩla n biti fɛɛ akyɩɩ mʋ ba bun atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kʋkwɛ bamʋ, nɩɩ ɩ dagaa, nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ agyaga‐sɩn. Ba man waa bamʋ inyini adawʋ‐adawʋ, nɩɩ ba man taa suwa atɔ abɛɛ agyibi yɛ ataa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ sʋ ɔgyalɩn mʋ bun.
54002010	Amaa ba taa kɩbaabʋtɔ danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ dagaa fɛɛ akyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ bee sun Ɩbwaarɛ.
54002011	Akyɩɩ ba bun bamʋ nnɔ sʋ bɩya bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ bɩɩla atɔ.
54002012	N man sa ɔkpa yɛ ɔkyɩɩ ɔ kaapʋ abɛɛ ɔ baa ɔ sʋ ɔlʋn ɔnyɩn sʋ, i tiri fɛɛ ɔ waa surum.
54002013	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Adam nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ gyankpaa tʋʋ pɔyɩ nɩɩ ɔ tʋʋ Hawa.
54002014	Nɩɩ man gyɛ Adam nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ pɩna, amaa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ pɩna nɩɩ o biliŋi alibi ɔwaapʋ.
54002015	Amaa nɩɩ akyɩɩ ba kan kyaga sʋ yɩlɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ yɛ kebiti yɛ kɩkyɩrɛkyɩrɛ tɔ, nɩɩ ba waa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ mɔlɩgɛ bamʋ lɩɩ nbii kɩkʋʋgɛ sʋ.
54003001	Katɔwɛ nɩmʋ gyɛ kesintin nɩn, yɛ ɔkʋ kan ee biti Krisito kʋbʋ ɔbɩlɩsa kusun mʋ, ee biti kusun kparɛ nɩn.
54003002	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ Krisito kʋbʋ ɔbɩlɩsa maa gyɛ nyɩmɩsa mʋ nɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ man sʋ asɩn, nɩɩ o kili ɔkyɩɩ kʋlʋn kpen, nɩɩ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ dɛ, nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩtaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ, nɩɩ ɔ sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ, nɩɩ ɛɛ kɔɔlɛ afɔ, nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ kaapʋ,
54003003	nɩɩ ɔ man gyɛ ɔtabʋʋpʋ, abɛɛ o du kirikiri, amaa o du bwahn, yɛgɛ ɔ man gyɛ oluu bitipu abɛɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ mu ansi ɩ payɩ afulee sʋ.
54003004	Ɩ dagaa maa taalɛ kɩɩ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa kɩkpaara sʋ danbɩrasa, kɛ ɔ kɩɩ fɛɛ mu‐bii ana bee nu mʋ asɛ nɩɩ bee buu mʋ danbɩrasa.
54003005	(Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ɔ man nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɩɩ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ mʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ kɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kʋbʋ mʋ sʋ?)
54003006	Ɩ man dagaa maa gyɛ nyɩmɩsa pʋpwɛ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ tɔ, kɛ ɔ ba kaapʋ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kɛ ɔ lɩɩ tɩyɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ lɩɩ tɩyɛ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ mʋ.
54003007	Ɩ dagaa maa gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Krisito akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu gbaa ba tɩɩ mʋ kɩtɩɩ danbɩrasa, kɛ ɔ man nyɛ tɩyɛ Sɩtaanɛ ɔdʋʋ tɔ kɛ o gyii ipeeli.
54003008	Kanɩn maŋa gbaa nɩɩ ɩ dagaa Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ akyɛtɔpʋ mʋ ba maa gyɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ, nɩɩ ba man gyɛ nnɔ nyɔ‐nyɔ wuya ana, yɛgɛ be mee nuu nta gaa, nɩɩ ba man sʋ onsi‐payɩ libi lɩɩ afulee sʋ.
54003009	Ɩ dagaa ba maa bɩɩ bamʋ nkɔlɔ tɔ fɛɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa mʋ ɩ bʋrɔn Krisito tɔ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii, mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kesintin asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ kaapʋ mʋ.
54003010	I tiri fɛɛ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ ɔ gyankpaa waa bamʋ kɩɩ, amaa nɩɩ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kan man sʋ asɩn kʋ mʋ, ba nyɛ waa akyɛtɔpʋ kusun mʋ.
54003011	Kanɩn ɔkpa maŋa sʋ, i tiri fɛɛ bamʋ akyɩɩ ana gbaa ba baa ba sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ, nɩɩ ba man gyɛ akyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ bee nyita asa atɩɩ, amaa bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ dɛ, nɩɩ asa ba kɔɔlɛ bamʋ gyii kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ.
54003012	Krisito kʋbʋ ɔkyɛtɔpʋ ɔ baa ɔ gyɛ ɔnyɩn mʋ nɩɩ o kili ɔkyɩɩ kʋlʋn kpen, nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ kɩɩ mu‐bii ana yɛ mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ danbɩrasa.
54003013	Bamʋ nɩɩ ba waa akyɛtɔpʋ kusun danbɩrasa mʋ, bɛɛ nyɛ bɛɛrɛɛ, nɩɩ bɛɛ taalɛ yɩlɛ kɩnyɩn tɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ Krisito Yesu gyii mʋ.
54003014	Halɩɩ n maa sʋ tamaa yɛ n biti n ba fʋ asɛ nkɛ nnyɔ nɩmʋ tɔ gbaa mʋ, n kyʋrɔɔ asɩn nɩmʋ n bɩya fʋ,
54003015	saamʋ, nɩɩ n kan n man ba bilen mʋ, fii biti fʋ bɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ asa ba kyɩna Ɩbwaarɛ kɩkpaara sʋ, nɩɩ kɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ kakpaa mʋ kʋbʋ mʋ. Kʋbʋ mʋ ɩ sʋ kesintin kenken fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ sabarɛ sʋ lenbu tɔ mʋ.
54003016	Nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ kamɔɔrɛ‐gyii fɛɛ anɛ Krisito kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ, ɩ gyɛ asɩn baalasa kparɛ. Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, Ɔ lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ kɔɔlɛ mʋ kyula kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ ba wu mʋ, nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ mʋ asɩn sa dulinyaa asa kpini, nɩɩ asa ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa mʋ kyʋn sʋsʋ.
54004001	Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ bugi tɔ tɔwɛ yɛ nkɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, akʋ bee biti ba ba yɛgɛ bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ, kɛ ba buu n‐yaayu libi antɩŋɛsa mʋ yɛ nbwɩɩ libi kɩkaapʋ mʋ.
54004002	Falɛ kɩkaapʋ mʋ lɩɩ antɩŋɛsa nnɔ nnyɔ‐nnyɔ wuya ana mʋ asɛ nɩn. Bɛɛ kɩɩ ansi bɛɛ tɩŋɛ antɩŋɛsa yɛgɛ bamʋ nkɔlɔ mɛɛ ŋmaa bamʋ.
54004003	Ba bɩla bee tii asa ɔkpa fɛɛ ba man kili, kɛ ba man gyii agyitɔ kʋ. Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ tʋʋ falɛ agyitɔ nɩmʋ sa fɛɛ, mʋ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii, nɩɩ be nyi kesintin mʋ, ba kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ abaa anyɔ kɛ ba taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ.
54004004	Lɩɩ fɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tʋʋ mʋ bʋrɔn, nɩɩ ɩ man dagaa fɛɛ a kina ɩmʋ tɔ ɩkʋ, ɩ dagaa fɛɛ a kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ kɛ a taa afwaala sa Ɩbwaarɛ.
54004005	Kpalɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn yɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ mʋ lɔŋɔ ɩmʋ sa kigyii.
54004006	Nɩɩ fɩɩ kan fɩɩ kaapʋ fʋ‐daa ana yɛ fu‐supu ana falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ mʋ, fii biti fʋ baa fʋ gyɛ Krisito Yesu kɩyaafɔlɛ danbɩrasa, fɛɛ fʋ maa dan kesintin asɩn danbɩrasa kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii yɛ kɩkaapʋ danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ fii buu mʋ.
54004007	Lɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ asɩrɩkpan ikisii‐sɩn yɛ adɩdaasɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ tɔnɔ, kɛ fʋ yɛgɛ kabwaarɛ‐sun danbɩrasa ɩ dɩn fʋ.
54004008	Nyɩmɩsa n‐yɩɩ kɩtɛɛŋɛ tɔ mʋ, ɩɩ sa mʋ tɔnɔ gbɛrɛɛ kʋ, amaa kabwaarɛ‐sun danbɩrasa ɩɩ bɩya mʋ tɔnɔ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩɩ sa mʋ nkpa nbɩɩnbɩɩ kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ yɛ nkpa kakpaa kakyɩna mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ ba mʋ.
54004009	Katɔwɛ nɩmʋ gyɛ kesintin nɩn, nɩɩ i tiri fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ gyii.
54004010	Ɩnɩmʋ sʋ an payɩ ansi an sun kusun gaa, lɩɩ fɛɛ an taa anɛ tamaa gyaga Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ kakpaa, nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ sa asa kpini mʋ, fɔnfɔn bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii mʋ.
54004011	Kaapʋ bamʋ atɔ nɩmʋ, kɛ fʋ yɩlɛ bamʋ sʋ fɛɛ ba buu ɩmʋ.
54004012	Man yɛgɛ ɔkʋ ɔ kɩɩ fʋ fɛɛrɛ fɛɛ fʋ maa gyɛ kebii sʋ. Amaa yɛgɛ fʋ katɔwɛ, yɛ fʋ kɩbaabʋtɔ, yɛ fu kebiti, yɛ fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii, yɛ fʋ kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ kakyɩna mʋ ɩ waa asɩn kaalasa sa akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ.
54004013	Pɔyɩ kɛ n ba mʋ, taa fʋ n‐yɩɩ sa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ kɩkaragɛ sakyɔ tɔ, kɛ fʋ tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn, kɛ fʋ kaapʋ ɩmʋ.
54004014	Man kan kina fʋ kakɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla kɩlɛɛkaapʋ asɩn mʋ sʋ sa fʋ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Krisito kʋbʋ abɩlɩsa ba taa abaa gyaga fʋ sʋ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ sa fʋ mʋ.
54004015	Kɩta ɩmʋ tɔ kɛ fʋ taa fʋ n‐yɩɩ kpini sa ɩmʋ kɩwaa tɔ, kɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ o wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ fii kpee ansi tɔ fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ.
54004016	Baa fʋ da fʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ yɛ fʋ Abwaarɛsɩn kɩkaapʋ mʋ sʋ. Baa fʋ maa sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ nɩɩ fʋ kan waa kanɩn mʋ, fii biti fʋ mɔlɩgɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee nu fʋ asɛ mʋ.
54005001	Man kan tɔwɛ yii kɩnyɩn‐bɩlɩsa, amaa tɔwɛ waa mʋ fɛɛ maa gyɛ fʋ‐sɛ. Tɔwɛ waa ayaafɔlɛ mʋ fɛɛ ba maa gyɛ fʋ‐daa ana yɛ fu‐supu ana.
54005002	Kɛ fʋ tɔwɛ waa akyɩɩ‐nyi mʋ fɛɛ fu‐nyi ana, kɛ fʋ tɔwɛ waa nbitebii mʋ fɛɛ fʋ‐pɩɩkyɩɩ ana yɛgɛ agyaga‐sɩn nfɛɛrɛ kʋ man tii sʋ.
54005003	Taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa akulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ bamʋ abaa sʋ, kɛ fʋ kɩɩ bamʋ sʋ.
54005004	Amaa nɩɩ okulapu‐kyɩɩ kan ɔ sʋ nbii abɛɛ anaana‐bii mʋ, i tiri fɛɛ nbii mʋ ba kaapʋ bamʋ kabwaarɛ‐sun mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ ba kɩɩ bamʋ gbaa‐gbaa akpaara sʋ asa sʋ mʋ. Saamʋ, bamʋ awaasa mʋ, ɩɩ tɛɛla bamʋ akʋʋgɛpʋ yɛ bamʋ naana ana mʋ. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩɩ bɔla Ɩbwaarɛ ansi.
54005005	Okulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ mʋ kɩbaa sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ, ɛɛ taa mʋ tamaa gyaga Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ nɩn, nɩɩ ɛɛ kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ kakyʋwapɛ yɛ kagyanbwɛ, ɛɛ kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ ɔ kyɛ mʋ tɔ.
54005006	Amaa Okulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ sa kensi kigyii mʋ, ɔ tɛ nkpa tɔ bɩrɛ, yɛgɛ o du fɛɛ maa wu nɩn.
54005007	Tɔwɛ falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ sa Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ, kɛ asa ba man nyɛ tɔwɛ asɩn akʋ yii bamʋ.
54005008	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kan kɩɩ mʋ kʋʋpʋ ana sʋ, fɔnfɔn mʋ kɩkpaara sʋ asa sʋ mʋ, o kina kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ, nɩɩ mu alibi ɩ kyɔ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba man kɔɔlɛ Yesu Krisito gyii mʋ gbaa.
54005009	Okulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man pɩɩ fʋʋ nsu adisiye mʋ, ɩ man dagaa fɛɛ ba taa mʋ kɩtɩɩ tii akulapu‐kyɩɩ atɩɩ mʋ sʋ. Ɩ dagaa okulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ maa gyɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man lɩɩ mu‐kuli kamaa,
54005010	nɩɩ asa be nyi mʋ adanbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa, fɛɛ ɛɛ bɩla mu‐bii ana danbɩrasa, nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩtaa afɔ, nɩɩ ɛɛ bɩya mʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ ɛɛ kyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asa tɔ, nɩɩ ɛɛ kyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee wu awʋrʋfɔ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɛɛ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ sa adanbɩrasa kʋmaa nɩmʋ kɩwaa.
54005011	Man kan taa akulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩ bɩlɛ mʋ atɩɩ tii akulapu atɩɩ mʋ sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ nɩɩ ɩ kan ba fɛɛ bamʋ kayalaga gyan kekili sʋ ɩ kyɔ kɩyɛgɛ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sa Krisito mʋ,
54005012	bee biti ba gyii kʋpwɛ lɩɩ bamʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ kɩda gyankpaasa sa Krisito mʋ tɔ.
54005013	Ɩmʋ kamaa mʋ bee biti ba biliŋi awʋlɛgyɔpʋ, yɛgɛ ba naa ba naa asa akpaara sʋ. Nɩɩ man gyɛ ɩmʋ nkʋn, ba naa bee kuli asa, yɛgɛ bee loo asa asɩn tɔ, nɩɩ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man dagaa nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ.
54005014	Ɩmʋ sʋ n biti fɛɛ akulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩ bɩlɛ mʋ ba kili, kɛ ba kʋʋgɛ nbii kɛ ba kɩɩ bamʋ akpaara sʋ, saamʋ, ɔdʋn mʋ mɛɛ nyɛ‐nyɛ ɔkpa tɔwɛ asɩn libi kʋ lɩɩ anɛ sʋ.
54005015	Lɩɩ fɛɛ akulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba man pɩɩ bɩlɛ mʋ, akʋ be tee bee buu Sɩtaanɛ ɩkpa.
54005016	Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ‐kɔɔlɛ‐gyipu kʋ kan ɔ sʋ akulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ mʋ kʋʋpʋ ana mʋ, ɩ dagaa maa kyɛ bamʋ tɔ kɛ ɩ man waa kasʋla sa Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ, saamʋ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ ɩ nyɛ kyɛ akulapu‐kyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ i tiri bamʋ mʋ tɔ.
54005017	Krisito kʋbʋ abɩlɩsa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kɩɩ kʋbʋ mʋ asɩn kyɛɛkyɛɛ sʋ mʋ, bɛɛrɛɛ yɛ kʋkɔka dagaa sa bamʋ ɩlɩɩ ɩnyɔ, fɔnfɔn bamʋ nɩɩ bee sun abwaarɛsɩn katɔwɛ yɛ ɩmʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ.
54005018	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɩ man dagaa ba ŋmina naatɛ kɔnɔ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa kusun agyitɔ opula mʋ.” Nɩɩ ba bɩla kyʋrɔɔ katɩn kʋ yɛ, “Kusun ɔwaapʋ mʋ dagaa mʋ kʋkɔka.”
54005019	Man kan kɔɔlɛ alibi mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ ba tɔwɛ fʋ lɩɩ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ ɔbɩlɩsa kʋ sʋ gyii, amɔɔ ba waa asa anyɔ abɛɛ asa.
54005020	Bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa alibi mʋ, tɔwɛ yii bamʋ Krisito kʋbʋ mu ansi tɔ kɛ ɩ waa asansa mʋ kufuu.
54005021	N yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ Krisito Yesu, yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mu ansi tɔ, n tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ, fu buu nnɔsa ɩnɩmʋ, yɛgɛ fʋ man yɩlɛ ɔkʋ kamaa abɛɛ fʋ sʋ nmɛɛgɛ tɔ lɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋ tɔ.
54005022	Man kan kpaala taa fʋ abaa gyaga asa sʋ waa bamʋ abɩlɩsa kabwaarɛ‐sun mʋ tɔ, kɛ fʋ man kan taa fʋ n‐yɩɩ loo akʋ alibi tɔ. Kɩta fʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ ineesi sʋ.
54005023	Man bɩla nuu nkyu nkʋn, baa fii nuu nta gbɛrɛɛ, kpalɩ fɛɛ fʋ ɔtɔ tɔ maa taalɛ ɩɩ kɔ fʋ yɛ fʋ alɔ wuribi mʋ sʋ.
54005024	Asa akʋ alibi ɩ dan lɩɩ ifuli nɩn, nɩɩ ɩɩ gyankpaa bamʋ ii kpee Ɩbwaarɛ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ mʋ tɔ. Akʋ lɛɛ mɔɔ kamaa tɔ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba lɩɩ ifuli.
54005025	Ɔkpa kʋlʋn maŋa sʋ, nɩɩ akʋ kɩdanbɩrasa kɩwaa ii biti ɩ lɩɩ ifuli. Nɩɩ halɩɩ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ lɩɩ ifuli gbaa mʋ ɩ mɛɛ taalɛ baala.
54006001	Anyɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ bamʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ana kasɛ mʋ kpini, i tiri fɛɛ ba maa taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa bamʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ana, kɛ asa ba man nyɛ ɔkpa tɔwɛ asɩn libi kʋ yii Ɩbwaarɛ kɩtɩɩ abɛɛ anɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ an kaapʋ mʋ.
54006002	Anyɛ mʋ nɩɩ bamʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ana ba gyɛ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ, ba man kɔɔgɛ bɛɛrɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ sa bamʋ mʋ sʋ, fɛɛ ba maa bamʋ ba maa gyɛ kʋkʋlʋn Krisito tɔ mʋ sʋ. Amaa ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ba sun bamʋ kɔkɔlɔ fuuli tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ anyɩrɩpɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ nyɛ tɔnɔ bɛɛ lɩɩ anyɛ mʋ kusun tɔ mʋ, ba gyɛ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu nɩɩ anyɛ mʋ ba sʋ kebiti sa bamʋ. Falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ i tiri fɛɛ fʋ kaapʋ bamʋ, kɛ fʋ waa bamʋ aniya tɔ kɛ ba buu ɩmʋ.
54006003	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kaapʋ asɩn pʋpwɛ, nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kesintin asɩn mʋ, yɛ anɛ kabwaarɛ‐sun kɩkaapʋ ee gyii mʋ,
54006004	ɔ gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kʋsaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋsʋ yɛgɛ ɔ man nyi sɛhn. Kanɩn ɔsa maŋa sʋ ɩmɔɔrɛ‐libi yɛ nluu kʋkɔ lɩɩ asɩn sʋ, nɩɩ ɩmʋ ɩɩ bɩya kayɩɩ basa yɛ nbarɩgɛ tɔ yɛ asebi yɛ nfɛɛrɛ libi kɩfɛ.
54006005	Ɔsa maŋa ii gyii ɩmɔɔrɛ nɩn fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ i nyita, nɩɩ ba man bɩla ba sʋ kesintin asɩn mʋ, bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ kabwaarɛ‐sun ɩ gyɛ ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ bɔla sʋ nyɛ afulee.
54006006	Amaa kabwaarɛ‐sun danbɩrasa sʋ tɔnɔ gaa, nɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ an sʋ mʋ ɩ kan kʋkwɛ anɛ mʋ.
54006007	Lɩɩ fɛɛ a man bɩya sɛhn dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ, nɩɩ a mɛɛ taalɛ taa sɛhn lɩɩ kɩmʋ tɔ.
54006008	Amaa nɩɩ an kan an sʋ agyitɔ yɛ atɔ bunsa mʋ, a yɛgɛ ɩ kʋkwɛ anɛ.
54006009	Asa mʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba waa atɔ wuya ana mʋ, bɛɛ tɩyɛ kʋtʋʋ tɔ kɩɩ tɔ yɛ ɔdʋʋ tɔ, kɛ be loo kimelensi yɛ kayalaga libi‐libi gaalaagaa tɔ, kɛ ɩ bɩɩtɛ bamʋ muuri kɛ ba wu nyita.
54006010	Lɩɩ fɛɛ kefulee biti gaa gyɛ alibi kʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔlɩɩkpa nɩn. Akʋ ba maa biti afulee kɩbansa sʋ mʋ, ba fɔyɩ lɩɩ bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ, nɩɩ i yii bamʋ nkɔlɔ tɔ fɛɛ deebi.
54006011	Amaa fʋ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nyɩmɩsa nɩn, ɩmʋ sʋ lɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ kpini tɔ, kɛ fʋ kɔ biti ɩkpa kikyiigi yɛ kabwaarɛ‐sun danbɩrasa yɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii yɛ kebiti yɛ kenyiita yɛ bwahn kɩwaa.
54006012	Kɔ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii keluu danbɩrasa mʋ, kɛ fʋ nyɛ nkpa kakpaa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɩɩ fʋ ba waa kɩmʋ tɔ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fu bugi fʋ kɔnɔ tɔwɛ fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sakyɔ tɔ, nɩɩ ba nu mʋ.
54006013	N yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa kʋtɔ kʋmaa nkpa mʋ, maa Yesu Krisito mʋ nɩɩ o bugi mʋ kɔnɔ tɔwɛ kesintin asɩn mʋ sa Pontu Paleti mu ansi tɔ mʋ, n tɔwɛ fʋ yɛ,
54006014	fu buu nnɔsa nɩmʋ, kɛ fʋ kɩtaa ɩmʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ, naa fʋʋ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito ii biti ɔ ba mʋ.
54006015	Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ayenbi ɩ gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ, nɩɩ mʋ nkʋn ɩ gyɛ Ɔlʋlʋnpʋ, yɛ awura tɔ Owura, yɛ anyɩrɩpɛ mʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, mʋ ii biti ɔ yɛgɛ Krisito Yesu kibwii ba mʋ kɩ ba tɔ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ saŋa mʋ.
54006016	Mʋ nkʋn ɩ gyɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ tɔ kakpaa, nɩɩ ɔ man bʋ tɔ o wu kakaakʋ, nɩɩ mʋ ɔ tɛ ɩŋmaŋɛsa mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ ŋalɩgɛ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa kʋ mɛɛ taalɛ tiri mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ man pɩɩta wu mʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ wu mʋ. Bʋnyaa yɛ ɔlʋn ɩ gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ kakpaa Amen.
54006017	Tɔwɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ atɔ mʋ fɛɛ, ba man ba bɛɛ kɩɩ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ abɛɛ ba taa bamʋ tamaa gyaga bamʋ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ taalɛ fɔyɩ mʋ sʋ. Amaa ba taa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ tʋʋ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ sa anɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ an nyɛ falɛ, nɩɩ ɩɩ waa anɛ ɔkɔn mʋ sʋ.
54006018	Tɔwɛ bamʋ fɛɛ ba waa kɩdanbɩrasa kɛ bamʋ awaasa ɩ baa ɩ bʋrɔn gaa, kɛ ba lɛɛ bamʋ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ mʋ tɔ kyɛ abaa tɔ.
54006019	Nɩɩ ba kan waa kanɩn mʋ, ii biti ɩ waa fɛɛ bɛɛ kʋʋla atɔ bɛɛ yɩla bɛɛ sa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋsʋ nɩn. Saamʋ, bee biti ba nyɛ nkpa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ kesintin nkpa mʋ.
54006020	Timoti kɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa waa fʋ kɩbaa tɔ mʋ sʋ danbɩrasa. Lɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ ntɔwɛ kɩyan yɛ ɩmɔɔrɛ‐gyaga mʋ nɩɩ akʋ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ kinyi mʋ tɔ.
54006021	Ɩmʋ nɩɩ akʋ bɛɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ ba sʋ, nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ ba fɔyɩ bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ. Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala kɩ baa kɩ bʋ fanɛ asɛ.
55001001	Mɛ, Pɔɔlɩ mʋ nɩɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti sʋ nɩɩ n ba waa Krisito Yesu osunpu, nɩɩ o sun mɛ yɛ n tɔwɛ Nkpa asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ yɩla, nɩɩ an nyɛ lɩɩ kʋkʋlʋn kɩwaa yɛ Krisito Yesu mʋ.
55001002	N kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ n sa fʋ, mi‐bii bitisa Timoti. Anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Krisito Yesu kabwaala yɛ kʋwɛɛ kuwu yɛ keyuula ɩ baa ɩ bʋ fʋ asɛ.
55001003	N fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ n sun mʋ yɛgɛ n man sʋ alibi akʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ mɛ naana ana ba daa sun mʋ mʋ. Saŋa kʋmaa n nyiŋi fʋ sʋ mɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ tɔ kagyanbwɛ yɛ kakyʋwapɛ.
55001004	N nyiŋi fʋ ansikyu mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɩ bʋ mɛ tɔ gaa fɛɛ n wu fʋ, saamʋ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ ɩ nyɛ fuuli mɛ.
55001005	N nyiŋi fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kesintin mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ, nɩɩ fʋ naana‐kyɩɩsa Lowisi yɛ fu‐nyi Yunisi gbaa ba nyɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ n nyi kesintin fɛɛ kanɩn nɩɩ ngbaa fʋ sʋ.
55001006	Lɩɩ falɛ sʋ mʋ, n nyiŋi fʋ fɛɛ, nin fʋlɔn waa Ɩbwaarɛ kakɛɛ, mʋ nɩɩ n kyɩna taa mɛ abaa gyaga fʋ sʋ, nɩɩ fʋ nyɛ mʋ tɔ.
55001007	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ man sa anɛ Kayaayu mʋ nɩɩ kɩ waa anɛ afuupu, amaa ɔ sa anɛ Kayaayu mʋ nɩɩ kɩ sa anɛ ɔlʋn, yɛ kebiti kɛ a bɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an kɩtaa anɛ n‐yɩɩ.
55001008	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ́ man waa fʋ ipeeli fɛɛ, fʋ maa tɔwɛ kesintin asɩn lɩɩ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ mʋ sʋ, abɛɛ ɩ́ waa fʋ ipeeli lɩɩ mɛ sʋ fɛɛ ba maa tii mɛ obu. Amaa fʋ gbaa fu gyii awʋrʋfɔ sa asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, lɩɩ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa sa fʋ mʋ sʋ.
55001009	Mʋ ɩ mɔlɩgɛ anɛ, nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ anɛ ba waa mʋ gbaa‐gbaa asa, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ yɛ an waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋrɔn sʋ, amaa lɩɩ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mu kiŋmina yɩla yɛ mʋ kabwaala sʋ. Nɩɩ Krisito Yesu sʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɔla taa kabwaala nɩmʋ bwaala anɛ pɔyɩ nɩɩ ɔ tʋʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ.
55001010	Amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ ɔ bɔla anɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ Krisito Yesu kɩba mʋ sʋ ba lɛɛ kabwaala nɩmʋ kaapʋ anɛ, nɩɩ ɔ bɔla asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sʋ nyita lewu ɔlʋn mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ nkpa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ ɔkaa mʋ ifuli.
55001011	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mɛ waa Krisito osunpu yɛ ɔkaapʋpʋ yɛ asɩn danbɩrasa nɩmʋ ɔtɔwɛpʋ.
55001012	Kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ n gyii ɩnɩmʋ awʋrʋfɔ falɛ. Amaa ɩ man sʋ mɛ ipeeli, lɩɩ fɛɛ n nyi ɔmʋ nɩɩ n kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii, nɩɩ n nyi kesintin tɔ fɛɛ ɛɛ taalɛ kun kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n taa waa mʋ abaa tɔ naa fʋʋ mʋ kakɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ.
55001013	Timoti, kɩtaa kesintin asɩn kaapʋsa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ nyɛ lɩɩ mɛ asɛ mʋ kenken, kɛ fu buu ɩmʋ, yɛgɛ fʋ sʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii yɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ lɩɩ Krisito Yesu sʋ an nyɛ mʋ.
55001014	Bɔla Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ anɛ tɔ mʋ sʋ, kun asɩn kparɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa waa fʋ abaa tɔ mʋ.
55001015	Fu nyi fɛɛ anɛ bɩrɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ Asiya ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ kpini, ba sɩlɛ yɛgɛ mɛ, nɩɩ Figelusi maa Hemogene gbaa ba tii sʋ.
55001016	N kʋlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ fɛɛ o wu Onesiforu kɩkpaara sʋ abi kpini kʋwɛɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa kʋmaa ɛɛ yɛgɛ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ kii fuuli mɛ. Nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ mʋ ipeeli fɛɛ ba tii mɛ obu gbaa.
55001017	Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ki tii sʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ ba Roma mʋ, ɔ natɛ biti mɛ halɩɩ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ o wu mɛ.
55001018	Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ o wu mʋ kʋwɛɛ mʋ kakɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ. Fu nyi danbɩrasa kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɛ mɛ tɔ ɩkpa gaalaagaa sʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ Efeso kadɛ tɔ mʋ.
55002001	Ɩmʋ sʋ mi‐bii, bɔla kabwaala mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Krisito Yesu tɔ mʋ nyɛ ɔlʋn.
55002002	Nɩɩ asɩn kaapʋsa mʋ nɩɩ fu nu lɩɩ mɛ asɛ sakyɔ ansi tɔ mʋ, taa ɩmʋ waa asa mʋ nɩɩ fʋ kɔɔlɛ bamʋ gyii mʋ abaa tɔ, kɛ ngbaa bamʋ bɛ taalɛ taa kaapʋ akʋ gbaa.
55002003	Yɩlɛ tɔ gyii awʋrʋfɔ yɛ anɛ, fɛɛ Krisito Yesu ɔnaakɔpʋ danbɩrasa.
55002004	Ɔnaakɔpʋ ɩ payɩ ansi lɩɩ mu kusun sunsa sʋ, kɛ ɩ nyɛ bɔla mʋ ɔbɩlɩsa ansi, ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ mɛɛ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ ɛɛ waa asa mʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ anaakɔpʋ mʋ awaasa tɔ.
55002005	Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ asɩlɛpʋ ba kan bɛɛ sɩlɛ, nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o gyii sʋ kan ɔ man buu kɩsɩlɛ nbara mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ nyɛ kigyii sʋ kakɛɛ mʋ.
55002006	Nɩɩ onsi‐payɩ ɔdɔɔpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa kusun mʋ, ɩ dagaa maa gyankpaa gyii lɩɩ kʋdɔɔ mʋ tɔ.
55002007	Fɛ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ falɛ sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ ii biti ɔ yɛgɛ fʋ taalɛ nu atɔ nɩmʋ kpini kasɛ.
55002008	Nyiŋi Yesu Krisito mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ owura Dawidi kanan tɔ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kyiŋi mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ mʋ,
55002009	nɩɩ n gyii ɩmʋ awʋrʋfɔ falɛ, halɩɩ ba taa agbeeleebi ŋmina mɛ fɛɛ maa gyɛ alibi ɔwaapʋ. Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ bɩrɛ, ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ taa agbeeleebi ŋmina ɩmʋ.
55002010	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n yɩlɛ tɔ gyii awʋrʋfɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ, lɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ yɩla mʋ sʋ, kɛ ngbaa bamʋ ba bɔla Krisito Yesu sʋ nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ yɛ bʋnyaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ ɔkaa mʋ.
55002011	Katɔwɛ nɩmʋ gyɛ kesintin nɩn, nɩɩ an kan wu yɛ mʋ bɩrɛ, an biti a kyɩna nkpa tɔ yɛ mʋ.
55002012	Nɩɩ an kan yɩlɛ tɔ gyii awʋrʋfɔ bɩrɛ, an biti i gyii kuwura yɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ an kan kina mʋ bɩrɛ, ngbaa mʋ ii biti o kina anɛ.
55002013	Nɩɩ an man kan kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ, mɛɛ mʋ bɩrɛ ɔ san ee gyii mʋ asɩn sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ mɛɛ tɔwɛ asɩn, nɩɩ ɛɛ lɩɩ ɩmʋ kamaa.
55002014	Kyaga sʋ nyiŋi bamʋ falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ sʋ. Yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩtɩɩ tɔ da bamʋ amu tɔ lɩɩ ntɔwɛ sʋ kamɔɔrɛ‐gyii, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ man sʋ kyaarɛ, amɔɔ ii nyita bamʋ nɩɩ bee nu ɩmʋ mʋ nɩn.
55002015	Kpan fʋ n‐yɩɩ kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ o wu fʋ fɛɛ fʋ dagaa, nɩɩ fʋ gyɛ kusun osunpu mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man dagaa maa sʋ ipeeli mu kusun mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ o nyi Ɩbwaarɛ kesintin asɩn mʋ kɩkaapʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ.
55002016	Lɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ aligyima mʋ nɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ bʋnyaa Ɩbwaarɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa ɩmʋ mʋ, ɩɩ bɩɩtɛ bamʋ ɩɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ gaa.
55002017	Nɩɩ kanɩn asa mʋ kɩkaapʋ ɩɩ yɛlɩgɛ fɛɛ kɩtamɛɛ. Anyɩn anyɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba tii bamʋ sʋ ɩ gyɛ Himenasu maa Filetusi.
55002018	Ba fɔyɩ kesintin asɩn mʋ ɔkpa, nɩɩ bɛɛ kaapʋ yɛ, asa kikyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ mʋ tɛɛ wʋla ba kyʋn, nɩɩ kɩkaapʋ nɩmʋ ii nyita akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ akʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii.
55002019	Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn du nɩn fɛɛ ɔpɔrɛ gyankpaasa mʋ nɩɩ o yii mʋ, nɩɩ ɩ yɩlɛ gin, nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ asɩn nɩmʋ ba gyaga kɩmʋ sʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nyi bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ,” nɩɩ ba bɩla kyʋrɔɔ yɛ, “Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ ɔ gyɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ, dagaa maa yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa.”
55002020	Kɩkpaara lala sʋ mʋ, atɔ mʋ nɩɩ bee gyii bee nu ɩmʋ tɔ kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ ɩ bʋ tɔ. Ba taa suwa abɛɛ gbiti waa ɩkʋ, nɩɩ ba taa iyu abɛɛ kabɔlɛ waa ɩmʋ ɩkʋ mɔɔ. Ɩmʋ ɩkʋ ɩ dɛ sa nkɛ kparɛ kigyii, nɩɩ ɩkʋ mɔɔ ɩ man dɛ sa nkɛ kparɛ kʋ.
55002021	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ alibi kɩwaa tɔ mʋ, ee biti ɔ baa ɔ dɛ sa nkɛ kparɛ kigyii mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ ba waa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ, nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kyaarɛ sa mʋ ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kʋʋla mʋ n‐yɩɩ yɩla sa kusun danbɩrasa kʋmaa nɩmʋ.
55002022	Amaa lɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ ayaafɔlɛ‐sɩn kayalaga libi tɔ, kɛ fʋ taa fu ansi gyaga ɩkpa kikyiigi yɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii yɛ kebiti yɛ kayɩɩ yuuli sʋ, bʋga yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba taa kɔkɔlɔ fuuli sʋ bee sun Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ sʋ.
55002023	Ɩmʋ sʋ lɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ kimelensi ɩmɔɔrɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ kasɛ mʋ tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fu nyi ɩ maa bɩya nluu.
55002024	Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ man dagaa maa kɔ keluu, amaa ɔ dagaa maa waa kɩdanbɩrasa ɛɛ sa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ, kɛ ɔ taalɛ kaapʋ, kɛ ɔ nyɛ kenyiita kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ.
55002025	Bamʋ nɩɩ bee gyii mʋ ɩmɔɔrɛ mʋ, ɩ dagaa maa lɛɛ asɩn mʋ kaapʋ bamʋ laakalɛ sʋ, akʋtɔ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti o bugi ɔkpa sa bamʋ, kɛ ba yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa, kɛ ba ba bɩɩ kesintin asɩn mʋ.
55002026	Kɛ ba nyɛ nfɛɛrɛ danbɩrasa, kɛ ba sɩlɛ lɩɩ ɔdʋʋ mʋ nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ sʋʋ kɩtaa bamʋ, nɩɩ bee nu mʋ asɛ bɛɛ waa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ee biti mʋ tɔ.
55003001	Amaa baa fʋ nyi ɩnɩmʋ fɛɛ, nkɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, awʋrʋfɔ damantɛ ii biti ɩ ba asa sʋ.
55003002	Lɩɩ fɛɛ, asa bee biti ba kɩɩ biti bamʋ nkʋn lɛɛ, yɛ kefulee biti bansa, yɛ n‐yɩɩ kɩkaapʋ, yɛ alala‐sɩn, yɛ asa kɩsaalɛ, yɛ kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn sa bamʋ akʋʋgɛpʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ waa kɩdanbɩrasa sa bamʋ gbaa ba mɛɛ lɛɛ mʋ kɩtɩɩ, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ taa Ɩbwaarɛ bɛɛ tɩɩ sɛhn,
55003003	nɩɩ ba mɛɛ yɛ bɛ nyɛ kebiti sa ɔkʋ, nɩɩ be mee wu ɔkʋ kʋwɛɛ, nɩɩ bee biti ba nyita asa kɩtɩɩ, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ taalɛ kɩtaa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ, nɩɩ asa bee biti ba sɩlɛ bamʋ, nɩɩ bee biti ba kisi kɩdanbɩrasa,
55003004	nɩɩ bee biti ba waa adiboyipu, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ fɛ nfɛɛrɛ pɔyɩ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa kʋtɔ kʋ, nɩɩ bɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ, nɩɩ bee biti dulinyaa tɔ ɔkɔn ba kyɔ Ɩbwaarɛ.
55003005	Bee biti ba sun Ɩbwaarɛ ansi sʋ, amaa ba kina mʋ ɔlʋn mʋ. Man bʋga yɛ kanɩn asa.
55003006	Bamʋ tɔ akʋ bɛɛ taa kanyaasɩn libi bee loo akpaara sʋ, nɩɩ bɛɛ taa kɔnɔ tɔ kɔn bɛɛ pɩna akyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ba mɛɛ taalɛ kɩtaa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ, nɩɩ bamʋ alibi i du fɛɛ kasʋla ɩ gyan bamʋ sʋ, nɩɩ kayalaga libi kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ bʋ bamʋ tɔ.
55003007	Kanɩn akyɩɩ mʋ bɛɛ kpan n‐yɩɩ saŋa kʋmaa bɛɛ bɩɩla, amaa ba mɛɛ taalɛ ba bɩɩ kesintin mʋ.
55003008	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Gyanise maa Gyanberesi ba daa kyɩna kʋsʋ yɩlɛ Mosesi sʋ mʋ, kanɩn nɩɩ falɛ anyɩn anɩmʋ gbaa bɛɛ kɔ bee tii kesintin mʋ ɔkpa. Bamʋ amu i nyita, nɩɩ ba man sʋ ɔyɩlɛkpa kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ.
55003009	Bamʋ awaasa nɩmʋ mee kpiya bamʋ ansi tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ii biti o wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba melensi, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Gyanise maa Gyanberesi kimelensi ɩ daa lɩɩ ifuli mʋ.
55003010	Amaa fɛɛ fʋ bɩrɛ, fu nyi asɩn mʋ nɩɩ n kaapʋ mʋ kpini, yɛ mɛ kakyɩna tɔ, yɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ mi ansi ɩ gyan sʋ, yɛ mɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii, yɛ mɛ kenyiita, yɛ mi kebiti, yɛ mɛ kɩyɩlɛ tɔ gyii awʋrʋfɔ.
55003011	Fu nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ asa ba nyanla mɛ, yɛ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ n gyii Antiyoki yɛ Ikoniyum yɛ Lisitira ndɛ tɔ, nɩɩ n nyɛ kenyiita yɩlɛ kanyanla mʋ kpini tɔ, nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito lɛɛ mɛ lɩɩ ɩmʋ kpini tɔ.
55003012	Ɩ gyɛ kesintin fɛɛ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti o buu Krisito Yesu, kɛ ɔ waa Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti mʋ, ee biti ɔ nyɛ kanyanla.
55003013	Alibi awaapʋ yɛ apɩnapʋ bɩrɛ bamʋ alibi ii biti ɩ lɔŋɔ tii sʋ nɩn, kanan mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ pɩna asa mʋ, kanɩn gbaa nɩɩ ii biti ɩ pɩna bamʋ.
55003014	Amaa fɛɛ fʋ bɩrɛ, kyaga sʋ kɩtaa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fʋ bɩɩla nɩɩ fʋ kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fu nyi bamʋ nɩɩ fʋ bɩɩla lɩɩ bamʋ asɛ,
55003015	nɩɩ lɩɩ fʋ kibii tɔ mʋ, fu nyi Asɩnkyan yɩlasa kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɩmʋ ɩ taalɛ sa fʋ kanyaasɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bɩya kamɔlɩgɛ bɔla kɩkɔɔlɛ Krisito Yesu gyii sʋ.
55003016	Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ kpini ɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ nɩn, nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn sa kɩkaapʋ, yɛ katɔwɛ yii, yɛ kɩtɔwɛ kyiigi, yɛ kɩbɩla ɩkpa kikyiigi tɔ,
55003017	saamʋ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔsa ɩ nyɛ dan tɔ sa kusun danbɩrasa kʋmaa kɩwaa.
55004001	Krisito Yesu ii biti ɔ ba yɛ mu kuwura‐gyii ba talɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ nkpa tɔ, yɛ alewupu. N yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ maa Yesu Krisito ansi tɔ n sa fʋ kɔnɔ yɛ,
55004002	tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ. Kʋʋla fʋ n‐yɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa yɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man dagaa, taa kenyiita kpini tɔwɛ kyiigi asa ɩkpa, kɛ fʋ tɔwɛ yii asa, kɛ fʋ tɔwɛ waa asa ɔlʋn tɔ.
55004003	Lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa kʋ ii biti ɔ ba nɩɩ asa ba mɛɛ yɛ be buu kesintin kɩkaapʋ mʋ. Amɔɔ be buu bamʋ kayalaga tɔ asɩn. Bee biti ba kɩɩ biti akaapʋpʋ damantɛ kyaabɔɔ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ, kɛ bɛ kaapʋ bamʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋkɔn bamʋ asʋ tɔ kɛ be nu.
55004004	Ba man bɩla yɛ be nu kesintin mʋ, bee biti ba biliŋi ba buu asɩrɩkpan ikisii‐sɩn.
55004005	Amaa fɛɛ fʋ bɩrɛ, baa fʋ da fu kumu sʋ asɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ, nyɛ kɔkɔlɔ yɩlɛ awʋrʋfɔ tɔ, waa asɩn danbɩrasa kusun mʋ ɔtɔwɛpʋ, sun fʋ kusun kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa naa lʋwɛ.
55004006	Mɛɛ mɛ bɩrɛ mɛ saŋa fʋ fɛɛ n wu, nɩɩ i du nɩn fɛɛ mɛ nkpa ɩɩ kyɛɛgɛ ɩɩ wʋrɩgɛ fɛɛ saraga sa Ɩbwaarɛ.
55004007	N kɔ keluu danbɩrasa mʋ, nɩɩ n sɩlɛ kɩsɩlɛ mʋ naa fʋʋ ɔkaa, nɩɩ n kɩtaa kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ.
55004008	Nbɩɩnbɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kii gyoo mɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ kigyii sʋ kakɛɛ, mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ, ɩkpa kyiigisa ɔtalɛpʋ mʋ ii biti ɔ taa sa mɛ kanɩn kakɛ maŋa, nɩɩ man gyɛ mɛ nkʋn, amaa yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ gyʋgyʋʋ bamʋ yɛ be wu Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu kɩba mʋ.
55004009	Kpan fʋ n‐yɩɩ kɛ fʋ ba mɛ asɛ bilen,
55004010	lɩɩ fɛɛ Demasi sʋ kebiti sa dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ atɔ, nɩɩ ɔ sɩlɛ yɛgɛ mɛ kpee Tesalonika kadɛ tɔ. Kresensi kyʋn Galati kadɛ tɔ, nɩɩ Titusi mɔɔ kyʋn Dalimatiya kadɛ tɔ.
55004011	Luka nkʋn ɩ bʋ mɛ asɛ. Biti Maki kɛ fʋ taa mʋ bɩya mɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ ɩ taalɛ kyɛ mɛ tɔ, mi kusun mʋ tɔ.
55004012	N sun Takikusi yɛ o kpee Efeso kadɛ tɔ.
55004013	Nɩɩ fʋ kan fɩɩ ba mʋ, fʋ taa mɛ balɩmaasʋ mʋ nɩɩ n yɛgɛ yɩla Kapusi asɛ Trowa kadɛ tɔ, yɛ mɛ ɩwʋlɛ, fɔnfɔn ɩmʋ nɩɩ ba taa atɔbwaaya ɩwʋlɛ waa mʋ bɩya mɛ.
55004014	Alekisanda mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ bayɩpʋ mʋ waa mɛ alibi gaa. Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa mɛ mʋ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ ii biti ɔ ka mʋ kʋkɔ.
55004015	Fʋ gbaa fʋ, baa fʋ da mʋ sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ yɩlɛ sʋ kenken ee tii anɛ asɩn tɔwɛsa mʋ ɔkpa.
55004016	Kakɛ gyankpaasa mʋ nɩɩ n yɩlɛ n lɛɛ kɔnɔ mɛ asɩn kigyii tɔ mʋ, ɔkʋ man ba yɩlɛ mɛ kamaa, ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ palɛ mʋ kamaa sa mɛ. N kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ fɛɛ ɔ man ka bamʋ kʋkɔ lɩɩ ɩmʋ sʋ.
55004017	Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ yɩlɛ mɛ kamaa nɩɩ ɔ sa mɛ ɔlʋn, nɩɩ n nyɛ tɔwɛ asɩn mʋ lʋwɛ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ Gyiwu abi mʋ gbaa ba nu ɩmʋ. Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mɛ lɩɩ bɩranɛ kɔnɔ tɔ.
55004018	Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu mʋ ii biti ɔ lɛɛ mɛ lɩɩ alibi kʋmaa mʋ tɔ, kɛ ɔ bɩya mɛ sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ yɛ alanfɩya. Mʋ nɩɩ bʋnyaa gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ kakpaa. Amen.
55004019	Fwaala Prisila maa Akwila yɛ Onesiforu kɩkpaara sʋ asa kpini.
55004020	Erasitu sii ɔ tɛ Korinto kadɛ tɔ, nɩɩ n yɛgɛ Trofimu mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɔɔ mʋ, Miletu kadɛ tɔ.
55004021	Kpan fʋ n‐yɩɩ kɛ fʋ fʋʋ nfɩɩ pɔyɩ kɛ gbangban ɔ fʋʋ. Ebulusi yɛ Pudensi yɛ Linusi yɛ Kilodiya yɛ bamʋ bɩrɩsa ana kpini bɛɛ fwaala fʋ.
55004022	Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ yɛ fʋ kayaayu fan kyɩna. Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ bwaala fanɛ.
56001001	Ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ lɩɩ mɛ Pɔɔlɩ, Ɩbwaarɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ yɛ Yesu Krisito osunpu mʋ asɛ. O sun mɛ yɛ n ba kyɛ mʋ asa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ, kɛ n kaapʋ bamʋ kɛ ba bɩɩ kesintin mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ asa bee buu kabwaarɛ‐sun danbɩrasa,
56001002	mʋ nɩɩ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii yɛ kinyi ɩ gyan nkpa kakpaa tamaa mʋ sʋ. Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ tɩn antɩŋɛsa mʋ, da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ sa anɛ nkpa nɩmʋ lɩɩ koo npiili asɛ,
56001003	nɩɩ saŋa kyɛɛkyɛɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ anɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ asɩn kaapʋ, fɛɛ maa taa waa mɛ abaa tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ sa mɛ kɔnɔ yɛ n tɔwɛ asɩn mʋ sa asa.
56001004	N kyʋrɔɔ n sa fʋ Titusi, mʋ nɩɩ n taa fʋ fɛɛ mi‐bii gbaa‐gbaa anɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kʋlʋn mʋ tɔ mʋ. Kabwaala yɛ kayɩɩ yuuli mʋ nɩɩ kɩ lɩɩ anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ anɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito asɛ mʋ yɛ fʋ fan kyɩna.
56001005	Kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ n yɛgɛ fʋ Kereti ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ mʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, fʋ nyɛ lɔŋɔ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ san mʋ lʋwɛ, kɛ fʋ yii abɩlɩsa kadɛ kʋmaa nɩmʋ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ tɔ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n kaapʋ fʋ mʋ.
56001006	Ɩ dagaa ɔbɩlɩsa maa gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ man sʋ asɩn pwɩɩsa, nɩɩ o kili ɔkyɩɩ kʋlʋn kpen, nɩɩ mu‐bii ana bɛ gyɛ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu, mʋ nɩɩ ba man sʋ kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn abɛɛ kibii libi.
56001007	Fɛɛ ɔbɩlɩsa maa gyɛ Krisito kʋbʋ ɔkɩɩsʋpʋ mʋ, ɩ dagaa maa gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ man sʋ asɩn pwɩɩsa, nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ kʋsaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ, nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ nyɛ agbʋ benbilen, nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ bʋʋ nta, nɩɩ ɔ man gyɛ oluu bitipu, nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ onsi‐payɩ libi afulee sʋ.
56001008	Amaa ɔ dagaa maa gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɔɔlɛ afɔ, nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn, nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩtaa mʋ n‐yɩɩ, nɩɩ mʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi, nɩɩ ɔ sɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ mʋ awaasa du kyɛɛkyɛɛ.
56001009	Ɔ dagaa maa taalɛ kɩtaa kesintin asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ kenken, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba kaapʋ ɩmʋ mʋ, kɛ ngbaa mʋ ɔ taalɛ taa kesintin kɩkaapʋ mʋ tɔwɛ waa asa, kɛ ɔ taa ɩmʋ tii bamʋ nɩɩ bee gyii ɩmʋ ɩmɔɔrɛ mʋ ɔkpa.
56001010	Lɩɩ fɛɛ asa gaalaagaa bɛɛ kʋsʋ bɛɛ yɩlɛ asɩn mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ bɛ sʋ bamʋ ntɔwɛ kɩyan bɛɛ pɩna asa, fɔnfɔn Gyiwu abi akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu.
56001011	Ɩ dagaa fʋ tii bamʋ ntɔwɛ mʋ ɔkpa, lɩɩ fɛɛ bɛ sʋ bamʋ npɩna kɩkaapʋ mʋ bee nyita akpaara sʋ abi lɩɩ kɩkaapʋ danbɩrasa mʋ sʋ. Bɛɛ waa ipeeli‐sɩn nɩmʋ bee biti afulee.
56001012	Halɩɩ Kereti abi atɔwɛpʋ mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kereti abi bɛ gyɛ antɩŋɛsa wuya ana nɩn saŋa kʋmaa, nɩɩ be du fɛɛ ndʋnbwɛ libi, nɩɩ bɛ gyɛ awʋlɛgyɔpʋ agyipu lala.”
56001013	Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ kesintin. Ɩmʋ sʋ taa kensi payɩ tɔwɛ yii bamʋ, kɛ bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii ɩ nyɛ yɩlɛ kinkin,
56001014	kɛ ba man nu Gyiwu abi asɩrɩkpan ikisii‐sɩn mʋ, abɛɛ be nu sa bamʋ nɩɩ bee kina kesintin asɩn mʋ.
56001015	Bamʋ nɩɩ ba man sʋ ineesi mʋ, kʋtɔ kʋ man gyɛ ineesi bamʋ asɛ, amaa bamʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ ineesi nɩɩ ba mɛɛ kɔɔlɛ bee gyii mʋ, sɛhn man gyɛ kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ bamʋ asɛ, amaa alibi ɩ bɔla bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ yɛ bamʋ nkɔlɔ tɔ kpini.
56001016	Bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ be nyi Ɩbwaarɛ, amaa bamʋ awaasa tɔ mʋ bee kina mʋ. Ɩbwaarɛ ii kisi bamʋ awaasa kpini, nɩɩ bɛ gyɛ kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn wuya ana, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ taalɛ waa kɩdanbɩrasa kakaakʋ.
56002001	Amaa fɛɛ fʋ bɩrɛ, ɩ dagaa fʋ kaapʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ii buu kesintin kɩkaapʋ mʋ.
56002002	Tɔwɛ anyɩn abɩlɩsa fɛɛ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ baa ɩ dɛ, kɛ ba baa bɛ sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ, kɛ ba kɩtaa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ, kɛ ba kɩtaa kesintin kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ, kɛ ba nyɛ kebiti sa abaa, kɛ ba nyɛ nkɔlɔ yɩlɛ tɔ.
56002003	Kanɩn maa nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ akyɩɩ‐nyi mʋ fɛɛ ba kyɩna kakyɩna mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ Krisito abuupu ba kyɩna mʋ. Ba man natɛ nyita asa atɩɩ abɛɛ ba baa bɛ gyɛ atabʋʋpʋ, amaa ba kaapʋ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn.
56002004	Kanɩn gbaa nɩɩ ba kaapʋ abite mʋ kanan mʋ nɩɩ bee biti bamʋ‐kuli ana yɛ bamʋ‐bii ana,
56002005	kɛ ba kɩtaa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kɛ ba man waa kɩgyagaa, kɛ ba waa bamʋ akpaara sʋ asun, kɛ ba waa adanbɩrasa, kɛ ba bɩya bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ sa bamʋ‐kuli ana, kɛ ɔkʋ ɔ man nyɛ tɔwɛ asɩn libi nyita Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ.
56002006	Kanɩn maa nɩɩ fʋ tɔwɛ waa ayaafɔlɛ gbaa fɛɛ ba kɩtaa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ.
56002007	Lɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa tɔ mʋ, ɩ dagaa fʋ maa waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋrɔn kɛ asa bɛ kasɛ fʋ tɔ. Lɩɩ fʋ kɩkaapʋ tɔ mʋ taa kensi payɩ yɛ kɔkɔlɔ fuuli kaapʋ.
56002008	Yɛgɛ fʋ katɔwɛ kɩ baa kɩ dɛ ɔkpa, yɛgɛ ɩ man sʋ asɩn pwɩɩsa kʋ, kɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bɛ kʋsʋ yɩlɛ fʋ sʋ mʋ be gyii ipeeli, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba mɛɛ yɛ bɛ nyɛ alibi kʋ tɔwɛ lɩɩ anɛ sʋ.
56002009	Kaapʋ anyɛ mʋ fɛɛ bɛ bɩya bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ sa bamʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ana kʋtɔ kʋmaa tɔ, kɛ ɩ bɔla bamʋ ansi. Amaa ba man kan tɔwɛ gyaŋa bamʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ana,
56002010	abɛɛ ba yuuri bamʋ. Amaa ba waa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn kɛ bamʋ‐nyɩrɩpɛ ana bɛ kɔɔlɛ bamʋ gyii, kɛ bamʋ awaasa ɩ yɛgɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, anɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ asɩn kaapʋsa mʋ, ɩ baa ɩ bʋ ɔbʋlɛ.
56002011	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ kabwaala mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ bɩya kamɔlɩgɛ ifuli sa asa kpini.
56002012	Kabwaala mʋ kaapʋ anɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ a lɛɛ anɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ ɩkpa libi yɛ dulinyaa tɔ atɔ kayalaga sʋ, kɛ a taalɛ kɩtaa anɛ n‐yɩɩ, kɛ a waa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ dɛ ɔkpa, yɛ kabwaarɛ‐sun danbɩrasa kakyɩna nɩmʋ tɔ,
56002013	fɛɛ a maa gyoo tamaa kparɛ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ anɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lala, yɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ Yesu Krisito ii biti o bwii ba yɛ mʋ bʋnyaa mʋ.
56002014	Mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ kyula wu ka anɛ kʋkɔ, lɛɛ anɛ lɩɩ alibi kpini tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ waa anɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba man sʋ ineesi, nɩɩ ɩɩ gyʋgyʋʋ bamʋ fɛɛ ba waa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn.
56002015	Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fʋ kaapʋ. Tɔwɛ waa bamʋ kɛ fʋ tɔwɛ yii bamʋ ɔlʋn tɔ. Man yɛgɛ ɔkʋ ɔ fɛɛrɛ fʋ.
56003001	Nyiŋi Krisito abuupu mʋ fɛɛ ba bɩya bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ sa awuragyipu yɛ kɩbanɛ alʋnpʋ kɛ ba nu sa bamʋ, kɛ ba baa bee biti kɩdanbɩrasa kʋmaa kɩwaa,
56003002	kɛ ba man tɔwɛ asɩn libi gyaga ɔkʋ sʋ, amaa ba nyɛ keyuula yɛ abaa, kɛ ba baa bee su bɛɛ sa abaa, kɛ ba bɩya bamʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ sa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ.
56003003	Saŋa kʋ tɔ mʋ, anɛ gbaa anɛ an daa melensi, nɩɩ an waa kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn, an fɔyɩ ɔkpa, nɩɩ an gyɛ anyɛ sa kɩgyagaa yɛ kayalaga kʋmaa nɩmʋ. Nɩɩ an sʋ kumu tɔ ɔlʋn yɛ kayɩɩ basa, nɩɩ bee kisi anɛ nɩɩ anɛ gbaa anɛ an kisi bamʋ.
56003004	Amaa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ anɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ Ɩbwaarɛ mu kebiti yɛ mʋ kʋwɛɛ kuwu lɩɩ ifuli mʋ,
56003005	ɔ mɔlɩgɛ anɛ. Man gyɛ anɛ adanbɩrasa kɩwaa sʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɔlɩgɛ anɛ, amaa lɩɩ mʋ kʋwɛɛ kuwu sʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɔla mʋ Kayaayu mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ fwɩɩ anɛ mʋ sʋ, sa anɛ kakʋʋgɛ pʋpwɛ yɛ nkpa pʋpwɛ mɔlɩgɛ anɛ.
56003006	Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla anɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ Yesu Krisito sʋ sa anɛ mʋ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ gaa.
56003007	Saamʋ, lɩɩ mʋ kabwaala mʋ sʋ mʋ, anɛ ɩkpa i kyiigi mu ansi tɔ, kɛ a ba waa mʋ nkpa kakpaa mʋ nɩɩ an sʋ ɩmʋ tamaa mʋ agyipu.
56003008	Katɔwɛ nɩmʋ gyɛ kesintin nɩn. Nɩɩ n biti fɛɛ fu bwii pɩla asɩn nɩmʋ tɔ, kɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gyii mʋ, ba taa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sa kɩdanbɩrasa kɩwaa. Falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ ɩ bʋrɔn gaa nɩɩ ɩ sʋ tɔnɔ sa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ.
56003009	Amaa lɛɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ kimelensi ɩmɔɔrɛ‐libi tɔ yɛ kakʋʋgɛ tɔ nkyaga sʋ yɛ kamɔɔrɛ‐gyii yɛ nluu kʋkɔ lɩɩ nbara sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ kɩyan nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ tɔnɔ kpini‐kpini.
56003010	Ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ fanɛ tɔ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ asa amu ɛɛ wɔtɛ abaa mʋ, tɔwɛ yii mʋ kɩlɩɩ kʋlʋn abɛɛ ɩlɩɩ ɩnyɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ man kan yɛgɛ mʋ, barɩgɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛgɛ mʋ.
56003011	Baa fii nyi fɛɛ kanɩn ɔsa maŋa alibi i gyii mʋ nfɛɛrɛ yɛ mu kumu, yɛgɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa nyi fɛɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa mʋ gyɛ alibi.
56003012	N dan kan sun Atemasi abɛɛ Tikiku fʋ asɛ mʋ, waa aniya kɛ fʋ ba gyaŋa mɛ Nikopoli kadɛ tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ n waa mɛ nfɛɛrɛ fɛɛ n kpee tʋtɔ awɔɔ saŋa.
56003013	Waa kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ taalɛ, kɛ fʋ kyɛ Senasi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ lɔya mʋ yɛ Apolosi tɔ, kɛ ba nyɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ki tiri bamʋ lɩɩ ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba kpee mʋ.
56003014	Ɩ dagaa anɛ bɩrɩsa ana Krisito abuupu mʋ, ba bɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba nyɛ saŋa sa kusun kɩwaa, kɛ ɩ kyɛ asa tɔ kɛ ba nyɛ bamʋ atɔ tirisa, kɛ ba man kyɩna kakyɩna mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ tɔnɔ.
56003015	Bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ mɛ asɛ nfɩɩ mʋ kpini bɛɛ fwaala fʋ. Fwaala ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti anɛ asɩn, nɩɩ ana bamʋ an bʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ mʋ kpini. Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala kɩ baa kɩ bʋ fanɛ asɛ.
57001001	Ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ lɩɩ mɛ Pɔɔlɩ mʋ nɩɩ lɩɩ Krisito Yesu kusun sʋ nɩɩ ba tii mɛ obu mʋ, yɛ anɛ bɩrɩsa Timoti asɛ. An kyʋrɔɔ an sa fʋ Filemon, anɛ kyɛmɩnɛ danbɩrasa yɛ anɛ bɩrɩsa osunpu,
57001002	yɛ anɛ‐pɩɩkyɩɩ Afiiya yɛ anɛ bɩrɩsa Krisito tɔ ɔnaakɔpʋ Akyipusi, yɛ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ gyaŋɛ fʋ kɩkpaara sʋ mʋ.
57001003	Anɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kabwaala yɛ keyuula kɩ baa kɩ bʋ fanɛ asɛ.
57001004	Mi‐supu Filemon, saŋa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n kʋlɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ mʋ, n nyiŋi fʋ sʋ nɩɩ n fwaala Ɩbwaarɛ lɩɩ fʋ sʋ.
57001005	Lɩɩ fɛɛ, n nu kanan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ kɔɔlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu gyii yɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ sa Ɩbwaarɛ asa mʋ kpini.
57001006	Mɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, payɩ ansi kyaga sʋ tɔwɛ fʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ kaapʋ asa. Saamʋ, fʋ ɩ nyɛ bɩɩ atɔ danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ an sʋ lɩɩ Yesu Krisito sʋ mʋ kpini lʋwɛ.
57001007	Mi‐supu Filemon, fu kebiti mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ mʋ yɛgɛ nɩɩ mi ansi i gyii gaa nɩɩ ɩ waa mɛ aniya tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ yɛgɛ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asa nkɔlɔ ɩ dɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba nyɛ ɔlʋn.
57001008	Ɩmʋ sʋ, lɩɩ Yesu Krisito sʋ mʋ, naafɔɔ n sʋ ɔkpa n taalɛ nyan fʋ lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fʋ waa mʋ sʋ,
57001009	amaa n kʋlɛ fʋ lɩɩ kebiti ɩkpa sʋ. Nɩɩ mɛ, Pɔɔlɩ mʋ nɩɩ n bɩlɛ, nɩɩ lɩɩ Yesu Krisito kusun sʋ mʋ, nbɩɩnbɩɩ n tii obu falɛ mʋ,
57001010	n kʋlɛ fʋ lɩɩ mi‐bii Onesimu, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ ba biliŋi mi‐bii Krisito tɔ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n bʋ obu kitii tɔ falɛ.
57001011	Naafɔɔ saamʋ, ɔ daa ɔ man sʋ kyaarɛ sa fʋ, amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ ɔ sʋ kyaarɛ sa n maa fʋ kpini.
57001012	Ɩmʋ sʋ, n bwiiyaa mʋ n bɩya fʋ, nɩɩ n biti mʋ asɩn gaa, kɔɔlɛ mʋ sa mɛ.
57001013	Naafɔɔ n daa n biti fɛɛ ɔ baa ɔ bʋ mɛ asɛ, kɛ o yii fʋ ayaa tɔ ɛɛ kyɛ mɛ tɔ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n tii obu falɛ lɩɩ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ katɔwɛ sʋ.
57001014	Amaa n mee biti fɛɛ n waa kʋtɔ kʋ yɛgɛ n man nyi fʋ nfɛɛrɛ, kɛ ɩ man naa ba fɛɛ n nyan fʋ nɩn, amaa ɩ baa ɩ gyɛ fʋ kebiti.
57001015	Akʋtɔ Onesimu barɩgɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ fʋ asɛ nkɛ gbɛrɛɛ kʋ nɩn, saamʋ nɩɩ ɔ kan bwii ba mʋ fii biti fʋ nyɛ mʋ kakpaa,
57001016	yɛgɛ ɔ man bɩla ɔ gyɛ kɩnyɛ nkʋn, amaa ɔ kyɔ kɩnyɛ lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ gyɛ fʋ bɩrɩsa bitisa Krisito tɔ. Nɩɩ n biti mʋ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ gaa, kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ ngbaa fʋ fii biti fʋ ba biti mʋ fʋ kyɔ mɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ gyɛ fʋ kɩnyɛ, nɩɩ ɔ bɩla ɔ gyɛ fʋ bɩrɩsa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ tɔ.
57001017	Ɩmʋ sʋ fʋ kan fu nyi fɛɛ fʋ bɩrɩsa ɩ gyɛ mɛ mʋ, fu bwii kɔɔlɛ mʋ yɛ ɔdan fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fii biti fʋ kɔɔlɛ mɛ mʋ.
57001018	Nɩɩ ɔ kan waa fʋ alibi akʋ abɛɛ ɔ sʋ fʋ kʋkɔ mʋ, taa ɩmʋ kpini sʋla mɛ.
57001019	Mɛ Pɔɔlɩ, n sʋ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ kɩbaa n kyʋrɔɔ ɩnɩmʋ yɛ n biti n ka fʋ kʋkɔ maŋa. Ngbaagbaa fʋ, fʋ sʋ mɛ fʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ kʋkɔ lɩɩ nkpa mʋ nɩɩ n yɛgɛ nɩɩ fʋ nyɛ mʋ sʋ.
57001020	Ɩmʋ sʋ mi‐supu Filemon, n biti fɛɛ fʋ kɩɩ Krisito Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ sʋ kɛ fʋ waa ɩnɩmʋ sa mɛ, kɛ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ kɩ dɛ mɛ.
57001021	N maa kyʋrɔɔ fʋ falɛ n kɔɔlɛ fu gyii fɛɛ fii biti fʋ waa sa mɛ, nɩɩ n nyi fɛɛ fii biti fʋ waa fʋ kyɔ ɩmʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ falɛ gbaa.
57001022	Amaa kʋtɔ kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ kɛ bɩla kɛ tii sʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, lɔŋɔ afɔ obu yɩla mɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ n sʋ tamaa fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti o kyula fanɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ, kɛ ɔ yɛgɛ ba tigi mɛ kɛ n ba fanɛ asɛ.
57001023	Mɛ bɩrɩsa Epafarasi mʋ nɩɩ maa mʋ an tii obu lɩɩ Krisito Yesu sʋ mʋ, ɩɩ fwaala fʋ.
57001024	Kanɩn nɩɩ Maki maa Arisitako yɛ Demasi yɛ Luka mʋ nɩɩ bɛ gyɛ mɛ bɩrɩsa ana asunpu mʋ bɛɛ fwaala fʋ.
57001025	Anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito kabwaala kɩ baa kɩ bʋ fanɛ asɛ.
58001001	Saŋa mʋ dɩdaa mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla mʋ atɔwɛpʋ sʋ nɩn tɔwɛ mʋ asɩn sa anɛ naana ana saŋa gaalaagaa yɛ ɩkpa kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ sʋ.
58001002	Amaa nkɛ laalaalʋwɛ nɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, ɔ bɔla Mu‐Bii Yesu sʋ nɩn tɔwɛ mʋ asɩn sa anɛ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla mʋ sʋ tʋʋ sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ yɛ ɩmʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ, nɩɩ ɔ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ fɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa ii biti ɩ baa ɩ gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ.
58001003	Nɩɩ mʋ ɩ lɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ bʋnyaa ŋalɩgɛsa kparɛ mʋ ifuli kaapʋ, nɩɩ mʋ tɔ nɩɩ an wu kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa‐gbaa du. Nɩɩ mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋgya nɩɩ ɔ sʋ ɛɛ kɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ maa fwɩɩ nyɩmɩsa alibi kamaa mʋ, ɔ naa kyɩna Ɔlʋnpʋ Owura lala Ɩbwaarɛ gyisa sʋ sʋsʋ.
58001004	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ kyɔ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ mʋ kʋkyɔ, nɩɩ kɩtɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa mʋ mʋ, bɩla kɩ kyɔ bamʋ lɛɛ gaa.
58001005	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ tɔ ɔmɔmɔ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ mʋ kakaakʋ yɛ, “Fʋ gyɛ Mi‐Bii, Lɩɩ ndaga n gyɛ Fʋ‐Sɛ?” Abɛɛ, “N biti n baa n gyɛ Mʋ‐Sɛ, kɛ mɔɔ mʋ ɔ baa ɔ gyɛ Mi‐Bii?”
58001006	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɩya Mu‐Bii gyankpaasa dulinyaa tɔ mʋ, ɔ bɩla tɔwɛ mʋ nbɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ yɛ, “Fanɛ mɛ nbɔɔ kpini fan muŋa sun mʋ.”
58001007	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ maa tɔwɛ lɩɩ mʋ nbɔɔ mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “N waa mɛ nbɔɔ fɛɛ afuu, nɩɩ n bɩla waa bamʋ fɛɛ fʋlɔn anobi.”
58001008	Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ sa mu‐Bii mʋ bɩrɛ yɛ, “Fʋ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ fu kuwura‐gyii kii biti kɩ baa kɩ bʋ tɔ kakpaa, nɩɩ fii biti fʋ taa kesintin gyii fu kuwura mʋ kɩmʋ ɔkpa sʋ.
58001009	Nɩɩ kesintin kigyii nɩɩ fii biti, nɩɩ fii kisi alibi. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ mɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ n diyaa fʋ n kyɔ fʋ tɔmaa ana ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ, nɩɩ n yɛgɛ fʋ kɔkɔlɔ ki fuuli fʋ.”
58001010	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɩla tɔwɛ mu‐Bii mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ mʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ yɛ, “Lɩɩ npiili asɛ mʋ fʋ ii yii dulinyaa kasɛ, nɩɩ fʋ ɩ waa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ.
58001011	Ɩnɩmʋ kpini ii biti i nyita, amaa fɛɛ fʋ bɩrɛ fʋ bʋ tɔ kakpaa. Ɩnɩmʋ ii biti ɩ kyatɛ fɛɛ atɔ bunsa.
58001012	Fii biti fʋ bɔɔ ɩmʋ fɛɛ ɩkaalɛ bunsa, kɛ fʋ kyɛɛgɛ ɩmʋ fɛɛ atɔ bunsa. Amaa fɛɛ fʋ, fʋ mɛɛ yɛ fʋ kyɛɛgɛ nɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fu du mʋ, kanɩn nɩɩ fii biti fʋ baa fu du, nɩɩ fu nsu ɩ man sʋ ɔkaa.”
58001013	Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ mu‐Bii yɛ, “Kyɩna mɛ kɩbaa gyisa sʋ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n biti n taa fu akisipu waa fʋ ayaa kasɛ.” Amaa ɔ man tɔwɛ falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ sa mʋ kabɔɔ kʋkʋ.
58001014	Ɩmʋ sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ mʋ kpini ba gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee sun Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ o sun bamʋ yɛ ba ba kyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba ba nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ mʋ tɔ.
58002001	Lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ mʋ ɩ dagaa a maa bɩya asʋ kasɛ, kɛ a kɩtaa asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ an nu mʋ tɔ yɛ ɔdan, kɛ a man kyɛɛgɛ gbɛrɛɛ‐gbɛrɛɛ lɩɩ ɩmʋ tɔ.
58002002	Fɛɛ nɩɩ nbara asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla mʋ nbɔɔ mʋ sʋ tɔwɛ anɛ naana ana mʋ i sun kusun, nɩɩ an nyi yɛ lɩɩ koo dɩdaa mʋ, ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn nɩɩ ɔ man buu Ɩbwaarɛ nbara ɩnɩmʋ mʋ, ɔ nyɛ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa.
58002003	Kanɩn bɩrɛ, fɛɛ nɩɩ an kan kina kamɔlɩgɛ lala asɩn nɩmʋ mʋ, nɛnɛ nɩɩ an taalɛ sɩlɛ lɩɩ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ mʋ tɔ? Falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu gyankpaa tɔwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba nu ɩmʋ mʋ, ba gyii ɩmʋ kesintin sa anɛ.
58002004	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa gyii ɩmʋ kesintin lɩɩ mʋ ɩsɩnkaala yɛ adangana yɛ asɩn kyinkyinsa yɛ mʋ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ kakɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa sa mʋ asa lɩɩ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ biti sʋ.
58002005	Ɩmʋ sʋ man gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ mʋ ɩ gyɛ akɩɩsʋpʋ sa dulinyaa pʋpwɛ mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ waa, nɩɩ an tɔwɛ ɩmʋ asɩn falɛ.
58002006	Amaa ɩ sʋ opula kʋ nɩɩ ɔsa kʋ gyii ɩmʋ kesintin lɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Mɩnɛ nɩɩ anyɩmɩsa ba dan ba gyɛ nɩɩ fɩɩ fɛ bamʋ sʋ nfɛɛrɛ, nɩɩ mɩnɛ nɩɩ daadimaadi nbii‐nyɩnsa ba dan ba gyɛ nɩɩ fii wu bamʋ sʋ kanɩn?
58002007	Fʋ waa bamʋ pii fʋ nbɔɔ mʋ asɛ saŋa gbɛrɛɛ, amaa fʋ taa bʋnyaa yɛ bɛɛrɛɛ sa bamʋ,
58002008	nɩɩ fʋ taa kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ waa bamʋ kasɛ.” Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ maa tɔwɛ yɛ ɔ taa kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ waa nyɩmɩsa kasɛ mʋ, nɩɩ sɛhn man bʋ tɔ yɛ ɔ man taa waa mʋ kasɛ. Nɩɩ halɩɩ ndaga gbaa, a man pɩɩta wu fɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ kɩ bʋ nyɩmɩsa kasɛ.
58002009	Amaa an wu Yesu mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ waa mʋ pii mʋ nbɔɔ asɛ saŋa gbɛrɛɛ kʋ, nɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ bɩrɛ, ɔ taa bʋnyaa yɛ bɛɛrɛɛ sa mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ o gyii lewu awʋrʋfɔ, nɩɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala mʋ sʋ mʋ, o wu sa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ.
58002010	Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tʋʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa, nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ kɩ bʋ tɔ sa mʋ mʋ, ɩ dagaa sa mʋ fɛɛ ɔ bɩya mu‐bii ana gaalaagaa mʋ bʋnyaa mʋ tɔ. Kɛ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ taalɛ waa mʋ, o ŋmina yɛ Yesu o gyii awʋrʋfɔ, kɛ ɔ ba waa ɔgyankpaapʋ danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ mɔlɩgɛ bamʋ naa lʋwɛ.
58002011	Mʋ ɩ lɛɛ bamʋ lɩɩ bamʋ alibi tɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ mʋ yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ bamʋ lɩɩ alibi tɔ mʋ kpini ba gyɛ Ɔsɛ kʋlʋn. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ mʋ ipeeli fɛɛ maa tɩɩ bamʋ mu‐supu ana.
58002012	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ, “N biti n tɩɩ fʋ kɩtɩɩ sa mi‐supu ana, kɛ n bɩɩ ɩlʋn yɩn fʋ asa nsana tɔ.”
58002013	Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ, n biti n taa mɛ n‐yɩɩ tʋʋ fʋ sʋ.” Nɩɩ o bwii kyaga sʋ yɛ, “Kɩɩ mɛ ndee yɛ nbii mʋ nɩɩ fʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ fʋ taa sa mɛ mʋ.”
58002014	Lɩɩ fɛɛ nbii mʋ ba maa gyɛ anyɩmɩsa nɩɩ ba sʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ yɛ nkalan mʋ, kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ Yesu gbaa ba biliŋi nyɩmɩsa fɛɛ bamʋ, kɛ ɔ taalɛ wu. Lɩɩ mu kelewu mʋ sʋ mʋ, o nyita Sɩtaanɛ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ lɩɩ lewu sʋ.
58002015	Kɛ ɔ kɔɔlɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba sɩlɛ lewu, nɩɩ lewu kufuu ki gyii bamʋ amu kakyɩna tɔ mʋ, lɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ abaa tɔ.
58002016	Ɩ gyɛ kesintin fɛɛ, Abraham kɩnaana nɩɩ ɔ kyɛ tɔ, amaa ɩ man gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ nɩɩ ɔ kyɛ tɔ.
58002017	Ɩmʋ sʋ i tiri sa mʋ fɛɛ maa waa mʋ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ mu‐supu ana ɔkpa kʋmaa sʋ, kɛ ɔ baa ɔ gyɛ kʋwɛɛ owupu yɛ kesintin Ɩbwaarɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ sa bamʋ, mu kusun mʋ nɩɩ ee sun ɛɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ mʋ ii biti ɔ yɩlɛ tɔ sa asa kpini kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ taa bamʋ alibi kɛɛ bamʋ.
58002018	Lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ wu awʋrʋfɔ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ kʋtʋʋ tɔ kɩɩ mʋ, ɩmʋ sʋ ɛɛ taalɛ kyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba nyɛ kʋtʋʋ tɔ kɩɩ mʋ tɔ.
58003001	Ɩmʋ sʋ mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana, Ɩbwaarɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩɩ fanɛ mʋ, fan yɛgɛ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ ɩ baa ɩ gyan Yesu sʋ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ osunpu yɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ mʋ nɩɩ an kɔɔlɛ mʋ gyii nɩɩ an lɛɛ an tɔwɛ mʋ.
58003002	Nɩɩ ee nu Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ mʋ mʋ asɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Mosesi nu Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa tɔ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ayɛ asa kɩkɩɩ sʋ mʋ.
58003003	Yesu gyɛ nyɩmɩsa kparɛ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ lala ɔ kyɔ Mosesi, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ kɩkpaara ɔpɔyɩpʋ sʋ bɛɛrɛɛ lala ɔ kyɔ kɩkpaara mʋ gbaa‐gbaa.
58003004	Lɩɩ fɛɛ kɩkpaara kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba pɔyɩ mʋ, ɔkʋ ɩ pɔyɩ kɩmʋ, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ gyɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔpɔyɩpʋ.
58003005	Nɩɩ Mosesi gyɛ kɩyaafɔlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ee gyii kesintin kʋtɔ kʋmaa tɔ. Nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ tɔwɛ kakaakʋ.
58003006	Amaa Krisito ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩkpaara asa sʋ yɛ kesintin. Nɩɩ an kan taa kɔkɔlɔ ɔsɩɩ, yɩlɛ tamaa mʋ tɔ kɩnyɩn tɔ mʋ, ɩmʋ ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ anɛ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩkpaara mʋ sʋ asa.
58003007	Kanɩn sʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fan kan nu mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ asɩn ndaga mʋ,
58003008	fan man waa nkɔlɔ ɔsɩɩ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ anɛ naana ana ba daa waa, nɩɩ ba kʋsʋ yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ba tʋʋ mʋ tɔ kɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ ofuli sʋ mʋ.
58003009	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ fanɛ naana ana ba waa mʋ, nɩɩ ba tʋʋ mʋ tɔ kɩɩ, nɩɩ ba wu atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa nsu adɩna mʋ tɔ mʋ.
58003010	Kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ ɩ waa mʋ agbʋ sa kanɩn kanaana maŋa asa, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, ‘Saŋa kʋmaa bamʋ nkɔlɔ ɩ man gyan mi kebiti sʋ, nɩɩ ii be kina mɛ nbara kibuu.
58003011	Ɩmʋ sʋ n nyɛ agbʋ bɔ ntan yɛ, N mɛɛ yɛ n bɩla sa bamʋ opula fʋʋtɛkpa mʋ nɩɩ n daa n biti n sa bamʋ mʋ.’ ”
58003012	Kanɩn sʋ mɛ‐daa ana yɛ mi‐supu ana Ɩbwaarɛ asa, fan baa fan da sʋ kɛ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ ɔ man fɛ nfɛɛrɛ libi, yɛgɛ mʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ, kɛ ɩ man lɛɛ mʋ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ nkpa tɔ kakpaa mʋ asɛ.
58003013	Amaa kakɛ kʋmaa fan waa abaa aniya tɔ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan san fan tɛ nkpa tɔ ndaga falɛ, kɛ alibi ɩ man pɩna fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ kɛ ɔ waa kɔkɔlɔ ɔsɩɩ.
58003014	Nɩɩ an kan yɩlɛ tɔ kinkin naa fʋʋ laalaalʋwɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ an kɔɔlɛ gyii npiili asɛ mʋ, anaa Krisito an biti a bʋga barɩgɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ mʋ tɔ.
58003015	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ wʋla tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Nɩɩ fan kan nu mʋ ɔbʋlɛ ndaga mʋ, fan man waa nkɔlɔ ɔsɩɩ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fanɛ naana ana ba daa kʋsʋ yɩlɛ mʋ sʋ saŋa mʋ dɩdaa mʋ.”
58003016	Anɩmʋ ana ɩ gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba nu Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn nɩɩ ba kʋsʋ yɩlɛ tɔ mʋ? Man gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ Mosesi lɛɛ lɩɩ Egyipiti mʋ kpini?
58003017	Nɩɩ anɩmʋ ana nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ agbʋ waa nsu adɩna mʋ? Man gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba waa alibi nɩɩ ba wu ba dɛ‐dɛ ofuli sʋ mʋ?
58003018	Anɩmʋ ana nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bɔ ntan yɛ, ba mɛɛ yɛ ba nyɛ loo mu opula fʋʋtɛkpa tɔ mʋ? Man gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba waa kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn mʋ?
58003019	Ɩmʋ sʋ an wu fɛɛ, lɩɩ bamʋ kɩman‐kɔɔlɛ‐gyi sʋ mʋ, ba man taalɛ loo mu opula fʋʋtɛkpa mʋ tɔ.
58004001	Ɩmʋ sʋ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ maa da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ lɩɩ mu opula fʋʋtɛkpa kuloo mʋ, nɩɩ kɩ maa san kɩ dɛ sa anɛ sʋ mʋ, fan yɛgɛ a baa an da sʋ yɛ ɔdan, kɛ ɩ man ba fɛɛ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ ɔ fɔyɩ kɛ ɔ man nyɛ opula fʋʋtɛkpa mʋ tɔ loo.
58004002	Lɩɩ fɛɛ anɛ gbaa anɛ an nyɛ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ sa anɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ sa ngbaa bamʋ mʋ. Amaa ba man nyɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba nu mʋ tɔnɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba maa nu waa bamʋ asʋ tɔ mʋ, ba man kɔɔlɛ gyii bamʋ nkɔlɔ tɔ.
58004003	Kanɩn sʋ nbɩɩnbɩɩ anɛ mʋ nɩɩ an kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ, anɛ ii biti a loo mu opula fʋʋtɛkpa mʋ tɔ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “N nyɛ agbʋ bɔ ntan yɛ, ‘Ba mɛɛ yɛ ba nyɛ loo mi opula fʋʋtɛkpa mʋ tɔ.’ ” Halɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ kanɩn mʋ, ɔ tɛɛ wʋla lʋwɛ dulinyaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tʋʋ mʋ kusun.
58004004	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ katɩn kʋ lɩɩ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa mʋ sʋ yɛ, “Kakɛ sunɔsapʋ mʋ tɔ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ fʋʋtɛ lɩɩ kusun mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ kpini tɔ.”
58004005	Nɩɩ ɩ bɩla tɔwɛ lɩɩ asɩn nɩmʋ sʋ yɛ, “Ba mɛɛ yɛ ba nyɛ loo mi opula fʋʋtɛkpa mʋ tɔ.”
58004006	Ɩmʋ sʋ mʋ kɩ san kɩ dɛ fɛɛ akʋ bee biti ba nyɛ loo opula fʋʋtɛkpa mʋ tɔ. Amaa bamʋ nɩɩ ba gyankpaa nu asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ, ba waa kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn, nɩɩ ba man nyɛ loo kɩmʋ tɔ.
58004007	Ɩmʋ sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ bɩla yɩla kakɛ kʋ, nɩɩ ɛɛ tɩɩ kɩmʋ yɛ, “Ndaga.” Nɩɩ ɩ maa kyɛɛrɛɛ kamaa tɔ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ bɔla Dawidi sʋ tɔwɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla tɔwɛ asɩn maŋa mʋ yɛ, “Ndaga, nɩɩ fan kan nu mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ asɩn mʋ, fan man kan waa kɔkɔlɔ ɔsɩɩ yɛ fɛn mɛɛ yɛ fan nu.”
58004008	Fɛɛ nɩɩ Gyosuwa dɩn sa bamʋ ɔfʋʋtɛ nɩn, naafɔɔ kamaa tɔ Ɩbwaarɛ man dɩn bɩla tɔwɛ kakɛ pʋpwɛ kʋ asɩn.
58004009	Kanɩn bɩrɛ ɔfʋʋtɛ fɛɛ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa mʋ kɩ san kɩ dɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ asa, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ fʋʋtɛ kakɛ fʋʋtɛsa akɛ mʋ.
58004010	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ loo Ɩbwaarɛ opula fʋʋtɛkpa mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ ɔ fʋʋtɛ lɩɩ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa kusun waasa sʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa fʋʋtɛ lɩɩ mu kusun sʋ mʋ.
58004011	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan yɛgɛ a kpan anɛ n‐yɩɩ ɔkpa kʋmaa sʋ, kɛ a loo kanɩn opula fʋʋtɛkpa mʋ tɔ, kɛ ɩ man nyɛ ba fɛɛ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ ɔ waa kʋsʋ tɔ ɔlʋn, kɛ ɔ fɔyɩ ɔkpa naa lɩɩ tɩyɛ fɛɛ bamʋ mʋ.
58004012	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ ɩ sʋ nkpa, nɩɩ ii sun kusun. Nɩɩ asɩn mʋ ɩ bʋyɛ ɩ kyɔ sakunde gyimba anyɔ, nɩɩ ɩ taalɛ nyɛ loo nyɩmɩsa kɔkɔlɔ tɔ yɛ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ, nɩɩ ɩɩ barɩgɛ nyɩmɩsa ɩkyagakpa yɛ awiya tɔ npu. Nɩɩ kɩ bɩla kɩ talɛ nyɩmɩsa kɔkɔlɔ yɛ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ.
58004013	Nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tʋʋ mʋ kʋkʋ man bʋ tɔ, nɩɩ kɩ baala mu ansi sʋ. Amaa kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ kɩ dɛ tentengilen mu ansi sʋ. Nɩɩ anɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ii biti ɔ yɩlɛ lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ mu ansi tɔ.
58004014	Lɩɩ kanɩn sʋ fan yɛgɛ a yɩlɛ anɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ an sʋ mʋ tɔ kenken, lɩɩ fɛɛ an sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ kparɛ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ Yesu, Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyʋn sʋsʋ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ.
58004015	Lɩɩ fɛɛ anɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ man gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ wu anɛ kʋwɛɛ lɩɩ ntɩn mʋ nɩɩ a mɛɛ taalɛ an kɩtaa anɛ n‐yɩɩ mʋ. Amaa an sʋ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ kʋtʋʋ tɔ kɩɩ atɔ kpini tɔ fɛɛ anɛ, nɩɩ mɛɛ mʋ man waa alibi kʋ.
58004016	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan yɛgɛ a nyɛ kɔkɔlɔ yɩlɛ tɔ, ba Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ mu kuwura‐gya mʋ asɛ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ kabwaala kɩ bʋ, kɛ o wu anɛ kʋwɛɛ kɛ a nyɛ kabwaala mʋ nkyɛtɔ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ i tiri san anɛ mʋ.
58005001	Ɩbwaarɛ Oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ kʋmaa nɩmʋ, bɛɛ lɛɛ mʋ lɩɩ mʋ asa tɔ nɩn, kɛ ɔ yɩlɛ bamʋ ayaa tɔ sun Ɩbwaarɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla ɔ sʋ bamʋ nkɛɛ yɛ saraga ɛɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ, kɛ ɔ fwɩɩ bamʋ alibi.
58005002	Kanɩn ɔsa maŋa ɩɩ nyɛ kenyiita ee wu asa mʋ nɩɩ ba man nyi nɩɩ ba fɔyɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔkpa mʋ kʋwɛɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ngbaa mʋ gyɛ nyɩmɩsa nɩn, nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ waa alibi.
58005003	Lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa maa lɛɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa n‐yɩɩ sʋ alibi saraga fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɛɛ asa mʋ alibi saraga mʋ.
58005004	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ taa bɛɛrɛɛ sa mʋ n‐yɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ, amɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɛɛ mʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɩna lɛɛ Aron mʋ.
58005005	Kanɩn ɔkpa maŋa sʋ nɩɩ Krisito gbaa man sa mʋ n‐yɩɩ bɛɛrɛɛ fɛɛ ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ. Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ nɩn tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ gyɛ Mi‐bii, Lɩɩ ndaga n gyɛ Fʋ‐Sɛ.”
58005006	Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla tɔwɛ katɩn kʋ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ yɛ, “Fʋ gyɛ oseepu kakpaa fɛɛ ɔkpa kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ Mekisedeki kyɩna ɔ gyɛ mʋ.”
58005007	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Yesu tɛ nkpa tɔ kasɛ sʋ mʋ, ɔ sawʋ kenken yɛ ansikyu kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ lɛɛ mʋ lɩɩ lewu tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ maa bɩya mʋ n‐yɩɩ kasɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, o nu Yesu asɛ.
58005008	Halɩɩ maa gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐Bii gbaa mʋ, ɔ bɩɩla fɛɛ kunu Ɩbwaarɛ kadɛ ɩ bɩya awʋrʋfɔ kigyii.
58005009	Maa taalɛ waa Ɩbwaarɛ kɔkɔlɔ biti lʋwɛ kyɛɛkyɛɛ sʋ mʋ, mʋ o be biliŋi nkpa kamɔlɩgɛ mu kumu, nɩɩ ɛɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ bee nu mʋ asɛ mʋ nkpa kakpaa.
58005010	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ lɛɛ mʋ waa mu oseepu bɩlɩsa asɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Mekisedeki kyɩna ɔ gyɛ mʋ.
58005011	Naafɔɔ n sʋ asɩn damantɛ n tɔwɛ fanɛ lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ, amaa fan maa mɛɛ nu asɩn kasɛ bilen sʋ mʋ, ɩ bʋlʋn gaa sa fɛɛ n lɛɛ ɩmʋ kasɛ sa fanɛ.
58005012	Naafɔɔ halɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ gbaa, ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fan maa tɛɛ fan gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ akaapʋpʋ. Amaa ɩ maa san i tiri sa fanɛ fɛɛ fan nyɛ ɔsa kʋ, kɛ ɔ bɩla lɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn gyankpaasa mʋ kaapʋ fanɛ mʋ, fan du nɩn fɛɛ nbii pʋpwɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩnyapʋ tiri sa bamʋ, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ agyitɔ budusa.
