61001004	Lɩɩ falɛ sʋ mʋ ɔ sa anɛ kakɛɛ kparɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ fɛɛ ee biti ɔ sa anɛ mʋ. Lɩɩ kakɛɛ nɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, an nyɛ taa anɛ n‐yɩɩ waa mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ keduli mʋ tɔ, kɛ a lɛɛ anɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ nkɔlɔ biti mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ atɔ gyɔɔsa dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ.
61001005	Lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ mʋ fan kpan fanɛ n‐yɩɩ nyɛ kɩdanbɩrasa tii fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ, kɛ fan taa kinyi tii kɩdanbɩrasa mʋ sʋ,
61001006	nɩɩ kinyi mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ mɔɔ mʋ, fan taa n‐yɩɩ kɩkɩta tii sʋ, nɩɩ n‐yɩɩ kɩkɩta mɔɔ mʋ, fan nyɛ kenyiita yɩlɛ tɔ nɩɩ fan nyɛ kenyiita yɩlɛ tɔ mʋ, fan nyɛ kabwaarɛ‐sun danbɩrasa.
61001007	Lɩɩ kabwaarɛ‐sun danbɩrasa sʋ mʋ, fan taa kinyi‐bii kyɩna yɛ abaa, nɩɩ kinyi‐bii mɔɔ mʋ, fan biti abaa.
61001008	Fɛɛ nɩɩ atɔ nɩmʋ kpini ɩ bʋ fanɛ kakyɩna tɔ kʋkyɔ mʋ, ɩɩ kyɛ fanɛ tɔ. Nɩɩ lɩɩ fanɛ kinyi anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito sʋ mʋ, ɩɩ yɛgɛ fan baa fan gyɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ kyaarɛ yɛgɛ fɛn waa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa.
61001009	Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man nyɛ falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ mʋ gyɛ gyaatanapʋ nɩɩ mu ansi ɩ man kɩɩ kata‐kata. Nɩɩ ɔ tan sʋ fɛɛ Yesu Krisito fwɩɩ mʋ dɩdaa alibi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kyɩna waa mʋ.
61001010	Kanɩn sʋ mʋ, mɛ bɩrɩsa ana akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu fan kpan fanɛ n‐yɩɩ waa atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ fanɛ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɩɩ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ. Nɩɩ fan kan waa kanɩn mʋ, fan mɛɛ yɛ fan siti kɛ fan lɩɩ tɩyɛ.
61001011	Nɩɩ falɛ ɔkpa nɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ kɔɔlɛ fanɛ abaa anyɔ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ yɛ anɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ Yesu Krisito sʋsʋ kuwura‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ ɔkaa mʋ tɔ.
61001012	N nyi fɛɛ fan wʋla fan nyi ɩmʋ kpini, nɩɩ fan yɩlɛ kesintin asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ tɔ kenken. Amaa i tiri fɛɛ n bɩla nyiŋi fanɛ falɛ atɔ nɩmʋ saŋa kʋmaa.
61001013	N maa san n tɛ nkpa tɔ falɛ mʋ, ɩ dagaa n maa nyiŋi fanɛ asɩn nɩmʋ n sʋ n da fanɛ n kyiŋi.
61001014	Lɩɩ fɛɛ n nyi mɛ nkɛ ɩ man bɩla ɛɛ kyɔ kasɛ sʋ nfɩɩ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito lɛɛ kaapʋ mɛ mʋ.
61001015	Nɩɩ n biti n kpan mɛ n‐yɩɩ ɔkpa kʋmaa sʋ kɛ mi lewu kamaa mʋ, fan taalɛ nyiŋi atɔ nɩmʋ saŋa kʋmaa.
61001016	Nɩɩ a maa tɔwɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito ɔlʋn yɛ mu kibwii‐ba mʋ asɩn mʋ, ɩ man gyɛ atɩntɩnsa asɩrɩkpan nɩɩ an taa tɔwɛ fanɛ asɩn mʋ. Amaa anɛ gbaa‐gbaa anɛ ansi i wu mʋ bʋnyaa kparɛ mʋ.
61001017	Nɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ bɛɛrɛɛ yɛ bʋnyaa lɩɩ Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ an bʋ tʋtɔ. Saŋa maa nɩɩ an nu Ɔlʋnpʋ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔbʋlɛ maa tɔwɛ yɛ “Ɔnɩmʋ nkʋn ɩ gyɛ mɛ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ obii bitisa, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɔla mi ansi.”
61001018	Anɛ gbaa‐gbaa anɛ a nu falɛ ɔbʋlɛ maŋa maa lɩɩ sʋsʋ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ an bʋ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu asɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ kɩbɩɩ mʋ sʋ mʋ.
61001019	Ɩmʋ sʋ anɛ akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ an wu fɛɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ ba tɔwɛ yɩla mʋ, an kɔɔlɛ ɩmʋ gyii kesintin. Kɛ fan kpan fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kɩtaa ɩmʋ tɔ yɛ ɔdan. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ki du nɩn fɛɛ fɩtɩla mʋ nɩɩ kɩ kɩɩ kitentenbiri tɔ, taa naa fʋʋ fɛɛ kɩbwayɩkɛ asɛ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ nyenyenfuu kikyikpebi (sanbunkyu) kii biti kɩ ŋalɩgɛ fanɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ mʋ.
61001020	Ɩnɩmʋ kpini kamaa mʋ, ɩ dagaa fan maa nu kasɛ fɛɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn tɔwɛ yɩla sa mʋ, ɩ man gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa nfɛɛrɛ tɔ asɩn.
61001021	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩnlɛɛ tɔwɛsa mʋ, ɩ man lɩɩ nyɩmɩsa kebiti tɔ nɩn, amaa Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ i sa bamʋ, nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ.
61002001	Amaa dɩdaa mʋ antɩŋɛsa wuya ana ba kyɩna ba bʋ Ɩsɩrayɩ asa tɔ, nɩɩ kanɩn gbaa nɩɩ atɩntɩnsa akaapʋpʋ bee biti ba baa ba bʋ fanɛ tɔ. Nɩɩ bee biti ba ba kaapʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ kesintin yɛgɛ ii nyita asa mʋ nɩɩ bee buu kanɩn kɩkaapʋ mʋ. Kɛ ba kina Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɔlɩgɛ bamʋ, kɛ bamʋ kinyita mʋ ki bwii ba bamʋ sʋ opula tɔ.
61002002	Lɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, akɔɔlɛ‐gyipu mʋ gaalaagaa bee biti ba buu bamʋ kɩbaabʋtɔ gyaga nɩmʋ sʋ. Lɩɩ bamʋ kɩbaabʋtɔ gyaga maŋa sʋ mʋ, asa mʋ nɩɩ ba man kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ bee biti ba tɔwɛ asɩn libi gyaga kesintin ɔkpa mʋ sʋ.
61002003	Lɩɩ kensi payɩ libi atɩntɩnsa akaapʋpʋ nɩmʋ bee biti ba taa kanyaasɩn ɔkpa sʋ pɩna fanɛ biti afulee. Amaa bamʋ ɔtalɛpʋ wʋla waa siriya lɩɩ koo dɩdaa o gyoo bamʋ. Nɩɩ ba mɛɛ taalɛ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ bamʋ onyitapu mʋ abaa tɔ.
61002004	Fɛɛ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ maa man yɛgɛ nbɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba waa alibi mʋ kʋsʋ kɩbɩɩtɛ, amaa nɩɩ ɔ taa bamʋ tʋʋ waa awʋrʋfɔ kamandɛ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ o ŋmina bamʋ waa kitentenbiri ɔbɔ bunkyinsa tɔ, ba dɛ ba gyoo Kakɛ talɛsa lala mʋ.
61002005	Fɛɛ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ maa man yɛgɛ dɩdaa abi mʋ nɩɩ ba waa alibi mʋ kʋsʋ kɩbɩɩtɛ, amaa nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ nkyu n bɔla gyii kasɛ yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man nu Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ. Asa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɔlɩgɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ Nowa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ ɩkpa kyiigisa mʋ asɩn, yɛ asa asunɔ akʋ.
61002006	Fɛɛ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ maa man yɛgɛ alibi awaapʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Sodom yɛ Gomora ndɛ lala mʋ tɔ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ, amaa ɔ yɛgɛ fʋlɔn dɛɛ bamʋ biliŋi ndaara, kɛ ɩ waa sɩnkaala sa kamaa tɔ alibi awaapʋ.
61002007	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ mɔlɩgɛ Loti mʋ nɩɩ mʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi, nɩɩ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ ki nyita mʋ lɩɩ asa mʋ kɩbaabʋtɔ gyaga yɛ kumu tɔ ɔlʋn mʋ sʋ.
61002008	(Nɩɩ Loti gyɛ nyɩmɩsa danbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ alibi awaapʋ mʋ tɔ kakɛ kʋmaa ee wu yɛgɛ ee nu asɩn libi mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa, nɩɩ ɩ yɛgɛ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ ki nyita mʋ nɩɩ mʋ kala sɩlɛ mʋ asɛ.)
61002009	Ɩnɩmʋ kpini ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nyi kanan mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ mɔlɩgɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ bee nu mʋ asɛ lɩɩ bamʋ kʋtʋʋ tɔ kɩɩ tɔ, kɛ ɔ yɛgɛ alibi awaapʋ mʋ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ yɩla naa fʋʋ Kakɛ talɛsa mʋ akɛ.
61002010	Fɔnfɔn bamʋ nɩɩ ba taa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sa kɩgyagaa abɛɛ kɔkɔlɔ biti nɩɩ ba man taa Ɩbwaarɛ ɔlʋn tɩɩ sɛhn mʋ. Falɛ atɩntɩnsa akaapʋpʋ banɩmʋ ba man sʋ kufuu, nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ tɔ bɛɛ saalɛ bamʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa bamʋ bʋnyaa mʋ.
61002011	Nɩɩ halɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ ɔlʋn gaa ba kyɔ atɩntɩnsa akaapʋpʋ anɩmʋ gbaa ba mɛɛ pwɩɩ bʋnyaa wuya ana mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ.
61002012	Amaa falɛ atɩntɩnsa akaapʋpʋ anɩmʋ awaasa a du nɩn fɛɛ atɔbwaaya kpensa mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ bamʋ fɛɛ asa ba kɩtaa kɛ ba mɔɔ. Ba sʋ asebi bɛɛ sa kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ be mee nu kasɛ. Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ mɔɔ bamʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ asa bɛɛ mɔɔ atɔbwaaya kpensa mʋ.
61002013	Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ taa bamʋ alibi bwii ka bamʋ akɔ. Bamʋ asɛ mʋ kɩlandɛ sʋ alibi kɩwaa ɩ gyɛ bamʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kensi‐gyii. Halɩɩ ba maa san ba bʋ bamʋ npɩna yɛ kɩgyagaa kigyii ɩkpa sʋ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ ipeeli yɛ ŋaabaa sa bamʋ fɛɛ ba maa ba tii fanɛ sʋ bee gyii mʋ.
61002014	Nɩɩ be mee wu ɔkyɩɩ bɛɛ kyʋn, nɩɩ kɩbʋrʋkɔɔnɛ kɩwaa ii gyii bamʋ ansi. Bɛ yɛgɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii kɩ man bʋlʋn mʋ bɛɛ waa alibi. Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bɔla bamʋ nkɔlɔ tɔ ɩ gyɛ kensi payɩ libi. Ɩnɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ bɩɩtɛ bamʋ asʋ.
61002015	Nɩɩ ba yɛgɛ ɔkpa kyiigisa mʋ, nɩɩ ba fɔyɩ naa taa Bewo mu‐bii Balaam ɔkpa sʋ. Balaam kyɩna ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ, nɩɩ mu kebiti ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ ɔ nyɛ afulee lɩɩ alibi kɩwaa tɔ.
61002016	Amaa mu kuruma mʋ gya mʋ. Mu kuruma mʋ tɔwɛ mʋ asɛ fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa, nɩɩ i tii Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ Balaam abʋnpʋ‐sɩn mʋ ɔkpa.
61002017	Falɛ atɩntɩnsa akaapʋpʋ anɩmʋ ba du nɩn fɛɛ atiribo mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ nkyu yɛ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ afuu a sʋ ɩmʋ a naa. Bamʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɔŋɔ kitentenbiri ɔbɔ bunkyinsa yɩla.
61002018	Ba sʋ alala‐sɩn ntɔwɛ mʋ nɩɩ sɛhn man bʋ ɩmʋ tɔ bɛɛ kaapʋ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ. Nɩɩ ba sʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ kɩgyagaa bɛɛ tʋʋ bamʋ tɔ bɛɛ kɩɩ, kɛ ba nyɛ waa alibi mʋ nɩɩ ba daa kyɩna bɛɛ waa nɩɩ ba sɩlɛ lɩɩ ɩmʋ tɔ mʋ.
61002019	Atɩntɩnsa akaapʋpʋ mʋ ba da bamʋ nkɔlɔ sʋ sa asa mʋ yɛ bee biti ba yɛgɛ ba nyɛ bamʋ n‐yɩɩ, yɛgɛ bamʋ gbaa‐gbaa bamʋ ba gyɛ anyɛ sa bamʋ asun libi. Lɩɩ fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa gyɛ kɩnyɛ sa kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ i gyii mu kumu.
61002020	Fɛɛ ba maa ba bɩɩ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ yɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ Yesu Krisito, nɩɩ ba yɛgɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa ɛɛ waa alibi kɩwaa dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ba kan bɩla bwii naa loo ɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, ɩɩ nyɛ bamʋ sʋ ɔlʋn ɩ kyɔ kakyɩna dɩdaa mʋ nɩɩ ba daa ba bʋ kɩmʋ tɔ mʋ.
61002021	Naafɔɔ ii biti ɩ baa ɩ bʋrɔn sa bamʋ gaa fɛɛ ba maa man bɩɩ ɔkpa kyiigisa mʋ, ɩ kyɔ fɛɛ ba maa bɩɩ kɩmʋ, nɩɩ ba bɩla bwii kamaa lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nbara kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba taa sa bamʋ mʋ sʋ.
61002022	Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ ba kanɩn sa bamʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ aŋasan mʋ ɩ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Gyoonɔ bwii naa taa mʋ ɩkpalagɛ gyii” nɩɩ “Kuuri mʋ nɩɩ ba gyee mʋ mʋ, bwii naa dɛ biliŋi kɩdɩpɔɔ tɔ” mʋ, ɩ gyɛ kesintin.
61003001	Mi‐nyi mu‐bii ana Krisito tɔ, ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mɛ Pita ɔwʋlɛ nyɔsapʋ mʋ nɩɩ n kyʋrɔɔ n sʋ n sa fanɛ. Nɩɩ mɛ ɩwʋlɛ mʋ kpini tɔ mʋ, n sʋ n nyiŋi fanɛ n da fanɛ n kyiŋi lɩɩ falɛ atɔ kpini sʋ.
61003002	N biti fɛɛ fan nyiŋi asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ba tɔwɛ yɩla lɩɩ koo dɩdaa, yɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ yɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ mʋ kɔnɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa bɔla asunpu mʋ sʋ sa fanɛ mʋ.
61003003	Ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyankpaa ɩmʋ kpini tɔ mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, fan baa fan nyi fɛɛ nkɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ aŋmasɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba buu bamʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kebiti mʋ bee biti ba ba ŋmasɛ fanɛ.
61003004	Bee biti ba taasɛ yɛ, “Yɛ fan tɔwɛ yɛ ee biti o bwii ba, ɔ bʋ fɩnɛ? Lɩɩ koo saŋa mʋ nɩɩ anɛ naana ana ba wu mʋ, atɔ kpini ɩ dan san i du nɩn fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ i du lɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tʋʋ dulinyaa mʋ.”
61003005	Amaa ba kɩɩ ansi nɩn kina kesintin maŋa lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɔnɔ tɔ asɩn sʋ nɩɩ sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ ba, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛgɛ kasɛ lɩɩ nkyu tɔ, nɩɩ nkyu sʋ nɩɩ ɔ bɔla waa kasɛ.
61003006	Nɩɩ kanɩn nkyu kʋlʋn maŋa nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa muuri nyita dɩdaa dulinyaa mʋ.
61003007	Amaa kanɩn Ɩbwaarɛ kɔnɔ tɔ asɩn kʋlʋn maŋa nɩɩ ɔ taa kʋʋla nbɩɩnbɩɩ sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ yɩla, nɩɩ ɩ dɛ i gyoo fʋlɔn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ dɛɛla sa Kakɛ talɛsa ɔ taa nyita asa mʋ nɩɩ be mee nu mʋ asɛ mʋ.
61003008	Amaa mi‐nyi mu‐bii ana Krisito tɔ, fan man tan kʋtɔ kʋlʋn nɩmʋ sʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ bɩrɛ, kakɛ kʋlʋn gyɛ mʋ asɛ fɛɛ nsu kagbɩn, nɩɩ nsu kagbɩn mɔɔ gyɛ mʋ asɛ fɛɛ kakɛ kʋlʋn.
61003009	Nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ man sʋ mʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɔ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ tɔwɛ yɩla mʋ ɛɛ kpɩɩ kasɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ akʋ bɛ fɛ ɩmʋ nfɛɛrɛ mʋ. Amaa ɔ sʋ kenyiita sa fanɛ, nɩɩ ee biti fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɔ kyɛɛgɛ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ mu alibi tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ o mee biti ɔkʋ maa nyita.
61003010	Amaa Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu Krisito ii biti ɔ ba mʋ ii biti i purigi asa fɛɛ oyu maa ba mʋ. Kɛ sʋsʋ ɔ nyaa yɛ ɔlanba, kɛ fʋlɔn ɔ dɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ sʋsʋ kpini, kɛ kasɛ yɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ kɩmʋ sʋ mʋ ɩ ba ɩ dɛ kɩkpan yɛgɛ sɛhn man bʋ kɩmʋ sʋ.
61003011	Nɩɩ falɛ ɔkpa nɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ atɔ kpini ii biti i nyita mʋ, nɛnɛ asa nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fan bɩla fan du? Ɩ dagaa fan kyɩna kakyɩna kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ yɛ kabwaarɛ‐sun tɔ.
61003012	Lɩɩ fɛɛ fan maa kɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩba mʋ ɔkpa yɛ kɩ ba bilen falɛ. Kanɩn kakɛ maŋa nɩɩ fʋlɔn ii biti o nyita sʋsʋ atɔ, kɛ fʋlɔn mʋ awulawula ɩ ŋalɩgɛ kanɩn atɔ maŋa.
61003013	Amaa fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ yɩlɛ tɔ mʋ an kɩɩ sʋsʋ pʋpwɛ yɛ kasɛ pʋpwɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ ɔkpa.
61003014	Ɩmʋ sʋ mi‐nyi mu‐bii ana Krisito tɔ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan kɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ɔkpa mʋ, fan kpan fanɛ n‐yɩɩ kɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ man pwɩɩ abɛɛ o wu alibi akʋ fanɛ tɔ, kɛ keyuula kɩ baa kɩ bʋ faa naa mʋ asɛ.
61003015	Fan baa fan nyi fɛɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kenyiita mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sa fanɛ kɛ fan nyɛ kamɔlɩgɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ anɛ bɩrɩsa ɔkɔɔlɛ‐gyipu Pɔɔlɩ kyʋrɔɔ sa fanɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa mʋ kanyaasɩn mʋ.
61003016	Nɩɩ ɔkpa kʋlʋn maŋa sʋ nɩɩ Pɔɔlɩ kyʋrɔɔ waa mʋ ɩwʋlɛ kpini tɔ, ɩɩ tɔwɛ asɩn kʋlʋn maŋa. Asɩn akʋ ɩ bʋ mʋ ɩwʋlɛ mʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɛɛ bʋlʋn sa kasɛ kunu. Nɩɩ ɛɛ yɛgɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man nyi abwaarɛsɩn yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man yɩlɛ kɩyaa kʋlʋn sʋ bee biliŋaa Pɔɔlɩ asɩn mʋ, nɩɩ kanɩn nɩɩ bee biliŋaa Ɩbwaarɛ Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ gbaa. Nɩɩ bɛɛ waa kanɩn mʋ, bee biti kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ ba sa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ.
61003017	Ɩmʋ sʋ mi‐nyi mu‐bii ana Krisito tɔ, fan maa wʋla fan nyi falɛ sʋ mʋ, fan baa fan da sʋ, kɛ fan man yɛgɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man buu Ɩbwaarɛ nbara mʋ ba pɩna fanɛ kɛ fan lɩɩ tɩyɛ lɩɩ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ tɔ.
61003018	Amaa fan kyaga sʋ fen dan anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ yɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ Yesu Krisito kabwaala mʋ tɔ kɛ fan bɩɩ mʋ danbɩrasa. Mʋ nɩɩ bʋnyaa gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ ndaga yɛ saŋa kʋmaa nɩmʋ. Amen!
62001001	An kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ lɩɩ Yesu Krisito mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla ɔ bʋ tɔ lɩɩ npiili asɛ mʋ asɩn, an sa fanɛ. An nu mʋ asɩn tɔwɛsa, nɩɩ an wu mʋ, nɩɩ an taa anɛ ansi kɩɩ mʋ, nɩɩ an taa anɛ abaa mata mʋ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sa nkpa mʋ.
62001002	Yesu mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ nkpa mʋ, lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ ifuli nɩɩ an wu mʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ an gyii ɩmʋ kesintin, nɩɩ an tɔwɛ fanɛ lɩɩ nkpa kakpaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla ɔ bʋ Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ asɛ, nɩɩ ɔ ba lɛɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ ifuli kaapʋ anɛ.
62001003	Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ anɛ ansi i wu nɩɩ an taa anɛ asʋ nu mʋ, ɩmʋ kibonbon nɩɩ an da an sa fanɛ, kɛ fan ba tii anɛ sʋ lɩɩ kɩkyɛmɩnɛ ɔkɔn mʋ nɩɩ an sʋ anaa Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ Mu‐Bii Yesu Krisito mʋ sʋ.
62001004	An kyʋrɔɔ ɩnɩmʋ an sa fanɛ nɩn, kɛ anɛ ansi i gyii gaa.
62001005	Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ an nu lɩɩ Yesu asɛ mʋ, ɩmʋ nɩɩ an sʋ an tɔwɛ fanɛ falɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ gyɛ fɩtɩla nɩɩ kitentenbiri kɩ man bʋ mʋ tɔ kpini‐kpini.
62001006	Nɩɩ an kan tɔwɛ yɛ anaa mʋ an sʋ kɩkyɛmɩnɛ ɔkɔn, yɛgɛ an san an naa kitentenbiri tɔ bɩrɛ, an pɩna nɩn lɩɩ anɛ atɔwɛsa yɛ anɛ awaasa sʋ.
62001007	Amaa nɩɩ an kan an naa fɩtɩla mʋ tɔ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ fɩtɩla mʋ tɔ bɩrɛ, ɩmɛɛ ɩmʋ an sʋ kɩkyɛmɩnɛ ɔkɔn yɛ abaa, kɛ Mu‐Bii Yesu Krisito nkalan mʋ ɛɛ fwɩɩ anɛ lɩɩ alibi kʋmaa nɩmʋ tɔ.
62001008	Nɩɩ an kan tɔwɛ yɛ a man sʋ alibi bɩrɛ, an pɩna anɛ n‐yɩɩ nɩn, nɩɩ kesintin kɩ man bʋ anɛ tɔ.
62001009	Nɩɩ an kan lɛɛ anɛ alibi tɔwɛ Ɩbwaarɛ bɩrɛ, ee biti ɔ taa anɛ alibi kɛɛ anɛ kɛ ɔ lɔŋɔ anɛ lɩɩ ɩkpa libi kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ sʋ kesintin, nɩɩ mʋ asɩn ii du kyɛɛkyɛɛ.
62001010	Nɩɩ an kan tɔwɛ yɛ an man waa alibi mʋ, ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ an tɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɩŋɛsa wuya, nɩɩ mʋ asɩn ɩ man bʋ anɛ tɔ.
62002001	Mi‐bii ana danbɩrasa, n kyʋrɔɔ ɩnɩmʋ n sa fanɛ kɛ fan man nyɛ waa alibi. Amaa nɩɩ anɛ tɔ ɔkʋ kan waa alibi mʋ, an sʋ ɔmaatapʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kʋlɛ Ɔsɛ mʋ ɛɛ sa anɛ. Nɩɩ mʋ ɩ gyɛ Yesu Krisito, nɩɩ mʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi.
62002002	Mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ waa kɔlɔŋɔ ka anɛ alibi kʋkɔ, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ anɛ nkʋn alibi, amaa ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ dulinyaa tɔ kpini.
62002003	Nɩɩ an kan buu Ɩbwaarɛ nbara mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sa anɛ mʋ, ɩmʋ ɩ yɛgɛ a taalɛ da anɛ nkɔlɔ sʋ fɛɛ an nyi mʋ.
62002004	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan tɔwɛ yɛ, “N nyi mʋ,” yɛgɛ ɔ man buu mʋ nbara mʋ, ɔ gyɛ antɩŋɛsa wuya, nɩɩ kesintin kɩ man bʋ mʋ tɔ.
62002005	Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o buu mʋ asɩn tɔwɛsa mʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti Ɩbwaarɛ kesintin tɔ kyɛɛkyɛɛ. Ɩnɩmʋ falɛ ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ an bɩɩ fɛɛ an bʋ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ.
62002006	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nyɩmɩsa mʋ, dagaa maa kyɩna fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Yesu kyɩna mʋ.
62002007	Mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana danbɩrasa, man gyɛ nbara pʋpwɛ nɩɩ n kyʋrɔɔ n sʋ n bɩya fanɛ, amaa ɩ gyɛ nbara dɩdaa mʋ nɩɩ fan wʋla nyɛ lɩɩ npiili asɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ fan kɔlɛ gyii mʋ. Nbara dɩdaa nɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fan wʋla nu mʋ.
62002008	Amaa ɔkpa kʋ sʋ mʋ, nbara mʋ nɩɩ n kyʋrɔɔ n sa fanɛ falɛ bɩrɛ gyɛ kɩpʋpwɛ nɩn, nɩɩ fanaa Krisito fan lɛɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ ɩ gyɛ nbara pʋpwɛ kesintin. Lɩɩ fɛɛ kitentenbiri mʋ kɩ tɛɛ kɩɩ kyʋn, nɩɩ kesintin fɩtɩla mʋ tɛɛ wʋla kɩɩ ŋalɩgɛ tɔ.
62002009	Nɩɩ ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, ɔ bʋ fɩtɩla tɔ, yɛgɛ ee kisi mʋ tɔmaa Krisito osunpu bɩrɛ, ɔ san ɔ bʋ kitentenbiri tɔ, ba fʋʋ halɩɩ saŋa nɩmʋ.
62002010	Nɩɩ ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti mʋ tɔmaa Krisito osunpu mʋ bʋ fɩtɩla mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ sɛhn man bʋ mʋ tɔ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ o siti tɩyɛ alibi tɔ.
62002011	Amaa ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee kisi mʋ tɔmaa Krisito osunpu mʋ bʋ kitentenbiri tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ naa kitentenbiri tɔ yɛgɛ o mee nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ee kpee, lɩɩ fɛɛ kitentenbiri mʋ kɩ waa mʋ gyaatanapʋ.
62002012	Mi‐bii ana danbɩrasa, n kyʋrɔɔ ɩnɩmʋ n sʋ n sa fanɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ taa fanɛ alibi kɛɛ fanɛ lɩɩ Yesu sʋ.
62002013	Asɛ ana, n kyʋrɔɔ ɩnɩmʋ n sa fanɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan wʋla fan nyi Yesu Krisito mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla ɔ bʋ tɔ lɩɩ npiili asɛ mʋ. Ayaafɔlɛ, n kyʋrɔɔ ɩnɩmʋ n sa fanɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan taalɛ gyii Sɩtaanɛ alibi wuya mʋ sʋ. Nbii, n kyʋrɔɔ n sa fanɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan bɩɩ Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ.
62002014	Asɛ ana, n kyʋrɔɔ ɩnɩmʋ n sa fanɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan wʋla fan nyi Yesu Krisito mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla ɔ bʋ tɔ lɩɩ npiili asɛ mʋ. Ayaafɔlɛ, n kyʋrɔɔ ɩnɩmʋ n sa fanɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ fan bʋlʋn nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ a bʋ fanɛ tɔ nɩɩ fan gyii Sɩtaanɛ alibi wuya mʋ sʋ.
62002015	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan man biti dulinyaa abɛɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ a bʋ dulinyaa tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ee biti dulinyaa mʋ, ɔ man sʋ kebiti sa Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ.
62002016	Kanɩn sʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ dulinyaa tɔ fɛɛ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kɔkɔlɔ biti, atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ansi i wu nɩɩ ɛɛ yalaga, yɛ n‐yɩɩ kɩkaapʋ lɩɩ kasɛ sʋ atɔ. Ɩnɩmʋ kpini ɩ man lɩɩ Ɔsɛ mʋ asɛ amaa ɩ lɩɩ dulinyaa tɔ nɩn.
62002017	Dulinya yɛ kɩmaa kɩmʋ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ i gyii asa amu kpini ii biti ɛɛ kyʋn, amaa ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa Ɩbwaarɛ kɔkɔlɔ biti bɩrɛ ee biti ɔ kyɩna kakpaa.
62002018	Mi‐bii ana, anɛ dulinyaa tɔ kakyɩna laalaalʋwɛ mʋ kɩ fʋʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan wʋla nu yɛ Krisito okisipu mʋ ii biti ɔ ba mʋ. Halɩɩ nbɩɩnbɩɩ gbaa Krisito akisipu gaalaagaa ba tɛɛ ba. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ an bɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa mʋ laalaalʋwɛ ndee.
62002019	Krisito akisipu banɩmʋ ba lɩɩ anɛ tɔ kyʋn, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba man gyɛ anɛ asa gbaa‐gbaa. Nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ ba daa ba gyɛ anɛ asa mʋ, naafɔɔ ba san ba bʋ anɛ tɔ. Amaa ba lɩɩ anɛ tɔ nɩn kɛ ɩ nyɛ lɛɛ kaapʋ fɛɛ bamʋ ɔkʋ man tii anɛ sʋ.
62002020	Amaa fanɛɛ fanɛ bɩrɛ Krisito sa fanɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ, nɩɩ fanɛ kpini fan nyi Ɩbwaarɛ kesintin asɩn mʋ.
62002021	Man gyɛ yɛ fan maa man nyi kesintin mʋ sʋ nɩɩ n kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ n sa fanɛ, amaa fan nyi kɩmʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ antɩŋɛsa akʋ a man bʋ kesintin mʋ tɔ.
62002022	Anɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ antɩŋɛsa wuya mʋ? Mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee kina yɛ Yesu man gyɛ Krisito (abɛɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ) mʋ. Kanɩn nyɩmɩsa maŋa ɩ gyɛ Krisito okisipu, nɩɩ mʋ ii kina Ɔsɛ yɛ Obii mʋ.
62002023	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee kina Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii mʋ, ee kina Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ gbaa, amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii mʋ gyii mʋ, ɛɛ kɔɔlɛ Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ gbaa ee gyii.
62002024	Kanɩn sʋ fan yɛgɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fan wʋla nu lɩɩ npiili asɛ mʋ ɩ kyɩna fanɛ tɔ. Nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ tɛ fanɛ tɔ mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ fanɛ gbaa fanɛ fɛn bʋ Ɔsɛ yɛ Obii mʋ tɔ.
62002025	Nɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu da mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ fɛɛ ee biti ɔ sa anɛ ɩ gyɛ nkpa kakpaa mʋ.
62002026	N kyʋrɔɔ ɩnɩmʋ n sʋ n sa fanɛ lɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba pɩna fanɛ mʋ sʋ.
62002027	Amaa fanɛɛ fanɛ bɩrɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan nyɛ lɩɩ Krisito asɛ mʋ kɩ bʋ fanɛ tɔ, nɩɩ ɩ man tiri fɛɛ ɔkʋ ɔ bɩla ba kaapʋ fanɛ. Kanɩn Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan nyɛ mʋ ɩɩ kaapʋ fanɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa, nɩɩ kanɩn kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ kaapʋ fanɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ kesintin, nɩɩ npɩna man bʋ kɩmʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kaapʋ fanɛ mʋ, fanaa Krisito fan kyɩna kanɩn.
62002028	Kanɩn sʋ mi‐bii ana, fanaa Krisito fan kyɩna. Kɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti o bwii ba mʋ, kɛ a taalɛ yɩlɛ tɔ, yɛgɛ a man sʋ ipeeli mu ansi tɔ.
62002029	Kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan nyi fɛɛ mʋ ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ, fan bɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa atɔ kyiigisa mʋ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii.
62003001	Fan kɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ kebiti lala sa anɛ, fɛɛ ba tɩɩ anɛ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii ana. Nɩɩ kanɩn nɩɩ an gyɛ falɛ. Kanɩn sʋ nɩɩ dulinyaa tɔ abi ba man nyi anɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba man nyi Ɩbwaarɛ.
62003002	Mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana danbɩrasa, nbɩɩnbɩɩ an gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii ana nɩn. Nɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ an biti an baa an gyɛ mʋ ɩ man pɩɩta lɩɩ ifuli. Amaa an nyi fɛɛ nɩɩ ɔ kan ba lɩɩ ofuli mʋ, an biti an baa an du fɛɛ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ an biti an wu mʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ o du mʋ.
62003003	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ falɛ tamaa fɛɛ ee biti o wu Yesu mʋ, ɛɛ waa mʋ n‐yɩɩ kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Yesu du kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ.
62003004	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa alibi mʋ, o mee man buu nbara mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ alibi kɩwaa ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ ɔkʋ maa mee buu nbara mʋ.
62003005	Amaa fan nyi fɛɛ ɔ ba nɩn yɛ ɔ ba lɛɛ anɛ alibi lɩɩ anɛ sʋ, nɩɩ mʋ tɔ nɩɩ alibi akʋ ɩ man bʋ.
62003006	Ɔkʋ man bʋ Yesu tɔ nɩɩ ɛɛ kyaga sʋ ɛɛ waa alibi, nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan kyaga sʋ ɛɛ waa alibi mʋ, ɔ man pɩɩta wu mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ man nyi mʋ.
62003007	Mi‐bii ana danbɩrasa, fan man yɛgɛ ɔkʋ ɔ pɩna fanɛ. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ dɛ ɔkpa mʋ, ɔ gyɛ ɔkpa kyiigisa wuya, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Krisito ɩkpa i kyiigi mʋ.
62003008	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa alibi mʋ, gyɛ Sɩtaanɛ lɛɛ nɩn. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Sɩtaanɛ wʋla ɛɛ waa alibi lɩɩ koo npiili asɛ. Kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ ba mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, ɔ baa o be nyita Sɩtaanɛ kusun nɩn.
62003009	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ waa mʋ Mu‐Bii mʋ, mɛɛ kyaga sʋ ɛɛ waa alibi, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ awaasa ɩ bʋ mʋ tɔ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ kyaga sʋ ɛɛ waa alibi, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ taa mʋ waa Mu‐bii.
62003010	Falɛ nɩɩ an sʋ an bɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐bii ana yɛ Sɩtaanɛ mu‐bii ana. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ mʋ ɩkpa ɩ man kyiigi abɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o mee biti mʋ tɔɔmaa mʋ, ɔ man gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐bii.
62003011	Asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fan nu lɩɩ npiili asɛ mʋ, ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ a biti abaa.
62003012	A man waa fɛɛ Ken mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Sɩtaanɛ lɛɛ nɩɩ ɔ mɔɔ mu‐supu mʋ. Mɩnɛ ɩ waa sʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɔɔ mu‐supu? Lɩɩ fɛɛ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ awaasa ɩ gyɛ alibi, nɩɩ mu‐supu ɩkpa i kyiigi.
62003013	Mɛ bɩrɩsa ana, nɩɩ dulinyaa asa ba kan bee kisi fanɛ mʋ, fan man yɛgɛ i kyinkyin fanɛ.
62003014	An nyi fɛɛ an lɩɩ lewu tɔ ba nkpa tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ an biti anɛ tɔɔmaa ana. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o mee biti mʋ bɩrɩsa mʋ, ɔ san ɔ bʋ lewu tɔ.
62003015	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee kisi mʋ bɩrɩsa mʋ gyɛ ɔmɔɔpʋ nɩn, nɩɩ fan nyi yɛ amɔɔpʋ maa man sʋ nkpa kakpaa.
62003016	Lewu mʋ nɩɩ Krisito wu sa anɛ mʋ kaapʋ anɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti ki du. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ a maa wu sa anɛ bɩrɩsa ana.
62003017	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ɔ sʋ atɔ gaa nɩɩ o wu fɛɛ i tiri mʋ tɔɔmaa, amaa nɩɩ ɔ man wu mʋ kʋwɛɛ mʋ, mɩnɛ ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ ɔ sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti mʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ?
62003018	Mi‐bii ana danbɩrasa, an man taa ntɔwɛ abɛɛ kɔnɔ tɔ kɩyan biti abaa, amaa a taa anɛ awaasa kaapʋ fɛɛ an biti abaa kesintin tɔ.
62003019	Ɩmʋ nɩɩ an biti a bɩɩ fɛɛ an buu kesintin ɔkpa mʋ sʋ. Ɩmʋ ii biti ɩ yɛgɛ kɛ a taalɛ taa kɔkɔlɔ fuuli a yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ.
62003020	Nɩɩ anɛ nkɔlɔ ɩ kan bun anɛ kʋpwɛ mʋ, an nyi fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ kyɔ anɛ nkɔlɔ, nɩɩ o nyi anɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ ɔ kyɔ anɛ gbaa‐gbaa, nɩɩ mʋ i nyi kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ.
62003021	Mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana danbɩrasa, nɩɩ anɛ nkɔlɔ ɩ man kan bun anɛ kʋpwɛ mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ an taalɛ yɩlɛ tɔ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ.
62003022	Kɛ a nyɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ an taasɛ mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ an buu mʋ nbara, nɩɩ an waa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ bɔla mu ansi.
62003023	Nɩɩ ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ mʋ nbara mʋ, fɛɛ a kɔɔlɛ Mu‐Bii Yesu Krisito kɩtɩɩ mʋ gyii, kɛ a biti abaa fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sa anɛ kɔnɔ mʋ.
62003024	Bamʋ nɩɩ bee nu mʋ nbara mʋ, ba maa Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ sʋ kɔnɔ kʋlʋn, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ bʋ bamʋ nkɔlɔ tɔ. Mʋ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa sa anɛ mʋ ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ, ɔ bʋ anɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ.
62004001	Mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana, fan man kɔɔlɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ yɛ ɔ sʋ Kayaayu mʋ gyii, amaa fan tʋʋ n‐yaayu mʋ tɔ kɩɩ fɛɛ ba lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ nɩn, abɛɛ ba man lɩɩ mʋ asɛ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ antɩŋɛsa atɔwɛpʋ gaalaagaa ba ba dulinyaa tɔ katɩn kʋmaa.
62004002	Falɛ nɩɩ fen biti fan bɩɩ kayaayu mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ. Kayaayu kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ tɔwɛ yɛ Yesu Krisito ba biliŋi nyɩmɩsa ba dulinyaa tɔ mʋ, kɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ.
62004003	Amaa kayaayu kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ kii kina yɛ Yesu Krisito man ba biliŋi nyɩmɩsa mʋ, kɩ man lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ. Kanɩn kayaayu nɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Krisito okisipu mʋ nɩɩ fan nu yɛ ɛɛ ba mʋ, nɩɩ halɩɩ ɔ tɛɛ wʋla ɔ bʋ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ gbaa.
62004004	Amaa fanɛ, mi‐bii ana bɩrɛ fan gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asa, nɩɩ fan tee gyii bamʋ sʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ fanɛ tɔ mʋ, kyɔ Sɩtaanɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ mʋ
62004005	Nɩɩ kanɩn asa maŋa ba gyɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ lɛɛ nɩn, ɩmʋ sʋ bɛɛ tɔwɛ ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ dulinyaa tɔ asɩn mʋ nɩn, kanɩn sʋ dulinyaa asa bee nu bamʋ asɛ.
62004006	Anɛɛnɛ bɩrɛ, an gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asa nɩn, nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o nyi Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, ee nu anɛ asɛ. Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nyɩmɩsa mʋ, o mee nu anɛ asɛ. Ɩmʋ sʋ falɛ asɩn nɩmʋ nɩɩ an sʋ an bɩɩ kesintin Kayaayu yɛ antɩŋɛsa kayaayu.
62004007	Mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana danbɩrasa, fan yɛgɛ a biti abaa, kpalɩ fɛɛ kebiti kɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ nɩn. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti mʋ, ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐bii, nɩɩ o nyi Ɩbwaarɛ.
62004008	Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ kebiti bɩrɛ, ɔ man nyi Ɩbwaarɛ kpini‐kpini, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ gyɛ obitipu.
62004009	Falɛ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mu kebiti mʋ kaapʋ anɛ tɔ, fɛɛ maa sun Mu‐Bii kʋlʋn kpen ba dulinyaa tɔ, kɛ a ba bɔla mʋ sʋ nyɛ nkpa.
62004010	Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ kebiti mʋ, man gyɛ anɛ ii biti Ɩbwaarɛ, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ bɩrɛ ɩ sʋ kebiti sa anɛ, nɩɩ o sun Mu‐Bii kʋlʋn yɛ, ɔ ba taa mʋ n‐yɩɩ waa ɩmata saraga sa anɛ alibi.
62004011	Mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana, fan kɩɩ kebiti lala mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ sa anɛ, kanɩn sʋ ɩ dagaa anɛ gbaa a maa biti abaa.
62004012	Ɔkʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔkʋ man pɩɩ wu Ɩbwaarɛ, amaa nɩɩ an kan an biti abaa bɩrɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ bʋ anɛ tɔ, nɩɩ mu kebiti mʋ kɩ bʋ anɛ asɛ kyɛɛkyɛɛ.
62004013	Ɩbwaarɛ maa sa anɛ mʋ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ sʋ, nɩɩ an nyi fɛɛ an bʋ mʋ tɔ nɩɩ ngbaa mʋ bʋ anɛ tɔ.
62004014	Nɩɩ an wu yɛ anɛ ansi, nɩɩ ana gyii ɩmʋ kesintin fɛɛ Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ sun Mu‐Bii Yesu Krisito yɛ ɔ ba waa dulinyaa tɔ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ.
62004015	Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kan bɩɩ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, Yesu ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐bii mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ bʋ mʋ tɔ nɩɩ ngbaa mʋ bʋ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔ.
62004016	Nɩɩ anɛ bɩrɛ an nyi Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ sa anɛ, nɩɩ an taa anɛ n‐yɩɩ tʋʋ kɩmʋ sʋ mʋ. Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ gyɛ kebiti. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti mʋ, ɔ bʋ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ gbaa bʋ mʋ tɔ.
62004017	Nɩɩ ɔkpa nɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ kebiti kɩ lɛɛ kaapʋ anɛ tɔ kyɛɛkyɛɛ, nɩɩ ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ an sʋ tamaa fɛɛ kakɛ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ ba talɛ asa mʋ, an taalɛ yɩlɛ tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ mʋ an du fɛɛ mʋ.
62004018	Kufuu kɩ man bʋ kebiti tɔ, amaa kebiti mʋ nɩɩ ki du kyɛɛkyɛɛ, kɩɩ gya kufuu kɩɩ lɩɩ tɔ, lɩɩ fɛɛ kufuu maa kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ ɛɛ naa, amaa ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kufuu mʋ man du kyɛɛkyɛɛ kebiti mʋ tɔ.
62004019	An sʋ kebiti sa Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ asa, lɩɩ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ gyankpaa ee biti anɛ.
62004020	Nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan tɔwɛ yɛ, ee biti Ɩbwaarɛ yɛgɛ ee kisi mʋ tɔɔmaa bɩrɛ, ɔ gyɛ antɩŋɛsa wuya. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ biti mʋ tɔɔmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee wu mʋ, ɔ mɛɛ taalɛ biti Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ o mee wu mʋ mʋ.
62004021	Nɩɩ nbara nɩmʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa sa anɛ yɛ, Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ, ɩ dagaa maa biti mʋ tɔɔmaa gbaa.
62005001	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ Yesu ɩ gyɛ Krisito (Ɔmʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ wʋla lɛɛ) mʋ, ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐bii nɩn. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa ɔsɛ mʋ, sʋ kebiti sa kebii mʋ gbaa.
62005002	Falɛ nɩɩ an bɩɩ fɛɛ an biti Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐bii ana, fɛɛ a maa biti Ɩbwaarɛ nɩɩ an buu mʋ nnɔsa mʋ sʋ.
62005003	Mʋ nnɔsa kibuu sʋ, ɩ gyɛ nyɩmɩsa maa biti Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ mʋ nnɔsa mʋ ɩ man bʋsɩn.
62005004	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐bii mʋ, i gyii dulinyaa sʋ. Lɩɩ anɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii nɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, an gyii dulinyaa sʋ.
62005005	Anɩmʋ i gyii dulinyaa sʋ? Amɔɔ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii Yesu gyii mʋ.
62005006	Yesu ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ ba, nɩɩ o gyee Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee nɩɩ ɔ kyɛɛgɛ mʋ nkalan wʋrɩgɛ, man gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee mʋ nkʋn sʋ nɩɩ ɔ ba, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ kekyugyee mʋ yɛ nkalan kɩkyɛɛgɛ wʋrɩgɛ mʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ Kayaayu mʋ ɩ lɛɛ kaapʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ Kayaayu mʋ gyɛ kesintin.
62005007	Ɩ sʋ atɔ asa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɛɛ Yesu keduli ɩɩ kaapʋ anɛ.
62005008	Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ, yɛ nkyu, yɛ nkalan. Falɛ atɔ asa anɩmʋ ɩɩ waa atɔ kʋlʋn
62005009	An kɔɔlɛ nyɩmɩsa asɩn tɔwɛsa an gyii, amaa Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ mʋ gyɛ kɩkparɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɩ gyɛ adansɛ mʋ nɩɩ o gyii lɩɩ Mu‐Bii mʋ sʋ.
62005010	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ Obii mʋ gyii mʋ, kɔɔlɛ asɩn nɩmʋ waa mʋ kɔkɔlɔ tɔ. Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gyii mʋ, kanɩn nyɩmɩsa maŋa kaapʋ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ gyɛ antɩŋɛsa wuya, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ man kɔɔlɛ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ lɩɩ Mu‐Bii mʋ sʋ mʋ gyii.
62005011	Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ asɩn mʋ yɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ sa anɛ nkpa kakpaa, nɩɩ kanɩn nkpa kakpaa nɩmʋ bʋ Mu‐Bii tɔ nɩn.
62005012	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ Obii mʋ gyii mʋ sʋ nkpa, amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ man kɔɔlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ gyii mʋ man sʋ nkpa kakpaa nɩmʋ.
62005013	N kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ sa fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan kɔɔlɛ Yesu gyii fɛɛ ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ, kɛ fan nyɛ bɩɩ fɛɛ fan sʋ nkpa kakpaa
62005014	Atɔ mʋ nɩɩ an nyi anɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ an bugi anɛ nkɔlɔ tɔ an sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ an kʋlɛ mʋ mʋ, ee nu anɛ asɛ
62005015	Nɩɩ an nyɛ nɩɩ an nyi fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ i nu kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ an kʋlɛ mʋ mʋ, kanɩn bɩrɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ an kʋlɛ mʋ mʋ, ɛɛ waa ɛɛ sa anɛ.
62005016	Nɩɩ fanɛ tɔ ɔkʋ kan wu fɛɛ mʋ bɩrɩsa ɩɩ waa alibi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ barɩgɛ maa Ɩbwaarɛ nsana kakpaa mʋ, ɔ kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ sa mʋ. Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ sa ɔsa mʋ nkpa. Alibi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ barɩgɛ nyɩmɩsa maa Ɩbwaarɛ nsana mʋ, asɩn nɩɩ n tɔwɛ. Amaa alibi akʋ ɩɩ bɩya lewu abɛɛ ɩɩ barɩgɛ nyɩmɩsa maa Ɩbwaarɛ nsana, maa gyɛ ɩmʋ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ nɩɩ n dɛ.
62005017	Asɩn kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man bʋrɔn sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ gyɛ alibi nɩn. Amaa alibi akʋ ɩɩ barɩgɛ nyɩmɩsa maa Ɩbwaarɛ nsana kakpaa nɩn.
62005018	An nyi fɛɛ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋgɛ mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔ mʋ, mɛɛ kyaga sʋ ɛɛ waa alibi. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Krisito mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋʋgɛ mʋ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔ mʋ ii kun kanɩn ɔsa mʋ, nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Sɩtaanɛ lɛɛ mʋ mɛɛ taalɛ waa mʋ alibi akʋ
62005019	An nyi fɛɛ an gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐bii ana, nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ dulinyaa nɩmʋ tɔ kpini ba bʋ alibi awaapʋ mʋ abaa tɔ.
62005020	Nɩɩ an bɩla an nyi fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Mu‐Bii mʋ ba kasɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ an nu kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ kasɛ, kɛ ɩ yɛgɛ a bɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kesintin mʋ. Anaa Ɩbwaarɛ kesintin wuya mʋ an waa kʋkʋlʋn, lɩɩ fɛɛ an waa kʋkʋlʋn maa Mu‐Bii Yesu Krisito mʋ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ Kesintin Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ nkpa kakpaa mʋ.
62005021	Mi‐bii ana, fan kɩtaa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ lɩɩ ɩdakpa mʋ sʋ.
63001001	Ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ ɩ lɩɩ mɛ, ɔbɩlɩsa asɛ. N kyʋrɔɔ naa sa kibite danbɩrasa maa mu‐bii ana, mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ kebiti kesintin tɔ n sa bamʋ. Nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ mɛ wʋlɛ nkʋn, amaa bʋga yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ be nyi kesintin mʋ kpini, ba sʋ kebiti sa faa fu‐bii ana.
63001002	Kpalɩ fɛɛ kesintin mʋ kɩ maa bʋ anɛ asɛ mʋ, kii biti ki sii anɛ asɛ kakpaa.
63001003	Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ maa Yesu Krisito, Ɔsɛ mʋ Mu‐Bii mʋ ba bwaala anɛ, kɛ ba wu anɛ kʋwɛɛ, kɛ ba sa anɛ kayɩɩ yuuli lɩɩ kesintin yɛ kebiti mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ anɛ tɔ mʋ sʋ.
63001004	Ɩ waa mɛ ɔkɔn gaa fɛɛ n maa wu fu‐bii ana mʋ tɔ akʋ ba maa naa kesintin ɔkpa sʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ sa anɛ nnɔsa mʋ.
63001005	Ɩmʋ sʋ kibite danbɩrasa, n tɔwɛ fʋ fɛɛ fan biti abaa. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ man gyɛ kɔnɔsa pʋpwɛ mʋ nɩɩ n kyʋrɔɔ n kyʋŋɛ n sa fanɛ, amaa ɩ gyɛ kɔnɔsa mʋ nɩɩ an wʋla nu lɩɩ koo asɩn mʋ npiili asɛ yɛ, an biti anɛ abaa.
63001006	Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ kebiti mʋ fɛɛ, an maa buu Ɩbwaarɛ kɔnɔsa mʋ. Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan wʋla nu lii npiili asɛ mʋ, ɔ sa anɛ kɔnɔ yɛ an biti abaa anɛ kakyɩna tɔ.
63001007	Asa pɩnapʋ damantɛ akʋ ba wʋla natɛ dulinyaa tɔ katɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ, nɩɩ ba man kɔɔlɛ gyii fɛɛ Yesu Krisito ba dulinyaa tɔ fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ tɔ. Kanɩn asa nɩmʋ tɔ ɔkʋmaa gyɛ ɔpɩnapʋ yɛ Krisito okisipu nɩn.
63001008	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan baa fan da sʋ kɛ fan man pan kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan sun nyɛ mʋ, kɛ fan nyɛ fanɛ kʋkɔka bɔla abaa.
63001009	Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kan taa ɔ mʋ gbaa‐gbaa mʋ nfɛɛrɛ tii kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Yesu kaapʋ mʋ sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ man kɔɔlɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Krisito kaapʋ mʋ gyii mʋ, ɔ man nyi Ɩbwaarɛ. Amaa ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kan kɔɔlɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Krisito kaapʋ mʋ gyii mʋ, o nyi Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ Mu‐Bii Yesu Krisito mʋ.
63001010	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ kan ba fanɛ asɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ man sʋ falɛ akaapʋ‐bi anɩmʋ mʋ, fan man kɔɔlɛ mʋ ba fan akpaara sʋ abɛɛ fan waa mʋ nsa‐nsa.
63001011	Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ kanɩn nyɩmɩsa maŋa mʋ, ngbaa mʋ tii mʋ asun libi mʋ sʋ.
63001012	N sʋ asɩn gaalaagaa mʋ nɩɩ n biti n tɔwɛ fanɛ, amaa n mɛɛ yɛ n kyʋrɔɔ ɩmʋ gyaga ɔwʋlɛ sʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ n sʋ tamaa fɛɛ n biti n ba fanɛ asɛ kɛ a tɔwɛ, kɛ maa fanɛ a kyɩna biri aligyima kɛ anɛ kpini ansi i gyii.
63001013	Fanɛ pɩɩkyɩɩ danbɩrasa mu‐bii ana bɛɛ fwaala fanɛ.
64001001	Mɛ ɔbɩlɩsa, n kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ n sa mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ danbɩrasa Gayusi mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ kebiti kesintin tɔ sa mʋ.
64001002	Mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ danbɩrasa, mɛ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ kinsigyi, yɛ alanfɩya, yɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ i kpee sʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ sa fʋ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ kala sʋ alanfɩya mʋ.
64001003	Fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ anɛ‐nyi mu‐bii ana akʋ ba be gyii fu kesintin, tɔwɛ mɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fʋ taa kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii fʋ yɩlɛ kesintin mʋ tɔ mʋ, ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ mi ansi i gyii gaa.
64001004	N man sʋ kinsigyi lala kʋ n kyɔ n maa nu yɛ mi‐nyi mu‐bii ana ba yɩlɛ kesintin mʋ tɔ.
64001005	Mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ danbɩrasa, kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fɩɩ waa fɩɩ sa fʋ bɩrɩsa ana Krisito abi afɔ mʋ, ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ fʋ gyɛ kesintin wuya.
64001006	Ba tɔwɛ fu kebiti mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ sa asa, sa Krisito abi kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ nfɩɩ mʋ. Fʋ kɩɩ kɛ fʋ lɛɛ bamʋ ɔkpa kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa nɩɩ ii gyii Ɩbwaarɛ ansi.
64001007	Lɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu kɩtɩɩ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ ba naa bee kpee yɛgɛ ba man kɔɔlɛ nkyɛtɔ kʋ lɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man kɔɔlɛ Yesu Krisito gyii mʋ asɛ.
64001008	Ɩ gyɛ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ dɛ sa anɛ yɛ a lɛɛ anɛ kesintin kaapʋ asa banɩmʋ, kɛ ana bamʋ a bʋga sun kesintin kusun mʋ.
64001009	N wʋla kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ naa sa Krisito abi kʋbʋ mʋ, amaa Diyotrefesi mʋ nɩɩ mu ansi ɩ payɩ kʋbʋ mʋ kɩbɩlɩsa kigyii sʋ mʋ, ɔ man taa anɛ waa sɛhn.
64001010	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ n kan ba fanɛ asɛ mʋ, n biti n tɩɩ fanɛ gyaŋɛ kɛ n tɔwɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa mʋ yɛ asɩn libi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɩn ɛɛ gyaga anɛ sʋ. Ɛɛ bɩla ee kina mʋ bɩrɩsa ana Krisito abi kɩfɔ kɩkɔɔlɛ, nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba kɔɔlɛ bamʋ kɩfɔ mʋ, ee tii bamʋ ɔkpa, nɩɩ ɛɛ gya bamʋ ɛɛ lɩɩ Krisito abi kʋbʋ mʋ tɔ.
64001011	Mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ danbɩrasa, man bɩɩla alibi kɩwaa amɔɔ adanbɩrasa. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa adanbɩrasa mʋ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ nɩn. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ waa alibi mʋ ɔ man pɩɩta bɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ.
64001012	Demetirisu bɩrɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ɩɩ tɔwɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn danbɩrasa lɩɩ mʋ kesintin kigyii sʋ. Anɛ gbaa anɛ a tɔwɛ mʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn danbɩrasa, nɩɩ fan nyi fɛɛ anɛ asɩn ɩ gyɛ kesintin.
64001013	N sʋ asɩn kɩkyɔ n kyʋrɔɔ sa fʋ, amaa n mee biti n kyʋrɔɔ ɩmʋ waa ɔwʋlɛ tɔ.
64001014	N sʋ tamaa fɛɛ ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ kyɛɛrɛɛ n biti n wu fʋ kɛ a tɔwɛ abaa asɛ.
64001015	Ɩbwaarɛ keyuula kɩ baa kɩ bʋ fʋ asɛ. Fʋ kyɛmɩnɛ ana mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ nfɩɩ kpini bɛɛ fwaala fʋ. Fwaala anɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana kpini kʋkʋlʋn kʋlʋn.
65001001	Ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ lɩɩ mɛ Gyudi asɛ, n gyɛ Yesu Krisito kɩyaafɔlɛ, nɩɩ n bɩla n gyɛ Gyemisi mu‐supu. N kyʋrɔɔ n sa bamʋ nɩɩ Ɔsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɩɩ bamʋ, nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kebiti sa bamʋ, nɩɩ Yesu Krisito ɩɩ kɩɩ bamʋ sʋ mʋ.
65001002	N kʋlɛ fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ o wu fanɛ kʋwɛɛ, kɛ mʋ kɔkɔlɔ yuuli yɛ kebiti kɩ baa kɩ bʋ fanɛ tɔ gaa.
65001003	Mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana, naafɔɔ ɩ bʋ mɛ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ fɛɛ n kyʋrɔɔ fanɛ lɩɩ kamɔlɩgɛ mʋ nɩɩ anɛ kpini an nyɛ mʋ asɩn, amaa n bɩla wu fɛɛ ɩ dagaa n kyʋrɔɔ waa fanɛ ɔlʋn tɔ fɛɛ fan kɔ kun kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa waa mʋ asa abaa tɔ kɩlɩɩ kʋlʋn kakpaa mʋ keluu.
65001004	Kʋtɔ mʋ sʋ nɩɩ n tɔwɛ kanɩn mʋ ɩ gyɛ fɛɛ, asa kʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba man sɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ ba baala loo fanɛ tɔ, bɛɛ kyɛɛgɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabwaala asɩn mʋ kasɛ, kɛ ba nyɛ‐nyɛ ɔkpa waa kakyɩɩ yɛ kanyɩn biti kɩgyagaa. Kanɩn asa maŋa ba kina Yesu Krisito mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ yɛ anɛ Owura mʋ. Lɩɩ koo dɩdaa mʋ, nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ waa Asɩnkyan yɩlasa mʋ tɔ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ mʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba nyɛ.
65001005	Fan tɛɛ wʋla fan nyi ɩnɩmʋ kpini, amaa n biti n nyiŋi fanɛ fɛɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ daa mɔlɩgɛ mʋ asa Ɩsɩrayɩ abi lɩɩ Egyipiti ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ. Amaa ɩmʋ kamaa tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ o muuri bamʋ tɔ bamʋ nɩɩ ba man kɔɔlɛ gyii mʋ.
65001006	Fan nyiŋi fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba man kɩtaa bamʋ kɩbɩlɩsa kigyii yɛ bamʋ ɩyɩlɛkpa, amaa ba kina bamʋ ɩkyɩnakpa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa bamʋ mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ŋmina bamʋ agbeeleebi kakpaa yɩla kitentenbiri naa fʋʋ katalɛ Kakɛ lala mʋ.
65001007	Kanɩn maŋa nɩɩ fan nyiŋi Sodom yɛ Gomora ndɛ, yɛ ndɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ kyaabɔɔ ɩmʋ mʋ. Ba daa kyɩna waa kakyɩɩ yɛ kanyɩn biti kɩgyagaa yɛ agyaga‐sɩn kɩbansa, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa fʋlɔn muuri bamʋ. Ndɛ maŋa tɔ asa gbaa be du nɩn fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba taa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ waa agyaga‐sɩn kayalaga. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ sɩnkaala sa alibi awaapʋ kpini fɛɛ bee biti ba loo awʋrʋfɔ fʋlɔn yen‐yen mʋ nɩɩ i mee dun kakpaa mʋ tɔ.
65001008	Kanɩn ɔkpa maŋa sʋ nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba ba baala loo fanɛ tɔ mʋ gbaa be du. Bɛɛ kɔyɩ idee nɩɩ bɛɛ yɩlɛ ɩmʋ sʋ bɛɛ waa bamʋ gbaa‐gbaa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ agyaga‐sɩn, nɩɩ bee kina Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ ɔlʋn, nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ nbusaa asɩn bɛɛ gyaga sʋsʋ nbɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ bʋnyaa mʋ.
65001009	Amaa Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ bɩlɩsa Maakɛlɩ gbaa man saalɛ Sɩtaanɛ. Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ maa mʋ bɛɛ bɩɩtɛ ɔdɩdaapʋ Mosesi kibuni sʋ mʋ, ɔ man tɔwɛ Sɩtaanɛ nnɔ, amaa ɔ tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔ bɩɩtɛ fʋ kʋsʋ.”
65001010	Amaa falɛ asa banɩmʋ bɩrɛ bɛɛ saalɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ be mee nu kɩmʋ kasɛ mʋ nɩn. Nɩɩ be du nɩn fɛɛ atɔbwaaya, lɩɩ fɛɛ ba man sʋ nfɛɛrɛ, kɛ ba fɛ lɩɩ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ kanɩn atɔ maŋa ii muuri bamʋ.
65001011	Kanɩn asa maŋa bamʋ laakʋ! Lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkpa libi mʋ nɩɩ Ken kyɩna bɔla sʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ba buu falɛ. Be du nɩn fɛɛ Baalam mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kpalɩ afulee sʋ waa alibi mʋ. Nɩɩ ba kʋsʋ yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ sʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Kora gbaa kʋsʋ yɩlɛ mʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ bamʋ gbaa bamʋ bee biti ba muuri fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ Kora muuri mʋ.
65001012	Falɛ asa nɩmʋ ba kan naa loo fanɛ tɔ kɛ fan bʋga gyii mʋ, be du nɩn fɛɛ atɔ kpensa fanɛ tɔ, nɩɩ ba man sʋ ipeeli fɛɛ bamʋ nkʋn lɛɛ nɩɩ bee biti. Nɩɩ be du nɩn fɛɛ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ bɩya bʋlayɩ, nɩɩ afuu ɩ da ɩmʋ ɩ kyaa ɩ bɔɔ. Ba bɩla be du nɩn fɛɛ iyu mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sɔyɩ abi ɩmʋ kɩsɔyɩ saŋa kyɛɛkyɛɛ mʋ, nɩɩ ba kyiigi ɩmaa ɩmʋ ilin nɩɩ i wu kpini‐kpini mʋ.
65001013	Be du nɩn fɛɛ ɔpʋ apaa nɩɩ bamʋ ipeeli awaasa mʋ ii fuu fɛɛ afʋfʋʋ ɩɩ sʋ akpa ɩ naa. Nɩɩ ba bɩla ba du nɩn fɛɛ akyikpebi mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ naa ɩɩ naa mʋ. Bamʋ opula kyɩnasa ɩ gyɛ kitentenbiri kyilim mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɔŋɔ yɩla bamʋ kakpaa mʋ.
65001014	Enoki mʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyan Adam sʋ kakʋʋgɛ tɔ nkyaga sʋ sunɔsapʋ mʋ, tɔwɛ falɛ asa banɩmʋ asɩn koo dɩdaa yɩla yɛ, “Fan kɩɩ, Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ ɩɩ ba maa mʋ nbɔɔ kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ ngbɩn‐ngbɩn mʋ,
65001015	kɛ o be gyii asa kpini asɩn. Ee biti o be bun bamʋ nɩɩ ba man sɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ kʋpwɛ lɩɩ bamʋ alibi kɩwaa sʋ, yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ asɩn libi yii Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ.
65001016	Falɛ asa banɩmʋ ba tɛ nɩn bɛɛ kɔlɩtɛ, yɛgɛ bɛɛ pwɩɩ bamʋ asa. Ba buu bamʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kayalaga sʋ, nɩɩ bɛɛ kʋsaa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛgɛ ba sʋ kɔnɔ tɔ kɔn bɛɛ pɩna asa kɛ ɩ waa ɔdan sa bamʋ.
65001017	“Amaa mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana danbɩrasa, fan nyi atɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito asunpu ba daa tɔwɛ fanɛ.
65001018	Ba daa tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, kakɛ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ tɔ mʋ, asa bee biti ba taa Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn bɛɛ waa ahin‐sɩn, kɛ ba buu bamʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ alibi kayalaga.”
65001019	Falɛ asa banɩmʋ ɩɩ bɩya nbarɩgɛ tɔ fanɛ tɔ, bamʋ kayɩɩ‐wʋlɛ kayalaga i gyii bamʋ amu, nɩɩ ba man sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ.
65001020	Amaa mɛ kyɛmɩnɛ ana danbɩrasa, fanɛɛ fanɛ bɩrɛ, fan waa fanɛ n‐yɩɩ ɔlʋn tɔ lɩɩ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii danbɩrasa mʋ tɔ, yɛgɛ fɛn kʋlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, Kayaayu Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ mʋ ɔlʋn mʋ tɔ.
65001021	Fan kyɩna Ɩbwaarɛ kebiti mʋ tɔ, yɛgɛ fan gyoo anɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito o be wu fanɛ kʋwɛɛ kɛ ɔ sa fanɛ nkpa kakpaa mʋ.
65001022	Fan wu bamʋ nɩɩ bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii du sika‐sika mʋ kʋwɛɛ.
65001023	Fan mɔlɩgɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ sʋ bamʋ ii kpee awʋrʋfɔ fʋlɔn yen‐yen tɔ mʋ, kɛ fan wu akʋ mɔɔ kʋwɛɛ yɛgɛ fan sʋ kufuu, kɛ fan kisi bamʋ alibi awaasa mʋ nɩɩ i du fɛɛ ataa kpensa mʋ.
65001024	Fan yɛgɛ a yɩn Ɩbwaarɛ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ yɛgɛ fan man lɩɩ tɩyɛ, kɛ ɔ taa fanɛ yɩlɛ mʋ bʋnyaa mu ansi tɔ yɛ kɔkɔlɔ fuuli, yɛgɛ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ man sʋ asɩn pwɩɩsa kʋ.
65001025	Mʋ nkʋn ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ Ɔmɔlɩgɛpʋ. Nɩɩ mʋ ɩ dagaa bʋnyaa, yɛ kɩkparɛ, yɛ ɔlʋn, yɛ kɩbɩlɩsa bɔla anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu Krisito lɩɩ koo dɩdaa yɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ man sʋ ɔkaa. Amen.
66001001	Ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ tɔ asɩn ɩ gyɛ asɩnlɛɛ kaapʋsa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ taa sa Yesu Krisito fɛɛ, ɔ lɛɛ kaapʋ mʋ ayaafɔlɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba waa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ yɛ ɩ kyɛɛrɛɛ. Nɩɩ Yesu mɔɔ sun mʋ kabɔɔ kʋ nɩɩ ɔ ba lɛɛ asɩn mʋ kaapʋ mɛ Gyɔn, Krisito kɩyaafɔlɛ.
66001002	Nɩɩ mɛ Gyɔn, ɩ tɔwɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ maa Yesu Krisito tɔwɛ nɩɩ ɔ lɛɛ kaapʋ mɛ mʋ.
66001003	Kumu ɔkɔn wuya ɩ gyɛ ɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kalɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩnlɛɛ kaapʋsa nɩmʋ, nɩɩ kumu ɔkɔn wuya ana ɩ bɩla ba gyɛ bamʋ nɩɩ bee nu asɩn mʋ, nɩɩ bee buu ɩmʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ atɔ nɩmʋ kpini ii biti ɩ waa mʋ i tiri tɔ.
66001004	Mɛ Gyɔn ɩ kyʋrɔɔ ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ n sʋ n sa Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ asunɔ, mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ Asiya ɔsʋwʋlɛ kɩbaafʋn kʋ mʋ sʋ. Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ wʋla ɔ bʋ tɔ pɔyɩ nɩɩ atɔ i piili, nɩɩ ee biti ɔ baa ɔ bʋ tɔ kakpaa mʋ, yɛ mʋ n‐yaayu nsunɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ mu kuwura‐gya mʋ asɛ mʋ, bamʋ kabwaala yɛ kayɩɩ yuuli kɩ gyɛ fanɛ lɛɛ.
66001005	Yesu Krisito gbaa kabwaala yɛ kayɩɩ yuuli kɩ ba fanɛ asɛ. Mʋ ii gyii kesintin nɩɩ ɛɛ lɛɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ ɛɛ kaapʋ tɔ, mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ gyankpaa kyiŋi lɩɩ lewu tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ gyɛ kasɛ sʋ awura tɔ Owura. Nɩɩ mʋ ii biti anɛ asɩn gaa, nɩɩ o wu taa mʋ nkalan lɛɛ anɛ lɩɩ alibi ɔlʋn tɔ,
66001006	nɩɩ ɔ waa anɛ mu kuwura‐gyii tɔ asa yɛ mu aseepu, kɛ a sun Mʋ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ. Yesu Krisito nɩɩ bʋnyaa yɛ ɔlʋn gyɛ mʋ lɛɛ kakpaa. Amen!
66001007	Fan kɩɩ! Yesu bʋ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ tɔ ɛɛ ba. Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ ii biti o wu mʋ, halɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba yii mʋ kɩkpa mʋ gbaa, lɩɩ mʋ sʋ kasɛ sʋ asa kpini bee biti ba su. Kanɩn nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba. Amen!
66001008	Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Mɛ ɩ gyɛ Alɩfa yɛ Omega. Mɛ ɩ bʋ tɔ, nɩɩ n wʋla n bʋ tɔ pɔyɩ nɩɩ atɔ i piili, nɩɩ n biti n baa n bʋ tɔ kakpaa mʋ. Mɛ ɩ gyɛ Ɔlʋlʋnpʋ.”
66001009	Mɛ, Gyɔn mʋ nɩɩ n gyɛ fanɛ bɩrɩsa, lɩɩ Yesu sʋ mʋ n gyii awʋrʋfɔ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fen gyii mʋ, lɩɩ an maa gyɛ mu kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ asa sʋ mʋ. Amaa an nyɛ kenyiita yɩlɛ tɔ. Lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn kɩtɔwɛ yɛ Yesu asɩn kɩlɛɛ tɔwɛ sʋ mʋ, ba kɩtaa mɛ naa tʋʋ Patimose kifintin mʋ sʋ.
66001010	Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Yesu kakɛ sunsa mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ kɩ ba mɛ sʋ, nɩɩ n nu ɔbʋlɛ lala kʋ mɛ kamaa, kɩ maa su fɛɛ kabɩlɛ.
66001011	Nɩɩ ɔbʋlɛ mʋ tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, “Kyʋrɔɔ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ fii wu falɛ waa ɔwʋlɛ tɔ, kɛ fʋ taa kyʋŋɛ Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ asunɔ mʋ. Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Efeso yɛ Simirina yɛ Pegamum yɛ Tatira yɛ Sadisi yɛ Filadefiya maa Lawodisiya.”
66001012	N maa biliŋi n kɩɩ ɔbʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ tɔwɛ mɛ asɛ mʋ, n wu ɩfɩtɩla ɩgyagakpa isunɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba taa isuwa waa ɩmʋ.
66001013	Ɩmʋ nsana tɔ mʋ, n wu ɔkʋ fɛɛ Daadimaadi Obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ. O bun kaalɛ bʋnswɩɩsa ba yii kasɛ, nɩɩ ɔ taa suwa kɩrɩsʋ ŋmina mʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ.
66001014	Nɩɩ mu kumu inyini i fuuli parɛparɛ fɛɛ ateebi abɛɛ bwanbwan, nɩɩ mu ansi abi i du fɛɛ fʋlɔn anobi.
66001015	Nɩɩ mʋ ayaa i du fɛɛ kɩbɩlɩtɔ pɩpɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba taa tʋʋ fʋlɔn tɔ, nɩɩ kɩɩ ŋalɩgɛ, nɩɩ mʋ ɔbʋlɛ mʋ i du fɛɛ nkyu ɩ maa bɔla ɩ kyʋn akʋlɩ tɔ.
66001016	Nɩɩ ɔ sʋ akyikpebi asunɔ mʋ gyisa kɩbaa tɔ, nɩɩ sakunde gyimba anyɔ ɩ lɩɩ mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ. Nɩɩ mu ansi tɔ mɔɔ ɩ ŋalɩgɛ fɛɛ kakyʋwapɛ kyɔwɛ.
66001017	Nɩɩ n maa wu mʋ mʋ, n tɩyɛ mʋ ayaa tɔ fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa wusa, nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ gyisa kɩbaa gyaga mɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Man waa kufuu. Mɛ ɩ gyɛ kagyankpaa yɛ laalaalʋwɛ.
66001018	Mɛ ɩ gyɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ n bʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ n kyɩna wu, amaa kɩɩ, n tɛ nkpa tɔ kakpaa. Nɩɩ lewu yɛ Kamandɛ ɩsafwɩɩ ɩ bʋ mɛ kɩbaa tɔ.
66001019	“Ɩmʋ sʋ, kyʋrɔɔ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ fu wu ɩ maa waa nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩmʋ yɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba kamaa tɔ mʋ kpini yɩla.
66001020	Akyikpebi asunɔ mʋ nɩɩ fu wu mɛ gyisa kɩbaa tɔ mʋ, yɛ ɩfɩtɩla ɩgyagakpa asunɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba taa suwa waa ɩmʋ mʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, Akyikpebi asunɔ mʋ ɩ yɩlɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ asunɔ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ kɩɩ Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ asunɔ mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɩfɩtɩla ɩgyagakpa asunɔ mʋ ɩ yɩlɛ sa Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ asunɔ mʋ.”
66002001	Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, “Kyʋrɔɔ asɩn nɩmʋ naa sa Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Efeso kadɛ tɔ mʋ sʋ. Asɩn nɩmʋ ɩ lɩɩ mɛ, mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ akyikpebi asunɔ mɛ gyisa kɩbaa tɔ, nɩɩ n naa ɩfɩtɩla ɩgyagakpa asunɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba taa suwa waa mʋ nsana.
66002002	N tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, N nyi fanɛ asɩn waasa yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan kpan fanɛ n‐yɩɩ waa kusun yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan nyɛ kenyiita yɩlɛ tɔ. Nɩɩ n nyi fan maa mee biti alibi awaapʋ fanɛ tɔ, nɩɩ fan kaala bamʋ nɩɩ ba yɛ ba gyɛ Krisito asunpu yɛgɛ ba man gyɛ mʋ kɩɩ, nɩɩ fan wu fɛɛ ba gyɛ antɩŋɛsa wuya ana.
66002003	Nɩɩ n nyi fan maa nyɛ kenyiita yɩlɛ tɔ, nɩɩ fen gyii awʋrʋfɔ lɩɩ mɛ kɩtɩɩ sʋ, nɩɩ fanɛ abaa a man yɔɔ.
66002004	Amaa n sʋ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn akʋ, ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ nbɩɩnbɩɩ fan man bɩla fɛn sʋ kebiti fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan gyankpaa fɛn sʋ mʋ.
66002005	Fan nyiŋi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ naafɔɔ fan fʋʋ, nɩɩ fan bwii lɩɩ tɩyɛ mʋ. Fan kyɛɛgɛ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ alibi tɔ, kɛ fan waa adanbɩrasa mʋ nɩɩ fan kyɩna fɛn waa mʋ. Nɩɩ fan man kan kyɛɛgɛ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ alibi tɔ mʋ, n biti n ba fanɛ asɛ ba lɛɛ fanɛ fɩtɩla ɔgyagakpa mʋ lɩɩ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ mʋ.
66002006	Amaa fanɛ kʋtɔ kʋlʋn mʋ nɩɩ fɛn waa nɩɩ ɩ bʋrɔn mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, fen kisi Nikolatan abi awaasa mʋ nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n kisi mʋ.
66002007	Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ asʋ mʋ, o nu asɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ ɩɩ tɔwɛ Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ. Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔ lɩɩ mʋ, n biti n sa mʋ ɔkpa, kɛ o gyii oyu mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ sa nkpa mʋ abi nɩɩ kɩ yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ayɛ sʋsʋ, mʋ nɩɩ bɛ bɩla bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Paradise mʋ.”
66002008	Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, “Kyʋrɔɔ asɩn nɩmʋ naa sa Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Simirina mʋ sʋ. Asɩn nɩmʋ ɩ lɩɩ mɛ mʋ nɩɩ n gyɛ Kagyankpaa yɛ Laalaalʋwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ n da wu nɩɩ n kyiŋi bɩla n tɛ nkpa tɔ mʋ.
66002009	N nyi awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ fen gyii yɛ fanɛ kitiri, amaa kesintin tɔ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii sʋ mʋ fen gyɛ atɔ wuya ana. N nyi bamʋ nɩɩ ba yɛ ba gyɛ Gyiwu abi yɛgɛ ba man gyɛ, nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩn antɩŋɛsa bɛɛ gyaga fanɛ sʋ mʋ. Ba gyɛ Sɩtaanɛ kʋbʋ mʋ tɔ asa.
66002010	Fan man waa kufuu lɩɩ awʋrʋfɔ mʋ nɩɩ fen biti fan gyii mʋ sʋ. N tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ, fen biti fɛn nyɛ kʋtʋʋ tɔ kɩɩ, mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ fɛɛ Sɩtaanɛ ii biti ɔ taa fanɛ asa mʋ tɔ akʋ naa tii obu. Fen biti fɛn nyɛ kanyanla nkɛ kudu. Halɩɩ lewu tɔ gbaa, fan yɩlɛ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ kenken, kɛ n sa fanɛ kʋkɔka mʋ nɩɩ kɩ gyɛ nkpa kakpaa.
66002011	“Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ asʋ mʋ, o nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ ɩɩ tɔwɛ Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ. Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔ lɩɩ mʋ, lewu nyɔsapʋ mʋ man bɩla yɛ o gyii mʋ.”
66002012	Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, “Kyʋrɔɔ asɩn nɩmʋ naa sa Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Pegamum kadɛ tɔ mʋ sʋ. Asɩn nɩmʋ ɩɩ lɩɩ mɛ mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ sakunde gyimba anyɔ mɛ asɛ.
66002013	N nyi katɩn mʋ nɩɩ fan tɛ. Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ kuwura‐gya mʋ kɩ bʋ. Ɩmaa ɩmʋ kpini gbaa mʋ fan san kɔɔlɛ mɛ gyii. Halɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ba mɔɔ mɛ asɩn mʋ kesintin ogyipu Antipasi fanɛ kadɛ lala mʋ nɩɩ Sɩtaanɛ tɛ mʋ tɔ gbaa mʋ, fan man kina mɛ lɩɩ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ.
66002014	“Amaa n sʋ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn pwɩɩsa kʋ. Ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, asa mʋ nɩɩ bee buu Balaam asɩn kaapʋsa mʋ akʋ ba bʋ fanɛ kʋbʋ mʋ tɔ. Balaam nɩmʋ ɩ kyɩna kaapʋ Balaki yɛ, kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa kɛ Ɩsɩrayɩ abi ba waa alibi mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, ɔ pɩna bamʋ kɛ ba gyii agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba taa lɔŋɔ sa ɩdakpa, kɛ ba waa kakyɩɩ yɛ kanyɩn biti kɩgyagaa.
66002015	Kanɩn ɔkpa maŋa sʋ, nɩɩ asa mʋ nɩɩ bee buu Nikolatan abi asɩn kaapʋsa mʋ akʋ ba bʋ fanɛ kʋbʋ mʋ tɔ.
66002016	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan kyɛɛgɛ fanɛ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ alibi tɔ ba Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, nɩɩ ɩ man gyɛ kanɩn bɩrɛ, n biti n ba fanɛ asɛ bilen kɛ n ba taa mɛ kɔnɔ tɔ sakunde ba kɔ yɛ kanɩn asa maŋa.
66002017	“Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ asʋ mʋ, o nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ ɩɩ tɔwɛ Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ. Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔ lɩɩ mʋ, n biti n sa mʋ agyitɔ baalasa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ mana, nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ mʋ. N biti n bɩla sa ɔsa maŋa kubuu fufuli mʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ kɩtɩɩ pʋpwɛ gyaga kɩmʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ man nyi kanɩn kɩtɩɩ maŋa, amɔɔ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ kɩmʋ mʋ nkʋn.”
66002018	Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, “Kyʋrɔɔ asɩn nɩmʋ naa sa Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Tiyatira kadɛ tɔ mʋ sʋ. Asɩn nɩmʋ ɩɩ lɩɩ mɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mu‐Bii mʋ nɩɩ mi ansi i du fɛɛ fʋlɔn anobi, nɩɩ mɛ ayaa sʋ ɩ du fɛɛ kɩbɩlɩtɔ pɩpɛɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ ŋalɩgɛ mʋ.
66002019	N nyi fanɛ asɩn waasa. N nyi fanɛ kebiti yɛ fanɛ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii yɛ fanɛ kusun, yɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fɛn nyɛ kenyiita yɩlɛ tɔ. Nɩɩ n nyi fan maa waa ɩnɩmʋ kpini fan kyɔ kanan mʋ nɩɩ fan daa kyɩna waa mʋ.
66002020	“Amaa n sʋ fanɛ n‐yɩɩ sʋ asɩn pwɩɩsa kʋ, fɛɛ fan maa sa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Gyesebeli ɔkpa, nɩɩ ɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ n‐yɩɩ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɔtɔwɛpʋ. Nɩɩ ɛɛ taa mʋ kɩkaapʋ mʋ pɩna mɛ abuupu, nɩɩ bɛɛ waa kanyɩn abɛɛ kakyɩɩ biti kɩgyagaa, nɩɩ ba bɩla bee gyii agyitɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba taa lɔŋɔ sa ɩdakpa mʋ.
66002021	N nyɛ saŋa sa mʋ fɛɛ ɔ kyɛɛgɛ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ mʋ kɩgyagaa mʋ tɔ, amaa o kina ɔ mɛɛ kyɛɛgɛ.
66002022	Ɩmʋ sʋ n biti n yɛgɛ ɔ lɔɔ, kɛ n yɛgɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba lɩɩ bamʋ‐ka ana kamaa nyita kekili yɛ mʋ mʋ, ba wu awʋrʋfɔ lala, amɔɔ ba kyɛɛgɛ bamʋ nfɛɛrɛ lɩɩ alibi ɩkpa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ waa mʋ sʋ.
66002023	N biti n mɔɔ mu abuupu mʋ kpini, kɛ Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ kpini ba bɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ ɩ gyɛ ɔmʋ nɩɩ o nyi nyɩmɩsa kɔkɔlɔ tɔ yɛ mʋ nfɛɛrɛ tɔ asɩn. N biti n ka fanɛ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ kʋkɔ lɩɩ kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ waa sʋ.
66002024	Amaa n tɔwɛ fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan san Tiyatira, nɩɩ fan man buu ɔkyɩɩ mʋ asɩn kaapʋsa libi, nɩɩ fan man bɩɩla mʋ asɩn mʋ nɩɩ mu abuupu bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Sɩtaanɛ asɩn budusa baalasa mʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ n tɔwɛ fanɛ yɛ n man bɩla yɛ n taa kɩkpɩnɛ kʋ tii fanɛ sʋ.
66002025	Amaa fan dan kɩtaa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan wʋla fan sʋ tɔ mʋ kenken, naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n biti n ba.
66002026	Ɔsa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɔ ɛɛ lɩɩ, nɩɩ ɛɛ waa mi kebiti naa fʋʋ laalaalʋwɛ mʋ, n biti n sa mʋ ɔlʋn ndɛndɛmandɛ sʋ.
66002027	Nɩɩ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ n nyɛ ɔlʋn lɩɩ mɛ‐Sɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ, saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ asɩn lɩɩ mɛ sʋ yɛ, ‘Ee biti ɔ taa kɩbɩlɩtɔ ɔlʋn kudubi gyii kuwura bamʋ sʋ, yɛgɛ o mee wu bamʋ kʋwɛɛ. Ee biti o boyi bamʋ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ bee boyi apɛɛ tɔ bɛɛ waa ɩmʋ buriburi mʋ.’
66002028	N biti n bɩla sa ɔsa maŋa kɩbwayɩkɛ kikyikpebi mʋ, ɩnɩmʋ ɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ ba kɔ lɩɩ.
66002029	Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ asʋ mʋ o nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu ɩɩ tɔwɛ Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ.”
66003001	Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, “Kyʋrɔɔ asɩn nɩmʋ naa sa Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Sadisi kadɛ tɔ mʋ sʋ. Asɩn nɩmʋ ɩ lɩɩ mɛ, mʋ nɩɩ n sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ N‐yaayu nsunɔ yɛ akyikpebi asunɔ mʋ. N nyi fʋ asɩn waasa, fʋ nyɛ kɩtɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ maa tɛ nkpa tɔ, amaa fu wu.
66003002	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan kyiŋi, kɛ fan sa ɩmʋ nɩɩ ɩ san nɩɩ ii biti i wu mʋ tɔ ɔlʋn. Lɩɩ fɛɛ n wu fanɛ asɩn waasa ɩ maa man du kyɛɛkyɛɛ mɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ.
66003003	Ɩmʋ sʋ fan nyiŋi atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba kaapʋ fanɛ nɩɩ fan nu mʋ. Fan buu ɩmʋ, kɛ fan yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa. Amaa nɩɩ fan man kan kyiŋi bɩrɛ, n biti n ba purigi fanɛ sʋ fɛɛ oyu, nɩɩ fɛn mɛɛ yɛ fan bɩɩ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ n biti n ba fanɛ asɛ.
66003004	“Amaa ɩ san asa kalɩsa akʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Sadisi, nɩɩ ba man waa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ ineesi. Bamʋ ii biti ba bun atɔ fufuli, kɛ n maa bamʋ a natɛ, lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ ɩ dagaa kanɩn.
66003005	Nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ kan kɔ lɩɩ mʋ, mʋ ii biti o bun atɔ fufuli fɛɛ bamʋ. Nɩɩ n mɛɛ yɛ n kpayɩ mʋ kɩtɩɩ lɩɩ nkpa ɔwʋlɛ mʋ tɔ kakaakʋ. Amaa n biti n lɛɛ tɔwɛ Nsɛ Ɩbwaarɛ maa mʋ nbɔɔ mu ansi tɔ fɛɛ ba gyɛ mɛ asa.
66003006	Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ asʋ mʋ, o nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ ɩɩ tɔwɛ Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ.”
66003007	Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, “Kyʋrɔɔ asɩn nɩmʋ naa sa Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Filadefiya kadɛ tɔ mʋ sʋ. Asɩn nɩmʋ ɩ lɩɩ mɛ mʋ nɩɩ n gyɛ Ɔkyɩrɛkyɩrɛpʋ yɛ kesintin wuya, nɩɩ mɛ kɩbaa tɔ nɩɩ Dawidi safɩɩ bʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n tigi mʋ, ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ tii, nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ n tii mɔɔ mʋ, ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ tigi.
66003008	N nyi fanɛ asɩn waasa. Fan nu, n tigi kebunɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ tii mʋ yɩla sa fanɛ. N nyi fɛɛ fanɛ ɔlʋn man kyɔ, amaa fan buu mɛ asɩn mʋ, nɩɩ fan man kina mɛ.
66003009	Kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n biti n taa waa bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ Sɩtaanɛ kʋbʋ mʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ba gyɛ antɩŋɛsa wuya ana, nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ ba gyɛ Gyiwu abi yɛgɛ ba man gyɛ mʋ ɩ gyɛ yɛ, n biti n nyan kanɩn asa maŋa kɛ ba be muŋa fanɛ ayaa kasɛ, kɛ ba bɩɩ fɛɛ n biti fanɛ asɩn.
66003010	Kpalɩ fɛɛ fan maa man nu mɛ kɔnɔsa, nɩɩ fan nyɛ kenyiita yɩlɛ tɔ mʋ, ngbaa mɛ n biti n lɛɛ fanɛ lɩɩ awʋrʋfɔ kʋtʋʋ tɔ kɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ ba dulinyaa tɔ, kɛ ɩ ba tʋʋ dulinyaa asa kpini tɔ kɩɩ mʋ.
66003011	“N biti n ba bilen. Fan kɩtaa kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ fan sʋ tɔ mʋ kenken, kɛ ɔkʋ ɔ man kɔɔlɛ kʋkɔka mʋ nɩɩ n biti n taa sa fanɛ mʋ.
66003012	Nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔ lɩɩ mʋ, ee biti ɔ baa ɔ gyɛ fɛɛ lenbu tɔ sabarɛ, Mɛ Ɩbwaarɛ osunkpa obu mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ mɛɛ yɛ ɔ lɩɩ tʋtɔ kakaakʋ kpaa. N biti n kyʋrɔɔ Mɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kɩtɩɩ yɛ mʋ kadɛ lala mʋ kɩtɩɩ gyaga kanɩn ɔsa maŋa sʋ. Kanɩn kadɛ lala maŋa ɩ gyɛ Gyerusalem pʋpwɛ mʋ nɩɩ kii biti kɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ Mɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɛ ba kasɛ sʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ n biti n kyʋrɔɔ mɛ gbaa‐gbaa mɛ kɩtɩɩ pʋpwɛ gyaga kanɩn ɔsa maŋa sʋ.
66003013	Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ asʋ mʋ, o nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ ɩɩ tɔwɛ Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ.”
66003014	Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, “Kyʋrɔɔ asɩn nɩmʋ naa sa Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ Krisito kʋbʋ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ Lawodisiya kadɛ tɔ mʋ sʋ. Asɩn nɩmʋ ɩ lɩɩ mɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Amen mʋ asɛ. Nɩɩ n gyɛ kesintin wuya, nɩɩ n ba lɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ ifuli kaapʋ kyɛɛkyɛɛ. Nɩɩ mɛ ɩ gyɛ kumu sa kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ tʋʋ mʋ.
66003015	N nyi fanɛ asɩn waasa, fɛɛ fan man yuuli nɩɩ fan man bʋgya. Nɩɩ fan daa fan yuuli abɛɛ fan bʋgya mʋ, naafɔɔ ɩ bʋrɔn!
66003016	Amaa lɩɩ fɛɛ fan maa du mɔlɔmɔlɔ, nɩɩ fan man yuuli abɛɛ fan man bʋgya sʋ mʋ, n biti n fura fanɛ lɩɩ mɛ kɔnɔ tɔ fɔyɩ.
66003017	Fɛn tɔwɛ yɛ, an gyɛ atɔ wuya ana, nɩɩ kʋtɔ kʋmaa kɩ waa ɔdan ɩ sa anɛ, nɩɩ sɛhn man tiri anɛ. Amaa fan man nyi fɛɛ fan gyɛ awʋrʋfɔ agyipu, nɩɩ fanɛ asɩn a sʋ kʋwɛɛ, nɩɩ fan gyɛ atiripu, yɛ agyaatanapʋ nɩɩ fan naa kubolonkpan.
66003018	Ɩmʋ sʋ n tɔwɛ n waa fanɛ fɛɛ fan ba mɛ asɛ ba sɔɔ suwa kparɛ, kɛ fan ba waa atɔ wuya ana. Kɛ fan ba sɔɔ atɔ fufuli mɛ asɛ naa bun fanɛ ipeeli kubolonkpan mʋ sʋ. Kɛ fan bɩla sɔɔ kɩfɛ waa fanɛ ansi tɔ kɛ fan taalɛ nyɛ wu.
66003019	“Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ n biti bamʋ asɩn mʋ, n gyii kadɛ sa bamʋ nɩɩ n bɩɩtɛ bamʋ asʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ fan payɩ fanɛ ansi kɛ fan yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa.
66003020	Fan nu mɛ asɛ! N yɩlɛ kebunɔ n ŋɛ ɔpʋnʋ mʋ. Ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o nu mɛ ɔbʋlɛ, nɩɩ o tigi ɔpʋnʋ mʋ, n biti n loo to ba, kɛ maa mʋ a bʋga gyii.
66003021	“Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔ lɩɩ mʋ, n biti n sa mʋ ɔkpa ɔ ba kyɩna kuwura‐gya sʋ mata mɛ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ngbaa mɛ n kɔ lɩɩ nɩɩ n kyɩna mata Mɛ‐Sɛ mʋ kuwura‐gya mʋ sʋ.
66003022	Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ asʋ mʋ, o nu kʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ ɩɩ tɔwɛ Krisito kʋbʋ‐kʋbʋ mʋ.”
66004001	Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, n kɩɩ nɩɩ n wu sʋsʋ Ɩbwaarɛ ayɛ ɔpʋnʋ maa tigi kɩ dɛ. Nɩɩ n nu ɔbʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ daa tɔwɛ mɛ asɛ fɛɛ kabɩlɛ mʋ bɩla tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, “Ba sʋsʋ nfɩɩ, kɛ n kaapʋ fʋ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ɩ maa waa ɩnɩmʋ kamaa.”
66004002	Opula tɔ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Kayaayu mʋ taa mɛ. Nɩɩ n ba kɩɩ mʋ, n wu kuwura‐gya mʋ kɩ maa bʋ sʋsʋ Ɩbwaarɛ ayɛ yɛgɛ ɔkʋ tɛ kɩmʋ sʋ.
66004003	Nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ kɩmʋ sʋ mʋ, ɩɩ ŋalɩgɛ pɩlɛpɩlɛ fɛɛ abuu ŋalɩgɛsa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ sʋ ɔgyalɩn, ɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ gyasipa nɩɩ ii fuuli yɛ kaneliyan nɩɩ ɩɩ payɩ mʋ. Nɩɩ okyimale mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ ŋalɩgɛ fɛɛ ɔgyalɩn kubuu mʋ nɩɩ ki du fɛɛ kɩfatɛɛ bunboli, nɩɩ kɩ kyaabɔɔ kuwura‐gya mʋ.
66004004	Nwuragya adʋnyɔ yɛ ana ɩkʋ ɩ yɩlɛ kyaabɔɔ kuwura‐gya mʋ yɛgɛ abɩlɩsa adʋnyɔ yɛ ana ba tɛ ɩmʋ sʋ. Ba bun atɔ fufuli nɩɩ ba bun suwa awura‐wʋrʋ.
66004005	Nɩɩ bʋlayɩ ɩɩ wɛɛ ɩsɛɛ yɛgɛ ɛɛ pʋntɛ lɩɩ kuwura‐gya mʋ asɛ. Ɩfɩtɩla isunɔ ɩ bʋ kuwura‐gya mʋ asɛ ɩ dɩyɛ. Ɩnɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ N‐yaayu nsunɔ mʋ.
66004006	Kuwura‐gya mu ansi tɔ mʋ, n bɩla wu kʋtɔ kʋ fɛɛ ɔpʋ, nɩɩ ki du fɛɛ kɩlasɛ, nɩɩ kɩ bɩla ki du kɩlɩn‐kɩlɩn. Nsana tɔ mʋ atɔ kɩsa ana ba kyaabɔɔ kuwura‐gya mʋ, yɛgɛ ba sʋ ansi bamʋ ansi tɔ yɛ bamʋ kamaa yɛ katɩn kʋmaa.
66004007	Kʋtɔ kɩɩsa gyankpaasa mʋ ki du nɩn fɛɛ barɩnɛ, nɩɩ ɔnyɔsapʋ du fɛɛ naatɛ gbelu, nɩɩ ɔsasapʋ mu ansi tɔ i du fɛɛ nyɩmɩsa, nɩɩ ɔnasapʋ du fɛɛ kpaakpaatɛ mʋ nɩɩ ee fugi.
66004008	Atɔbwaaya kɩɩsa ana maŋa ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ abanbantɛ asiye, nɩɩ ba sʋ ansi bamʋ n‐yɩɩ sʋ katɩn kʋmaa nɩmʋ kyaabɔɔ halɩɩ bamʋ abanbantɛ tɔ. Ba mɛɛ yɛgɛ kɩtɔwɛ kakyʋwapɛ yɛ kagyanbwɛ yɛ, “Kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ, kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ, kyɩrɛkyɩrɛ, ɩ gyɛ anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ Owura lala, mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ɔ wʋla ɔ bʋ tɔ pɔyɩ nɩɩ atɔ i piili, nɩɩ ee biti ɔ baa ɔ bʋ tɔ kakpaa mʋ.”
66004009	Saŋa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ atɔbwaaya kɩɩsa mʋ bɛɛ bɩɩ ɩlʋn bɛɛ taa bʋnyaa yɛ bɛɛrɛɛ yɛ afwaala bɛɛ sa ɔmʋnɩ ɔ tɛ kuwura‐gya mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɛ nkpa tɔ kakpaa mʋ.
66004010	Nɩɩ abɩlɩsa adʋnyɔ yɛ ana mʋ bee muŋa ɔmʋnɩ ɔ tɛ kuwura‐gya mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ tɛ nkpa tɔ kakpaa mu ansi tɔ, bee sun mʋ. Nɩɩ bee bugi bamʋ awura‐wʋrʋ bɛɛ yɩla kuwura‐gya mʋ asɛ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ,
66004011	“Anɛ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ yɛ anɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, fʋ dagaa fɛɛ ba sa fʋ bʋnyaa yɛ bɛɛrɛɛ, nɩɩ fʋ ɔlʋn dagaa fʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ fʋ ɩ tʋʋ kʋtɔ kʋmaa nɩmʋ, nɩɩ fʋ kebiti tɔ nɩɩ fʋ tʋʋ ɩnɩmʋ kpini, nɩɩ bamʋ kpini ba bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ba sʋ nkpa falɛ.”
66005001	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ n wu ɔwʋlɛ bɔɔsa kʋ maa bʋ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ kuwura‐gya mʋ sʋ kɩbaa gyisa tɔ. Nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ kɩmʋ ansi tɔ yɛ kamaa kpini, nɩɩ ba taa atɔ tarɩsa asunɔ tarɩ ɔwʋlɛ bɔɔsa mʋ kɔnɔ sʋ.
66005002	Nɩɩ n wu Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ ɔlʋnpʋ maa taa ɔbʋlɛ lala ee kuusi ɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ ɔ kyatɛ kʋtɔ tarɩsa mʋ, kɛ o bugi ɔwʋlɛ bɔɔsa mʋ tɔ?”
66005003	Amaa ɔkʋ man bʋ sʋsʋ abɛɛ kasɛ sʋ abɛɛ kasɛ tɔ, nɩɩ ɛɛ taalɛ bugi ɔwʋlɛ bɔɔsa mʋ tɔ abɛɛ ɔ taalɛ kɩɩ kɩmʋ tɔ.
66005004	Nɩɩ n su gaa, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔkʋ man bʋ tɔ nɩɩ ɔ dagaa fɛɛ o bugi ɔwʋlɛ bɔɔsa mʋ tɔ abɛɛ ɔ kɩɩ kɩmʋ tɔ.
66005005	Nɩɩ abɩlɩsa mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, “Man bɩla su! Kɩɩ, Gyuda kebunɔ nyɩmɩsa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Bɩranɛ, nɩɩ ɔ lɩɩ Dawidi kanaana kparɛ tɔ mʋ, ɔ kɔ gyii sʋ. Ɩmʋ sʋ ɛɛ taalɛ kyatɛ atɔ tarɩsa asunɔ mʋ, kɛ o bugi ɔwʋlɛ bɔɔsa mʋ.”
66005006	Nɩɩ n maa kɩɩ mʋ, n wu Kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ mʋ ɔbʋlɛ tɔ sʋ kɩlɔpanɛ fɛɛ ba maa taa mʋ waa saraga, maa yɩlɛ kuwura‐gya mʋ yɛ atɔ kɩɩsa ana mʋ yɛ abɩlɩsa mʋ nsana. Ɔ sʋ agyakpaa asunɔ yɛ ansi asunɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ Ɩbwaarɛ N‐yaayu nsunɔ mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sun bamʋ kpee dulinyaa tɔ katɩn kʋmaa mʋ.
66005007	Nɩɩ Kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ ba kɔɔlɛ ɔwʋlɛ bɔɔsa mʋ lɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ kuwura‐gya mʋ sʋ mʋ gyisa kɩbaa tɔ.
66005008	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kɔɔlɛ ɔwʋlɛ bɔɔsa mʋ, atɔ kɩɩsa ana mʋ yɛ abɩlɩsa adʋnyɔ yɛ ana mʋ ba muŋa Kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ bamʋ ɔkʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ adʋnlɛ yɛ suwa kalapɛ‐bi mʋ nɩɩ nlaa liifensa ɩ bɔla ɩmʋ mʋ, nɩɩ ɩ yɩlɛ sa Ɩbwaarɛ asa mʋ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ.
66005009	Nɩɩ atɔ kɩɩsa ana mʋ yɛ abɩlɩsa mʋ ba bɩɩ ɔlʋn pʋpwɛ sa Kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ yɛ, “Fʋ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ fʋ taa ɔwʋlɛ bɔɔsa mʋ, kɛ fʋ kyatɛ ɩmʋ ɩtarɛsa mʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ ba mɔɔ fʋ, nɩɩ fʋ taa fʋ nkalan mʋ sɔɔ asa sa Ɩbwaarɛ. Fʋ sɔɔ bamʋ lɩɩ nbunɔ kʋmaa tɔ yɛ ntɔwɛ kʋmaa tɔ, yɛ asa kʋmaa tɔ yɛ ndɛndɛmandɛ kʋmaa tɔ.
66005010	Nɩɩ fʋ taa bamʋ ba loo fu kuwura‐gyii mʋ tɔ, waa bamʋ aseepu kɛ be sun anɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, nɩɩ bee biti ba gyii kuwura kasɛ sʋ.”
66005011	Nɩɩ n bɩla kɩɩ, nɩɩ n nu Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ ngbɩn‐ngbɩn kudu ɩbʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ nyɩmɩsa mɛɛ taalɛ bɩɩ bamʋ kɔnɔ ba maa kyaabɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gya mʋ yɛ atɔ kɩɩsa ana mʋ yɛ abɩlɩsa mʋ.
66005012	Nɩɩ ba taa ɔbʋlɛ lala bɩɩ ɔlʋn yɛ, “Kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba mɔɔ mʋ, mʋ nɩɩ ɔlʋn yɛ atɔ kparɛ yɛ kanyaasɩn yɛ kuwura tɔ ɔlʋn yɛ bɛɛrɛɛ yɛ bʋnyaa yɛ ayɩn‐bi ɩ dagaa mʋ.”
66005013	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ n nu atɔ tʋʋsa kpini mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ sʋsʋ yɛ kasɛ sʋ yɛ kasɛ tɔ yɛ ɔpʋ tɔ, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ ɩmʋ kpini tɔ bɛɛ bɩɩ yɛ, “Ayɩn‐bi yɛ bɛɛrɛɛ yɛ bʋnyaa yɛ ɔlʋn, ɩ gyɛ sa ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ kuwura‐gya mʋ sʋ, yɛ Kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ kakpaa.”
66005014	Nɩɩ atɔ kɩɩsa ana mʋ ba tɔwɛ yɛ, “Amen.” Nɩɩ abɩlɩsa mʋ ba muŋa sun Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ Kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ.
66006001	N wu Kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ maa kyatɛ atɔ tarɩsa asunɔ mʋ tɔ kɩgyankpaasa mʋ. Nɩɩ n nu atɔ kɩɩsa ana mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ ɔbʋlɛ maa pʋntɛ fɛɛ bʋlayɩ, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, “Ba!”
66006002	N maa kɩɩ mʋ n wu gbaŋɛ fufuli! Nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee dii mʋ mʋ sʋ kɩtaa, nɩɩ ba sa mʋ kuwura‐wʋrʋ, nɩɩ o dii fɛɛ ɔkɔ‐gyisapu mʋ nɩɩ ee kpee ɔ naa kɔ gyii sʋ.
66006003	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ kyatɛ kʋtɔ tarɩsa nyɔsapʋ mʋ, n nu kʋtɔ kɩɩsa nyɔsapʋ mʋ maa tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, “Ba!”
66006004	Nɩɩ gbaŋɛ kʋ bɩla lɩɩ ba, ɔ gyɛ ɔpɩpɛɛ nɩn. Nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee dii mʋ mʋ, ba sa mʋ ɔlʋn yɛ ɔ lɛɛ kayɩɩ yuuli lɩɩ kasɛ sʋ, kɛ asa ba mɔɔ abaa. Nɩɩ ba sa mʋ sakunde lala kʋ.
66006005	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ kyatɛ kʋtɔ tarɩsa sasapʋ mʋ, n nu kʋtɔ kɩɩsa sasapʋ mʋ maa tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ba!” N maa kɩɩ tʋtɔ mʋ n wu gbaŋɛ lenbiri maa yɩlɛ, nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee dii mʋ mʋ sʋ kɩbɩlɩtɔ kaalasa mʋ kɩbaa tɔ.
66006006	Nɩɩ n nu ɔbʋlɛ kʋ maa tɔwɛ lɩɩ atɔ kɩɩsa ana mʋ asɛ yɛ, “Ayu mudu ii biti ɩ waa ɔgyalɩn, kɛ ɩmʋ kɩgya ii biti ɩ waa kakɛ kʋlʋn kusun kʋkɔka nɩɩ akyembee mɔɔ imuduu ɩsa kɩgya ii biti ɩ waa kakɛ kʋlʋn kusun kʋkɔka, amaa fan man kan nyita nfɔ yɛ nta!”
66006007	Kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ maa kyatɛ kʋtɔ tarɩsa nasapʋ mʋ, n nu kʋtɔ kɩɩsa nasapʋ mʋ ɔbʋlɛ maa tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ba!”
66006008	N maa kɩɩ tʋtɔ mʋ nɩɩ n wu gbaŋɛ mʋ nɩɩ mʋ ifuu ɩ du fɛɛ ndaara mʋ, maa yɩlɛ, nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ee dii mʋ mʋ, bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Lewu, yɛgɛ kamandɛ mɔɔ buu mʋ kamaa. Ba sa bamʋ ɔlʋn yɛ ba mɔɔ kasɛ sʋ asa nbarɩgɛ tɔ ntun nna mʋ tɔ kʋkʋlʋn. Ɩkɔ yɛ akʋn yɛ alɔ yɛ kasɛ sʋ ndʋnbwɛ nɩɩ bee biti ba taa mɔɔ bamʋ.
66006009	Saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ kyatɛ kʋtɔ tarɩsa nusapʋ mʋ, asa mʋ nɩɩ ba mɔɔ bamʋ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ katɔwɛ sʋ, yɛ kɩtɔwɛ asɩn danbɩrasa mʋ lɩɩ Yesu Krisito sʋ mʋ, n wu bamʋ kala ana ba maa bʋ Ɩbwaarɛ saraga kaswɩɩ mʋ ɔpɩɩ tɔ.
66006010	Nɩɩ ba kuusi kenken tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Owura lala, Ɔkyɩrɛkyɩrɛpʋ yɛ kesintin wuya, saŋa mɔɔ nɩɩ fii biti fu gyoo naa fʋʋ, pɔyɩ kɛ fʋ talɛ, kɛ fʋ bɩɩtɛ kasɛ sʋ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba mɔɔ anɛ mʋ asʋ”
66006011	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa akaala mʋ ɩbalɩmasʋ fufuli, nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan nyɛ kenyiita saŋa gbɛrɛɛ tii sʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ, fanɛ bɩrɩsa ana Krisito kusun awaapʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ asa ba mɔɔ bamʋ fɛɛ fanɛ mʋ, kɔnɔ ɔ fʋʋ pɔyɩ.”
66006012	N maa kɩɩ mʋ Kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ kyatɛ kʋtɔ tarɩsa siyesapʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ kasɛ ki gyingyen ɔlʋn sʋ, nɩɩ kyɔwɛ biliŋi kitentenbiri tumm fɛɛ kɩtaa lenbiri. Nɩɩ ɔbwaayɩ payɩ kɔɔ fɛɛ nkalan.
66006013	Nɩɩ akyikpebi a lɩɩ sʋsʋ tɩyɛ kasɛ fɛɛ afuu bʋlʋnsa ɩ da nɩɩ ɩ yɩyaa figi abi ɩ lɩɩ tɩyɛ mʋ.
66006014	Nɩɩ sʋsʋ nyaa fɛɛ kalan nɩɩ ba bɔɔ mʋ. Nɩɩ abɩɩ yɛ afintin kpini ɩ bɩɩtɛ lɩɩ ɩmʋ ipula.
66006015	Nɩɩ kasɛ sʋ awura yɛ asa kparɛ, yɛ anaakɔpʋ abɩlɩsa yɛ afulee wuya ana, yɛ alʋnpʋ yɛ anyɛ kpini, yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ bamʋ abaa sʋ kpini, ba sɩlɛ naa baala afʋlɛ ɩbɔ tɔ, yɛ afʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ abɩɩ sʋ mʋ tɔ.
66006016	Nɩɩ ba tɔwɛ abɩɩ yɛ afʋlɛ mʋ yɛ, “Fan tɩyɛ anɛ sʋ baala anɛ lɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ kuwura‐gya mʋ sʋ ansi sʋ yɛ Kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ agbʋ lala sʋ.”
66006017	Lɩɩ fɛɛ bamʋ agbʋ kakɛ lala mʋ kɩ fʋʋ, nɩɩ anɩmʋ ɩ taalɛ yɩlɛ?
66007001	Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ, n wu Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ ana, ba maa yɩlɛ kasɛ sʋ abaafʋn ntun nna ba kɩtaa abaafʋn ana afuu, kɛ ɩ man nyɛ funti kasɛ sʋ abɛɛ ɔpʋ sʋ abɛɛ iyu.
66007002	Nɩɩ n bɩla wu kabɔɔ kʋ maa lɩɩ kyɔwɛ ɔlɩɩkpa ɛɛ ba sʋsʋ, yɛgɛ ɔ sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ tɔ kakpaa mʋ kʋtɔ duligisa. Nɩɩ ɔ taa ɔbʋlɛ lala kuusi tɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ ana mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa bamʋ ɔlʋn yɛ ba nyita kasɛ yɛ ɔpʋ mʋ.
66007003	Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan man nyita kasɛ abɛɛ ɔpʋ abɛɛ iyu, amɔɔ an duligi anɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asunpu bamʋ asɩkpɩɩ sʋ pɔyɩ.”
66007004	Nɩɩ n nu asa mʋ nɩɩ ba duligi bamʋ mʋ kɔnɔ. Ba bʋ ngbɩn kɩlɩfa yɛ adɩna yɛ ana lɩɩ Ɩsɩrayɩ nbunɔ kudu anyɔ mʋ kpini tɔ.
66007005	Gyuda kebunɔ tɔ asa ba bʋ ngbɩn kudu anyɔ. Nɩɩ Ruben kebunɔ tɔ asa ba bʋ ngbɩn kudu anyɔ. Nɩɩ Gadi kebunɔ tɔ asa ba bʋ ngbɩn kudu anyɔ.
66007006	Nɩɩ Asa kebunɔ tɔ asa ba bʋ ngbɩn kudu anyɔ. Nafitali kebunɔ tɔ asa ba bʋ ngbɩn kudu anyɔ. Manase kebunɔ tɔ asa ba bʋ ngbɩn kudu anyɔ.
66007007	Simeyon kebunɔ tɔ asa ba bʋ ngbɩn kudu anyɔ. Lewi kebunɔ tɔ asa ba bʋ ngbɩn kudu anyɔ. Isaki kebunɔ tɔ asa ba bʋ ngbɩn kudu anyɔ.
66007008	Sebulun kebunɔ tɔ ba bʋ asa ngbɩn kudu anyɔ. Gyosefu kebunɔ tɔ ba bʋ asa ngbɩn kudu anyɔ. Bengyamin kebunɔ tɔ ba bʋ asa ngbɩn kudu anyɔ.
66007009	Ɩnɩmʋ kamaa mʋ n wu sakyɔ damantɛ kʋ, nɩɩ ɔkʋ mɛɛ taalɛ karagɛ bamʋ. Ba lɩɩ ndɛndɛmandɛ yɛ nbunɔ kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ yɛ asa kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ yɛ ntɔwɛ kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ ba yɩlɛ kuwura‐gya mʋ yɛ Kabʋlʋpʋ mu ansi tɔ. Ba bun ɩbalɩmasʋ fufuli yɛgɛ ba sʋ abalaafa bamʋ abaa tɔ.
66007010	Nɩɩ ba taa ɔbʋlɛ lala bee kuusi bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Kamɔlɩgɛ gyɛ anɛ Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ kuwura‐gya sʋ mʋ yɛ Kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ lɛɛ.”
66007011	Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ mʋ kpini ba yɩlɛ kyaabɔɔ kuwura‐gya mʋ yɛ abɩlɩsa mʋ yɛ atɔ‐kɩɩsa ana mʋ. Nɩɩ ba muŋa taa bamʋ ansi bun kasɛ kuwura‐gya mu ansi tɔ, nɩɩ ba sun Ɩbwaarɛ,
66007012	bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Amen! Ayɩn‐bi yɛ bʋnyaa yɛ kanyaasɩn yɛ afwaala yɛ bɛɛrɛɛ yɛ kɩtɩɩ kɩnyɛ yɛ ɔlʋn ɩ gyɛ anɛ Ɩbwaarɛ lɛɛ kakpaa‐kakpaa! Amen!”
66007013	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ abɩlɩsa mʋ tɔ ɔkʋ taasɛ mɛ yɛ, “Nɩɩ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bun ɩbalɩmasʋ fufuli nɩmʋ mʋ, anɩmʋ ana nɩn? Nɩɩ fɩnɛ nɩɩ ba lɩɩ?”
66007014	Nɩɩ n lɛɛ mʋ kɔnɔ yɛ, “Ɔbɩlɩsa, fu i nyi.” Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, “Bamʋ ɩ gyɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba lɩɩ awʋrʋfɔ lala mʋ kigyii tɔ, nɩɩ ba fwɩɩ bamʋ ɩkaalɛ Kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ nkalan tɔ, nɩɩ i fuuli mʋ.
66007015	Ɩmʋ sʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gya mu ansi tɔ, nɩɩ bee sun mʋ kakyʋwapɛ yɛ kagyanbwɛ mʋ osunkpa obu lala mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ tɛ kuwura‐gya mʋ sʋ mʋ, ee biti ɔ baa ɔ bʋ bamʋ asɛ kɛ o kun bamʋ.
66007016	Nɩɩ akʋn man bɩla yɛ ɔ kɩtaa bamʋ, nɩɩ bʋlɩfɔ man bɩla yɛ ɔ kɩtaa bamʋ. Nɩɩ kyɔwɛ man bɩla yɛ ɔ da bamʋ, nɩɩ awulawula man bɩla yɛ ii wiili bamʋ.
66007017	Lɩɩ fɛɛ Kabʋlʋpʋ‐bi mʋ nɩɩ ɔ yɩlɛ kuwura‐gya mʋ nsana mʋ ii biti ɔ baa ɔ gyɛ bamʋ ɔkpapʋ. Kɛ o kpiya bamʋ ɔbʋn kumu mʋ nɩɩ kɩ sʋ nkpa nkyu mʋ asɛ. Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ii biti ɔ kpayɛ ansikyu kʋmaa lɩɩ bamʋ ansi tɔ.”
66008001	Kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ maa kyatɛ kʋtɔ tarɩsa sunɔsapʋ mʋ, nɩɩ sʋsʋ waa surum fɛɛ kerefi kʋlʋn kɩbaafʋn.
66008002	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ n wu Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ asunɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ, nɩɩ ba taa nbɩlɛ nsunɔ ba sa bamʋ.
66008003	Nɩɩ n wu Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ kʋ maa sʋ suwa kalapɛ‐bi nɩɩ ɔ ba yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kaswɩɩ asɛ. Nɩɩ ba taa atɔ liifensa kʋkyɔ sa mʋ kɛ ɔ taa bʋga yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asa mʋ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ sʋ, taa ba suwa kaswɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kuwura‐gya mu ansi tɔ mʋ, kɛ o tuwa sa Ɩbwaarɛ.
66008004	Kɛ atɔ liifensa mʋ nɩɩ ba tuwa mʋ idiisii, taa bʋga yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asa mʋ kabwaarɛ‐kʋlɛ mʋ, ɩ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ abaa tɔ kpee sʋsʋ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ.
66008005	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ taa suwa kalapɛ‐bi mʋ, nɩɩ ɔ nyɔ fʋlɔn lɩɩ suwa kaswɩɩ mʋ sʋ bɔla suwa kalapɛ‐bi mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ tʋʋ ɩmʋ wʋrɩgɛ kasɛ sʋ, nɩɩ bʋlayɩ kpira nɩɩ o kpira, ɔlanba ɩ waa, nɩɩ bʋlayɩ wɛɛ ɩsɛɛ nɩɩ kasɛ gyingyen.
66008006	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ asunɔ mʋ nɩɩ ba sʋ nbɩlɛ mʋ ba kʋʋla bamʋ n‐yɩɩ ba fʋlɛ nbɩlɛ mʋ.
66008007	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ gyankpaasa mʋ fʋlɛ mʋ kabɩlɛ. Nɩɩ n wu bʋlayɩ abuu yɛ fʋlɔn ɩ maa kyagɩlɛ yɛ nkalan lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba wʋrɩgɛ kasɛ sʋ. Nɩɩ kasɛ nbarɩgɛ tɔ ntun nsa ɩmʋ tɔ ketun kʋlʋn kɩ dɩyɛ, nɩɩ iyu gbaa nbarɩgɛ tɔ ntun nsa mʋ tɔ ketun kʋlʋn gbaa dɩyɛ, nɩɩ afitiri bunboli mʋ kpini gbaa ɩ dɩyɛ.
66008008	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ nyɔsapʋ mʋ fʋlɛ mʋ kabɩlɛ. Nɩɩ ba tʋʋ kʋtɔ kʋ fɛɛ kɩbɩɩ lala mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ dɩyɛ yen‐yen waa ɔpʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔpʋ mʋ tɔ nbarɩgɛ tɔ ntun nsa ɩmʋ tɔ ketun kʋlʋn biliŋi nkalan.
66008009	Nɩɩ atɔ tʋʋsa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ ɔpʋ mʋ tɔ nbarɩgɛ tɔ ntun nsa mʋ tɔ ketun kʋlʋn ba wu, nɩɩ ɩkʋlɩ lala mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ ɔpʋ mʋ tɔ nbarɩgɛ tɔ ntun nsa mʋ tɔ ketun kʋlʋn i nyita.
66008010	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ sasapʋ mʋ fʋlɛ mʋ kabɩlɛ. Nɩɩ kikyikpebi lala mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ dɩyɛ fɛɛ ɔgyaa ba tɩyɛ ɩbʋn amu‐amu yɛ atiribo mʋ tɔ nbarɩgɛ tɔ ntun nsa ketun kʋlʋn tɔ.
66008011	Kikyikpebi mʋ kɩtɩɩ ɩ gyɛ yɛ Ɔlɩlɩ. Nɩɩ nkyu mʋ nbarɩgɛ tɔ ntun nsa mʋ tɔ ketun kʋlʋn ɩ bʋlɩlɩ. Nɩɩ asa gaalaagaa ba nuu nkyu mʋ, nɩɩ ba wu‐wu, lɩɩ fɛɛ nkyu mʋ ɩ bʋlɩlɩ.
66008012	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ nasapʋ mʋ fʋlɛ mʋ kabɩlɛ. Nɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ kyɔwɛ daa ɔ kɩɩ tɔ mʋ, kakɛ tɔ nbarɩgɛ tɔ ntun nsa tɔ mʋ, ketun kʋlʋn ki biliŋi kitentenbiri. Nɩɩ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔbwaayɩ yɛ akyikpebi ɩ daa ɩ kɩɩ tɔ mʋ, kagyanbwɛ nbarɩgɛ tɔ ntun nsa tɔ mʋ, ketun kʋlʋn biliŋi kitentenbiri.
66008013	Nɩɩ n maa kɩɩ mʋ, n nu kpaakpaatɛ maa fugi sʋsʋ afuu tɔ ee su kenken yɛ, “Asa mʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba sii kasɛ sʋ, naa fʋʋ saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ nbɔɔ nsa mʋ nɩɩ ba san mʋ, ba ba fʋlɛ bamʋ nbɩlɛ mʋ, bamʋ laakʋ ɩlɩɩ ɩsa!”
66009001	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ nusapʋ mʋ fʋlɛ mʋ kabɩlɛ, nɩɩ n wu kikyikpebi mʋ nɩɩ kɩ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba tɩyɛ kasɛ sʋ mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔkʋ taa ɔbɔ bunkyinsa lala mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ ɔkaa mʋ kebunɔ saafɩɩ sa mʋ.
66009002	Maa tigi ɔbɔ bunkyinsa lala mʋ, idiisii ɩ lɩɩ kɩmʋ tɔ fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɩ lɩɩ bodobodo obu lala tɔ mʋ, nɩɩ idiisii ɩ yɛgɛ nɩɩ kyɔwɛ yɛ sʋsʋ waa kitentenbiri.
66009003	Nɩɩ ntuntunbi ba lɩɩ idiisii mʋ tɔ ba kasɛ sʋ, nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa bamʋ ɔlʋn mʋ nɩɩ ba taa dun fɛɛ kasɛ sʋ kyankpatɩ lɛɛ mʋ.
66009004	Ba tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ ba man kan mata kasɛ sʋ afitiri abɛɛ atɔ duusa abɛɛ iyu, amaa ba nyanla bamʋ nɩɩ ba man sʋ Ɩbwaarɛ kakyʋlɛ bamʋ asɩkpɩɩ sʋ mʋ.
66009005	Ba man sa ntuntunbi mʋ ɔkpa yɛ ba mɔɔ asa, amaa ba sa ba mʋ ɔkpa yɛ ba nyanla bamʋ ɩbwaayɩ inuu. Nɩɩ ntuntunbi mʋ kudun ɩɩ kɔ fɛɛ kyankpatɩ maa dun nyɩmɩsa mʋ.
66009006	Kanɩn ɩbwaayɩ maŋa tɔ mʋ asa maŋa bee biti ba biti lewu, amaa ba mɛɛ yɛ ba nyɛ lewu mʋ. Bee biti fɛɛ ba wu gbaa, amaa ba mɛɛ yɛ ba wu.
66009007	Ntuntunbi mʋ ba du nɩn fɛɛ ɩgbaŋɛ mʋ nɩɩ ba kʋʋla bamʋ bee kpee ɩkɔ. Ba bun atɔ kʋ fɛɛ suwa awura‐wʋrʋ bamʋ amu tɔ nɩɩ bamʋ ansi tɔ i du fɛɛ asa ansi.
66009008	Bamʋ inyini i du nɩn fɛɛ akyɩɩ inyini, nɩɩ bamʋ anyi i du fɛɛ barɩnɛ anyi mʋ.
66009009	Ba sʋ atɔ kʋ fɛɛ abɩlɩtɔ panpasan kun bamʋ kɔkɔlɔ sʋ, nɩɩ ba maa fugi mʋ bamʋ abanbantɛ tɔ mʋ ɩlawʋ i du fɛɛ abɩlɩtɔ itoroko damantɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɩgbaŋɛ bɛɛ bɩɩtɛ ba sɩlɛ bee kpee ɩkɔ tɔ.
66009010	Ba sʋ ɩpɩɩ nɩɩ bee duŋi fɛɛ ɩkyankpatɛ, nɩɩ bamʋ ɩpɩɩ mʋ tɔ nɩɩ ba sʋ ɔlʋn bɛɛ nyanla asa ɩbwaayɩ inuu mʋ.
66009011	Ba sʋ owura mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ kɩɩ bamʋ sʋ, nɩɩ mʋ ɩ gyɛ ɔbɔ bunkyinsa lala mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ ɔkaa mʋ kabɔɔ. Nɩɩ Hibriwu katɔwɛ tɔ mʋ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Abadon, nɩɩ Giriki katɔwɛ tɔ mʋ bɛɛ tɩɩ mʋ yɛ Apoliyon. Mʋ kɩtɩɩ mʋ kasɛ ɩ gyɛ onyitapu.
66009012	Gyerebi gyankpaasa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ sʋ kufuu mʋ kyʋn. Amaa gyerebi ntun nnyɔ sʋ ɩ bʋ ɔkpa ɩɩ ba.
66009013	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ siyesapʋ fʋlɛ mʋ kabɩlɛ, nɩɩ n nu ɔbʋlɛ kʋ maa lɩɩ suwa kaswɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ nbɔntɔnbʋlɔn ana tɔ.
66009014	Nɩɩ ɔbʋlɛ mʋ tɔwɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ siyesapʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kabɩlɛ mʋ yɛ, “Saŋɛ nbɔɔ nna mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ ŋmina bamʋ yɩla ɔbʋn lala Gyufereti asɛ mʋ.”
66009015	Nɩɩ ɔ saŋɛ nbɔɔ nna maŋa, mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɔŋɔ bamʋ yɩla sa saŋa nɩmʋ yɛ kakɛ nɩmʋ yɛ ɔbwaayɩ nɩmʋ yɛ kesu nɩmʋ, yɛ ba mɔɔ kasɛ sʋ asa nbarɩgɛ tɔ ntun nsa mʋ tɔ ketun kʋlʋn.
66009016	Nɩɩ n nu anaakɔpʋ mʋ kɔnɔ. Ba gyɛ ngbɩn kudu‐kudu kanɩn kudu kanɩn anyɔ (mɩlɩyɔn alɩfa anyɔ abɛɛ 200,000,000).
66009017	Mɛ ansi sʋ kɩlɛɛkaapʋ mʋ tɔ mʋ, n wu ɩgbaŋɛ yɛ bamʋ adiipu. Nɩɩ adiipu mʋ ba sʋ abɩlɩtɔ panpasan kunsa bamʋ nkɔlɔ sʋ. Nɩɩ ɩɩ payɩ fɛɛ fʋlɔn, nɩɩ i du fɛɛ buluu, nɩɩ kɩ bɩla ki du fɛɛ kɩkyʋn‐nyufo. Ɩgbɛŋɛ mʋ amu i du nɩn fɛɛ abɩranɛ amu, nɩɩ fʋlɔn yɛ idiisii yɛ ferinwuta ɩɩ lɩɩ bamʋ nnɔ tɔ.
66009018	Kanɩn gyerebi atɔ asá mʋ nɩɩ ɩ gyɛ fʋlɔn yɛ idiisii yɛ ferinwuta nɩmʋ ɩ mɔɔ asa nbarɩgɛ tɔ ntun nsa mʋ tɔ ketun kʋlʋn.
66009019	Ɩgbaŋɛ mʋ ɔlʋn bʋ bamʋ nnɔ tɔ yɛ bamʋ ndufa tɔ. Bamʋ ndufa i du nɩn fɛɛ anansɛ, nɩɩ ɩ sʋ amu nɩɩ ba sʋ bee gyii gyerebi.
66009020	Asa mʋ nɩɩ ba san kasɛ sʋ, nɩɩ gyerebi atɔ nɩmʋ gbaa ɩ man mɔɔ bamʋ mʋ, ba man yɛgɛ alibi kɩwaa. Nɩɩ nbwɩɩ libi abɛɛ ɩdakpa mʋ nɩɩ ba taa suwa abɛɛ gbiti abɛɛ kɩtasan abɛɛ abuu abɛɛ iyu mʋ, ba man yɛgɛ ɩmʋ kusun. Bamʋ ɩdakpa maŋa ɩ man kɩɩ, nɩɩ i mee nu, nɩɩ ɩ mɛɛ natɛ.
66009021	Nɩɩ ba man yɛgɛ asa kɩmɔɔ, yɛ afɛ kʋtʋʋ yɛ akpa‐sɩn, yɛ kɩgyagaa kakyɩɩ yɛ kanyɩn biti yɛ keyu tɔ.
66010001	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ n bɩla wu Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ ɔlʋlʋnpʋ kʋ maa kpɩlɩgɛ lɩɩ sʋsʋ ɛɛ ba kasɛ sʋ. Nɩɩ abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ a bun mʋ fɛɛ atɔ bunsa, nɩɩ okyimale kyaabɔɔ mu kumu. Nɩɩ mu ansi i du fɛɛ kyɔwɛ, nɩɩ mʋ ayaa i du fɛɛ sabarɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ dɛɛ fʋlɔn.
66010002	Nɩɩ ɔ sʋ kawʋlɛ‐bi mʋ nɩɩ ki bugi kɩ bʋ mʋ kɩbaa tɔ. Ɔ taa mʋ gyisa kɩyaa yii ɔpʋ sʋ nɩɩ ɔ taa mʋ bɩna kɩyaa yii kasɛ sʋ.
66010003	Nɩɩ ɔ pʋntɛ kenken fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ bɩranɛ muusi mʋ. Maa pʋntɛ kanɩn mʋ bʋlayɩ kikpira asunɔ mʋ kyula sʋ.
66010004	Bʋlayɩ kikpira asunɔ maa tɔwɛ mʋ, nɩɩ n biti n kyʋrɔɔ. Amaa n nu ɔbʋlɛ kʋ maa tɔwɛ lɩɩ sʋsʋ yɛ, “Taa asɩn mʋ nɩɩ fu nu lɩɩ bʋlayɩ kikpira asunɔ mʋ tɔ mʋ waa asiiri tɔ, man kyʋrɔɔ asɩn mʋ yɩla!”
66010005	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ n wu maa yɩlɛ ɔpʋ sʋ yɛ kasɛ sʋ mʋ, kʋsaa mʋ gyisa kɩbaa sʋsʋ.
66010006	Nɩɩ ɔ taa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ tɔ kakpaa, nɩɩ ɔ tʋʋ sʋsʋ yɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ kɩmʋ tɔ, yɛ kasɛ yɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ kɩmʋ tɔ, yɛ ɔpʋ yɛ kʋtɔ kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ kɩmʋ tɔ, bɔ ntan tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɩbwaarɛ man bɩla yɛ o gyoo!”
66010007	Amaa saŋa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ sunɔsapʋ mʋ ii biti ɔ fʋlɛ mʋ kabɩlɛ mʋ, kanɩn saŋa maŋa nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn baalasa mʋ ii biti ɩ ba tɔ, fɛɛ kanan mʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla tɔwɛ sa mʋ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ mʋ ayaafɔlɛ mʋ.
66010008	Nɩɩ ɔbʋlɛ mʋ nɩɩ n nu lɩɩ sʋsʋ mʋ bɩla tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, “Kpe naa kɔɔlɛ kawʋlɛ‐bi bɔɔsa mʋ nɩɩ ki bugi mʋ, lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ yɩlɛ ɔpʋ sʋ yɛ kasɛ sʋ mʋ kɩbaa gyisa tɔ.”
66010009	Ɩmʋ sʋ n kpee Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ asɛ naa tɔwɛ mʋ yɛ, “Taa kawʋlɛ‐bi mʋ nɩɩ fʋ sʋ mʋ sa mɛ.” Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, “Kɔɔlɛ, kɛ fʋ wɛ kɩmʋ. Kii biti kɩ baa kɩ bʋkɔn fʋ kɔnɔ tɔ fɛɛ ŋmasan, amaa fʋ ɔtɔ tɔ bɩrɛ kii biti kɩ baa kɩ bʋlɩlɩ kɩtɛ‐kɩtɛ.”
66010010	Nɩɩ n kɔɔlɛ kawʋlɛ‐bi mʋ lɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ mʋ kɩba tɔ, nɩɩ n wɛ kɩmʋ. Kɩ waa mɛ kɔnɔ tɔ ɔkɔn fɛɛ ŋmasan mʋ, amaa n maa wɛ kɩmʋ lʋwɛ mʋ, mɛ ɔtɔ tɔ waa mɛ ɔlɩlɩ.
66010011	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, “Ɩ dagaa fʋ maa kyaga sʋ fɩɩ tɔwɛ atɔ mʋ nɩɩ ii biti ɩ ba asa gaalaagaa sʋ yɛ ndɛndɛmandɛ sʋ yɛ ntɔwɛ kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ sʋ yɛ awura sʋ mʋ.”
66011001	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ ɔkʋ taa oyu kaalasa nɩɩ ki du fɛɛ kikpebi mʋ sa mɛ. Nɩɩ ɔ tɔwɛ mɛ yɛ, “Kʋsʋ kɛ fʋ naa kaala mɛ, Ɩbwaarɛ mi osunkpa ayɛ mʋ yɛ mɛ kaswɩɩ mʋ, kɛ fʋ kalɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ kɩmʋ tɔ bee sun mɛ mʋ kpini.
66011002	Amaa yɛgɛ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ kasɔrɔga opula mʋ yɩla, man kaala tʋtɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ mɛ ɩ taa tʋtɔ sa bamʋ nɩɩ ba man gyɛ mɛ asa. Nɩɩ bee biti ba ba kɔ kɔɔlɛ mɛ kadɛ mʋ ɩbwaayɩ adɩna yɛ anyɔ.
66011003	Nɩɩ n biti n sa mɛ kesintin agyipu anyɔ mʋ ɔlʋn, kɛ ba taa nkɛ kagbɩn kʋlʋn yɛ anyɔ yɛ adisiye tɔwɛ mɛ asɩn, yɛgɛ ba bun kensi payɩ atɔ bunsa, mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ kaapʋ fɛɛ asɩn ɩ basa bamʋ.”
66011004	Falɛ kesintin agyipu anyɔ anɩmʋ ɩ gyɛ olifu iyu ɩnyɔ yɛ ɩfɩtɩla ɩgyagakpa ɩnyɔ mʋ. Anyɩn anyɔ banɩmʋ ɩ yɩlɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ kasɛ wuya ansi tɔ.
66011005	Nɩɩ ɔdʋn kʋ kan ii biti ɔ tɔɔrɔɔ Ɩbwaarɛ kesintin agyipu anyɔ banɩmʋ mʋ, fʋlɔn ii biti ɔ lɩɩ bamʋ nnɔ tɔ ba dɩyɛ mʋ. Falɛ nɩɩ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ tɔɔrɔɔ bamʋ mʋ, ii biti o wu.
66011006	Anyɩn anyɔ banɩmʋ ba sʋ ɔlʋn ba taalɛ kɩtaa bʋlayɩ sʋsʋ, kɛ ɔ man bɩla da saŋa mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɔwɛ abwaarɛsɩn mʋ. Nɩɩ ba sʋ ɔlʋn ba taalɛ yɛgɛ nkyu ii biliŋi nkalan, nɩɩ ba bɩla ba sʋ ɔlʋn ba tɩɩ gyerebi ba tʋʋ kasɛ sʋ saŋa kʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ bee biti.
66011007	Nɩɩ ba kan lʋwɛ bamʋ abwaarɛsɩn kɩtɔwɛ mʋ, kadʋnbwɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ lɩɩ ɔbɔ bunkyinsa lala mʋ nɩɩ kɩ man sʋ ɔkaa mʋ tɔ mʋ, ee biti ɔ ba kɔ yɛ bamʋ, taalɛ bamʋ kɛ ɔ mɔɔ bamʋ.
66011008	Kɛ bamʋ abuni ɩ baa ɩ dɛ kadɛ lala mʋ kigbenbi sʋ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba da bamʋ‐Nyɩrɩpɛ Yesu oyu laasa sʋ mʋ. Kɩŋasan tɔ mʋ bɛɛ tɩɩ kadɛ lala nɩmʋ yɛ Sodom abɛɛ Egyipiti.
66011009	Asa kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ yɛ ndɛndɛmandɛ yɛ ntɔwɛ kʋkwɩɩ‐kʋkwɩɩ yɛ ɔsʋwʋlɛ sʋ asa kpini bee biti ba ba yɩlɛ kɩɩ bamʋ abuni mʋ nkɛ nsa yɛ kɩdɩyɛ, nɩɩ ba mɛɛ yɛ be kyula kɛ ɔkʋ o pula bamʋ.
66011010	Atɔwɛpʋ anyɔ maŋa lewu ii biti ɔ waa asa mʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ kasɛ sʋ mʋ kpini ɔkɔn, kɛ ba gyii bamʋ ansi kɛ ba kɛɛ abaa atɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ kanɩn Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ anyɔ maŋa ba yɛgɛ nɩɩ asa ba gyii awʋrʋfɔ kasɛ sʋ gaa.
66011011	Amaa nkɛ nsa yɛ kɩdɩyɛ kamaa mʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ nkpa ɔfʋʋtɛ ba loo bamʋ tɔ, nɩɩ ba kyiŋi kʋsʋ yɩlɛ bamʋ ayaa sʋ. Tʋtɔ mʋ, kufuu kɩ kɩtaa asa mʋ nɩɩ ba wu bamʋ mʋ.
66011012	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ atɔwɛpʋ anyɔ mʋ ba nu ɔbʋlɛ lala kʋ lɩɩ sʋsʋ tɔwɛ bamʋ yɛ, “Fan dii ba sʋsʋ nfɩɩ.” Nɩɩ ba bɔla abwaarɛ‐wʋlɛ tɔ dii kpee sʋsʋ yɛgɛ bamʋ dʋn ana ba kɩɩ bamʋ.
66011013	Kanɩn opula maŋa tɔ nɩɩ kasɛ ki gyingyen, nɩɩ kadɛ mʋ tɔ nbarɩgɛ tɔ kudu mʋ tɔ ketun kʋlʋn boyi tɩyɛ. Nɩɩ kanɩn kasɛ kigyingyen maŋa mɔɔ asa ngbɩn nsunɔ. Nɩɩ kufuu kɩ kɩtaa bamʋ nɩɩ ba nyɛ nkpa mʋ, nɩɩ ba taa bʋnyaa sa Ɩbwaarɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ.
66011014	Gyerebi nyɔsapʋ mʋ kyʋn nɩɩ gyerebi sasapʋ mɔɔ bʋ ɔkpa sʋ ɛɛ ba bilen.
66011015	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ sunɔsapʋ mʋ fʋlɛ mʋ kabɩlɛ, nɩɩ ɩbʋlɛ damantɛ kʋ ii tɔwɛ kenken lɩɩ sʋsʋ yɛ, “Kasɛ sʋ kuwura‐gyii ki biliŋi anɛ Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ yɛ Ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ wʋla lɛɛ mʋ lɛɛ, nɩɩ ee biti o gyii kuwura kakpaa.”
66011016	Abɩlɩsa adʋnyɔ yɛ ana mʋ nɩɩ ba tɛ bamʋ awuragya sʋ, Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ mʋ kpini ba muŋa, taa bamʋ ansi bun kasɛ sun Ɩbwaarɛ,
66011017	bɛɛ tɔwɛ yɛ, “Ɔnyɩrɩpɛ Ɩbwaarɛ, Ɔlʋlʋnpʋ, an sʋ afwaala an sa fʋ, fɛɛ fʋ maa taa fʋ ɔlʋn lala mʋ nɩɩ fu piili fii gyii kuwura.
66011018	Kasɛ sʋ asa mʋ nɩɩ be mee sun fʋ mʋ ba nyɛ agbʋ, amaa nbɩɩnbɩɩ fʋ agbʋ mʋ ba. Saŋa fʋ fɛɛ fʋ talɛ alewupu, kɛ fʋ ka fʋ atɔwɛpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba gyɛ fʋ ayaafɔlɛ kʋkɔ, yɛ fʋ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba sɩlɛ fʋ kɩtɩɩ mʋ, asa kparɛ yɛ bamʋ nɩɩ ba san kpini. Saŋa mʋ fʋʋ fɛɛ fu nyita bamʋ nɩɩ bee nyita kasɛ mʋ.”
66011019	Nɩɩ kabwaarɛ‐sunkpa ayɛ mʋ nɩɩ kɩ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ ki bugi, nɩɩ n wu Ɩbwaarɛ maa asa nsana katɔwɛ kyula kɩdakaa mʋ maa bʋ obu lala mʋ tɔ. Nɩɩ n wu bʋlayɩ maa wɛɛ ɩsɛɛ nɩɩ ɩ sʋ ɔlanba yɛgɛ ɩɩ pʋntɛ, nɩɩ kasɛ ki gyingyen, nɩɩ bʋlayɩ abuu ɩ lɩɩ tɩyɛ gaa.
66012001	N wu sɩnkaala yɛ adangana lala kʋ maa lɛɛ ɩmʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ sʋsʋ. N wu ɔkyɩɩ maa bun kyɔwɛ fɛɛ atɔ bunsa, nɩɩ ɔbwaayɩ bʋ mʋ ayaa kasɛ, nɩɩ o bun kuwura‐wʋrʋ mʋ nɩɩ akyikpebi kudu anyɔ ɩɩ maa kɩmʋ sʋ.
66012002	Ɔ sʋ ɔtɔ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ kʋʋgɛ. Nɩɩ keduŋidi mʋ maa kɔ mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ sawʋ kenken.
66012003	Nɩɩ n bɩla bwii wu sɩnkaala kʋ maa lɛɛ ɩmʋ n‐yɩɩ kaapʋ sʋsʋ. N wu kɩnansɛ pɩpɛɛ dansa kʋ, nɩɩ ɔ sʋ amu asunɔ yɛ agyakpaa kudu nɩɩ o bun awura‐wʋrʋ asunɔ amu mʋ sʋ.
66012004	Nɩɩ mʋ ɔpɩɩ bɩɩtɛ akyikpebi mʋ nɩɩ ɩ bʋ sʋsʋ mʋ nbarɩgɛ tɔ ntun nsa mʋ ketun kʋlʋn ba tʋʋ kasɛ sʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ ba yɩlɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ kʋʋgɛ mu ansi tɔ. Nɩɩ ɔ kan kʋʋgɛ mʋ kɛ ɔ nyɛ taa kebii mʋ mɩyɛ bilen.
66012005	Nɩɩ ɔ kʋʋgɛ kebii‐nyɩnsa‐bii mʋ nɩɩ ee biti ɔ taa kɩbɩlɩtɔ kuwura‐kpebi gyii ndɛndɛmandɛ kpini sʋ kuwura. Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ ba taa kebii mʋ kpee Ɩbwaarɛ maa mʋ kuwura‐gya mʋ asɛ.
66012006	Nɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ sɩlɛ kpee keperi sʋ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ lɔŋɔ yɩla sa mʋ, katɩn mʋ nɩɩ bee biti ba kɩɩ mʋ sʋ nkɛ kagbɩn kʋlʋn yɛ alɩfa anyɔ yɛ adisiye (1,260). Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ bɩlɩsa asɛ kɔ yɛ kɩnansɛ pɩpɛɛ dansa mʋ.
66012007	Nɩɩ kɩnaa kɩtɩyɛ sʋsʋ. Ɩbwaarɛ kabɔɔ bɩlɩsa asɛ Maakɛlɩ maa mʋ nbɔɔ ba kɔ yɛ kɩnansɛ dansa mʋ, nɩɩ kanansɛ dansa mʋ maa mʋ nbɔɔ gbaa ba kɔ yɛ bamʋ.
66012008	Amaa kɩnansɛ dansa maa mʋ nbɔɔ ba kɔ tɩyɛ, nɩɩ ba man bɩla nyɛ ɔkyɩnakpa sʋsʋ.
66012009	Nɩɩ ba ŋɛ kanɩn kɩnansɛ dansa maŋa kyʋŋɛ kasɛ sʋ. Mʋ ɩ gyɛ dɩdaa kanansɛ mʋ nɩɩ bɛɛ tɩɩ yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ okisipu, abɛɛ Sɩtaanɛ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ pɩna dulinyaa tɔ asa kpini mʋ. Ba ŋɛ maa mʋ nbɔɔ mʋ kyʋŋɛ kasɛ sʋ.
66012010	Nɩɩ n nu ɔbʋlɛ lala kʋ sʋsʋ maa tɔwɛ yɛ, “Nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kamɔlɩgɛ kɩ ba. Nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ kaapʋ mʋ ɔlʋn fɛɛ Owura. Nbɩɩnbɩɩ nɩɩ Krisito mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ Wʋla lɛɛ mʋ, kɩbɩlɩsa mʋ kɩ lɩɩ ifuli. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Sɩtaanɛ, anɛ tɔɔmaa ana ɔpwɩɩpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ɛɛ yɩlɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ansi tɔ ɛɛ pwɩɩ bamʋ kakyʋwapɛ yɛ kagyanbwɛ mʋ, ba ŋɛ mʋ lɩɩ sʋsʋ fɔyɩ.
66012011	Nɩɩ anɛ tɔɔmaa ana ba taa Kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ nkalan, yɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asɩn mʋ kesintin kɩlɛɛ tɔwɛ mʋ gyii Sɩtaanɛ sʋ, nɩɩ ba man taa bamʋ n‐yɩɩ tɩɩ sɛhn, amaa ba taa bamʋ nkpa yɩlɛ tɔ sa lewu.
66012012	Ɩmʋ sʋ, sʋsʋ yɛ fanɛ mʋ nɩɩ fan tɛ kɩmʋ tɔ mʋ, fan yɛgɛ fanɛ ansi i gyii. Amaa kasɛ yɛ ɔpʋ bɩrɛ, laakʋ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ Sɩtaanɛ kpɩlɩgɛ ba kasɛ sʋ fanɛ asɛ, nɩɩ agbʋ a bɔla mʋ tɔ. Lɩɩ fɛɛ o nyi mʋ saŋa maa man bɩla ɔ kyɔ.”
66012013	Kɩnansɛ pɩpɛɛ dansa mʋ maa wu fɛɛ ba ŋɛ mʋ kyʋŋɛ kasɛ sʋ mʋ, ɔ kʋsʋ bɩɩtɛ ɔ gya ɔkyɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɔ kʋʋgɛ obii‐nyɩnsa mʋ.
66012014	Nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa ɔkyɩɩ mʋ kpaakpaatɛ lala abanbantɛ anyɔ, kɛ ɔ taalɛ fugi kpee kepiri sʋ katɩn mʋ nɩɩ ba lɔŋɔ yɩla sa mʋ. Kɛ ba kɩɩ mʋ sʋ naa fʋʋ nsu nsa yɛ kɩdɩyɛ, kɛ kɩnansɛ pɩpɛɛ dansa mʋ ɔ man nyɛ mʋ.
66012015	Tʋtɔ nɩɩ kɩnansɛ mʋ gbʋʋ nkyu lɩɩ mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ fɛɛ ɔbʋn mʋ, kɛ kɩmʋ ɔgyalɛ o gyii ɔkyɩɩ mʋ.
66012016	Amaa kasɛ kɩ kyɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ tɔ, fɛɛ kɩ maa bugi kɩmʋ kɔnɔ mɩyɛ nkyu mʋ nɩɩ kɩnansɛ mʋ gbʋʋ lɩɩ mʋ kɔnɔ tɔ mʋ.
66012017	Nɩɩ kɩnansɛ mʋ nyɛ agbʋ lɩɩ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ sʋ, nɩɩ ɔ kyʋn ɔ naa kɔ yɛ ɔkyɩɩ mʋ mu‐bii ana asansa mʋ kpini. Bamʋ ɩ gyɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba buu Ɩbwaarɛ nbara, nɩɩ ba yɩlɛ kenken bee gyii Yesu asɩn mʋ kesintin mʋ.
66012018	Nɩɩ kɩnansɛ pɩpɛɛ dansa mʋ naa sii ɔ yɩlɛ ɔpʋ kɔnɔ.
66013001	N wu kadʋnbwɛ kʋ maa lɩɩ ɔpʋ tɔ ɛɛ ba. Ɔ sʋ agyakpaa kudu yɛ amu asunɔ yɛgɛ awura‐wʋrʋ kudu ɩɩ bun agyakpaa mʋ sʋ, yɛgɛ atɩɩ mʋ nɩɩ ɩɩ saalɛ Ɩbwaarɛ ɩ gyan mu kumu kʋmaa nɩmʋ sʋ.
66013002	Kadʋnbwɛ mʋ nɩɩ n wu mʋ du fɛɛ ɔpɩya, nɩɩ mʋ ayaa i du nɩn fɛɛ ɔkyʋkyʋrakyʋrɛ ayaa, nɩɩ mʋ kɔnɔ ki du fɛɛ bɩranɛ kɔnɔ. Nɩɩ kɩnansɛ pɩpɛɛ dansa mʋ taa mʋ ɔlʋn yɛ mʋ kuwura‐gya yɛ kɩmʋ kɩbɩlɩsa mʋ kpini sa kadʋnbwɛ mʋ.
66013003	Mu amu mʋ tɔ kʋkʋ du nɩn fɛɛ kɩ maa nyɛ lewu ɔlɔ mʋ nɩɩ kɩɩ taalɛ mɔɔ, amaa ki wu. Nɩɩ i kyinkyin dulinyaa tɔ asa kpini nɩɩ ba buu mʋ.
66013004	Nɩɩ asa ba sun kɩnansɛ pɩpɛɛ dansa mʋ, lɩɩ fɛɛ ɔ sa kadʋnbwɛ mʋ ɔlʋn nɩɩ ba bɩla ba sun kadʋnbwɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ bɛɛ taasɛ yɛ, “Anɩmʋ ɩ fʋʋ kadʋnbwɛ nɩmʋ? Anɩmʋ ɩ taalɛ kɔ yɛ mʋ?”
66013005	Ɩbwaarɛ sa kadʋnbwɛ mʋ ɔkpa yɛ ɔ tɔwɛ alala‐sɩn kɛ ɔ saalɛ mʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ sa mʋ ɔlʋn yɛ o gyii kɩbɩlɩsa ɩbwaayɩ adɩna yɛ anyɔ.
66013006	Nɩɩ o bugi mʋ kɔnɔ tɔwɛ nbusaa asɩn ee yii Ɩbwaarɛ, ee nyita mʋ kɩtɩɩ yɛgɛ ɛɛ saalɛ mʋ ɔkyɩnakpa yɛ asa mʋ nɩɩ ba bʋ mʋ asɛ sʋsʋ mʋ kpini.
66013007	Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla sa mʋ ɔkpa yɛ ɔ kɔ mʋ asa, kɛ o gyii bamʋ sʋ. Nɩɩ ɔ bɩla sa mʋ ɔkpa yɛ o gyii kuwura nbunɔ kʋmaa yɛ asa kʋmaa yɛ ntɔwɛ kʋmaa yɛ ndɛndɛmandɛ kpini sʋ.
66013008	Kasɛ sʋ asa kpini bee biti ba sun kadʋnbwɛ mʋ. Amɔɔ bamʋ nɩɩ ba kyʋrɔɔ bamʋ atɩɩ waa nkpa ɔwʋlɛ mʋ tɔ lɩɩ dulinyaa npiili asɛ mʋ nkʋn. Nkpa ɔwʋlɛ nɩmʋ gyɛ Kabʋlʋpʋ mʋ nɩɩ ba mɔɔ mʋ lɛɛ.
66013009	Nɩɩ ɔmʋ nɩɩ ɔ sʋ asʋ mʋ o nu.
66013010	Nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ dɛ sa fɛɛ bee biti ba tii ɔkʋ obu mʋ, bee biti ba kɩtaa mʋ naa tii. Nɩɩ ɩ kan ɩ dɛ fɛɛ sakunde nɩɩ bee biti ba taa mɔɔ ɔkʋ mʋ, sakunde lewu nɩɩ ee biti o wu. Asɩn nɩmʋ falɛ sʋ nɩɩ ɩ dagaa fɛɛ Ɩbwaarɛ asa ba maa nyɛ kenyiita, kɛ ba nyɛ nkɔlɔ yɩlɛ bamʋ kɩkɔɔlɛ‐gyii tɔ.
66013011	Nɩɩ n bɩla wu kadʋnbwɛ kʋ maa paatɛ lɩɩ kasɛ tɔ. Ɔ sʋ agyakpaa anyɔ fɛɛ kabʋlʋpʋ, amaa ɛɛ tɔwɛ fɛɛ kɩnansɛ pɩpɛɛ dansa mʋ.
66013012	Ɔ sʋ kadʋnbwɛ gyankpaasa mʋ kɩbɩlɩsa, nɩɩ ɔ yɩlɛ mʋ ayaa tɔ sun kusun. Nɩɩ ɔ nyan kasɛ yɛ kɩmʋ sʋ asa kpini, yɛ ba sun kadʋnbwɛ gyankpaasa mʋ nɩɩ mu lewu ɔlɔ mʋ wu mʋ.
66013013	Nɩɩ kadʋnbwɛ nyɔsapʋ nɩmʋ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa lala, halɩɩ ɔ yɛgɛ nɩɩ fʋlɔn lɩɩ sʋsʋ ba kasɛ sʋ nɩɩ asa ba wu yɛ bamʋ ansi.
66013014	Lɩɩ ɔkpa mʋ nɩɩ Ɩbwaarɛ sa mʋ sʋ mʋ, ɔ yɩlɛ kadʋnbwɛ gyankpaasa mʋ ayaa tɔ waa asɩn kyinkyinsa, ɔ sʋ ɛɛ pɩna dulinyaa tɔ asa kpini. Nɩɩ ɔ nyan dulinyaa tɔ asa yɛ ba pɔyɩ ɔdakpa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ yɩlɛ sa kadʋnbwɛ gyankpaasa mʋ nɩɩ ɔ nyɛ lewu ɔlɔ, nɩɩ o bwii kpaarɛ mʋ.
66013015	Ɩbwaarɛ sa kadʋnbwɛ nyɔsapʋ mʋ ɔkpa, fɛɛ ɔ fʋʋtɛ nkpa ɔfʋʋtɛ sa ɔdakpa mʋ nɩɩ kɩ yɩlɛ sa kadʋnbwɛ gyankpaasa mʋ. Kɛ kɩ taalɛ tɔwɛ, kɛ kɩ taalɛ mɔɔ ɔkʋmaa mʋ nɩɩ o kina yɛ ɔ mɛɛ yɛ o sun mʋ mʋ.
